en: From the report, it appears that the abnormal signal fluctuations exhibit the same characteristics as our scan results from before.

zh: 从敌舰提取的战斗信息记录中可以判断出战斗已经转移至{4|system_name:_tr}星系。
en: The combat log extracted from the enemy ship indicates that the battle has moved to the {4|system_name:_tr} system.

zh: 从早已遗忘的时代留下来的某种奇怪古物的基地。
en: The base of some strange artifact from long-forgotten times.

zh: 从而获得特殊故事任务的委托书！奖励丰厚，但是难度也更大！请务必小心。
en: Then you'll be able to unlock special story missions! But with greater rewards come greater risks! Please be careful.

zh: 从舰船上发射一个全向脉冲，对周围船只造成电磁伤害。
en: Radiates an omnidirectional pulse from the ship that causes EM damage to surrounding vessels.

zh: 从虚无缥缈的空洞中诞生的存在。它超越世人的所有想象：比所有元素都更原始，即便毁灭，也不断重生。它是混沌之子，是迈向未来之途。空虚的欲望扩散到整个世界，因而黑暗吞噬大地，其后风暴肆虐。从虚无缥缈的空洞中诞生的存在。——《天启之七兆》，达美拉·马卡柏博士
en: From the formless void's gaping maw, there springs an entity. Not an entity such as any you can conceive of, nor I; an entity more primordial than the elements themselves, yet constantly coming into existence even as it is destroyed. It is the Child of Chaos, the Pathway to the Next. The darkness shall swallow the land, and in its wake there will follow a storm, as the appetite of nothing expands over the world. From the formless void's gaping maw, there springs an entity. Dr. Damella Macaper The Seven Events of the Apocalypse

zh: 从设计上看，这个冬眠者无人机很像最早期的冬眠者星舰。这表明它可能是在那个时期制造的。尽管已经年代久远，但是它的装甲看上去确实非常完好。如果它确实是在它的设计者那个时代制造的，那也肯定是最近才被投入使用的。
en: The design of this Sleeper drone is believed to echo that of the very earliest Sleeper Starships, suggesting it may also have been constructed during that period. Contrasting with its possible age is the unspoiled condition of its armor, suggesting that, if it is indeed as ancient as its designers, it has only very recently been put into service.

zh: 从这个虫洞喷射出来的物质中含有氢气、氧气、硅、铁以及其他通常只在类地行星上才能找到的物质。
en: The material being ejected from this wormhole consists of hydrogen, oxygen, silicon, iron, and other materials usually only found in those states and frequency on terrestrial planets.

zh: 他一定有苦衷，我要把他找回来。
en: He must be having a hard time, I want to bring him back.

zh: 他们在外环星域隐秘地点安置的采矿装置，最近又被海盗袭击了。我这就把事发点的坐标发给你。
en: Some of their mining facilities, placed in a hidden location in the Outer Ring, were recently attacked by pirates. I'm sending you the coordinates of the attack.

zh: 他们在最早的战争中主动加入了艾玛，甘愿被奴役以保全性命。
en: They joined the Amarr, willing to become slaves in exchange for the Empire's protection.

zh: 他们已经和海盗周旋很久了，如果再拖下去恐怕就要酿成悲剧了。
en: They have been battling with pirates for quite some time, and if the conflict continues, I'm afraid that it will turn into a real tragedy.

zh: 他们当中甚至有些没来得及完成意识传送就遇害了。
en: Some of them were killed even before they finished uploading their minds.

zh: 他们当中的很多人都是加达里鼎盛时期的精锐军人。
en: Many of them were elite troops from the Caldari army during its heyday.

zh: 他们打伤了守卫之后迅速逃到船坞，启动舰船逃走了……
en: They took down the guards, fled to the shipyard, started up the ship and got away...

zh: 他们的一艘运货船出了机械故障，仓库里的冷藏植物种子眼看就要腐坏了。坐标我立即发给您。
en: One of their cargo ships had a mechanical failure, and the frozen plant seeds in the warehouse were spoiled. I'm sending you the coordinates now.

zh: 他们的逃跑路线已经被我们掌握了，消灭他们。
en: Their escape route has already been discovered. Destroy them.

zh: 他们空间站里的净水系统因为核反应堆故障完全污染了。
en: Their water purification system in the space station has been completely contaminated by the nuclear reactor.

zh: 他们背后的力量超乎我们的想象，我一直试图搞清解药的来源。
en: What lies behind them is beyond our imagination. I've been trying to figure out where the antidotes are from.

zh: 他们让一批携带着外星病毒的艾玛达难民进入了空间站。
en: They let a group of Ammatar refugees carrying an alien virus into the station.

zh: 他们需要那些秘密……很不巧，我就知道其中一些。
en: They need these secrets... Unfortunately for them, I'm keeping some of them.

zh: 他似乎在这里和什么人见了面，然后搭乘穿梭机去了别的地方。
en: It seems that he met someone here, than took a shuttle to somewhere else.

zh: 他已经走了，我不知道他在哪。
en: He's gone, I don't know where he is.

zh: 他掌握着很多对皇室不利的资料，我们不能允许这样的人在枢密院活跃。
en: He holds a lot of information that is unfavorable to the royal family. We cannot allow such people to be active in the Privy Council.

zh: 代理人驾驶的一艘共和舰队狂暴级份飞船。
en: A Republic Fleet Tempest piloted by an agent.

zh: 代理人驾驶的先知级飞船。
en: A Prophecy piloted by an agent.

zh: 代理人驾驶的凤凰级飞船。
en: A Phoenix piloted by an agent.

zh: 代理人驾驶的咒灭级飞船。
en: A Malediction piloted by an agent.

zh: 代理人驾驶的噩梦级飞船。
en: A Nightmare piloted by an agent.

zh: 代理人驾驶的多米尼克斯级飞船。
en: A Dominix piloted by an agent.

zh: 代理人驾驶的大鸨级飞船。
en: A Bustard piloted by an agent.

zh: 代理人驾驶的大鸨级飞船。 任务：  难度等级：5级
en:
A Bustard piloted by an agent.

Missions: 

Difficulty Rating: Grade 5

zh: 代理人驾驶的布鲁提克斯级飞船。
en: A Brutix piloted by an agent.

zh: 代这些工人和他们的家属感谢您的义举！
en: On behalf of these workers and their families, I thank you for your generous help!

zh: 令人回忆起古老往日的古物。
en: An archaic reminder of the days of olde.

zh: 令人激动的时刻！克隆人先生！一款新性的重型战斗无人机就要问世了！
en: What an exciting moment, my Capsuleer friend! A new heavy combat drone is about to be announced!

zh: 以后不再弹出此项提示
以吞食孩子的艾玛传奇精灵为名，巴戈龙级是血袭者同盟的骄傲与幸福。尽管大家都知道它的设计基于末日沙场级蓝图，但没人知道该设计的最初源头。在怪异妖孽的仪式中，那些迷信似的教唆不绝于耳。但对于大多数人来说，实际景象就足以说明一切：但你在地平线上看到有血色恐怖若隐若现时，也就是你应该浑身颤抖的时候。
en: Named after a child-devouring demon of Amarrian legend, the Bhaalgorn is the pride and joy of the Blood Raider cabal. Though it is known to be based on an Armageddon blueprint, the design's origin remains shrouded in mystery. Those of a superstitious persuasion whisper in the dark of eldritch ceremonies and arcane rituals, but for most people, the practical aspect of the matter will more than suffice: you see one of these blood-red horrors looming on the horizon, it's time to make yourself scarce.

zh: 以护盾为核心思想的的大规模会战理论，能够提升护盾效能。
en: Large-scale siege warfare theory based on shield use. Increases shield efficiency.

zh: 以某些物体为中心的球状防御罩。
en: A spherical barrier, centered around some object.

zh: 以游击作战为核心思想的的大规模会战理论，能够提升机动性和续航能力。
en: Large-scale siege warfare theory based on skirmish warfare. Increases mobility and flight time.

zh: 以电子战为核心思想的的大规模会战理论，能够提升电子战效能和对电子战的抗性。
en: Large-scale siege warfare theory based on electronic warfare. Increases efficiency and endurance in electronic warfare.

zh: 以装甲为核心思想的的大规模会战理论，能够提升装甲效能。
en: Large-scale siege warfare theory based on armor. Increases armor efficiency.

zh: 价钱和数量必须大于零
en: Price and quantity must be greater than zero

zh: 任务位标已发送至频道：#cFDD07A{channel_name:_tr}#n
任务信息任务信息任务信息
任务包括了战斗任务和后勤任务，您可以根据自己喜欢的内容进行选择。
en: Missions include combat missions and logistics missions. You can choose missions according to your own preferences.

zh: 任务完成的不错，您和我在军中的那些同僚们一样优秀。
en: Job well done. You are as good as my comrades-in-arms.

zh: 任务完成的非常出色，飞行员。
伊奇马利·欧巴萨的哨站
伊帕娜·玛尔提的潜龙级
伊库尔·艾任的尼铎格尔级飞船
伊松·蒂亚达拉是驻扎在奥德斯代尔的米玛塔尔和盖伦特部队的首领。她被授命于守卫该恒星系并防止任何敌人入侵。鉴于奥德斯代尔不安定的政治形势，共和国将她及其他数十万军人派遣到了这里。 伊松尽管较年轻，但已久经沙场。由于展现出了作为战地指挥官的杰出才能，她在米玛塔尔共和国中的军衔一路扶摇直上。她指挥一艘强大的、令整个宇宙感到畏惧的“纳迦法”级无畏舰。 任务：  难度等级：8.5级
en:
Ison Tiadala is the leader of the Minmatar and Gallente army stationed in Audesder.  Her assignment is to defend the solarsystem from any enemy incursions.  She was ordered by the Republic, as were hundreds of thousands of other military personnel, to relocate herself to Audesder due to the volatile political situation in the region.

Ison is a veteran on the battlefield, despite her relatively young age.  Displaying remarkable ability as a field commander, she quickly rose up in the military ranks of the Minmatar Republic.  She commands a mighty Naglfar dreadnought, which is feared in all corners of the galaxy.

Missions: 

Difficulty Rating: Grade 8.5

zh: 伊松·蒂亚达拉的狂暴级飞船
伊松·蒂亚达拉的纳迦法级
伊林尔·安家特的埃比斯级
伊特龙级货运船高速可靠，有好几个版本。因为它价格便宜，装配方式多样，可以用来运送任何货物，所以广受军民欢迎。不过它的防御能力极差，在危险地区作业时需要有人保护。
en: The Iteron-class cargo tugger is fast and reliable and there are many versions of it. It is equally popular among civilians and militaries alike as it's cheap and can be fitted in myriad different ways, allowing it to be used to freight almost anything. It is, however, quite vulnerable and needs to be protected while in unfriendly territories.

zh: 伊甸币可用于兑换星币，获得途径是使用量子元兑换
en: PLEX can be exchanged for ISK. You can obtain it by exchanging AUR.

zh: 伊米卡斯级护卫舰尽管航速较慢，但却具有相当的防护能力，是侦查行动中的理想选择，通常为商人、矿业人员和战斗人员所喜爱。伊米卡斯级在低安全等级地区航行时，更大程度上是依赖于飞行员敏锐的视力和听力来发挥它最大的效能。
en: The Imicus is a slow but hard-shelled frigate, ideal for any type of scouting activity. Used by merchant, miner and combat groups, the Imicus is usually relied upon as the operation's eyes and ears when traversing low security sectors.

zh: 伊米卡斯级护卫舰尽管航速较慢，但却具有相当的防护能力，是侦查行动中的理想选择，通常为商人，矿业人员和战斗人员所喜爱。伊米卡斯级在低安全等级地区航行时，更大程度上是依赖于飞行员敏锐的视力和听力来发挥它最大的效能。
en: The Imicus is a slow but hard-shelled frigate, ideal for any type of scouting activity. Used by merchant, miner and combat groups, the Imicus is usually relied upon as the operation's eyes and ears when traversing low-security sectors.

zh: 伊米卡斯级被当做货运快递运输船使用，放弃了武装之后，机动能力也提高了不少，不过运输货物多了之后，依然还是缓慢的爬行者。
en: The Imicus is used as a delivery ship. Its mobility was greatly increased by removing its weapons systems. However, it will still slow down to a crawl after being loaded full of goods.

zh: 伊米卡斯级隐匿型蓝图
伊米卡斯级高机动型蓝图
伊麦·克农遭受了自由无人机袭击，显然是在痛苦中死去的。
en: Imai Kenon evidently met a painful death after his ship had been infested by rogue drones.

zh: 伐木者级护卫舰虽然廉价，但却是个多面手。它被大规模生产，是米玛塔尔空间内最常见的舰船之一。伐木者级速度极快，武器装备也不错，因此在新手中很流行。
en: The Slasher is cheap but versatile. It has been manufactured en masse, making it one of the most common vessels in Minmatar space. The Slasher is extremely fast, with decent armaments, and is popular amongst novice pirates and smugglers.

zh: 优秀的反护卫平台被莱登船业升级改造后，哪怕遇到其他同类驱逐舰也不必过于担忧，谁会拒绝更优质的舰船呢？
en: After being upgraded by Roden Shipyards, this already excellent anti-frigate platform is now even better equipped, giving it more breathing room when dealing with other destroyers of a similar class. Who would say no to a vessel with such impressive improvements?
Mission Beacon: Survival of the Fittest

zh: 伯棱·欧迪利杜的徘徊者级飞船
似乎奴隶船的船长不愿投降呢，剩下的事交给我们吧。
en: It seems that the captain of the slave ship is unwilling to surrender. Leave the rest to us.

zh: 但我会尽快安排人把你的家人都救出来。
en: But I'll send someone to save your family as soon as possible.

zh: 但我无法相信自己的弟弟会做出这样的事情！
en: But I don't believe that my brother would do something like this!

zh: 但是因为我们的运输船刚刚被海盗袭击……结果……
en: But since our freighter just suffered a pirate attack...

zh: 但是里面的舰船却又不符合任何血袭者舰船的特征……
en: But the ships don't share any characteristics with Blood Raider ships...

zh: 位于一个巨大小行星内的哨站。
en: An outpost situated inside a massive asteroid.

zh: 低技术隐匿空间能量采集站
体验其他文化和探索新世界的愿望在宇宙富裕公民心中是难以抑制的。
en: The need for tasting other cultures and seeing new worlds is unquenchable among the well-off citizens of the universe.

zh:
作为一名商人，可以在市场中通过低价买入、高价售出物品获取其中的差价利润。
也可以囤积大量的资源操控市场物价。
en:
As a dealer, you can earn a profit by purchasing items on the Market and selling them at a higher price.
You can also stock up on certain resources to control their market price.

zh: 作为克隆人飞行员，战斗是立身之本
en: As a Capsuleer, the battle is the foundation

zh: 作为八大集团之首，如果连基本的安保都做不好，以后势必难以立足。
en: They are the leader among the eight mega corporations. If they can't even get the basics – like their security – right, they're going to have trouble in the future.

zh: 作为加达里的军人，连这点苦都吃不了，实在令人大失所望。
en: He's a Caldari soldier, yet he can't even endure a hardship like this. This truly is disappointing.

zh:
作为外空联合矿业(ORE)与深核矿业(DCM)的合作产品，逆戟鲸级不仅可满足新伊甸的工业需求，也是一款灵活的采矿作业管理平台。

逆戟鲸级传承了ORE应用在长须鲸级上的很多技术，并融合了DCM研发部门的最新成果，它多样化的能力可以支持各种规模的作业与需求。
en:
The Orca was developed as a joint venture between Outer Ring Excavations and Deep Core Mining Inc as a vessel to help meet the demands of New Eden's industry and provide a flexible platform from which mining operations can be more easily managed.
The Orca uses much of the technology developed by ORE for the Rorqual and integrated with the latest advancements from Deep Core Mining research division has developed a vessel which offers a diverse role to all sizes of operations and needs.

zh: 作为外空联合矿业与深核矿业的合作产品，逆戟鲸级不仅可满足新伊甸的工业需求，也是一个灵活的采矿作业管理平台。逆戟鲸级传承了外空联合矿业应用在长须鲸级上的很多技术，并融合了深核矿业研发部门的最新成果，它多样化的能力可以支持各种规模的作业与需求。
en: The Orca was developed as a joint venture between Outer Ring Excavations and Deep Core Mining Inc as a vessel to help meet the demands of New Eden's industry and provide a flexible platform from which mining operations can be more easily managed. The Orca uses much of the technology developed by ORE for the Rorqual and integrated with the latest advancements from Deep Core Mining research division has developed a vessel which offers a diverse role to all sizes of operations and needs.

zh: 作为多功能的米玛塔尔战舰，挑战级既能成为决定性的战斗力量，也能为大队的护卫舰提供支持。虽然它已经不能与新型的海军巡洋舰相提并论，但是挑战级仍然是执行各种任务时的可靠选择，尤其是在远程作战方面。
en: Being a highly versatile class of Minmatar ships, the Bellicose has been used as a combat juggernaut as well as a support ship for wings of frigates. While not quite in the league of newer navy cruisers, the Bellicose is still a very solid ship for most purposes, especially in terms of long range combat.

zh: 作为昇威财团堡垒建筑中性价比较均衡的典型，铁壁专为太空中的大规模活动而设计，可以作为大型军团和小型联盟的装备精良的基地，也可以作为大型联盟的边境和贸易哨站。空堡建筑采用了最新的舰船驻留科技而建造，能够容留大多数舰船停泊，货舰甚至旗舰也不例外。虽然不能接纳超级旗舰停泊，但借助范围性武器，铁壁在低安星系的防御能力有了很大提升。
en: Conceived as a good balance of capability and investment in the Upwell Consortium's Citadel range of space stations, the Fortizar has been designed for large-scale operations in space, such as providing a well-equipped home for large corporations and small alliances, or as a border or trade post for larger alliances. The Fortizar has been built with new spaceship tethering technology as standard, and will readily accommodate most ships, including freighters and even capital ships, in its internal docking bays. While the docks are unable to service 'supercapital' level vessels, the defensive capabilities of the Fortizar are considerably enhanced in lower security star systems with the ability to mount area effect weapons.

zh: 作为渡神级的创造国，加达里通常被誉为货舰行业的领头人。他们意识到，随着深空装置数目不断显著增长，对于大型运输工具的需求必定大增，因此他们着手制造终极大规模运输工具——其他帝国不久纷纷跟进。尽管如此，渡神级依然是衡量其他货舰的尺标。它巨大的体形和货舱容量无船能及。
en: As the makers of the Charon, the Caldari State are generally credited with pioneering the freighter class. Recognizing the need for a massive transport vehicle as deep space installations constantly increase in number, they set about making the ultimate in efficient mass transport - and were soon followed by the other empires. Regardless, the Charon still stands out as the benchmark by which the other freighters were measured. Its massive size and titanic cargo hold are rivalled by none.

zh: 作为渡神级的设计者，加达里合众国被誉为是货舰级别舰船设计建造的先驱者。由于深空设施的不算增加，其对大型运输载具的需求也日益剧增，加达里的设计者深深地明白这个需求的存在。他们决定建造一种终极运输舰船，从而引发了其它各个国家在这个方面的投入。不过，渡神级成为了其它所有国家建造自己的货件时的参照物，它庞大的尺寸和巨大的货柜容量是其他任何舰船所无法比拟的。
en:
As the makers of the Charon, the Caldari State are generally credited with pioneering the freighter class. 
Recognizing the need for a massive transport vehicle as deep space installations constantly increase in number, 
they set about making the ultimate in efficient mass transport - and were soon followed by the other empires. 
Regardless, the Charon still stands out as the benchmark by which the other freighters were measured. 
Its massive size and titanic cargo hold are rivalled by none.

zh: 作为盖伦特星际飞船设计中涌现出的最凶猛战舰之一，布鲁提克斯级是个不折不扣的巨兽。当这个强大的怪物出现的时候，整个战场都会为之瞩目。
en: One of the most ferocious war vessels to ever spring from Gallente starship design, the Brutix is a behemoth in every sense of the word. When this hard-hitting monster appears, the battlefield takes notice.

zh: 作为第三个进入货舰制造领域的国家，共和国在设计最初阶段就决定注重所有舰船系统的平衡性。与共和国以往的风格一样，他们创造了一种相对较轻的飞船——当然，“较轻”这个词在这个大家伙身上可能不那么适用。
en: Third in line to jump on the freighter bandwagon, the Republic decided early in the design process to focus on a balance between all ship systems. True to form, their creation is comparatively lightweight - though lightweight is certainly not a term easily applicable to this giant.

zh: 你一个初出茅庐小小年纪的事务官，怎么有胆量像这样和我说话？
en: How dare you talk to me like that! You're just a novice officer!

zh: 你一出马就收回一大笔钱了，哈哈哈。
en: With you on the case, the money was recovered straight away, haha.

zh: 你不用着急，我有很多问题要问你。
en: There's no need to rush. I've got a lot of questions for you.

zh: 你也一样，克隆人！你至少拯救了两百名杜厦船员！
en: You're not so bad yourself, Capsuleer! You saved at least two hundred Ducia Foundry crew members!

zh: 你也知道，那个传言……一旦被证实，将掀起撼动皇位的大风波……
en: You know, that rumor... Once it's proven, the aftermath will affect even the Empress...

zh: 你们一点都不高兴吗？重获自由，摆脱奴隶主的控制。
en: Aren't you guys supposed to be happy now? You've escaped the slavers and regained your freedom...

zh: 你们的定位有没有问题？还是说文件已经被销毁了？
en: Is there anything wrong with your positioning? Or are the files already destroyed?

zh: 你们自由了，米玛塔尔人。
en: You are free, people of Minmatar!
Here's the vaccine you asked for

zh: 你们这样做不符合联邦的法律！你们侵害了我的人身自由！
en: What you have done does not comply with Federal Laws! You have violated my personal freedom!

zh: 你估计如果使用某种打捞设备，或许还能从这些废渣中获得些有价值的东西。
en: You surmise that with some salvaging equipment there is still something of value to be had from this old waste.

zh: 你估计如果使用某种打捞设备，或许还能从这些残骸中获得些有价值的东西。
en: You surmise that with some salvaging equipment there is still something of value to be had from this old wreck.

zh: 你估计如果使用某种打捞设备，或许还能从这些遗弃物中获得些有价值的东西。
en: You surmise that with some salvaging equipment there is still something of value to be had from this old derelict.

zh: 你估计如果使用某种打捞设备，或许还能从这老旧的船体中获得些有价值的东西。
en: You surmise that with some salvaging equipment there is still something of value to be had from this old hulk.

zh: 你刚才在说什么？噢，对，追击！当然要追击！
en: What did you say? Oh, right, yes! Of course we pursue!

zh: 你又一次解救了我们，飞行员。
你可以在这里看到由其他非克隆人团体发布的委托任务。
en: Here you can see the missions posted by other non-Capsuleer organizations.

zh: 你可以换一艘大船或者多跑几次，不过我希望你还是尽量一次搞定。
en: You can either get a bigger ship and deliver them all in one go, or stick to your current ship and run back and forth a few more times. The choice is yours, but I'd prefer that you choose the former.

zh: 你和你的灵魂之间当然已有距离，但你是真实存在的。
en: It is sure that you are somewhat detached from your soul. Nevertheless, this does not affect your physical existence.

zh: 你和这座不祥的废墟间隔了亿万年的历史。人们只能纳闷，究竟是谁在很久以前建造了它，而且更重要的是，他们留下了什么。精明的考古学家也许能发现一些有趣的东西。
en: Eons seperate you and this foreboding ruins. One can only wonder over who built it long ago and, more importantly, what they left behind. A shrewd archaeologist might be able to unearth something of interest.

zh: 你好啊，年轻人。本来家丑不可外扬，但这件事确实非常棘手。
en: Hello, young one. It's really just family business, but this has gotten out of hand.

zh: 你好啊，飞行员。我们集团部署在{2|system_name:_tr}的市场服务器在黑客的攻击下停机了。
en: Hello, Capsuleer. Our market servers in {2|system_name:_tr} were taken down by hacker attacks.

zh: 你好啊，飞行员，最近有一点小麻烦想要拜托你。
en: Hello, Capsuleer, I have a favor to ask.

zh: 你好，年轻人，猜猜又发生什么事了？
en: Hello, young one. Guess what happened? Again!

zh: 你好，报酬即刻打给你，我得去抢单了回见！
en: Greetings! You'll receive your rewards shortly. I've got more orders to work on – till next time!

zh: 你好，自尊集团不希望粉丝们得知这些礼物的去向，报酬即刻打给你。
en: Greetings! Egonics Inc. would rather its fans didn't know where these gifts are going. You will receive your rewards shortly.

zh: 你好，这里是索菲亚，感谢你平息了这批旅客的怨愤，星捷运会即刻支付报酬。
en: Hello, this is Sophia. Thank you for appeasing the passengers. Your reward payment will be made by InterBus immediately.

zh: 你好，这里是索菲亚，我已经收到你的调查数据了，我们会联系姐妹会进行确认。
en: Hello, this is Sophia. I have received your investigation data. We will contact the Sisters for confirmation.

zh: 你好，飞行员。一伙贪得无厌的地痞阻拦了我们的航道。
en: Hello, Capsuleer. A group of avaricious scoundrels blocked our route.

zh: 你好，飞行员。又有一项讨厌的工作需要你的帮忙了。
en: Greetings, pilot. Here's another nasty job that needs your help.

zh: 你好，飞行员。情况有些特殊。
en: Greetings, pilot. The situation is a little special.

zh: 你好，飞行员。我们在{2|system_name:_tr}附近探查到一艘艾玛达的船队。
en: Greetings, pilot. We've detected an Ammatar fleet near {2|system_name:_tr}.

zh: 你好，飞行员。有一个战斗任务需要你的协助。
en: Greetings, pilot. There's a battle mission that needs your assistance.

zh: 你好，飞行员！我是自由扩张集团的贝尔。
en: Hello, Capsuleer! I'm Bell from Freedom Extension.

zh: 你好，飞行员，{2|station_name:_tr}的疾病防治部门出了点问题。
en: Hello, pilot. Something went wrong in the Disease Control and Prevention Division of {2|station_name:_tr}.

zh: 你好，飞行员，非常感谢你能接受这次委托。
en: Hello, Capsuleer. Thank you so much for accepting this commission.

zh: 你就不能换一艘大一点的船吗？
en: Can't you switch to a bigger ship?

zh: 你就是负责运输原料的飞行员吧？我等你好久了！
en: So you're the pilot who's in charge of transporting the raw materials? I've been waiting for you!

zh: 你已位于该星系，无法设为终点
en: Can't set destination to the system you are already in

zh: 你已位于该空间站，无法设为终点
en: Can't set destination to the station you are already in

zh: 你已经成功地进行了安全退出，
你应该好好学一学电子技术，舒达夫，传统的那一套早就行不通了。
en: Learn some electronic technology, Shudav. The old ways won't get you anywhere nowadays.

zh: 你必须完成{task_type2}{cnt}次，当前仅完成{cur_cnt}次
en: You need to complete {task_type2} {cnt} time(s). Currently completed: {cur_cnt} time(s).

zh: 你怀疑这块伤痕累累的金属块中隐藏了什么古物。
en: You suspect this battered hunk of metal may conceal some kind of relic.

zh: 你思量着如果使用打捞工具的话，说不定能从这个残骸中搞出点什么值钱的东西。
en: You surmise that with some salvaging equipment there is still something of value to be had from this wreck.

zh: 你提供这个给我是为了什么？
en: Why are you providing this to me?

zh: 你收到了玩家{player_name}的入队申请，要批准吗？
en: You received a request to join your team from player {player_name}. Approve it?

zh: 你收到了舰队{fleet_name}的入队邀请，要加入吗？
en: You received an invite from fleet {fleet_name}. Join them?

zh: 你是一个不朽者，或许重生对于你来说早就和吃饭睡觉一样平常……
en: You are an immortal; perhaps rebirth is as mundane to you as eating and sleeping...

zh: 你是新来的吗？以前没有见过你的名字……
en: Are you new here? I've never seen your name before...

zh: 你没有什么事情瞒着我吧？
en: Is there anything you're hiding from me?
Please check how many people there are

zh: 你的仓库里并没有我们需要的电池啊。
en: We didn't find the battery we need in your warehouse.

zh: 你的分析仪在这块麻花状的残骸中找到了一些有趣的东西，你迫不及待地想看看到底是什么。
en: Your analyzer is picking up something of interest in this piece of twisted wreckage, though you can't for the life of you see what it is.

zh: 你的舰船会在宇宙中消失。
en: Your ship will disappear in space.

zh: 你的船太小了！根本装不下！
en: Your ship is too small! It won't fit!

zh: 你的船舱不够大啊，去换一艘大一点的船吧。
en: You ship's cargo hold is not big enough. Switch to a bigger ship.

zh: 你的飞船好像装不下这么多东西，你还是换一艘船再来吧。
en: Looks like we can't fit all of these into your ship. You'd better come back with a bigger one.

zh: 你的飞船连装下一张纸的空间都没有吗？
en: Does your ship not even have space for a piece of paper?

zh: 你看到了什么东西，对吗？
你真是毫无防范，我只不过是在被袭击的舰船的特征信息加入一点小小的盖伦特病毒……
en: You really need to be more cautious. I've just implanted a little Gallente Virus into the attacked Ship's characteristic info...

zh: 你真的想卸下船上所有装备吗？
en: Do you really want to remove all modules from your ship?

zh: 你真的要将该物品重新装箱吗？
en: Are you sure you want to repackage this item?

zh: 你知道他们为什么费这么大力气搜捕我吗？
en: Do you know why they've gone to such trouble to hunt me down?

zh: 你知道克隆人泡在培养液的样子有多可笑吗？
en: Do you know how ridiculous the clones look in the incubation fluid?

zh: 你知道吗？唔……好像不是“华丽”，或许是“闪耀”？“璀璨”？也说不定。
en: Do you know? Hmm... it's not "Shiny." Perhaps "Bright"? "Sparkly"? Maybe not.

zh: 你知道这个东西意味着什么？这将成为女皇非法使用克隆技术的证据！
en: Do you know what this means? This proves that the Empress has been illegally using clone technology!

zh: 你确定是这个东西吗？我怎么感觉不太对啊！
en: Are you sure this is it? Something doesn't seem quite right to me...

zh: 你确定要中止此工程项目吗？
en: Are you sure you want to abort this engineering job?

zh: 你确定要将{member_name}请出舰队吗？
en: Are you sure you want to remove {member_name} from the fleet?

zh: 你确定要将队长头衔移交给{member_name}吗？
en: Are you sure you want to transfer the leadership to {member_name}?

zh: 你确定要离开当前舰队吗？
en: Are you sure you want to leave this fleet?

zh: 你确定这个是文件而不是别的什么奇怪的东西？
en: Are you sure this is a file, and not some other strange thing?

zh: 你确认要将玩家 {player_name} 添加到黑名单吗？
en: Are you sure you want to add player {player_name} to the blacklist?

zh: 你确认要将玩家 {player_name} 移出分组吗？
en: Are you sure you want to move player {player_name} out of the list?

zh: 你胡扯！我什么都没有做！
en: Nonsense! I've done none of that!
What are you doing? Damn it!

zh: 你要是不去，今天晚上就别想进屋子！
en: If you don't go, you're sleeping on the couch tonight!

zh: 你认为这东西里面藏着的东西可以用分析仪找到。
en: You think there might be something concealed here that an analyzer could discover.

zh: 你说什么？飞船没有足够空间容纳这些难民！
en: What are you saying? There's not enough room in the ship for all these refugees!

zh: 你身上有和所有加达里人一样卓越的战斗天赋。
en: You have the same great fighting talent as all Caldari.

zh: 你还是一如既往的优秀，委托金马上就给你打过去。
en: You are still as good as ever. Your commission will be paid to you immediately.

zh: 你这个可恶的人口贩子，把我们的同胞藏到哪里了！？
en: You dirty trafficker. Where did you hide our people?

zh: 你这个毫无信仰的尤朵人，这种无耻的话你都能说得出口！
en: You faithless Udorian! How dare you speak such blasphemy!

zh: 你这个骗子，里面一个人也没有！
en: You liar. There is no one inside!

zh: 你这次的任务完成的很好，女皇不会吝啬她的奖赏。
en: You have performed well in your mission. The Empress will spare no expense with your rewards.

zh: 你送来的东西似乎有问题。
en: There's something wrong with what you sent.
You lied to me. There's no medicine.

zh: 你！你袭击了我的私人舰队！
en: You! You ambushed my private fleet!

zh: 佩塔·瓦空的茶隼级飞船
使用分析仪应该能够从这块扭曲的船体外壳金属板上找到一些有用的信息。
en: This mangled sheet of hull plating contains something of interest to your analyzer.

zh: 使用扫描仪探索空间信号，获得各种数据。
en: Use scanner to sort through cosmic signatures for data.

zh: 使用核芯战斗部的通用地雷
使用纳米机器人缓慢修复目标舰船装甲受到的损伤，或者将护盾的能量传输到目标舰船上，帮助其进行防御。
en: Uses nanobots to slowly repair damage to the target, or to transfer shield power to the target, aiding in its defense.

zh: 使用舰船碎片与数据核心，花费一定的星币与时间，可以获得舰船蓝图。
en: With a small investment of your time and ISK, you'll be able to get ship blueprints from vessel debris and datacores.

zh: 使用蓝图与行星材料、矿物，花费一定的星币与时间，可以制造出各种工业产物，包括舰船、改装件等。
en: With a small investment of your time and ISK, you'll be able to use blueprints and planetary materials/minerals to manufacture industrial products like ships and rigs.

zh: 侍僧 大型电容器电池
依靠超光粒子晶体提供能量的反物质发生器，创造了一个完美的电磁辐射防御环。
en: An antimatter generator powered by tachyonic crystals, creating a perfect defensive circle of electro-magnetic radiance.

zh: 侦测到舱壁裂缝！危险！克隆程序启动！
en: Hull breach detected! Danger! Activating clone!

zh: 促进级最适于小型冲突战和舰队支援，被誉为最佳的反护卫舰平台之一。没什么人能质疑其顶尖的跟踪装置。
en: Ideally suited for both skirmish warfare and fleet support, the Catalyst is touted as one of the best anti-frigate platforms out there. Faced with its top-of-the-line tracking equipment, not many can argue.

zh: 促进级驱逐舰是联邦海军最常用的小型舰船之一，度沃勒改造其反跃迁功能，现在这个改进型正好证明了促进级的优势。
en: Catalyst-class destroyers are among the most common small ships in the Federation's naval fleet. Duvolle Labs improved the Catalyst's warp disruption capabilities, complementing its existing advantages over other ships.

zh: 保护技术蓝图委托信标

信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容信息内容
信息战指挥脉冲波作用范围
信息矩阵是当地人用来学习技能的工具。它由密码保护，不过保护力度可能并不强。
en: The info matrix is used by the local pirates to learn how to become good pirates. It is password protected, but probably not all that well.

zh: 修复成功，舰船已经停靠至当前空间站
en: Repair successful. The ship has docked at this station.

zh: 修复舰船必须在空间内
en: You can only repair ships inside a station

zh: 倒计时结束后，将自动安全下线
en: You will be logged off safely after the countdown.

zh: 做得不错，算是暂时稳定住了局势。回头我再找人单独收拾他们。
en: Well done, the situation is stabilizing for now. I will find someone to teach them a lesson later.

zh: 做的不错，飞行员，扫描结果非常清晰。我的技术人员正在努力地进行数据解析。
en: Well done pilot, the scan results are very clear. Our technicians are analyzing the data.

zh: 停止武器并取消编组确认

停滞捕捉光束通过使用微能流来降低目标舰船的最大速度，该装备可以有效地暂时束缚目标，降低其速度。

这种减速效果在近距离时十分有效，随着距离增加而逐渐减弱。

装配重型停滞捕捉光束需要非常稳定的基础平台，所以只能装配在战列舰和旗舰级舰船上。
en:
Stasis Grapplers reduce the maximum speed of a target ship by employing micro energy streams which effectively entangle the target temporarily, thereby slowing it down.
This slowing effect is strongest at very close ranges, and diminishes as range increases.
Heavy Stasis Grapplers require a very stable base platform, and therefore may only be fitted to Battleships and Capital Ships.
Dock with {station_name:_tr} {security} ({jump_cnt} jump(s)) and collect {item_cnt} unit(s) of {item_name:_tr}
Dock with {station_name:_tr} {security} ({jump_cnt} jump(s)) and deliver {item_cnt} unit(s) of {item_name:_tr}

zh: 停靠着的神示级无畏舰
偷窃 自适应装甲增强器
偷运这些药是重罪，但是更关键的是——究竟打算运给谁……
en: Smuggling these drugs is a serious crime. But more importantly – who are they being smuggled to...

zh: 储藏舱比安全货柜安全、耐用得多。哨站遭受袭击时，它们通常是主要目标，其中一般装有矿石、提炼矿物或者一些准备运往帝国区的贵重物品。
en: Storage silos are much more secure and durable than their Secure Container counterparts. They are usually the focus of attacks on outposts and commonly contain ore, reprocessed minerals or valuable items waiting to be transported to empire space.

zh: 储藏设施—放射性物资及小型武器
en: Storage Facility - radioactive stuff and small arms

zh: 像这样的储藏设施在太空中是常常见到的，它们被各种不同的人用作各种不同的用途。从储藏帝国居住地的粮草到藏匿海量的药物，这些储藏设施可以用做座种用途，因此它是在宇宙中最多被建筑的一种设施。
en: Storage warehouses like this are a common sight in space, and are employed by all kinds of people for all kinds of reasons. From storing wheat for Empire colonies to hiding vast stockpiles of drugs for resale, storage facilities serve a number of roles and as a result they are one of the most frequently deployed structures.

zh: 像这样的档案馆设施四处分布在新伊甸的宇宙中。尽管在这样的地方它并不是很常见，但在一些公司和个人在这里存放重要的文档的需求还是存在的。有一些情况则是因为后勤需要的原因；把整顿好的物资一个星系一个星系的移动是较为方便的一种方式。此外，在这些档案馆中数公里长的黑暗和真空环境也为对私人和隐秘空间的需求提供了便利。
en: Archival facilities can sometimes be found dotted around the spacelanes of New Eden. Although it is rare for them to be established out here, it is not unknown for various companies and individuals to store valuable documents in such places. Some are motivated by logistical factors; it's always easier to move things from system to system when they're already in space. Others simply favor the privacy and security that endless kilometers of darkness and vacuum offers.

zh: 新兵教育资料委托信标
先生，你最好想清楚再开口说话。
en: Sir, you'd better give it some thought before you talk.
Sir, can't you understand this situation?

zh: 先生，多谢你的好心，快离开这个是非之地吧。
en: Thank you for your kindness, sir. Please leave this place before trouble finds you.

zh: 先知级的设计基于一种古代艾玛战船，可以追溯到星际飞船大战的最早期。最初的设想是把它塑造成一艘完备的战列舰，但在其早期原型与各类飞船交火后，设计者发现，先知级作为一艘移动迅速的小型支援船更有效。
en: The Prophecy is built on an ancient Amarrian warship design dating back to the earliest days of starship combat. Originally intended as a full-fledged battleship, it was determined after mixed-fleet engagements with early prototypes that the Prophecy would be more effective as a slightly smaller, more mobile form of artillery support.

zh: 先知级的设计基于一种古代艾玛战船，可以追溯到星际飞船大战的最早期。最初的设想是把它塑造成一艘完备的战列舰，但在其早期原型与各类飞船交火后，设计者发现，先知级作为一艘移动迅速的较小型炮火支援船更有效。
en: The Prophecy is built on an ancient Amarrian warship design dating back to the earliest days of starship combat. Originally intended as a full-fledged battleship, it was determined after mixed fleet engagements with early prototypes that the Prophecy would be more effective as a slightly smaller, more mobile form of artillery support.

zh: 先驱者级战列巡洋舰自从出现在战场的那一刻起，便奠定了自己强大火力武器的地位，它就像一束能直穿天际的灼热激光。它所具备的一切都是为了实现这一使命——其机鼻和机翼的照明灯可以令敌人无所遁形，而数量众多的激光炮槽位将把他们彻底摧毁。
en: Right from its very appearance on a battlefield, the Harbinger proclaims its status as a massive weapon, a laser burning through the heart of the ungodly. Everything about it exhibits its focused intent, from the lights on its nose and wings that root out infidels, to the large number of lasers that serve to destroy them. Should any heathens be left alive after the Harbinger's initial assault, its drones will take care of them.

zh: 先驱者级战列巡洋舰自从出现在战场那一刻起，便奠定了自己强大杀伤力武器的地位，它就像一束能直穿异教徒心脏的灼热激光。它所具备的一切都是为了实现这一使命——其机鼻和机翼的照明灯可以令异教徒无所遁形，而数量众多的激光炮槽位将把他们彻底摧毁。即使有人侥幸逃脱了先驱者的首轮攻击，也必定会丧命于它的无人机轮番攻击之下。
en: Right from its very appearance on the battlefield, the Harbinger proclaims its status as a massive weapon, a laser burning through the heart of the ungodly. Everything about it exhibits this focused intent, from the lights on its nose and wings that root out the infidels, to the large number of turreted high slots that serve to destroy them. Should any heathens be left alive after the Harbinger's initial assault, the drones will take care of them.

克琉斯级本来是伊特龙级的一个衍生品，但后来不断进化成为了一个完全独立的个体。
en: The Kryos was originally designed as a variant of the Iteron, but eventually evolved to perform an entirely separate role.

en: Capsuleer – you are the Capsuleer, right?

zh: 克隆人飞行员，请领取你的每日奖励。
en: Capsuleer, please claim your daily reward.

en: Who do you work for, pilot?

zh: 克隆等级{}: 拥有{}效率
兑换所需要量子元不足
全双工 弹道控制系统
全息影像盘片（也称为“全息记忆盘”）是最常见的个人娱乐用品。从互动游戏到色情电影，这种盘片每张可以容纳数百部作品。
en: Holographic video reels (also called "holoreels") are the most common type of personal entertainment there is. From interactive gaming to erotic motion pictures, these reels can contain hundreds of titles each.

zh: 全息数据存储嵌入自编程全息信号处理器。这种芯片在大多数现代计算机中都有使用，通常被人们称呼为“蚜虫”芯片。这个名称当然衍生了许多关于计算机系统臭虫的双关语。
en: Autonomous field programmable holographic signal processor with embedded holographic data storage. Used in most modern computers, the ubiquitous AFPHSPEHDS is colloquially known as the "Aphid". This name leads of course to many bad puns about bugs in the system.

zh: 全都被打爆了？看来这次的调整还不够完美……我让我的助手也来看看。
en: A terrible defeat? Looks like the tweaks still weren't quite perfect this time... I'll get my assistant to have a look.

zh: 六类沃尔夫-拉叶星效果光束
六类激变变星效果光束
共和国的很多市场都能买到这样的烧肉，感激不尽。
en: Roast meat like this is sold in many markets in the Republic. Thank you very much.

zh: 共和安全局是维护共和国稳定的特务组织，情报线遍布黑白两道，很多重要的犯人都被共和安全局亲自收押。最近，一个头号要犯却从安全局的监禁室里面逃脱了。
en: The Republic Security Services is a secret service organization dedicated to keeping the peace within the Republic. It has sources in both government and underground organizations. Many infamous criminals are in the custody of the Republic Security Services. Recently, however, their number one criminal escaped from prison.

共和舰队一时半会儿抽不出空来收拾他们。
en: The Republic fleet doesn't have time to deal with them.

zh: 共和舰队一直希望能配备一种新型战舰，既能成为护卫舰舰队的中坚力量，又比其它战列舰更具机动能力。它拥有7个高能量槽和强劲的推进器，被认为是战场上最理想的选择。
en: The Cyclone was created in order to meet the increasing demand for a vessel capable of providing muscle for frigate detachments while remaining more mobile than a battleship. The Cyclone's 7 high-power slots and its powerful thrusters have proved ideal to this end.

zh: 共和舰队一直希望能配备一种新型战舰，既能成为护卫舰舰队的中坚力量，又比其它战列舰更具机动能力。它拥有多个高能量槽和强劲的推进器，被认为是战场上最理想的选择。
en: The Cyclone was created in order to meet the increasing demand for a vessel capable of providing muscle for frigate detachments while remaining more mobile than a battleship. The Cyclone's multiple high-power slots and powerful thrusters have proved ideal to this end.

zh: 关于凡晶石、斜长岩和灼烧岩等最常见矿石的提炼知识，能显著提升提炼产量。
en: Knowledge of techniques for reprocessing common ores and scrap metals including Veldspar, Plagioclase, and Scordite. Significantly increases their reprocessing output.

zh: 关于加达里舰船和装备工作原理的知识，掌握后能够提高加达里舰船和装备的发明效率。
en: Knowledge of the working principles of Caldari ships and modules. Master it to increase your invention efficiency for Caldari ships and modules.

zh: 关于古斯塔斯舰船和装备工作原理的知识，掌握后能够提高古斯塔斯舰船和装备的研究和发明效率。
en: Knowledge of the working principles of Guristas Pirate ships and modules. Master it to increase your invention efficiency for Guristas Pirate ships and modules.

zh: 关于同位原矿、杰斯贝矿和克洛基等贵重矿石的提炼知识，能显著提升提炼产量。
en: Knowledge of techniques for reprocessing highly valuable ores including Hedbergite, Jaspet, and Crokite. Significantly increases their reprocessing output.

zh: 关于大规模开采的理论，能够提升采矿激光器效能。
en: Theory of large-scale mining. Increases Mining Laser effectiveness.

zh: 关于天使企业联合体舰船和装备工作原理的知识，掌握后能够提高天使企业联合体舰船和装备的研究和发明效率。
en: Knowledge of the working principles of Angel Cartel ships and modules. Master it to increase your research and invention efficiency for Angel Cartel ships and modules.

zh: 关于天蛇集团舰船和装备工作原理的知识，掌握后能够提高天蛇集团舰船和装备的研究和发明效率。
en: Knowledge of the working principles of Serpentis Corporation ships and modules. Master it to increase your research and invention efficiency for Serpentis Corporation ships and modules.

zh: 关于奥贝尔石、水硼砂、干焦岩和黑赭石等价值较高的矿石的提炼知识，能显著提升提炼产量。
en: Knowledge of techniques for reprocessing valuable ores including Omber, Kernite, Pyroxeres, and Dark Ochre. Significantly increases their reprocessing output.

zh: 关于姐妹会舰船和装备工作原理的知识，掌握后能够提高原理姐妹会舰船和装备的研究和发明效率。
en: Knowledge of the working principles of SOE ships and modules. Master it to increase your invention efficiency for SOE ships and modules.

zh: 关于拦截泡、反跃迁力场发生器等大型干扰装置的知识，掌握后能提升干扰效果。
en: Knowledge of large disruptive modules including Interdiction Sphere and Warp Disruption Field Generator. Master it to increase disruption effectiveness.

zh: 关于探索装置的知识，掌握后能提高探索效率和安全性。
en: Knowledge of exploration modules. Master it to increase exploration efficiency and safety.

zh: 关于控制飞船的进阶学科，掌握后能够有效增加引擎类装备的效能。
en: Advanced knowledge of ship maneuvering. Master it to increase your Engine Equipment efficiency.

zh: 关于文明的一个长期既定事实是，只要有政府机构的地方，它的臣民就会在那里集中起来，成为官僚主义机器加速运转的燃料。在这方面，米玛塔尔共和国也不例外，当议会和司法部在戈多洱星座落成之后，这确实带来了大量人口流入。这些人口当然有各种需要，于是一些最大的玛塔利集团在这设立了总公司，使该星域热闹非凡，与美特伯里斯相差不远。
en: It has long been an established fact of civilization that wherever a seat of government lies, then so will a high concentration of its subjects, the better to fuel the halls of bureaucracy. In this, the Republic has been no exception, and in locating their Parliament and Justice Department in the Gedur constellation, they guaranteed a huge population influx. This population needs supporting, and so some of the largest Matari corporations also have their head offices here, making this region a bustling hub not unlike Metropolis.

zh: 关于星捷运舰船和装备工作原理的知识，掌握后能够提高原理星捷运舰船和装备的研究和发明效率。
en: Knowledge of the working principles of InterBus ships and modules. Master it to increase your invention efficiency for InterBus ships and modules.

zh: 关于星际贸易的基本技能，能够提升订单数量。
en: Basic skill in interstellar trading. Increases order quantity.

zh: 关于星际运输的基本技能，能够提升物流订单数量。
en: Basic skill in interstellar transportation. Increases delivery request quantity.

zh: 关于殷郡舰船和装备工作原理的知识，掌握后能够提高原理殷郡舰船和装备的研究和发明效率。
en: Knowledge of the working principles of Yan-Jung ships and modules. Master it to increase your invention efficiency for Yan-Jung ships and modules.

zh: 关于片麻岩、灰岩、希莫菲特等贵重矿石的提炼知识，能显著提升提炼产量。
en: Knowledge of techniques for reprocessing highly valuable ores including Gneiss, Spodumain, and Hemorphite. Significantly increases their reprocessing output.

zh: 关于盖伦特舰船和装备工作原理的知识，掌握后能够提高盖伦特舰船和装备的发明效率。
en: Knowledge of the working principles of Gallente ships and modules. Master it to increase your invention efficiency for Gallente ships and modules.

zh: 关于管理军团的技能，掌握后能够提升军团规模。
en: Skill in Corporation management. Master it to increase your Corporation size.

zh: 关于米玛塔尔舰船和装备工作原理的知识，掌握后能够提高米玛塔尔舰船和装备的发明效率。
en: Knowledge of the working principles of Minmatar ships and modules. Master it to increase your invention efficiency for Minmatar ships and modules.

zh: 关于缠绕光束、能量获取器和电子干扰器等干扰装置的知识，掌握后能提升干扰效果。
en: Knowledge of disruptive modules including Webifier, Energy Nosferatu, and Electronic Disruptor. Master it to increase disruption effectiveness.

zh: 关于联合矿业舰船和装备工作原理的知识，掌握后能够提高原理联合矿业舰船和装备的研究和发明效率。
en: Knowledge of the working principles of ORE ships and modules. Master it to increase your invention efficiency for ORE ships and modules.

zh: 关于艾克诺、双多特和基腹断岩等价值极高的特殊矿物的提炼知识，能显著提升提炼产量。
en: Knowledge of techniques for reprocessing extremely valuable special ores including Arkonor, Bistot, and Mercoxit. Significantly increases their reprocessing output.

zh: 关于艾玛舰船和装备工作原理的知识，掌握后能够提高艾玛舰船和装备的发明效率。
en: Knowledge of the working principles of Amarr ships and modules. Master it to increase your invention efficiency for Amarr ships and modules.

zh: 关于莫德团舰船和装备工作原理的知识，掌握后能够提高原理莫德团舰船和装备的研究和发明效率。
en: Knowledge of the working principles of Mordu's Legion ships and modules. Master it to increase your invention efficiency for Mordu's Legion ships and modules.

zh: 关于萨沙共和国舰船和装备工作原理的知识，掌握后能够提高萨沙共和国舰船和装备的研究和发明效率。
en: Knowledge of the working principles of Sansha's Nation ships and modules. Master it to increase your research and invention efficiency for Sansha's Nation ships and modules.

zh: 关于血袭者同盟舰船和装备工作原理的知识，掌握后能够提高血袭者同盟舰船和装备的研究和发明效率。
en: Knowledge of the working principles of Blood Raider Covenant ships and modules. Master it to increase your research and invention efficiency for Blood Raider Covenant ships and modules.

zh: 关于行星开发的基础知识，掌握后能够提升行星开发效率。
en: Basic knowledge of Planetary Interaction. Master it to increase Planetary Interaction efficiency.

zh: 关于贸易、管理、制造、发明和探索等非战斗行为的技能，覆盖面非常广。
en: Skills pertaining to trade, management, manufacturing, invention, and exploration are not used in battle.

zh: 关于雷达多目标锁定的技能，属于太空航行基本学科，掌握后可提升锁定速度和同时锁定数量。
en: Skill in locking onto multiple targets via radar. One of the basic subjects in space navigation. Master it to increase lock speed and target quantity.

zh: 关于高速机动的进阶学科，掌握后可使用跃迁推进器进行高速飞行。
en: Advanced principles of high-speed mobility. Master it to use Warping Propulsion for high-speed flight.

zh: 其中有个叫妮娜的家伙你要特别小心。
en: There's a gal named Nina among them... You need to be careful around her.

zh: 其实也没什么可猜的，你只需要在交易现场出现，然后，“砰”，就是这样。
en: There's nothing to guess. You just show up at the transaction and "Bang." It's that simple.

zh: 其实，我的好朋友今早才刚刚加入训练兵团……噢，对不起，我不该说这些题外话。
en: Actually, one of my friends joined the Training Corps this morning... Oh, sorry. I'm not supposed to be chatting.

zh: 具有大容量货柜舱的舰船，是运输大量货物的理想选择。
en: Vessels whose large cargo bays make them ideal for mass transportation of goods.

zh: 具有灰色声誉的娱乐场所。它究竟是无耻、肮脏、致命还是仅仅非法？你肯定能在这找到答案。
en: A pleasure house of questionable honor. Whether it's outrageous, dirty, lethal or just merely illegal, you're bound to find it here.

zh: 具有远程维修和辅助能力的高级舰船，可以在战场上支援战友。
en: Advanced ship with remote repair and support capabilities. Designed to support teammates on the battlefield.

zh:
具有高密度的金属通常被称为反应金属，它们传导电流和吸收热量的能力是无可比拟的。它们在自然界中很少以固态形式出现，常常是同一些其他的特殊物质在原子层面结合在一起。

可以从下列类型的行星开采获得：
风暴行星
气体行星
离子行星
en:
Very dense metals are often called reactive metals, as their ability to conduct electrical currents and absorb heat is unparalleled. Rarely found in a natural solid state, they are instead usually assembled on an atomic level from particulate matter found in other forms.

Can be obtained by mining the following types of planets:
Storm Planet
Gas Planet
Plasma Planet

zh: 典型的冬眠者式建筑，这座设施是一座信息交互枢纽，连接了无数的数据源。坚固的外壳保护着内部的数据传输系统，使其不受到任何外部的干扰。
en: Distinctively Sleeper in design, this structure operates as an information hub, linking up various data sources with one another. An extraordinarily resilient superstructure guards the flow of information inside from any disruption.

zh: 内瓦达部族一直被海盗袭击所困扰，他们想出了一个新方案来应对这个问题——他们派出了一个商船做诱饵。他们希望由一名克隆人飞行员来配合他们的计划，给海盗一次沉重的打击。
en: The Nefantar tribe has been troubled by pirate attacks, and they have come up with a new solution to solve this problem – they're sending a merchant ship as bait. They hope to find a Capsuleer to help them carry out their plan and strike the pirates hard.

zh: 再播一遍！这好像是一个不得了的发现！
en: Broadcast it again! This sounds like a great discovery!

zh: 军事技术主要聚焦于提升武器和防御装备的输出功率和操作技巧，可以极大地提升舰船的作战能力。
en: The main focus of military technology is to improve output power and operation techniques. Can greatly enhance a ship's combat capabilities.

zh: 军团详情功能暂未开放
军团间激烈的竞争，对抗外来企业的积极态度，使加达里成为了一个高度资本化的社会。
en: The Corporations compete aggressively amongst themselves and with companies from outside the State, resulting in a highly capitalistic society.
Why should we give you the munitions?

zh: 冥府级航母的设计灵感来源于旧世界玛塔尔当地的一种凶猛尖牙鲨鱼，其凶残好战的特性给所有人留下了深刻的印象。冥府级的研发工程是最高机密，除了很少的几个人外，没人知道它的制造进度和实际能力。因此当这样一艘母舰出现在世人面前时，不亚于扇了那些曾认为玛塔利无法设计出此类星舰的人一记响亮的耳光。无论其设计来源为何，有一件事是肯定的：从朴实的生活方式到严格的自然美学，这个凶猛巨物的设计只为了一个目的，也只有一个目的。“想象有一群致命的胡蜂从恶魔之口涌出向你扑来。再想象它们的尾部都装着自动加农炮。”——某位冥府级设计者
en: Inspired by a vicious scissor-toothed shark indigenous to old-world Matar, the Hel is widely viewed as a sign of a Republic out for blood. Since the beginning of its development it has remained a project cloaked in secrecy, with precious few people aware of its progress and its capabilities, and its formal unveiling has come as a defiant slap in the face to many who formerly believed the Matari incapable of working at this scale of starship design. Whatever comprises the soil of its roots, though, one thing is clear: from no-frills living quarters to grim, unadorned aesthetic, this ferocious behemoth has been designed for one purpose and one purpose only. ”Imagine a swarm of deadly hornets pouring from the devil's mouth. Now imagine they have autocannons.” -Unknown Hel designer

zh: 冬眠者多元转发站是一座巨大的交换机房，负责传递来自不同冬眠者设施的电子数据。尽管主体被保护在超高强度的合金外壳下，但可以从数据电缆的尺寸看出它所具有的强大信息处理能力。
en: The Sleeper Multiplex Forwarder was built as a massive router for transferring electronic data between various Sleeper facilities. Although enclosed in super-resilient metal alloys, the size of the data cables suggests that it is capable of transmitting extraordinary amounts of information.

zh: 冬眠者设计的岗哨炮塔，当前没有启动。
en: A sentry gun of Sleeper design. Currently dormant.

zh: 冰冻植物种子在很多星域需求很大，在那些不适宜居住的星球周围环绕的空间站里尤其如此。
en: Frozen plant seeds are in high demand in many regions, especially on stations orbiting non-habitable planets.

zh: 冷凝能量管理单元 I
冷凝能量管理单元 II
冷凝能量管理单元 III
冷凝能量管理单元 IV
冷凝能量管理单元蓝图 I
en: Algid Energy Administrations Unit I Blueprint

zh: 冷凝能量管理单元蓝图 II
en: Algid Energy Administrations Unit II Blueprint

zh: 冷凝能量管理单元蓝图 III
en: Algid Energy Administrations Unit III Blueprint

zh: 冷凝能量管理单元蓝图 IV
en: Algid Energy Administrations Unit IV Blueprint

zh:
准备一艘容量足够大的舰船以及一定的保证金，就可以去完成物流委托了。
将货物运送至指定的空间站，即可获取星币。
en:
Prepare a ship with a sufficiently large cargo hold and some collateral, and you can start taking delivery requests.
Deliver cargo to specified stations to earn ISK.

zh: 减小控制塔的信号半径。
en: Decreases signature radius of control tower.

zh: 几个不识好歹的工人抢走了施工现场的工程船并以此要挟集团答应他们的无理要求。
en: Several ungrateful workers took control of the construction ship at the construction site, and demanded that the corporation agree to their unreasonable demands.

zh: 几个奴隶拒绝参与神前角斗，不过别担心，这种事也不是第一次了。
en: Several slaves refused to participate in the gladiator tournament before the god. But don't worry, this isn't the first time this has happened.

zh: 几个飞马集团的矿工无视联邦法律服用非法兴奋剂，陷入精神错乱，导致矿场一片混乱。
en: Several FedMart miners disregarded the federal law against illegal stimulants, resulting in them going insane and causing chaos in the mines.

zh: 几乎没有什么资料能说明夜魔侠级护卫舰的确切起源，据说守护天使集团的工程师们将它设计为偏重于防御、与德拉米尔级护卫舰形成互补的版本。无论在效率和性能方面，两舰都十分相像，但夜魔侠级刻意削减了攻击能力以获得更强大的防御潜能和附甲。它确实是块难啃的骨头。
en: Little to no data can be found on the Daredevil's exact origin, but it's believed that Guardian Angel engineers created it to serve as a defensive complement to the Cartel's Dramiel frigate. In terms of flair and utility, it closely resembles its counterpart, but it eschews offensive capabilities in favor of greater defensive potential and stronger armor plating.

zh: 凤凰级无畏舰一如既往地秉承了加达里战舰的设计理念。大幅改进的导弹接口，高质量的锁定天线阵列，宇宙中最先进的护盾系统，造就了最强大的长距离攻击战舰。护盾回充增量器能让凤凰级在短时间内经受住猛烈的炮轰，但它的防御系统却经受不住长时间的考验。然而，要是得到适当的辅助，没有什么舰船能抵御凤凰级的全力进攻。
en: In terms of Caldari design philosophy, the Phoenix is a chip off the old block. With a heavily tweaked missile interface, targeting arrays of surpassing quality and the most advanced shield systems to be found anywhere, it is considered the strongest long-range installation attacker out there. While its shield boosting actuators allow the Phoenix, when properly equipped, to withstand tremendous punishment over a short duration, its defenses are not likely to hold up against sustained attack over longer periods. With a strong supplementary force, however, few things in existence rival this vessel's pure annihilative force.

zh: 凭借以前在加达里海军学习的知识，古斯塔斯的首领“野兔”克拉克·卡萨加米打算给加达里的伤口上撒上一把盐——他窃取了合众国的飞船设计图并加以改造，并用这些改良过的飞船去攻击他以前的主人。这艘巨鸟级巡洋舰的邪恶同胞，毒蜥级巡洋舰，就是最好的例子。
en: Taking what he had learned from his days in the Caldari Navy, Korako 'The Rabbit' Kosakami, the Guristas' leader, decided that he would rub salt in the State's wounds by looting their designs and striking against his former masters in ships whose layout was obviously stolen from them. To this end, the Gila (the Moa's twin) has served him well.

zh: 凭着闪耀的橙色光芒，这个无人机信标似乎在标示一个有趣的地点，或者是某条大航线的一个航标。
en: With it's swirling orange light, this drone beacon appears to be marking a point of interest, or perhaps a waypoint in a greater trail.

zh: 凯克·迈纳的小鹰级飞船
凯格·兹凯恩的启示级飞船
摧毁游荡的海盗获取装备
en: Eliminate the roaming pirates and loot modules

zh: 击毁海盗而获得追击赏金
en: got a bounty prize for killing pirates

zh: 分析仪可以找出有价值的信息。
分裂者级的船体结构比一堆废铜烂铁强不了多少，但在远程作战中，它的导弹发射槽位和高级感应器使其成为最有价值的米玛塔尔护卫舰。
en: The Breacher's hull is no more than a fragile scrapheap, but the ship's missile launcher slots and superior sensors have placed it among the most valued Minmatar frigates when it comes to long-range combat.

zh: 分裂者级的船体结构比一堆废铜烂铁强不了多少，但在远程作战中，它的高槽位和高级感应器使其成为最有价值的米玛塔尔护卫舰。
en: The Breacher's hull is no more than a fragile scrapheap, but the ship's missile launcher slots and superior sensors have placed it among the most valued Minmatar frigates when it comes to long-range combat.

zh: 切尔姆氏 大型掠能器
切尔姆氏 大型能量中和器
切尔姆氏 自适应装甲增强器

en: Switch to the internal server list
Switch to the Chinese & worldwide server list
Switch to the European server list

zh: 刚刚接到线报，一艘艾玛的奴隶押送船在经过这个附近的时候被海盗拦截了。
en: I just received a report that an Amarr slave escort ship was intercepted by pirates while passing near this location.

zh: 刚才我就觉得奇怪，只是救人要紧，我并没有点破。
en: I knew something was up. It's just that saving people took priority, so I didn't mention it.

zh: 利用别人的时候就会被别人利用，这是最简单的道理。
en: If you take advantage of others, you will be taken advantage of by others. This is the simplest truth.

zh: 利用市政管理局的补贴发布假委托，袭击运输者，看起来是个不错的计划。
en: Using Urban Management's subsidy to post fake assignments and ambush transporters. Seems like a solid plan.

zh: 利用纳米级装配技术来修复船体的损伤。
en: Makes use of nano-assembler technology in order to repair hull damage.

zh: 别开玩笑了先生，工人的家属正等着这里的消息呢。
en: Please stop kidding, sir. The workers' families are all here waiting for more information.

zh: 别忘了，奴隶们会一直受到葳砣柯的控制。
en: Don't forget, the slaves will always be under the control of Vitoc.

zh: 别急，飞行员，去换一艘船再来吧。
en: Don't worry, Capsuleer. You can go switch to another ship and come back later.

zh: 别浪费时间，什么矿也没有。
en: Don't waste your time. There are no ores here. None.

zh: 别跟我提什么安保部队，那些笨蛋中了敌人的奸计，现在{2|system_name:_tr}毫无防备。
en: Don't talk to me about the security forces. Those idiots fell into our enemies' trap and they're now defenseless in {2|system_name:_tr}.

zh: 别这样，我的老朋友，你以前从不向我催债。
en: Don't do this to me, my old friend. You never once gave me a hard time over mere debts before.

zh: 制导武器系统，命中目标有一定延迟，具有多种伤害类型。
en: Guided weapon system with delayed impact and broad selection of damage types.

zh: 战士级巡洋舰是米玛塔尔舰队的中流砥柱。它重量轻、速度极快，而且火力出人意料地强，可以使用许多不同种类的武器。它是少数几种在米玛塔尔境外也很受欢迎的米玛塔尔舰船之一。
en: The Stabber is the mainstay of the Minmatar fleet. It is light and extremely fast, yet surprisingly powerful, with a wide variety of weapons. It is one of few Minmatar vessels that have reached popularity outside Minmatar space.

zh: 刽子手级护卫舰是又一艘新近服役的艾玛皇家海军舰船。刽子手级专为反击小巧、敏捷的米玛塔尔突击护卫舰而设计，因此它与大多数艾玛飞船不同，偏重速度胜过防御。刽子手级扩展了艾玛人在战场上的战术能力。
en: The Executioner is another newly commissioned ship of the Amarr Imperial Navy. The Executioner was designed specially to counter the small, fast raider frigates of the Minmatar Republic; thus it is different from most Amarr ships in favoring speed over defenses. With the Executioner, the Amarrians have expanded their tactical capabilities on the battlefield.

zh: 刽子手级是艾玛帝国海军新近启用的舰船。刽子手级专门用来对抗米玛塔尔共和国轻巧快速的突袭护卫舰；因此，与多数艾玛舰船不同的是，该船侧重于速度而不是防御。有了刽子手级，艾玛人扩充了自己的战术能力。
en: The Executioner is one of the Amarr Imperial Navy's newly commissioned ships. The Executioner was designed specially to counter the small, fast raider frigates of the Minmatar Republic. For this reason it is different from most Amarr ships, as it favors speed over defense. With the Executioner, the Amarrians have expanded their tactical capabilities on the battlefield.

zh: 削减目标舰船电容器的部分能量。
en: Neutralizes a portion of the energy in the capacitor of the enermy's ship.

zh: 前哨站/碟状—狭长，脉动的

en: Go to {system_name:_tr} {security} ({jump_cnt} jumps) and scan the system data
Head for {system_name:_tr} {security} ({jump_cnt} jumps), and loot the Cache Container
Go to {system_name:_tr} {security} ({jump_cnt} jumps) and defeat the Exposed Addict

zh: 前往{system_name:_tr} {security} ({jump_cnt}跳),摧毁枢密院官员
en: Go to {system_name:_tr} {security} ({jump_cnt} jumps) and defeat the Privy Council Official

zh: 前往{system_name:_tr} {security} ({jump_cnt}跳),摧毁逃跑的欠债人
en: Go to {system_name:_tr} {security} ({jump_cnt} jumps) and defeat the Escaped Debtor

zh: 前往{system_name:_tr} {security} ({jump_cnt}跳),歼灭委托位标内的所有敌人
en: Go to {system_name:_tr} {security} ({jump_cnt} jumps) and annihilate all enemies at the mission beacon

zh: 前往修复行星海关确认
en: Go to Repair Planetary Customs Confirmation

zh: 剩下的事情交给哥哥好吗？
en: Leave the rest to your brother, okay?

zh: 剩下的人会在空间站等您，请不要丢下我们。
en: The rest of us will wait for you at the station. Please don't leave us behind.

zh: 功能失效的太阳能采集站
功能暂未开放，敬请期待
en: Feature not yet available. Coming soon.

zh: 加力燃烧器速度增强效果
加尔哈·拉拉的激进级飞船
加达里425毫米磁轨炮岗哨
加达里一直是隐形战术的支持者，海燕级经过维克米集团的改造，成为了隐形突入型驱逐舰。
en: The Caldari have always favored stealth tactics. With the Wiyrkomi Corporation's modifications, the Cormorant became an effective stealth destroyer.

zh: 加达里中型无人机使用的武器。
en: A weapon used by Caldari Medium Drones.
A Tour of the Caldari State

zh: 加达里人把这些称作“宣传塔”，而盖伦特人还是喜欢称之为“自由之塔”。不管它们如何称呼，这些隐蔽的广播塔将经它们放大的信号发送到所在星系内的每个角落。盖伦特网络使用这些塔来将广播发送至那些禁止这类信号的区域。那些区域的中继塔网络会使用超光速网络将地下信号发送至目标塔。
en: The Caldari call these propoganda towers, however the Gallente people prefer to call them liberty towers. Whatever their designation these hidden broadcast towers send their amplified signal throughout the system they are located in. The Gallente networks use them to broadcast their channels to areas of space where such signals are usually banned. There are a network of relay towers which utilise the FTL networks to bring their underground signal to the source tower.

zh: 加达里人最先对巨鸟级进行了改进，虽然牺牲了一些进攻能力，但成为一艘阻拦大量舰船跃迁的拦截舰，也还是可以接受的。
en: The Caldari were the first to modify the Moa. Although some attack power was sacrificed, the ability to stop large numbers of ships from warping more than makes up for it.

zh: 加达里人的技术机巧、精妙，每一个到过加达里的人，都会惊叹于他们工业制造水平的高超。
en: The Caldari are famous for their advanced technology and technical ingenuity. Every person who has been to the Caldari State will tell you about the industrial marvel that is Caldari manufacturing.

zh: 加达里人绝不能流下软弱的泪水，可，可我……
en: A Caldari shouldn't cry. That's a sign of weakness. But I...

zh: 加达里伊毕斯号轻型护卫舰体型虽小，但坚固结实，非常适合货物运输或小规模采矿。它的可靠性使它成为新手船长的理想选择。
en: The Caldari Ibis corvette is a small but stout vessel that serves admirably well as a cargo hauler or small-scale miner. Its reliability makes it a good choice for novice ship captains.

zh: 加达里军队使用这个广播单元向米玛塔尔联盟发动宣传攻势，旨在降低士气，使军队内部不合。这是加达里的常用战术。
en: This broadcasting unit is being used by the Caldari military to send messages of propoganda to the Minmatar alliance, aimed at lowering morale and causing dissent amongst the army.  Quite a common tactic amongst the Caldari.

zh: 加达里勒维亚坦级泰坦
加达里合众国内部比武盛行，在一些关键的比赛上，他们甚至不惜花重金雇佣克隆人飞行员代表自己的集团出战，以赢得胜利。
en: Sparring has become a popular pastime in the Caldari State. In some key competitions, they even spend a lot of money to hire Capsuleers to represent their corporation in order to achieve victory.

zh: 加达里合众国多年来苦于缺少比较像样的磁轨炮平台，所以当鹏鲲级的设计规格发布时，加达里的飞行员无不欣喜若狂。这是一种名副其实的军舰，攻击范围大、防御能力强的特点将使它在远近所有战场上都能做出卓越贡献。
en: Having long suffered the lack of an adequate railgun platform, the Caldari State's capsule pilots found themselves rejoicing as the Rokh's design specs were released. A fleet vessel if ever there was one, this far-reaching and durable beast is expected to see a great deal of service on battlefields near and far.

zh: 加达里合众国曾是联邦的一部分，但是在一场激烈的纷争过后，加达里脱离了联邦的管辖，与盖伦特爆发了连年的战争。
en: The Caldari State was once part of the Federation, but a severe dispute resulted in their departure and a long war between the Gallente Federation and the Caldari State.

zh: 加达里合众国最先在空间站外部使用矿石精炼厂的，对于一个视效率为一切的国家来说，这么做非常合乎情理。
en: The Caldari State was the first to employ ore refineries outside space stations, a natural move for an entity that values efficiency above everything else.

zh: 加达里合众国海军改良了海燕级，并大量运用在小队规模的战斗中。
en: The Caldari State Navy made some modifications to the Cormorant. The improved model is heavily used in squadron-level combat.

zh: 加达里大型无人机使用的武器。
en: A weapon used by Caldari Large Drones.

zh: 加达里小型无人机使用的武器。
en: A weapon used by Caldari Small Drones.

zh: 加达里岗哨无人机使用的武器。
en: A weapon used by Caldari Scout Drones.

zh: 加达里幼龙级战列巡洋舰
加达里战力辅助舰残骸
加达里战斗模拟场中的一个主要设施
en: A main structure for CA combat simulator

zh: 加达里战术支援空间站
加达里控制塔最初由卡拉吉塔集团制造。但由于该集团将精力主要集中于其他利润更高的项目建设上，加达里很快便终止了与他们的合同。异株湖集团随后接管了控制塔的开发与生产工作。
en: At first the Caldari Control Towers were manufactured by Kaalakiota, but since they focused their efforts mostly on other, more profitable installations, they soon lost the contract and the Ishukone corporation took over the Control Towers' development and production.

加达里诸多小型集团下的雇佣军作战能力并不比正规军差，而维克米集团下的一次技术改进尝试，促使了蝎尾怪级在更多战场下的泛用性，现在加达里海军也关注了这个特殊改型。
en: The many corporate-affiliated mercenary groups in Caldari space possess a combat prowess rivaling that of the state's official forces. The Wiyrkomi Corporation's modifications made the Manticore an all-purpose ship, attracting the Caldari Navy's attention.

加速轨道技术可以追溯到很久以前，当时从EVE之门坍塌中幸存的各帝国正开始向外扩张。虽然各星门的设置可能会在传送飞船尺寸以及是否需要通行钥匙或密码等方面存在差异，但它们都有着共同的基本功能，那就是把太空飞船推进到星系内的目的地信标处。
en: Acceleration gate technology reaches far back to the expansion era of the empires that survived the great EVE gate collapse. While their individual setup might differ in terms of ship size they can transport and whether they require a certain passkey or code to be used, all share the same fundamental function of hurling space vessels to a destination beacon within solar system boundaries.

zh: 加速轨道技术可以追溯到很久以前，当时从EVE大门坍塌中幸存的各帝国正开始向外扩张。虽然各星门的设置可能会在传送飞船尺寸以及是否需要通行钥匙或密码等方面存在差异，但它们都有着共同的基本功能，那就是把太空飞船推进到星系内的目标信标处。

zh: 卓越的战斗技巧，永远是你在加达里社会中赢得别人尊重的最佳方式。在新伊甸，不会有任何一个国家像加达里一样有着严格的兵役要求和尚武精神。尽管，已经有一些集团开始尝试开辟不一样的发展思路，但是从上个时代留下来的传统并不是一朝一夕就能扭转的。
en: Demonstrating excellent combat skills is always the best way to win respect in Caldari society. No other nation in New Eden has strict military service requirements and a martial spirit quite like the Caldari. Although some corporations have begun to experiment with adopting new attitudes, the traditions of previous eras cannot be undone overnight.

en: A brothel operated by the Kazka Bandits. As sleazy as they come. Frilly petticoats are the pet fetishes here.

en: Khanid Innovations modified the Maller, giving it much better defense capabilities.

zh: 卡尼迪的技术人员在偶然获得的殷郡技术后，改良了强制者级的力场装置，使其成为战术小队的关键角色。
en: After accidentally acquiring Yan-Jung's technology, Khanid technicians improved the Coercer's force field generator, giving it a key role in tactical squads.

zh: 卡德·罗姆的末日沙场级飞船
卡拉·莫拉图的大鸨级飞船
卡拉吉卡集团对巨鸟级进行了改造，护盾防御能力大幅提升。
en: The Kaalakiota Corporation modified the Moa, greatly improving its shields.

zh: 卡拉吉卡集团获得了不知名的技术，对海燕级进行了改造，使其更擅长小队作战。
en: The Kaalakiota Corporation applied technologies of unknown origin to the Cormorant, making it more suitable for squad operations.

zh: 卡拉吉塔是加达里八大集团中最强大的一个，堪称合众国里的国中之国。那些试图削弱卡拉吉他集团的人，都会被集团无情地排除。
en: Kalaakiota is the most powerful of the eight Caldari megacorporations. It is almost its own country within the State. Those who try to weaken Kaalakiota will be dealt with mercilessly by the corporation.

zh: 卡拉多恩的猛犸级飞船
卡斯顿·伦丹是一位为赛毕斯托部族工作的微生物学家。他现在已年过半百，在决定将自己的余生奉献给治愈神经病毒病毒的研究之前，他致力于免疫学领域的研究达十年之久。
en: Karsten Lundham is a microbiologist working for the Sebiestor Tribe. Currently in his fifties, he worked in the field of immunology for ten years before deciding to dedicate the rest of his life to the search for a cure to vitoxin.

zh: 卡斯顿·伦丹的台风级飞船
卡罗拉的音乐估计不能听了，让我找找还有别的什么好听的。
en: I can't listen to Carola's music anymore. I'll have to find something else.

zh: 卡罗拉走私毒品？不可能啊？她可是我们集团最干净的艺人了。
en: Carola's been smuggling drugs? No way! She's our cleanest artist.

zh: 卫星科技 露天采矿器
卫星采集阵列产出大量的卫星原料，然后提供给反应堆。反应堆会加工这些原料以将其制成维持母星建筑在线和运作所需的半成品或最终物质。
en: Moon Harvesting Arrays yield a number of moon materials that are then fed to Reactors. Reactors then process the materials in order to produce intermediate or final materials for use in keeping the Starbase's structures on-line and functioning.

zh: 即便是在这样一个不景气的采矿站，米扎拉的私家住宅还是如此豪华。
en: Even among the remnants of this rundown mining colony, the Mizara family's hovel looks particularly impoverished.

zh: 即再经历7次爆蛋的较为遥远的将来。
en: That is to say, in the distant future... 7 more poddings after this…

zh: 即将进入危险区域，是否继续？
en: You are about to enter a dangerous area. Proceed?

zh: 厚重的装甲防御系统，虽然机动性不足，但修复难度不大；
en: A heavily armored defense system. It sacrifices mobility, but is easy to repair.

zh: 原件已经在{2|station_name:_tr}准备好了，你过去取一下就行。
en: It's ready at {2|station_name:_tr}, go there and fetch it.

zh: 去搞艘大点的船，我在空间站等你。
en: Go get a bigger ship. I'll wait for you at the station.

zh: 又一个犯人从监狱里跑了，我真不知道他们那些狱警都是些什么酒囊饭袋。
en: Another captive has escaped from prison. I really don't know what they're paying the guards for.

zh: 又一名罪犯被绳之以法！非常感谢！
en: Another criminal was brought to justice! Thank you very much!

zh: 又拯救了一个迷失的灵魂，真神保佑。
en: You saved another lost soul. May the one true God bless you.

zh: 又是新的一天，飞行员。有一件小事需要你的帮忙。
en: It's a new day, pilot! There's something I need you to take care of.

zh: 又有好差事儿了，年轻人。
en: I have another lucrative job for you, young one.

zh: 又有饥饿的小兔子在发出吱吱叫的声音了！
en: I can hear the chittering of those hungry rabbits again!

zh: 又被爆蛋了？这得有10次了吧？！
en: Podded again? That's, what... 10 times already?

zh: 双击一个目标可以快速锁定
en: Double-tap on a target to easily lock onto it

发现新的活动目标，初步识别为姐妹会小型舰船。
en: A new target has been detected in this area. Preliminary analysis results show it as an SOE frigate.

zh: 发达的星际航行连接了各个独立的星球，不同生态环境的交流也导致各种新型疾病流传爆发。EVE姐妹会长期致力于疾病防治工作，为各国的空间站提供新型疫苗。
en: Advanced interstellar transportation connected the once isolated planets. The communication between different ecosystems soon gave birth to many new types of epidemics. The Sisters of EVE have a long history of dedicated efforts in disease prevention and treatment. They provide new types of vaccines to stations of all nations.

zh: 变形的冬眠者数据库：这一段损坏的船壳当时保护着备用数据库。该数据库已在空间中暴露了很长时间，但你或许依然能通过数据分析仪从中找出一些有用的信息。
en: Deformed Sleeper Databank: This section of hull plating once shielded an auxiliary databank on its obverse. The databank has been exposed to space for some time now, but you may still be able to extract something with your Data Analyzer.

古斯塔斯在多年前树立起了这块纪念碑，这是他们对加达里境内掀起的大规模国家投资公共工程项目，以及形象工程和爱国主义展示的挖苦。纪念碑上写着:“国家地位的化身”。整个这个地区都充满了对神圣的嘲讽，对亵渎行为的赞美，以及对古斯塔斯信条的鼓吹：可怜的虚无主义。
en: The Guristas erected this monument years ago, in direct mockery of the massive State-funded public works programs, beautification initiatives, and patriotic displays seen throughout Caldari space. Dubbing this monument, “Statehood Incarnate,” the entire area is a mockery of the sacred, the glorification of the profane, littered with the true ideals of the Gurista pirates: abject nihilism.

古斯塔斯官员的居所，配备有高科技的电磁力场。
en: Guristas Officer's Quarters.  Equipped with a high tech EM forcefield.

古斯塔斯巡航导弹炮塔
古斯塔斯数据处理中心
古斯塔斯是更为纯粹的海盗，他们没有奇怪的教义或者复杂的组织结构，仅仅由贪欲支配。这使得古斯塔斯海盗们也更加捉摸不定，打击行动也更加困难。
en: The Guristas are pure pirates. They have no strange doctrines or complex organizational structures. Their only motive is greed. This makes the Guristas Pirates more elusive and more difficult to crack down on.

古斯塔斯海盗以狡猾且善于伪装著称，长期以来一直是加达里合众国贸易线上的一大隐患，对来往造成了极大的威胁。
en: The Guristas Pirates are infamous for their cunning and their ability to disguise themselves. They have long been a major threat on Caldari trade routes.

zh: 古斯塔斯是新伊甸最古典的团体。他们没有奇怪的信仰，也没有特别的利益。为这群野兔的疯狂繁殖提供养料的，正是伴随着人类这个种族一同诞生的贪婪之心。古斯塔斯主要由脱离加达里的老兵组成，是绝对的战斗精英。
en: Among the pirate organizations in New Eden, the Guristas Pirates are the most old-fashioned. They don't possess any strange beliefs, nor do they pursue any specific interests. These rogues are fueled by nothing but one of humanity's oldest vices – pure greed. The Guristas Pirates consist mainly of veterans who have cut ties with the Caldari State. They are elite combatants.

zh: 古斯塔斯海盗现在是合众国的头号大敌。
en: The Guristas Pirates are now the number one enemy of the State.

zh: 古斯塔斯海盗绑架了一名斯库维塔集团集团的高层官员。斯库维塔集团作为合众国内可以和卡拉吉塔集团平起平坐的巨头之一，绝不会轻易接受这样的羞辱。
en: Guristas Pirates kidnapped an executive member of the Sukuuvestaa Corporation. As one of the few giants in the State that can compete with the Kaalakiota Corporation, the Sukuuvestaa Corporation will never accept such humiliation.

zh: 古斯塔斯的海盗大多是由叛离了加达里信条的军人，常年的军事训练，使得他们的战斗能力绝非普通的歹徒可以比拟。他们熟知战斗的规律，并且也知道到哪能找到最值钱的货物。
en: Most of the Guristas Pirates are soldiers who have defected from the Caldari creed. Common gangsters are no match against the fighting ability they have gained as a result of their year-round military training. They are familiar with the rules of combat and know where to find the most valuable goods.

zh: 古斯塔斯的高级军官守卫着这座战斗塔。
en: This battlestation is defended by high ranking Gurista officers.

zh: 古斯塔斯研究和贸易中心
古斯塔斯紧急救援(专家)

古斯塔斯舰船残留部分
古斯塔斯舰队的众多据点之一。
en: One of the many quarters of the Gurista fleet.

zh: 古斯塔斯轻型导弹炮塔
古斯塔斯逆向工程成功率
古斯塔斯逆向工程研究速度
古斯塔斯重型导弹炮塔
古斯塔斯镇静剂储存站
古斯塔斯集会点委托信标
古斯塔斯领袖“野兔”克拉克·卡萨加米有个特别的癖好，就是窃取加达里的飞船设计并加以改造，然后反过头来对付这些飞船的创造者：加达里。潜龙级战舰正是来自于加达里飞行员非常熟悉的小鹰级护卫舰，现在被改造成了一艘能以恐怖的速度将弹药倾泻在敌人头上的防御型强力舰船。
en: The Guristas' leader Korako 'The Rabbit' Kosakami, has a particular love for stealing Caldari ship designs, scooping them up and turning them on their creators. With the Worm, he has taken the Merlin design that is familiar to Caldari pilots, and turned it into a defensive powerhouse, capable of firing blasts after blasts at terrifying speeds.

zh: 只可惜执行的人太蠢了，真不知道这些人当初怎么被选到空间站里工作的。
en: Too bad the executor's not sharp enough for the job. I really wonder how those people got their work in the station in the first place.

zh:
只存在于巨大的晶洞中：它的外层是岩石，而内层是水晶般的石英。在所有晶洞中，最稀有最珍贵的是那些内含暗绿色晶状石英核岩的，它们非常稀有而且非常昂贵。

可以从下列矿石中提炼获得：
双多特石
克洛基石
同位原矿
希莫非特
杰斯贝矿
en:
Only found in huge geodes: rocks on the outside with crystal-like quartz on the inside. The rarest and most precious of these geodes are those that contain the dark green zydrine within. Very rare and very expensive.

Can be obtained by reprocessing the following ores:
Bistot
Crokite
Hedbergite
Hemorphite
Jaspet

zh: 只是希望你能留下来作为证人，我们会向卡拉吉塔集团询问这件事情。
en: We just hope you can stay as a witness. We will be issuing a query about this to Kaalakiota.

zh: 只是提取一些必要的原料。
en: We are just extracting some necessary ingredients.

zh: 只有四分之一的玛塔利人民居住在共和国境内，其余分散在世界的各个角落，很大一部分仍在艾玛帝国境内受到奴役。
en: Yet, only a quarter of the Minmatar people reside within the Republic. The rest are scattered around the star cluster, including a large portion who are still enslaved within the Amarr Empire.

zh: 只有在空间站仓库中的物品才能发起短途物流
en: You can request regional delivery only when the item is in a station

zh: 只有当前等级效果生效，不累加
en: Only the current level's effects are active. They don't stack.

zh: 只有用炸药炸出来的矿坑才是有灵魂的。
en: Only the pits that are blown out with explosives are worth mining.
Only the first time is free

zh: 只能麻烦你再跑一趟，拜托了，飞行员。
en: I think the only solution is for you to go there again. Sorry for the bother, pilot.

zh: 只要你把事情办好，钱不是问题。
en: Money is not a problem as long as you get things done.

zh: 只要你能消灭它们，报酬金少不了你的。
en: If you can destroy them, a handsome commission is guaranteed.

zh: 只要地理条件允许，这样的哨站很容易提高深空采矿的效率。
en: Where geographical conditions allow, outposts such as this one are a good way of increasing the effectiveness of deep-space mining operations.

zh: 可以使用侵噬链接占领这个建筑。
en: This structure can be captured by targeting it with an Entosis Link module.

zh: 可以瞬时击中目标的武器系统，不需要电容便可启用。伤害类型广泛。
en: Can instantly hit the target's weapon system. Does not require capacitors to work. Has a variety of damage types.

zh: 可以被其他飞行员自由攻击
en: Can be attacked freely by other pilots

zh: 可否答应我一个私人请求？
en: Can you accept a personal request of mine?
Can you accept a request of mine?

zh: 可否请你直接到那个地点调查一下？我们会为你追加额外的报酬。
en: Could you head to that location and investigate? We'll compensate you for your efforts.

zh: 可在空间站外替换的备用仓
en: Backup storage which can be replaced in space
Try going to a different location

zh: 可恶，没想到曾经九大集团中最弱的异株湖集团现在能如此嚣张。
en: Damn it. Ishukone are the weakest of the nine corporations – I didn't expect them to get this imperious.

zh: 可惜了，事情果然不会像我们想象的那样顺利。
en: It's a pity that things didn't go as smoothly as we expected.

zh: 可能到天蛇集团的化工厂“取”这样东西。
en: We'll probably have to "borrow" some from one of the Serpentis chemical factories.

zh: 可释放的无人驾驶舰载机，具有多种功能和伤害类型。
en: Unmanned and deployable craft with versatile functions and a broad selection of damage types.

zh: 台风级战列舰一向都是宇宙中最具争议的飞行器——支持者对它赞赏有加，反对者对它恶语中伤。它最引人瞩目的方面——同时也是多数争论的根源——是它的纯粹多功能性，有人认为这种设计缺乏重点，也有人觉得这是特意留给飞行员的装配自由。
en: Much praised by its proponents and much maligned by its detractors, the Typhoon-class battleship has always been one of the most hotly debated spacefaring vessels around. Its distinguishing aspect - and the source of most of the controversy - is its sheer versatility, variously seen as either a lack of design focus or a deliberate freedom for pilot modification.
Swipe right to delete a single notification

zh: 合众国的公民们，欢呼吧！就在今天，我们无比荣耀的领袖取得了里程碑式的成就。我们的国家在其光辉历史上又跨上了一级新的台阶。我们各自的恐惧可以平息；我们伟大国家的安全已经得到保障。直到今天，我们一直都不屈不挠地如同战士一般前行。我们用自己的双手塑造了自己的命运。我们的文明将骑在勒维亚坦级的背上返航，敌人的污迹将从我们的灵魂中被清除干净。欢呼吧，公民们！胜利即将到来。——《加达里合众国新闻局宣传册》，公元23248年
en: Citizens of the State, rejoice! Today, a great milestone has been achieved by our glorious leaders. A stepping stone in the grand story of our empire has been traversed. Our individual fears may be quietened; the safety of our great nation has been secured. Today, unyielding, we have walked the way of the warrior. In our hands have our fates been molded. On the Leviathan's back will our civilization be carried home and the taint of the Enemy purged from our souls. Rejoice, citizens! Victory is at hand. -Caldari State Information Bureau Pamphlet, 23248 AD

zh: 合众国虽然看起来坚不可摧，但是八大集团之间的勾心斗角毫不亚于五大帝国之间的战争。
en: Although the State appears impenetrable, the intrigues and infighting that take place between the eight megacorporations are no less complicated than the war between the five Empires.

zh: 合同金我已经安排人给你发过去了。
en: Your contract commission has been arranged.

zh: 合成船体 惯性稳定器
合理安排时间 享受健康生活
en: Plan your time reasonably, enjoy a healthy lifestyle
