zh: 同时，四大帝国的主要矿业公司也会长期发布矿业收购合同，当您需要星币的时候，可以考虑向他们出售矿石。
en: At the same time, major mining corporations from all four nations also issue acquisition contracts. When you need ISK, you can consider selling ores to them.

zh: 同附近的太空农场相连的巨型太阳能采集器，已经失灵好多年了。
en: A huge solar harvester once linked to the nearby astro farm. It has been out of order for many years.

zh: 名字必须在3-12个字符之间
名字过长(最多为16个字符)
en: Name too long (16 characters at most)
Name is too long (up to {0} characters)

zh: 向电容提供快速能量注入。
en: Provides a quick injection of power into the capacitor.

zh: 听明白了就大点声回答我，老年人耳朵不好使。
en: Respond if you understand. I'm old and have poor hearing, so make sure you're loud enough.

zh: 听起来不错，那你把位标给我发过来吧，我让这位克隆人朋友帮我收收帐。
en: Sounds good. Send me those coordinates. I'll ask our Capsuleer friend to help me sort this out.

zh: 启动舰船？牢房离船坞有这么远的距离，你们都没有抓到他们吗？
en: Started up the ship? The cells are that far away from the shipyard, and you still couldn't catch them?

zh: 启用后，玩家停靠在空间站中时可以使用克隆服务来将该空间站设为其医疗克隆体所在的基地空间站。
en: When operational, the Cloning Service allows Capsuleers to use this station as their medical clone home location.

zh: 启用后，玩家停靠在空间站中时可以使用实验室服务来开展研究和发明项目。
en: When operational, the Laboratory Service allows Capsuleers to conduct research and invention operations at this station.

zh: 启用后，玩家停靠在空间站中时可以使用工厂服务来制造物品和舰船。
en: When operational, the Factory Service allows Capsuleers to manufacture items and ships at this station.

zh: 启用后，玩家停靠在空间站中时可以使用提炼服务来将矿石、物品或废弃物转化为有价值的原材料。
en: When operational, the Reprocessing Service allows Capsuleers to break down ore, items and scrap into potentially valuable raw materials while docked in this station.

zh: 启用后，玩家停靠在空间站中时可以使用维修服务来修理舰船和装备。
en: When operational, the Repair Service allows Capsuleers to repair their ships and modules while docked in this station.

zh: 启用后，玩家停靠在空间站中时可以使用装配服务来改变舰船上装配的装备。
en: When operational, the Fitting Service allows Capsuleers to customize and change the modules attached to their ships while docked in this station.

zh: 吸取对方舰船的能量为自己所用。
en: Drains energy from the target and adds it to your own.

zh: 吸血鬼 小型掠能器
呸，你以为，我，高贵的尤尼斯大人的侍从，会被你那些来路不明的脏钱诱惑吗？
en: Pfft. So you assumed that I, servant of the noble Mr. Yonis, would be tempted by your pitiful gold?

zh: 呸，这些狗东西，老子当年跑运输的时候从来没有哪个混蛋敢惹我的麻烦。
en: Tsk, those bastards. No one dared mess with me when I was hauling goods back then.

zh: 呼，看起来完成的不错，你们这些克隆人在这种事情上还是蛮有用的。
en: Whew, looks like a job well done. Turns out you Capsuleers are more useful than I thought for this kind of thing.

zh: 咔嘣！宝贝儿！猜猜今天怎么着？
en: Crack! Babe, guess what happened today?

zh: 咔嘣！飞行员！合同的内容我想不需要我解释第二遍了吧？
en: Crack! Capsuleer! Do you need me to explain the content of the contract again?

zh: 咳……咳咳……矿石已经收到，可惜我已经老了，不然我也想再开一次我的宝贝矿船啊。
en: *Cough*... *Cough, cough*... The ore's been received. I really want to fly my baby – my mining ship – again, if I'm not too old for it.

zh: 咳咳，喂，那个，小伙子！我知道你很能行！再顺带帮我跑一趟？
en: *Cough* Hey, you over there! I know you're talented! Mind doing me another favor?

zh: 哇靠！这么多钱！哈哈哈哈！
en: Damn! This is a lot of money! Hahahaha!

zh: 哈卡尔斯的猎狼级飞船

en: Hahaha!!! YEAH!! New Eden here I come!

zh: 哈哈，我可不介意给我无聊的采矿生活添加一些趣味。
en: Haha, I don't mind adding some fun to my boring mining life.

zh: 哈哈，我拿到飞行员执照了！开心点！
en: YEAH! I got my license! I got my license! WOOOO!!!! Come on! Aren't you even a little happy for me?!

zh: 哈哈，真是勇敢。如果我手底下那些饭桶有你一半的勇气，我们怎么会沦落到今天。
en: Haha, you're brave. If we had more people like you instead of those fools, things wouldn't have become the way they are today for us.

zh: 哈拉·拉芙的复仇者级飞船
哈特兰的刽子手级飞船
哈科姆氏 中型电容注电器
哈科姆氏 停滞缠绕光束
哈科姆氏 回转稳定器
哈科姆氏 大型护盾回充增量器
哈科姆氏 大型电容器电池
哈科姆氏 大型电容注电器
哈科姆氏 小型电容注电器
哈科姆氏 弹道控制系统
哈科姆氏 跃迁扰断器
哈科姆氏 跃迁扰频器
哈科姆氏 隐形装置
哈科诺·勒坎的裂谷级飞船
哈萨兹拉斯·阿萨的毒蝎级
哈萨兹拉斯·阿萨驾驶的毒蝎级。
en: A Scorpion piloted by Hasaziras Assa.

zh: 哎呀可算来了个接手的，这批种子都快发芽啦！
en: Finally, someone's here to take these from me. These seeds would've all sprouted if you'd come any later!

zh: 哎，帮忙帮到底吧，飞行员。这样你我都省事儿。
en: *Sigh*... Please help me get it all done, Capsuleer. That way, you can save us both a lot of trouble.

zh: 哎，明明我只是一个研究助理，为什么这样的事情也会落到我的头上……
en: *Sigh*... I'm just a research assistant. Why is this happening to me?

zh: 哎，月月打仗，月月搬迁，真是头疼啊。
en: Argh. There's a war every month. This is driving me crazy.

zh: 哎，终归是没有酿成大祸。
en: Well, no major damage is done.

zh: 哥哥……他们还有一些人，还没走远。
en: Brother... There are still some of them not so far away.
Ah... the Elders are coming back?

zh: 唔……作为正规银行，你知道的，我没有什么好办法让他快点还钱。
en: Well... As a legitimate bank, you know, I have no better way to force him to pay back the money sooner.

zh: 唔……如果她真的被抓，可能会对集团造成上百亿的损失。
en: Well... If she gets arrested, it'll cause us losses worth tens of billions.

zh: 唔……怎么发委托金来着？哦，对，想起来了。
en: Hmm... How do I wire the commission? Wait, right, I remember.

zh: 唔……确实有人掉包了这份文件。
en: Hmm... Indeed, someone switched the documents.

zh: 唔……虽然克隆体本身也不过是蛋白质……
en: Well... Clones are also made of proteins though...

zh: 唔！别担心！我们并不是要用费多做什么！
en: Uh, don't worry! We're not doing anything to the Fedos!

zh: 唔，从战斗数据上来看，这些赛毕斯托人似乎和天使海盗并无瓜葛。
en: Well, looking at the battle data, these Sebiestors seem to have nothing to do with the Angel Cartel pirates.

zh: 唔，其实我这边有一些小麻烦想拜托你解决——最近总有我们的顾客被古斯塔斯袭击。
en: Well, actually, I have a favor to ask. Our clients have been attacked by the Guristas recently.

zh: 唔，好在任务顺利完成了，*哈欠* 哈，好了，下班下班。
en: Well, fortunately, the mission has been successfully completed, *yawn*. Ha, well, that's a wrap for me today.

zh: 唔，虽然完整性不是很高，但是有13.2%的概率是女皇的基因。
en: Hmm, although it's not complete, there's a 13.2% chance that this is the Empress' gene.

zh: 唔，让我看看节目单，今晚的焰火表演就在——{2|system_name:_tr}！
en: Well, let me take a look at the program list, the fireworks show tonight is in {2|system_name:_tr}!

zh: 唠叨了这么多，剩下的东西还请你自己体验吧！
en: Enough talk. Feel free to have a shot at the rest and experience them for yourself!

zh: 唷唷，飞行员，今天的推荐音乐是热情似火的摇滚！
en: Hey there, Capsuleer. The music of the day is a passionate rock song!

zh: 啊啊啊啊！又到了一件快递！开心！
en: Ah! Another package for me! Nice!

zh: 啊，啊，你好，飞行员。我是汉森博士。
en: Ah, hello, Capsuleer! I'm Dr. Hansen.

zh: 啥？发芽的种子我可不敢要啊！
en: What? I don't want sprouted seeds!
Hello, hello, oh, yes, I can hear you.

zh: 喂？喂？能听到吗？真神保佑，这里是帝国海军。
en: Hello? Hello? Can you hear me? May the one true God bless us, this is the Imperial Navy.

zh: 喂？怎么是你？异株湖的小姑娘，你怎么跑到三岛集团去了？
en: Hello? You? What are you, a little girl from Ishukone, doing at Hyasyoda?

zh: 喂？我有一件重要的工作需要你完成。
en: Hello? I have an important job for you.

zh: 喂？飞行员，我这里有一件重要的事情需要拜托你完成。
en: Hello, Capsuleer? I have an important job that needs your help.

zh: 喏，就是这批疫苗。情势不乐观，您可要加速前进呀！
en: Here, these are the vaccines. The situation isn't looking good – ಊ  you have to hurry!

zh: 喝一罐酷菲，并尝试调整呼吸。
en: Drink a can of Quafe, and relax your breathing pattern.

zh: 嗝，交给你了，我要再开一罐酷菲。
en: *Hic* It's all yours. I'll get myself another can of Quafe.

zh: 嗝，那边说已经收到货了。
en: *Hic* They said they've received your delivery.

zh: 嗨！你好呀！飞行员！喜欢后现代迷幻电音吗？
en: Hi, pilot! Do you like postmodern psychedelic electronic music?

zh: 嗨！我已经收到了移民们的旅行信息，感谢你的帮助！
en: Hi! I've received the immigrants' travel information. Thank you for your help!

zh: 嗨！飞行员！这里是全世界最伟大的软饮公司——酷菲！
en: Hi, pilot! This is the greatest soft drink company of all time – Quafe!

zh: 嗨！飞行员，任务完成的很棒！我很满意！你满意今天的音乐吗？
en: Hi, Capsuleer. Job well done! I'm quite content! What do you think of today's music choice?

zh: 嗨！飞行员，非常高兴见到你。
en: Hi, Capsuleer! It's a great pleasure to meet you.

zh: 嗨，你做了件十分有意义的事情！报酬由EVE姐妹会提供，我立即打到你账上。
en: Hey, what you did for us was truly meaningful! The Sisters of EVE will send you your reward payment. I will arrange the transfer immediately.

zh: 嗨，你好呀！实际上，我有一些事情需要你的帮助。
en: Hi there! Actually, I have a favor to ask.

zh: 嗨，你还好吗？战斗数据我已经收到了。
en: Hey, are you okay? I received the combat data.

zh: 嗨，我等了你有一会儿了，飞行员。
en: Hi. I've been waiting for you for quite a while, pilot.

zh: 嗨，飞行员！今天也享受了美味的大餐吗？
en: Hi, Capsuleer! Did you enjoy a great meal today?

zh: 嗨，飞行员，任务完成得不错，我立即把报酬打到你账上。
en: Hi, Capsuleer. Well done! The reward payment will be made to your account immediately.

zh: 嗨，飞行员，非常感谢你能接受这次委托。
en: Hi, Capsuleer. Thank you so much for accepting this commission.
Yes! These are the ones. Please deliver them to {6|station_name:_tr}.

zh: 嗯，合理的诉求。年轻人，请追加委托内容，救援剩下的两个驻留点。
en: A reasonable request. Young pilot, I have an additional task for you: a rescue mission to the two remaining refuges.

zh: 嗯，就是这样，这些没有灵魂的矿石从其他地方收购就行了。
en: Well, that's how it is. These ores aren't worth mining; we'll just purchase them elsewhere.

zh: 嘉哈·考赫特是阿根塔里的维克米军事武装力量的领袖。维克米和平军团将他送到这里来接管死亡空间。这些死亡空间是维克米军团从天蛇集团那里购买得来的，考赫特还要与那敌对情绪日益高涨的环境保护组织——自然之友——进行斗争。考赫特同时也是维克米的代理人。他成功地与盖伦特雇佣兵集团天科达成协议，让天科在联邦领域里为维克米服务。任务：  难度等级：7级
en:
Gara Kort is the leader of Wiyrkomi's military arm in Algintal.  He was sent here by Wiyrkomi's Peace Corps to wrest control of the deadspace areas purchased by Wiyrkomi from Serpentis control, as well as combat the increasingly hostile environmentalist organization, Friends of Nature.  He was also the Wiyrkomi agent who managed to strike a deal with the gallente mercenary group, Temko, which now serve under Wiyrkomi in Federation space.

Difficulty Rating: Grade 7

zh: 嘉哈·考赫特的乌鸦级飞船
嘘……至少，这不是直接证据，只是一个克隆舱的遗骸。
en: Shhh... At least this isn't direct evidence. It's just a wrecked clone vat bay.

zh: 嘿，克隆人。恭喜你成为纳基维集团的代言人。
en: Hey, Capsuleer. Congratulations on becoming a spokesperson for Nugoeihuvi.

zh: 嘿，干得不赖，有我当年的范儿！
en: Hey, not bad. Almost as good as I was!

zh: 嘿，飞行员。你知道这次是什么委托吗？
en: Hey, Capsuleer. Do you know what the commission is this time?

zh: 噢！对不起，请原谅我的心不在焉。
en: Oh! Sorry, please forgive me for being absent-minded.

zh: 噢，不用叫我主人，你们现在是自由身了。
en: No need to call me master now. You are all free.

zh: 噢，别跟我装傻。我从德沃塔那里要求的是一份女皇的基因样本，你给我的究竟是什么？
en: Hey, stop messing me around! I asked DeVorta for a sample of the Empress's genes, and now you give me this? What is it?

zh: 噢，噢，好的，是我孤陋寡闻了。
en: Alright, alright. I'm the ignorant one.

zh: 噢，天哪。我说，真的要我来做这么无聊的事情吗？
en: Good heavens. I mean, do I really have to do something this boring?

zh: 噢，太好了，我这就去通知管理部的人让他们开始分发商品。
en: Wow, great! I'll ask the administration to start distributing the goods right away.

zh: 噢，对不起，飞行员。她就是这样，腕儿越大脾气越大，希望你不要介意。
en: I beg your forgiveness, pilot. She's just that sort of person. The greater the star, the bigger the temper. Please don't mind her.

zh: 噢，对了。如果你抓到妮娜，记得绝·对·不·要·和·她·说·话。
en: Ah, right. If you get Nina, remember: DO NOT SPEAK A SINGLE WORD TO HER!

zh: 噢，怎么了，我的老朋友，没看见我正忙呢吗？
en: What's wrong, my old friend? Can't you see I'm busy right now?

zh: 噢，我想起来了，异株湖集团快要解散了。啧啧，也难免你想换个工作。
en: Oh, I remember! The Ishukone corporation is about to be disbanded. No wonder you're looking for a new job.

zh: 噢，真够无聊的。现在流行哑巴克隆人飞行员吗？
en: Heavens, this is sooo tedious. Is it popular to use mute Capsuleers these days?

zh: 噢，真神保佑，该死的舒达夫，我就知道是你！
en: Oh, may the one true God bless you, Shudav! I just knew it was you!

zh: 噢，真神保佑，非常感谢，非常感谢，人救到了就好。
en: Oh, may the one true God bless you, thank you so so much. I'm glad they're saved.

zh: 噢，真神保佑，飞行员。我们集团的一艘货运舰被卡拉吉塔集团扣押了。
en: May the one true God bless you, Capsuleer. A cargo-runner of our corporation was detained by Kaalakiota.

zh: 噢，真该死，怎么会是一个克隆人飞行员？
en: Damn it! How could it be a Capsuleer?
Wow, heavens above! You're finally back.

zh: 噢，老天。飞行员，我们在{6|system_name:_tr}星系的设施正在被他们袭击！
en: Oh heavens above. Pilot! Our facilities at {6|system_name:_tr} System are under attack!

zh: 噢，让我看看是哪一位飞行员，嗯，嗯。
en: Oh, let me see which pilot that is. Yes, yes.

zh: 噢，该死。怎么可能说的出口！
en: Oh come on! How could I say that!

zh: 噢，谢天谢地，真的把我吓坏了！
en: Oh, thank God. I was really worried!

zh: 噢，飞行员，不知道哪来的一伙强盗打劫了我们仓库，抢走了所有的酷菲。
en: Ah, Capsuleer. A gang of bandits appeared out of nowhere, robbed our warehouse and took all the Quafe.

zh: 四大帝国之间的冲突不时爆发，要是战火烧到家门口，就只能向更安全的星域转移。星捷运的子公司遍布新伊甸，难免遭逢战火，为保证正常运转，时常会雇佣飞行员进行资产转移。
en: Conflicts between the four nations are frequent. If battle comes your way, the only way to escape is to move to a safer region. InterBus has subsidiaries all across New Eden, which makes it hard for them not to get caught in the crossfire. To ensure normal operation, InterBus often hires pilots to transfer its assets.

zh: 四类沃尔夫-拉叶星效果光束
四类激变变星效果光束
四维加强转化模组蓝图
四维加强集成模组蓝图
四维普适转化模组蓝图
四维普适集成模组蓝图
四维降频转化模组蓝图
四维降频集成模组蓝图
en: Four-dimensional Frequency Reducing Integrated Module Blueprint

zh: 因为一个无聊的证据，我们和斯库维塔集团的公审陷入了僵局，会在下个月举行两方之间的比武审判。
en: Our public trial with Sukuuvestaa Corporation reached a stalemate due to an insignificant piece of evidence. Therefore, a sparring trial will be held next month.

zh: 因为一些意外，求救信号到我们这里就被中断了，我们也没能把完整的救援信号发出去……
en: Because of an accident, the distress signal was cut off when it reached us. We couldn't sent out the complete signal...

zh: 因为某些旗舰级舰船无法参与的战斗逐渐增加，各个国家都需要一种火力强大且吨位合适的战列舰，增强火力的改良舰船开始出现并风靡新伊甸。
en: Due to the increasing number of battles in which Capital Ships cannot participate, every nation now needs powerful battleships of a more suitable size. Modifying smaller ships for increased firepower has therefore become a new trend in New Eden.

zh: 因卡萨斯级突击型蓝图
因金钱不足，无法发起物流，您购买的物品已存放至购买地所在空间站仓库
en: Insufficient funds, cannot start shipping. The item you purchased has been deposited at the local station's warehouse.

zh: 囤积者级在米玛塔尔工业舰中排名第二，它虽没有猛犸级那么坚固，但就其价位而言，它提供了非常充裕的货舱空间。它非常适合在安全区域或在拥有强大护卫的条件下作业。
en: The Hoarder is the second in line of the Minmatar industrial ships, it's not as strong as the Mammoth but its cargo space is very large for its price. It's perfect for operation in peaceful areas or when it has strong escort.

zh: 国拉尔德·久姆的徘徊者级飞船
图万氏 大型装甲维修器
图万氏 灵敏度抑制发射器
图万氏 磁性力场稳定器
图万氏 自适应装甲增强器
图克尔技师改造了分裂者级，使其火力得到提升。
en: Thukker engineers modified the Breacher, increasing its firepower.

zh: 图克尔技师改造了刺客级，使其远航能力得到强化。
en: Thukker engineers modified the Stabber, greatly improving its long-range capabilities.

zh: 图克尔通过改造长尾鲛级大赚一笔，速度更快一点，火力更强一点，诸多提升的点汇聚成了这艘加强型舰船上，使其成为共和舰队正面战场上的佼佼者。
en: The Thukkers made a hefty fortune by selling modified Thrashers. Their version of this destroyer comes with many improvements over the original. Faster and more powerful, this vessel has proved to be one of the best in the Republic Fleet.

zh: 图克斯，把你上午抓到的那几个赫特的残党移交给这位克隆人飞行员吧。
en: Thukks, get those remnants of Heth's for this Capsuleer.

zh: 圣光 跃迁核心稳定器

在人类重返宇宙的早期，科学家伯兰图和金奇共同发现了一种能自我维持的自然结构，这种结构完全由悬浮在行星磁场的等离子构成。自那时起，这个词汇被用于个所有这种物质，无论是在普通环境下形成的还是使用电流人工制成的。

可以从下列类型的行星开采获得：
熔岩行星
贫瘠行星
离子行星
en:
In the early days of humanity's return to space flight, scientists Planto and Ginch co-discovered a self-sustaining natural structure made entirely from plasma suspended in a planetary magnetic field. Since then, the term has been applied to any such construct, whether occurring under normal conditions or produced artificially using electrical currents.

Can be obtained by mining the following types of planets:
Lava Planet
Barren Planet
Plasma Planet

zh: 在仓库界面左下角点击切换至<color value="0x9afdd07a">个人资产</color>。
en: Tap the bottom-left button on the Inventory screen to switch to <color value="0x9afdd07a">Personal Assets</color>.

zh: 在你完成任务后，任务的星币奖励会直接发到你的电子钱包中。
en: After completing a mission, the ISK reward will be directly transferred to your wallet.

zh: 在净化级隐形轰炸舰的基础上，塔什蒙贡家族提供了一些改进思路和技术，使其可以拥有更强大的作战能力。
en: Thanks to ideas and technology contributed by the Tash-Murkon family, the Purifier stealth bomber was modified to enhance its combat capability.

zh: 在外乡隐忍多年，受尽苦难，回到自己的土地还要忍受这么多的欺凌……
en: After all those years of hiding and suffering in foreign lands, I wasn't expecting the torment to follow me back home...

zh: 在多利安姆·柯埃佐统治该星域时，它成为了一个蓬勃发展的星际贸易中心，所有的行星和城市都欣欣向荣。在他们敬爱的皇帝遇刺后，整个星域陷入了休克，尽管为重新燃起它的经济活力进行过多次努力，但该星域及其人民仍旧沉浸在丧失一位最伟大领导人的悲痛中。
en: During the time that Doriam Kor-Azor controlled this region it became a prosperous and thriving center of interstellar trade, its planets and cities flourishing. The whole area went into a state of shock following their beloved Emperor's assassination, and despite many attempts at rekindling the economic prosperity and spirit, the region and its people still mourn the loss of one of their greatest leaders.

zh:
在大型小行星和卫星内部高压环境中形成的淡蓝色晶体，用于电子和军火制造。只在几个区域有丰富储量。

可以从下列矿石中提炼获得：
黑赭石
片麻岩
灰岩
同位原矿
希莫非特
水硼砂
奥贝尔石
en:
Light-bluish crystal, formed by intense pressure deep within large asteroids and moons. Used in electronic and weapon manufacturing. Only found in abundance in a few areas.

Can be obtained by reprocessing the following ores:
Dark Ochre
Gneiss
Spodumain
Hedbergite
Hemorphite
Kernite
Omber

zh: 在大型小行星和行星卫星内部高压环境中形成的淡蓝色晶体，常用于电子和军火制造业。只在几个区域有丰富储量。
en: Light-bluish crystal, formed by intense pressure deep within large asteroids and moons. Used in electronic and weapon manufacturing. Only found in abundance in a few areas.

zh: 在大范围内扰断跃迁行为。
en: Disrupts warping over a large area.

zh: 在天使企业联合体的所有船只中，德拉米尔级护卫舰服役时间最长，使用频率最高。该舰称得上是护卫舰中吃苦耐劳的役马；如果掉以轻心的话，很可能会被这个牙尖齿利的小美人狠狠咬上一口。
en: The Dramiel is the most long-standing and commonly-used ship design in the Angel Cartel's vast repertoire of vessels. A frigate workhorse, if ever there was one, this sharp-tusked and dangerous beauty can sting incredibly hard if one is not prepared for its assault.

zh: 在太空舱被击毁后，将默认在此空间站重新激活飞行员克隆体。
en: If your capsule is destroyed, a new clone will be activated on this station by default.

zh: 在安全等级0.5及以上的区域，不允许拾取不属于你的行星开采箱子。
en: You cannot loot planetary resource containers in areas with a Security Level of 0.5 and above.

zh: 在局部隐身力场的作用下，这个小型货柜能够躲过扫描器的侦测。
en: Rigged with a localized cloaking field, this small container is hidden from sensors while activated.

zh: 在市政管理局批准的驻留点当中，我并没有看到这两个驻留点的信息。
en: These two refuges are not among those approved by the Urban Management.

zh: 在帝国的某些地方，顽皮的孩子们一听到血袭者的惊悚传说就会吓得停止哭泣。众所周知，阿什姆级巡洋舰上骇人的阿什姆之矛会带来比死亡更为恐怖的灾难。小孩子和飞行员之间的共识不多，但这是其中之一。
en: In certain Empire regions, where naughty children are frightened into submission with tales of the Blood Raiders and their gallery of horrors, the terrible spear of the Ashimmu is known by all as a harbinger of things that are worse than death. This is one of the few things that small children and capsule pilots generally agree upon.

zh: 在彻底修好之前，我们可能一直需要给他们运送干净水源吧。
en: Before they finish fixing the thing, we may need to keep bringing them clean water.

zh: 在很早的时候，加达里就确立了“企业即是国家”的政治形式。以九大寡头集团为核心，加达里人从出生之日起，就是被分配好工作的企业员工，并为了能够更好地为企业服务而接受教育，磨练自己的技艺。
en: Long ago, the Caldari established "corporation as government" as their political philosophy. The Caldari State is made up of nine megacorporations, and each person within them is an employee from birth onward. The education they receive is focused entirely on helping them perfect their skills and better fulfill their specified role in the corporation.

zh: 在总览中，<color value="0x9afdd07a">双击目标</color>可以快速进行锁定。
en: In the Overview, <color value="0x9afdd07a">double-tap on the target</color> to lock onto it.

zh:
在新伊甸中，各个势力会将委托任务发布在统一的公告板上。
打开际遇，在新闻页签可以领取公告板任务，包括战斗、运输、采矿等任务类型，可根据自身情况进行选择。
某些稀有任务完成后还可获得任务委托书，完成新闻委托可以解锁故事线。
en:
In New Eden, all factions will post missions on a common-use billboard.
Open the News page under Encounters to accept billboard missions, which are sorted into categories including combat, transport, mining, etc. Feel free to pick the missions that best suit your own abilities.
Some rare missions will grant you Mission Assignments. Complete News Missions to unlock Storylines.

zh:
在新伊甸的星系深处，有着大大小小的小行星带，其中储藏着丰富的矿石资源。
可以驾驶装备有采矿设备的舰船前往开采。
开采后的矿石可以提炼出各种矿物，用于工业制造。
en:
Asteroid belts can be found in all shapes and sizes in the depths of New Eden. They are rich in ores.
You can mine them using ships equipped with mining equipment.
The ores you mine can be processed into various minerals, which can then be used for manufacturing items.

zh:
在新伊甸的星系深处，游荡着大量的海盗。这些海盗的聚集点，会产生异常信号并被监测到。
根据难度分为小型异常、中型异常、大型异常、基地与检察官异常。
其中小型、中型、大型为普通的战斗异常。
基地为困难的战斗异常，有概率掉落势力装备。
检察官异常为困难的战斗异常，有概率掉落势力装备，第二层还可获得蓝图。
en:
Large amounts of pirates roam the depths of New Eden. Their gathering places will emit abnormal signals, or anomalies, which your equipment can detect.
Anomalies are classified by difficulty: small, medium and large anomalies; bases; and inquisitor anomalies.
Small, medium and large anomalies are regular combat sites.
Bases are high-difficulty combat sites which have a chance of dropping faction modules.
Inquisitor anomalies are high-difficulty combat sites which have a chance of dropping faction modules. You can even get blueprints in the second level of these anomalies.

zh: 在星图左上角的标题可切换宇宙星图与星域星图。
en: You can toggle between the universe  and the region via the title at the top left.

zh: 在极短时间内大幅提高航行速度。推进舰船的动力和相应的最大速度加成均受使用该装备的舰船重量所限。该系统运转所需的高额能量值意味着它必须使用部分电容输出的能量，以确保跃迁有效力场的完整性。启用该装备会显著增加舰船的电磁辐射信号。
en: Boosts speed massively for a very short time. The thrust that boosts the ship, and the corresponding maximum velocity bonus, are limited by the mass of the ship that uses this module. The sheer amount of energy needed to power this system means that it must permanently reserve a fraction of the capacitor output just to maintain the integrity of its warp containment field, and when activated it substantially increases the's EM footprint.

zh: 在隐匿空间区域里的高层人员。在这里居住。
en: The highest ranking personnel within this deadspace pocket reside here.

zh: 在没有经过有效的许可情况下就将舰船停靠到这座加达里空间站里是不允许的。
en: Docking into this Caldari station without proper authorization has been prohibited.

zh: 在现场有少量训练兵团舰艇的残骸，但是应该还有幸存者。
en: There is a small amount of Training Corps wreckage on the scene, but there should be survivors.

zh: 在现存的无畏级战舰当中，莫洛级可能是唯一一种在对付敌方旗舰级战舰的同时还能腾出手来应付小型敌舰的旗舰级飞船。依靠其变化多端的点防阵列，以及能在战场上迅速对敌人造成巨大伤害的恐怖能力，莫洛级能够扭转整场战斗的走向。
en: Of all the dreadnoughts currently in existence, the versatile Moros possesses perhaps the greatest capacity to fend off smaller hostiles by itself while concentrating on its primary capital target. By virtue of its protean array of point defense capabilities - including a drone bay capable of fielding vast amounts of drones to safeguard the behemoth - the Moros is single-handedly capable of turning the tide in a fleet battle.

zh: 在现实中，宁静之域根本谈不上宁静。这块星域的南部区域居住着臭名昭著的印塔基人，他们对个人自由的过分强调从某种程度上解释了这里的基本无法律性。而联邦似乎不愿对该星域进行大量投资的暧昧态度更使情况恶化，这是许多尚未逃往辛迪加的印塔基人主要不满之处。而更糟糕的是，该星域真正获得的投资经费却被主要用于增强联邦在宁静之域动荡的极北之地的军事力量，那些地方经常处在威胁之下。
en: In reality, Placid is anything but. The southern reaches of the region are home to the notorious Intaki, whose huge emphasis on personal freedom goes some way towards explaining its general lawlessness. The situation is not helped by the Federation's seeming reluctance to invest heavily in the region - a source of some resentment among the Intaki who haven't already fled to Syndicate.    To make matters worse, much of what does get earmarked for the region ends up being used to bolster the Federation's increasingly important military presence in Placid's turbulent and far-flung northern extremities, which are constantly under threat.

zh: 在电子化战列巡洋舰改造前，指挥型就已经存在了，但现在这种新型的轻量化指挥舰更受飞行员的喜爱。
en: Command ships already existed before the modification of the battlecruiser's electronic equipment, but the new lightweight model of command ship is currently enjoying great popularity among pilots.

zh: 在盖伦特的军事行动中，因卡萨斯级护卫舰通常充当先锋的角色。它的速度以及惊人的力量使得它很适合小规模战斗。因卡萨斯级飞船如果成群结队行动，即使体积数倍于它的对手也难以抵挡它们一拥而上的攻击。近几年来，由于其富有攻击性的外观，因卡萨斯级在海盗群体中越来越流行。
en: The Incursus is commonly found spearheading Gallentean military operations. Its speed and surprising strength make it excellent for skirmishing duties. Incursus-class ships move together in groups and can quickly and effectively gang up on ships many times their size and overwhelm them. In recent years the Incursus has increasingly found its way into the hands of pirates, who love its aggressive appearance.

zh: 在盖伦特的军事行动中，因卡萨斯级护卫舰通常充当先锋的角色。它的速度使得它很适合小规模战斗，而它的恢复能力使得它能够在战场上坚持到最后。因卡萨斯级飞船如果成群结队行动，即使体积数倍于它的对手也难以抵挡它们一拥而上的攻击。近几年来，由于其富有攻击性的外观，因卡萨斯在海盗们中越来越流行。
en: The Incursus is commonly found spearheading Gallentean military operations. Its speed and surprising strength make it excellent for skirmishing duties. Incursus-class ships move together in groups and can quickly and effectively gang up on ships many times their size and overwhelm them. In recent years the Incursus has increasingly found its way into the hands of pirates, who love its aggressive appearance.

zh: 在盖伦特联邦的人眼里，纳美西斯级隐形轰炸舰表现的很完美，但很多商业集团的雇佣军还是对其进行了一些改造，这艘就是某神秘集团的产物，出现后很多私人甚至也逆向工程了这一改型的图纸。
en: From the perspective of the Gallente Federation, the Nemesis stealth bomber has performed perfectly. But some mercenaries hired by commercial organizations still felt the need to modify it, and ended up with this. Who exactly was responsible for the initial modification is unknown, but several people were able to reverse-engineer its design.

zh: 在盖伦特联邦，只要肯花钱，就能享受到任何快乐。一艘采矿船的驾驶员过量服用了非法增效剂导致精神失常，现在制止的办法只剩下摧毁他们了。
en: In the Gallente Federation, you can enjoy anything you want as long as you are willing to pay for it. The crew of a mining ship overdosed on an illegal booster, which cost them their sanity. The only way to stop them now is to destroy them.

zh: 在系统标题栏，你也能发现我的快捷求助按钮。
en: You can also find me by using the Help shortcut in the System title bar.

zh: 在联邦政府黑名单上挂名已久的一名天蛇集团高管，最终在{2|system_name:_tr}暴露了自己的位置。自大的他以为自己能侥幸躲过联邦的搜捕，却没想到政府部也有自己独特的手段……
en: An executive member of Serpentis Corporation, who has been on the Federal Administration's blacklist for a long time, exposed his position in {2|system_name:_tr}. He was arrogant enough to think he had evaded the Federation's grasp. But what he didn't know is that the government has its own unique methods...

zh: 在联邦海军万王宝座设计的基础上，守护天使的工程师们建造了一艘让任何胆敢与天使或天蛇作对的人不寒而栗的战舰。从这艘船已经享有的声誉来看，他们似乎已经大功告成了。
en: Basing their design on the Federation Navy's much-vaunted Megathron, the Guardian Angels' engineers set out to create a battleship that would instill fear in anyone fool enough to square off against the Cartel or its Serpentis protectorate. Based on the reputation this ship has engendered, they seem to have succeeded admirably.

zh: 在艾玛的土地上，奴隶就像是商品一样可以合法买卖，有钱的贵族们也时不时地向地方各省购买健康年轻的奴隶以作补充。然而，对于有着血祭传统的血袭者来说，运输奴隶的船队是他们最喜欢的目标。
en: In the land of Amarr, slaves can be traded legally just like commodities. Wealthy nobles also buy healthy young slaves from local provinces to supplement them from time to time. However, for the Blood Raider Covenant, with its tradition of performing the Rites of Blood, a transport fleet filled with slaves is their favorite target.

zh: 在行星表面殊死拼杀的地面部队可以使用遥感广播来呼叫在附近的友军飞船对地面实施一次针对性的轨道轰炸。
en: Telemetry broadcast by forces fighting on a nearby planetary body enables allied ships in range to unleash a terrifying orbital bombardment against the designated target.

zh: 在过去人们的认知中，太阳是一成不变的。而实际上微小的引力波动时时刻刻都在发生，而引力的波动，往往预示着巨大的恒星风暴将在不久后发生。恒星将释放出巨量的电磁辐射，恒星中的太空殖民地都有可能受到不同程度的损害。
en: In the past, people thought of the sun as a static object. However, there are constant gravitational fluctuations. These phenomena are often the telling sign of a forming star storm. When that happens, the star releases immense amounts of electromagnetic radiation, damaging all colonies within the system to various degrees.

zh: 在过去的年代里，只有深受皇帝宠爱的人才有希望获赏成为威严、强大的灾难级战列舰的指挥官。后来，这些辉煌的金色巨舰在市场上全面流通，不过它们依然被视为艾玛力量的永恒象征而令人敬畏。
en: In days past, only those in high favor with the Emperor could hope to earn the reward of commanding one of the majestic and powerful Apocalypse class battleships. In latter years, even though now in full market circulation, these golden, metallic monstrosities are still feared and respected as enduring symbols of Amarrian might.

zh: 在近期已经增加过开采时间，请稍等。
en: The mining time has been increased recently, please wait.

zh: 在这个世界生存最重要的就是不要想太多，还是来一首好听的音乐吧。
en: Maybe I should just put on some good music and stop worrying about things...

zh: 在这个只建造了一半的万王宝座级周围有大量活动进行着。当你好奇为什么会这样时，你注意到你的感应器显示，它被一个极其牢固的护盾保护着。
en: There is a lot of activity around this partially constructed Megathron. As you start to wonder why, you notice that your sensors indicate it is protected by an extremely durable shield.

zh: 在这个隐匿空间层内储存着萨沙共和国进行战争所需的各种补给，这个补给储藏库是其中守卫最严密的一处。
en: Of the various supplies to fuel Sansha's Nation's warfare that are stored in this deadspace pocket, this one is the most securely guarded.

zh: 在这个盖伦特度假胜地，游客有很多事可以做，包括赌博、洗浴、私人隔间及三个模拟的热带天堂，一切都为了最大程度地娱乐大众。
en: This Gallentean pleasure resort sports various activities open for guests, including casinos, baths, escort booths and three domes of simulated tropical paradise for maximum bliss.

zh: 在这座塔洛迦库房的废墟中还矗立一座交换库房。从内部的残骸来看，这座空间站要么是用来作为监狱的，要么就是一座用于文化交流的空间站，实际上这两者基本没有什么分别。不管它的作用到底是什么，这种类似的建筑在塔洛迦文化中非常多见，由此可见它对塔洛迦人的重要意义。
en: Amidst the ruins of this Talocan outpost, the exchange depot looms, its presence foreboding. Judging from the wreckage inside, the depot was either used for imprisonment or cultural exchange; eerily, there seems to be very little difference between the two. Whatever its purpose, this structure is rather prevalent among the outposts, displaying its importance in Talocan society.

zh: 在这样一个充斥着独裁者和寡头政治家的世界里，盖伦特始终是民主和自由的象征。
en: The Federation is democratic and very liberal in a world full of dictators and oligarchies.

zh: 在这里可以直接从矿石中提炼矿物，省去了把矿石运回空间站的时间。一切都是为了皇帝的荣耀和艾玛帝国的昌盛！
en: Built to reprocess ores into minerals without the tedious interlude of a station visit. All for the glory of the Emperor and the prominence of the Amarr Empire.

zh:
在远离炙热恒星的地方，当等离子聚集到足够被开采的数量的时候，就被称之为处于“悬浮”状态的等离子。使用特种的电子设备可以将离子化的粒子吸引到收集管中，然后再进行储藏、转运或者直接在多种科技中应用。

可以从下列类型的行星开采获得：
离子行星
风暴行星
冰体行星
en:
When found in harvestable quantities beyond the unapproachable heat of an active star, plasma is said to be in a "suspended" state. Specialized electronic equipment is used to attract the ionized particles into collection tubes, after which it can be stored, transported, or applied to a variety of technologies.

Can be obtained by mining the following types of planets:
Plasma Planet
Storm Planet
Ice Planet

zh: 在阻碍跃迁方面，小型舰船的优势很大，但某些舰队交战时，生存能力更强的大型舰船也需要拥有阻拦能力，于是先知级、猛鲑级、弥洱米顿级和飓风级都成功的被改造出了力场战术型。
en: Small ships have great advantages when it comes to preventing warp. However, in certain fleet engagements, large-scale ships with stronger survivability also need to have warp-hindering capabilities. The modified force field versions of the Prophecy, Ferox, Myrmidon, and Cyclone were developed for this reason.

zh: 地点和收货人我已经传给你了。
en: Location and receiver info have been sent to you.

zh: 地狱天使级战舰是专于破坏的星际工具。它的设计宗旨是这样：从战斗一开始就进入战场，锁定射程内的敌人，不断用火力对它们扫射，直到视线内所有的异教徒都被扫成碎片，最后它仍完好无损地屹立于战场。
en: The Abaddon class ship is a celestial tool of destruction. It is designed to enter combat from the outset, targeting enemies at range and firing salvo after salvo at them, and to remain intact on the battlefield until every heretic in sight has been torn to shreds.

zh: 领主级飞船是专于攻击的星际工具。它的设计宗旨是这样：从战斗一开始就进入战场，锁定射程内的敌人，不断用火力对它们扫射，直到视线内所有的敌人都被击毁，最后它仍完好无损地屹立于战场。
en: The Abaddon class ship is a celestial tool of destruction. It is designed to enter combat from the outset, targeting enemies at range and firing salvo after salvo at them, and to remain intact on the battlefield until every heretic in sight has been torn to shreds.

zh: 均衡是米玛塔尔的特点，但是远一点消灭敌人总是好的，弯刀级被无限创造改造为远狙型号，用来保护共和国的部落商团。
en: The Minmatar's philosophy is characterized by balance, but they always prefer striking their enemies from a long distance. For this purpose, Boundless Creation converted the Talwar into a sniping ship to protect the Republic's many tribe-owned businesses.

zh: 坎米利亚·欧尔迪特的狂暴级飞船
埃及特·斯科维兰的堡垒
埃吉·基活的奥伯西斯级飞船
埃拉亚娜·阿诗雅的主宰级
埃拉亚娜在天使联合企业内部有关系，能为那些想要开拓眼界的人提供便利。
en: Arajna is known to have contacts within the Angel Cartel for those willing to expand their horizons.

zh: 埃斯塔梅尔氏 反应式护盾力场
埃斯塔梅尔氏 大型护盾回充增量器
埃斯塔梅尔氏 弹道控制系统
埃斯塔梅尔氏 自适应全能力场
埃斯塔梅尔氏 跃迁扰断炸弹
埃玛格尔·迪特农的狂热级飞船
埃索迪克·米特的裂谷级飞船
埃达尼·约瑟夫的乌鸦级
城壕 反应式装甲增强器
城壕 大型能量中和器

基于接近触发式原理工作的岗哨炮。

船只进入炮台10千米范围内会受到攻击。
en:
Proximity based sentry gun.

Entering within 10km of this turret will cause it to engage with your ship.

zh: 基因样本事关重大，如果让乌拉姆大人知道了，我绝对小命不保。
en: The genetic sample is of great importance. If Mr. Uriam learns about this, I'll be done for.

zh: 基础型 信号放大器
基础型 回转稳定器
基础型 惯性稳定器
基础型 磁性力场稳定器
基础建设的匮乏，使得米玛塔尔人不得不面对各种意料之外的自然灾害。坚毅且勇敢的米玛塔尔人，在常年的危险生活中也逐渐掌握了各种应对灾害的方法。
en: The lack of infrastructure forced the Minmatar to face all kinds of unexpected natural disasters. A long history of dealing with danger gradually taught the brave and determined Minmatar how to deal with catastrophes.

zh: 基础采矿激光器。能快速采集普通的矿石，但不太适合开采稀有品种。
en: Basic mining laser. Extracts common ore quickly, but has difficulty with rarer types.

zh: 基础采矿激光器，能快速采集常见的矿石。
en: A basic mining laser that can quickly extract common ores.

zh: 堡垒博物馆内收藏了本区域在内凡达统治时期的各种古物。
en: The Bastion Museum holds various old relics gathered from the days of Nefantar rule in this sector.

zh:
堡垒等级：空堡

建造商：昇威财团

它由昇威财团于新纪元118年建造完成，并得到了来自克隆飞行员的大力协助。
en:
Citadel Class: Astrahus
Manufacturer: Upwell Consortium

Here stands one of the first five Citadel-class structures constructed in New Eden.
Manufactured in YC-118 by the Upwell Consortium with great assistance from Capsuleers.

The Upwell Consortium and its known affiliates wish to specifically thank <url=showinfo:1376//1093626644>Naava Edios</url>, for going above and beyond all limits and expectations to make these dreams become a reality.

The following Capsuleers have earned an Astrahus blueprint copy for services rendered to the Upwell Consortium:

<url=showinfo:1373//94144727>Aeris Cuprum</url>
<url=showinfo:1380//93850133>Marionne</url>
<url=showinfo:1383//91359513>Ruth Maude</url>
<url=showinfo:1378//1374341627>Shinron Sakai</url>

The following Capsuleer has earned a Fortizar blueprint copy for services rendered to the Upwell Consortium:

<url=showinfo:1376//1601075763>Dzen Avi</url>

zh:
堡垒等级：空堡

建造商：昇威财团

它由昇威财团于新纪元118年建造完成，并得到了来自克隆飞行员的大力协助。
en:
Citadel Class: Astrahus
Manufacturer: Upwell Consortium

Manufactured in YC-118 by the Upwell Consortium with great assistance from Capsuleers.

The Upwell Consortium and its known affiliates wish to specifically thank <url=showinfo:1376//1093626644>Naava Edios</url>, for going above and beyond all limits and expectations to make these dreams become a reality.

The following Capsuleers have earned an Astrahus blueprint copy for services rendered to the Upwell Consortium:

<url=showinfo:1373//94144727>Aeris Cuprum</url>
<url=showinfo:1380//93850133>Marionne</url>
<url=showinfo:1383//91359513>Ruth Maude</url>
<url=showinfo:1378//1374341627>Shinron Sakai</url>

The following Capsuleer has earned a Fortizar blueprint copy for services rendered to the Upwell Consortium:

<url=showinfo:1376//1601075763>Dzen Avi</url>

zh: 塔斯帕·佐兰克尔的审判者飞船
塔斯帕·佐兰克尔的惩罚者级飞船
塔格里纳·安吉的裂谷级飞船
塔洛迦坚固的连接装置
塞特勒氏 大型装甲维修器
塞特勒氏 灵敏度抑制发射器
塞特勒氏 磁性力场稳定器
塞特勒氏 自适应装甲增强器
塞纳斯·伊佳索的奇美拉级战舰
塞纳波级巡洋舰是天使企业联合体最早的飞船设计之一，直到现在，它依然是使用最为广泛的。这种船的起源已不可考，不过据说多数联合体的船只都留有朱庇特人的痕迹，估计这艘船也不会例外。无论这些传言是否有据可循，事实就是：塞纳波级是速度最快，火力最强的巡洋舰之一。
en: The Cynabal was one of the earliest designs put forth by the Angel Cartel, and to this day it remains their most-used design. The ship's origins are unknown, but as with most Cartel ships, persistent rumors of Jovian influence continue to linger. Whether these tales have any basis in reality or not, the facts are on the table; the Cynabal is one of the fastest, most powerful cruisers to be found anywhere.

zh: 增加开采时间需要花费{count}钱/天，是否增加开采时间？
en: Extending mining time costs {count} ISK/day. Confirm?

zh: 增加护盾的最大强度，并可以短时间内通过磁场激活为更强的增效状态。
en: Increases the maximum strength of shields. Its effect can be temporarily amplified via a magnetic field.

zh: 增加电容器储量。有效抵抗能量吸取和能量中和效果。可以通过改变纳米存储结构的活性，短时间强化电池的耐用性。
en: Increases capacitor capacity. Effectively resists the effects of energy absorption and neutralization. By changing the activeness of the nano storage, it can temporarily enhance the battery's capacity.

zh: 增加行星开采时间确认
增强控制塔护盾抵抗爆破伤害的能力。
en: Boosts the control tower's shield resistance against explosive damage.

zh: 增强舰船控制和机动性能。

增强舰队的装甲抗性。

作战网络是专业的舰队指令系统，专为战列巡洋舰和高级指挥舰船而设计。

通常在同一时间只允许一个此类设备运作，不过某些高级单位允许多系统并行。

注意：只有当你被指定为舰队加成官时，舰队加成才有效。这个装备不能在母星力场内使用。
en:
Grants a bonus to the fleet's armor resistance.
Warfare links are dedicated fleet command systems designed for use on battlecruisers and advanced command class ships.
While only one of these units can normally be operated at any given time, certain advanced units allow the use of multiple systems.
Notes: The Fleet bonus only works if you are the assigned fleet booster. This module cannot activate inside a starbase forcefield.

zh: 增强装配舰船的感应和电子套件，包括增加目标锁定数上限、增加最大锁定范围、提升锁定速度和增加感应强度。
en: Augments the sensor and electronics suite of the fitted ship. Benefits include additional locked targets, increased maximum target acquisition range, faster locking speed, and increased sensor strength.

zh: 声音放大点，解析员，这似乎是一个音频信号。
en: Turn the volume up, Analyst. This sounds like an audio signal.

zh: 处于未加工状态的加强型超感本能化合物，可用来生产战斗增效剂。
en: Improved X-Instinct compound in its uncut form, ready to be processed into the final version of the combat booster.

zh: 处于未加工状态的加强型坠落感化合物，可用来生产战斗增效剂。
en: Improved Drop compound in its uncut form, ready to be processed into the final version of the combat booster.

zh: 处决在星期一到星期六正午进行，星期天闭馆。在后台有售印有“绞死他们”字样的T恤，请联系温迪。
en: Executions Mon-Sat at High Noon. Closed Sundays. Hang'em High T-Shirts for sale in the back. Ask for Wendy.

zh: 复合碳素引擎舱蓝图 I
en: Small Polycarbon Engine Housing I Blueprint

zh: 复合碳素引擎舱蓝图 II
en: Small Polycarbon Engine Housing II Blueprint

zh: 复合碳素引擎舱蓝图 III

zh: 外空联合矿业 开采先锋网络
en: Outer Ring Excavations Mining Foreman Link

zh: 外空联合矿业 采矿器
外空联合矿业 露天采矿器

外空联合矿业意识到市面上紧缺一种能够在危险地区快速作业的舰船，于是他们创造了冲锋者级。每一位飞行员，无论资历深浅能力高低，只要有志于从事矿业贸易，都可以驾驶这艘船进行作业。

冲锋者级的能力十分出色，能够快速钻探矿石和气体，并以极快的速度进行采集，即使在危险的敌对地区也能迅速撤离。
en:
Recognizing the dire need for a ship capable of fast operations in unsafe territories, ORE created the Venture. It was conceived as a vessel primed and ready for any pilot who wished to engage in the respectable trade of mining, no matter how new to the dangers of New Eden they might be.

The Venture has amazing capabilities at drilling for ores and gases, harvesting them at the speed necessary for mining in hostile space, and getting out relatively unscathed.

zh:
外空联合矿业集团(ORE)在YC110年提出了塔洛斯级的研发概念。它最初的设计理念是一种在无法治地区开采矿石的巡逻舰，要不是黑鹰组织（盖伦特政府下属的一支特别行动队）采纳了它的设计的话，塔洛斯级早就被彻底抛弃了。黑鹰组织去掉了塔洛斯级上那些不必要的系统，并为其加装了战列舰级别的武器装备，这样就创造了一艘专为游击战设计的、理想的快速突击舰船。 
塔洛斯级一直被作为军事机密，直到YC113年才正式对外公布为三级战列巡洋舰。现在，塔洛斯级由度沃勒实验室生产，将最初的ORE设计标准改良为盖伦特联邦标准。
en:
The Talos began in YC110 as an R&D concept by ORE. Conceived as a patrol craft for mining operations in lawless space, the Talos would have been abandoned completely were it not adopted by the Black Eagles, a black-ops branch of the Gallente government. The Black Eagles stripped the Talos of non-essential systems and bolted on battleship-class weapons, creating a quick-strike craft ideal for guerilla operations. 

The Talos remained a military secret until YC113, when it was introduced into wider circulation as a third-tier battlecruiser. Today the Talos is manufactured by Duvolle Labs, who modified the original ORE designs to bring it in line with Gallente standards.

zh: 外空联合矿业集团曾在外环星域发现了超新星诺克石，因此闻名于世。他们拥有分散在新伊甸各地的采矿装置，难免地，不时会遭到海盗的袭击。
en: Outer Ring Excavations are known for their discovery of Nocxium in the Outer Ring. Their mining devices are scattered across New Eden. Inevitably, they're often attacked by pirates.

zh: 多帮助各个势力的人，就能提高你在其势力的声望，从而能以优惠的价格购买他们的商品，甚至购买特色稀有物品。
en: You can increase your standing by helping people in different factions, thus enabling you to buy their commodities at a lower price or even unlock their rare items.

zh: 多年前这里曾发生过一次激烈的交火。尸体至今仍遍布大厅。
en: Years ago this was the site of a major firefight. The dead still litter its halls.

zh: 多米尼克斯级 （莱登船业）
多米尼克斯级战列舰是久经沙场的老将，其服役期可以追溯到盖伦特-加达里战争时期。尽管现在它不再是战场上的王者，但也绝对没有过时。它拥有强大的舰体和威猛的无人机武器，如果你没有最大最新型的战列舰的话，最好就不要在它面前卖弄风骚。
en: The Dominix is one of the old warhorses dating back to the Gallente-Caldari War. While no longer regarded as the king of the hill, it is by no means obsolete. Its formidable hulk and powerful drone arsenal means that anyone not in the largest and latest battleships will regret ever locking horns with it.
Thank you! Your mission is complete.

zh: 夜神级航母的建造是为了向盖伦特社会中一位备受爱戴的人物致以深切的敬意。飞船的设计以洛维诺三世的权杖为原形，这位国王在其和平统治盖伦特的36年间，奠定了科技发展和社会思想解放的基础，在之后的数千年时间里，这种思想延伸到了盖伦特社会的每个角落。夜神级是盖伦特人热爱进步的标志，完美结合了先进的人类工程学概念与最新的前沿科技，它无时不刻地提醒着人们：是什么样的特质能让盖伦特联邦拥有今天的辉煌。
en: The Nyx is a gigantic homage to a figure much loved in Gallente society. The ship's design is based on the scepter of Doule dos Rouvenor III, the king who, during his peaceful 36-year reign, was credited with laying the foundation for the technologically and socially progressive ideologies which have pervaded Gallente thought in the millennia since. Indeed, the Nyx itself is emblematic of the Gallenteans' love for progress; packed to the ergonomic brim with the latest in cutting-edge advancements, it is a proud reminder of the things that make the Federation what it is.

zh: 大事不好了！应用知识……对，应用知识学院的一个研究站被海盗占领了！
en: Terrible news! The pirates... yes, the pirates are occupying a research station of the School of Applied Knowledge!

zh: 大型审计安全密码集装箱
大型小行星空间站任务等级3

大型：通常装配在战列舰上。
大家伙儿，欢迎回归米玛塔尔！
大幅提高舰船的防御能力，电量消耗较高。
en: Greatly improves the ship's defensive capabilities. Has a high power consumption.

zh: 大教堂残骸 I_建设中
大明星，你最好识相一点，我们免得动粗。
en: You better behave, big shot. Or we'll rough you up.

zh: 大概有什么误会，我并没有看到遗物。
en: There's probably a misunderstanding. I didn't see any relic.

zh: 大部分的冰体行星在历史上都有一段贫瘠时期，在过后的漫长时期中它们的表面又被冰层所覆盖。表层冰盖生长的过程会因具体条件差异而不尽相同，但是最终的结果从形式上和外观上都是类似的：明亮、高反射率的行星表面上布满了数不清的断层和裂谷。有人推测部分冰体行星在过去可能经历过一段温暖的时期，曾经的液态地表水被冻结成为厚厚的冰层。造成这种结果的原因大多是因为星体本身温度的降低或者是失败的地貌改造工程。
en: The majority of icy planets went through a period of being barren terrestrials, before being surfaced with ice over the course of many millennia. The exact process for this varies from case to case, but the end result is both common and visually uniform - a bright, reflective planet scored by countless fractures and crevasses. A few icy planets are hypothesized to have been warmer, liquid-bearing planets in the past that have subsequently frozen, as a result of either stellar cooling or failed terraforming projects.

zh: 大面积的不明残片。感应器侦测到多处剧烈的能量波动。
en: Unidentified debris on a massive scale. Sensors indicate multiple severe power surges emanating throughout.

zh: 天主凝聚会对暴君级进行了适航性改造，并提升了火力和突防能力。
en: Carthum Conglomerate modified the Maller, improving its adaptability, firepower and ability to penetrate enemy defenses.

zh: 天主凝聚会改造了强制者级的武器系统，使其更好的适应正面战场；加强后的火力可以迅速的消灭一切异教徒。
en: Carthum Conglomerate modified the Coercer's weapon systems to make it more suitable for direct conflicts. The enhanced firepower allows the Coercer to wipe out heretics with at great speed.

zh: 天主凝聚会改造了惩罚者级，使其火力得到提升。
en: Carthum Conglomerate modified the Punisher, increasing its firepower.

天使中央数据处理中心
天使企业联合体不仅仅是头脑简单的强盗，更是阴险狡诈的间谍。赛毕斯托部族在自己的自治领内发现了一个天使企业联合体的间谍，为了部族的安全，必须在他带来更大的威胁之前铲除他。
en: The Angel Cartel is not just a group of simple-minded bandits. They're also sinister and insidious spies. The Sebiestor tribe identified an Angel Cartel spy within its sovereign space. For the safety of the tribe, he must be eliminated before he brings a greater threat.

zh: 天使企业联合体和天蛇集团，猜猜他们之间有什么话要说？
en: The Angel Cartel and Serpentis, guess what kind of conversation they would be having?

zh: 天使企业联合体是一群误入歧途的米玛塔尔人在被艾玛侵略的岁月里，为了生存而组建起一个庞大的集团。对于许多处在水深火热中的米玛塔尔人来说，正义或许早已不再重要——只要能让米玛塔尔人活下去，你就是米玛塔尔的天使。
en: The Angel Cartel is a large criminal faction founded by a group of desperate Minmatar who were struggling for survival under the Amarr Empire's oppression. To many Minmatar living under such extreme circumstances, law and justice are irrelevant. As long as you can lead them to the fountain of wealth, they'll worship you as their angel.

zh: 天使企业联合体是威胁米玛塔尔治安的主要团体。近期，{2|system_name:_tr}范围内天使企业联合体的活动愈发猖獗，共和舰队不得不雇佣克隆人飞行员协助执行海盗抓捕任务。
en: The Angel Cartel is the most notorious pirate group threatening the security of the Minmatar. Recently, the activities of Angel Cartel in {2|system_name:_tr} have become increasingly frequent and bold, and the Republic fleet has had to hire pilots to assist in their pirate hunting missions.

zh: 天使企业联合体的成员大多是迷途的米玛塔尔人，他们知道如何把自己悄无声息地隐藏在共和国的角落。纵使如此，共和安全局还是在{2|system_name:_tr}发现了一处隐藏极深的天使海盗窝点。
en: Most members of the Angel Cartel are Minmatar who have lost their way and now hide on the outskirts of the Republic. Even so, the Republic Security Services have located an Angel Cartel pirate den hidden deep in {2|system_name:_tr}.

zh: 天使企业联合体的罪犯袭击了正在执行情报任务的联邦情报处船只。虽然牺牲的飞行员已经无可挽回，但是这也让联邦情报处更加重视非卧底情报人员的生命安全。
en: Federal Intelligence Office ships were attacked by criminals from the Angel Cartel while on intelligence missions. Although the lives of those lost pilots are gone forever, the situation has made the Federal Intelligence Office pay more attention to the safety of non-undercover intelligence personnel.

zh: 天使区域数据处理中心
天使和天使，究竟谁才是最大的受益者……
en: Angels or Serpentis, I wonder who is the biggest beneficiary...

天蛇集团曾是联邦境内最强大的生物制药公司，其推出的多款划时代意义的人体强化药剂曾在新伊甸风靡一时。但随着强化药剂的滥用，其逐渐暴露出的致幻性和神经毒性使得公司的产品受到大规模抵制。天蛇集团也由此从一个科技公司，转变为一个邪恶企业。他利用自己独特的渠道，向联邦，乃至整个新伊甸输送这种有害药剂。
en: The Serpentis Corporation was once the top biopharmaceutical company in the Federation. For a short time, its human enhancement drugs were immensely popular across New Eden. As more and more people began abusing these drugs, their various side effects, including hallucinations and nervous system damage, were brought into the spotlight, which led to a ban being issued by the Federation. This forced the Serpentis Corporation to turn away from legal business and become a drug-smuggling criminal organization, shipping the now-illegal drugs to every corner of New Eden through covert channels.

太空建筑的主要建造材料。一种非常坚硬但有韧性的金属。由于它在大气温度下不稳定，因此不能用于人类生活环境。在宇宙中很常见。

可以从下列矿石中提炼获得：
艾克诺岩
克洛基石
黑赭石
灰岩
希莫非特
水硼砂
奥贝尔石
斜长岩
干焦岩
灼烧岩
凡晶石
en:
The main building block in space structures. A very hard, yet bendable metal. Cannot be used in human habitats due to its instability at atmospheric temperatures. Very common throughout the universe.

Can be obtained by reprocessing the following ores:
Arkonor
Crokite
Dark Ochre
Spodumain
Hemorphite
Kernite
Omber
Plagioclase
Pyroxeres
Scordite
Veldspar

en: Mission Beacon: Recapture the Occupied Chapel

zh: 奇怪的掩护目标，不知道从哪里来得突袭——然而攻击的目标都不是那些最值钱的工厂。
en: They're covering a strange target, and the origin of the assault is unknown... But they're not going for the most valuable factories.

zh: 奇科·鲁瓦森的审判者飞船

奇美拉级航空母舰的设计基于凯利欧拉号战舰，后者对于加达里而言具有非凡的历史意义。凯利欧拉号最初是一艘负责运送净水的货舰，由于盖伦特-加达里战争的爆发，被改造为一艘铁骑舰载机航母，在加达里首星遭受轨道轰炸期间投入实战。加达里传奇人物雅卡•托维托巴海军上将，驾驶这艘战舰直接冲入盖伦特首星大气层，利用飞船解体碎裂后的残片对行星上几处关键地点发动了致命性的打击。上将的牺牲，成功扰乱了联邦的计划，为加达里人民赢得了足够的时间，使他们能有时间逃离被围困中的家园。奇美拉级承载着加达里人民对上将的追思，看到它，就会想起那些为民族自由抛洒热血的不屈英魂。
en: The Chimera's design is based upon the Kairiola, a vessel holding tremendous historical significance for the Caldari. Initially a water freighter, the Kairiola was refitted in the days of the Gallente-Caldari war to act as a fighter carrier during the orbital bombardment of Caldari Prime. It was most famously flown by the legendary Admiral Yakia Tovil-Toba directly into Gallente Prime's atmosphere, where it fragmented and struck several key locations on the planet. This event, where the good Admiral gave his life, marked the culmination of a week's concentrated campaign of distraction which enabled the Caldari to evacuate their people from their besieged home planet. Where the Chimera roams, the Caldari remember.

zh: 奈杨·卡萨尔的巴戈龙级飞船
奈泊尔·法提马尔的启示级

en: This reward code mission doesn't exist

en: Ms. O'Pato, you're not messing with us, are you?

女皇是真神的化身，神学理事会是真神的代言人。
en: The Empress is the embodiment of the one true God, and the Theological Council are those through whom the one true God speaks.

zh: 她们希望你前往调查，并发回详细的数据报告。
en: They'd like you to investigate and send back a comprehensive data report.

zh: 她曾经是赫特手下最优秀的几个飞行员之一。
en: She used to be one of Heth's best pilots.

zh: 她的遇害……滋滋……损失……滋滋……
好了，克隆人，你算是解决了我的一个大危机。
en: OK, pilot. You helped me solve a big problem.

zh: 好像数量不太够啊，朋友。
en: The numbers don't add up, friend.

zh: 好吧好吧，别打了，今天就到此为止，但我希望共和国能把这件事儿办好。
en: Okay, okay, stop. Let's call it a day. But I hope the Republic can see to it.

zh: 好吧，好吧。咦？通讯已经接通了？
en: Alright, alright. What? It's already gone through?

zh: 好吧，好吧。通过资料的分析对比，这场闹剧可能没有我想的那么简单。
en: Alright, alright. After comparing the data, I can say that things are much more complicated than I expected.

zh: 好吧，好吧。飞行员，唔，我家里的疯婆子非得要我给她买什么“华丽”什么什么的唱片。
en: Fine, fine. Pilot, errm... my crazy wife keeps nagging me to buy her albums by someone called "Shiny" something or other.

zh: 好吧，好吧，又有工作要做了。
en: Alright, alright, I got work to do.

zh: 好吧，要么你，要么德沃塔，你们两个人当中肯定有一个人在装傻。
en: OK. It's either you or DeVorta. One of you is playing dumb.

zh: 好吧，试图跟你搭话的我就是一个笨蛋。
en: Fine. I feel like a fool, trying to talk to you.

zh: 好吧，这是一个有趣的计划。
en: Okay, this sounds like an interesting plan.

zh: 好吧，这次姑且我先相信你。……我这就去查一下，希望你没有信口开河。
en: Alright. I'll take your word for it this time... I'll go check it out. You'd better not be making this up.

zh: 好咧！让我们都再赚一笔。
en: Good! Let's make some more profit.

zh: 好啦！这些蠕动的小东西……真令人兴奋。
en: OK! These little wriggly things... are really exciting.
Keep up the good work and don't let me down.

zh: 好样的飞行员，{2|system_name:_tr}的通讯已经恢复正常。
en: Great job, Capsuleer. The comms in {2|system_name:_tr} is now back to normal.

zh: 好样的，让我们看看究竟他们究竟在做什么。
en: Well done. Let's see what they're doing, exactly.

zh: 好的哲学家，能说点实在的么？
en: Did I pay extra for the philosophy module? Yeesh. Forget I asked.

zh: 好的，拿到飞行执照大概要等到下辈子……
en: Alright then, maybe I'll get Pilot License on the next rebirth...
How do I toggle Star Chart layers?
How do I select multiple items at once?
How do I autopilot to a destination?

zh: 如何导航至目标空间站？
en: How do I autopilot to a target station?
How do I start planetary interaction?
How do I open Personal Assets?
How do I collect mining yields?
How do I attack a target?

zh: 如何查看其他空间站的物品？
en: How do I check items in other stations?
How do I check the time remaining?

zh: 如何查看舰船/货柜包含内容？
en: How do I view the contents of a ship/container?
How do I check attribute details?

zh: 如何筛选总览显示内容？
en: How do I filter the Overview display?
How do I set autopilot preferences?
How do I rotate the camera?
How do I lock onto targets through the Overview?
How do I lock onto targets?

zh: 如果不介意的话，我希望下次能约你喝一杯。
en: If you don't mind, I hope to have a drink with you next time.

zh: 如果不想重蹈那场灾难的覆辙……这件事情必须引起重视。
en: If that disaster is not to be repeated... This matter must be taken seriously.

zh: 如果你们不能妥善解决这个事情，我会向仲裁机构提出要求，追加额外的赔偿。
en: If you cannot solve this problem properly, I will ask the arbitration organization to increase the compensation amount.

zh: 如果你加入加达里海军，一定会成为非常得力的战力！
en: You'd be a helpful asset if you joined the Caldari Navy!

zh: 如果你已经对际遇平台非常熟悉，可以放弃这个任务。
en: If you are already familiar with the Encounters platform, you can skip this mission.

zh: 如果你是一个普通的加达里人，我想我一定会重用你的。
en: If you were an ordinary Caldari, I think I would have you on our side.

zh: 如果你有正确的设备，你也许可以破解这个主机并获得宝贵的信息。
en: If you have the right equipment you might be able to hack into the mainframe and get some valuable information.

zh: 如果你有正确的设备，你也许可以破解这个数据库并获得宝贵的信息。
en: If you have the right equipment you might be able to hack into the databank and get some valuable information.

zh: 如果你有正确的设备，你也许可以破解这块信息碎片并获得宝贵的信息。
en: If you have the right equipment you might be able to hack into the info shard and get some valuable information.

zh: 如果你有正确的设备，你也许可以破解这座通信塔并获得宝贵的信息。
en: If you have the right equipment you might be able to hack into the com tower and get some valuable information.

zh: 如果你有正确的设备，你也许可以破解进入该数据库并获得宝贵的信息。需要破译装备。
en:
If you have the right equipment you might be able to hack into the databank and get some valuable information.
Requires Hacking module.

zh: 如果你有正确的设备，你也许可以破解进入这个集装箱并获得宝贵的信息。
en: If you have the right equipment you might be able to hack into this container and get some valuable information.

zh: 如果你有针对性的设备，那或许能破解其中的数据库来获得有价值的情报。
en: If you have the right equipment you might be able to hack into the databank and get some valuable information.

zh: 如果你能把{2|system_name:_tr}的天蛇集团消灭，我会给你支付一笔可观的佣金。
en: If you can eliminate the Serpentis in {2|system_name:_tr}, I will pay you a handsome commission.

zh: 如果其他人发现我冒着被开除的风险，用公司的名义发布代理委托——结果只是为了给老婆买唱片……那会成为全西顿工业最好笑的笑话。
en: If the others found out that I risked being fired and issued a commission in the company's name... just to buy a music album for my wife... I would become the biggest joke in CreoDron.

zh: 如果可以的话，请你协助我们排查一下。
en: If it's not too much trouble, please assist us with the investigation.

zh: 如果想要长时间作战又灵活快捷，启示级平台改造的远航泛用型的确很适合这个评价，维鲜集团对其改造功不可没。
en: For extended combat, the agile long-range Omen is one of the best options available, thanks to Viziam's stellar modification works.

zh: 如果我们的信徒知道了有人能从审判大会逃脱，会给我们造成非常大的不良影响。
en: If our believers learned that someone managed to escape the trial, it would do great damage to our reputation.

zh: 如果我是你，我会在你开始下一段永无止境的谩骂之前，先到这个位标看看。
en: If I were you, I'd head to this position before starting another round of endless abuse...

zh: 如果把帝国比作一艘航行在银河的巨轮，那么承载她的，就是无数劳工的汗水。尽管在艾玛人眼中，劳作是一种来自真神的试炼，但是它却未曾给劳工带来任何来自真神的福音。米玛塔尔大起义后，艾玛人加强了对劳工的控制，但是，新的星火正在重新点亮。
en: If the Empire is a great ship sailing among the stars, then what keeps her afloat is the blood and sweat of countless slaves. From an Amarrian perspective, being enslaved is one of the True Divine Trials, though the one true God never shows any favor to slaves. The Amarr tightened their control over the enslaved population following the Minmatar Rebellion. However, new sparks are beginning to ignite...

zh: 如果报给警察，他们肯定又会嘻嘻哈哈的推脱过去，所以只好找你了。
en: The police would definitely laugh at us and send us packing with some random excuse, so we had to find you.

zh: 如果没人来救我们的话恐怕我们永远都得困在这太空里了。
en: I'm afraid we'll be trapped in space forever if no one comes to rescue us.

zh: 如果没有获得正式授权，不准在此空间站停靠。
en: Docking has been prohibited into this station without proper authorization.

zh: 如果知道运输船坠毁的地点……说不定还能从残骸当中……
en: If you know where the transport was wrecked, perhaps we can salvage something from it...

zh: 如果能在仪式的过程中把他们一网打尽，那么那些血袭者必将遭到重创。
en: If we can wipe them out during their rite, those Blood Raiders will suffer a terrible loss.

zh: 如果说新伊甸有什么东西能够带来真正的和平，那一定是酷菲。传闻中的某场战争中，酷菲的断货曾一度导致士兵拒绝作战，最终战斗双方只能握手言和。不仅如此，世界各地也常常发生一些由酷菲引起的暴力事件。酷菲中的一些神秘材料让很多机构怀疑其成分是否有成瘾性，但是未能得出定论。
en: If there is anything in New Eden that can bring about real peace, it must be Quafe. It is rumored that once, during wartime, a shortage of Quafe led to the soldiers refusing to fight, and eventually the two sides were forced to agree to a ceasefire. But reports of violent incidents caused by Quafe have also been known to occur all across the galaxy. Some of the mysterious substances used in Quafe have led many institutions to suspect it may contain addictive ingredients, but their investigations have always been inconclusive.

zh: 如果阻止目标跃迁逃走在新伊甸是永久的话题，维鲜集团改造的强制者级可以很好的完成这个任务。
en: In New Eden, stealing a target's chance of warping away is always a popular option, and Viziam's custom Coercer does this really well.

zh: 妮娜，好久不见，欢迎来到纳基维集团。
en: Long time no see, Nina. Welcome to the Nugoeihuvi Corporation.

zh: 姐妹会 中型炮台扫射设备
姐妹会 信息作战网络
姐妹会 大型炮台扫射设备
姐妹会 小型炮台扫射设备
姐妹会 扫描探针发射器
姐妹会 护盾作战网络
姐妹会 核心探针发射器
姐妹会 游击作战网络
姐妹会 装甲作战网络
姐妹会 隐秘行动装置

en: Sisters of EVE Cold Storage Unit

zh: 姐妹会向来行善，你没有理由不信任我。
en: Sisters of EVE has an established reputation as a charitable organization. You have no reason not to trust me.
I do what I want. This is none of your business!

zh: 委托金已收到，请检查您的钱包。
en: Reward has been received, please check your wallet.

zh: 委托金已收到，请检查您的钱包，物品奖励将被递送至{station_name:_tr}。
en: Reward has been received, please check your wallet. Items will be delivered to {station_name:_tr}.

zh: 威力强大的自动加农炮，可以轻松击毁大部分配有轻型装甲的护卫舰。
en: A powerful autocannon that can smash apart most lightly armored frigates with ease.

zh: 威帕斯 反应式护盾力场
威帕斯 大型护盾回充增量器
威帕斯 弹道控制系统
威帕斯 自适应全能力场
威帕斯 跃迁扰断炸弹
威赞氏 大型护盾回充增量器
威赞氏 大型掠能器
威赞氏 大型能量中和器
威赞氏 自适应装甲增强器
娅克·门森的裂谷级飞船

娜迦级诞生于YC109年，由联合警备队设计，专门被用来对付古斯塔斯战舰，它舍弃了加达里海军的坚固传统而换来了战列舰级别的武器装备。三岛集团的管理层因为它的适用性过于狭窄而放弃了它的生产。
它的设计图就一直躺在三岛集团的档案库中，被人遗忘（虽说它在盖伦特全息影像连续剧《流氓警备队》中曾经露过一小面)。YC113年，加达里海军招标建造新型战列巡洋舰。三岛集团迅速提交了娜迦级的设计，并最终以低廉的价格压倒卡拉吉塔集团和异株湖集团，赢得了合同。
娜迦级适用于任何要求快速机动火力的作战行动。
en:
The Naga was designed in YC109, by the Corporate Police Force as an anti-Guristas ship that sacrificed the usual robust Caldari Navy standards in favor of supporting battleship-class weaponry. It was rejected by Hyasyoda management for being overspecialized.

The Naga design remained in the Hyasyoda archives, forgotten (save for a cameo in the Gallente holo-series CPF Blue). In YC113, the Caldari Navy entertained contracts for a new tier of gunboat battlecruiser. Hyasyoda quickly submitted and won with the Naga, underbidding both Kaalakiota and Ishukone.

The Naga is effective in any campaign where fast, mobile firepower is required.

zh: 娱乐是盖伦特人生活不可或缺的一部分，他们富有的贸易帝国为这个世界增添了不少富足和奢华。
en: For the Gallente, entertainment is an inseparable part of their lives. Their wealthy trade empire has brought much wealth and luxury to this world.

zh: 学院派技术军官改良了断崖级，使其适合装载庞大的跃迁力场发生装置和可以提供足够的能量的动力核心，飞得快也要拦的住。
en: The engineers from the Republic University modified the Rupture, fitting it with a large Warp Disruption Field Generator and an equally large power core to match. Fast-flying, fast-stopping.

zh: 宁静 大型远程装甲维修器
它基本上是一个大幅修改过的母星控制塔。作为一个海军型指挥塔，它也进行了进一步改造，以满足第七舰队的具体需求。每个指挥塔都有能力控制整个星系内的舰队行动，并装备了超光速通讯设备、一个战地主计算机及全套指挥控制设施。
en: Essentially an extensively modified Starbase Control Tower, this Navy-issue Command Post has been further modified to meet the 7th Fleet's specific needs. Each Command Post is capable of running Fleet operations for an entire system, and contains FTL comms equipment, a field-spec mainframe and full command-and-control facilities.

zh: 它建于一个多世纪前，那时玛塔尔在所谓的米玛塔尔叛乱中摆脱了艾玛人的统治。
en: The Minmatar Republic was formed over a century ago when the Minmatar threw out their Amarrian overlords in what is now known as the Minmatar Rebellion.

zh:
它是姐妹会为克隆飞行员制造的首批舰船之一。这艘船由圣殿军团研发，这个军团对宇宙空间的探索不仅仅限于研究和营救行动，他们一直在尝试揭开EVE之门的神秘面纱。得益于姐妹会的不懈努力和圣殿军团的精湛技艺，涅斯托级灵活且坚固，非常符合星空探索者的理念：安全、低调、功能齐全。



它非常擅于在危险的空域中穿梭探险，不仅有能力发掘未知的神秘宝藏，还能够安全地带着战利品全身而退。它的引擎可以使用多种能源，这样即使它大容量的货舱中的物品因为某些原因与内部系统起了冲突，它也能从容应对。它的武器系统使用的是可再生资源，对于一艘不知道要在深空中航行多久的舰船来说实在是再理想不过了它的装甲相比拥有相似灵活性的舰船来说可谓坚固异常，而且遍布感应装置，让它的船员可以追踪多种多样的信号源。一艘探索船上总不会少了不速之客或是被营救的遇险人员，他们身上可能携带的致病原并不会威胁到船员的健康安危，这都得益于船上位于弹射出口附近的特殊隔离舱。



圣殿军团投入了大量资源试图让专为斯特修斯级设计的隐形技术也能用于涅斯托级，不过最终还是被迫承认这是不可能的事情。不过他们的努力也并没有白白浪费，涅斯托级的舰船质量减轻了不少，使得它更容易探索那些对庞大笨重的舰船极其不友好的危险环境。结果，涅斯托级现在可以自由进出之前一直无法征服的虫洞空间了，不过这也意味着船体自带的小型救生船无用武之地了。既然涅斯托级无法具备隐形能力，圣殿军团就加强了它的后勤支援能力，使得涅斯托级成为了目前宇宙中最好的支援舰船之一。
en:
This was one of the first vessels the Sisters of EVE made available to Capsuleers. It had been under development by the Sanctuary corporation, whose interest in exploration includes not only search & rescue operations but also a constant inquiry into the nature of the EVE Gate. Thanks to the Sisters' efforts and the Sanctuary's particular expertise, the Nestor is an agile, tenacious ship that aptly adheres to the mantra of both rescuers and explorers: Stay safe, stay hidden, and use every tool at your disposal.

It is particularly adept at venturing into dangerous territories, not merely in recovering whatever may be of interest but also in being able to safely bring it back. Its engines have alternate power sources that come into play should any of its cargo - for which it has plenty of room - cause serious interference with internal systems. Its weaponry runs best on renewable sources, an ideal for a ship that doesn't know how long it'll be in deep space. Its carapace is extremely well armored for a ship this agile, and covered in sensors capable of letting its crew track a myriad of different organic signatures. The crew itself is safely protected from any number of transmittable ailments from rescues and other unexpected passengers, thanks to special quarantine bays that are conveniently located near jettisonable openings.

The Sanctuary corporation poured uncountable resources into making the cloaking technology developed for the Stratios fit the Nestor, but were eventually forced to concede that it was impossible. The effort was not without benefit though, as part of their work focused on reducing the Nestor's mass enough that it could make its way into unexplored territories that might've been hazardous to bulkier vessels. This paid off by affording the Nestor unmatched access to wormhole space, and meant that the embedded miniature rescue vessel on the ship's hull could be relegated to a decommissioned role. With covert function off the table, the Sanctuary turned their eyes on logistics and now the Nestor serves as one of the best support platforms in New Eden.

zh:
它是姐妹会为克隆飞行员制造的首批舰船之一。这艘船由避难会军团研发，这个军团对宇宙空间的探索不仅仅限于研究和营救行动，他们一直在尝试揭开EVE之门的神秘面纱。得益于姐妹会的不懈努力和避难会军团的精湛技艺，斯特修斯级灵活且坚固，非常符合星空探索者的理念：安全、低调、功能齐全。

它非常擅于在危险的空域中穿梭探险，不仅有能力发掘未知的神秘宝藏，还能够安全地带着战利品全身而退。它的引擎可以使用多种能源，这样即使它大容量的货舱中的物品因为某些原因与内部系统起了冲突，它也能从容应对。它的武器系统使用的是可再生资源，对于一艘不知道要在深空中航行多久的舰船来说实在是再理想不过了它的装甲相比拥有相似灵活性的舰船来说可谓坚固异常，而且遍布感应装置，让它的船员可以追踪多种多样的信号源。一艘探索船上总不会少了不速之客或是被营救的遇险人员，他们身上可能携带的致病原并不会威胁到船员的健康安危，这都得益于船上位于弹射出口附近的特殊隔离舱。

此外，它还使用了一种先进且神秘的技术将一部分跃迁核心的功能转移到了船体外的圆柱形结构上，这使得它的隐形功能十分强大，而且跃迁对其的影响微乎其微。除了表示不要试图修改这项技术外，姐妹会拒绝透露其具体信息。
en:
This was one of the first vessels the Sisters of EVE made available to Capsuleers. It had been under development by the Sanctuary corporation, whose interest in exploration includes not only search & rescue operations but also a constant inquiry into the nature of the EVE Gate. Thanks to the Sisters' efforts and the Sanctuary's particular expertise, the Stratios is an agile, tenacious ship that aptly adheres to the mantra of both rescuers and explorers: Stay safe, stay hidden, and use every tool at your disposal.

It is particularly adept at venturing into dangerous territories, not merely in recovering whatever may be of interest but also in being able to safely bring it back. Its engines have alternate power sources that come into play should any of its cargo - for which it has plenty of room - cause serious interference with internal systems. Its weaponry runs best on renewable sources, an ideal for a ship that doesn't know how long it'll be in deep space. Its carapace is extremely well armored for a ship this agile, and covered in sensors capable of letting its crew track a myriad of different organic signatures. The crew itself is safely protected from any number of transmittable ailments from rescues and other unexpected passengers, thanks to special quarantine bays that are conveniently located near jettisonable openings.

And lastly, an ingenious but cryptic transfer in part of the warp core functionality to an outlying cylindrical structure means the Stratios is able to run certain higher-level cloaking functions with very little technical cost, and minimal interference from warp. The Sisters of EVE have refused to comment on this technology, other than to recommend it not be tampered with.

zh:
它是姐妹会为克隆飞行员制造的首批舰船之一。这艘船由避难会军团研发，这个军团对宇宙空间的探索不仅仅限于研究和营救行动，他们一直在尝试揭开EVE之门的神秘面纱。得益于姐妹会的不懈努力和避难会军团的精湛技艺，阿斯特罗级灵活且坚固，非常符合星空探索者的理念：安全、低调、功能齐全。

它非常擅于在危险的空域中穿梭探险，不仅有能力发掘未知的神秘宝藏，还能够安全地带着战利品全身而退。它的引擎可以使用多种能源，这样即使它大容量的货舱中的物品因为某些原因与内部系统起了冲突，它也能从容应对。它的装甲相比拥有相似灵活性的舰船来说可谓坚固异常，而且遍布感应装置，让它的船员可以追踪多种多样的信号源。一艘探索船上总不会少了不速之客或是被营救的遇险人员，他们身上可能携带的致病原并不会威胁到船员的健康安危，这都得益于船上位于弹射出口附近的特殊隔离舱。

此外，它还使用了一种先进且神秘的技术将一部分跃迁核心的功能转移到了船体外的圆柱形结构上，这使得它的隐形功能十分强大，而且跃迁对其的影响微乎其微。除了表示不要试图修改这项技术外，姐妹会拒绝透露其具体信息。
en:
One of the first vessels the Sisters of EVE made available to Capsuleers. It had been under development by the Sanctuary corporation, whose interest in exploration included not only search & rescue operations but also research into the nature of the EVE Gate. Thanks to the Sisters' efforts and the Sanctuary's particular expertise, the Astero was made into an agile, tenacious ship that aptly adheres to the mantra of both rescuers and explorers.

It is particularly adept at venturing into dangerous territories, not just to recover items of interest, but also to bring them back safely. Its engines have alternate power sources that come into play should any of its cargo cause serious interference with its internal systems. Its exterior is extremely well armored and covered in sensors capable of letting its crew track a myriad of different organic signatures.

The outlying cylindrical structure allows the Astero to run higher-level cloaking systems with very little technical cost, and minimal interference from warp travel. The Sisters of EVE have refused to comment on this technology, other than to recommend it not be tampered with.

zh: 它由多个超级集团控制，没有中央政府专权执政，合众国内的一切都为军团所属，军团掌握着一切。
en: The Caldari State is ruled by several mega-corporations. There is no central government to speak of - all territories within the State are owned and ruled by corporations.

zh: 它的龙骨扭曲变形，一大片的装甲被整块撕裂。这艘末日沙场级一定是遭受到了非常猛烈的攻击。
en: With its spine snapped and large areas of its armor stripped away, this Armageddon must have been subjected to massive amount of damage.

zh: 它能通过预测目标的轨迹来提升导弹的精准度和射程。该装备可与脚本合用来提升其在某些方面的效果，短时间内过载可以使其获得更强的效果。
en: By predicting the trajectory of targets, helps to boost the precision and range of missiles. This module can be loaded with scripts to increase its effectiveness in certain aspects. Overheating it can temporarily amplify its effects.

zh: 它能通过预测目标的轨迹来提升炮台跟踪速度和射程。该装备可与脚本合用来提升其在某些方面的效果，短时间内过载可以使其获得更强的效果。
en: By predicting the trajectory of targets, helps to boost the tracking speed and range of turrets. This module can be loaded with scripts to increase its effectiveness in certain aspects. Overheating it can temporarily amplify its effects.

zh: 宇宙深处的一个不稳定虫洞。这种虫洞通常会在几天后坍塌，它们的出口可能指向任何地方。
en: An unstable wormhole, deep in space. Wormholes of this kind usually collapse after a few days, and can lead to anywhere.

zh: 宇宙航行相关技能，涵盖舰船驾驶，导航和推进器使用等技术。
en: Skills related to space travel, including a wide range of techniques that'll help you understand ship piloting, navigation, propulsion operation, etc.

zh: 守夜者级是艘与众不同的米玛塔尔飞船，可用作远程侦察机。它快速、敏捷，可以使自身与敌人保持一定距离进行火力打击。
en: The Vigil is an unusual Minmatar ship, serving as a long-range scout. It is fast and agile, allowing it to keep its distance while attacking enemy ships.

zh: 守夜者级是艘与众不同的米玛塔尔飞船，既可用作远程侦察机，又可用作电子战平台。它快速、敏捷，可以在使用干扰器等电子设备扰乱敌方的同时使自身与敌人保持一定距离以避开其火力。
en: The Vigil is an unusual Minmatar ship, serving both as a long-range scout and an electronic warfare platform. It is fast and agile, allowing it to keep the distance needed to avoid enemy fire while making use of jammers or other electronic gadgets.

zh: 守夜者级电子战型蓝图
安德罗孚·尼尔的狂暴级飞船
安普欣·阿加西的特里斯坦级飞船
安装改装件之后，卸下将会销毁！你确认要安装么？
en: After fitting this rig, the removed one will be destroyed. Confirm rig fitting?

zh: 安闵·弗洛西的星空级飞船
完成帝国势力的委托获得佣金
en: Finish the mission from the empires to get a reward

zh: 完成得很好，你很有做士兵的天赋。
en: Well done, you were born to be a soldier.

zh: 完成得非常漂亮，委托金我马上叫人打给你。
en: Very well done. Your commission will be paid right away.

zh: 完成新闻委托以解锁故事线
en: Complete News Missions to unlock Storylines

zh: 完成运输获得星币奖励
完美的诱饵战术委托信标
宗教有力影响着艾玛的政治，艾玛人认为自己是整个世界的真正主人。
en: Religion has always played a big part in Amarrian politics and the Amarrians believe they are the rightful masters of the world.

zh: 实力派联合安全总部安装了巨大的超大型鱼雷炮台、远距离停滞网发生器和强力远距感应器。
en: The headquarters of the True Power security headquarters have been fitted with huge XL torpedo batteries, a long range stasis web generators and powerful long-range sensors.

zh: 实在不好意思，货物积压太多，给您添麻烦了。
en: I am really sorry for your trouble. The backlog of goods is just too huge.

zh: 实在是对不起！这……我真的不知情啊！我这就去查这个仓库消息的来源！
en: I am so sorry! I- I really don't know! I'm checking the source of this warehouse intel right away!

zh: 实际上我今天发布这则公告的原因你应该能猜到——如果你关注新闻的话。
en: To be frank, you should know the reason why I posted this announcement today – if you have been checking the news.

zh: 实际上，被袭击的暂住点不止我们这一处，还有另外两个地方，同样遭到了袭击。
en: Actually, there are two other residences under attack as well as us.

zh: 宾尼·尼格里耶的奥卡托级飞船
寂静的宇宙中，闪烁着星球的回声。从跃迁引擎的能量辐射残留来看，艾玛达的舰船刚刚离开不久。
en: The twinkling of the stars echoes through the silent universe. Judging from the remaining traces of warp drive radiation, the Ammatar ship must have left just a few moments ago.

zh:
富勒体是固体状态的富勒烯分子，可以在自然宇宙气云中找到它。它的独特结构使其成为人类世界中最具有价值的原料之一。以富勒烯为基础的原料技术已经应用于电子、推进以及工程建设等方面，另外在超强合金与高耐热武器系统制造方面也有应用。

虽然各个国家都已掌握了此类原料的基本运用技术，但只有朱庇特人被认为是富勒烯应用方面的真正专家。这也是其他各国难以在关键科技上撼动朱庇特领先地位的原因之一。
en:
Fullerite is the solid-state manifestation of fullerene molecules and can be found naturally occurring within interstellar gas clouds. Fullerites are coveted for the unique structural properties that make them some of the most useful materials known to humankind. Fullerene-based technology has applications in electronics, propulsion and engineering as well as the construction of ultra-hard metal alloys and heat-resistant weapons systems. 

Although all of the empires have developed a rudimentary understanding of how to manipulate fullerene, only the Jovians are known to have mastered the science. This has allowed them to maintain a significant technological advantage over other races in many crucial areas.

富勒烯 遗迹分析仪
