富勒烯 露天采矿器
富豪级护卫舰是艾玛帝国中装饰最为豪华的舰船之一，它是一小群精英皇家工程师孕育十年才得出的成果。
en: This Magnate-class frigate is one of the most decoratively designed ship classes in the Amarr Empire, considered to be a pet project for a small, elite group of royal ship engineers for over a decade.

zh: 富豪级护卫舰是艾玛帝国中装饰最为豪华的舰船之一，它是一小群精英皇家工程师孕育十年才得出的成果。过去十年中，护卫舰的设计发展经过了多个阶段，而富豪级也每隔几年就推出全新的模型。新纪元105年，富豪级护卫舰的最新版本——白银富豪级以及黄金富豪级作为艾玛冠军杯的奖品正式面世，而其实它的最初设计版本仍然广受艾玛飞行员的推崇。
en: This Magnate-class frigate is one of the most decoratively designed ship classes in the Amarr Empire. For over a decade, it was considered to be a pet project formed by a small elite group of royal ship engineers. The frigate's design has gone through several stages, and new models of the Magnate appear every few years. The most recent versions of this ship – the Silver Magnate and the Gold Magnate – debuted as rewards in the Amarr Championships in YC105, though the original Magnate design is still a popular choice among Amarr pilots.

zh: 对不起，先生。本来是有卖的……
en: Sorry, sir. It was in stock initially...

zh: 对不起，奥帕托女士。我已经不是那个任你摆布的小姑娘了。
en: Sorry, Ms. O'Pato. I'm no longer the little girl who obeys your every command.

zh: 对不起，我不能暴露雇主的信息。
en: Sorry, I can't give anyone my employer's information.

zh: 对不起，我不该让你看到我在这里哭哭啼啼。
en: Sorry, I shouldn't let you see me crying here.

zh: 对不起，我应该学会克制情绪。
en: Sorry, I should learn to control my temper.

zh: 对不起，我没有你要的东西
en: Sorry, I don't have what you want.

zh: 对不起，我费劲心机和你通话不是想和你斗气。
en: Sorry, I didn't want to argue with you after working this hard to reach you.
Sorry, I can't give it to you just yet.

zh: 对不起，飞行员。这些当小弟的办事不周，只能麻烦你多跑一趟了。
en: Sorry, Capsuleer. I didn't plan things properly. You'll have to make another trip.

zh: 对了！这儿不是有个克隆人飞行员嘛。
en: Right! We have a Capsuleer here.

zh: 对了，还有一个可能需要调查的地点，我把位标给你发过去。
en: Oh, right – there's another area that might need investigating. I'm sending you the coordinates.

zh: 对于一些人来说，报废的各种物资和产品都是一文不值的垃圾。但对于另一部分人来说，这些都是非常有价值的资源。
en: Production waste may be garbage to some, but it is valuable resource material to others.

zh: 对于他们的亲人而言，临终遗物是重要的纪念。就拜托你带他们回家了。
en: These relics are important for their loved ones to remember them by. Please take the relics to their families' homes.

zh: 对于基因匹配来说，13%已经是一个很高的数字了，德沃塔。
en: When it comes to gene matching, 13% is a really good match, DeVorta.

zh: 对于崇尚武力的加达里人来说，力量也会成为法律判罚的考量因素之一。当一场审判难以得到结果时，审判的双方会通过比武的方式，决出正确的一方。
en: In Caldari culture, might makes right, and thus strength is one of the elements factored into determining legal punishment. When the outcome of a trial is difficult to conclude, the two parties will meet in battle to decide the result.

zh: 对于非法增设的驻留点，我们没有保护你们的义务。
en: We're not obliged to protect illegally built refuges like yours.

zh: 对付这种恶魔，我们绝不能手软。
en: We must not be soft when dealing with these devils.

zh: 对漩涡级来说，玩的就是多功能性。它的防御能力使它非常适合小队突袭或单独作战，而多门炮台安装座为它提供了在战场上建功立业的机会。
en: With the Maelstrom, versatility is the name of the game. Its defensive capabilities make it ideally suited for small raid groups or solo work, while its multiple turret hardpoints present opportunities for untold carnage on the fleet battlefield.

zh: 对违背教义的异端分子进行例行审判，是神学理事会用于塑造自身权威再基本不过的手段。事实上，每一个虔诚的艾玛人，都会参与到审判之中，对那些迷失了信仰的同胞表示出唾弃又怜悯的复杂感情。
en: Prosecuting heretics who don't conform to the doctrines is both a routine for Theology Council and a way to reinforce their authority. In fact, all devoted Amarrians participate in the trial process. They hold mixed feelings of disdain and sympathy towards their faithless compatriots.

zh: 对，就是卡罗拉，她会在空间站等你。
en: Yes, it's Carola. She'll be waiting for you in the station.

zh: 对，就是因为你什么都没有做——包括还钱。
en: Yes, it's precisely because you did nothing – including paying back the money.

zh: 对，就是这样！让他们灰飞烟灭。
en: Yes, that's what I'm talking about! Blow them all up!

zh: 对，没错，又是海盗，又是该死的海盗，我们的一艘货船又被海盗拦截了。
en: Yes, that's right, it's pirates again, those damn pirates. They intercepted one of our cargo-runners.
Can't engage navigation system. Destination forbidden.

zh: 射电望远镜 - 破译 - 扫描仪数据芯片
en: Radio Telescope - Hacking - Encoded Data Chip

zh: 将力场发射器和冗余系统结合使用，减轻由严重系统性损坏造成的影响。可以短时间提高护盾、装甲和结构的抗性。只能同时装配一个损伤控制。
en: Utilizes a combination of containment field emitters and redundant systems to reduce the impact of critical system damage. Grants a temporary resistance bonus to the shields, armor, and hull. Only one Damage Control module can be fitted at a time.

zh: 将小行星开凿为供矿工和生产者的居住地是一种廉价、有效及迅捷的赚钱方式，从无限的太空产业需求中充分获益。此处正在施工，防御薄弱。
en: Carving out asteroids to act as habitats for miners and manufacturers is a cheap and efficient way to quickly cash in on the insatiable needs of the space industry. The construction of this one is underway and the defenses are weak.

zh: 将小行星开发成矿工与生产者的居住地是一种廉价、有效及迅捷的赚钱方式，能从无限的太空产业需求中充分获益。
en: Carving out asteroids to act as habitats for miners and manufacturers is a cheap and efficient way to quickly cash in on the insatiable needs of the space industry.

zh: 将护盾的能量传输到目标舰船上，帮助其进行防御。
en: Transfers shield energy to the target ship, aiding its defense.

zh: 将护盾的能量传输到附近舰船上。
en: Transfers shield energy to nearby ships.

zh: 将电容器的能量传输到目标舰船上，帮助其进行充能。
en: Transfers capacitor energy over to the target, aiding its charging.

zh: 将电容能量转移到另一艘舰船上。
en: Transfers capacitor energy to another ship.

zh: 将电容能量转移到附近的舰船上。
en: Transfers capacitor energy to nearby ships.

zh: 将矿石精炼为矿物的工厂。
en: A factory that refines ore into minerals.

zh: 将运算能力共享给目标，提高其各种运算性能。
en: Shares computing power with the target, improving its computing capabilities.

zh: 将防御系统的能量集中到武器系统，大幅提高火力，但也就没什么防御力可言了。
en: Transfers the energy of the defense system into the weapon system, greatly increasing firepower but reducing defensive power to almost zero.

zh:
尊敬的各位飞行员：
感谢各位对《星战前夜：无烬星河》的热情支持，由于一些技术原因，我们不得不紧急停服进行服务器维护。
对给您带来的不便深感抱歉，所有受到影响的克隆人飞行员都可以点击邮件下的按钮领取停服补偿。
再次感谢您对《星战前夜：无烬星河》的支持，您的包容是我们进步的动力。
en:
Dear pilots,
Thank you for your supports. Due to some technical issues, we urgently stopped the server for maintenance. 
Sorry for all the inconvenience caused, and all affected pilots can claim compensation in this mail.
Your tolerance will help us make EVE Echoes better.

zh: 尊敬的奥帕托女士，请问我们之前签署的关于赫特名下股份的转让合同怎么回事？
en: Dear Ms. O'Pato, may I know what happened to the contract we signed earlier? The one about transferring Heth's shares.

zh: 尊敬的飞行员，这里是联邦政府部的{npc_name:_tr}
en: Mr. Capsuleer, this is {npc_name:_tr} from the Federal Administration.

zh: 尊敬的飞行员，这里是联邦政府部的事务员{npc_name:_tr}在和你说话。
en: Honored Capsuleer, this is {npc_name:_tr} from the Federal Administration talking.

zh: 尊贵的客人被允许在这里寻找主人为他们准备的各种财宝和秘密。这个地方有密码保护以防止普通来访者进入，不过只要一些黑客技术就应该能弄到里面的东西。
en: Guests of honor are allowed to dip into whatever treasures and secrets the hosts have in their possession. It is password protected to keep not-so-VIP guests out, but a bit of hacking should suffice to get to the goods inside.

zh: 小型审计安全密码集装箱
小型导弹炮塔，可以抵御入侵者和其他威胁。
en: A small missile battery, designed to repel invaders and other hazards.

zh: 小型导弹炮塔，用于抵御入侵者和其他威胁。
en: A small missile battery designed to repel invaders and other hazards.

zh: 小型炮台能量栅格需求
小型群体护盾回充增量器
小型远程护盾回充增量器
小型远程电容传输装置
小型：通常装配在护卫舰和驱逐舰上。
en: Small: Usually fitted to frigates and destroyers.

zh: 小子，你就不能开艘大点的船来吗？
en: Can't you get a bigger ship, kid?

zh: 小子，你想惹事？我奉陪到底。
en: You want trouble, kid? I won't let you off this one easily.

zh: 小巧、快速但防御脆弱的飞船，能满足多种需求，尤其是捕获敌人。
en: Small, fast but fragile vessels suited to a variety of purposes, especially tackling.

zh: 小心点，你那些平平无奇的战斗技巧在专业的猎人面前可不一定奏效。
en: Be careful, your unremarkable combat skills may be of little help against professional hunters.

zh: 小行星带工厂虽然很脆弱，但在经济角度上是非常可行的，它们是不断扩张的太空产业的主要恩赐之一。
en: Highly vulnerable, but economically extremely feasible, asteroid factories are one of the major boons of the expanding space industry.

zh: 小行星微型空间站—小型
小行星隐匿空间矿工居住地
小行星隐匿空间采矿站
小行星殖民站—小型塔楼
小行星殖民站—楔形断面
小行星殖民站巨型主体
小鹰级是加达里威力最大的全方位战斗护卫舰。就加达里飞船而言，它的防御实在是非常出众。
en: The Merlin is the most powerful all-out combat frigate of the Caldari. It is highly valued for its versatility in using both missiles and turrets, while its defenses are exceptionally strong for a Caldari vessel.

zh: 小鹰级是加达里威力最大的全方位战斗护卫舰。就加达里飞船而言，它的防御实在是非常出众。多年来，它一直在不断进化，从一艘多用途的全能型舰船成长为一艘专注于提供致命火力的炮舰。小鹰级的主要目的就是用它的炮台在敌人的船体上打出一个个窟窿。
en: The Merlin is the most powerful combat frigate of the Caldari. Its role has evolved throughout the years, and while its defenses have always remained exceptionally strong for a Caldari vessel, its offensive capabilities have evolved from versatile, jack-of-all-trades attack patterns into focused and deadly gunfire tactics. The Merlin's primary aim is to have its turrets punch holes in its opponents' hulls.

zh:
少量的重金属对生命来说是至关重要的，能够为生命的运转提供关键的矿物质。大量运用它们则可以让其作为构件，用在计算机电子器件的基本材料及强化建筑体的建造上。

可以从下列类型的行星开采获得：
熔岩行星
冰体行星
离子行星
en:
In small quantities, heavy metals are vital to life, providing essential minerals for biological processes. In bulk, they are commonly found in most construction materials, forming the most basic components of computer electronics and reinforced structures.

Can be obtained by mining the following types of planets:
Lava Planet
Ice Planet
Plasma Planet

zh: 尤尼斯大人肩负帝国重担，日理万机，没空理睬这些小鱼小虾。
en: Mr. Eunice has many duties to attend to, and has no time to deal with those nobodies.

zh: 尤希嘉穆的黑鸦级飞船
就因为这些罪犯，我上周核对货单的工作被整整拖延了70个小时！
en: Because of those criminals, my work cross-checking the orders was delayed by 70 hours last week!

zh: 就按说好的那样。只要有了这个样本，很多事情就容易了。
en: Just as we agreed. This sample will make a lot of things easier.

zh: 就是你负责送水过来吗？真是救星啊！
en: You're delivering water here? You're our savior!

zh: 就是运送军火，嗝，附近的军火商人需要的的，要卖给当地的一些雇佣兵。
en: Just a simple munitions delivery. *Burp* Some arms dealer near here wants to sell them to the local mercenaries.

zh: 就是这个，塔什蒙贡家族的商队，摧毁他们。
en: This is it – the trade convoy of the Tash-Murkon family. Eliminate them.

zh: 就飞船设计而言，启示级堪称艾玛学院模式的典范：它拥有厚重的装甲和强悍的激光武器。启示级先进的散热技术使得它的激光射速比没有该技术的飞船更快。
en: The Omen is a stereotypical example of the Amarrian school of thinking when it comes to ship design: thick armor and hard-hitting lasers. Its advanced heat dissipation technology allows the Omen to fire its lasers faster than ships that lack this technology.

zh: 就飞船设计而言，启示级堪称艾玛学院模式的典范：它拥有厚重的装甲和强悍的激光武器。启示级先进的散热技术使得它的激光射速比没有该技术的飞船更高。
en: The Omen is a stereotypical example of the Amarrian School of thinking when it comes to ship design: thick armor and hard hitting lasers. Advancements in heat dissipation allow the Omen to fire its lasers faster than other ships without this technology.

zh: 尼克玛·耶兰的审判者飞船
尼克玛·耶兰的惩罚者级飞船
尼尔夫·阿布拉斯克的长剑级
尼特鲁特的守夜者级飞船
尼特鲁的守夜者级飞船
尼铎格尔级航母是其兄长冥府级航母的浓缩版，不过与后者一样令人畏惧。该舰的制造初衷就是用于全面战争，而且尼铎格尔级也确实能应对自如。毫无疑问，它将成为众多战场上的中流砥柱。
en: Essentially a pared-down version of its big brother the Hel, the Nidhoggur nonetheless displays the same austerity of vision evident in its sibling. Quite purposefully created for nothing less than all-out warfare, and quite comfortable with that fact, the Nidhoggur will no doubt find itself a mainstay on many a battlefield.

zh:
尽管他们都是些简单的机器而且也非常的微小，不过少量的纳米机器人就可以成就医学奇迹，而大规模的使用则能够完成令人叹为观止的工程项目。

可以从下列类型的行星开采获得：
离子行星
风暴行星
en:
Though they are only simple machines and very small, nanites can be used to achieve miraculous medical results in small amounts or astounding feats of engineering in mass quantities.

Can be obtained by mining the following types of planets:
Plasma Planet
Storm Planet

zh: 尽管体积庞大，这座建筑却没有多少装饰，里面只是有几个停机坪和大厅。历史学家怀疑这座哨站枢纽之所以这么简单，目的是为了能够在哨站遭受攻击的时候与迅速主体分离，但目前还是没法得出准确的结论。
en: Though large in design, this structure is sparsely adorned, with only a few antechambers and docking platforms inside. Speculation among historians suggests that this outpost hub was capable of immediate and easy disconnection from the Talocan outpost in case of attack, but there hasn't been a scholarly consensus about this.

zh: 尽管米玛塔尔共和国已经成立多年，但是仍然有超过三分之一的米玛塔尔人深陷于艾玛的桎梏之中。米玛塔尔人无时无刻都在渴望着从艾玛的统治下脱离。孱弱的经济实力使得米玛塔尔难以组建庞大的舰队进行大规模的营救，但是一些见缝插针的小规模救援活动一直没有停歇。
en: Although many years have passed since the founding of the Minmatar Republic, more than a third of all Minmatar still remain in shackles, serving the Amarr slavers. Every Minmatar in the Republic longs to free their kin and bring them home, but the Republic's weak economy prevents them from launching large-scale rescue operations. However, small-scale efforts are always ongoing.

zh: 尽管卡多尔星域属于被称为“老牌皇室家族”的太子家族，但它却是帝国中最落后的星域之一。卡多尔家族并不积极鼓励贸易和投资进入该星域，而是更偏爱具有显赫血统和遗产的贵族。虽然卡多尔在很多方面都显得迂腐老旧，但这里是旅行者仍旧可以领略帝国昔日的高贵强大的少数艾玛领地之一。
en: Despite belonging to the Heir House known as the "Old Imperial Family," Kador is one of the least developed regions in the Empire. The Kador Family has not been progressive in encouraging trade and investment in the region, instead showing favor to older, established Holder families with proven bloodlines and heritage. Though in many ways a musty embodiment of the old ways, Kador may be one of the few parts of Amarr territory where a traveler can still get a glimpse of the grand and majestic Empire of days gone by.

zh: 尽管在使用新技术创造可用原型机的竞赛中，帝国一如既往地成为迟到参与者，但他们的工程师还是不遗余力地将普罗维登斯级推向了世界。尽管据说飞行员市场的巨大利润潜力是使迟钝的帝国最终决定着手开发货舰的原因，但他们的成品绝对不是敷衍了事的产品：普罗维登斯级是当今最坚固的货舰之一。
en: Even though characteristically last in the race to create a working prototype of new technology, the Empire's engineers spared no effort in bringing the Providence into the world. While the massive potential for profit from the Capsuleer market is said to have been what eventually made the stolid Empire decide to involve themselves in the freighter business, their brainchild is by no means the runt of the litter; the Providence is one of the sturdiest freighters out there.

zh: 尽管在使用新技术创造可用原型机的竞赛中，帝国一如既往地成为迟到参与者，但他们的工程师还是不遗余力地将普罗维登斯级推向了世界。虽说飞行员市场的巨大利润潜力是使迟钝的帝国最终决定着手开发货舰的原因，但他们的成品绝对不是敷衍了事的产品：普罗维登斯级是当今最坚固的货舰之一。
en: Even though characteristically last in the race to create a working prototype of new technology, the Empire's engineers spared no effort in bringing the Providence into the world. While the massive potential for profit from the Capsuleer market is said to have been what eventually made the stolid Empire decide to involve themselves in the freighter business, their brainchild is by no means the runt of the litter; the Providence is one of the sturdiest freighters out there.

zh: 尽管它的大小还不足以被当成一个空间站，但这座装饰华丽的设施却有任何多功能隐匿空间所具有的内部陈设。
en: Though not quite large enough to be a station, this ornate, lavish establishment contains furnishings for any multi-purpose deadspace location. From cutting edge laboratories, to private studios and entertainment facilities, the services available in this structure are applicable for professionals and elite socialites alike.

zh: 尽管它的构造看起来非常熟悉，但是这个科学探针所采用的材质和电子元件却是在新伊甸前所未见的。它静静地飘过太空，就像是在冬眠一样。
en: Despite its familiar construction, this ancient probe is made from materials and electronics unlike anything you've ever seen in New Eden. It floats silently through space, seemingly dormant.

zh: 尽管已经经历了千年的岁月，这个建筑依然处于运转状态。对其中科技的初步分析显示，它的功能应该是作为某种中央能源供应系统，提供能源给其他的冬眠者设施。装甲板上不明显的线条显示这个建筑可能还有一个供冬眠者自动无人机起降的机库。
en: Despite countless years in space, this structure appears to be entirely functional. A brief analysis of the technology inside reveals that it operates as some kind of central power source for other Sleeper facilities. Faint seams in the rigid armor suggest it may even house a docking port to power the Sleeper's automated drones.

zh: 尽管拥有共和国的执照，这个代理人却散发着阴暗的气息。
en: Despite flying with a Republic license, this agent radiates "shady."

zh: 尽管整个前半部分已经完全丢失，但一眼看上去，后半部分的船体似乎没有受到太大的损伤。更仔细的扫描显示它内部结构受到了非常严重的创伤，已经超出了其结构能够承受的范围。
en: Despite the obvious absence of a front end, this section of wreck appears largely intact at first glance. A more detailed scan though reveals deep fractures throughout the structure, betraying the titanic stresses it has been subjected to.

zh: 尽管这个虫洞看上去十分的稳定，但是却有大量的辐射溢出，这意味着使用这个虫洞的后果可能是毁灭性的。
en: Though the wormhole seems stable, the exotic radicals pouring from the tear imply that using it would be catastrophic.

zh: 居住舱 - 兹纳的科学实验室
居住舱 - 迷幻药物超市
居然现场还遭遇了血袭者的海盗，真是万万没想到！
en: And an encounter with the Blood Raiders? I didn't expect that!

zh: 居然还没有任何人提前注意到！
en: I can't believe no one noticed this!

zh: 属下该死！他们混在人群中，实在是难以分辨……
en: I apologize for my incompetence! They were mixed in with the crowd, I couldn't tell...

zh: 岗哨炮被布置在重要太空设施的周围，会攻击任何威胁其保护对象的人。岗哨炮易于购买和部署，但威力却不容小视。
en: Sentry guns are placed around important space facilities and will attack anyone threatening the place they've been assigned to defend. Sentry guns are very powerful compared to their ease of purchase and deployment.

zh: 岗哨站 阿尔法/贝它
岩石—被自由无人机所占据
峡谷 中型护盾扩展装置
任何一个未曾到访过盖伦特的新伊甸人，都会在初次到访时被盖伦特人的娱乐业所震惊。每一个盖伦特人，都会在享乐上投入大量的金钱。哪怕是收入微薄的工薪阶层，也会耗尽家产去享受全宇宙最豪华的旅行。“一个现代人的生活，就应该充满美食，娱乐和酷菲！”——一个在盖伦特首星喝得烂醉的人如是说。
en: Its advocacy of freedom and pleasure makes the Gallente Federation a land of luxury. Anyone in New Eden who has never visited Gallente will be shocked by the consumption-oriented lifestyle of its citizens. No Gallente would spare any expense in their pursuit of pleasure. Even the working class are willing to exhaust what little fortune they have for the chance to enjoy the most luxurious travel the universe has to offer. "Modern life means a life full of delicious food, entertainment and Quafe!" —a drunk person on Gallente Prime.

zh: 巡洋舰、攻守平衡，可以应付多种战况
en: Cruiser class: A good balance of offense and defense allows these ships to deal with a wide range of combat situations

zh: 工业人士将不起眼的小行星矿打造成种类丰富的舰船和装备。如果你立志要将石块点化成有史以来最强大的机器设备，那不妨加入此行。
en: Industrial pilots are capable of manufacturing a variety of ships and modules from common ores. Join this profession if you want to learn how to transform rocks into the most powerful machines in history.

zh: 工业生产相关技能，涵盖矿石采集，矿石提炼，舰船制造，装备制造等技术。
en: Skills related to industrial manufacturing, including a wide range of techniques that'll help you understand ore mining, ore processing, ship manufacturing, module manufacturing, etc.

zh:
工业纤维和民用纤维的最大区别在于，其降低了舒适度但大大提高了韧性和强度。从恶劣环境中的电子元器件保护到冰冷虚无太空中的太阳帆，工业纤维都能应用于更加残酷的环境。

可以从下列类型的行星开采获得：
贫瘠行星
温和行星
冰体行星
en:
The main difference between fibers used in industry and those created for civilian use is the trade-off of comfort for tensile strength and durability. This allows industrial fibers to be used in more severe environments, from electronic component shielding on hostile worlds to solar sails in the frigid void of space.

Can be obtained by mining the following types of planets:
Barren Planet
Temperate Planet
Ice Planet
We can't give you the workers

zh: 左恩·麦奎的毒蝎级飞船
巨大的射电望远镜，装配有脆弱却非常先进的传感设备。这类建筑物所具有的强大性能可以轻易处理来自邻近星系和星座的探测数据。
en: This huge radio telescope contains fragile but advanced sensory equipment. A structure such as this has enormous capabilities in crunching survey data from nearby systems and constellations.

zh: 巨大的建筑钢梁在碎裂的小行星之间延伸，为空间站或者哨站提供了牢固的基础。
en: Massive construction girders stretch between the crumbled asteroids, giving a solid ground for a station or outpost.

zh: 巨大的建筑钢梁在碎裂的小行星之间延伸，为空间站或者哨站提供了牢固的基础。这个链接小行星的建筑似乎有人居住。
en: Massive construction girders stretch between the crumbled asteroids, giving a solid ground for a station or outpost.  The structure connecting the asteroids appears to be inhabited.

zh: 巨大的纳加法级无畏舰上半部分遭受到了严重的打击。一些间断不连续的信号不时从残骸中发射出来，可能是一些埋在残骸内部的生命迹象。但想要切开这么巨大的残骸似乎是很难办到的。
en: The upper half of this mighty Naglfar-class dreadnaught has sustained considerable damage to its starboard batteries. A few intermittent signals which might be signs of life deep inside can still be detected, but there's no easy way to cut through the mangled wreckage and find out

zh: 巨大的金属储藏库，上面留有许多陨石碰撞的痕迹，说明它已在此漂浮了很长时间。
en: This enormous metal silo bears many marks of meteor-hits, suggesting it's lingered here for a long time.

zh: 巨神兵级已经服役了几十年，主要是作为采矿船。其体型尚够不上战斗护卫舰的标准，但和大多数艾玛舰船一样，它的强大防御使它成为难以击溃的对手。再加上它近来在电容消耗和火力输出方面的进步，它的激光器已不再徜徉于不会说话的矿石之间，而是闪烁在战场之上，在那些倒霉的飞船船体上钻下一个个孔洞。
en: The Tormentor has been in service for many decades, mainly as a mining ship. Though it is not big enough to make the cut as a battle frigate, but with most Amarr ships its strong defense makes it a tough opponent to crack. The way the body of this ship curls up on itself has given the Tormentor-class the nickname 'Armadillo'.

zh: 巨神兵级已经服役了几十年，主要是作为采矿船。其体型尚够不上战斗护卫舰的标准，但和大多数艾玛舰船一样，它的强大防御使它成为难以击溃的对手。正是由于这一点，再加上它看上去蜷缩的外型，人们戏称巨神兵级为“犰狳”。
en: The Tormentor has been in service for many decades, mainly as a mining ship. Though it is not big enough to make the cut as a battle frigate, but with most Amarr ships its strong defense makes it a tough opponent to crack. The way the body of this ship curls up on itself has given the Tormentor-class the nickname 'Armadillo'.

zh: 巨鸟级被设计为一艘全能型战舰，它的重型武装使其几乎能应付太空里飞行的任何东西。与竞争对手托勒克斯级不同，巨鸟级擅长远程作战，它的磁轨炮和导弹发射器能将死亡的气息像雨点一般砸在对手身上。
en: The Moa was designed as an all-out combat ship, and its heavy armament allows the Moa to tackle almost anything that floats in space. In contrast to its nemesis the Thorax, the Moa is most effective at long range where its railguns and missile batteries can rain death upon foes.

zh: 巨鸟级被设计为一艘全能型战舰，它的重型武装使其几乎能应付太空里飞行的任何东西。与竞争对手托勒克斯级不同，巨鸟级擅长远程作战，它的磁轨炮能将死亡的气息像雨点一般砸在对手身上。
en: The Moa was designed as an all-out combat ship. Its heavy armament allows it to tackle almost anything that floats in space. In contrast to its nemesis, the Thorax, the Moa is most effective at long range where its railguns can rain death upon its foes.

希望你以后也能一直赢下去。
en: I hope you can keep on winning.
I hope you've learned your lesson.

zh: 希望你能一并救救他们！
en: I hope you can save them as well!

zh: 希望你能够铲除这个据点。
en: I hope you can eradicate this stronghold.

zh: 希望你能帮忙提前侦察一下那个区域，我们打算把那个哨站重修修缮以后送给小公主做行宫。
en: It'd be best if you could scout the area in advance. We're planning on decorating the outpost there to make a getaway palace for the princess.

zh: 希望你能送一些{2|item_name:_tr}到{2|station_name:_tr}，这样我们这个月的指标就能顺利完成了。
en: I hope you can send some {2|item_name:_tr} to {2|station_name:_tr} so we can hit our target for this month.

zh: 希望其他人也能吸取教训，少和皇室作对，否则无论有几条命都不够。
en: I hope the others can learn from this and stop going against the royal family, because no matter how many lives they have, it will never be enough.

zh: 希望您能协助我们完成这次任务。
en: I hope you'll be able to help us on this mission.

zh: 希望您赶快救救他们！拜托了！
en: Please hurry up and save them! Please!

zh: 希望每一个艾玛人都能小心地聆听真神的教诲。
en: I hope that each and every one of the Amarr can listen carefully to the teachings of the one true God.

zh: 希望这不会影响到我们双方的友谊，奥帕托女士。
en: I hope this will not affect our friendship, Ms. O'Pato.

zh: 希望这次的样本不要再出问题了。
en: The sample better be good this time.

en: Constructed in honor of the Capsuleers of Pandemic Legion who fought and defeated their opponents, in a series of gruelling and murderous fights, to claim their place as winners of the sixth round of the great Alliance Tournament. Pandemic Legion can truly claim to be among the true elite, the best of the best.

en: The Impairor-class corvette has been mass-produced by the Amarr Empire for decades. It is the most common space vessel sighted within the Amarrian boundaries, and is used both as a basic trade vessel and as a small-scale slave transporter.

zh: 帝国海军将执政官级定义为一艘搭载人员和铁骑舰载机的航空母舰。海军司令官在柯埃佐皇帝遇刺后，单方面下令建造了这艘飞船。执政官级拥有最新的铁骑舰载机接口技术以及超强的防御能力，其在任何战役中都是强有力的支援。
en: The Archon was commissioned by the Imperial Navy to act as a personnel and fighter carrier. The order to create the ship came as part of a unilateral initative issued by Navy Command in the wake of Emperor Kor-Azor's assassination. Sporting the latest in fighter command interfacing technology and possessing characteristically strong defenses, the Archon is a powerful aid in any engagement.

zh: 帝国海军需要进行一次重要物资调遣，在那之前他们希望把沿途的血袭者都清理干净。
en: The Imperial Navy needs to reallocate some important materials. But first, they need to get rid of some Blood Raiders along the route.

zh: 带有加密数据芯片的生活舱
en: Habitation Module With Encoded Data Chip

zh: 常用于模拟和传输各种战术信号，是非常重要的组件。
en: A very important component often used to simulate and transmit various tactical signals.

zh: 干得不错，你这个朋友我交了！
en: Well done! Consider me your friend!

zh: 干得不错，合同金一分也不会少你的。
en: Well done. All reward payments will be made as per the contract.

zh: 干得不错，年轻人，选择你真是一个正确的决定。
en: Well done, young one. Choosing you was the right decision.

zh: 干得不错，飞行员，我这就把报酬金给你打过去。
en: Well done, Capsuleer. Your reward payments will be made right away.

zh: 干得好，早该给这些坏蛋一些教训了。
en: Well done. It was high time to teach those scoundrels a lesson.

zh: 干扰对方舰船的导航计算机，防止其跃迁。
en: Disrupts the navigation computer of the enemy's ship, disabling: warping, jumping, microwarp drives and micro jump drives.

zh: 干扰对方舰船的火力控制系统，从而降低其武器性能。
en: Disrupts the target ship's fire-control system to reduce its weapon performance.

zh: 干扰目标的锁定系统，使其无法锁定目标。
en: Disrupts the target's targeting systems to prevent it from locking onto targets.

zh: 平定工人叛乱委托信标
en: Mission Beacon: Pacifying a Workers' Rebellion

zh: 年轻人，你去{2|station_name:_tr}帮我运送一支警察部队过去，我会给你应得的报酬。
en: Young one, go to {2|station_name:_tr} and deliver a police squad. I will pay you what you deserve afterwards.

zh: 年轻人，工作完成得不错，委托金我会很快打到你账上
en: Well done, young one. Your commission will be paid right away.

zh: 年轻人，这里面该不会有你送的礼物吧！哈哈。
en: Ha ha. Don't tell me there's something from you among these gifts, young one!

zh: 并没有你说的难民，别开玩笑了先生。
en: I saw none of the refugees you spoke of. Please don't make jokes like this, sir.

zh: 幼龙级战列巡洋舰的诞生继承了加达里赖以成名的精益求精的舰船制造技术。加达里长久以来高超的导弹技术在它身上被表现得淋漓尽致，更不用说其强劲的性能保证它优越的电子战能力了。
en: Of the meticulous craftsmanship the Caldari are renowned for, the Drake was born. It was found beneath such a ship to rely on anything other than the time-honored combat tradition of missile fire, while the inclusion of sufficient CPU capabilities for decent electronic warfare goes without saying.

zh: 序列号激活次数达到上限
en: This serial number has reached its activation limit

zh: 库沙恩·霍瑞特的主宰级
应付那些阴险狡诈的罪犯是联邦情报处的一项基本日常工作。对于像天蛇集团这样大规模有组织的犯罪团伙，往往连联邦警察也无能为力，只能通过联邦情报处和一些其他联邦的军事部门的配合才能与他们抗衡。
en: Dealing with insidious criminals is a basic day-to-day job of the Federal Intelligence Office. For large-scale organized criminal organizations like Serpentis, the federal police are often helpless, and can only compete with them through the cooperation of the Federal Intelligence Office and other federal military departments.

zh: 应对越来越多的小型舰队破袭战，三岛集团改进了海燕级，使其可以阻碍小型舰队的侵入作战，这艘船迅速的风靡合众国的领地上。
en: Small fleet incursions are growing in number. In response, Hyasyoda modified the Cormorant, increasing its capability to deal with such attacks. The improved model quickly became popular across the Caldari State.
Terrorist Attack on School of Applied Knowledge
Terrorist Attack on School of Applied Knowledge (Expert)
Terrorist Attack on School of Applied Knowledge (Advanced)

zh: 应用学院恐怖袭击委托信标
en: Mission Beacon: School of Applied Knowledge Terrorist Attack

zh: 应用方案会摧毁已安装的改装件, 确认应用该方案吗?
en: Applying this fitting will destroy the current rigs. Continue?

zh: 应用科学相关技能，涵盖逆向工程，考古研究，空间探索，目标扫描等知识。
en: Skills related to applied science, including a wide range of knowledge that'll help you understand reverse engineering, archaeological research, space exploration, target scanning, etc.

zh: 应该没错……我向上级汇报一下。
en: That should be right... I'll report it to my superiors.

zh: 店员，能查到运输船被击毁的位置吗？
en: Can you find out where the freighter was destroyed, clerk?

zh: 庞大、坚固而缓慢的舰船，用于大规模交战。
en: Large, durable but slow vessels designed for heavy-duty engagement.

zh: 废弃的冬眠者人造物件
废弃的古斯塔斯运输设施
度沃勒应联邦海军要求，改造了纳维达斯级护卫舰，使其拥有极佳的维修功用。
en: At the request of the Federal Navy, Duvolle modified the Navitas, giving it excellent maintenance functions.

zh:
座头鲸级的原型是联合矿业的逆戟鲸级，星捷运集团对其运载能力进行了升级，并去除了矿业开采功用。


座头鲸级拥有非凡的运载能力，武装型拥有更优秀的防御能力，但牺牲了运载效率。
en:
The Humpback's design is based on ORE's Orca. InterBus enhanced its transporting capacity and removed its mining functions.


The Humpback has an incredible hauling capacity. The Combat model has better defensive abilities, but some of its cargo-carrying efficiency was sacrificed.

zh:
座头鲸级的原型是联合矿业的逆戟鲸级，星捷运集团对其运载能力进行了升级，并去除了矿业开采功用。


座头鲸级拥有非凡的运载能力，高机动型拥有较快的航速，但运输能力有所下降。
en:
The Humpback's design is based on ORE's Orca. InterBus enhanced its transporting capacity and removed its mining functions.


The Humpback has an incredible hauling capacity. The High Mobility model is faster, but its hauling capacity is somewhat reduced.

zh:
座头鲸级的原型是联合矿业的逆戟鲸级，星捷运集团对其运载能力进行了升级，并去除了矿业开采功用。


座头鲸级拥有非凡的运载能力，高载荷型拥有更强大的运输能力，但其他方面就有所缺陷了。
en:
The Humpback's design is based on ORE's Orca. InterBus enhanced its transporting capacity and removed its mining functions.


The Humpback has an incredible hauling capacity. The Hauling model is great for transporting goods, but not very good at anything else.

座头鲸级高载荷型蓝图
座狼 小型护盾扩展装置
建筑集团的一些工人由于不满于自己的劳动待遇，掀起了一场抗议活动。可是他们从来没有想到，加达里的大集团们，从来不会给予公然造反的人任何谈判的机会。建筑集团的一些工人由于不满于自己的劳动待遇，掀起了一场抗议活动。可是他们从来没有想到，加达里的大集团们，从来不会给予公然造反的人任何谈判的机会。
en: Some workers in a construction corporation started a protest because they weren't happy with their salary. However, they didn't realize that Caldari megacorporations have a zero tolerance policy towards those who undermine their authority.

zh: 建议即刻启动跃迁引擎，跳离高危星域。
en: Caution! It is recommended that you activate the warp drive and pilot us away from this low-sec system ASAP.

zh: 建议遵照《新伊甸漫游指南》第366条的指引，
en: It is recommended that you follow Article 366 of "The Hitchhiker's Guide to New Eden";

zh: 建设中的共和舰队纳迦法级
建设和修复中的星际之门
建造太空建筑中宣传设施所需的组件。
en: Materials for the construction of advertisement facilities in a space structure.

zh: 建造太空建筑中情报和电子相关设施所需的组件。
en: Materials required for the construction of intelligence- or electronics-related facilities in a space structure.

zh: 建造太空建筑中跃迁和工程相关设施所需的组件。
en: Materials required for the construction of warp or engineering facilities in a space structure.

zh: 建造空间哨站个人飞船和机库所需的部件。
en: Parts for the construction of personal ship and module hangars in space outposts.

zh: 建造空间站工厂设施所需的材料。
en: Materials required for the construction of manufacturing facilities in a space station.

zh: 建造空间站所需的无数建筑部件中的一种。
en: One of the myriad components required for space station construction.

zh: 建造空间站材料精炼厂所需的部件。
en: Parts required for the construction of a space outpost materials refinery.

zh: 建造空间站船坞所需的机械部件。
en: Mechanical components required for the construction of a space station shipyard.

zh: 建造许多办公室所需的建材以及每天运作所需的电脑系统和必需品。
en: Materials required for the construction of dozens of offices, as well as the computer systems and supplies needed for their day-to-day running.

zh: 开启超高画质会大幅增加设备耗电和发热，是否继续？
en: Setting graphics quality to high will increase the power draining of your device and may cause it to heat up. Confirm anyway?

zh: 开膛手的传闻在帝国的克隆人之间逐渐传开了，一个凶狠狡诈的血袭者在帝国领内接连袭击了数十位克隆人飞行员。他们当中甚至有些没来得及完成意识传送就被遇害了……
en: Rumors of a so-called "Ripper" are spreading among the Capsuleers in the Amarr Empire. A fierce and cunning Blood Raider attacked dozens of pilots in the Empire. Some of them were killed even before they finished uploading their minds.

zh: 开采技术将帮助我们提升矿物和行星产物的获取效率，为建筑新伊甸提供源源不断的基础资源。
en: Mining technology helps us obtain ore and planet resources more efficiently, and provides endless basic resources for the development of New Eden.

zh: 开采行星数量超过上限
异株湖集团一直都很重视战术性质的作战，他们改造了矮脚鸡级护卫舰，使其成为了一个优质的维修平台。
en: Ishukone has always focused on strategic warfare. They have modified the Bantam, turning it into a better maintenance platform.

zh: 异株湖集团成功的在黑鸟级平台的基础上，研究出了适合于谐振能量作战的型号。
en: Ishukone Corporation successfully adapted the Blackbird for energy resonance combat.

zh: 异株湖集团所在领域内发现了一处古斯塔斯要塞。尽管异株湖集团是一所以研究为主的企业，但由于超级集团之间互相的不信任，他们还是组建了自己的武装力量以对抗古斯塔斯海盗。
en: A Guristas fortress was found in Ishukone's space. Although Ishukone is a research-oriented company, they still formed their own armed forces to fight against the Guristas pirates due to mutual distrust between the mega corporations.

zh: 异株湖集团跟进了富豪级隐匿型的制造，并平移了技术到苍鹭级上。
en: The Ishukone Corporation followed up on the modifications made to the Magnate Covert Ops, applying the same technology to the Heron.

en: Send over some {2|item_name:_tr} to {2|station_name:_tr}. I don't want to waste my explosives on this cheap ore.

弯刀级体现了米玛塔尔著名的实用主义理念。无论战场上的情势如何，他们的战斗策略总是围绕着一个核心理念：尽量不要被敌人发现，要么偷偷摸过去，要么迅速冲到敌人眼前，尽可能在最短时间内造成最大伤害，然后在敌人醒悟过来之前逃之夭夭。

因此，弯刀级的装配思路从来就不是要在战场上打持久战，它要在敌人有所行动之前快速出击，有多快打多块，有多狠打多狠。
en:
The Talwar is reminiscent of the renowned Minmatar practicality in terms of battle prowess. Irrespective of numbers, firepower and circumstances, their strategy when engaged in combat often revolves around the same central tenet: stay untouchable as much as possible, either by sneaking around or rushing in. Do as much damage as fast as you can, and get out before you get killed.

As such, the Talwar is not equipped to hang around for long on the battlefield. It is built to rush around at speed without getting caught, and to hit very hard and very, very fast.

zh: 弹出的冬眠者数据库：这个模块化构件在某种紧急的情况下被紧急弹射系统抛离了搭载体。你可以检测到在它坚实厚重的外壳下还封存有一个完整的数据库。你可以尝试使用你的数据分析仪找出其中有用的信息。
en: Ejected Sleeper Databank: This modular structure was long ago subjected to some sort of emergency ejection procedure, but you can detect an intact databank concealed under its heavy plating. You may be able to extract something with your Data Analyzer.

强大的末日沙场级战列舰是艾玛帝国的主力军舰。它曾经是战场上不可抗拒的主宰力量，不过现在它的战斗方式更加庄严与精准，一边从远距吸取敌人的能量，一边用海量的无人机撕碎目标。
en: The mighty Armageddon class is one of the enduring warhorses of the Amarr Empire. Once a juggernaut that steamrolled its way into battle, it has now taken on a more stately and calculated approach, sending out a web of drones in its place while it drains the enemy from a distance.

zh: 强大的流浪战列舰的残余势力。
en: The remains of a mighty Drifter battleship.

zh: 归因于惊人的性价比和建造速度，这些维修哨站越来越受到需要在危险区域保持移动性的旅行者的欢迎。
en: Due to their amazing cost-effectiveness and the speed at which they can be built, these repair outposts are seeing greater and greater use among travelers who need to be able to stay mobile in dangerous territory.

zh: 当你将传感器对准这个特殊现象的时候，传感器显示出了图表读数。从你获得的有限数据中你猜测，要安全穿过这个虫洞飞船需要某种稳定机械装置。但这些读数似乎还表明，这个虫洞不是完全随机的自然现象，而是被人创造出来的。没人能判定其创造时间与创造者，而它通向何处更是一个谜。
en: Your sensors show readings of the chart when you aim them at this peculiar phenomenon. From what little information you can gather you surmise that a stabling mechanism of some sort is needed for it to be safe to venture through the wormhole. But the readings also seem to indicate that this wormhole might not be a totally random natural phenomenon, but rather something that was created. When or by whom is impossible to tell and where it leads is an even bigger mystery.

zh: 当初集团还在加达里首星时，我就从没犯过这样的错误。
en: I never made such a mistake when the corporation was still located on Caldari Prime.

zh: 当前不能选择交付仓库
当前不能选择制造数量
当前区域安全等级{count}，如启动进攻性设备可能违法，请问您确认此操作么？
en: You're in a {count}-security system. Activating offensive modules may be illegal. Confirm?

zh: 当前市场没有该物品买单
en: No purchase order for the item found on the market

zh: 当前市场没有该物品卖单
en: No sale order for the item found on the market

zh: 当前无法使用网络，可在手机“设置”中重新配置。\n
en: Unable to connect to network. You can change your network configurations in the Settings on your device.\n

zh: 当前无法选择其他工业设施
en: Cannot currently select other industrial facilities

zh: 当前星域没有匹配的空间站
en: No matching station in current region
Failed to find item in current region

zh: 当前有武器正在工作，无法进行合并编组
en: Weapon is active, cannot merge or group
You haven't joined any Corporation yet

zh: 当前没发现可以锁定的舰船目标
没有装配任何装备, 无法保存
当前没有可以分享的位标
当前没有可以重置的禁止信息设定
en: No prohibition message settings to reset

zh: 当前没有可使用的蓝图
当前没有可运送的线路
当前没有正在学习的技能
当前没有箱子生成，已设定%s为终点
en: No container spawned. %s set as destination.

zh: 当前没有需要处理的事物
当前环节不支持自动引导，请手动操作
en: This segment doesn't support auto guidance. Please operate manually.

zh: 当前角色不在舰队中，已自动为您创建舰队
en: This character is not in a fleet. A fleet has been created for you.

zh: 当地海盗正在搜寻增强其产品的方法。这些盒子里储存着他们收集的成果。破解技术高超的人也许可以通过安全防线并获得盒子中的内容。
en: The local pirates are searching for ways to enhance their products. They collect their findings in these boxes. Those skilled in hacking might be able to bypass the security measures and access the contents of the box.

zh: 当地的海盗正在积极地尝试各种方法增强他们产品的效力，同时也改善毒品生产的各方面。使用适当的设备就可能侵入实验室电脑主机获得一些有用的东西。
en: The local pirates are actively trying to enhance the potency of their products, as well as improving other aspects of drug manufacturing. With the right equipment it might be possible to hack into the lab's mainframe and get something of interest.

zh: 当地的海盗正在积极地尝试各种方法增强他们产品的效力，同时也改善毒品生产的各方面。使用适当的设备就可能侵入数据池电脑主机获得一些有用的东西。
en: The local pirates are actively trying to enhance the potency of their products, as well as improving other aspects of drug manufacturing. With the right equipment it might be possible to hack into the tank's mainframe and get something of interest.

zh: 当地的海盗正在积极地尝试各种方法增强他们产品的效力，同时也改善毒品生产的各方面。这个箱子装着他们最新的发现成果和研究方法。它由高级密码保护，能技术高超的黑客应该能够破解。
en: The local pirates are actively trying to enhance the potency of their products, as well as improving other aspects of drug manufacturing. This case contains their latest discoveries and avenues of research. It has an advanced password protection, but very skillful hackers should be able to break through.

zh: 当地的海盗正在积极地尝试各种方法增强他们产品的效力，同时也改善毒品生产的各方面。这个箱子装着他们最新的成果，使用合适的装备也许能够打开。
en: The local pirates are actively trying to enhance the potency of their products, as well as improving other aspects of drug manufacturing. This crate contains some of their latest efforts and might be accessible with the right equipment.

zh: 当地的海盗正在积极地尝试各种方法增强他们产品的效力，同时也改善毒品生产的各方面。这个装置储存着他们的备份文件，使用合适的装备就有可能破解它。
en: The local pirates are actively trying to enhance the potency of their products, as well as improving other aspects of drug manufacturing. This unit stores some of their backup files and with the right equipment it might be possible to hack into it.

zh: 当地联邦警察无暇顾及他们，还请您协助制止那些瘾君子。
en: The local federal police have no time to deal with them. Please help stop those addicts.

zh: 当您的科技等级提升以后，也可以设置任务的难度，来挑战更有难度的任务。
en: As your Tech Level increases, you can increase the difficulty of the missions for a greater challenge.

zh: 当战争和瘟疫爆发时，人们从家园逃离，形成了大量的临时移民。
en: When wars and epidemics break out, people flee from their homes, causing massive temporary migrations.

zh: 当战争爆发后，为了向战场源源不断地运送武装人员，军方总是需要大量的运输力量，但军事机构本身无法满足这种需求。在这种情况下，通常需要非军用舰船的协助。
en: When war breaks out, the demand for military personnel transport can exceed the grasp of the military organizations concerned. In these cases, aid from non-military spacecraft is often needed.

zh: 当然是为了更远大的目标。
en: In aid of the greater goal, of course

zh: 当然，如果您还想复习这些知识，也可以再次领取！
en: However, if you want to go back and refresh your memory with the easier missions, feel free to claim them again!

zh: 当然，我们确信文件的加密代码是完全匹配的。
en: Of course, we are sure that the encryption codes of the files are an exact match.

zh: 当然，我会建议旁边这位飞行员替你去看看。因为可能需要先对付一些海盗。
en: Of course, I would recommend that the pilot here go first to scout it out for you. There might be pirate threats to take care of.

zh: 当经理不招待客人时，这座上档次的空间站就成了他的私人豪宅。
en: This upscale estate probably serves as a swank bachelor pad when the manager isn't entertaining clients.

zh: 当联邦海军当局意识到市场上需要中档价位的夜神级航母时，绝念级就应运而生。出色的防御能力以及特殊改装的铁骑舰载机挂舱，使其在中小规模的战斗中足以独挡一面。
en: Sensing the need for a more moderately-priced version of the Nyx, Federation Navy authorities commissioned the design of the Thanatos. Designed to act primarily as a fighter carrier for small- to mid-scale engagements, its significant defensive capabilities and specially-fitted fighter bays make it ideal for its intended purpose.

zh: 彗星 -  有毒彗星副本
彗星 -  火焰彗星副本
彗星 -  金色彗星副本
彗星 -  黑色彗星副本
彭达·珊吉的咒灭级飞船

en: A Thorough Investigation of Heretical Doings
A Thorough Investigation of Heretical Doings (Expert)
A Thorough Investigation of Heretical Doings (Advanced)

zh: 彻查间谍行为委托信标
en: Mission Beacon: A Thorough Investigation of Heretical Doings
Bad news, young one. It's me again.

zh: 很不幸，我们的一只本该盯着天蛇集团的“眼睛”被天使企业联合体给破坏了。
en: Unfortunately, one of our "eyes" that should have been watching over Serpentis was destroyed by the Angel Cartel.

zh: 很多势力都尝试了截击机计划，计划过程中出现了很多衍生型舰船，卡拉吉卡改造的刽子手级就是其中之一。
en: Many Factions took a shot at the Interceptor Project, giving rise to a lot of customized ships. The Executioner modified by Kaalakiota is one of these.

zh: 很多势力都尝试了截击机计划，计划过程中出现了很多衍生型舰船，卡拉吉卡集团改造的秃鹫级就是其中之一。
en: Many Factions took a shot at the Interceptor Project, giving rise to a lot of customized ships. The Condor modified by the Kaalakiota Cooperation is one of these.

zh: 很多势力都尝试了截击机计划，计划过程中出现了很多衍生型舰船，度沃勒改造的阿特龙级就是其中之一。
en: Many Factions took a shot at the Interceptor Project, giving rise to a lot of customized ships. The Atron modified by Duvolle is one of these.

zh: 很多势力都尝试了截击机计划，计划过程中出现了很多衍生型舰船，异株湖集团改造的秃鹫级就是其中之一。
en: Many Factions took a shot at the Interceptor Project, giving rise to a lot of customized ships. The Condor modified by the Ishukone Corporation is one of these.

zh: 很多势力都尝试了截击机计划，计划过程中出现了很多衍生型舰船，无限创造改造的伐木者级就是其中之一。
en: Many Factions took a shot at the Interceptor Project, giving rise to a lot of customized ships. The Slasher modified by Boundless Creation is one of these.

zh: 很多势力都尝试了截击机计划，计划过程中出现了很多衍生型舰船，核心局面改造的伐木者级就是其中之一。
en: Many Factions took a shot at the Interceptor Project, giving rise to a lot of customized ships. The Slasher modified by Core Complexions is one of these.

zh: 很多势力都尝试了截击机计划，计划过程中出现了很多衍生型舰船，维鲜集团改造的刽子手级就是其中之一。
en: Many Factions took a shot at the Interceptor Project, giving rise to a lot of customized ships. The Executioner modified by Viziam is one of these.

zh: 很多势力都尝试了截击机计划，计划过程中出现了很多衍生型舰船，西顿工业改造的阿特龙级就是其中之一。
en: Many Factions took a shot at the Interceptor Project, giving rise to a lot of customized ships. The Atron modified by CreoDron Industry is one of these.

zh: 很明显是用做冬眠者自动化无人机防御系统的一个部分，这个诡异的建筑是它其中的一个中心机库。尽管年代久远，但它受到的损伤和老化并不是很严重，有可能还能用。
en: Clearly built to serve the needs of the Sleeper's automated defense drones, this ominous structure functions as one of their central docking points. Despite its age, the facility shows few signs of decay, suggesting that it is perhaps maintained by its residents.

zh: 很有必要给他们一点教训，不然他们不知道该如何夹起尾巴做人。
en: It is necessary to teach them a lesson, otherwise they'll never learn how to behave correctly.

zh: 很遗憾！{monster_name}被摧毁，任务失败
很难想象是怎样一股力量能够制服这些心高气傲的海盗。
en: It's hard to imagine what kind of force was able to overpower those arrogant pirates.

zh: 得了吧，老滑头。嘴上说着漂亮话，心底里可能已经在考虑着怎么对我严刑拷打了吧。
en: Save your sweet words, you sly old fox. You've probably been thinking about how to torture me this whole time.

zh: 得力于盖伦特联邦的开明经济策略，联邦货运集团获取了一批阿特龙级护卫舰，并对其进行了适应性改造；最了解截击战术的不一定是使用截击舰的人，于是这次极其成功的改装就此落地并大放异彩。
en: Thanks to the Gallente Federation's progressive economic policies, Federal Freight acquired a batch of Atron frigates and modified them. As it turned out, it doesn't take years of Interceptor piloting experience to be a master of interception. Thus, the modifications were extremely successful and well-received.
We have to find a way to defend ourselves!

zh: 微型 中型远程护盾回充增量器
微型 大型远程护盾回充增量器
微型 小型远程护盾回充增量器

微电路是多数常规电子设备的基本组成部件。这一块不是处于最好状态，不过可能还有一些用处。

可以从下列物品中提炼获得：
米玛塔尔4级受损结构
米玛塔尔5级受损结构
米玛塔尔6级受损结构
加达里4级受损结构
加达里5级受损结构
加达里6级受损结构
en:
Micro Circuits are one of the most common electronics components seen in use. This one has seen better days but could still be of some use.

Can be obtained by reprocessing the following items:
Minmatar Ship Debris 4
Minmatar Ship Debris 5
Minmatar Ship Debris 6
Caldari Ship Debris 4
Caldari Ship Debris 5
Caldari Ship Debris 6

zh: 德拉克里雅氏 中型群体电容传输器
德拉克里雅氏 大型掠能器
德拉克里雅氏 大型能量中和器
德拉克里雅氏 大型装甲维修器
德拉克里雅氏 小型群体电容传输器
德拉克里雅氏 散热槽
德拉克里雅氏 自适应装甲增强器
德米尔·阿达米娅的特里斯坦级飞船
快停火！别打了！我还钱！钱，钱给你！
en: Cease fire now! Stop already! I'll pay your money back!
Come on! What are you waiting for!

zh: 快递业务风靡后，涅鲁斯级逐渐被改造成各种型号。武装型速度和运力较差，但是可以一定程度的反制一些小坏蛋的邪恶念头。
en: After express delivery services became popular, the Nereus was modified for all kinds of purposes. The combat variant, though lacking in speed and cargo space, is good enough for fighting off common scoundrels.

zh: 快递业务风靡后，涅鲁斯级逐渐被改造成各种型号。高机动型速度较快，运力一般。
en: After express delivery services became popular, the Nereus was modified for all kinds of purposes. The high-mobility variant is fast, but has limited hauling capability.

zh: 快递业务风靡后，涅鲁斯级逐渐被改造成各种型号。高载荷型运力出色，速度和防御就一般了。
en: After express delivery services became popular, the Nereus was modified for all kinds of purposes. The hauling variant is great for shipping goods, but its speed and defense are average at best.

zh: 快速的重型牵引光束，如果能够激活，经过调整，可以用于牵引距离遥远的冬眠者领地周围的储藏库。
en: Heavy duty, fast working tractor beam. It can be aligned to pull storage depots surrounding the distant Sleeper enclave close to itself, if you manage to activate it.

zh: 快速突击装备，可以对敌军防守薄弱之处造成巨大打击。
en: Designed for carrying out quick assaults to wreak havoc on weak spots in the enemy's defenses.
Hurry! Load all the water on board!

zh: 快！我们需要更多的酷菲！
快！解析员，重新解析战斗数据，搜查可能的逃离行为。
en: Quick, analyst! Analyze the combat data again. Look for possible fleeing behaviors.

zh: 快，快帮帮我们！我们已经没辙了！对，位标，我把位标给你发过去！
en: Quick, help us! We don't know what to do! Right, the coordinates, I'm sending your the coordinates right away!

zh: 怎么回事，不是说好你们这里有卖吗？
en: What's wrong? Aren't you supposed to be selling this?

zh: 怎么回事？为什么会有人袭击我们？
en: What's happening? Why are we being attacked?

zh: 怎么回事？到现在才来！我们整团三十一个人，等待了整整一天啊！
en: What took you so long? You kept us waiting a whole day!

zh: 怎么样，听起来不错吧？模拟战斗环境我已经在{2|system_name:_tr}配置好了！你准备好了以后就马上过来，我已经等不及了！
en: So? Sounds good to you? The battle simulation is configured in {2|system_name:_tr}! Come over when you're ready! I'm already excited!

zh: 怎么，一个工人也没有啊……
en: Why are there no workers here...

zh: 思维冲击是宇宙中最受欢迎的体育运动之一，无论是在艾玛首星的皇家庭院里还是加达里的大型赌场中都有人尽情享受这项运动。不过，还是有人认为这种正式玩法太过于温和，所以他们创造了一套新的规则：决斗到死。当然这在帝国区域内是绝对禁止的。然而，黑社会酷爱这项运动，在空间内建立了许多隐蔽的竞技场，在这里体育狂热者们可以尽情观看他们的英雄战斗致死而不用担心帝国机构的干预。
en: Mind Clash is one of the most popular sports throughout known space, it is as enthusiastically played in the royal court on Amarr Prime as in the gambling halls of the Caldari. However there are a certain cadre of people who think that the official sport is too tame, so they created a new set of rules, to the death - which was promptly banned from Empire space. However their is much underground hunger for this sport so hidden in space arena's have started to be constructed in which sport enthusiasts can enjoy watching their heroes fight and die without the inteference of the beaurcratic empires.

zh: 总之你去一趟，让他们都停下来。如果他们不停下来，你就给他们点颜色看看。
en: You just go there and tell them to stop. If they don't, teach them a lesson.
We can consider this thing over now.

zh: 总有一天，我们会把血袭者从柯埃佐领清除出去。
en: One day, we will clean all the Blood Raiders from Kor-Azor's space.

zh: 恐惧古斯塔斯 中型护盾回充增量器
恐惧古斯塔斯 中型护盾扩展装置
恐惧古斯塔斯 中型群体护盾回充增量器
en: Dread Guristas Medium Group Shield Booster

zh: 恐惧古斯塔斯 中型远程护盾回充增量器
en: Dread Guristas Medium Remote Shield Booster

zh: 恐惧古斯塔斯 停滞缠绕光束
恐惧古斯塔斯 全方位索敌连接
恐惧古斯塔斯 反应式护盾力场
恐惧古斯塔斯 大型护盾回充增量器
恐惧古斯塔斯 大型护盾扩展装置
恐惧古斯塔斯 大型远程护盾回充增量器
en: Dread Guristas Large Remote Shield Booster

zh: 恐惧古斯塔斯 导弹制导计算机
恐惧古斯塔斯 小型护盾回充增量器
恐惧古斯塔斯 小型护盾扩展装置
恐惧古斯塔斯 小型群体护盾回充增量器
en: Dread Guristas Small Group Shield Booster

zh: 恐惧古斯塔斯 小型远程护盾回充增量器
en: Dread Guristas Small Remote Shield Booster

zh: 恐惧古斯塔斯 弹道控制系统
恐惧古斯塔斯 无人机伤害增效装置
恐惧古斯塔斯 自适应全能力场
恐惧古斯塔斯 跃迁扰断器
恐惧古斯塔斯 跃迁扰断炸弹
恐惧古斯塔斯 跃迁扰频器
恐惧古斯塔斯 隐形装置
恒星伽玛射线校准单元
恒星射线能量终端现在看起来能正常工作了。散射的能源少多了。你应该可以接近这个建筑了，不过还是要万分小心。
en: The Solray Power Terminal now seems to be in working order. The erratic outlet of energy seems to be lessening. You should be able to move close to this structure now, but use extreme care.

zh: 恒星射线能量终端能收集附近的恒星射线校准单元的恒星能量，然后将其转化为能源。但是，这些校准单元看起来发生了故障，使得恒星射线能量终端将能源不断散射到周围的太空中。靠近它是件极其危险的事情。
en: The Solray Power Terminal is intended to use solar power to generate energy, by gathering solar power from nearby Solray Alignment Units. However, it seems the alignment units are not working properly, causing the Solray Power Terminal to flare its energy erratically into space around it. This makes it extremely hazardous to move close to.

zh: 恩娜·阿拉恩的激进级飞船
恩赐者级几十年来一直被帝国用作劳工运输舰，在帝国空间的各文明行星间运送劳动力。作为该级别飞船多年来的可靠性的证明，皇帝自己已经将恩赐者级的一个升级版本用作皇室国库的运输舰。恩赐者级拥有很厚的装甲和巨大的货舱空间。
en: The Bestower been used by the Empire as a slave transport, shipping human labor between cultivated planets in Imperial space, for decades. As a proof to how reliable this class has been through the years, the Emperor himself has used an upgraded version of this very same class as transports for the Imperial Treasury. Furthermore, it has very thick armor and large cargo space.

zh: 恭喜你完成预备期服役。我谨代表统合部联合安全局，正式授予你飞行员执照。
en: Congratulations Capsuleer! You have completed your probation period. On behalf of the Directive Enforcement Department of CONCORD, I hereby grant you your Pilot License.

zh: 恭喜，你距离成为一名合格的飞行员已经不远了。
en: Congratulations, you are almost a qualified pilot.

zh: 恶徒 中型装甲连接模块
恶徒 大型装甲连接模块
恶徒 小型装甲连接模块

en: Your {item_name:_tr} listed for sale in {name:_tr} has been sold

zh: 您刚才提交的文件似乎有一些问题。
en: There seem to be some problems with the file you just submitted.

zh: 您在{name:_tr}开启的制造项目已完成
en: The Manufacturing Job you started in {name:_tr} has been completed

zh: 您好！飞行员。我是自由扩张集团的业务委托人贝尔。
en: Hello, Capsuleer! I'm Bell, the business agent from Freedom Extension.

zh: 您好，乐于助人的克隆人先生。
您好，克隆人先生，这里是星形矿业。
en: Hello, Capsuleer, this is Astral Mining Inc.

zh: 您好，您送来的矿石已经入库，报酬即刻发放！感谢您的合作！
en: Hello. The ores you brought have been sent to the warehouse. The rewards payment will be made immediately. Thank you for your cooperation!

zh: 您好，飞行员。EVE姐妹会在维星系附近救助了一批难民。
en: Hello, Capsuleer. The Sisters of EVE rescued a group of refugees near the Vay system.

zh: 您好，飞行员。{2|system_name:_tr}星系出了一点小麻烦。
en: Hello, Capsuleer. There seems to be a small incident in {2|system_name:_tr}.

zh: 您好，飞行员。{3|station_name:_tr}发生了水源污染事件。
en: Hello, Capsuleer. There was a water pollution incident in {3|station_name:_tr}.

zh: 您好，飞行员。众所周知，酷菲在新伊甸广受欢迎，甚至有人迷信船舱里带一罐酷菲可以减小被点名的几率。
en: Greetings, Capsuleer. As is widely known, Quafe is widely popular across New Eden. Some even believe that carrying a can of Quafe on board can reduce the possibility of being targeted.

zh: 您好，飞行员。你知道的，外空联合矿业曾靠着发现超新星诺克石大赚了一笔，引来不少势力的觊觎。
en: Hello, Capsuleer. The discovery of Nocxium has brought ORE a great fortune and attracted the envy of many other factions.

zh: 您好，飞行员。可以耽误您几分钟吗？
en: Greetings, pilot. May I have a minute?

zh: 您好，飞行员。最近一种被称作“利维坦”的新型病毒在伊勒达星系爆发，并有流行扩张的势头。
en: Hello, Capsuleer. A new virus nicknamed "Leviathan" has broken out in the Eletta system – and it seems to be spreading.

zh: 您好，飞行员。泛光之源的某个恒星即将爆发大风暴，辐射区域内的居民都在囤积电池，以防电力供应中断。
en: Hello, Capsuleer. A storm is forming on a star in Luminaire. Residents within the radiation range are hoarding batteries in case the power supply goes down.

zh: 您好，飞行员。泛星船运作为新伊甸最大的船运公司，提供各种便宜可靠的服务，其中包括生鲜食品的极速运输。
en: Hello, Capsuleer. The largest shipping company in New Eden, TransStellar Shipping offers a cheap and reliable service, including express transportation of fresh food.

zh: 您好，飞行员。艾玛达的一个行星上出现了前所未见的巨型生物，严重影响到当地居民的日常安全。
en: Hello, Capsuleer. Unknown gigantic creatures have appeared on a planet in the Ammatar Mandate, endangering the lives of the residents there.

zh: 您好，飞行员。隶属于加达里合众国的波斯矿业发生了一起核原料泄露事件，人员尚未撤出。
en: Hello, Capsuleer. A nuclear material leak occurred in a plant belonging to the Poksu Mineral Group in Caldari, and the people there have not yet been evacuated.

zh:
您好，飞行员：
这是一封来自统合部克隆体服务中心的邮件，我们收到您克隆体的报告，伦敦时间 {expire_time}，欧米伽克隆 -（{omega_type}）服务已经结束，如果您希望继续得到欧米伽克隆服务，请尽快购买.
{remove_skill_info}
谢谢.
统合部-克隆体服务中心
en:
Greetings, Capsuleer,
This is a mail from the CONCORD Clone Service Center. We received the following clone report: your Omega Clone - ({omega_type}) service ended at {expire_time} GMT. Please make another purchase if you wish to enjoy the Omega Clone service again.
{remove_skill_info}
Thank you,
CONCORD - Clone Service Center

zh:
您好，飞行员：
这是一封来自统合部克隆体服务中心的邮件，我们收到您克隆体的报告，您在伦敦时间 {start_time}激活了欧米伽克隆 ({omega_type})，克隆体激活后可以获得多种服务, 您的克隆体到期时间为伦敦时间{expire_time}

谢谢.
统合部-克隆体服务中心
en:
Greetings, Capsuleer,
This is a mail from the CONCORD Clone Service Center. We received the following clone report: you activated the Omega Clone - ({omega_type}) at {start_time} GMT. You can enjoy a variety of services once the clone is activated. Your Omega Clone service will expire at {expire_time} GMT.

Thank you,
CONCORD - Clone Service Center

zh:
您好，飞行员：
这是一封来自统合部克隆体服务中心的邮件，我们收到您克隆体的报告，您的欧米伽克隆-（{omega_type}）将于伦敦时间 {expire_time}失效，如果您希望继续得到欧米伽克隆服务，欢迎购买。

谢谢.
统合部-克隆体服务中心
en:
Greetings, Capsuleer,
This is a mail from the CONCORD Clone Service Center. We received the following clone report: your Omega Clone - ({omega_type}) service will expire at {expire_time} GMT. Please make another purchase if you wish to extend your Omega Clone service.

Thank you,
CONCORD - Clone Service Center
You stopped undocking from the station.

zh: 您帮帮忙，我把运输舰的位标发给您，快给想个办法！
en: Please help me. I'm sending you the coordinates of the transport ship. You have to help me!

zh: 您打算提交时可以随时联系我。
en: Feel free to contact me when you decide to submit.

zh: 您用您切实的行动保卫了联邦的安全！
en: You defended the security of the Federation with your actions!

zh: 您申领的集装箱已存放到{name:_tr}
en: The container you applied for has been deposited in {name:_tr}

zh: 您的舰船货仓中缺少{item_count}单位{item_name}，请仔细检查仓库
en: {item_count} unit(s) of {item_name} missing from your ship's cargo hold. Please check your Warehouse.

zh: 您的舰船需要修理，是否修理？
en: Your ship is damaged. Repair ship?

zh: 您的货单已经全部核对完毕，合同金马上就会发放至您的账上，谢谢。
en: Your orders have been fully cross-checked. Reward payments will be made right away as per the contract. Thank you.

zh: 您的飞船坐不下啊！我们这儿还剩好多人呢！
en: There's not enough room in your ship! Many more people are waiting here!

zh: 您的飞船货舱实在是太小了，我把东西暂时存在物品机库了。
en: Your ship's Cargo Hold is too small, so I've temporarily stored things in the Item Hangar.

zh: 您给我们送来珍贵的水，我们永不能忘记您的恩情！
en: You delivered us precious water. We will never forget your kindness!

zh: 您购买的物品已存放至{name:_tr}
en: The item you purchased has been deposited to {name:_tr}

zh: 您购买的物品已寄入物流系统
en: The item you purchased has been sent to the Delivery System

zh: 情况不一样了，泰利斯，看看这个。
en: Things are different now, Thales. Look at this.

zh: 情况和以往基本差不多，一小伙赛毕斯托人组成的海盗在{2|system_name:_tr}内大肆掠夺。
en: The situation is basically the same as always. A group of Sebiestor pirates are plundering in {2|system_name:_tr}.

zh: 情报局和你们说的是面谈吗？我怎么不知道？不好意思，我只负责把你抓回去。
en: Did Intelligence tell you they wanted to talk to you in person? How come I didn't hear about that? Sorry, but I'm going to have to take you back.

zh: 惩罚：在一艘舰船上使用多个类似装备或改装件，将削弱实际使用效果。
en: Penalty: Using more than one of this type of module or rig on a single ship will result in a penalty to the final effect.

zh: 惩罚：最大电容量将减少。
en: Penalty: Max capacitor capacity will be reduced.

zh: 惰性接近触发式自动炮台
想都不用想，奴隶船上装的肯定是米玛塔尔的子民。
en: I can say for sure that the slave ship is loaded with Minmatars.

zh: 感谢你使用新伊甸商城服务，请记得领取你的物品
en: Thank you for using New Eden Store. Please remember to claim your items.

zh: 感谢你的善举！祝你好运！
en: Thank you for your kind help! I wish you the best of luck!

zh: 感谢你的帮助，记得查收报酬。
en: Thank you for your assistance. Be sure to check if your payments have been made.

zh: 感谢您的合作，飞行员，联邦政府部衷心期待和您再次合作。
en: Thank you for your cooperation, Capsuleer. The Federal Administration look forward to working with you again.

zh: 感谢您的支持，我们会尽快处理
en: Thank you for your support. We will deal with it as soon as possible.

zh: 感谢！来自古斯塔斯的兔子先生，为我们献上的精彩焰火表演！
en: Let's express our gratitude to Mr. Rabbit of the Guristas, who gave us a wonderful fireworks show!

zh: 愿真神降天罚于这些无知的罪人。
en: May the one true God give these ignorant sinners the punishment they deserve.

zh: 戈丹氏 中型电容注电器
戈丹氏 停滞缠绕光束
戈丹氏 回转稳定器
戈丹氏 大型电容器电池
戈丹氏 大型电容注电器
戈丹氏 小型电容注电器
戈丹氏 弹道控制系统
戈丹氏 跃迁扰断器
戈丹氏 跃迁扰频器
戈莫萨宾·扎达南的旅行者级飞船
成功将战列巡洋舰电子化改造后，技术人员也攻克了后勤支援方面的难题，最终各个国家都制造出了符合自己要求的轻量化后勤支援舰船。
en: Following the successful modification of the battlecruiser's electronic equipment, the tech crews also overcame their logistical difficulties. In the end, all nations managed to manufacture their own lightweight logistics ships to meet their needs.

zh: 成功解锁故事线委托书
我……我真的不知道啊！有人明明报告我说发现了存着烟花的仓库，怎么会变成海盗呢！
en: I- I really don't know! Someone reported to me, saying fireworks were found in a warehouse. How come they're pirates now?

zh: 我不想看到任何一个和我一同出生入死的同胞死在海盗的手里，请赶快救救他们。
en: I don't want to see any of my comrades-in-arms die in the hands of pirates. Please help them quickly.

zh: 我不知道你在说什么，我只是一个负责跑腿的雇佣兵。
en: I don't know what you're talking about. I'm just a gun-for-hire who does the busy work.

zh: 我不能忍受任何一笔钱离开我超过三个月。不能！绝不！
en: I can't stand any money leaving me for over three months. Can't stand it! I just can't!

zh: 我了解斯普尔（Spool），他是一个有正义感的孩子，绝不会做出这种错事。
en: I know Spool. He is a child with a sense of justice. He wouldn't do such a thing.

zh: 我从对话当中听到，他们就在{8|system_name:_tr}，我可以带你们过去。
en: I heard from their conversation that they're in {8|system_name:_tr}. I can take you there.

zh: 我代表我自己……对，我自己，寻求你的帮助。
en: On behalf of myself – yes, myself – I require your assistance.

zh: 我们不会容忍任何逃兵，不必刻意留活口，就按你喜欢的方式来。
en: We don't allow any deserters. You don't have to keep them alive. Just do as you please.

zh: 我们不确定他们和天使企业是否有关联，但这次的对手可能没有这么轻松，你最好谨慎一点。
en: We are not sure if they are related to Angel Cartel. But one thing we know for sure, our enemies may not be so easy to deal with. Be cautious.

zh: 我们不能要求每一个大学教授都能像真正的军人一样机敏，不是吗？
en: You can't expect every university professor to be as agile as real soldiers, can you?

zh: 我们会全力对间谍展开搜捕。
en: We will do everything we can to find this spy.

zh: 我们会在空间站机库等你。
en: We will be waiting in the station hanger.

zh: 我们刚刚查获了一处隐藏极深的海盗窝点，我需要你神不知鬼不觉地端掉它。
en: We have discovered a hidden pirate den, and I need you to take out the targets stealthily.

zh: 我们又在{2|system_name:_tr}发现了一个海盗的内应。
en: We found another pirate spy in {2|system_name:_tr}.

zh: 我们又定位一个新的窃听设备的坐标，在这里，不花钱就想听音乐是绝对不行的！
en: We located the coordinates of another bugging device. Here, it is absolutely not allowed to listen to music without paying for it!

zh: 我们只不过是回到自己本来的地方，至少给我们一些基本的资源吧？不然我们靠什么生活？
en: We're just going back to where we used to live. Could you spare us some basic resources at least, please? Otherwise, I don't know how we will survive!

zh: 我们唯一的职责就是给人民以自由。岁月交替，千百万人为这一理想献出了宝贵的生命；而今，解放人民的崇高事业将由我们这一代来完成。长时间里，我们族群被迫屈从于人，蒙受无数苦难和羞辱。那些奴役者虽用华丽的宗教言语做掩饰，但其动机仍然和市侩一样卑鄙可耻。如果说有朝一日，我们能站起来，和千万兄弟携手反击，那么这一天已然来到！牢记这历史的转折点，我们将逃脱魔掌，赢得自由！抓住这个机会，兄弟们。民族的崛起，就在今日！——共和国议长，马拉图·沙克尔，于共和议会的演讲，新纪元107年11月27日
en: The liberty of our people is solely our responsibility. Tempting as it is to foist this burden upon our well-wishers, we must never forget that the onus of our emancipation rests with us and us alone. For too long, our proud people have been subjugated to the whims of enslavers, forced to endure relentless suffering and humiliation at the hands of people whose motivations, masked though they may be by florid religious claptrap, remain as base and despicable as those of the playground bully. If ever there was a time to rise – if ever there was a time to join hands with our brothers – that time is now. At this exact junction in history we have within our grasp the means to loosen our tormentors' hold and win freedom for our kin. Opportunities are there to be taken. Brothers, we must rise. -Malaetu Shakor, Republic Parliament Head Speaking before the Tribal Council November 27th, YC 107

zh: 我们在{2|system_name:_tr}定位了一处古斯塔斯海盗聚集地。
en: We located a Guristas pirates holdout in {2|system_name:_tr}.

zh: 我们在{2|system_name:_tr}星系内似乎捕捉到了天蛇集团的小型舰队的活动位标。
en: We discovered a coordinates marking the activity of a small Serpentis fleet in the {2|system_name:_tr} system.

zh: 我们在{2|system_name:_tr}的矿队遭到了未知势力的袭击。
en: Our mining team in {2|system_name:_tr} was ambushed by an unknown faction.

zh: 我们接到线报，一伙古斯塔斯海盗正在{2|system_name:_tr}聚集。
en: One of our source says a group of Guristas pirates is gathering in {2|system_name:_tr}.

zh: 我们收到求救信号，我司下属的一艘工业舰被一伙海盗拦截，请您速速赶往救援。
en: We received a distress signal. An industrial ship of our corporation was intercepted by a group of pirates. Please head to their rescue.

zh: 我们放心地主推她也是这个原因。
en: That's why we feel safe focusing most of our resources on promoting her.

zh: 我们政府部始终相信与克隆人飞行员进行密切的合作是保护联邦治安的最佳手段。
en: Federal Administration has always believed that close cooperation with Capsuleers is the best way to protect federal law and order.

zh: 我们最近发现了一处老旧的存放着斯塔科马尼传统烟花的仓库，大概已经就几十年没人打开过了。
en: We recently discovered an old warehouse that stores Starkmanir traditional fireworks. No one has opened it in decades.

zh: 我们有一批来自盖伦特联邦的图克尔移民滞留在了{2|station_name:_tr}，如果你去把他们带到他们想去的地方那就再好不过了。
en: We have some Thukker immigrants from the Gallente Federation stranded in {2|station_name:_tr}. It would be great if you could take them wherever they want..

zh: 我们有一批重要的物资要路过{2|system_name:_tr}，希望你能提前过去，确保那个地区的安全。
en: We have some important cargo that needs to be delivered via {2|system_name:_tr}. I hope you can go there and make sure we'll be safe crossing that space.

zh: 我们有确凿的证据证明塔什蒙贡家族数次雇凶袭击我们的舰队。
en: We have concrete evidence showing that the fleet that attacked us had been hired by the Tash-Murkon family several times.

zh: 我们查出一小队小型舰船在暗中破坏我们集团的重要设施。
en: We found that a small fleet was secretly undermining the important facilities of our corporation.

zh: 我们正在准备酷菲特别纪念版的原材料！
en: We're preparing ingredients for a special commemorative version of Quafe!

zh: 我们正在锁定敌人的位标，请你替我消灭他们。
en: We're tracking down the enemy's coordinates. Please eliminate them for me.

zh: 我们派出了一个肥美的诱饵——一艘很棒的运输船，肯定能吸引海盗的注意。
en: We sent a luring bait - a great transport ship that would surely attract the attention of pirates.

zh: 我们的一艘正在前往预留定居点的图克尔移民船在{2|system_name:_tr}被一伙海盗给截了！
en: One of our Thukker ships was intercepted by a gang of pirates in {2|system_name:_tr} while heading for the reserved settlement.

zh: 我们的引擎出现了故障，整个电力系统都停止工作了。
en: Our engine has failed and the entire power system has stopped working.

zh: 我们的救援人员已经在路上了，你们再等一会儿就能回家了。
en: Our rescue team is already on the road, and you can all go home shortly after.

zh: 我们的数据库中没有和这个建筑匹配的资料。
en: There's nothing in our databanks that matches this structure.

zh: 我们的数据库中没有和这个虫洞匹配的资料。
en: There's nothing in our databanks that matches this wormhole.

zh: 我们的追踪系统显示，攻击服务器的黑客并没有离开{2|system_name:_tr}。
en: Our tracking system shows that the hacker who attacked the server hasn't left {2|system_name:_tr} yet.

zh: 我们真正希望你做的事情其实是在战斗的过程中允许我们对你的战斗数据进行实时采集和转播。
en: What we really hope is that you can allow us to collect and broadcast your battle data in real time while you're battling.

zh: 我们老板不希望有任何人抓到我们的把柄，你是个聪明人，你知道该怎么做。
en: Our boss doesn't like anyone to have something that's unfavorable to us, you are a smart person, you know what to do.

zh: 我们老板希望看到我们赢得下一轮的竞技大会。
en: Our boss wants see us win the next round of the Competition Games.

zh: 我们老板的一个出货渠道被古斯塔斯海盗给劫持了，飞行员。
en: One of the shipping connections of our boss was hijacked by the Guristas pirates, Capsuleer.

zh: 我们萨拉姆家族是女皇的亲属，如果血袭者连女皇家族的领地都能来去自如，我萨拉姆家族的颜面何存？
en: The Sarum Family is a relative of the Empress. It would be a disgrace to our family if the Blood Raiders can come and go freely in the royal family's space!

zh: 我们要的不是这个……请你再确认一下。
en: This is not what we asked for... Please confirm if there was a mix-up.
We plan to acquire a batch of {2|item_name:_tr} at {2|station_name:_tr}.

zh: 我们银行有一笔数额不菲的债务，已经拖欠了整整三个月了！
en: Someone took a loan from us and hasn't paid anything back for three months!

zh: 我们集团已经顺利的定位到了他们目前的位置。
en: We have successfully pinpointed their current location.

zh: 我们集团现在正在主推“璀璨”卡罗拉，她的音乐绝对让你大吃一惊！
en: We're now promoting "Sparkly" Carola. Her music will absolutely shake your world!

zh: 我们需要48单位的{2|item_name:_tr}，对，就送到{2|station_name:_tr}，联络自由扩张集团即可。
en: We need 48 units of {2|item_name:_tr}. That's right, deliver them to {2|station_name:_tr} and contact Freedom Extension.

zh: 我们需要一个懂扫描的人过去帮我们看看，我想这个工作你在合适不过了。
en: We need someone there who knows how to scan. I think you're the right person for the job.

zh: 我们需要大量的矿，有多少要多少。
en: We need a lot of ores. All of them.

zh: 我们需要您送些水去，以解燃眉之急。我把坐标发给您。
en: We need you to deliver some water. It's an emergency. I'll send you the coordinates.

zh: 我们飞马集团作为一家业务广泛的零售公司，经营范围遍布整个盖伦特联邦。
en: FedMart is a retail corporation with a wide range of operations, and we operate all across the Gallente Federation.

zh: 我会向企业办事处提交战斗记录。
en: I will submit the combat log to the office.

zh: 我会尽快把报酬转到你的账上。
en: I will transfer your payment to your account as soon as possible.

zh: 我会常驻<color value="0x9afdd07a">主界面左下方</color>，为你提供必要的帮助。
en: I will be at <color value="0x9afdd07a">the lower left of the main interface</color> to provide you with any necessary help.

zh: 我会把需要运送的东西都打包好，送到你的物品机库去，换了船以后记得来拿。
en: I will pack all the things you need to ship and send them to your Item Hangar. Remember to come and pick them up after changing ship.

zh: 我会给你我最好的宝贝做奖励。
en: I will give you my best as a reward.

zh: 我会给您付额外的报酬，这次的战斗还请不要再追究了……
en: I'll pay you extra compensation. Please don't ask about this battle anymore...

zh: 我会配合你做好信号侦察，只要解决那个间谍，委托金再翻一倍！
en: I'll help you with the signal scan. Once you've dealt with that spy, I'll double your commission!

zh: 我假装加入他们就是想拿到证据，因为我相信他们不会防范我这样的年轻人。
en: I pretended to join them just to collect evidence, as I believed that they would not suspect a young person like me.

zh: 我先把帐结了吧，我要去喝一杯咖啡再来处理报告。
en: Let me settle the payment first. I'm going to have a cup of coffee before I deal with the report.

zh: 我刚刚向我的老板确认过。
en: I just talked to my boss.

zh: 我十分仰慕贵军团的科技，希望能加入你们
en: I admire the technology of your Corporation and I'd like to join you

zh: 我压根没想到他们会派一个克隆人飞行员来送水啊！
en: There was no way I would expect them to send a Capsuleer for a water delivery!

zh: 我只是一个微不足道的陌生人。
我只是在战斗记录中查看有没有我的朋友搭乘的舰船。
en: I was checking to see if my friend's ship was in the combat log.

zh: 我只是给你一个简单的警告，接下来，我还会继续对你的财产进行“调查”。
en: I'm simply giving you a warning. Next, I'll need to "investigate" your property.

zh: 我可能会唠叨很多的注意事项，希望你能耐心的听完。
en: I may ramble a lot about the precautions, but I hope you can be patient and listen to the end.

zh: 我向上面反映过，但老板只想看到成果，他可没兴趣听我抱怨。
en: I reported this to the high up, but the boss only wants to see the results, and was not interested in listening to my complaint.

zh: 我告诉你，一般这时再去要他们还钱，事半功倍！
en: Let me tell you, they always hand out the money after a good beating!

zh: 我和你一起长大，我了解你。你是费比（Fibbi）的弟弟，整个部落最有正义感的人，不是吗？
en: I grew up with you. I know you. You're Fibbi's brother, the most righteous man of our entire tribe. Are you not?

zh: 我唯一的弟弟，斯普尔·莱格（Spool Lyger）逃离了家乡。加……加入了天使企业。
en: My only brother, Spool Lyger, ran away from home and j-joined the Angel Cartel.

zh: 我在战斗结束后遇到了一个陌生人，他有东西转交给你。
en: I met a stranger after the battle. He asked me to give this to you.

zh: 我好像和你很熟。你是谁？
en: Did I know you before? Who are you?

zh: 我就长话短说了，飞行员。
我希望共和国能有更多你这样的飞行员，别忘了查收你的报酬。
en: I hope there are more Capsuleers like you in the Republic. Don't forget to check your reward payments.

zh: 我帮你看看发芽了没有
en: I'll help you check to see if it's sprouting

zh: 我年纪大了，看不得这些东西。
en: I am too old for things like these.

zh: 我建议你不要耍什么花样。
en: I suggest that you behave. Don't try to trick me.

zh: 我当年第一次碰上海盗的时候，可比他勇敢多了。
en: I was much braver than him when I first run into the pirates.

zh: 我待会儿会按其他委托类型的条目给你转账，毕竟袭击女王的贡品也不是什么光彩的事情。
en: I will transfer your fee under the name of another assignment. After all, ambushing the tribute for the Empress isn't something you'd want others to know about.

zh: 我想再多看这些肉一眼
en: I want to stay just a little bit longer with this meat

zh: 我我我，我这就把报酬给你打过去！
en: I-I'm sending you the payment now!

zh: 我承认船上可能会有盖伦特人，但“盖伦特间谍”的指控纯属无稽之谈！我们本来就是一个国际化的集团。
en: I admit that there may be a Gallente on board, but the allegations of the Gallente spy are pure nonsense! We have always been an international corporation.

zh: 我把他的位标发送给你，希望你能帮他一把。
en: I'm sending you his coordinates. I hope you can help him.

zh: 我把现场的情况给你发送过去，免得你说我在骗你。
en: I'm sending you the info about the scene in case you don't believe me.

zh: 我拿到执照了？我天！这是真的？！
en: I got my license? Are you serious? I'll be... Is this for real?!

zh: 我明明准备了完整的合同材料！这背后一定有阴谋。
en: It's not like I didn't prepare the complete contracts! There must be something else going on.

zh: 我是你的飞行助理，西顿工业第二代光量子机器人。
en: I am your flight assistant; the second-generation CreoDron light quantum AI.

zh: 我是视角传媒的索菲娅。
en: I am Sophia from the Scope.

zh: 我有一些好活计要交给你。
en: I have some nice work for you.

zh: 我没有看到什么军火，该不会是你弄丢了？
en: I'm not seeing any munitions. Could it be that you lost them?

zh: 我现在可以很肯定天使企业联合体与天蛇集团存在着某种合作。
en: I can now say for sure that there is some kind of cooperation between Angel Cartel and Serpentis.

zh: 我现在暂时抽不出人手对付他们，只能交给你了。
en: I don't have enough manpower to deal with them, so I'll have to leave this to you.

zh: 我的妻子和孩子还在艾玛达……我不能离开他们。
en: My wife and kids are still in Ammatar... I can't leave without them.

zh: 我相信你应该有十足的把握，如果没能赢下比赛，那么我就不客气了。
en: I believe it will be easy for you. But if you fail to win the game, I won't go easy on you.

zh: 我看看，报酬打给你，嗝，不错啊你，不错！
en: Let's see. Reward payments will be made. *Hic*. Not bad, huh? Not bad at all!

zh: 我看起来特别可笑，不是吗？
en: I look really stupid now, don't I?

zh: 我真是受够了，实验室里的无人机还没调试好呢。
en: I've had enough. I still have drones that need calibrating in the lab.

zh: 我真没看到啊，之前雇佣我们的人，也没说要注意这事儿啊！
en: I really didn't see it. The people who hired us didn't mention anything about this!

zh: 我知道有个集团在某个地方藏了一笔钱，我可以告诉你！
en: I know that some corporation hid a lot of money. I can tell you where they hid it!

zh: 我确信他有钱还我们的，只是这个人是个出了名的赖皮。
en: I'm sure he has the money to pay us back, but he's infamous for being a deadbeat.

zh: 我稍后就把您应得的报酬转到您的账上。
en: The reward will be deposited to your account shortly.

zh: 我能从战斗报告里看到那个蠢货的飞船爆炸的样子！
en: I can see from the battle report how that idiot's ship exploded!

zh: 我要你现在就把他抓回来！立刻！马上！
en: I want you to take him back now! Immediately! Pronto!

zh: 我认为，一切生命都该活在安静的绝望中。
en: It is my opinion that all life forms should persue lives of quiet reflection.

zh: 我负责接收军火，你可以卸货了。
en: I'm here to receive the munitions. You can unload them now.

zh: 我负责接收难民，难民在哪儿？
en: I'm here to receive the refugees. Where are they?

zh: 我还有其他要紧的事儿，就麻烦你来“疏通疏通”航道吧。
en: I have other important business to attend to. I'll have to ask you to "clear the traffic" of the route.

zh: 我还有别的事情要忙，电池先放在你的物品机库了。
en: I have other business to take care of, so I'll just leave the batteries in your item hangar.

zh: 我这儿还有很多长者战争时留下的存货。
en: I've got a lot of them here, all from the Elder War.

zh: 我这就把位标发给你，剩下的故事我们之后再说吧。
en: I'm sending you the coordinates. Let's save the story for later.

zh: 我这就把报酬给你打过去，对了，还有一个小礼物，希望你能喜欢。
en: I'm transferring your payment now. Oh, right, and a small gift. I hope you like it.

zh: 我这就放陆战队员们出舱
en: I will let the Marines out now

zh: 我这次非得向上面举报那些狱警不可。
en: I will report the prison guards to the high up this time.

zh: 我追踪这群人已经有一段时间了，你打乱了我全盘的计划。
en: I've been tracking these people for a while. You disrupted all my plans.

zh: 我需要向我们的投资人展示他们的投资是多么的有价值！
en: I need to show our investors how worthwhile their investment is!

zh: 我霍图的飞船，炸毁的火焰一定是最漂亮的！
en: My ship has the most beautiful fire when blown up!

zh: 战列巡洋舰优秀的适航性使其成为新伊甸最常用的大型作战舰船，加达里在对抗周围的邪恶势力时采取了异株湖改造的猛鲑级战列巡洋舰，并取得了一系列的优秀战果。
en: Battlecruisers' excellent adaptability makes them the most common vessels in New Eden's large scale battles. Caldari employed Ferox battlecruisers in its battles against evil forces and received great results.

zh: 战列巡洋舰优秀的适航性使其成为新伊甸最常用的大型作战舰船，卡尼迪对先知级战列巡洋舰进行了改造，使其拥有舰队指挥优势。
en: Battlecruisers' excellent adaptability makes them the most common vessels in New Eden's large scale battles. Khanid Innovations made several changes to the Prophecy, giving it an edge in fleet command.

zh: 战列巡洋舰优秀的适航性使其成为新伊甸最常用的大型作战舰船，核心局面改造了飓风级战列巡洋舰并提供给卫队使用，虽然强悍的共和卫队依然喜欢更小型的舰船。
en: Battlecruisers' excellent adaptability makes them the most common vessels in New Eden's large scale battles. Core Complexion modified the Cyclone and supplied them to the Republic Fleet, despite the Fleet's preference for smaller vessels.

zh: 战列巡洋舰优秀的适航性使其成为新伊甸最常用的大型作战舰船，联邦海军在一次行动中，尝试性的将弥洱米顿级战巡用于舰队联络和指挥，并得到相关军事指挥人员的好评，之后度沃勒集团接手了大量的改造订单。
en: Battlecruisers' excellent adaptability makes them the most common vessels in New Eden's large scale battles. The Federation Navy attempted to use the Myrmidon as the fleets communication and command ship. The decision was highly praised by naval officers, which resulted in increased modification orders at Duvolle Labs.

zh: 战列巡洋舰制造时间效率
战列巡洋舰制造材料效率
战列巡洋舰的电子化改进持续了很多年都没有太好的进展，神秘势力进入新伊甸后带来了很多新奇的技术，这次大型舰船也可以提供电子战支持了。
en: For a long time, modifications to the electronic equipment of battlecruisers had failed to achieve any major improvements, until mysterious forces arrived in New Eden, bringing with them new technologies like nothing seen before. Now, even larger ships can provide effective electronic warfare capabilities.

zh: 战后，共和国接收了大量长者舰队的遗产——
en: After the war, the Republic received a large legacy from the Elder Fleet.

zh: 战场维修功能逐渐在新伊甸兴起，卡尼迪技师改造了检察官级，并使其成为更优秀的维修平台。
en: With battlefield maintenance gaining more popularity in New Eden, Khanid engineers have modified the Inquisitor, making it a better maintenance platform.

zh: 战场需要持续长时间的作战船只，卡尼迪改造的主宰级恰好出现了。
en: The battlefield requires vessels that can sustain extended bouts of combat. The Khanid-customized Arbitrator came out at just the right time.

zh: 战场需要持续长时间的作战船只，度沃勒改造的星空级袭扰型是联邦不多的选择之一。
en: The battlefield requires vessels that can sustain extended bouts of combat. Duvolle Labs' Celestis variant, designed for raids, is one of the few choices the Federation has.

zh: 战场需要持续长时间的作战船只，无限创造集团优化了挑战级，使其更适应袭扰作战。
en: The battlefield requires vessels that can sustain extended bouts of combats. Boundless Creation has improved the Bellicose, making it more suitable for disrupting enemy ships.

zh: 战场需要持续长时间的作战船只，黑鸟级卡拉吉卡袭扰型是一个不错的选择。
en: The battlefield requires vessels that can sustain extended bouts of combat. The Kaalakiota's Blackbird, designed for raids, is a pretty good choice.
Mission Beacon: A Soldier's Way II
Mission Beacon: A Soldier's Way I

zh: 战斗数据已确认，非常感谢。
en: Battle data confirmed. Thank you very much.

zh: 战术哨站是艾玛达抵御其米玛塔尔同胞的第一道防线。这些战术单位的设计来自艾玛帝国，是艾玛皇帝在艾玛达共和国成立时赠送的礼物。
en: Tactical outposts serve as the first line of defense of the Ammatars against their Minmatar cousins.  The design of these Tactical Units come from the Amarr Empire, originally as a personal gift from the Emperor himself when the Ammatar nation was founded.

zh: 戴米·拉泽鲁斯的惩罚者级飞船
所以希望你能够和我的“宝贝”进行一场真刀真枪的演练。
en: So I hope that you can have drill with my "baby" using real weapons.

zh: 所以我们并不会责怪你。
所有想去内部隐匿空间层的人都必须经过总部批准。
en: It is through these headquarters that everyone heading for the inner deadspace pockets must go.

zh: 所有斯塔科马尼人都会感谢您的。
en: All of Starkmanir will thank you.

zh: 所谓的“熔岩行星”（或者“岩浆行星”）一共分为三个类型：恒星熔岩星，这类熔岩星的运行轨道比较靠近所在星系中的恒星，受到恒星高温辐射影响，它们的表面无法冷却凝固；第二种是引力熔岩星，它们受到强烈的引力偏移的拉扯而使得表面已经凝固的地壳周期性地大规模破裂；第三种是原发熔岩星，这些行星因为诸多未查明的原因而导致其无法冷却形成稳定的地壳。这三种类型的熔岩行星都有着较为相似的表面特征：巨大的橘红色熔岩区域遍布行星表面，而后两种熔岩行星都可能会在一个时期内出现短暂的凝固期，持续几年或几十年。
en: So-called "lava planets" (properly "magmatic planets") fall into one of three groups: solar magmatics, which orbit sufficiently close to their star that the surface never cools enough to solidify; gravitational magmatics, which experience gravitational shifts sufficiently strong to regularly and significantly fracture cooling crusts; and magmatoids, which are for largely-unexplained reasons simply incapable of cooling and forming a persistent crust. All three types generally exhibit the same external phenomena - huge red-orange lava fields being a defining feature - but the latter two types are sometimes capable of briefly solidifying for a period measured in years or perhaps decades.

zh: 所需科技等级未解锁，无法开启制造项目
en: Required Tech Level not yet unlocked. Cannot start this job.

zh: 扎坎纳·坎特的特里斯坦级飞船
扎玛·菲达斯的卡尼迪惩罚者级飞船
扎艾·福拉利的恩赐者级飞船

en: Thank you to you, this is my 29th day of working overtime this month. I think I could fall asleep immediately when I close my eyes.

zh: 托勒克斯级守卫型II蓝图
托勒克斯级守卫型蓝图
托勒克斯级巡洋舰是最近被联邦编入现役的战舰。尽管托勒克斯级体现了典型的现代盖伦特设计理念，适合任何距离的作战，不过它还是最擅长在极短的距离内用疾速炮和成群的战斗无人机将哪怕最为顽强的敌人撕成碎片。
en: The Thorax-class cruiser is the latest combat ship commissioned by the Federation. The Thorax is a very effective ship at any range, but typical of modern Gallente design philosophy it is most effective when working at extreme close range, where its blasters and hordes of combat drones tear through even the toughest of enemies.

zh: 托勒克斯级巡洋舰是最近被联邦编入现役的战舰。尽管托勒克斯级体现了典型的现代盖伦特设计理念，适合任何距离的作战，不过它还是最擅长在极短的距离内用疾速炮将哪怕最为顽强的敌人撕成碎片。

zh: 抛弃的数据库：这以前可能属于某个气闸，或者通风系统的关键部件，或者停滞设备载舱之类的。不管是什么，现在所剩下的唯一有价值的东西可能就是里面的一块数据库设备了。
en: Obsolete Sleeper Databank: This could once have been an airlock. Or an essential component of a ventilation system. Or some kind of stasis pod. Whatever it was, the only thing of value that remains is the databank you can detect concealed within.

en: Start your adventure to the low-security regions

zh: 据传，这些自然现象会将过于靠近的人抛到非常遥远的地方。谨慎的旅行者都会避开它们；曾经有些人大着胆靠近它们，结果从此失去了踪迹。
en: These natural phenomenum that rumour says will hurtle those that come too close to faraway places.  Wary travelers stay away from them as some that have ventured too close have never been seen again.

zh: 据传，这座古代加速轨道会将过于靠近的人抛到非常遥远的地方。谨慎的旅行者都会避开它们；曾经有些人大着胆靠近它们，结果从此失去了踪迹。
en: This is an ancient device that rumor says will hurtle those that come too close to faraway places. Wary travelers stay away from them as some that have ventured too close have never been seen again.

zh: 据传，这种自然现象会将过于靠近的人抛到非常遥远的地方。谨慎的旅行者都会避开它们；曾经有些人大着胆靠近它们，结果便杳无音讯。
en: A natural phenomena that rumour says will hurtle those that come too close to faraway places.  Wary travelers stay away from them as some that have ventured too close have never been seen again.

zh: 据可靠情报，那批海盗已经偷偷占据那个地方，并把那里当成一个藏身地了。
en: According to a reliable source, a gang of pirates have occupied that place and turned it into a hideout.

zh: 据能够穿透此建筑的扫描结果显示，它主要由许多紧密相连的单元构成，通过监控系统与数据处理网络运营。这个设施的外壳遭到了严重损毁，导致一些导管暴露在外，表明这个单元的日常工作仍在进行，每天要处理大量的生物信息数据。
en: Such scans as can penetrate this structure suggest it is primarily made up of a series of interconnected cells, run through with monitoring systems and data processing networks. There is significant damage to the shielding of this facility and some conduits are sufficiently exposed to reveal that complex processing routines are still operating on vast quantities of bioinformatic data.

zh: 探索级护卫舰是米玛塔尔护卫舰中的大家伙，是一种不错的侦察和货运舰。与一般的米玛塔尔飞船不同，它坚硬的船体外壳使它很难被摧毁，但它有限的武器槽位使它在战斗中不得不依赖其他战舰的火力支援。
en: The Probe is large compared to most Minmatar frigates and is considered a good scout and cargo-runner. Uncharacteristically for a Minmatar ship, its hard outer coating makes it difficult to destroy, while the limited weapon hardpoints force it to rely on fighter assistance if engaged in combat.

zh: 探索级护卫舰是米玛塔尔护卫舰中的大家伙，是一艘不错的侦查舰和货运舰。与一般的米玛塔尔飞船不同，它坚硬的船体外壳使它很难被摧毁，但它有限的武器槽位使它在战斗中不得不依赖无人机的火力支援。
en: The Probe is large compared to most Minmatar Frigate Vessels and is considered a good scout ship and cargo-runner. Uncharacteristically for a Minmatar ship, its hard outer coating makes it difficult to destroy, while the limited weapon points force it to rely on drone assistance if engaged in combat.

zh: 探针发射器能量栅格需求
接下来，有一场简单的海盗清理任务给你，你可以用来练练手。

en: Now, we still need some fresh Fedos.

en: The letter of assignment will be destroyed after you accept the mission. Proceed?

可以从下列物品中提炼获得：
米玛塔尔7级受损结构

Interface Circuits are common building blocks of starship subsystems. This one seems a little worse for wear but might be useful for someone with a little ingenuity.

Can be obtained by reprocessing the following items:
Minmatar Ship Debris 7
Minmatar Ship Debris 8
Caldari Ship Debris 7
Caldari Ship Debris 8

Controlling the Pilot who Lost Control

en: It is essential to control the epidemic. The vital job of delivering the vaccine has been entrusted to you.
