en: It is estimated that you will complete your CONCORD service in the 7th rebirth following this one.

zh: 提兰·马西的麻雀级飞船
提到盖伦特，就不得不提到酷菲，这种廉价又上瘾的饮料，常常会给盖伦特警方制造一些匪夷所思的案件。
en: When it comes to Gallente, you have to mention Quafe. This cheap and addictive drink often brings the Gallente police unimaginable cases.

zh: 提升加农炮的发射速率和伤害，短时间内过载可以使其获得更强的效果。
en: Grants a bonus to the firing rate and damage of cannons. Overheating it temporarily can amplify its effects.

zh: 提升无人机的最佳射程、失准范围和跟踪速度。短时间内过载可以使其获得更强的效果。
en: Enhances the range and tracking speed of drones. Overheating it can temporarily amplify its effects.

zh: 提升混合炮台的发射速率和伤害，短时间内过载可以使其获得更强的效果。
en: Grants a bonus to the firing rate and damage of railguns. Overheating it temporarily can amplify its effects.

zh:
提升舰队的电子战装备的强度。

作战网络是专业的舰队指令系统，专为战列巡洋舰和高级指挥舰船而设计。

通常在同一时间只允许一个此类设备运作，不过某些高级单位允许多系统并行。

注意：只有当你被指定为舰队加成官时，舰队加成才有效。这个装备不能在母星力场内使用。
en:
Boosts the strength of the fleet's electronic warfare modules.
Warfare links are dedicated fleet command systems designed for use on battlecruisers and advanced command class ships.
While only one of these units can normally be operated at any given time, certain advanced units allow the use of multiple systems.
Notes: The Fleet bonus only works if you are the assigned fleet booster. This module cannot activate inside a starbase forcefield.

zh: 提姆斯·萨耶的多米尼克斯级飞船
提炼废金属的专业技能。提高装备、舰船和其他可提炼设备（不包括矿石和冰矿）的提炼产出。
en: Professional skill at refining waste metals. Increase Modules, Ships and other Refining Devices' refinement output (Ores and Ice Ores not included).

zh: 提炼数量不足，需要{0}单位
en: Reprocessing quantity is insufficient, {0} units are required

zh: 提高目标舰船的能量反应强度，使其信号半径增大。
en: Increases the strength of the energy reaction on the target ship and its signal radius.

zh: 搜索完成后我会给你进一步指示。
en: I'll give you further instructions after the search is complete.

zh: 搭载了高级的自动发射电子子程序，这个小型发生器可以产生等同于老式大型型号所产生的能量。
en: Utilizing advanced auto-locomotive electrocardic subroutines, this miniscule generator is able to generate power equal to far bigger versions of older models.

zh: 摩尔马列·蒙的太阳神级

摩登赫斯是块共有之地，远离西玛特尔和美特伯里斯的喧闹人群，早在长老时代，这里就被定为玛塔利部族间的中立之地，谁都不得占有，谁都需尽开发之力。但在现代米玛塔尔社会的眼中，由于缺乏资源并且靠近尚未驯服的大荒野星域和叛变者艾玛达人的敌对空间，这里的价值已经减弱。再加上与此相邻的奇点和虚空，这些因素使得摩登赫斯成为一个有着未定夺历史和不确定未来的星域。如今，作为“宇宙中心”头衔的合法申请者和格洛之域的遗址，该星域仍能唤起极大的民族自豪，但尽管如此，它仍是相当不发达。实际上，近年来，被驱逐的图克尔部落时常进犯，这对该星域本已受损的形象有弊无利。
en: The common ground of the Heath, away from the bustling crowds of Heimatar and Metropolis, was in the days of the Elders committed as neutral ground between the Matari Tribes, to be claimed by none and developed by all.    Its scarcity of resources, as well as its proximity to the untamed reaches of Great Wildlands and the hated space of the turncoat Ammatar, have all diminished its value in the eyes of modern Minmatar society. Coupled with barriers imposed by bordering singularities and voids, this has created a region with an unsettled history and an uncertain future.    Today, as legitimate claimant to the title of "center of the cluster," and as the site of the Golgothan Fields, the region still evokes great national pride, but despite this it remains mostly undeveloped. Indeed, in recent years the outcast Thukker Tribe have been making inroads, which does little to enhance the region's already tarnished image.

zh: 擅长使用导弹，依赖速度和护盾进行防御。
en: Excels at using missiles. Relies on its speed and shields for defense.

zh: 擅长使用无人机。灵活性好，但速度较慢。
en: Excel at using drones. Have good agility but their max velocity is low.

zh: 擅长使用无人机。用护盾来抵御敌人的攻击。
en: Excel at using drones. They rely on their shield for defense.

zh: 擅长干扰并削弱敌人的高级舰船。
en: Excels at jamming and weakening the enemy's advanced ships.

zh: 擅长干扰敌人的高级舰船，用于侦察行动和电子战。
en: Excels at jamming and weakening the enemy's advanced ships. Best used for scout operations and electronic warfare.

zh: 擅长进行采矿的舰船，适用于采集大量资源。
en: A ship that excels at mining. Best used for collecting large amounts of resources.

zh: 操作成功（信息延迟了5分钟）
操控护盾回充器的技能，属于太空航行基本学科，掌握后能全面提升回充器各项性能。
en: Skill in operating Shield Rechargers. One of the basic subjects of space navigation. Master it to increase the overall performance of Rechargers.

zh: 操控星舰的基础技能，涵盖基础操作、导航和锁定目标等必要知识。
en: Basic skill in operating Starships. Includes essential knowledge on operation, navigation, and locking onto targets.

zh: 操控舰船及相关设备的技能，是成为克隆人飞行员翱翔太空不可或缺的必备技能。
en: Skill in operating ships and devices, an essential skill for Capsuleers.

zh: 操控舰船和武器装备的核心技能，掌握后能提高战斗能力。
en: The core skills of ships and weapons can improve combat capabilities.

zh: 操控装甲维修器的技能，属于太空航行基本学科，掌握后能全面提升维修器各项性能。
en: Skill in operating Armor Repairers. One of the basic subjects of space navigation. Master it to increase the overall performance of Repairers.

zh: 操控远程护盾回充器的技能，属于舰队会战基本学科，掌握后能全面提升远程护盾回充器各项性能。
en: Skill in operating Remote Shield Rechargers. One of the basic subjects of fleet warfare. Master it to increase the overall performance of Remote Shield Rechargers.

zh: 操控远程装甲维修器的技能，属于舰队会战基本学科，掌握后能全面提升远程装甲维修器各项性能。
en: Skill in operating Remote Armor Repairers. One of the basic subjects of fleet warfare. Master it to increase the overall performance of Remote Armor Repairers.

zh: 操控采矿激光器的技能，能够显著提升开采效率。
en: Skill in operating Mining Lasers. Significantly increases mining efficiency.

zh: 操控露天型采矿激光器的技能，能够显著提升开采效率。
en: Skill in operating Laser Strip Miners. Significantly increases mining efficiency.

zh: 收看直播的观众们可是非常满意呢，期待和您的下次合作！
en: The audience is very pleased with the livestream. We look forward to working with you again in the future!

zh: 收集卫星矿物的采集工厂。
en: A harvesting factory for collecting moon minerals.

zh: 改装部件已经和舰船融合，无法拆卸，只能销毁，需要销毁吗？
en: This rig is already merged with the ship and can only be removed by destroying it. Confirm destruction?

zh: 攻防平衡，机动性好，是一种用途广泛的舰船。
en: Craft with balanced offensive, defensive and mobility capabilities making them quite versatile.

en: Let go! Who dares try me?

zh: 放逐 大型护盾回充增量器
救援的地点是……唔……等我确认一下……对，就是这个，我这就给您发过去。
en: The location of the rescue is... umm... hold on while I check...right, that's the one. I'm sending it to you right away.

zh: 救救我！飞行员，那些证据都是伪造的！都是伪造的！
en: Help me, pilot! That evidence was forged! It's all fake!

zh: 数据收到。您的工作完成得非常好，由EVE姐妹会提供的报酬即刻到账。
en: Data received. Well done! Reward payments from the Sisters of EVE will be made immediately.

zh: 数据收到。您的工作完成得非常好，由外空联合矿业集团提供的报酬即刻到账。
en: Data received. Well done! Reward payments from ORE will be made immediately.

zh: 数据收到。您的工作完成得非常好，由应用知识学院提供的报酬即刻到账。
en: Data received. Well done! Reward payments from the School of Applied Knowledge will be made immediately.

zh: 数据收到。您的工作完成得非常好，由泛星船运提供的报酬即刻到账。
en: Data received. Well done! Reward payments from TransStellar Shipping will be made immediately.

zh: 数据收到。您的工作完成得非常好，由波斯矿业提供的报酬即刻到账。
en: Data received. Well done! Reward payments from Poksu Mineral Group will be made immediately.

zh: 数据收到。您的工作完成得非常好，由统合部提供的报酬即刻到账。
en: Data received. Well done! Reward payments from CONCORD will be made immediately.

zh: 数据收到。您的工作完成得非常好，由酷菲集团提供的报酬即刻到账。
en: Data received. Well done! Reward payments from Quafe will be made immediately.

zh: 数据收到。您的工作完成得非常好，由飞马集团提供的报酬即刻到账。
en: Data received. Well done! Reward payments from FedMart will be made immediately.

zh: 数据收到，飞行员。医护人员很快就会赶过来。
en: Data safely received, pilot. The medics will be here soon.

数百年的空寂让这座塔洛迦哨站的中央枢纽变得面目全非，只剩下内部的隔舱和廊道还保持着当年的原貌。锈蚀的修复段参杂着高级科技的痕迹，一些科技看上去十分的古老原始。它们讲述着故去文明的故事，但却又有莫名的亲近感。
en: Centuries of emptiness have left this Talocan outpost's central hub in disarray, but the chambers and corridors inside portray a busy (if very spartan) existence. Advanced technology mingles with rustic repairs and patchwork assemblages. Some of the technology is ancient and very rudimentary in design, harkening back to cultures long gone, yet with hints of familiarity.

zh: 斑驳、暗红色及形如水蛭，凝血级为血袭者的理念做了一个恰如其分的比喻。该船的设计理念就是专门利用它们那效果好得令人恐怖的吸能加停滞缠绕战术。它是任何一支血袭者舰船中都不可或缺的基石，且在更标准的队伍中，能产生更细腻的作用。
en: Dark red, mottled, and shaped like a leech, the Cruor presents a fitting metaphor for the Blood Raiders' philosophy. Designed almost solely to engage in their disturbingly effective tactics of energy draining and stasis webbing; this ship is a cornerstone of any effective Blood Raider fleet. Alternatively, it could also play an intriguing role in more standard ones.

zh: 断崖级巡洋舰比一般的米玛塔尔飞船要慢，但用其火力弥补了这一弱点。由于断崖级拥有极其强大的火力，米玛塔尔共和国用这种飞船来保护空间站等固定设施，并将其编入大规模攻击编队。
en: The Rupture is slow for a Minmatar ship, but makes up for it in power. The Rupture has superior firepower and is used by the Minmatar Republic, both to defend space stations and other stationary objects. Furthermore, it is a part of the Minmatar's massive attack formations.

zh: 斯卡米·查图恩的德拉米尔级飞船
斯古洛·安萨的尼铎格尔级母舰
斯基亚·阿尔弗塔的堡垒
斯塔克马是米玛塔尔最古老的部族，在黑暗之日和长者一起埋葬在了艾玛人的屠刀之下。
en: The Starkmanir were the most ancient tribe among the Minmatar, and were slaughtered by the Amarr along with the Elders on the Day of Darkness.

zh: 斯塔科马人刚刚回归共和国，供应体系仍然不算健全。{2|station_name:_tr}的斯塔科马部族正在征募一名飞行员来帮助他们采购一些新鲜食材。
en: The Starkmanir have just rejoined the Republic. Their supply system is not fully operational. The Starkmanir tribe in {2|station_name:_tr} is looking for a pilot to help them gather fresh food.

zh: 斯塔科马人的许多传统在几十年前的劫难中已经遗失殆尽，纵使现在回归，仍有许多东西无法找回。{2|system_name:_tr}的斯塔科马部族想要举办一场宴会，大量宴会所需的斯塔科马传统烟花存放在了一个老旧的仓库中。
en: Many of the Starkmanir's traditions were lost in a brutal genocide decades ago. Even though they have rejoined the Republic, there are still things they cannot recover. The Starkmanir tribe in {2|system_name:_tr} is planning to hold a banquet. The Starkmanir's traditional fireworks required for the banquet are stored in a deserted warehouse.

zh: 斯塔科马和图克尔的回归，让共和国本来均衡的格局产生了倾斜。部族间的矛盾层出不穷。由于新的土地划分政策的原因，{2|system_name:_tr}爆发了一起民众骚乱，共和安全局正在征募飞行员协助他们维持治安。
en: With the transferring of sovereignty of the Starkmanir and the Thukker back to the Republic, the balance of the Republic was broken. Conflicts broke out frequently between tribes. A civil chaos has broken out in {2|system_name:_tr} due to the new territory allocation policy. The local authority is understaffed. The Republic Security Services are looking for pilots to help them maintain law and order.

zh: 斯塔科马尼人的午餐不能没有烧肉，请给我们送一些烧肉过来。
en: A lunch without roast meat is not lunch for the Starkmanir. Bring us some roast meat please.

zh: 斯库维塔集团高层绑架事件
斯库维塔集团高层绑架事件(专家)
斯库维塔集团高层绑架事件(进阶)
斯库维塔集团高层绑架事件委托信标
en: Mission Beacon: Kidnapping of a Sukuuvestaa Executive

zh: 斯皮泰克的挑战级飞船
新伊甸从来都不是一个平静的世界。灾害、冲突、战争使得无数人流离失所。在EVE姐妹会的资助下，因各种原因失去家园的难民将会被运送到更安全的星系。
en: New Eden has never been a peaceful place. Disasters, conflicts and wars have robbed countless people of their homes. With financial support from the Sisters of EVE, refugees of all kinds will be transferred to safer systems.

zh: 新伊甸危险重重，每天都有无数人殒命太空。他们没有克隆，也无法享受超远程通讯。对于他们的亲人而言，临终遗物是重要的纪念。EVE姐妹会的慈善项目之一，就是出资把他们的遗物送回家乡。
en: New Eden is a dangerous place. Countless people lose their lives on a daily basis. They cannot enjoy the benefits of cloning or access long-range communication. To their relatives, the belongings they leave behind are the most important way of remembering them. One of the Sisters of EVE's charity projects is to fund the deliveries of such items.

zh: 新伊甸有着许许多多的私人雇佣兵军团，和克隆人飞行员一样，他们中立地为各国提供纠纷“解决”服务。所以军火补给，也常常成为了这些雇佣兵团的重要需求。
en: New Eden has many private mercenary corps. Like Capsuleers, these neutral organizations provide nations with "solutions" to end conflicts. Thus, munitions are usually in high demand among these groups.
The Hitchhiker's Guide to New Eden

zh: 新伊甸的工业基石。依赖其他舰船的保护。如果遭到攻击，则主要以护盾进行防御。
en: The industrial backbone of New Eden. Depend on others to fight for them. Rely on shields if all else fails.

zh: 新伊甸通识知识学习，是一个克隆人飞行员在新伊甸中生存和获取财富的基础能力。
en: Common knowledge taught in New Eden, basic skill required for a Capsuleer to survive and seek fortune in New Eden.

zh: 新加达里是加达里人首都沦陷后建立起的新世界。星门四通八达，工业空间站井然有序。“国家越强大，其治下的人民才会越繁荣富强。”
en: New Caldari is a new world founded after the fall of the Caldari capital. The stargate system here is extensive and the industrial stations are well-organized. "The stronger the nation, the more prosperous and powerful its people will be."
New name is the same as the old one

zh: 新的启示，很快就会降临……
en: A new revelation is not far away...

zh: 无人机A 无人机伤害增效装置
无人机B 无人机伤害增效装置
无人机C 无人机伤害增效装置
无人机X 无人机伤害增效装置
无人机伤害增效装置通过在舰船的无人机或铁骑舰载机通信网络中加入多节点的量子缠绕技术桥接了一个处理器，使得实时的轨迹投射效果比以往更好了，短时间内过载可以使其获得更强的效果。
en: Drone Damage Amplifiers project a multi-node quantum entanglement program onto the ship's drone or fighter communications net, creating a bridged processor link that allows for better real-time trajectory projections. Overheating it can temporarily amplify its effects.

en: Basic principles of Drone technology. Master it to enhance Drones' shield, armor and hull.

zh: 无人机技术的基础学科，掌握后能够提升无人机控制数量与距离。
en: Basic principles of Drone technology. Master it to increase the number of controllable Drones and their range.

zh: 无人机技术的基础学科，掌握后能够提升无人机速度，降低信号半径。
en: Basic principles of Drone technology. Master it to increase the speed of Drones and reduce signature radius.

zh: 无人机控制加强装置 I

en: Drone Control Range Augmentor II Blueprint

en: Drone Control Range Augmentor III Blueprint

无人机离子疾速加农炮岗哨

en: You are attempting to activate a passive module

zh: 无法更换装备，需要在空间站内更换。
en: Cannot change modules. Module change must be carried out in a station.

zh: 无法连接服务器，请检查网络连接
en: Unable to connect to server. Please check your network connection.

zh: 无论是狂热的血袭者还是保守的艾玛人都处于尊重死者的荣誉而没有过问这里，你觉得你能挖出点什么宝贝来么？
en: From the conservative Amarr to the frantic Blood Raider, no one has ever come here and disturbed the peace of the dead. Do you really think whatever's in there is worth all this trouble?

zh: 无论这个建筑当初是以什么目的建立的，现在它都变成了毫无用处的东西。只剩下了几片从爆炸中残留的阵列外壳碎片。
en: Whatever purpose this structure once served, it is utterly useless now. Only a few bits of the array's hull survived the explosion that tore it apart.

zh: 无证经营的思维冲击体育馆

en: Generally utilized in deep space scenarios, Amarr Factory Outposts are structures dedicated to the swift and efficient manufacture of ships and modules. These outposts are most often built, maintained and owned by Capsuleer organizations.

zh: 无锁定目标, 关闭设备
en: No target locked, shutting down modules

zh: 无限创造集团与西顿工业交流时，获得了强击改造技术，并应用在断崖级巡洋舰平台上。
en: Boundless Creation acquired technologies for strike modifications through exchange with CreoDron, and applied them to the Rupture.

zh: 无限创造集团发挥了空前的想象力，改造了长尾鲛级，不过如何获得的技术就不为人知了。
en: Boundless Creation showed an unprecedented amount of imagination in modifying the Thrasher, using technologies of unknown origin.

zh: 无限创造集团成功改造了断崖级，使其综合防御能力大幅提高。
en: Boundless Creation successfully modified the Rupture, greatly improving its defense capabilities.

zh: 既然反复交涉没用的话，我们也只能使用一些武力手段夺回我们自己的财产。
en: Repeated negotiations are useless. We can only use force to regain our property.

zh: 昙花一现的长者舰队重新把失散的七大部族带回了米玛塔尔。然而，仅仅靠盲目模仿盖伦特联邦的民主模式很难让玛塔尔的七个孩子重新如手足一般团结。一条新的道路，等待着米玛塔尔人去开辟。
en: The short-lived Elder Fleet brought the seven tribes back to Minmatar. However, imitating the Gallente Federation's democratic system is not enough to unite the children of Matar as brothers and sisters. The Minmatar need to find a new way.

zh: 星币不足，无法开启制造项目
en: Not enough ISK. Cannot start the job.

zh: 星币是新伊甸中的主要货币，可用于学习技能、市场购买、工业制造等活动。
en: ISK is the main currency of New Eden. You can use ISK for learning skills, purchasing items on the Market, industrial manufacturing, and more.

zh: 星币追加至下一次赏金发放
en: Extra ISK will be issued in the next bounty.

zh: 星形矿业凡晶石收购合同
en: Astral Mining Inc. Veldspar Acquisition Contract

zh: 星形矿业干焦岩收购合同
en: Astral Mining Inc. Pyroxeres Acquisition Contract

zh: 星形矿业灼烧岩收购合同
en: Astral Mining Inc. Scordite Acquisition Contract

zh: 星捷运是一个中立的运输机构，负责在空间站之间往来搭载乘客。眼下正值旅游旺季，星捷运承运能力暂时不足，想雇佣一批克隆飞行员支援一线。
en: InterBus is a freighter company that remains neutral in all aspects. They ferry people to and from stations. They are now short of transportation capacity for the tourist season and are looking for Capsuleers to help them with transportation.

zh: 星捷运的一家子公司遭遇战火，为保证继续运作，需要往{3|station_name:_tr}转移设备。
en: One of the companies under InterBus has been affected by the war, and therefore wants to transfer their facilities to {3|station_name:_tr} in order to keep their operations going.

zh: 星捷运货舰紧急求救委托信标
en: Mission Beacon: InterBus Freighter Stress Call

zh: 星捷运逆向工程成功率
星捷运逆向工程研究速度
星空级巡洋舰用途广泛，可以扮演多种角色，非常适合飞船数量有限的小型军团使用。星空级的设计具有典型的盖伦特特征，它先进的锁定系统使它在近战中具有致命的威力。
en: The Celestis cruiser is a highly versatile ship, making it useful for small corporations with a limited number of ships. True to Gallente style, the Celestis is especially deadly in close-quarters combat due to its advanced targeting systems.

zh: 星空级是均衡平台的代表，度沃勒在其上增加了谐振能量作战功能。
en: The Celestis is a quintessentially well-balanced platform. Duvolle Labs improved upon it by adding energy resonance combat capabilities.

zh: 星舰工程学，主要研究能源转换架构，掌握后全面提升能源参数。
en: Starship engineering discipline that mainly focuses on the research of energy conversion structures. Master it to increase overall energy stats.

zh: 星舰防御升级，主要研究防御系统，掌握后能够提升护盾、装甲、机械组件和结构安全性。
en: Defense upgrade theory that mainly focuses on defensive system research. Master it to enhance shields, armor, mechanical modules, and hull safety.

zh: 是卡拉吉塔集团的文件吗？请送到这儿来。
en: Is it the file from Kalaakiota? Send it here, please.
Are you sure you want to spend {currency:_tr} {currency_type:_tr} to purchase {item_count:_tr}x {item_name:_tr}?

zh: 是否出站并开启自动导航？
是否安全退出游戏？（请确认当前是否处于安全场景）
en: Quit the game now? (make sure you're in a high-security system)

zh: 是否将以上物品投弃到太空中，它们将在你的机库中消失?
en: Jettison the items above into space? They will disappear from your hanger.

zh: 是否将本空间站设为基地？
en: Set this station as your home base?

zh: 是否自动导航至任务地点？
en: Do you want to travel by autopilot to the mission location?

zh: 是否花费 {delivery_fee} 星币，将所选物品将递送至 {station_name:_tr} ？
en: Spend {delivery_fee} ISK and have selected items delivered to {station_name:_tr}?

zh: 是否花费约{skill_point}技能点，加速技能的学习？
en: Spend approx. {skill_point} skill points to accelerate the training of this skill?

zh: 是否花费约{skill_point}技能点，加速队列中所有技能的学习？
en: Spend approx. {skill_point} skill points to accelerate the training of all queued skills.

zh: 是否要交付所有的物流箱子
是否要大约花费{count}技能点，立刻完成学习?
en: Spend about {count} SP to complete the learning immediately?

zh: 是否要大约花费{count}技能点，立刻完成所有学习?
en: Spend about {count} SP to complete all learning tasks immediately?

zh: 是否跟随指挥官解除锁定？
是否跟随指挥官进行锁定？
en: Follow the commander and lock on?

zh: 是否跟随指挥官进行停船？
是否跟随指挥官进行接近？
是否跟随指挥官进行朝向？
是否跟随指挥官进行跃迁？
是否跟随指挥官进行跳跃？
是否返回至登录界面，重新选择飞行员角色？
en: Return to the login screen and select a new pilot?

zh: 是时候展示你的战斗技术了，飞行员。
en: It's time to show off your combat skills, pilot.

zh: 是赛毕斯托还是天使(专家)
是赛毕斯托还是天使(进阶)
是赛毕斯托还是天使委托信标
en: Mission Beacon: Sebiestor or Angel Cartel

zh: 暂无该槽位可用的装备
暂时不能立刻完成该科技
en: Cannot complete the technology immediately now
We can't give it to you yet
We can't give it to you yet.

zh: 暗影天蛇 中型群体装甲维修器
en: Shadow Serpentis Medium Group Armor Repairer

zh: 暗影天蛇 中型装甲维修器
暗影天蛇 中型远程装甲维修器
en: Shadow Serpentis Medium Remote Armor Repairer

zh: 暗影天蛇 停滞缠绕光束
暗影天蛇 反应式装甲增强器
暗影天蛇 大型装甲维修器
暗影天蛇 大型远程装甲维修器
en: Shadow Serpentis Large Remote Armor Repairer

zh: 暗影天蛇 小型群体装甲维修器
en: Shadow Serpentis Small Group Armor Repairer

zh: 暗影天蛇 小型装甲维修器
暗影天蛇 小型远程装甲维修器
en: Shadow Serpentis Small Remote Armor Repairer

zh: 暗影天蛇 惯性稳定器
暗影天蛇 损伤控制
暗影天蛇 灵敏度抑制发射器
暗影天蛇 磁性力场稳定器
暗影天蛇 索敌计算机
暗影天蛇 自适应装甲增强器
暗影天蛇 跃迁扰断器
暗影天蛇 跃迁扰频器
暴乱者 弯刀级训练舰⁴
暴力是最差劲的手段——不过，在处理钱的问题时例外。
en: Violence is the worst – except when money problems arise.

zh: 暴君级是艾玛皇家海军行动的常用飞船，很可能也是星系中最强悍的巡洋舰。它主要用于军事任务，不过在私人用途领域，它有时也被用作重要货运任务的护航舰。
en: Quite possibly the toughest cruiser in the system, the Maller is a common sight in Amarrian Imperial Navy operations. It is mainly used for military duty, although a few can be found in the private sector acting as escort ships for very important dispatches.

zh: 暴君级是艾玛皇家海军行动的常用飞船，很可能也是星系中最强悍的巡洋舰。它主要用于军事任务，不过在私人用途领域，它有时也被用作重要货运任务的护送舰。
en: Quite possibly the toughest cruiser in the galaxy, the Maller is a common sight in Amarrian Imperial Navy operations. It is mainly used for military duty, although a few can be found in the private sector acting as escort ships for very important dispatches.

zh: 暴君阿里特西奥……或许，现在应该叫他先知阿里特西奥了。
en: Aritcio the Tyrant... Perhaps now we should call him Aritcio the Prophet.

zh: 暴风级的攻击力足以让敌军支离破碎，然后像冷寂的太空垃圾到处飘荡。作为一艘适应性强的战舰，它拥有足够多的炮塔安装座，能够发动全面的猛烈炮击，同时也不失灵活地拥有较强的导弹攻击能力。它的航速让敌舰望尘莫及，充足的电容器电容量使它能打赢任何消耗战。
en: The impact of this ship is more than sufficient to leave a trail of shattered enemies floating around like lifeless debris. It is an adaptable vessel, that has enough turret hardpoints for a full-scale assault while remaining versatile enough to allow for plenty of missile fire, and has both sufficient speed to outrun its enemies and sufficient capacitor charge to outlast them.

zh: 更丰富的资源、自由PVP的黑暗森林
en: Valuable resources, free PVP hunting ground

zh: 更可疑的是，安全局都没能发现的秘密基地，居然就这样因为一次暴动暴露了出来。
en: What's more suspicious is that the secret base, which even the Republic Security Services weren't able to find, was quickly exposed because of a riot.

zh: 更多功能开发中，敬请期待
en: More features under development. Stay tuned.

zh: 更新补丁成功，需要重启游戏。
曼多·尼克的惩罚者级飞船
曼尼尔·卡多尔的灾难级飞船
曾经在新伊甸中叱咤风云的一艘工业舰，如今就只剩下这个空心的金属皮了。
en: This hollowed out husk is all that remains of one of New Eden's most impressive industrials.

zh: 曾经在新伊甸中叱咤风云的一艘战列舰，如今就只剩下这个空心的金属皮了。它曾经是战场上的破坏之王，而眼下除了这个在死一般的寂静中慢慢腐朽的坟墓，其他什么都没有了。
en: This hollowed out husk is all that remains of one of New Eden's most impressive battlehips. What was once a battlefield juggernaut has been reduced to nothing but a silent, slowly deteriorating tomb.

zh: 曾经在新伊甸中叱咤风云的一艘战列舰，如今就只剩下这个空心的金属皮了。它曾经是战场上的破坏之王，而眼下除了这个在死一般的寂静中慢慢腐朽的坟墓，其它什么都没有了。
en: This hollowed out husk is all that remains of one of New Eden's most impressive battlehips. What was once a battlefield juggernaut has been reduced to nothing but a silent, slowly deteriorating tomb.

zh:
曾经在新伊甸中叱咤风云的一艘旗舰，如今就只剩下这个空心的金属皮了。



它曾经是战场上的破坏之王，而眼下除了这个在死一般的寂静中慢慢腐朽的坟墓，其它什么都没有了。
en:
This hollowed out husk is all that remains of one of New Eden's most impressive capital ships.

What was once a battlefield juggernaut has been reduced to nothing but a silent, slowly deteriorating tomb.

zh: 曾经在新伊甸中叱咤风云的一艘旗舰，如今就只剩下这个空心的金属皮了。  它曾经是战场上的破坏之王，而眼下除了这个在死一般的寂静中慢慢腐朽的坟墓，其他什么都没有了。
en: This hollowed out husk is all that remains of one of New Eden's most impressive capital ships.  What was once a battlefield juggernaut has been reduced to nothing but a silent, slowly deteriorating tomb.

zh: 曾经在新伊甸中叱咤风云的一艘旗舰，如今就只剩下这个空心的金属皮了。它曾经是战场上的破坏之王，而眼下除了这个在死一般的寂静中慢慢腐朽的坟墓，其他什么都没有。
en: This hollowed out husk is all that remains of one of New Eden's most impressive capital ships. What was once a battlefield juggernaut has been reduced to nothing but a silent, slowly deteriorating tomb.

zh: 曾经属于某个母巢的自由无人机智能体。它现在已被严重损坏，但依然能执行部分功能。它使用全息图像界面进行交流。
en: A rogue drone mind that was once part of a hive. It is severely damaged, but semi-functional. It uses a hologram image interface for communication purposes.

zh: 曾经让人敬畏的空间航行舰船，现在已经变成一堆破铜烂铁。这肯定不是它曾经的舰长所希望的，但是……这就是命运。
en: A proud spacefaring vessel reduced to a pile of generic scrap. Not exactly what the captain was hoping would happen, but that's life for you.

zh: 最后一次探查到他们是在{2|system_name:_tr}，请你立刻前往搜索。
en: The last time we detected them was at {2|system_name:_tr}. Please start the search immediately.

zh: 最后一次见到他是在{2|system_name:_tr}，他可能正和一些穷凶极恶的罪犯在一起。
en: The last time I saw him was at {2|system_name:_tr}. He might be in the company of some nefarious criminals.

zh: 最近在{2|system_name:_tr}工作的船只频繁受到通信干扰，我们认为可能在某个角落被布置了通讯干扰装置。
en: The comms of the working ships in {2|system_name:_tr} are recently and frequently jammed.. We believe that jamming devices may be placed somewhere.

zh: 最近，有一批酷菲的狂热爱好者，成立了一个非法组织，专门针对酷菲集团的仓库和车间实施破坏和抢劫。他们打着“让下一代不再受酷菲的毒害”的奇怪口号，给酷菲集团造成了巨大的损失。
en: Recently, a group of fanatic anti-Quafe activists founded an illegal organization. They've been damaging and robbing Quafe's warehouses and factories, and justifying it with some crazy slogan: "Protect the next generation from the harm of Quafe." Their actions have resulted in a huge loss for Quafe.

zh: 最高戒备级的盖伦特联邦监狱
en: A maximum-security prison block and run by the Gallente Federation.

zh: 有一个代理人居住在这里。任务：难度等级: 7.5 级 警告: 建议工业舰与战舰一起上
en: An agent resides in here. Missions: Difficulty Rating: Grade 7.5 Warning: Industrial and combat ship recommended

zh: 有一些特殊的任务，可能会提供一些物品作为奖励，那些物品会被自动递送至附近的空间站。
en: Some special missions might give you items as rewards. Those items will be automatically delivered to nearby stations.

zh: 有一份加密的商业合同实体原件需要你帮忙递送给三岛集团的人。
en: I need you to deliver an encrypted commercial contract to Hyasyoda.

zh: 有个不知好歹的瘾君子，拿了我们的货以后被耶利集团的安保给抓了。
en: An ungrateful addict was arrested by Ytiri security after taking our cargo.

zh: 有个穷光蛋欠了我们一大笔钱。
en: There's a poor bastard that owes us a lot of money.

zh: 有人向我举报，一些无知的盖伦特人正在{2|system_name:_tr}散播异端言论。
en: It was reported to me that some ignorant Gallenteans are spreading the words of the heretics in {2|system_name:_tr}.

zh: 有人救我们了！太好了！请把我们都接走吧！
en: Someone's here to save us! Great! Please, take us all with you!

zh: 有什么不敢说的，我萨拉姆家族难道还保护不了一个说实话的人？
en: Why are you so afraid of speaking the truth? Do you assume that the Sarum Family is not capable of protecting someone who is willing to tell the truth?

zh:
有毒金属从重金属中分离出来，没有任何生物学功能，而且对大多数的生物都是有害的。

可以从下列类型的行星开采获得：
贫瘠行星
海洋行星
风暴行星
en:
Derived from heavy metals, toxic metals are those that have no biological function and are in fact poisonous to most living creatures.

Can be obtained by mining the following types of planets:
Barren Planet
Oceanic Planet
Storm Planet

zh: 有缠绕光束、武器扰断器和标记装置等多种类型，从各方面降低目标舰船性能。
en: Contains Stasis Webifier, Weapon Disruptor, and Target Painter among other modules. Can weaken the target ship in a variety of ways.

zh: 有缺陷的萨沙塔台哨站 II
服务器将于%s开启, 请稍候
en: The server will be open on %s. Please wait patiently.

zh: 服务器暂未开启，开服时间预计为 %s
en: Server not yet available. Estimated opening time %s
Please wait while server maintenance is completed

zh: 望真神宽恕，今天真是糟糕透了，一个满口疯言疯语的家伙在{2|system_name:_tr}广播一些不堪入耳的流言。
en: May the one true God forgive us. Today is awful. A guy who talks crazy was broadcasting unspeakable rumors in {2|system_name:_tr}.

zh: 望眼欲穿，这些救命的药终于来了！
en: The medicine is here! We've been waiting for so long!

zh: 望远镜从它巨大的透明圆顶望向宇宙黑暗的深处。塔洛迦观测圆顶看上去非常的显眼，只是现在已经是人去楼空。
en: Large windows and telescoping turrets peer out into the surrounding darkness. The Talocan observation dome always appears to be staring, despite the absence of its original occupants.
Looking forward to our next cooperation!

zh: 未到达指定星系#cFDD07A {solar_system_name:_tr} #n，无法获取任务位标
en: Failed to reach the specified system #cFDD07A{solar_system_name:_tr}#n. Failed to obtain mission bookmark.
You haven't joined any Corporation yet

zh: 未找到产品交付仓库，是否将产品放入个人物品机库中？
en: Delivery warehouse not found. Put the product in personal item hangar instead?

zh: 未找到可用路点，自动导航结束
未校准的恒星射线能量终端
本介绍任务偶尔会出现在平台上，那是为其他新飞行员准备的，请您忽视它们即可。
en: This introduction mission will occasionally appear on the platform. Please ignore it, as it is intended for other new pilots.

zh: 本任务需要前往低安全等级地区完成，可能会遭到其他玩家的攻击，是否接受任务？
en: This mission requires you to go to a low-security region where other players can attack you. Are you sure you want to accept the mission?

zh: 本周购买该商品已达上限
en: You've reached this week's purchase limit for this item

zh: 本地古斯塔斯备份服务器
本地古斯塔斯救生设施
本地古斯塔斯数据终端
本地古斯塔斯生产基地
本地古斯塔斯病毒测试点
本地空间现象可能会对你的舰船系统造成影响。
en: Local spatial phenomena may cause strange effects on your ship systems.

zh: 本地血袭者备份服务器
本地血袭者病毒测试点
en: Local Blood Raider Virus Test Site

zh: 本星域没有一级空间站
en: No ITC found in this region

zh: 本星域没有匹配的空间站
en: No matching station in the region

zh: 本星域没有合适的买家，本条订单不会立即交易
en: No suitable buyers in this region. The order will not be completed immediately.

zh: 本来这些事情应该我们亲自完成，不过现在舰队上下谁也不愿跑腿，拜托你了，克隆人。
en: Usually we take care of these things ourselves, but now no one in the fleet is willing to run the errands, so we must trouble you, Capsuleer.

zh: 本次旅行的目的地是加达里合众国。
en: The destination of this tour is the Caldari State.

zh: 本次旅行的目的地是四大帝国中最古老的艾玛帝国。
en: The destination of this tour is the Amarr Empire, the oldest of the four nations.

zh: 本次旅行的目的地是盖伦特联邦。
en: The destination of this tour is the Gallente Federation.

zh: 本次旅行的目的地是米玛塔尔共和国。
en: The destination of this tour is the Minmatar Republic.

zh: 本环节不支持自动前往，请根据任务要求完成任务。
en: This segment doesn't support auto navigation. Please complete the mission in line with the requirements.
No unclaimed rewards in this message

zh: 朱瓦尔·萨许的旅行者级飞船
机舱内暂无备用无人机
en: There are no backup drones in the cabin

zh: 杀鸡儆猴这招真是屡试不爽，真神保佑，今年又能有一场精彩的决斗了。
en: Sending a warning by making a kill always works. May the one true God bless us. We will have a spectacular duel this year.

zh: 材料不足, 无法开启制造项目
en: Not enough materials. Cannot start the job.

zh: 杜厦的工人们都是真正敢于冒险的艾玛人！
en: The workers of Ducia Foundry are truly adventurous Amarr!

zh: 杜厦铸造作为疆域广大的艾玛帝国的一员，没有局限于享受已有的资源。在资源充裕的情况下，他们依旧热爱探险，深入最危险的矿区寻找富矿。杜厦铸造长期向愿意为帝国出力的克隆人矿工提供矿石收购合同。
en: Though a member of the vast Amarr Empire, Ducia Foundry do not content themselves with enjoying their current resources. Though these are abundant, they still have a thirst for adventure and go deep into the most dangerous mining areas to find rich ores. For a long time, Ducia Foundry has been offering ore acquisition orders to Capsuleer miners who are willing to contribute to the State.

zh: 杜厦铸造凡晶石收购合同
杜厦铸造干焦岩收购合同
杜厦铸造是少数几个在边境以外寻找商机的艾玛公司之一，在危险地区作业的代价就是舰队的护航也显得比较困难。
en: Ducia Foundry is one of the few Amarr companies looking for business opportunities beyond the Empire's borders. But operating in hazardous spaces comes at a cost: the difficulty of escorting the fleet becomes much greater.

zh: 杜厦铸造灼烧岩收购合同
杜厦铸造船队遇袭(专家)
杜厦铸造船队遇袭(进阶)
杜厦铸造船队遇袭委托信标
en: Mission Beacon: Attack on Ducia Foundry Fleet

zh: 条件不足，无法开启项目
en: Requirement not met, cannot start the job

zh: 来人！快拦住她，她要自杀！她是克隆人！
en: Somebody stops her! She's trying to kill herself! She's a Capsuleer!

zh: 来啦，来啦，刚出锅的烧肉！
来得正好！电池眼看就要空仓了。
en: You came at the right time! We're running out of battery here.
Here, give me the relics and we're done.

zh: 杰瑞米·塔克的银鹰级飞船
杰瑞米的生活曾一直局限在一颗蓝色小星球上，但有进取心且年轻的他在小时候就认定，星辰才是他命运的归宿。现在的杰瑞米已经摆脱星球生活的束缚，自由翱翔在宇宙的广阔天地，为适当的人提供援助。
en: Once bound within the confines of a tiny blue planet, enterprising young Jeremy Tacs decided at a tender age that his destiny lay between the stars. Having shed the limitations of his planetbound life, he now glides through celestial heavens, lending a hand of help to those proving themselves worthy.

zh: 枯河小队占用这个仓库进行可疑的活动。它被一些小队成员守卫着。
en: Warehouse used by the Dry River gang for unknown purposes. It is guarded by several gang members.

zh: 某个对自己能力过于自信的倒霉海盗的遗物。一些破解技术应该就够打开它。
en: Leftovers from some unfortunate pirate overconfidant in his abilities. A bit of hacking might unlock it.

zh: 某个年轻伯爵的DNA残余物。
en: DNA remains from some young count.

zh: 查利特·利须的巴戈龙级飞船
柯埃佐家族截获了一条关于血袭者血祭活动的重要情报，如果能在血祭活动现场将血袭者一网打尽，那么柯埃佐家族领内的血袭者必将遭到重创。
en: The Kor-Azor Family intercepted an important piece of information about the Blood Raiders' Rites of Blood. If we can eliminate all the Blood Raiders present during the Rites, the Blood Raiders in the Kor-Azor family's territories will suffer a terrible loss.

zh: 柯埃佐家族的小公主最近应该快过生日了，我们必须准备一些好礼物给她。
en: The Kor-Azor family's little princess is celebrating her birthday soon. We must prepare some good gifts for her.

zh: 标准电磁装甲附甲的加强版本。使用了先进的磁场发生器来增强纳米技术附甲的完整性。
en: An enhanced version of the standard EM armor plating. Uses advanced magnetic field generators to strengthen the Nanobot Plating integrity.

zh: 标准货柜集装箱，用于运输普通货物。
en: A standard cargo container, used for common freight.
Establishing the Authority of the Church
Establishing the Authority of the Church (Expert)
Establishing the Authority of the Church (Advanced)

zh: 树立教廷权威委托信标
en: Mission Beacon: Establishing the Authority of the Church

zh: 校准的恒星射线能量终端
核心天蛇集团运作中心
核心局面成功逆向工程了卡尼迪人的技术，最终制造找出了挑战级平台下的谐振能量作战船只。
en: Core Complexion successfully reverse-engineered Khanid technologies and used them to build an energy resonance combat vessel based on the Bellicose model.

zh: 核心防御力场扩张装置 I
核心防御力场扩张装置 II
核心防御力场扩张装置 III

en: According to Serpentis intelligence, this outpost is the hiding spot for Wolf Burgan. According to your intelligence, this is where Wolf Burgan loaded an unhealthy amount of explosives.

zh: 欢迎使用视角传媒代理委托平台，在这里，你可以领取并尝试完成各种各样的任务。这是一个简单的实习任务，用于给新舰长学习和了解委托平台的基本知识。
en: Welcome to the Scope, a platform for mission requests. Here, you can claim and attempt a series of missions. This is an easy practice mission for new captains to learn the basics of using the mission platform.

zh: 欢迎各位旅客朋友！ 一路辛苦，我已经恭候多时啦！
en: Welcome, travelers! I've been expecting you!

zh: 欢迎来到联邦首都，一位联邦政治家曾说过：“联邦不是一个对空间、星球、山峦、河流或树木的定义区域。它是一种视野。”
en: Welcome to the capital of the Federation. A famous politician once said "The Federation is not a particular area of space, a set of planets, mountains, rivers, or woods. It is a vision."

en: This construction recharges the shields on ships within range.

zh: 此操作会导致教程任务中断，确定进行此操作吗？
en: This action will suspend tutorial missions. Do you wish to proceed?

en: No available ship in this station

en: The module is disabled. It can be dismantled and reactivated after entering the station.

zh: 武器正在工作，无法取消编组。是否将武器停止工作并取消编组？
en: Weapon in use. Cannot cancel grouping. Stop the weapon and cancel grouping?

zh: 武装人员所需要的运输空间可能比你想象中的要大一点，朋友。
en: The military might need more room for transportation than you expected, friend.

zh: 死亡漩涡级强袭型蓝图
隐匿空间复合体内的障壁不仅起到了私人运输通道的作用，而且还是建筑间的加固管道，确保较大的建筑不会彼此漂离。
en: Walls inside deadspace complexes both serve as personal transportation lanes between structures, as well as reinforcement tubes to make sure larger structures don't drift away from each other.

zh: 隐匿空间复合体内的障壁不仅起到了私人运输通道的作用，而且还是建筑间的加固管道，确保较大的建筑不会彼此漂离。它们的另一作用是在不同建筑间传送气体或液体。
en: Walls inside deadspace complexes both serve as personal transportation lanes between structures, as well as reinforcement tubes to make sure larger structures don't drift away from each other. They are also commonly used to transport liquid or gas between structures.

zh: 死神号轻型护卫舰是最小的米玛塔尔护卫舰之一，刚好超过有人舰载机级别，达到新手船标准。死神号很便宜，被米玛塔尔黑白两道在危险的游击行动中大量使用。
en: The Reaper-class corvette is one of the smallest Minmatar frigate vessels. It just barely meets rookie ship standard instead of being a manned carrier-based spacecraft. The Reaper is very cheap and is used en masse in daring hit-and-run operations by Minmatar on either side of the law.

每一个加达里儿童，都会被他父母所在的公司全权抚养。虽然异株湖集团是一个完全的研究型集团，但他们依然希望自己的孩子能更早的接触到真实的太空战斗。
en: All children in Caldari are raised by the companies of their parents. Although Ishukone is purely a research corporation, they still want their children to become familiar with real space battles as early as possible.

zh: 每个恒星都有自己的生命周期，恒星风暴发生时，会对该星系的电力供应产生极大影响。{2|station_name:_tr}的恒星即将爆发大风暴，辐射区域内的居民都在囤积电池，一时供不应求。
en: Each star has its own life cycle. When a star storm is formed, it severely affects the power supply of the system. A storm is forming on a star near {2|station_name:_tr}. Residents within the radiation zone are hoarding batteries, causing battery supplies to run low.

zh: 每个艾玛人都知道，女皇对你们塔什蒙贡信赖有加，动摇女皇对你们有什么好处？
en: It's well known that you, the Tash-Murkon family, are trusted by the Empress. Why would you want to betray her trust?

zh:
每个行星上面都储藏有种类丰富的工业原材料，这些材料被统称为行星材料。
打开行星开采界面，根据自身所需材料找到资源丰富的行星，在其上放置开发阵列并设置好资源类型即可进行开采。
每隔一段时间，都需要将开采出的行星材料发射至太空中，并驾驶容量足够的舰船将材料运送至空间站。
en:
Every planet has a rich repository of industrial raw materials known as Planetary Materials.
Open the Resource Extraction page, find the planet with your desired resource(s), place a development array, and set the resource type to start mining.
You'll need to eject the extracted planetary materials into space every once in a while and send them to a station using a ship with sufficient cargo capacity.

zh: 每天都有无数人殒命太空，他们没有克隆，也无法享受超远程通讯。
en: Countless lives are lost in space every day. Most of the victims are not Capsuleers and don't enjoy the privilege of using FTL communication.

zh: 毒蝎级船体的上半部分
毒蝎级船体的下半部分
比特尼克 小型远程装甲维修器
比赛规则很简单——用你喜欢的方式炸掉对手的舰船。
en: There's just one rule – blow up your opponent's ship any way you like.

zh: 毕竟联邦内没有公司能直接生产那种配料……
en: After all, no corporations in the Federation can directly manufacture that ingredient...

zh: 毛鲁斯级是一种高科技战舰，专门用于电子战。由于针对感应抑阻技术进行过最优化处理，因此它在舰队战中的价值尤为突出。
en: The Maulus is a high-tech vessel, specializing in electronic warfare. It is particularly valuable in fleet battles due to the optimization of its sensor-dampening technology.

zh: 毛鲁斯级是一种高科技战舰，专门用于远程作战。
en: The Maulus is a high-tech vessel specializing in long-range combat.

zh: 毛鲁斯级电子战型蓝图
民团 自适应全能力场
民用 中型护盾回充增量器
民用 中型装甲维修器
民用 反应式护盾力场
民用 反应式装甲增强器
民用 大型护盾回充增量器
民用 大型装甲维修器
民用 小型护盾回充增量器
民用 小型装甲维修器
气体行星的特点是它们拥有厚实、浑浊的上层大气，通常都是由氢或氦这样的轻元素构成。简单的化合物就能引起明显的色彩和光影变化。上升气流与快速运动的气压带使得行星表面可能呈现出各种样貌。而在云层之下，气体行星的内核形态拥有同样复杂的多样性，没有两颗是相同的。
en: Gas planets are characterized by a deep, opaque upper atmosphere, usually composed primarily of light elements such as hydrogen or helium. Simple chemicals can add a range of hues and shades in the visual spectrum, and the interaction between upwellings and rapidly circulating pressure bands result in a huge variety of visible surface structures. A similar level of diversity can be found beneath the cloud-tops: the inner composition of a given gas planet might belong to any one of a dozen broad groups, with no two planets entirely alike in this regard.

zh: 氢电池已经变成了工业和民用领域中的国际标准，这在空间站这样的远离地面的人类生活区是非常常见的。
en: The use of hydrogen batteries has become an international standard both in industry and in the public domain; they are a particularly common power supply in off-world habitats such as space stations.

zh:
氧化氘，俗称重水，是具有重要原子属性的水，因此在各型能源反应堆中都是性能很好的中子缓和剂。

可以从下列类型的行星开采获得：
温和行星
海洋行星
en:
Dideuterium oxide. Water with significant nuclear properties which make it extremely effective as a neutron moderator in various types of power reactors.

Can be obtained by mining the following types of planets:
Temperate Planet
Oceanic Planet

zh: 水是人类生存必不可少的基本元素之一。这种化合物的储备在许多地方都相对稀缺，因此必须要靠星际飞船运送才能满足供应。
en: Water is one of the basic elements necessary for human survival. Most worlds have this compound in relatively short supply and hence must rely on starship freight.
We can't give you the water just yet

zh: 求求你，飞行员，你刚刚才见过那个人，如果是你的话一定能很快把他追回来。
en: I beg you, pilot. You've seen that guy. I'm sure you can bring him back.

zh: 沙切尔 回转稳定器
沙弗拉·古利埃斯的战鹰级飞船
没了一个卡罗拉，还会有第二个，但是我要是没了工作……
en: With Carola gone, someone's going to take her place. But if I lose my job...

zh: 没人喜欢在跃迁时被力场拦截下来，随后某艘暴君级被阿荻沙波家族成功改进为拦截型，现在痛哭的人更多了，因为不能跃迁的宇宙是悲伤的，不过开启力场的飞行员可能不这么认为。
en: No one likes being stopped by a force field while trying to warp. After the Ardishapur modified the Maller into an Interdictor ship, warping away from combat has become much more difficult. This is sad news for many – though not for the pilots behind the force field controls.

zh: 没人知道米玛塔尔如何获取这些技术的，挑战级应运而生，隐身和导弹的完美结合。
en: How Minmatar acquired these technologies remains a secret. The direct result of these new technologies is the Bellicose, a vessel that perfectly combines cloaking capabilities with missile systems.

zh: 没关系，不用太着急，他死不了。
en: It's okay, don't worry too much, he won't die.

zh: 没有什么比和克隆人飞行员一起进行星际旅行更快乐的事情了。我们将一起走过加达里合众国境内的几个重要地点，感受这个由巨型企业组成的老牌工业国家的厚重与沉稳。请准备好一台神经碰撞游戏机，这趟旅程可能会花点时间。
en: Nothing beats an interstellar tour with a Capsuleer. We'll be visiting several important locations within the Caldari State to experience this industrial state's stolid, dignified culture, shaped by its multiple megacorporations. Please prepare a Mind Clash machine, since it'll take us a while to complete the journey.

zh: 没有什么比和克隆人飞行员一起进行星际旅行更快乐的事情了。我们将一起走过盖伦特联邦境内的几个重要地点，在奢靡的大都市之间彻夜狂欢。请准备好一罐酷菲，这趟旅程可能会花点时间。
en: Nothing beats an interstellar tour with a Capsuleer. We'll be visiting several important locations within the Gallente Federation and partying all night in its extravagant cities. Please prepare a can of Quafe, since it'll take us a while to complete the journey.

zh: 没有什么比和克隆人飞行员一起进行星际旅行更快乐的事情了。我们将一起走过米玛塔尔共和国境内的几个重要地点，在这个自然而又狂野的世界尽情的呼吸。可以试试纹一个米玛塔尔的刺青，这趟旅程可能会花点时间。
en: Nothing beats an interstellar tour with a Capsuleer. We'll be visiting several important locations within the Minmatar Republic to enjoy the atmosphere of this wild, natural world. You might want to try getting a Minmatar tattoo, since it'll take us a while to complete the journey.

zh: 没有什么比和克隆人飞行员一起进行星际旅行更快乐的事情了。我们将一起走过艾玛帝国境内的几个重要地点，感受这个古老而又神秘的神权国家的特殊魅力。请准备好一本艾玛真神的圣典，这趟旅程可能会花点时间。
en: Nothing beats an interstellar tour with a Capsuleer. We'll be visiting several important locations within the Amarr Empire to experience the unique charm of this ancient and mysterious nation. Please prepare a copy of the Scriptures, since it'll take us a while to complete the journey.

zh: 没有任何线索告诉大家这是个什么东西，现在姑且就把它当作是一堆垃圾。
en: There's no telling what this used to be; now though it's definitely scrap

zh: 装配方案应用失败，物品机库中没有任何装备,
en: Failed to equip fitting. No modules found in Item Hangar.

zh: 没有任何装备，方案应用失败
en: Failed to equip fitting: no modules

zh: 没有办法得到准确信息……不过，我觉得这两个信标您应该感兴趣。
en: I couldn't get accurate info... But these two beacons should interest you.

zh: 没有可使用的蓝图，无法开启制造项目
en: No available Blueprints. Cannot start the job.

zh: 没有查找到匹配的物品
没有比一边吃炸鸡一边喝酷菲更爽的事情了。
en: There is nothing better than eating fried chicken while drinking Quafe.

zh: 没有疫苗，你真是浪费时间。
en: Without a vaccine, you're just wasting our time.

zh: 没有目标, 无法切换攻击
en: No available target, cannot switch to attack mode.

zh: 没有目标，无法使用该装备
en: No available target, cannot activate the module

zh: 没有种子啊？你别欺负穷人啊，没有就是没有。
en: No seeds? Don't bully the poor. No is no.

zh: 没有符合条件的装配方案
没有能够发现卡拉吉塔集团所期待的那个间谍信号，但是深空之中却有一个奇妙的波动一闪而过——仿佛一颗跳动的流星，华丽却又迅速地湮灭在了夜空之中。
en: I couldn't find the spy signal Kalaakiota was expecting. But there was a curious ripple of light, brief and beautiful, like the flash of a distant meteor.

zh: 没用的工具和垃圾没有区别，嗯，就是这个道理。
en: There is no difference between useless tools and garbage. That's the truth.

zh: 法拉克·卡里的凝血级飞船
法撒拉·纳扎鲁特的切割机级飞船
法芙娜祭司……这里面确实有她的批文。
en: Priestess Fafna... Indeed, there is a letter of approval from her.

zh: 泛星船运专用航道(专家)
泛星船运专用航道(进阶)
泛星船运专用航道委托信标
en: Mission Beacon: Exclusive TransStellar Shipping Route

zh: 泛星船运作为EVE世界最大的船运公司，在各地提供便宜可靠的服务，其中包括生鲜食品的极速运输。事不凑巧，他们的一艘运货船出了机械故障，仓库里的冷藏植物种子眼看就要腐坏了……
en: The largest shipping company in the world, TransStellar Shipping offers a cheap and reliable service, including express transportation of fresh food. Unfortunately, one of their cargo ships has had a mechanical failure. The frozen plant seeds stored in the warehouse are about to be spoiled...

zh: 泛星船运拥有全新伊甸第二的物流网络，但是却没有全新伊甸第二的护航体系。在危险的边境星域，没有跳跃引擎的货运船是非常危险的。
en: TransStellar Shipping has the second-best logistics network in New Eden. But their escort system isn't as good. In dangerous bordering regions, cargo-haulers will face grave danger if they don't have warping engines.

zh: 泛星船运是仅次于星捷运的第二大船运公司，它的业务遍及整个联邦，那些贪婪的强盗不止一次地想要从泛星船运身上捞油水……
en: TransStellar Shipping is the second largest shipping company after InterBus. Its operations span the entire Federation. Greedy bandits often want to take something from them...

zh: 泛星船运紧急救援(专家)
泛星船运紧急救援(进阶)
泛星船运紧急救援委托信标
en: Mission Beacon: TransStellar Shipping Emergency Rescue

zh: 波斯矿业需要您将工人从核辐射威胁中解救出来，运送到他们安排好的安全星域。
en: The Poksu Mineral Group need you to rescue their workers from the radiation threat and take them to a safe point they've prepared.

zh: 波玛希·玛哈的秃鹫级飞船
注意自我保护 谨防受骗上当
注意！前行三点钟方向有无人机出现，战舰处于实在的危险中！
en: Alert! An unidentified drone is closing in on your position from 3 o'clock! Your existence is threatened!

zh: 注意：对电容器电量值比你更低的目标没有效果。
en: Note: Ineffective against targets whose capacitor charge is lower than yours.

zh: 洛尔尼亚·欧马尔的堡垒
活跃的市场经济让盖伦特的每一天都有人变成富豪，也有人变成穷光蛋。如果追讨债务的工作全都落到银行和政府身上，那么恐怕把所有银行职员都累死也忙不过来。
en: Gallente's dynamic market economy creates new tycoons and new beggars every day. If debt recovery work was to fall entirely to the banks and the government, I don't think it could all get done even by working every single bank clerk to exhaustion.

zh: 派特里基亚·劳瑞得是共和大学进化遗传学方面的专家。她被认为是领域内的顶尖科学家之一，她早期的成就包括开创了对图鲁克综合症的革命性的基因疗法——这是一种基因序列紊乱的病症，会导致劳工后裔的布鲁特人生长出多余的骨头。那些劳工当年在高重力行星上卖苦力。不过，在过去的两年中，她一直致力于抗神经病毒病毒的研究。
en: Patrikia Noirild is a Professor of Evolutionary Genetics at Republic University. Regarded as one of the foremost minds in her field, her early achievements include pioneering a revolutionary gene therapy for Toluuk's Syndrome - a genetic disorder that causes excess bone growth in Brutor descended from slaves bred to work on high-gravity worlds. For the last two years, however, she has worked in the field of anti-vitoxin research.

zh: 派特里基亚·劳瑞得的死神号飞船
海关局查获了一艘运有大量违禁货品的货船，但没想到驾驶员暴力抗法。
en: Customs seized a cargo ship carrying a large number of contraband goods. But to their surprise, the pilot violently resisted capture.

zh: 海尔莱塔·夏卡诺的大鸨级飞船
海洋行星是一种类地行星，不过它们的表面完全被液体所覆盖，通常液体种类是我们熟知的水。尽管液态的星球表面非常的平滑，但是下层的固体洋底却有显著的地貌变化和差异。正也是这种次表面的不规则性导致了复杂气候系统的形成，否则其气候特征将会较为单一。
en: Oceanic worlds are a class of terrestrial world covered entirely by liquids, usually in the form of mundane water. While the liquid surface is exceptionally smooth, the ocean floor on most worlds of this type exhibits significant topographic variety. It is this subsurface irregularity which causes the formation of complex weather systems, which would otherwise revert to more uniform patterns.

zh: 海燕级是唯一一艘合众国生产却是由第三方设计的太空战舰。尽管众说纷纭，但设计者的身份在合众国内至今仍属高度机密。
en: The Cormorant is the only ship manufactured by the Caldari State that was designed by a third party. Despite all the hypotheses surrounding it, the designer's identity is still highly confidential.

zh: 海燕级是唯一一艘合众国生产却是由第三方设计的太空战舰。尽管流言四起，但设计者的身份在合众国内至今仍属高度机密。
en: The Cormorant is the only State-produced space vessel whose design has come from a third party. Rumors abound, of course, but the designer's identity has remained a tightly-kept secret in the State's inner circle.

zh: 海盗将他们抓来的人及其他证据放在这里，之后这些人及证据将被抛入酸雨云中。
en: This is where the pirates keep their hostages and other evidence while they wait to be disposed of in the acid cloud.

zh: 海盗的妄想等级3气体贮藏站
en: Gas/Storage Silo - Pirate Extravaganza lvl 3_ MISSION

zh: 海纳拉·韦恩的斯雷普尼级飞船
涅鲁斯级最初是伊特龙级的衍生版本，不仅快速，而且可靠。由于价格低廉且具有无数种装配可能性，它广受新伊甸居民和武装人员的喜爱。尽管它快速且结实，但是在敌对领地中进行运输任务的话最好还是配备支护航队。
en: Originally designed as an upgrade of the Iteron, this new iteration of an old stalwart is fast and reliable. In New Eden, the Nereus is equally popular among civilians and the military due to its low price and capacity for being outfitted in myriad different ways. Despite its speed and resilience, it may require a bodyguard squad in particularly unfriendly territories.

深空交战中，越来越多的战斗者希望自己不被发现，且可以远距离攻击视野内的目标，凝聚会改良了龙骑兵级的武器系统，使其射程大大加强。
en: More and more pilots prefer striking their targets from afar without being discovered. That's why Carthum Conglomerate modified the Dragoon, giving it an impressive range.

zh: 混乱的治安一直是共和国的一块心病。这不，{2|station_name:_tr}又爆发了一起民众骚乱，当地警员人手不足。共和安全局正在征募一名飞行员协助他们进行警员运输工作。
en: Poor security has always been an issue for the Republic. More civil chaos has broken out in {2|station_name:_tr}. The local police are understaffed. The Republic Security Services are looking for a pilot to assist them with transportation.

zh:
渡鸦级继承了加达里完善的设计哲学——用数字说话，并能够把这种理念明确地传达给敌人。这不仅见于和平谈判中，还体现在无情的战场上——没有人怀疑加达里精神力量的强大，只要有人打出了第一击，紧随其后的就是枪林弹雨。

因此，渡鸦级既不使用炮弹，也不使用激光来招待敌人。相反，它的导弹打击强大而有力，坚定且迅速，让敌人感受到死亡将临的气息。
en:
The Corax adheres to the well-established Caldari design philosophy of strength in numbers and the principle that messages sent to an enemy should be strong and unequivocal. This applies just as much to peace talks as it does to actual engagements on the battlefield – there should be no doubt about the strength of Caldari spirit, nor about the fact that when one blow has been struck, others are bound to follow.

As such, the Corax does not pepper its opponents with pellets from a gun, nor does it toast them with continuous beams of light. Instead, it delivers strong, hard-hitting payloads at a pace that's not only steady, but rapid enough to rock its targets and knock them off-balance.

然而，他们最近的行动也变得越来越奇怪，似乎不再单纯为了掠夺财富而行动。
en: However, their behavior has grown stranger and stranger recently, as if they are acting in pursuit of something more than just plunder.

zh: 然而，背信弃义的行为使得内凡达人和其他米玛塔尔部族留下了永远的芥蒂……噢，数据解析完成了。
en: However, their betrayal has left an everlasting grudge between Nefantar and Minmatar... Oh. The analysis is finished.

zh: 熟练而又迅速，做得不错，年轻人。
en: Skilled and fast! Well done, young one.

zh: 爆发级原本的缺陷在核心局面技术人员的改造下，成为了不错的维修平台。
en: Since its original flaws were fixed by Core Complexion Engineers, the Burst has become a better maintenance platform.

爵士阁下，和平年代没有英雄——只有金钱和权力。
en: Lord Sarum, there are no heroes in peacetime – only money and power.

zh: 物品已递送至贸易中心{station_name:_tr}
en: Items have been delivered to ITC {station_name:_tr}

zh: 物品已由星捷运寄送到最近的星际贸易中心,请前往查看
en: Items have been delivered to the nearest Interstellar Trading Center via InterBus. Please check.

zh: 物品所在星域没有星际贸易中心
en: The region the items are held does not have an Interstellar Trading Center

zh: 物资争夺事件委托信标
特克拉沃的断崖级飞船
特别提醒：初次前往低安全等级地区不要驾驶过于昂贵的舰船——你很有可能在PVP战斗中失去它
en: Warning: Don`t fly an expensive ship on your first adventure to the low-sec region, you will lose it easily in a PVP combat.

zh: 特居·欧斯尼的大鸨级飞船
特斯托·宁茨的小鹰级飞船
特维斯·雅克的埃比斯级
犯罪分子已被顺利清除，联邦政府感谢您的协助！
en: All criminals have been eradicated. The Federal Administration appreciates your assistance!

zh: 狂怒者级是一艘强大的战舰，也适合扮演其它多种角色。狂怒者级在侦查可能潜伏着敌人的空域时尤其有效，因为它可以长时间工作而不必返回基地去补给。此外，它有极佳的自卫能力，足以抵挡敌人的集中攻击。
en: The Vexor is a strong combat ship that is also geared to operate in a variety of other roles. The Vexor is especially useful for carrying out surveillance in potentially hostile sectors, as it can stay on duty for a very long time before having to return to base. Furthermore, it is well capable of defending itself against even concentrated attacks.

zh: 狂怒者级海军型巡洋舰原本被设计为搭载高科技的舰载设备并需要技术非常精湛的人来操作。但最后联邦海军决定取消那些复杂的设计，而只是简单地增强狂怒者级的装甲、护盾、结构和无人机槽。其结果就是：一个可怕的战争怪物。
en: The Navy Issue edition of the Vexor cruiser was originally designed with highly advanced equipment on board, which would require a very experienced crew to operate. However, the original proposal was dropped in favor of a much simpler solution: thicker armor, better shields, and an enhanced hull and drone bay. The result is a monster of a combat cruiser that is capable of trading blows with any enemies of freedom across the New Eden cluster.

zh: 狂暴级战列舰是共和舰队的重要舰船之一。作为多用途的武装炮舰，它擅长远程炮击，并且能有效造成特种伤害。实践一次次证明，一支实力全面的狂暴级飞船中队是个在舰队战中可以翻盘的不确定因素，如果对手忽视它们，将使自己陷入极其危险的境地。
en: The Tempest is one of the Republic Fleet's key vessels; a versatile gunship proficient at long-range bombardment and capable of dishing out specialized types of damage with great effectiveness.

zh: 狂暴级战列舰是共和舰队的重要舰船之一。作为多用途的武装炮舰，它擅长远程炮击，并且能有效造成特种伤害。实践一次次证明，一支实力全面的狂暴级飞船中队是会战中可以翻盘的不确定因素，如果对手忽视它们，将使自己陷入极其危险的境地。
en: The Tempest is one of the Republic Fleet's key vessels; a versatile gunship proficient at long-range bombardment and capable of dishing out specialized types of damage with great effectiveness. A well-rounded squadron of Tempests has been proven time and time again to be an invaluable wild card in a fleet battle, one which opponents should ignore at their own peril.

zh: 狂钻集团很多不知情的人听到矿钻集团的名字，会以为它和大多数的矿业公司没什么不同。而实际上，矿钻集团是以炸药起家的军工企业。攻击矿钻集团的罪犯，可能低估了他们的自卫武装。
en: Minedrill. Many unwitting people believe Minedrill is no different from most mining corporations when they hear the name. In fact, Minedrill is a military enterprise that began life as an explosives manufacturer. Criminals who attack Minedrill have probably underestimated the corporation's defensive forces.

zh: 狐鼬级是著名的獾级工业舰的最新版本，主要被军方或超级集团用来运输贵重商品。狐鼬级具有超大的货舱容量，是运载大量货物的理想选择。
en: The Tayra is an alternative version of the famous Badger, it's mostly used by the military or the mega corps for transports of goods of great value. The Tayra has a much larger cargo capacity, making it ideal for high volume hauling.

zh: 狐鼬级能够达到加达里工程师所能实现的最大运载能力。
en: The Tayra has the highest carrying capacity that Caldari engineers could manage to give a ship.

zh: 狞獾级海军型的诞生是为了应付加达里境内日益增加的海盗入侵者，而它们在这一任务中确实表现极为出色。它那经过强化的防御能力以及装备升级潜力，使其在防御国土的任务中发挥着越来越大的作用。
en: Designed specifically to counter the ever-increasing numbers of pirate invaders in Caldari territories, the Navy Issue Caracal has performed admirably in its task. Sporting added defensive capabilities as well as increased outfitting potential, it is seeing ever greater use as a defender of the homeland.

zh: 狞獾级精于导弹技术，拥有强大的战斗力。它的护盾防御非常优秀，然而装甲却相当脆弱。当它的导弹储备充足时，消灭任何敌人都只是小菜一碟。
en: The Caracal is a powerful vessel that specializes in missile deployment. It has excellent shield defenses, but poor armor plating. Its missile arsenal, when fully stocked, is capable of making mincemeat of almost anyone.

zh: 狭窄的管道和输电线路缠绕在这座哨站的管道中。这座链接建筑物中近半数的电子管脉已经年久失修，但是它的聚铁外壳依然牢固地保护着它们。
en: Narrow tubes and electrical wiring fill the outpost conduit. Equal parts electrical artery and linking structure, the interior of this connecting structure is in disrepair, but it's polyferrous hull keeps the ravages of space and time at bay.

zh: 狮鹫级常被加达里海军用作战斗中队的支援舰船，它出色的炮台射程，使得它们成为常规战斗舰船炮下待宰的羔羊。
en: The Griffin is much used by the Caldari Navy as a support vessel in combat squadrons. Though designed with an impressive turret range, its defenses are rather weak, making it easy prey for traditional combat vessels.

zh: 狮鹫级常被加达里海军用作战斗中队的支援舰船，它出色的电子设备阵列能干扰目标舰船的运作，使得它们成为常规战斗舰船炮下待宰的羔羊。
en: The Griffin is much used by the Caldari Navy as a support vessel in combat squadrons, using its impressive array of electronic gadgetry to disrupt the operation of target ships and make them easy prey for traditional combat vessels.

zh: 猛犸级是米玛塔尔共和国最大也是最坚固的工业舰。盖伦特联邦参与了猛犸级的设计过程，这使它体积巨大、威力强劲，同时又机动灵活、技术先进。非常值得选购。
en: The Mammoth is the biggest and the strongest industrial ship of the Minmatar Republic. It was designed with aid from the Gallente Federation, making the Mammoth both large and powerful yet also nimble and technologically advanced. A very good buy.

zh: 猛犸级是米玛塔尔共和国最大的工业舰。盖伦特联邦参与了猛犸级的设计过程，这使它体积巨大、威力强劲，同时又机动灵活、技术先进。非常值得选购。
en: The Mammoth is the largest industrial ship of the Minmatar Republic. It was designed with aid from the Gallente Federation, making it both large and powerful, yet also nimble and technologically advanced. An excellent choice.

zh: 猛鲑级战舰有着“沙场绞肉机”般的外观，给任何不幸落入它瞄准器的猎物带去恐怖和死亡。充足的武器装备以及惊人的电子战性能使这种全面型炮舰成为战争中不可或缺的角色。
en: Designed just as much to look like a killing machine as to be one, the Ferox strikes fear in the hearts of anyone unlucky enough to get caught in its crosshairs. With sizable armaments and tremendous electronic warfare capabilities, this versatile warship is at home in a great number of scenarios.

zh: 猛鲑级战舰有着“沙场绞肉机”般的外观，给任何不幸落入它瞄准器的猎物带去恐怖和死亡。充足的武备以及惊人的电子战性能使这种全面型炮舰成为战争中不可或缺的角色。
en: Designed as much to look like a killing machine as to be one, the Ferox will strike fear into the heart of anyone unlucky enough to get caught in its crosshairs. With the potential for sizable armament as well as tremendous electronic warfare capability, this versatile warship is at home in a great number of scenarios.

zh: 獾级是加达里合众国内的主要货运船，特别适用于路途遥远而艰辛的贸易路线。它巨大的船体和充足的防备使它非常适合此类任务，不过加达里人很少驾驶它单独往来。
en: The Badger-class freighter is the main cargo-carrier for the Caldari State, particularly in long, arduous trade-runs. Its huge size and comfortable armament makes it perfectly equipped for those tasks, although the Caldari seldom let it roam alone.

zh: 玛塔尔得到盖伦特联邦的支持，直到现在他们仍是亲密的盟友。
en: The Matari received support from the Gallente Federation, and they are still close allies.

zh:
玛塔利运用的科技并不先进，更偏重于射速，而不是火力或科技含量。不幸的是，这对固定目标物并不十分奏效，因此正中艾玛人的下怀。

艾玛人称其为一堆壮观的垃圾。不过千万不要低估了这些建筑。当战斗打响的时候，米玛塔尔指挥官总是能笑到最后。
en:
The Matari aren't really that high-tech, preferring speed rather than firepower or involved technology. Unfortunately that doesn't apply very well to stationary objects, much to the liking of the Amarr Empire.

Amarrians call it a scrapheap of epic proportions. But don't underestimate these structures. Minmatar commanders usually have the last laugh when it comes to combat.

zh: 玛塔利运用的科技并不先进，更偏重于射速，而不是火力或科技含量。不幸的是，这对固定目标物并不十分奏效，因此正中艾玛人的下怀。艾玛人称其为一堆壮观的垃圾。不过千万不要低估了这些建筑。当战斗打响的时候，米玛塔尔指挥官总是能笑到最后。
en:
The Matari aren't really that high-tech, preferring speed rather then firepower or involved technology. Unfortunately that doesn't apply very well to stationary objects, much to the liking of the Amarr Empire.

Amarrians call it a scrapheap of epic proportions. But don't underestimate these structures. Minmatar commanders usually have the last laugh when it comes to combat.

zh: 玛塔利运用的科技并不先进，更偏重于射速，而不是火力或科技含量。不过这对固定目标物并不十分奏效，因此正中艾玛人的下怀。艾玛人称其为一堆壮观的垃圾。不过千万不要低估了这些建筑。当战斗打响的时候，米玛塔尔指挥官总是能笑到最后。
en: The Matari aren't really that high-tech, preferring speed rather then firepower or involved technology. Unfortunately that doesn't apply very well to stationary objects, much to the liking of the Amarr Empire. Amarrians call it a scrapheap of epic proportions. But don't underestimate these structures. Minmatar commanders usually have the last laugh when it comes to combat.

zh: 玛塔尔的重生III委托信标
玛塔尔的重生II委托信标
玛塔尔的重生I委托信标
玛德比·阿纳迪的裂谷级飞船
玛纽·安考吉的鱼鹰级飞船
玩家可以通过储存数据来保留本角色名字。在未来，被预留的角色名字将只能被所关联的特定账号注册（保留期限为开服一周内）。
en: You can save your character name by uploading data. In the future, reserved names will only be registerable by accounts that made the reservation. (The names will be reserved for one week from the server launch date.)

zh: 玩家自定义签名功能尚未接入
en: Custom player introduction not yet implemented

zh: 环绕级是米玛塔尔共和国的一种旧式飞船，也是仍在服役的最老的飞船之一。环绕级的设计非常简单，这是它长期服役的主要原因，不过这也使得这种飞船只适用于一些最普通的任务。
en: The Wreathe is an old ship of the Minmatar Republic and one of the oldest ships still in usage. The design of the Wreathe is very plain, which is the main reason for its longevity, but it also makes the ship incapable of handling anything but the most mundane tasks.

zh: 现在{2|station_name:_tr}又爆发骚乱——想都不用想肯定又是有些多事的人惹怒了内瓦达人。
en: More chaos broke out in {2|station_name:_tr}. I knew instantly that it was because some trouble maker had angered the Nefantar.

zh: 现在你们又要通过这种自导自演的闹剧蒙混过关，中饱私囊吗？
en: And now you're trying to get a pass by fabricating all this drama, for your own benefit?

zh: 现在军队抽不出人来帮我们，我把移民船的位标发给你，剩下的就靠你了！
en: The army couldn't give us any help. I'm sending the coordinates of the migrant ship. They're counting on you!

zh: 现在我们有了更多的线索，迟早我要将这些胆敢反抗女皇的混蛋一网打尽。
en: Now that we have more clues, sooner or later, I'll bust those idiots who dared oppose the Empress!

zh: 现在瘟疫爆发了，我们需要准备一批药物送到{2|station_name:_tr}去。
en: A plague has broken out and we need to deliver some medicine to {2|station_name:_tr}.

zh: 现在的年轻人实在是太不可靠了，必须给他们一些惩罚才行。
en: Young people today are so unreliable, a little harsh discipline is what they need.

zh: 现在驾驶员已经逃走，我们的追踪系统显示他已经前往{2|system_name:_tr}，请协助我们进行拦截。
en: That pilot has now escaped. Our tracking system shows that he has already arrived in {2|system_name:_tr}. Please help us intercept him.

zh: 现在，你可以对我进行个性定制。
en: You can personalize my settings now.

zh: 现在，我们要以走私毒品的罪名逮捕你，大明星。
en: You're now under arrest for smuggling drugs, big shot.

珍贵的合金，常用于舰船的制造。

可以从下列类型的行星开采获得：
冰体行星
贫瘠行星

Can be obtained by mining the following types of planets:

zh: 珐克堂·斯多的茶隼级飞船
瑕古昂·瑕里巴哈的夜魔侠级飞船
瑕库梓·玛卡的毒蜥级飞船
瑟文·法基德的战鹰级飞船
瑟莱尼氏 大型掠能器
瑟莱尼氏 大型能量中和器
瑟莱尼氏 自适应装甲增强器
瓦尔迪·米达勒的多米尼克斯级飞船
瓦希特·伊尔耶的纳维塔斯飞船
甚至在成为一个太子家族之前，塔什蒙贡家族就控制着如今以他们名字命名的这片星域的大部分区域。因为采用富有魄力的执政方式，塔什蒙贡家族将这个曾经的穷乡僻壤转变成了一座繁华的贸易中心。虽然由于身为皇室的压力和责任使该星域不再是从前的经济热土，但对想谋生的普通商人而言，塔什蒙贡仍是帝国内最友好、最便利的星域。
en: Even before they were an Heir Family, the Tash-Murkon house controlled much of the space that now bears their name. Through their enterprising ways, the Tash-Murkon transformed the once-backwater locale into a bustling trade hub. Though the pressures and duties of being a Royal Family have rendered the region less of an economic juggernaut than it once was, Tash-Murkon continues to be the friendliest and easiest region of the Empire for the average trader to make a living in.

zh: 用于发射导弹的平台，类似岗哨炮。
en: A platform designed to launch missiles similar to sentry guns.

zh: 用于将能量从飞船电容器传送到激光增益介质。
en: Used to transfer energy from a ships capacitor to a laser gain medium.

zh:
用于将能量从飞船电容器传送到激光增益介质。这个设备上的机械装置需要维修。

可以从下列物品中提炼获得：
加达里4级受损结构
加达里5级受损结构
加达里6级受损结构
加达里7级受损结构
加达里8级受损结构
加达里9级受损结构
加达里10级受损结构
古斯塔斯受损结构
莫德团受损结构
en:
Used to transfer energy from a ship's capacitor to a laser gain medium. The mechanism on this device is in need of repair.

Can be obtained by reprocessing the following items:
Caldari Ship Debris 4
Caldari Ship Debris 5
Caldari Ship Debris 6
Caldari Ship Debris 7
Caldari Ship Debris 8
Caldari Ship Debris 9
Caldari Ship Debris 10
Guristas Ship Debris
Mordu's Legion Ship Debris

zh: 用于控制各种模块的能量分配与超载，是高级舰船的常用组件。
en: Used to control the power distribution among modules, as well as overloading. A common component on advanced ships.

zh: 用于星域内货运的大型货柜集装箱，最常用在货舰上。
en: A massive cargo container, used for inter-regional freight; most commonly used in freighter cargo bays.

zh: 用于星域间货运的大型货柜集装箱。
en: A massive cargo container, used for inter-regional freight.

zh: 用于星域间货运的大型货柜集装箱，最常用在货舰上。
en: A massive cargo container, used for inter-regional freight; most commonly used in freighter cargo bays.

zh: 用于绕过电子安保系统的黑客系统。
en: A Hacking system used to override electronic security systems.

zh: 用户已激活过该类型序列号
en: User has already activated a serial number of this type

zh: 用户超过最大重试限制
en: User has exceeded max retry limit
User has exceeded the activation time limit

zh: 由FON环保组织运作的空间站，借以对抗天蛇走私者对骷髅彗星公园的占领。
en: Station operated by the FON environmental organization to protest the occupation of the Serpentis smugglers of the Skeleton Comet park.

zh: 由一个代理人驾驶的太阳神级。
en: A Helios piloted by an agent.

zh: 由一个代理人驾驶的诅咒级。
en: An Anathema piloted by an agent.

zh: 由一群新品种无人机建造的星际信标。
en: Celestial beacon created by a new breed of rogue drones.

zh: 由于交付仓库不存在，%s制造项目转为交付至物品机库中
en: Target hangar does not exist, %sManufacture project delivery to item hangar.

zh: 由于交付仓库不存在，%s制造项目转为交付至舰船机库中
en: Target hangar does not exist, %sManufacture project delivery to ship hangar.

zh: 由于交付仓库容积不足，%s制造项目转为交付至物品机库中
en: Target hangar's capacity not enough, %sManufacture project delivery to item hangar.

zh: 由于交付仓库容积不足，%s制造项目转为交付至舰船机库中
en: Target hangar's capacity not enough, %sManufacture project delivery to ship hangar.

zh: 由于其弹载量和射速处于中等水平，因此很受青睐。适用于快速攻击战和更持久的战斗。
en: Favored by many for its average capacity and firing rate. Useful in both fast raids and longer battles.

zh: 由于力场战术型的战列巡洋舰防御出色，泛用性也表现的很好，所以很多有钱的组织都对其进行了适应性改造。某些不可描述的交易之后，这些舰船的设计图也流出到市场中，现在新伊甸里飞行的这种定制化的舰船还真的不少了。
en: It's a well known fact that battlecruisers which rely on the strategic use of force fields provide excellent defense. Even the most ordinary such models perform admirably. As a result, many wealthy organizations have adapted the designs to suit their own needs. Following some clandestine transactions, these designs were leaked onto the open market, and now these modified ships are a common sight throughout New Eden.

zh: 由于姐妹会通常需要迅速接收和部署救助物资，救助站应运而生。这些空间站非常容易建设及部署在轨道上，并且可以接收大量的救助物资，同时能通过轨道飞行器将物资快速部署到星球上。自这些空间站启用以来，它们拯救了大量的生命，其他集团也借鉴了这种设计用作己用。
en: The Sisters need to rapidly receive and deploy aid has led to the creation of the Aid Stations, relatively quick and easy to construct and place in orbit these stations can recieve vast quantities of aid and transfer them to orbital craft for quick deployment on a planet. Since their inception they have saved vast quantities of lives and other corporations have leased the design for their own purposes.

zh: 由于小队作战的需要，艾玛帝国下的某个家族参与到强制者级的改进计划中，并最终改良出了这艘综合性极强的轻型舰船。
en: Due to the requirements of squad-based combat, one of the families under the Amarr Empire worked on modifications for the Coercer, eventually resulting in this highly integrated light ship design.

zh: 由于惊人的性价比和建造速度，这些哨站正被越来越广泛使用，尤其受到玛塔利自由战士以及其他需要在危险区域保持移动性的战士和旅行者的欢迎。
en: Due to their amazing cost-effectiveness and the speed at which they can be built, these outposts are seeing greater and greater use among Matari freedom fighters and other warriors and travelers who need to be able to stay mobile in dangerous territory.

zh: 由于未知原因，一批奴隶脱离了葳砣柯的控制。联合收割集团希望雇佣一名飞行员摧毁叛逃的奴隶。擅自脱离帝国掌控的奴隶，等待他们的只有死亡。
en: For unknown reasons, a group of slaves were freed from the control of Vitoc. Joint Harvesting hopes to hire a pilot to eliminate the runaways. There's only one thing that awaits slaves who try to flee from the Empire – death.

zh: 由于环境因素，在隐匿空间复合体里建造星门的计划从未成功。但是天使军团显然还在尝试……
en: The construction of a stargate within a Deadspace Complex has not yet been successful due to environmental factors. But the Angel Corporation is obviously trying...

zh: 由于米玛塔尔人经常需要以少对多的舰队战，所以很多学员也会教授学员使用隐形轰炸舰，某个神秘的天才学生推出了一款猎犬级改良型，迅速影响了很多年轻入役军人的战术思路，也使这一款战舰出现在很多军事机构的备忘录中。
en: The Minmatar often need to engage in numbers against their superior enemies in fleet battles. Therefore, many Capsuleer students learn how to use stealth bombers in the institute. Naturally, a certain prodigy among them introduced a modified Hound, immediately revolutionizing the strategic thinking of many young Minmatar soldiers. The new ship design is now a permanent fixture on the orders of battle of many military organizations.

zh: 由于认识到发展疾速炮平台对完善高端军械库的必要性，联邦海军引进顶级人才，研发了亥伯龙神级。其结果就是：产生了黑暗天幕中最致命、最全面的炮舰之一。
en: Recognizing the necessity for a blaster platform to round out their high-end arsenal, the Federation Navy brought in top-level talent to work on the Hyperion. The result: one of the most lethal and versatile warships ever to take to the dark skies.

zh: 由于部分物品的价值超过了帝国限制,{audit_bank}将对这些物品，增加时间锁，以便于会计人员进行审核，感谢配合。是否继续？
en: As the value of some items exceeds the limits set by the Empire, {audit_bank} will initiate a Trade Lock in order to properly examine these items. Thank you for your cooperation. Proceed?

zh: 由于驾驶员的疏忽，卡拉吉塔集团的一艘重要的科研船被古斯塔斯海盗所劫持。卡拉吉塔集团不会允许任何重要的科学机密流落到古斯塔斯海盗手中。
en: Due to the pilot's negligence, an important Kalaakiota scientific research ship was hijacked by the Guristas pirates. Kaalakiota won't allow any of their important scientific secrets to fall into the hands of the Guristas Pirates.

zh:
由各种不稳定原子结构组成的活性气体，在爆破，分子重组以及导电等领域中非常有用。储藏和运输大量活性气体的时候应加倍地小心。

可以从下列类型的行星开采获得：
气体行星
温和行星
风暴行星
en:
Consisting of any number of volatile atomic structures, reactive gases are the most useful when applied to the fields of explosives, molecular restructuring, and electrical conduction. Great care must be taken when storing or transporting any sizeable quantity.

Can be obtained by mining the following types of planets:
Gas Planet
Temperate Planet
Storm Planet

zh: 由埃玛格尔·迪特农驾驶的狂热级，他是这个区域一个数一数二的情报人员。 任务：  难度等级：8级

A Zealot piloted by Ammargal Detrone, one of the leading intelligence agents in the sector.

zh: 由擅长炸药的军工企业转型而来的矿业公司。一直利用着自己优异的岩石爆破能力，从一些棘手的矿区获取资源。矿钻集团长期向愿意为合众国出力的克隆人矿工提供矿石收购合同。
en: A mining corporation that originated from a military enterprise specializing in explosives. With its excellent rock-blasting explosives, the corporation is able to extract resources from some of the trickiest mining areas. For a long time, Minedrill has been offering ore acquisition orders to pilot miners who are willing to contribute to the State.

盖伦特 露天采矿器
盖伦特万王宝座级战列舰
盖伦特不需要远距离的胆小鬼，不过总有特例，度沃勒完善了这个特例，超远距离的武器系统，谁会拒绝呢？
en: Gallente doesn't need sneaking cowards, but there's an exception for everything. Duvolle Labs' super long range weapon system is that exception, and an irresistible one at that.

zh: 盖伦特中型无人机使用的武器。
en: A weapon used by Gallente Medium Drones.

zh: 盖伦特亥伯龙神级战列舰
盖伦特人对舰船和建筑的安全性有着很高的追求，所以可以看到他们的东西总是使用非常厚重的钢材。
en: The Gallenteans are committed to their high security standards in ship manufacturing and structure building. Therefore, steel is always heavily utilized in Gallente equipment construction.

zh: 盖伦特伊特龙级MKV工业舰
en: Gallente Iteron Mark V Industrial Ship

zh: 盖伦特伊米卡斯级护卫舰
盖伦特俄洛巴斯级泰坦
盖伦特克琉斯级工业舰
en: Gallente Iteron Mark II Industrial Ship

zh: 盖伦特和加达里人的电子战计数日新月异，真是令人大开眼界。
en: The ever-advancing electronic warfare technology of the Gallente and Caldari is truly eye-opening.

zh: 盖伦特因卡萨斯级护卫舰
盖伦特埃比斯级工业舰
en: Gallente Iteron Mark III Industrial Ship

zh: 盖伦特多米尼克斯级战列舰
盖伦特大型无人机使用的武器。
en: A weapon used by Gallente Large Drones.

zh: 盖伦特奥卡托级工业舰
盖伦特小型无人机使用的武器。
en: A weapon used by Gallente Small Drones.

zh: 盖伦特尼纳苏级战力辅助舰
盖伦特岗哨无人机使用的武器。
en: A weapon used by Gallente Scout Drones.

zh: 盖伦特布鲁提克斯级战列巡洋舰
盖伦特开放自由的市场离不开金融巨鳄们的活跃。在这个金钱至上的世界，每天都有无数人成为巨富，又有无数人倾家荡产。只要能够敛聚财富，金融大亨们更是无所不用其极。比起金钱来说，信用在这个疯狂的世界里远比你想象的廉价得多。
en: The Gallente's free market cannot exist without the involvement of business tycoons. In this land where wealth is worshipped, the tide of fortune shifts daily, pushing some to the top and sending others plummeting to the bottom. The finance giants will not let morality stand in their way when it comes to accumulating wealth. When money is on the table, credibility becomes dirt cheap.

zh: 盖伦特弥洱米顿级战列巡洋舰
盖伦特战力辅助舰残骸
盖伦特战术供给空间站
盖伦特托勒克斯级巡洋舰
盖伦特控制塔最引人注意的不是它们的坚固或强大，而是它们讨人喜欢的外观。与其他种族的控制塔相比，盖伦特控制塔有着中上水平的电子干扰设施、良好的处理器输出及足够的输出功率，但是缺乏尖端防御设备。
en: Gallente Control Towers are more pleasing to the eye than they are strong or powerful. They have above average electronic countermeasures, average CPU output, and decent power output compared to towers from the other races, but are quite lacking in sophisticated defenses.

zh: 盖伦特旅行者级工业舰
盖伦特隐匿空间前哨站
盖伦特母星控制塔堡垒
盖伦特毛鲁斯级护卫舰
盖伦特海关 专用船
盖伦特涅鲁斯级工业舰
en: Gallente Iteron Mark I Industrial Ship

盖伦特离子疾速加农炮岗哨

盖伦特米亚莫斯级工业舰
en: Gallente Iteron Mark IV Industrial Ship

zh: 盖伦特纳维达斯级护卫舰
盖伦特联邦海军改良了促进级，并大量运用在小队规模的战斗中。
en: The Gallente Federation Navy made some modifications to the Catalyst. The improved model is heavily used in squadron-level combat.

zh: 盖伦特能量中和炮塔 I
盖伦特能量中和炮塔 II
盖伦特能量中和炮塔 III
盖伦特训练用哨站炮塔
盖伦特超级航母的残骸
