盖伦特逆向工程成功率
盖伦特逆向工程研究速度
盖伦特阿特龙级护卫舰
目前净化系统已经开始工作，亟需外来水源度过这段时期。
en: The purification system has now started working. But they need clean water before the pollution can be removed.
You haven't joined a Corporation yet

zh: 目前没有舰船和装备可以维修
en: There are currently no ships or modules to repair

zh: 目标位置就在{2|system_name:_tr}，希望你能帮忙解决一下。
en: The target location is {2|system_name:_tr}. I hope you can help me deal with this.

zh: 目标地点是……{4|system_name:_tr}。飞行员，我需要你立刻对这个地方进行调查。
en: The target location is... {4|system_name:_tr}. Capsuleer, I need you to head to this location immediately and investigate it.

zh: 目标信号丢失，自动导航结束
目标距离太远，无法锁定，请接近目标后再进行操作。
en: Target too far away and cannot be locked. Please try again when you're closer to the target.

zh: 目的地的地址我给你发过去了，待会儿见。
en: I sent you the destination address. See you later.

zh: 直到几年前的长者战争才突然复活……是一群刁钻难缠的家伙。
en: They reappeared during the Elder War... Seems it's impossible to get rid of them.

zh: 相关合同在很早就签订好了，为什么唯独在移交的过程中出差错……
en: The contracts were signed long ago. How come things only went wrong during the transfer...

zh: 看上去不久前在这座小型防御设施附近发生了一场激烈的战斗。外壳上巨大的窟窿还没有得到完全的修缮，热源信号显示据点内仍然还有多出火灾没有被扑灭，就让它们这样慢慢燃烧直到耗尽氧气。
en: This minor defense facility reveals that heavy fighting took place here not long ago. Giant holes in the outer armor have still not been properly repaired, and heat signatures coming from inside the compound show that some fires within have not even been extinguished; only contained, as they slowly burn themselves out of oxygen.

zh: 看什么？能救人吗？不要再拖延了！
en: What are you standing around for? Can you save people by staring? Get moving!

zh: 看样子解决得还算干净。
en: Looks like a job well done.

zh: 看着还是有点恶心……哦不！我的意思是，美味！
en: It still looks disgu-... delicious! I meant delicious!

zh: 看起来你已经成为克隆人飞行员很久了，驾驶技术值得称赞。
en: Looks like you've been a Capsuleer for a long time. Nice piloting skills.

zh: 看起来这是一座重要的大型建筑的施工地点。
en: This looks like a construction site of a grand structure of great importance.

zh: 看起来问题不是很复杂，晚点我就派人过去装修。
en: Looks like the problem isn't too complicated. I'll send someone to decorate it later.

zh: 真不明白这些事情有什么好争的，市政管理局的人难道连这点事情都安排不好吗？
en: I don't understand why they're fighting over these. I'm sure the Urban Management can handle trifles like this, can't they?

zh: 真不知该怎样才能阻止他们继续污染真神的子民。
en: I really don't know how to stop them from corrupting the children of the one true God.

zh: 真够蠢的，都什么时代了，还要看当面会谈。
en: What nonsense! A face-to-face conversation? What year is this?

zh: 真好！真好！我这就给我老婆打电话！
en: Great! Great! I'm calling my wife now!

zh: 真是一个蠢货！是不是克隆人你看不出来吗？后颈上这么明显的金属接口！
en: Such an idiot! Can't you see it's a Capsuleer? Are the metal parts on the back of the neck not obvious?

zh: 真是可笑，他们难道忘了建筑集团在他们陷入危难时为他们提供的帮助吗？
en: This is ridiculous. Did they forget the help that the construction corporation provided to them when they were in trouble?

zh: 真是太棒了！请帮我送到{6|station_name:_tr}吧！
en: Great! Send them to {6|station_name:_tr} for me, please!

zh: 真是有趣的一天，年轻人。
en: What a lovely day, young people.

zh: 真是没想到你这么容易就把他们全部摆平了。
en: I never thought you'd be able to deal with them all so easily.
Test 真正的图克尔人(专家)
Test 真正的图克尔人(进阶)

zh: 真正的图克尔人委托信标
真没想到，你居然活了下来。
en: I never thought you'd make it out alive.

zh: 真神不会对背叛者留情，所以我们也不。
en: The one true God will show no mercy to traitors, so neither shall we.

zh: 真神保佑。咳咳……真是把我气的够呛。
en: May the one true God bless us. *coughs* ...That really made me mad.

zh: 真神保佑。大事不妙，送往乌拉姆大人府邸的奴隶们被血袭者抢走了。
en: May the one true God bless you. Terrible news, the slaves who were sent to the Uriam Mansion were taken away by the Blood Raiders.

zh: 真神保佑。这些愚蠢的异端居然质疑理事会对圣典的解读。
en: May the one true God bless you. These stupid heretics dared to question the Council's interpretation of the Scriptures.

zh: 真神保佑。这次是一个硬茬，克隆人。
en: May the one true God bless you. It will be a hard mission this time, Capsuleer.

zh: 真神保佑。非常不幸，本来应该押送审判的宗教犯人被血袭者劫持了。
en: May the one true God bless us. Unfortunately, the sinners who were meant to be on trial were kidnapped by the Blood Raiders.

zh: 真神保佑，下次的报告不用给我看这么详细的战斗数据。
en: May the one true God bless you. You don't have to show me the detailed battle data next time.

zh: 真神保佑，东西送到了吗？
en: May the one true God bless you. Is the sample delivered?

zh: 真神保佑，今年的竞技大会出了点小插曲。
en: May the one true God bless you. Something went wrong in this year's Competition Games.

zh: 真神保佑，你的脑子似乎还有点用处。
en: May the one true God bless you – or your brain, which has finally proven itself to still be functional.

zh: 真神保佑，出什么事了？目标错误？
en: By the name of the one true God, what happened? Wrong target?

zh: 真神保佑，办得不错，飞行员。
en: May the one true God bless you, pilot, well done.

zh: 真神保佑，原来一些血袭者的犯罪分子在那个附近吗？
en: May the one true God bless us. So there are Blood Raiders hanging about that place?

zh: 真神保佑，又一个背离真神的恶魔在四处散播对我们不利的言论。
en: May the one true God bless you. Another demon who has forsaken the one true God is spreading words that are unfavorable to us.

zh: 真神保佑，又是愉快的一天，飞行员。
en: May the one true God bless us. It's another pleasant day, Capsuleer.

zh: 真神保佑，又有好活给你干了，我知道你们克隆人最擅长这样的活。
en: May the one true God bless you, I have another great job for you. I know you Capsuleers are best at this kind of work.

zh: 真神保佑，咳咳。请你稍等一下，飞行员。
en: May the one true God bless you, cough, cough! Please wait a moment, pilot.

zh: 真神保佑，希特修女，刚才真是经历了一场不得了的战斗。
en: May the one true God bless you, Sister Sayite. That was some battle.

zh: 真神保佑，总算是及时地解决了危机。
en: May the one true God bless us. The crisis was resolved in time.

zh: 真神保佑，愿背叛者能在您的身边悔过。
en: May the one true God bless you and may the traitors repent at your side.

zh: 真神保佑，我们有一个有趣的目标需要你帮忙解决，飞行员。
en: May the one true God bless you, pilot. There's an interesting target we'd like you to deal with.

zh: 真神保佑，我们杜厦的一艘运输舰在{2|system_name:_tr}遭到海盗拦截。
en: May the one true God bless you. A transport ship from our corporation, Ducia Foundry, was intercepted by pirates in {2|system_name:_tr}.

zh: 真神保佑，我们阿狄莎波家的一个礼拜堂被血袭者侵占了。
en: May the one true God bless you. A chapel of our family was occupied by the Blood Raiders.

zh: 真神保佑，最近我们侦察到一群行为奇怪的血袭者在首星附近活动。
en: May the one true God bless you. We have detected some Blood Raiders acting strangely near the Prime.

zh: 真神保佑，最近脱离葳砣柯控制的奴隶越来越多了。
en: May the one true God bless you. More and more slaves are being freed from Vitoc control.

zh: 真神保佑，有一件重要的事情需要你帮忙调查一下，飞行员。
en: May the one true God bless us. I have an important matter for you to look into, Capsuleer.

zh: 真神保佑，有了这些矿石，下一期的勘探计划就可以提前开始了。
en: May the one true God bless you, with these ores, the next exploration plan can begin early.

zh: 真神保佑，没留下什么痕迹吧，飞行员？
en: May the one true God bless you, pilot. You didn't leave any traces behind, did you?

zh: 真神保佑，特姆森博士不愧是专家，这一批残骸的特征信号和之前的间谍完全一致。
en: May the one true God bless Dr. Temson, and his well-earned title of expert! The signal from this wreckage is exactly the same as those from the previous spies.

zh: 真神保佑，瑟米巴爵士，结果显而易见。
en: May the one true God bless you, Lord Semba. The results are obvious.

zh: 真神保佑，目标已经往{6|system_name:_tr}去了吗？
en: May the one true God bless us. The target has left for {6|system_name:_tr} already?

zh: 真神保佑，看来我们需要花点时间了。等信号处理完成，我会发布新的任务给你。
en: May the one true God bless you. Looks like we'll need some time. You will receive further missions after the signals have been analyzed.

zh: 真神保佑，真是令人气愤！
en: May the one true God bless you, this is outrageous!

zh: 真神保佑，请把东西交给我吧。
en: May the one true God bless you. Please hand it over.

zh: 真神保佑，这些可怕的异教徒，无论消灭多少都会不断地冒出来。
en: May the one true God bless us. Those heretics are truly terrifying. No matter how many of them you cut down, there will always be new ones to take their place.

zh: 真神保佑，这位是帝国学院的特姆森博士，他是信号识别的专家。
en: May the one true God bless you. This is Dr. Temson from the Imperial Academy. He is an expert in signal analysis.

zh: 真神保佑，需要的东西都在这里。
en: May the one true God bless you. Here are all the things you need.

zh: 真神保佑，飞行员。我们截获了一条非常重要的情报。
en: May the one true God bless you, Capsuleer. We've intercepted a very important piece of information.

zh: 真神保佑，飞行员。我想这次你拿着正确的样本回来了？
en: May the one true God bless you, pilot. I suppose you have the correct sample this time?

zh: 真神保佑，飞行员。我有一个非常重要的任务，需要你亲自完成。
en: May the one true God bless you, pilot. I have a very important mission for you, and you need to do it on your own.

zh: 真神保佑，飞行员。血袭者的事情我想你应该很清楚了。
en: May the one true God bless you, Capsuleer. The situation with the Blood Raiders should be clear to you, I think.

zh: 真神保佑，飞行员。这事儿有点难以启齿，一群不知天高地厚的奴隶企图背离真神的教导。
en: May the one true God bless you, Capsuleer. This is quite embarrassing. A group of bold but misguided slaves tried to deviate from the teachings of the one true God.

zh: 真神保佑，飞行员！我们最近在外层空间的探索不是很顺利。
en: May the one true God bless you, Capsuleer! Our recent deep space exploration efforts have not very successful.

zh: 真神保佑，飞行员，一支运送奢侈品的舰队发生了奴隶叛变。
en: May the one true God bless you, pilot. A slave rebellion occurred on a fleet transporting luxury goods.

zh: 真神保佑，飞行员，你应该早点联系我，把我担心坏了。
en: May the one true God bless you, pilot. You should have contacted me earlier. I was so worried about you!

zh: 真神的教义深入人心，它是艾玛社会的道德和法律的准则，任何不符合真神教义的行为都会受到教会严厉的惩罚，无论是最普通的公民，还是至高无上的继承人。虽然教会不会直接对帝国的领土实行统治，但教会的存在，对于每一个艾玛人都意义非凡。
en: The doctrines of the Amarrian faith, and belief in its one true God, are deeply rooted in the hearts of the people. Any behavior that does not conform to these doctrines will be punished severely by the church, whether the perpetrator is an ordinary citizen or an Imperial Heir. Although the church does not rule the territory of the Empire directly, attempts to win its favor are an important part of each family's daily business. On the surface, the church favors no family more than any other, but few can be certain of just how many covert transactions are carried out behind the scenes.
Mission Beacon: True Divine Trial II
Mission Beacon: True Divine Trial I

zh: 真糟糕，这不是我老婆要的唱片！
en: Oops! That's not the album my wife wanted!

zh: 真蠢！真蠢！他们怎么会选上你这么一个蠢蛋！
en: Stupid! Stupid! How could they get someone as dumb as you?

zh: 真该死，最近这已经不是第一次被他们耍得团团转了。
en: Damn! This isn't the first time that we've been played by them.

zh: 眼下是打折季，你懂的，疯狂的女人们导致整个物流体系都瘫痪了。埃拉斯多集团需要你协助送货，我现在就把坐标发给你。
en: The sale season is here. You know, the ladies caused the entire logistics system to collapse. Aliastra needs you to assist with delivery. I'm sending you the coordinates now.

zh: 眼下正值旅游旺季，旅客爆满，星捷运承运能力不足，需要你的支援。
en: InterBus is now short on transportation capacity for the tourist season and needs your assistance.

zh: 知道什么叫王牌飞行员吗？
en: You know what makes an ace pilot?

zh: 矿石已经入库，感谢您的合作。
en: The ores have been sent to the warehouse. Thank you for your cooperation!

zh: 矿石数量不足，请您再次清点后再联系我。
en: The quantity of ore is insufficient. Please check again before contacting me.

zh: 矿钻集团凡晶石收购合同
矿钻集团干焦岩收购合同
矿钻集团灼烧岩收购合同
砍下左手的无名指，今天之内送到直接上司手里。
en: Cut off your ring finger and send it to the boss before the day is out.

zh: 研究反应式装甲和自适应装甲增强器的技能，能够动态调整装甲对单一种类伤害的抗性。
en: Skill in researching reactive armor and adaptive armor hardeners, to allow dynamic adjustment of armor resistance against a single type of damage.

zh: 研究护盾抗性反应协调系统的技能，能够动态调整护盾对单一种类伤害的抗性。
en: Skill in researching reactive shield resistance adjustment systems, to allow dynamic adjustment of shield resistance against a single type of damage.

zh: 研究站的设施加起来可值好几亿呢！还好有你！
en: The facilities at the research station are worth hundreds of millions! Fortunately, we have you!

zh: 破朽的冬眠者人工物件
破碎的橙色水晶小行星
破碎的蓝色水晶小行星
破碎的金属结晶小行星

硅基中常见的普通建筑材料，在新伊甸的宇宙中有着稳定的需求量，用于行星设施的建造或者经过强化后用于多种太空设施和空间舰船。

可以从下列类型的行星开采获得：
贫瘠行星
海洋行星
en:
A common silicon-based construction material that is in constant demand throughout New Eden, whether in planetary structures or reinforced for use in space vessels.

Can be obtained by mining the following types of planets:
Barren Planet
Oceanic Planet

zh: 确定删除选中的通知吗？（删除后无法恢复）
en: Confirm to delete selected notifications? (Cannot recover)

zh: 确定删除选中的邮件吗？
en: Confirm to delete selected mails? (Cannot recover)

zh: 确定要删除这个分组吗？
en: Are you sure you want to delete the list?

zh: 确定要把{name:_tr}设定为舰队加成官吗？
en: Are you sure you want to assign {name:_tr} as the fleet Booster?

zh: 确定要跃迁到目标信标所在的异常空间吗？
en: Warp to the Cosmic Anomaly where the bookmark is located?

zh: 确实是精彩的操作！相信异株湖的孩子们学到了宝贵的一课！
en: What a wonderful operation! I believe that the children of Ishukone have learned a valuable lesson!

zh: 确认拆除当前行星开采阵列?
en: Are you sure you want to dismantle this mining array?
Confirm reprocessing of the selected item(s)?

zh: 确认花费 {isk_num} 星币 购买技能?
en: Spend {isk_num} ISK to purchase this skill?

zh: 确认花费{}伊甸币购买{}天的欧米伽克隆吗?
en: Spend {} PLEX to purchase an Omega clone for {} days?

zh: 确认要销毁选中的物品吗？
en: Are you sure you want to destroy the selected item(s)?

zh: 碎片 - 损坏的动力单元
碎裂行星曾经是一个类地的星球，在经历了某种灾难事件后被完全粉碎肢解。在新伊甸宇宙中，所有这种星体都是因为遭受了"瑟伊林事故"期间的灾变性恒星影响而形成的。不过，也有报道称在虫洞彼端的未知空间里也发现了这种碎裂星体。是什么造成了它们的灾难命运，目前此问题还未得到确信的解释。
en: Shattered worlds were once terrestrial planets, torn asunder by some immense cataclysm. All such worlds in the New Eden cluster are products of the disastrous stellar events that occurred during the "Seyllin Incident". However, reports continue to circulate of similar planets discovered in the unmapped systems reached exclusively through unstable wormholes. How these met their fate, if indeed they exist at all, is unknown.

zh: 磨难级护卫舰的设计初衷是用于侦察/探索，但它的当前版本将原本用作科学研究的电子设备投入到了更具攻击性的用途上。磨难级的电子和计算机系统占据了大量船内空间，因此货舱和传统武器的空间就非常有限了。
en: The Crucifier was first designed as an explorer/scout, but the current version employs the electronic equipment originally intended for scientific studies for more offensive purposes. The Crucifier's electronic and computer systems take up a large portion of the internal space leaving limited room for cargo or traditional weaponry.

zh: 磨难级护卫舰的设计初衷是用于侦察及探索，但它的当前版本将原本用作科学研究的电子设备投入到了更具攻击性的用途上。
en: The Crucifier was first designed as an explorer/scout, but the current version employs the electronic equipment originally intended for scientific studies for more offensive purposes.

zh: 社会科学相关技能，涵盖商业买卖，物流运输，人员管理，外交关系等知识。
en: Skills related to social science, including a wide range of techniques that'll help you understand trading, making deliveries, staff management, diplomatic relationships, etc.

zh: 祖沃德·阿登的徘徊者级飞船
神示级象征着艾玛军事技术的顶峰。帝国工程师们发扬了生产世上最坚固装甲附甲的光荣传统，超越自我，制造出了无可争议的史上回复能力最强的无畏舰。不仅如此，神示级具有发射旗舰级激光束的能力，这使得它在战场上拥有独特地位。在发动大规模围歼战时，这艘舰船将是你的不二选择。
en: The Revelation represents the pinnacle of Amarrian military technology. Maintaining their proud tradition of producing the strongest armor plating to be found anywhere, the Empire's engineers outdid themselves in creating what is arguably the most resilient dreadnought in existence. Added to that, the Revelation's ability to fire capital beams makes its position on the battlefield a unique one. When extended sieges are the order of the day, this is the ship you call in.

zh: 神秘势力抵达了新伊甸，他们认同福祸相依的理论，他们可能比朱庇特人还要古老，这艘神秘的舰船带着他们远古时期的期望来到这里。
en: A mysterious faction has arrived in New Eden. They hold the belief that disasters and good fortune are often inextricably linked. They may even be more ancient than the Jovians. This mysterious ship brought their ancient dream here.

zh: 神秘势力抵达了新伊甸，他们认过犹不及的理论，他们可能比朱庇特人还要古老，这艘神秘的舰船带着他们远古时期的期望来到这里。
en: A mysterious faction has arrived in New Eden. They hold the belief that more is not always better. They may even be more ancient than the Jovians. This mysterious ship brought their ancient dream here.

zh: 神秘，庄严，圣洁，是艾玛建筑和舰船的主要风格。
en: Mysterious, solemn, holy and pure. These are the core design principles of Amarr structures and ships.

zh: 离线后舰船仍停留在太空
en: The ship will remain in space after you log out

zh: 秃鹫级快捷灵巧。其货柜容量有限，因此不适合用作贸易或采矿船。它最适合在游击战中承担突击舰的角色。
en: The Condor is fast and agile. It has limited cargo space, so it's not very suitable for trading or mining. It's best used as an assault vessel in hit-and-run type operations.

zh: 秃鹫级游击战中表现出色，三岛集团在基础版本上进行了电子化改装，使其作战能力大幅提升。
en: The Condor performs well in guerilla warfare. Hyasyoda modified the electronic equipment on the basic model, greatly improving its combat capabilities.

zh: 秃鹫级轻巧敏捷，速度很快。它的货舱空间有限，所以不适合贸易或者开采矿石。它的最佳用途是执行闪电式的突击任务。
en: The Condor is fast and agile. It has limited cargo space so it's not very suitable for trading or mining. It is best used as an assault vessel in a hit-and-run type of operations.

zh: 秉持着海盗一贯的恶劣习性，“野兔”克拉克·卡萨加米无耻地窃取了“毒蝎”级战列舰的设计思路，并融入了自己的风格。其结果就是：可怕的“响尾蛇”级诞生了，这是任何古斯塔斯大规模战斗中的旗舰型号。当然还有另外一种完全相反的说法：人们之所以对“毒蝎”的起源三缄其口，可能就是因为其设计从头到尾都是由卡萨加米完成的。
en: In the time-honored tradition of pirates everywhere, Korako 'Rabbit' Kosakami shamelessly stole the idea of the Scorpion-class battleship and put his own spin on it. The result: the fearsome Rattlesnake, flagship of any large Guristas attack force. There are, of course, also those who claim things were the other way around; that the notorious silence surrounding the Scorpion's own origins was, in fact, an indication of its having been designed by Kosakami all along.

zh: 种子来啦？但愿还赶得上播种！
en: The seeds are here? I hope I can make it before the sowing starts!

zh: 种子的成色，好的孬的，我一瞧就清楚！
en: I can tell at a glance if the seeds are good or not!

zh: 科利安·韦恩的多米尼克斯级飞船

en: Tech level upgraded, you can fly ships at tech level {4|skill_level:_tr} and below.

zh:
稳定的稀有同位素，对维持特殊动力体系至关重要。

可以从下列类型的行星开采获得：
熔岩行星
贫瘠行星
风暴行星
en:
A rare, stable isotope, essential for maintaining special power generating processes.

Can be obtained by mining the following types of planets:
Lava Planet
Barren Planet
Storm Planet

zh: 稳定的结构防御系统，修复速度缓慢，启用耗电量很低。
en: Stable hull defense system. Has a low repair speed and a low activation cost.

zh: 穆塔马·切科的裂谷级飞船
空荡荡的宇宙没有任何回声，只剩下跃迁引擎留下的微弱的空间波动信号。
en: There are no echoes in the emptiness of space, only the weak fluctuations left by warp drives.

zh: 空间农场的空壳。尽管被废弃了很久，但它依然保存完好。可能某天一个勇于冒险的农民会在此居住。
en: The empty hull of an astro farm. Though it was abandoned long ago it's still in good shape. Maybe one day an adventurous farmer will take up residence here.

zh: 空间站修理设施的运作所需的车床、磨床、铆接机、开卷机和不同其他类型的机械。
en: Lathes, grinders, riveting machines, uncoilers, and various other pieces of machinery required for the operation of a space station repair facility.

zh: 空间站实验室的建筑材料和研究工具。
en: Construction materials and research tools for space station laboratories.

zh: 空间站市场货物的市场访问电子部件和安全储藏设施。
en: Market access electronics and secure market goods storage facilities for space stations.

zh: 空间站机库的管理员会暂时帮你看管它们，你过一会直接到物品机库去找它们就行了。
en: The administrator in the station hanger will look after them for you. You can just leave them in the Item Hangar and come back for them later.

zh: 空间站的药品、麻醉剂、手术设备和完整的克隆设备。
en: Medicine, anaesthetics, surgical supplies and complete cloning facilities for space stations.

第一艘毒蝎级战列舰的出航只不过是几年前的事情，目前已经造出的一些都被认为是原型机。有关它性能的信息非常少，但已知情报显示，毒蝎级最大限度地装配了几乎无人能敌的高科技装备。
en: The first Scorpion-class battleship was launched only a couple of years ago, and those that have been built are considered to be prototypes. Little is known of its capabilities, but what has been garnered suggests that the Scorpion is crammed to the brink with sophisticated hi-tech equipment that few can match.

zh: 等先把另一个驻留点的暴民解决，我再来跟你算这笔账。
en: I'll settle the score between us – after I've dealt with some rioters in another refuge.

zh: 等等……残骸的记录中显示，有一艘穿梭机在奴隶叛变之前离开了舰队。
en: Wait... The log in the wreck shows that a shuttle left the fleet before the slaves rebelled.

zh: 等等！怎么回事！不是面谈吗？
en: Wait! What is this? Isn't this supposed to be a face-to-face conversation?
Wait a second. We can't hand over the person just yet
Wait, I can't give it to you yet.
Wait, we can't give you the ores
Hold on, let me run a test first.

zh: 等等，飞行员，你有没有见到奇怪的舰船在战斗中跃迁脱离？
en: Wait, pilot. Did you see a strange ship warp away from combat?

zh: 筛选可以隐藏总览内不希望显示的目标。
en: You can use the filter to hide the targets you don't want to see in the Overview.

zh: 算盘打得不错，老滑头。不过，我可没打算奉陪。
en: Well played, you old slicker. I'm not planning to accompany you on that though.

zh: 管他呢，反正这也不是我该操心的事儿。
en: Whatever. It's none of my business.

zh: 管船坞的那个家伙的手指也一并给我砍了。
en: Also, cut off the fingers of the guy who's in charge of the shipyard.

zh: 米玛塔尔人独立高傲，意志坚强，拥有丰富的部落传统。
en: The Minmatar are independent, haughty and iron-willed. They possess a rich heritage of tribal traditions.

zh: 米玛塔尔人的务实精神在伐木者级上表现的淋漓尽致，维洛奇亚战斗后勤队的技术人员成功对其进行了截击电子化改进，使其成为专业型的小队战护卫舰。
en: The Slasher perfectly illustrates the no-nonsense nature of the Minmatar. The Vherokior combat logistics team successfully modified it for interception, turning it into a frigate specialized in squadron combat.

米玛塔尔在小型舰队的投入最多，所以也是第一研究出反制小队侵入战术舰船的组织，尤其一些负责运输的后勤型团队。
en: The Minmatar have prioritized investment in small-scale fleets, which is why they were the first to develop ships to guard against squadron-based incursions, courtesy of some of their logistics teams.

zh: 米玛塔尔在局部战场上的失利被图克尔的工程技术人员敏锐的捕捉，技术团队对弯刀级进行了适应性改造。（突击型主要用于对抗力场布设型的舰船，快速突进并释放大量火力输出是其显著的特点）
en: Sharp Thukker engineers quickly summed up the reasons behind Minmatar's defeat in local battles and modified the Talwar accordingly. (The assault variant destroyer specializes against targets that rely heavily on force fields. Rushing in and dealing large amounts of damage is its signature tactic.)

zh: 米玛塔尔大团结又进了一步！
en: Another step towards a united Minmatar!

zh: 米玛塔尔大型无人机使用的武器。
en: A weapon used by Minmatar Large Drones.

zh: 米玛塔尔大起义时期为了躲避艾玛的追捕，图克尔人早已移民至了新伊甸的每一个角落。共和国建立后，不断有图克尔人回乡祭祖。一批图克尔移民因为交通堵塞滞留在了{2|station_name:_tr}，市政管理局正在征募一名飞行员帮助疏散移民。
en: During the Great Minmatar Rebellion, the Thukker immigrated to every corner of New Eden to hide from the Amarr. After the Republic was established, many Thukkers returned to their homeland to commemorate their ancestors. A group of immigrants became stranded at {2|station_name:_tr} due to space traffic. Urban Management is looking for a pilot to help transport the immigrants.

en: The ancestors of the Minmatar used to live here. After they were enslaved by the Amarrians, this place gradually lost its vitality – "Never Again"

zh: 米玛塔尔矿业联合体在艾玛征服米玛塔尔之前就已经建立。它承担了共和国内绝大部分矿物供应的需求。米玛塔尔矿业联合体长期向愿意为共和国出力的克隆人矿工提供矿石收购合同。
en: The Minmatar Mining Corporation was established before the Amarrians conquered the Minmatar. It provides ore supplies to meet most of the Republic's needs. For a long time, the Minmatar Mining Corporation has been offering ore acquisition orders to Capsuleer miners who are willing to contribute to the State.

zh:
米纳斯·伊卡萨恩将军是艾玛帝国的战争英雄。  他曾在8年前率领舰队击败了针对艾玛领地的最大一波血袭者袭击。他为帝国海军效命了40余年，忠诚如一。作为一名皇室成员，米纳斯·伊卡萨恩一进入帝国学院后，很快就确立了其军事指挥官的地位。

米纳斯现在正率领艾玛/艾玛达/卡尼迪/加达里联军在奥德斯德尔与米玛塔尔部队及其联盟进行对抗。
en:
Minas Iksan is a vetern war hero of the Amarr Empire.  He led the fleet that defeated the largest Blood Raider armada ever to attack an Amarrian settlement eight years ago. His credentials also include over 40 years of dedicated service to the Imperial Navy. Born of Royalty, his place as a commander of the military was quickly established upon his entrance into the Imperial Academy.

Minas now leads the Amarr/Ammatar/Khanid/Caldari campaign against the Minmatar and their allies in Audesder.

zh: 米纳斯·伊卡萨恩将军是驻扎在科诺巴纳拉的艾玛军队及其盟军的最高级别的军官。他的职责是确保“泰伦事件”顺利解决。若其发展为全面战争，他将率领舰队进入奥德斯代尔。米纳斯指挥一艘“神示”级战舰，目前正在进行维修。 任务：  难度等级：8.5级
en:
General Minas Iksan is the highest ranking officer of the Amarr forces and their allies stationed in Kenobanala.  His responsibility is to see to it that the 'Tyrion incident' is resolved, and to lead his armada into Audesder should it come to all-out-war.

Minas commands a Revelation, which is currently undergoing maintenance.

Missions: 

Difficulty Rating: Grade 8.5

zh: 米纳斯·伊卡萨恩将军是驻扎在科诺巴纳拉的艾玛军队及其盟军的最高级别的军官。他的职责是确保“泰伦事件”顺利解决，若其发展为全面战争，他将率领舰队进入奥德斯代尔。米纳斯指挥一艘“神示”级无畏舰。该舰集中了艾玛所有的尖端科技。帝国工程师们发扬了生产世上最坚固装甲附甲的光荣传统，超越自我，制造出了无可争议的史上回复能力最强的无畏舰。不仅如此，“神示”级具有发射旗舰级激光束的能力，这使得它在战场上拥有独特地位。在发动大规模围歼战时，这艘舰船将是你的不二选择。
en:
General Minas Iksan is the highest ranking officer of the Amarr forces and their allies stationed in Kenobanala.  His responsibility is to see to it that the 'Tyrion incident' is resolved, and to lead his armada into Audesder should it come to all-out-war.

Minas commands a Revelation.  It represents the pinnacle of Amarrian military technology.  Maintaining their proud tradition of producing the strongest armor plating to be found anywhere, the Empire's engineers outdid themselves in creating what is arguably the most resilient dreadnought in existence.

Added to that, the Revelation's ability to fire capital beams makes its position on the battlefield a unique one.  When extended sieges are the order of the day, this is the ship you call in.

zh: 米纳斯·伊卡萨恩将军的神示级战舰_旧
米纳斯·伊卡萨恩的控制塔
粉丝们还真是热情啊！呵呵。
en: These fans are really enthusiastic! Haha.

zh: 粉丝送出的海量礼物，总部实在存放不下，不得不定期处理，运到市场做二手转卖。我现在就把坐标发给你。
en: The fans have sent over a huge amount of gifts. They're unable to store all of them at headquarters, and they had to transfer them to the second-hand market for sale. I'm sending the coordinates to you now.

zh: 粗犷却又不失灵动，加上不拘小节建筑形式，米玛塔尔总能表现出与众不同的一面。
en: Rough, but never clumsy: these characteristics, along with their unique, unrefined architectural style, allow the Minmatar to always stand out.

zh: 粮食救济会人员的居住舱
精英野兔小队委托信标
精通于采掘作业或者采集气云，是新伊甸发展的基石。
en: Highly efficient in mining or gas cloud harvesting. The cornerstone of New Eden's development.
The system is busy. Please try again later.

zh: 索拉·迪斯托的断崖级飞船
提升效果：提升效果将根据对应属性的基础值进行计算。
en: Effect boost: The effect boost is calculated based on the base stats of the corresponding attribute.

zh: 红色晶体，在大型小行星或卫星内部深处的高压环境中形成。用于电子和武器制造业。仅在少数地区储量丰富。
en: Mykoserocin is a crystalline compound formed by intense pressure deep within large asteroids and moons. The crystals are commonly used in electronics and weapon manufacturing, as well as the creation of legalized Synth booster variants. Mykoserocin can only be found in abundance in a few areas, such as interstellar gas clouds within high security space.

纳卡穆塔的因卡萨斯级飞船
纳基托·伊阿德茨的秃鹫级飞船
纳基维集团是一个以娱乐业为主的超级集团，它的很多产品都打法律的擦边球，使得纳基维集团与黑手党之间，形成了相互共生的关系。
en: The Nugoeihuvi Corporation is a megacorporation mainly engaged in the entertainment industry. Many of its products are borderline illegal, and as a result, the Nugoeihuvi Corporation has a mutual symbiotic relationship with the Mafia.

zh: 纳米机器人加速器 I
纳米机器人加速器 II

纳米机器人加速器蓝图 IV
纵使帝国的封臣们都有各自明确的领地，但是他们之间的边境摩擦依旧层出不穷。近日，阿狄莎波家族的一支矿队跑到了萨拉姆家族的地盘挖矿，萨拉姆家族打算用自己的方式给他们一点教训。
en: Even though the vassals of the Empire have their own space territories, there is still endless border friction between them. Recently, a miner team of the Ardishapur Family crossed over into the Sarum Family's territory to mine, and the Sarum Family decided to teach them a lesson in their own way.

zh: 纵使神学理事会已经掌控艾玛多年，依然能够听到不满者对神学理事会的质疑之声。神学理事舍得出高价索取一名异端分子的性命，此人时常在公开场合发表针对神学理事会的不良言论。
en: Even though the Theology Council has been in control of Amarr for many years, there are still dissidents who question its teachings. The Theological Council is willing to pay a high price for the life of a certain heretic, who has made frequent subversive statements against the Theological Council in public.

zh: 细节报告我直接发给你了，反正钱管够，你只要把事情搞定。
en: I'm sending you the detailed report now. You'll receive all the money you want as long as get it done.

zh: 终于有人肯借这个任务了，这些共和国的毒瘤，每天都被他们弄得焦头烂额。
en: Finally, the mission is accepted. Those Republic scum are giving me headaches every day.

zh: 终于来了，等了你好久了。
en: So you're here. We've been waiting for you.

zh: 终于来了，终于来了！真是急死我了！
en: It's finally here! I'm done waiting!

zh: 经历了9次克隆，我的身体，我的记忆，我的……这还是“我”吗？
en: I've been cloned 9 times. My body... My memories... My everything... Am I even... “me” still?

zh: 经过几个月的辛苦破译，我们查到了一个古斯塔斯海盗据点的位标。
en: After several months of decryption work, we found the coordinates of a Guristas Pirates stronghold.

zh: 经过分析战斗数据，我们发现那几个劫匪可能受过完整的特种作战训练。
en: After analyzing the battle data, we found that the bandits may have had full special operations training.

zh: 经过强化的天使空间站。 外界不清楚这里发生了什么。
en:
Reinforced Angel Station.

Little is known about what exactly goes on in here.

zh: 经过某种特殊数学加密的文件。尽管信息技术高度发达，但是这种古老的实体文件还是确保某个秘密安全的最佳方式。
en: A document that's been mathematically encrypted. Even though information technology has become extremely advanced, nothing keeps secrets better than old, physical documents like this one.

zh: 给我接通联邦政府部的泰利斯。
en: Get Thales of the Federal Administration on the line.

zh: 绝不能容许这样的事情发生！
en: I will not allow such a thing to happen!

zh: 统合部 第一等兵士
统合部 第三等兵士
统合部 第二等兵士
统合部公告屏带给你最新的消息及荣誉追击的情况。
en: Concord Billboards keep you updated, bringing you the latest news and bounty information.

zh: 统合部在艾玛帝国、加达里合众国、盖伦特联邦和米玛塔尔共和国（排名不分先后）的许可下，为克隆人飞行员打造的试飞作训型舰船，祝你新伊甸飞行快乐，记得守法缴税和做你想做的事情。
en: CONCORD constructed this trainer ship with permission from the Amarr Empire, the Caldari State, the Gallente Federation, and the Minmatar Republic (no specific order). We wish you a fantastic voyage. Remember to pay your taxes and follow your heart.

zh: 统合部对这个建筑的分析只能提供一些少得可怜又语焉不详的信息。对建筑被毁坏区域的调查显示有一种强大而目的明确的神秘力量介入其中。这个建筑毫无疑问属于朱庇特，但它先进的建造材料及工艺让人难以确定它存在多久了。不管其年龄，可以说，这个建筑超越了我们之前所见过的任何东西。
en: CONCORD's analysis has revealed only scant and confusing information about this structure. Surveys of the damaged areas of the structure reveal a series of clearly powerful but functionally mysterious elements. The structure is undoubtedly Jove in origin but it is hard to determine its exact age given the advanced nature of the materials and construction. Regardless of its age, it is safe to say the structure surpasses anything we have previously seen.

zh: 统合部对这个建筑的分析只能提供一些少得可怜又语焉不详的信息。对建筑被毁坏区域的调查显示有一种强大而目的明确的神秘力量介入其中。这个建筑毫无疑问属于朱庇特，但它先进的建造材料及工艺让人难以确定它存在多久了。可以说，这个建筑超越了我们之前所见过的任何东西。
en: CONCORD's analysis has revealed only scant and confusing information about this structure. Surveys of the damaged areas of the structure reveal a series of clearly powerful but functionally mysterious elements. The structure is undoubtedly Jove in origin but it is hard to determine its exact age given the advanced nature of the materials and construction. Regardless of its age, it is safe to say the structure surpasses anything we have previously seen.

zh: 统合部已经调配了陆战队员，正等您将他们运送到事发地点。我这就将坐标发给您。
en: CONCORD has deployed marines and they're waiting for you to take them to where it happened. I'm sending you the coordinates now.

zh: 统合部联合安全局将全面保障你的权益，密切关注你的成长。
en: The DED will protect your rights and closely follow your future development.

zh: 统合部舰船通常采用先进的船体建造工艺，即使在舰船受到完全损伤时也能保持外表的完整性。这个残骸看上去就是一个最直接的例子——尽管外壳看上去没有受到严重的损伤，但整个舰船很明显已经完全丧失了所有功能。
en: CONCORD vessels employ advanced hull technology which allows them to maintain external integrity even after the ship has suffered complete systems failure. This is definitely one of those cases - while the hull appears intact, the rest of the ship is very clearly non-functional

zh: 继续前进将离开统合部管辖范围，你很可能遭到敌对势力的攻击，无论如何都要进入吗？
en: You're about to leave CONCORD's jurisdiction, which means you may be attacked by hostile forces. Do you wish to proceed anyway?

zh: 继续前进将进入安全等级较低的星系，这里统合部影响力较小，你很可能遭受敌对势力的攻击，确定要进入吗？
en: You're about to enter a low-security system where CONCORD's influence is limited, which means you may be attacked by hostile forces. Do you wish to proceed?

zh: 继续前进将进入非常危险的星系，这已经超出了统合部的保护范围，确定要进入吗？
en: You're about to enter a very dangerous system, where you will not be under CONCORD's protection. Do you wish to proceed?

zh: 维安内·欧尼的分裂级飞船
维尔瑕能的苍鹭级飞船
维护帝国境内的信仰是神学理事会的基本职责。当有异端分子集合起来反对神学理事会的权威时，神学理事会愿意出高价钱铲除这些异端。
en: The primary duty of the Theology Council is to safeguard and maintain the religion of the Empire. When heretics unite against the authority of the Theology Council, the Council is willing to pay a high price to purge them.

zh: 维拉托尔号轻型护卫舰是盖伦特舰队中较古老的一种。它原本作为高速客运飞船出现在市场上，但由于其新型号开始被用于小规模的保安和军事行动中，其额外的客舱后来被改装为武器槽。维拉托尔号还是艘非常可靠的采矿和贸易飞船。
en: The Velator-class corvette is one of the older types of vessel in the Gallente fleet. It was first deployed on the market as a fast passenger craft but the extra passenger quarters were later modified into weapon points as the newer models came to be used for small-scale security and military duties. The Velator is still a very solid mining and trading vessel.

zh: 维斯特·高斯的奥内罗斯级飞船
维斯特·鲁杜里的裂谷级飞船
维纳·萨皮艾伦的天鹤级飞船
维考·塔尔拉瑕的毒蝎级飞船
维达尔·厄杂科的火尾鸡级
维鲜集团设计的新船。在老式劳工运送船的基础上加以改造。
en: A recent ship from Viziam. Based on a old slave transport design.
Edit fitting name and fitting type

zh: 缚魂 无人机伤害增效装置
罗那伦·艾文维尔的埃比斯级

en: Are all the criminals eliminated? That's great.

zh: 群体电容传输器作用范围
老兵 小型护盾回充增量器
老头，在你继续你那无病呻吟的感叹之前我必须打断一下。
en: Allow me to interrupt your pointless rambling, old man.

zh: 考拉·查克塔伦末日沙场级飞船
而且，我的主人其实对我们还不错，而且，我还有农活要做，而且……
en: Besides, my master actually treats us quite well. And I still have some farming to do. And...

zh: 而且，有些话我觉得可能不敢说……
en: And there are things I'm afraid to say...

zh: 耶利集团是一个有着浓厚外国血统的公司，这样的公司能在加达里立足是非常罕见的。这使得他们时常需要应对一些对于其他集团来说并不存在的麻烦。
en: Ytiri is a rare example of an outsider company that managed to establish itself within the Caldari State. This means that it often has to deal with troubles that do not exist for other corporations.

zh: 耶塔·尼克的启示级飞船
联合矿业改造了冲锋者级的矿石收集装置，不过改造并不是很彻底，只能说是一次比较小的优化。
en: ORE modified the Venture's ore-collecting devices, but the modifications were limited in scope and only served as small optimizations.

zh: 联合矿业改造了冲锋者级的矿石收集装置，这次改造虽然不是很彻底，但性能已经大幅提升了。
en: ORE modified the Venture's ore-collecting devices. Although the modifications are limited in scope, the improvements to its performance are impressive.

zh: 联合矿业逆向工程成功率
联合矿业逆向工程研究速度
联邦在拦截侵入的小型舰队方面一直没有投入太多资源，某些货运集团决定自行改进促进级，使其可以拦阻小型侵入舰队战术。
en: The Federation's government has never prioritized defense against small fleet incursions. Some shipping corporations therefore decided to modify the Catalyst themselves, making it more suited to repelling small-scale attacks.

zh: 联邦在继精华之域之后殖民的第一座星域就是埃维希尔。在这座星域的小行星带里发现了海量的凡晶石和灼烧岩，联邦用前所未见的精力对其进行挖掘以满足其疆土不断扩张的建设需求。后来，当这些小行星带被开采到一定程度时，大规模采矿业务已不具备经济效益，于是人们将贪婪的眼光投向了那些行星，决心要开采它们获取矿物。但是，在阿克兰星系某个充满茂密原始森林的星球上发生的一起事件迫使政府介入了进来。为了争取同联邦海军的一大笔合同，星形矿业向该星球大气中散布了一种除草剂，打算清空所有的原始森林以开始采矿。这是一种无知的破坏行动，许多人们尚未了解的植物和动物种类因此灭绝，这种行为激怒了许多杰出的生态学者，他们强行让参议院通过了一项议案：如果没有联邦参议院授予许可，不得对有生命形式存在的星球的生态系统以任何方式进行损害。这条法律被称为《阿克兰协议》，并且至今仍在发挥效力。
en: The first region that the Federation colonized after Essence was Everyshore. The asteroid belts of this region were found to hold significant amounts of Veldspar and Scordite, which the Federation mined with a vigor never seen before in order to fuel construction projects that their quickly expanding borders required. When the belts were mined to a level that made large scale operations uneconomical, greedy eyes turned towards the planets, intent on mining these for minerals.    An incident on a lush jungle planet in the Aclan system forced the government to intervene. Astral Mining, filling a large contract for the Federation Navy, introduced a herbicide into the atmosphere to clear the jungle and enable mining to begin. Outraged at this senseless destruction, where many species of flora and fauna were lost that had not even been studied, prominent ecologists managed to force a bill through the Senate: no planet that supported any life-form was to have its ecosystem tampered with in any way without a license being granted from the Federation Senate. This law became known as The Aclan Agreement and it remains in place to this day.

zh: 联邦政府希望对我们旗下的艺人进行调查，所以需要你配合接送一下。
en: The Federal Administration wishes to investigate one of our artists, so we need you to help with picking them up.

zh: 联邦海关局查获了一艘运有大量违禁货品的运输船，但是没想到货船驾驶员抗拒执法，打伤海关人员后架船逃窜。
en: Federal Customs seized a transport ship carrying a large amount of contraband. But to their surprise, the pilot violently resisted capture and fled after injuring the Customs officers.

zh: 联邦海军 中型群体装甲维修器
en: Federation Navy Medium Group Armor Repairer

zh: 联邦海军 中型装甲维修器
联邦海军 中型装甲连接模块
en: Federation Navy Medium Armor Link Module

zh: 联邦海军 信号放大器
联邦海军 停滞缠绕光束
联邦海军 全方位索敌连接
联邦海军 反应式装甲增强器
联邦海军 大型装甲维修器
联邦海军 大型装甲连接模块
en: Federation Navy Large Armor Link Module

zh: 联邦海军 小型群体装甲维修器
en: Federation Navy Small Group Armor Repairer

zh: 联邦海军 小型装甲维修器
联邦海军 小型装甲连接模块
en: Federation Navy Small Armor Link Module

zh: 联邦海军 惯性稳定器
联邦海军 损伤控制
联邦海军 无人机伤害增效装置
联邦海军 无人机导航电脑
联邦海军 灵敏度抑制发射器
联邦海军 盖伦特中型无人机武器
en: Federation Navy Gallente Medium Drone Weapon

zh: 联邦海军 盖伦特大型无人机武器
en: Federation Navy Gallente Large Drone Weapon

zh: 联邦海军 盖伦特小型无人机武器
en: Federation Navy Gallente Small Drone Weapon

zh: 联邦海军 盖伦特岗哨无人机武器
en: Federation Navy Gallente Sentry Drone Weapon

zh: 联邦海军 磁性力场稳定器
联邦海军 第一中士
联邦海军 索敌计算机
联邦海军 自适应装甲增强器
联邦海军 舰队将军
联邦海军 舰队少校
联邦海军 跃迁扰断器
联邦海军 跃迁扰频器
联邦海军的飞行员们总是过于富有激情，这让他们中的很多人都在蛮勇的冲锋中化为炙热的火球，研制这个系列舰船的目的正是希望有勇无谋的飞行员多一份谨慎。弥洱米顿级是其同门兄弟的强化版本，是能够在战场上持久作战的飞船。它的无数中高能量槽位使它能有条不紊地从敌人中开辟一条道路，而在它强大的无人机携带能力面前，任何敌人都无法毫发不伤。
en: Worried that their hot-shot pilots would burn brightly in their eagerness to engage the enemy, the Federation Navy created a ship that encourages caution over foolhardiness. A hardier version of its counterpart, the Myrmidon is a ship designed to persist in battle. Its numerous medium and high slots allow it to slowly bulldoze its way through the opposition, while its massive drone space ensures that no enemy is left unscathed.

zh: 联邦由多个种族构成，而盖伦特人是最主要的组成部分。
en: The Federation is a racially diverse nation, with the Gallente forming the majority of its population.

zh: 联邦的隐形战术一直不弱，不过促进级成为隐形驱逐舰还是一次美丽的误会，但没人在乎误会是什么，不过促进级优秀的平台改装出什么样的舰船都不奇怪。
en: The Federation has always been good at using stealth tactics, but turning the Catalyst into a stealth destroyer was all down to a beautiful misunderstanding that no one cared to clear up. With excellent potential for upgrades, the Catalyst has seen all kinds of strange modifications.

zh: 肉呢，烧肉呢，斯塔科马尼人最喜欢的玛塔尔传统烧肉呢？
en: Where's my meat? Where's my roast meat? Where's my favorite traditional Matar-style roast meat?

zh: 肝脏分泌的碱性液体，储存在胆囊之中，能帮助消化，分解血红蛋白。
en: Alkaline fluid secreted by the liver and stored in the gall bladder. It aids digestion and hemoglobin breakdown.
Can you send me back to Ammatar?

zh: 能在长尾鲛级核心局面反跃迁型驱逐舰下跃迁逃跑的目标不太多，这个驱逐舰平台是共和海军的荣耀。
en: Few targets can escape from Core Complexion's custom anti-warping Thrashers, the pride of the Republic Fleet.

zh: 能够孕育生命的星球通常都被认作是“温和”的星球，其所拥有的适宜气候就是它们的首要特征。存在有稳定生态系统的星球通常会被作为殖民规划的首要选择，因为要在这些星球上生存下来，相对要容易得多。因此，绝大多数人口稠密的行星实际上都是属于这种类型的星体。总的来说，想要通过细致的勘察在新伊甸中发现各个历史时期的居住痕迹，并不是一件十分困难的事情。
en: Life-bearing worlds are often referred to as "temperate", as their mild temperatures are one of their defining features. Planets with existing, stable ecosystems are prime targets for colonization efforts as they are generally easier to make fully habitable; as a result, the majority of highly populated worlds are of this type. Indeed, it is not altogether uncommon for detailed surveys to reveal signs of previous settlements from various stages of New Eden's history.

zh: 能够瞬时命中目标的武器系统，主要造成动能和热能伤害。
en: A weapon system that can hit the target instantly. Deals mainly kinetic damage and thermal damage.

zh: 能够立即命中目标的武器系统，主要造成电磁和热能伤害。
en: A weapon system that can hit the target immediately. Deals mainly EM damage and thermal damage.

zh: 能更有效地散去能量武器的积聚热量，从而加快了它们的发射速度；短时间内过载可以使其获得更强的效果。
en: Dissipates the heat of energy weapons more efficiently, thus allowing them to be fired more rapidly. Overheating it can temporarily amplify its effects.

zh: 能有幸见到赫特手下最出名的王牌飞行员，我深感荣幸。
en: I am honored to have met Heth's best pilot.

zh: 能生成一个以舰船为中心的护盾防御力场，保护其中舰船免受外部攻击。
en: It can generate a ship-centered defensive force field that protects the ship from external attacks.

zh: 能装配用于作战网络装备和微型跳跃力场发生器等舰队支援装备的高级舰船。
en: An advanced ship that can be equipped with fleet support modules such as battle-use network equipment and Micro Jump Field Generators.

zh: 能走就不错了，消消气。我有个侄女，一年前出发去泛光之源度蜜月，现在孩子都出生了，还滞留在一个不知名的空间站呢。
en: At least you can still leave. Just calm down. I have a niece who went on a honeymoon in Luminaire a year ago and never came back. She's still out there in a station somewhere, with a child.

zh: 能追查到是谁在假扮血袭者吗？
en: Can you find out who those fake Blood Raiders are?

zh: 能量中和器能量栅格需求

能量栅格：{power}/{powerOutput}
装备能量栅格总和超出舰船最大能量栅格时，无法启用装备
en:
Powergrid: {power}/{powerOutput}
Module unavailable when ship max powergrid is reached

zh: 能麻烦你到{2|station_name:_tr}一趟吗？有一个非常重要的东西需要你运送。
en: Could you please head to {2|station_name:_tr}? I need you to help deliver something very important.

zh: 腐蚀的古斯塔斯岩石群
腐蚀的古斯塔斯开采地
腐蚀的古斯塔斯碰撞点
腐蚀的古斯塔斯粒子加速器
腐蚀的古斯塔斯落单船只
腐蚀的古斯塔斯采矿设施
腐蚀的天使粒子加速器
腐蚀的天蛇粒子加速器
腐蚀的萨沙粒子加速器
腐蚀的血袭者粒子加速器
腐蚀的血袭者落单船只
腐蚀的血袭者采矿设施

自其恐怖的身影第一次现身于幽暗的星海后，围绕着噩梦级战列舰设计理念的谣言就从没有停歇过，据传它被打上了萨沙·库瓦柯伊独有的疯狂烙印。还能有谁——阴谋论者争论道——会使用这么古怪却又性能惊人的设计？



各种这样那样的流言都在萨沙于YC111-112年间发动的入侵行动中得以证实——遮云蔽日的噩梦级舰队向星球上的居民以及飞行员们发动了猛烈攻击，将效忠于他们的首领萨沙·库瓦柯伊视为最高荣耀。
en:
When this terror was first seen haunting the spacelanes, rumors abounded about its design, which bore the indelible stamp of Sansha Kuvakei's unique madness. Who else, the conspiracy theorists argued, could come up with such marvelously twisted designs?
These and other theories were all but confirmed during the Sansha invasions of YC 111-112, as endless swarms of Nightmare fleets descended upon planet dweller and Capsuleer alike, eager to serve their returned master Sansha Kuvakei once again.

zh: 自天庭俯瞰，大地邪恶暗涌，战火连绵。神怒火中烧，亲入凡间，裁决卑贱之徒，救赎纯洁之心。——《圣典·启示录2:12》
en: Casting his sight on his realm, the Lord witnessed The cascade of evil, the torrents of war. Burning with wrath, He stepped down from the Heavens To judge the unworthy, To redeem the pure. -The Scriptures, Revelation Verses 2:12

zh: 自尊集团是一家盖伦特娱乐公司，他们利用人工智能创作音乐，旗下拥有数个超级偶像。
en: Egonics Inc. is a Gallente entertainment company who makes music with AI and owns a number of super idols.

zh: 自尊集团是一家盖伦特娱乐公司，他们利用人工智能创作音乐，旗下拥有数个超级偶像。这些偶像吸引了大批粉丝送礼，于是不得不定期雇人，将海量的礼物处理掉。
en: Egonics Inc. is a Gallente entertainment company who makes music with AI and owns a number of super idols. These idols receive gifts from their huge number of fans. The company has to hire people from time to time to get rid of the huge quantity of gifts they receive.

zh: 自尊集团是新伊甸最火爆的音乐公司，全联邦的娱乐记者都时刻关注着自尊集团的动态，自尊集团舰船通过的航路常常被安装了各种各样的窃听装备。
en: Egonics Inc. is the most popular music company in New Eden. Every entertainment journalist in the Federation follows the latest news about the company with keen interest. The routes frequently travelled by Egonics Inc. ships are often bugged with various eavesdropping devices.

zh: 自带访问限制的小型限制护盾发生器可以被布置在控制塔外的防御带。这使得母星周围安全性较差的区域也可以进行仓储或货物提取。
en: Smaller confined shield generators with their own access restrictions can be deployed outside the Control Tower's defense perimeter. This allows for lesser security areas around the Starbase, for purposes of storage or pickup.

zh: 自然 跃迁核心稳定器
自然科学相关技能，涵盖加密破解，物质反应，天文测算，星球研究等知识。
en: Skills related to natural science, including a wide range of knowledge that'll help you understand encryption, hacking, chemical reactions, astronomy, planet research, etc.

zh: 自由扩张集团向我们订购的建筑模块都在这里了。
en: The building modules ordered by the Freedom Expansion are here.

zh: 自由扩张集团是共和国的主要物流公司，他们的一艘工业舰不幸受到了海盗的袭击，缺乏完善安保的他们，只能尝试求助于克隆人飞行员。
en: Freedom Extension is one of the main logistics companies of the Republic. One of their industrial ships was unfortunately attacked by pirates. They lacked sufficient security and could only ask help from Capsuleer pilots.

zh: 自由扩张集团船队遇袭
自由扩张集团船队遇袭(专家)
自由扩张集团船队遇袭(进阶)
自由扩张集团船队遇袭委托信标
en: Mission Beacon: Freedom Extension Fleet Under Attack

zh: 自由技能点已注入，请前往技能界面查看
en: Free skill points issued. Please check the skill page.

zh: 自由无人机的大脑皮层碎片。
en: A fragment of a rogue drones cerebral cortex.

zh: 自由无人机的心脏，这个能源结构是项技术奇迹，它的尺寸/能量比超过了现代设计所能达到的水平。只要用一些巧妙的方法，就可能使它与当前的无人机技术相适应。
en: The beating heart of a rogue drone, this power unit is a marvel of technology providing a greater size/power ratio than is currently achievable by modern designs. With some clever tinkering it is possible to adapt this to interface with current drone technology.

zh: 自由无人机突触系统的传导线，它可以实现各大帝国科技都无法达到的高能量和信息流承载。
en: The relay wiring of a rogue drones synaptic system, these wires allow for a much higher flow of power and information than standard empire technology has yet to achieve.

zh: 自由海盗港口里的天使部队总部。
en: The headquarters of the Angel forces within Freebooters Haven.

zh: 舒达夫，你的愚蠢真是让我大开眼界。
en: Shudav, your stupidity really is next-level.

zh: 航线预置通道是最初由卡拉吉塔集团研发的一种设备，非常方便实用，可以将旅行者引导至星系内或周围的区域。最初发明的目的是为了帮助旅游者快速方便地在星系各重要景点间穿梭。但是最近它却在军事和海盗圈子里越来越受欢迎，因为它可以降低高度敏感的坐标被敌人发现的危险。现在再也不用向舰队的每艘舰船都发送位标，只要有一座航线预置通道就行了。它能对位于某常用集合地的飞船进行指引。这样保持坐标的隐秘性就很简单了，同时还能防止黑客侵入舰队飞船主机获取坐标。你必须先接近航线预置通道才能激活它。
en:
The Pathfinder Gate is a gizmo first produced by Kaalakiota corporation, as a handy navigational device in space that directs travelers to areas within and around the solarsystem.  It was originally created for tourist attractions as a quick and easy way to navigate between important sites within a solar-system.

However recently it has become quite popular within military and pirate circles, as a way to limit the risk of losing highly-sensitive coordinates to the enemy.  Instead of handing out bookmarks to every ship in the fleet, there would be a single Pathfinder Gate which would direct the ships from a common meetingplace.  That way keeping the coordinates hidden would be that much simpler, as well as preventing hackers from uncovering the coordinates by breaking into a computer mainframe of a ship of the fleet.

You must approach the Pathfinder Gate before you can activate it.

zh: 舰船停靠成功。{player_name}，你还不算太差劲。
舰船将会放置在当前空间站
en: The ship will be placed in storage in the current station

zh: 舰船的残骸。使用适当的设备或许还能够从这些残渣中打捞一些有价值的物品。
en: The remains of a destroyed ship. Perhaps with the proper equipment something of value could be salvaged from it.

zh: 装配方案无法适用于当前舰船
en: This fitting cannot be applied to this ship

zh: 舰船货仓中没有所需的货物
en: Required cargo is missing from the ship's cargo hold

zh: 舰船货柜似乎不够啊，你稍后自己来机库取东西吧。
en: There doesn't seem to be enough space in the ship's cargo hold. You can come by the hangar later and get them yourself.

zh: 舰载扫描设备的微波不断地扫向深空，却没有收到任何和古斯塔斯相关的特征信息。事实上，大海捞针也远比想在空洞而又深邃的空间中寻找一艘未知的舰船要来得容易得多。
en: Scanning devices continue to probe the depths of space, but nothing related to the Guristas has ever come back. Finding a needle in a haystack is nothing in comparison to locating an unknown ship in the endless void.

zh: 舰长阁下，您收到了一封来自视角传媒的采访邀请函。若有兴趣，可点击<a href="https://survey.163.com/htmls/it95zp/paper.html">查看详情浏览详细内容。
en: Captain, you have received an invitation to interview from the Scope. If you are interested, you can <a href="https://survey.163.com/htmls/it95zp/paper.html">tap here to view the details.

zh: 艳舞被认为是一种艺术形式，尽管并不是每个人都同意这种说法。公众场合裸露身体的行为在联邦是完全可以接受的，而在艾玛帝国却被视为一种极大的罪恶，是离经叛道的标志。
en: Exotic dancing is considered an art form, even though not everyone might agree. Exposing one's flesh in public places may be perfectly acceptable within the Federation, but in the Amarr Empire it's considered a grave sin and a sign of serious deviancy.

zh: 艾丁·昂卡的女妖级飞船
艾伯提兹的审判者飞船
艾可·奥赛玛的黑鸟级飞船
艾叶奥·格拉菲尔的堡垒
艾尔可棱的黑鸟级飞船
艾提恩·杜鲁尔的纳维达斯级飞船
艾斯塔坎的特里斯坦级飞船
艾玛·塔琴的巨鸟级飞船
艾玛中型无人机使用的武器。
en: A weapon used by Amarr Medium Drones.

zh: 艾玛使徒级战力辅助舰
艾玛先知级战列巡洋舰
艾玛先驱者级战列巡洋舰
艾玛历来喜欢威严壮观的建筑。他们的控制塔也沿袭了这一传统。这些控制塔是真正地巨大且有威力的建筑。与其说其存在目的是为了保卫商业利益，不如说是为了保卫领土完整。
en: The Amarr have always been fond of majestic and intimidating constructions. Their Control Towers do not deviate from that tradition and are truly big and powerful structures, intended more for preservation of territorial interests than commercial benefits.

zh: 艾玛地狱天使级战列舰
艾玛大型无人机使用的武器。
en: A weapon used by Amarr Large Drones.

zh: 艾玛小型无人机使用的武器。
en: A weapon used by Amarr Small Drones.

zh: 艾玛岗哨无人机使用的武器。
en: A weapon used by Amarr Scout Drones.

zh: 艾玛帝国幅员辽阔，这座位于战略位置的维修哨站表明，艾玛皇帝的意志即便在最偏僻遥远的角落也必将得到执行。
en: The Amarr Empire spreads far and wide and the presence of repair outposts at strategic locations ensures the will of the Emperor prevails in its every far flung corner.

zh: 艾玛帝国海军改良了强制者级，并大量运用在小队规模的战斗中。
en: The Amarr Imperial Navy made some modifications to the Coercer. The improved model is now used extensively in squadron-level combat.

zh: 艾玛帝国由五大家族组成，五大家族的领袖将通过一系列选举，轮流担任艾玛统治者。
en: The Amarr Empire consists of five families, the leaders of which, through a series of elections, take turns acting as the ruler of the Empire.

zh: 艾玛帝国由若干个独立的家族组成，在这些家族中，最有权势的就是五大继承者家族。每当上一任皇帝逝世，新的继承人就从继承者家族中选出。继承者需要经历一系列的考验和试炼，然而，真正的较量，早在继承者试炼开始之前就在暗中进行。
en: The Amarr Empire consists of several individual families, among which the five Heirs hold the most power. When an Emperor dies, a new successor is chosen from among the Heirs. The successor needs to go through a series of tests and trials before becoming the new Emperor. However, the real test is the competition between families that takes place beforehand.

zh: 艾玛帝国的封建义务驱使每一个效忠皇帝的领主参与自己领域的防御工作。战术哨站是帝国第一防线的脊梁。
en: Feudal obligations in the Amarr Empire force every lord loyal to the Emperor to participate in the defense of the realm. Tactical outposts serve as the backbone to the first line of defense the empire enjoys.

zh: 艾玛帝国的能量打击型舰船另其他势力感受到了另类的战术方式，守夜者级护卫舰经过图克尔改装后，也拥有了能量谐振的作用。
en: The energy attack ships of the Amarr Empire showcase an alternative strategy to other factions. After being modified by the Thukker, the Vigil also gained an Energy Resonance function.

zh: 艾玛帝国的能量打击型舰船另其他势力感受到了另类的战术方式，而佼佼者天主凝聚会改造了磨难级护卫舰，使其能量谐振紊乱功能更为强劲。
en: The energy weapon ships of the Amarr Empire showcase an alternative strategy to other factions. Carthum Conglomerate, one of the best in the field, modified the Crucifier frigates, enhancing their Energy Resonance Disrupting System.

zh: 艾玛帝国的能量打击型舰船另其他势力感受到了另类的战术方式，莱戴集团通过合作，获取了艾玛帝国的技术，并改造在狮鹫级护卫舰上。
en: The energy weapon ships of the Amarr Empire showcase an alternative strategy to other factions. Through intensive cooperation, Lai Dai acquired Amarr technology and modified the Griffin with it.

zh: 艾玛帝国的能量打击型舰船另其他势力感受到了另类的战术方式，莱登船业通过打捞一艘原型设备获取了类似的技术，并改造在毛鲁斯级护卫舰平台上。
en: The energy attack ships of the Amarr Empire showcase an alternative strategy to other factions. By salvaging a prototype device, Roden Shipyards acquired similar technologies, and modified the Maulus with them.
A Tourist's Guide to the Amarr Empire

zh: 艾玛普罗维登斯级货舰
艾玛末日沙场级战列舰
艾玛隐匿空间战术哨站
艾玛母星控制塔_强悍_掉落好
艾玛海军期望改良刽子手级，使其更适应快节奏的小型舰队决战，并可以更多的使用各种电子设备；传言说在这次改装中，阿荻沙波家族似乎也提供了一些稀有的技术。
en: The Amarr Imperial Navy modified the Executioner to make it more suitable for fast-paced, small fleet combat. Its capacity for using electronic equipment has also been improved. It's said that the Ardishapur family also provided some rare technology for the upgrade.

zh: 艾玛皇家海军近年来升级了许多飞船，而且还在增添新的型号。惩罚者级就是最近增添的飞船之一，许多人认为它是目前艾玛最好的护卫舰。从它配备的重型武器就可以看出，惩罚者级主要用于与大型军舰配合作战的大规模军事行动，不过它也完全能够胜任独立行动。
en: The Amarr Imperial Navy has been upgrading many of its ships in recent years and adding new ones. The Punisher is one of the most recent ones and considered by many to be the best Amarr frigate in existence. As witnessed by its heavy armaments, the Punisher is mainly intended for large-scale military operations, acting in coordination with larger military vessels, but it is more than powerful enough for solo operations.

zh: 艾玛能量中和器炮塔 I
艾玛能量中和器炮塔 II
艾玛能量中和器炮塔 III
艾玛超光速粒子束岗哨
艾玛达隐匿空间战术单位
艾玛达特统区人员控制的一个堡垒。
en: A bunker manned by personnel of the Ammatar Mandate.

zh: 艾玛达超光速粒子束岗哨
艾玛逆向工程研究速度
艾般博士希望你在他的罐子里放上一大笔钱。
en: Dr. Elban's kidnappers are expecting you to put a lot of money into this can.

zh: 艾薇·奥兹的小鹰级飞船
艾隆·瓦尔的促进级飞船
苍鹭级拥有优秀的计算机和电子系统，使其能够在电子战中发挥有力的作用。但由于它的防御和武器系统相对较弱，所以通常被用于执行侦查和搜索任务。
en: The Heron has good computer and electronic systems, giving it the option of participating in electronic warfare. But it has relatively poor defenses and limited weaponry, so it's more commonly used for scouting and exploration.

zh: 茶隼级护卫舰是一艘轻型导弹船，其感应器阵列是当今最精密的感应器阵列之一。有趣的是，它被加达里海军和一些富有的贸易集团当作货物运输船使用。它是少有的火力强大的贸易船只之一，非常适合在危险地区独自进行贸易运输。
en: The Kestrel is a light missile boat with one of the most sophisticated sensor arrays in the galaxy. Interestingly enough, it has been used by both the Caldari Navy and several wealthy trade corporations as a cargo-hauling vessel. It is one of few trading vessels with potent firepower, making it ideal for solo trade runs in dangerous regions of space.

zh: 茶隼级护卫舰是一艘重型导弹船，拥有一个相当大的货舱，其感应器阵列是当今最精密的感应器阵列之一。有趣的是，它被加达里海军和一些富有的贸易集团当作货物运输船使用。它是少有的火力强大的贸易船只之一，非常适合在危险地区独自进行贸易运输。茶隼级被设计为可装配四个导弹发射器，因此，它无法装备炮台武器或者采矿激光器。
en: The Kestrel is a heavy missile boat with a fairly large cargo space and one of the most sophisticated sensor arrays around. Interestingly enough, it has been used by both the Caldari Navy and several wealthy trade corporations as a cargo-hauling vessel. It is one of few trading vessels with good punching power, making it ideal for solo trade-runs in dangerous areas. The Kestrel was designed so that it could take up to four missile launchers but instead it can not be equipped with turret weapons nor mining lasers.

zh: 荒废的古斯塔斯古哨站
荒废的古斯塔斯太阳能采集器
荒废的古斯塔斯聚集地
荒废的古斯塔斯水晶开采地
荒废的古斯塔斯采矿设施
荒废的天使太阳能采集器
荒废的天使水晶开采地
荒废的天蛇太阳能采集器
荒废的天蛇水晶开采地
荒废的萨沙太阳能采集器
荒废的萨沙水晶开采地
荒废的血袭者太阳能采集器
荒废的血袭者水晶开采地
荒废的血袭者爆炸残片
荒废的血袭者采矿设施
荒无的古斯塔斯岩石群
药物实验室_思维冲击增效体
药物实验室_撞击感增效体
药物实验室_游离感增效体
药物已经收到，报酬很快就会发给你，再会。
en: They've received the medicine. The payment will be transferred to you ASAP. See ya!

zh: 莎露姆的毛鲁斯级飞船

莫尔石是一种相当奇异的矿物质，只存在于稀有的基腹断岩石之中。莫尔石很难用作基础的建造材料，但是当它加入已有的建筑中时，它可以成倍增强其性能和耐久性。这种令人震惊的性能使该材料开启了材料技术新纪元。

可以从下列矿石中精炼获得：

基腹断岩
en:
Morphite is a highly unorthodox mineral that can only be found in the hard-to-get Mercoxit ore. It is hard to use Morphite as a basic building material, but when it is joined with existing structures it can enhance the performance and durability by a considerable factor. This astounding quality makes this the material responsible for ushering in a new age in technology breakthroughs.

Can be obtained by refining the following ore:

Mercoxit

zh: 莫非是路上发生了感情。好的，给你们时间叙叙旧。
en: Could it be that something happened between you on the road? Alright, I'll give you some alone time.

zh: 莱塞勒氏 中型群体电容传输器
莱塞勒氏 大型掠能器
莱塞勒氏 大型能量中和器
莱塞勒氏 大型装甲维修器
莱塞勒氏 小型群体电容传输器
莱塞勒氏 自适应装甲增强器
莱戴集团也接受了一些小团队的需求，对渡鸦级的发射器和燃料输入装置进行了改造，并使其可以发射多级武器，延长了武器射程。
en: The Lai Dai Corporation also accepted requests from smaller teams, making modifications to the Corax's launcher and fuel system. They also gave the Corax the ability to fire multi-stage weaponry, extending its range.

zh: 莱戴集团在与联邦的小范围冲突中，获得了灵感，成功在巨鸟级平台上改造出了强击版本。
en: Lai Dai, taking inspiration from small-scale conflicts with the Federation, successfully modified the Moa, creating a strike variant.

zh: 莱戴集团改造了小鹰级，使其火力得到提升。
en: The Lai Dai Cooperation modified the Merlin, increasing its firepower.

zh: 莱戴集团改造了狞獾级平台，使其远航能力提高并可以长时间作战。
en: The Lai Dai Corporation modified the Caracal, improving its long-range and extended combat capabilities.

zh: 莱登船业改造了因卡萨斯级，使其火力得到提升。
en: Roden Shipyards modified the Incursus, increasing its firepower.

zh: 莱登船厂的深空运输舰只在设计上注重了低安全等级地区航行的安全性。相较普通工业舰只，它们具有更强的防御能力，对所运载的货物能起到更好的保护作用。不过，它们却是太空中飞行速度最慢的舰船之一。
en: Roden Shipyards Deep space transports are designed with the depths of lawless space in mind. Possessing defensive capabilities far in excess of standard industrial ships, they provide great protection for whatever cargo is being transported in their massive holds. They are, however, some of the slowest ships to be found floating through space.

zh: 获取任务委托书，需要完成特定的新闻任务。这些新闻任务会随机地出现在新闻公告板中。
en: Complete certain news missions to obtain mission assignments. News missions will appear on the News Board at random.

zh: 获取版本信息失败，可点击任意位置进行重试。
en: Failed to retrieve version info. Tap anywhere to retry.

zh: 获取版本信息失败，是否重试？(建议在WIFI网络下载新版本。)
en: Failed to retrieve version info. Tap OK to Retry. (We recommend downloading the latest version under WiFi.)

zh: 萝希的因卡萨斯级飞船
营救完成后，请把他们带到{8|station_name:_tr}来，我们会对他们进行戒除葳砣柯的治疗。
en: After rescuing them, send them to {8|station_name:_tr}. We'll give them treatment to free them from the Vitoc's control.

zh: 萨格莫洛的黑鸟级飞船
萨沙 先驱者级后勤型⁹
萨沙 刽子手级截击型⁸
萨沙 启示级海军型⁶
萨沙 启示级狙击型⁸
萨沙 启示级训练舰⁵
萨沙 富豪级隐匿型⁵
萨沙 强制者级守卫型⁵
萨沙 强制者级拦截型II⁹
萨沙 强制者级拦截型⁶
萨沙 强制者级海军型⁵
萨沙 惩罚者级突击型⁷
萨沙 暴君级守卫型II⁸
萨沙 暴君级守卫型⁷
萨沙 暴君级训练舰⁶
萨沙 磨难级电子战型⁶
萨沙中央数据处理中心
萨沙入侵效果 总部
萨沙入侵效果 突袭
萨沙入侵舰船属性效果 先锋
萨沙入侵舰船属性效果 总部
萨沙入侵舰船属性效果 突袭
萨沙区域数据处理中心

萨沙控制塔是一种大幅改良并强化过的母星建筑，使用了最新的前沿设计技术，提高了防御力及效率。

尽管大部分内部组件都是基于艾玛技术改良而来，萨沙控制塔还是表现出了融合全宇宙先进科技的迹象。 
自从新纪元112年对巴勒星系的大规模入侵以来，萨沙控制塔开始越来越多地展现出盖伦特设计理念的影子。许多观察家由此推断，萨沙共和国在上次行动中掳走的高级教育中心的工程师们一定在其中发挥了非常重要的作用。
en:
The Sansha Control Tower is a heavily modified and enhanced starbase structure utilizing the latest frontier design techniques to increase its defenses and efficiency.

Although the majority of the internal components are based on modified Amarr technology, Sansha control towers have always exhibited traits incorporated from all over the cluster. 
Ever since their massive YC112 abduction raids in the Balle system, Sansha control towers have begun displaying more and more traits reminiscent of Gallente designs. This has led some observers to speculate that the Nation made significant use of the Center for Advanced Studies engineers they captured in that operation.

萨莉·埃哈的巴戈龙级飞船

著名的奥提马太空站贮藏着机密研发项目和成果。据传，萨沙共和国的最高级别领导不时在这里举行会议。
en: The famed Station Ultima houses secret development projects and production. The most high ranking leaders of Sansha's Nation are rumoured to meet here from time to time.

zh: 葳砣柯不是永远无法治愈的吗？
葳砣柯理论上是一种无解的毒药，很难想象究竟是什么样的人在暗中帮助这些奴隶。
en: Theoretically, there's no antidote to Vitoc. It's hard to imagine exactly what kind of people are secretly helping these slaves.

zh: 蒂科斯特的断崖级飞船
蒺藜 小型能量中和器
蓝色晶体，在大型小行星或卫星内部深处的高压环境中形成。用于电子和武器制造业。仅在少数地区储量丰富。
en: Mykoserocin is a crystalline compound formed by intense pressure deep within large asteroids and moons. The crystals are commonly used in electronics and weapon manufacturing, as well as the creation of legalized Synth booster variants. Mykoserocin can only be found in abundance in a few areas, such as interstellar gas clouds within high security space.

zh: 虽然三岛集团势力不如当年，但也绝不能输给那些毫无教养的家伙。
en: Although Hyasyoda Corporation is not as powerful as it used to be, we must not lose to those uncultivated fools.

zh: 虽然从实际外观上看不出什么端倪，但人们还是相信“马克瑞”级的设计是基于一份古老的朱庇特设计图，这份设计图是几年前天使企业联合体入侵未知领域时发现的。不管事实究竟如何，这个庞然大物悄然出现在人们的视线中，并很快成为了天使集团最重要的一艘军舰。
en: While its utilitarian look may not give much of an indication, many are convinced that the Machariel is based on an ancient Jovian design uncovered by the Angel Cartel in one of their extensive exploratory raids into uncharted territory some years ago. Whatever the case may be, this behemoth appeared on the scene suddenly and with little fanfare, and has very quickly become one of the Angels' staple war vessels.

zh:
虽然体积不大，但是仍然处于主星序阶段，这些黄色或橙黄色恒星非常稳定，还能在主星序阶段持续数十亿年。由于数量上比其它级别适合居住的行星系多得多，这些恒星往往成为星际殖民的目标。



这些恒星的稳定性，加上它们发射的相对较低的紫外线辐射通量，被认为增加了在它们的行星系发展生命的可行性。
en:
Rather small but on the main-sequence, these yellow or yellow-orange stars are very stable, remaining on the main-sequence for tens of billions of years. Abundant compared to other classes that tend to support habitable planetary systems, these stars are common targets for colonization efforts.

The stability of these stars, combined with the relatively low ultraviolet radiation flux they emit, is thought to enhance the viability of their planetary systems for the development of life.

zh: 虽然共和国已经无力负担大规模的救援行动，但是能拯救多少同胞就尽量拯救多少同胞。
en: Although the Republic cannot afford a large-scale rescue operation, please save as many people as you can!

zh: 虽然叛变的舰队不属于我们管辖，但是既然看到了，就不能坐视不理。
en: The rebel fleet is not under our jurisdiction, but since it's here, we'll have to deal with it.

zh: 虽然只包含少量的机械部件，这个神奇的东西可以靠蓄能构件中独一无二的电磁折射特性，从恒星采集能量。
en: Containing only a handful of mechanical components, this simple wonder harvests energy from the system's sun by virtue of the unique EM refractive qualities in its scartate fabric.

zh: 虽然在我看来这事儿没什么可着急的，但他们在我面前哭得一塌糊涂的样子实在让我厌烦。
en: Although it seems to me that there is nothing to worry about, the way they come crying to me is really annoying.

zh: 虽然在现在这个乌烟瘴气的国家，加入犯罪集团简直就是家常便饭。
en: Living in a country like this though... People join criminal organizations during their walk after dinner.

zh: 虽然大家一致认为联邦的警察制度是新伊甸中最健全的，但联邦的警察也做不到随叫随到。联邦里的一些大型公司，通常也需要尝试通过自己的力量保障公司业务的安全运转。
en: Although everyone agrees that the Federation has the best police system in New Eden, it's impossible for the federal police to always be available on call. Some large companies within the Federation often need to assemble their own forces to make sure their company business can run safely.

zh: 虽然对于加达里人来说，军事训练是最基本的日常生活。但是并不是每一个加达里士兵都能够忍受那近乎变态的训练强度。逃兵事件虽然不多，但偶有发生。
en: For the Caldari, military training is a part of daily life. But not every Caldari soldier can endure the almost inhuman intensity of the training. Although desertion is rare, it does happen occasionally.

zh: 虽然我们击溃了他们殿后的部队，但是他们的主力已经无影无踪了。
en: Although we defeated their rear guard, the main bulk of their forces still managed to get away.

zh: 虽然我们卡拉吉塔集团从不认同你们那软弱的管理理念，但在生意问题上，我们绝对会一丝不苟。
en: We at Kaalakiota despise your incompetent management, but business is business, we won't bring prejudice to the deal.

zh: 虽然我们集团有一些“特殊交易”，但狡猾的兔子绝对不在我们的交易对象之列。
en: Although our corporation has some "special deals", we never strike deals with sly rabbits.

zh: 虽然我超不甘心！——毕竟我是卡罗拉忠实的粉丝！——但是我也没有别的办法。
en: I'm so frustrated! I'm a super fan of Carola, you know! But there's nothing I could have done.

zh: 虽然是一个矿业公司，星形矿业严密规整的公司架构和高效的办事模式，绝不亚于任何一个商业巨头。这也使得星形矿业成为了新伊甸最优秀的几个矿业公司之一。星形矿业长期向愿意靠挖矿赚钱的克隆人矿工提供矿石收购合同。
en: Despite being just an ore company, the tightly organized corporate structure and efficient business model of Astral Mining Inc. rival those of any of the tycoons. This has also made Astral Mining Inc. one of the best mining companies in New Eden. For a long time, Astral Mining Inc. has been offering ore acquisition orders to Capsuleer miners who are willing to contribute to the State.

zh: 虽然根据公约我不能对你怎么样，但是真神不会放过任何一个阴险小人。
en: According to the convention, there's nothing I can do to you. But just you remember, the one true God will never let an insidious villain go unpunished.

zh: 虽然海燕级设计者不详，但莱戴集团改进了海燕级的武器系统后，使其正面作战能力大幅提升；好用就成了，至于其他的，没那么重要。
en: The Cormorant's frontal combat capabilities have been greatly enhanced thanks to the weapon systems modifications it received from Lai Dai. Although the identity of the ship's original designer remains a mystery, these modifications quickly gained popularity due to their remarkable advantages.

zh: 虽然艾玛帝国还没有与盖伦特爆发正面的冲突，但是长久以来，盖伦特人都试图用自己的文化动摇艾玛教廷的影响力。这使得双方常常摩擦不断。
en: Although there hasn't been any direct clash between the Amarr Empire and the Gallente Federation, the Gallente have always tried to use their culture to reduce the Amarrian church's influence, which constantly causes minor conflicts between the two sides.

zh: 虽然解药的制作方法连共和大学最优秀的医学教授也毫无头绪，但是长者们掌握着这项技术。
en: Even the best professors from the Republic University's medical department have no clue how to create the antidote, but the recipe is known to the Elders.

zh: 虽然调查结果还没有完全确认，但我们已经无法继续忍受他们带来的损失了。
en: Although the results of the investigation have not yet been fully confirmed, we can't continue to suffer the losses they have caused.

zh: 虽然造价很便宜，但是这座精炼厂处理大部分矿石的效率与任何基于空间站的精炼平台一样。
en: Though built cheaply, this refinery is able to process most ores at the same level of efficiency found on any station-based refinery platform.

zh: 虽然钱是个好东西，但我们不会为了钱和其他集团对着干。
en: As important as money is, we won't go up against the other corporations for profit.

zh: 蛋白食物是加达里的大公司斯库维塔生产的食品，既便宜又有营养且口味众多。尽管价格低廉且非珍稀之物，但凭借纯正的口感和芳香的气味，还是受到了许多顶级大饭店美食厨师的青睐。
en: Protein Delicacies are cheap and nutritious food products manufactured by one of the Caldari megacorporations, Sukuuvestaa. They come in many flavors and taste delicious. Despite their cheap price and abundance, they are favored by many gourmet chefs in some of the finest restaurants around for their rich, earthy flavor and pleasant aroma.

zh: 蝙蝠 无人机伤害增效装置

en: Mission Beacon: Friends by Blood III
Mission Beacon: Friends by Blood II
Mission Beacon: Friends by Blood I

zh: 血袭者同盟所拥有的巴戈龙级战列舰，只有拥有正确安全码的人才能驾驶它。
en: Bhaalgorn battleship. Owned by the Blood Raider Covenant. Only those with the correct security codes can hope to pilot this ship.

zh: 血袭者在艾玛边境的骇人行径让帝国上下为之震动，清剿血袭者的呼声也越来越响，萨拉姆家族作为目前的执政家族，在应对血袭者的问题上也是最积极的一方。
en: The appalling acts of the Blood Raiders on the Amarr borders have caught the attention of the Empire, both royals and common folk. The voices calling for the Blood Raiders to be purged have grown louder and louder. The Sarum Family, the current ruling family, is among the first to begin tackling the Blood Raider issue.

zh: 血袭者基础型防卫炮塔
血袭者散发的集装箱，内含装有窃听装置的尸体，这样，粗心的拾荒者就会把间谍设备带入自己的船中。
en: A container filled with bug-ridden corpses created by the Blood Raiders to get spy devices into the ships of unwary scavengers.
Central Blood Raider Data Mining Site

zh: 血袭者曾是艾玛宗教的一个分支，却因为狂热而扭曲的奇怪教义而与艾玛社会格格不入。现在，脱离了艾玛宗教的血袭者同盟，成为了帝国最大的治安隐患。
en: The Blood Raider Covenant began as a branch of the Amarrian religion. However, their fanatical and twisted blood worship led them constant clashes between them and the rest of Amarrian society. Now, having parted ways with the Amarrian faith, the Blood Raider Covenant has become the largest threat to the Amarr Empire's security.

zh: 血袭者隐匿空间战术哨站
血袭者目前最大、最致命的军事设施。据传，血袭者的高级指挥官会每隔数月都在这里聚会。
en: The largest and deadliest military facility currently owned by the Blood Raiders. High-ranking Blood Raider commanders are rumored to meet here every few months.

zh: 血袭者能量中和炮塔 I
血袭者能量中和炮塔 II
血袭者能量中和炮塔 III
血袭者超光速粒子集束岗哨炮
血袭者，又是血袭者！这些可怕的恶魔，他们刚刚献祭了萨拉姆女皇的亲侄子！
en: Blood Raiders, it's those Blood Raiders again! Those terrible demons, they just sacrificed the nephew of Empress Sarum!

zh: 行了，我不是第一天听你们这些神神叨叨的论调了。
en: OK, this isn't the first time I've heard your crazy arguments.

zh: 行了，泰利斯，没你事儿了，滚吧。
en: OK, Thales, I'm done with you here. Now scram.

zh: 行星指挥中心，作为一个基本的转运站，使用标准的垂直发射火箭运送各种物资。
en: A planet command center that serves as a basic transit station. Uses standard vertical-launching rockets to transport all kinds of resources.

zh: 行星海关正在修复中，是否要立即完成？
en: Planetary Customs under repair. Complete immediately?

zh: 行星海关立即修复确认
行星海关被打爆，无法运输，是否前往修复海关？
en: Failed to deliver. Planetary Customs was destroyed. Repair Planetary Customs now?

zh:
行星科学中，原始、自然状态的电解液称为离子溶液。只有在经过了长时间的精心提取和精炼后，成品液体才能被用于医学、工业和食品等领域。

可以从下列类型的行星开采获得：
离子行星
海洋行星
气体行星
en:
An electrolyte found in a raw, natural form is called an ionic solution, especially in terms of planetary astronomy. Only after a lengthy process of extraction and refining can the resulting fluid go on to be used for medical, industrial, or nutritive applications.

Can be obtained by mining the following types of planets:
Plasma Planet
Oceanic Planet
Gas Planet

衍生无人机 - 露姆赫-吉-2 - 娜

衍生无人机 - 露姆赫-姆-2 - 娜

衍生无人机 - 姆赫-西-1 - 比

衍生无人机 - 姆赫-西-2 - 佛
衍生无人机 - 姆赫-西-2 - 娜
衍生无人机 - 姆赫-吉-1 - 比

衍生无人机 - 姆赫-吉-1 - 娜
