衍生无人机 - 姆赫-吉-2 - 佛
衍生无人机 - 姆赫-吉-2 - 娜
衍生无人机 - 姆赫-姆-1 - 比
衍生无人机 - 姆赫-姆-1 - 佛
衍生无人机 - 姆赫-姆-1 - 娜
衍生无人机 - 姆赫-姆-2 - 比
衍生无人机 - 姆赫-姆-2 - 佛
衍生无人机 - 姆赫-姆-2 - 娜
表面上受着女皇的信任，私底下却不知道和盖伦特人有多少勾结。
en: Trusted by the Empress, all while secretly working with the Gallente.

zh:
被广泛使用的一种近防系统，已经毁坏了，或许还有零件可以使用。

可以从下列物品中提炼获得：
盖伦特7级受损结构
盖伦特8级受损结构
艾玛7级受损结构
艾玛8级受损结构
en:
A widely used close-in weapon system. Though it's damaged, it should have parts that can be salvaged.

Can be obtained by reprocessing the following items:
Gallente Ship Debris 7
Gallente Ship Debris 8
Amarr Ship Debris 7
Amarr Ship Debris 8

zh: 被毁走私船上的集装箱，已经被烧焦，表面也凹陷了进去。
en: A dented and damaged container from a destroyed smuggling vessel.

zh: 裂谷级是一种非常强大的战斗护卫舰，可以轻松和当今最出色的护卫舰一较高下。它诞生于米玛塔尔起义期间，其后经历了许多次重大设计调整。裂谷级护卫舰具有多种多样的攻击能力，因此是战场上难以琢磨而又致命的对手。
en: The Rifter is a very powerful combat frigate and can easily tackle the best frigates out there. It has gone through many radical design phases since its inauguration during the Minmatar Rebellion. The Rifter has a wide variety of offensive capabilities, making it an unpredictable and deadly adversary.

zh: 装卸加速装置蓝图 I
装卸加速装置蓝图 II
装卸加速装置蓝图 III
装卸加速装置蓝图 IV
装有天蛇集团违禁货物的存储设施。
en: A storage facility for contraband goods owned by the Serpentis.

zh: 装甲指挥脉冲波作用范围
装甲维修器能量栅格需求
装甲维修器装甲维修量
装甲连接模块通过与附近队友的装甲系统建立连接，为其承受大部分的装甲伤害。
en: The Armor Link Module establishes a link between your armors and nearby teammates', which reduces most of the damage to their armors.

zh: 装载于战列舰上的发射器，用于和其他战列舰的远程对战，但不适于轰炸战略设施。具有极大的弹载量，但是发射速度慢，而且很难锁定小型高速舰只。
en: A battleship mounted launcher used for long range standoffs with other battleships, but less suitable for bombardment of deployed structures. Contains a huge missile capacity, but has a slow firing rate and trouble targeting small, fast ships.

zh: 装配大型炮台的战列巡洋舰令人神往，改造后的战列巡洋舰将大炮巨舰在新伊甸中发挥的更佳淋漓尽致。
en: Battlecruisers equipped with large turrets make for a highly effective combination. The introduction of modified battlecruisers has brought an influx of such vessels to New Eden.

zh: 装配经理在这里对他们的工作进行协调和同步。大部分事情实际上都是从这里远程控制的。
en: From here, the assembly managers synchronize and concentrate their efforts. Much of what goes on is actually remote controlled from here.

zh: 装配阵列经常被用于制造那些许多帝国不想在自己的空间站内制造的非法高科技模块。这个阵列的尺寸虽然不大，运行效率却很高，能将高质量模块以令人吃惊的速度生产出来。
en: Assembly Arrays are oftentimes required to manufacture many high-tech and illegal modules that the empires don't want manufactured in their stations.  While humble in size, this one is able to operate at a high level of efficiency, bringing its operators quality modules with surprising speed.

zh: 装配阵列经常被用于制造那些许多帝国不想在自己的空间站内制造的非法高科技模块。这是同类建筑中最大的一种，能在相对较短的时间内生产出大量设备。
en: Assembly Arrays are oftentimes required to manufacture many high-tech and illegal modules that the empires don't want manufactured in their stations.  This is one of the biggest of its kind, able to churn out a great deal of equipment in relatively short order.

zh: 装配阵列经常被用于制造那些许多帝国不想在自己的空间站内制造的非法高科技模块。这是同类建筑中最大的一种，能在相对较短的时间内生产出大量设备。 该建筑由哈扎利·阿克希男爵守卫。
en:
Assembly Arrays are oftentimes required to manufacture many high-tech and illegal modules that the empires don't want manufactured in their stations.  This is one of the biggest of its kind, able to churn out a great deal of equipment in relatively short order.

This structure is being guarded by Baron Haztari Arkhi.

zh: 装配阵列经常被用于制造那些许多帝国不想在自己的空间站内制造的非法高科技模块。这是同类建筑中最大的一种，能在相对较短的时间内生产出大量设备。 该建筑由玛塔尔·保将军守卫。
en:
Assembly Arrays are oftentimes required to manufacture many high-tech and illegal modules that the empires don't want manufactured in their stations.  This is one of the biggest of its kind, able to churn out a great deal of equipment in relatively short order.

This structure is being guarded by General Matar Pol.

zh: 西顿工业与行家住宅公司达成协议，为其实现矿工和外空间探索者居住漂流站的标准化，这便是西顿工业居住舱设计的开端。当工程因资金短缺而取消时，西顿工业把他们的设计以高轨道商用公寓的形式推向市场。这次市场推广极其成功，以致后来居住舱成为宇宙中随处可见的景象。
en: The architectural design for the CreoDron Habitation Module started out as a contract deal from the Expert Housing Corporation to standardize the modular drifter homes normally used by miners and deep space explorers. When the project was cancelled due to insufficient funding, CreoDron utilized their design for the open market as high-orbit department buildings for commercial use. The marketing was a tremendous hit, making the Habitation Module a common sight across the universe.

zh: 西顿工业与行家住宅公司达成协议，为其实现矿工和外空间探索者居住漂流站的标准化，这便是西顿工业居住舱设计的开端。当工程因资金短缺而取消时，西顿工业把他们的设计以高轨道商用公寓的形式推向市场。这次市场推广极其成功，以致后来居住舱成为宇宙中随处可见的景象。 它们被赋予各种用途：酒吧、赌场甚至娱乐场所、警察局和审讯站。
en: The architectural design for the CreoDron Habitation Module started out as a contract deal from the Expert Housing Corporation to standardize the modular drifter homes normally used by miners and deep space explorers. When the project was cancelled due to insufficient funding, CreoDron utilized their design for the open market as high-orbit department buildings for commercial use. The marketing was a tremendous hit, making the Habitation Module a common sight across the universe. Common uses include anything from bars, casinos and brothels, to police stations and interrogation facilities.

zh: 西顿工业与行家住宅公司达成协议，为其实现矿工和外空间探索者居住漂流站的标准化，这便是西顿工业居住舱设计的开端。当工程因资金短缺而取消时，西顿工业把他们的设计以高轨道商用公寓的形式推向市场。这次市场推广极其成功，以致后来居住舱成为宇宙中随处可见的景象。它们被赋予各种用途：酒吧、赌场甚至娱乐场所、警察局和审讯站。
en: The architectural design for the CreoDron Habitation Module started out as a contract deal from the Expert Housing Corporation to standardize the modular drifter homes normally used by miners and deep space explorers. When the project was cancelled due to insufficient funding, CreoDron utilized their design for the open market as high-orbit department buildings for commercial use. The marketing was a tremendous hit, making the Habitation Module a common sight across the universe. Common uses include anything from bars, casinos and brothels, to police stations and interrogation facilities.

zh: 西顿工业和图克尔部落先后也对隐匿型舰船进行了评估，并很快应用在伊米卡斯级护卫舰上。
en: CreoDron and the Thukker Tribe both evaluated the new Stealth types and soon applied them to their Imicus frigates.

zh: 西顿工业和图克尔部落先后也对隐匿型舰船进行了评估，并很快应用在探索级护卫舰上。
en: CreoDron and the Thukker Tribe also evaluated the new Stealth types and soon applied them to their Probe frigates.

zh: 西顿工业对狂怒者级进行了改造，使其作战能力不损失的情况下，大幅提升远航能力。
en: CreoDron modified the Vexor, greatly improving its long-range capabilities without sacrificing anything else.

zh: 西顿工业快速的跟进了力场改进技术，使促进级在与其他势力的对抗中不落下风。
en: CreoDron quickly caught up with the competition with their own improved force field technology, making the Catalyst a formidable competitor against other factions' models.

zh: 西顿工业改造了托勒克斯级，使其装甲防御大幅提升。
en: CreoDron modified the Thorax, greatly improving its armor.

zh: 西顿工业是联邦最富有的科技公司。最近，他们的营销团队想出了一个绝妙的计划来展示他们无人机的卓越性能——一场克隆人和西顿工业无人机之间的大战。
en: CreoDron is the richest technology company in the Federation. Recently, their marketing team came up with a wonderful plan to showcase the superior performance of their drones – a battle between Capsuleers and CreoDron drones.

zh: 西顿工业通过技术交流，获得了强击改造技术，并成功改造了托勒克斯级。
en: Through technological exchanges, CreoDron acquired technologies for improving strike abilities, and successfully applied them to the Thorax.

zh: 西顿工业采取了完全不同的改造策略，虽然也被称为突击型驱逐舰，但和其他势力的大相径庭。（突击型主要用于对抗力场布设型的舰船，快速突进并释放大量火力输出是其显著的特点）
en: CreoDron took a completely different approach to modifying this ship. Although it's also classified as a assault variant destroyer, there are few similarities between it and other factions' models. (The assault variant destroyer specializes against targets that rely heavily on force fields. Rushing in and dealing large amounts of damage is its signature tactic.)

zh: 要不怎么说你们克隆人都是精英呢，办事就是利索。
en: No wonder they call Capsuleers the elites of the elites. You get jobs done fast.

zh: 要我说，随便在远程通讯频道里聊一下就行了，我可是很忙的。
en: If you ask me, I suggest you talk on the communication channel. I'm busy.

zh: 要是每天都能和这太空一样安宁平静就好了。
en: If only every day were as peaceful and quiet as deep space.

zh: 要知道，这种可爱的爬行动物每天都能分泌很多甜味剂。
en: These cute little crawly critters can produce lots of sweetener every day, you know.

zh: 要辛苦你跑一趟了，不用留活口，我可不想再摊上麻烦事儿了。
en: I need your help this time. No need to spare them. I don't want to have any trouble again.

zh: 观赏奴隶之间用的太空角斗是贵族的一项基本娱乐，偶尔会有一些奴隶拒绝执行，但是他们有自己的办法来给他们一些“动力”。
en: Watching space fights between slaves is a common form of entertainment for nobles. Occasionally, some slaves will refuse to fight, but the nobles have their own way of giving them "encouragement."

zh: 解决的方式还是一如既往——随便教训他们一下，其他人就会乖乖听话了。
en: The solution is the same as always – just teach them a lesson and the others will remain obedient.

zh: 解压补丁失败， 请检查手机存储空间然后重启游戏。
en: Patch extraction failed. Please check the storage space of your device and restart the game.

zh: 警告！由于你的违规行为，你目前已被统合部通缉。你现在将进入统合部所管辖的区域，如你继续前进，将会被统合部攻击，并且你也不能停靠任何空间站。你确定还要继续吗？
en: Warning! Due to your recent actions, you're now a wanted criminal. The area you're about to enter is under CONCORD's jurisdiction. If you choose to proceed, you'll be attacked by CONCORD's police force, and you won't be able to dock at any station. Do you still wish to proceed?

zh: 警告！阿斯特罗级船体重损，建议放弃营救，跃迁脱离战场。
en: Warning! The Astero is severely damaged. It is highly recommended to abandon this rescue attempt and warp away for now.

zh: 警告，收到新的入侵警报！
警惕级巡洋舰是守护天使窃取的第一张盖伦特设计图，但绝不会是最后一张。借助托勒克斯级本身的长处，无论是一对一的战斗还是配合其他飞船群战，它都能起到致命的作用。一支警惕级巡洋舰队可以令敌人闻风丧胆。
en: The Vigilant was the first Gallente design which the Guardian Angels stole and made their own, but it wouldn't be the last. Building on the Thorax's natural strengths, it is a deadly vessel both by itself and as part of a fleet. A group of these sluggers is a sight to fear.

zh: 警长 大型护盾扩展装置
警长已经向我汇报了，干得不错，年轻人。
en: I've received the report from the sheriff. Well done, young one!

zh: 让我们像一首朋克摇滚一样华丽地解决它吧！
en: Let's solve it in style, like a punk rock song!

zh: 让我们喝一罐酷菲，放松一下。
en: Let's grab a can of Quafe and relax.

zh: 训练以下技能，可以降低制造项目所需时间。
en: Train the following skills to reduce the time required for finishing manufacturing jobs.

zh: 训练以下技能，可以降低制造项目所需材料的数量。
en: Train the following skills to reduce the amount of materials required for manufacturing jobs.

zh: 训练技能，提升科技，驾驶更强大的舰船
en: Train skills, upgrade tech level, fly powerful ships

zh: 训练方形舱是当地海盗用来学习海盗技能的工具。它由密码保护，不过保护力度可能并不强。
en: The training cube is used by the local pirates to learn how to become good pirates. It is password protected, but probably not all that well.

zh: 训练用货柜 - 空间异常
训练课程已备份到“际遇-新手教程”，你可以随时查看。
en: The training courses have been backed up to "Encounter - Beginner's Tutorials". You can check them at any time.

zh: 记得查收你的报酬，我现在就给你打过去。
en: Be sure to collect your reward payment. I'm sending it now.

zh: 记得，不管他们说什么都请多给一些耐心。
en: Remember, be patient, no matter what they say.

zh: 许多人居住在这些建筑里。
en: A multitude of people inhabit these structures.

zh: 许多人认为惩罚者级是目前艾玛最好的护卫舰。从它配备的重型武器就可以看出，惩罚者级主要用于与大型军舰配合作战的大规模军事行动，不过它也完全能够胜任独立行动。
en: The Punisher is considered, by many, to be one of the best Amarr frigates in existence; as evidently shown by its heavy armaments. The Punisher is mainly intended for large-scale military operations, acting in coordination with larger military vessels. With its damage output, however, it is also perfectly capable of punching its way right through unwary opponents.

zh: 识别错误，被击毁舰船与目标敌人特征不符。
en: Recognition error. The destroyed ship doesn't match the enemy's characteristics.

zh: 诊断为克隆过程中偶有发生的部分记忆缺失。
en: You have been diagnosed with partial memory loss. This occurs occasionally after the cloning process.

zh: 诊断为脑部扫描常引发的自律神经失调症。
en: You have been diagnosed with a temporary autonomic dysfunction, a common side effect of brain scans.

zh:
该中继站由通信中继委员会使用至新纪元116年7月，在当时主天使部队的一次突袭之后被遗弃了。

从该站点残留的用于监控和拦截无线电通信、流动性无线路由传输的设备来看，统合部认为该站点是在成功截获从伊瓦提的一个侦查小组发送给天使集团总部的加密数据后遭到袭击的。

该站点的操作员代号“埃史迪尔”，之前已经销声匿迹了，而现在报告称他正在逃避主天使部队的重金悬赏。
en:
This relay station was used by the Communications Relay Committee until July YC116, when it was abandoned after an assault by Dominations forces.
Containing equipment used by the CRC to monitor and intercept radio, wireless and fluid router transmissions, the DED believe that the site was attacked after intercepting encrypted data broadcasted to Angel Cartel headquarters from a scouting party in Evati.
The CRC operator of this site, codenamed “Eshtir”, has vanished without trace and is now reportedly on the run from Dominations forces, whom have placed a sizeable bounty on his head.

zh: 该临时设施用来关押遭七人组绑架的人，之后他们将被运送到一个更安全的地点。
en: This temporary structure is made to house The Seven's hostages until they are ready to be transported to a more secure location.
This mission can only be accepted once.

zh: 该做什么应该不用我多说了吧？——干掉他们。
en: You don't need me to tell you what's next, do you? Finish them off.

zh: 该分组暂无任何联系人
en: No contacts in this list yet

zh: 该塔洛迦驱逐舰残骸以一种令人觉得优美的姿态漂浮在太空中。它已经完全遭弃不能用了，也许当初造它的人就是想让它这样长年累月浪迹于宇宙吧。虽然这船已经没用了，但从其残骸的坚实度来看，好像还有再利用的可能。也许这就是个陷阱，是前人老早以前就设下的圈套。请小心为上。
en: This Talocan ship wreckage drifts in space with surprising grace and efficiency. Even completely offline and abandoned, the embarkment destroyer appears to have been created for just this function, or at least for survival across vast stretches of unknown space for extended periods of time. Despite its incapacitated status, the wreckage looks sturdy enough to be rebuilt; perhaps its appearance is merely a ruse, a trap set long ago by a dead civilization. Regardless, caution is recommended.
This skill is already at the front of the queue

zh: 该星系已在规避列表中
该星门目前只能从另一端进入。
en: This stargate is currently only usable from the other end.

zh: 该死的卡提兹，一个外系家族，仰仗着女皇的信任，居然敢踩在尤尼斯大人头上。
en: Damn Catiz. That outsider dares to abuse the Empress's trust and walk over Mr. Yonis?

zh: 该物品不在你当前位置，是否需要导航前往？
en: This item is not in your current location. Start autopilot?

zh: 该玩家已经在联系人中
en: This player is already on your contact list

zh: 该矿站已是废墟一片，只剩下扭曲反转，形状可怕的钢架结构。它已经成了自由无人机的一座基地。
en: All that remains of the mining station is a twisted, nightmarish husk that has been transformed into a rogue drone base.

zh: 该空间站负责为当地遭受攻击的萨沙舰队进行维修与补给。尽管该空间站的整合度非常高，其敌友判别功能还是交给了一个独立的后勤控制阵列，以尽量降低被非法闯入的可能性。
en: This station repairs local Sansha fleets as they come under fire. Although almost entirely self-contained, friend or foe identification is handled by the Logistics Control Arrays, which are separated from the station to minimize risk of unauthorized overrides.

zh: 该联系人已经在黑名单中
en: This contact is already on your blacklist

zh: 该舰船不能使用保险券修复
en: This ship cannot be repaired with insurance vouchers

zh: 该舰船不能使用保险券修复
en: This ship cannot be repaired with insurance vouchers

zh: 该船曾经风光过。现在已经残缺不全，好像是被撕裂了一般。船内没有任何生命迹象。
en: This ship has seen better days. Parts of it are missing, looking as though the ship was torn apart. There are no signs of life inside, though.

zh: 该装备使用纳米级装配器来修复周围舰船装甲的损伤。
en: This module uses nano-assemblers to repair damage done to the armor of nearby ships.

zh: 该装备使用纳米级装配器来修复对舰船装甲造成的损伤。
en: This module uses nano-assemblers to repair damage done to the armor of the ship.

zh: 该装置在安装并启动后会补偿舰船跃迁核心的波动和中断。
en: When installed, this unit attempts to compensate for fluctuations and disruptions of the ship's warp core.

zh: 该设施不在你当前位置，是否需要导航前往？
en: This facility is not in your current location. Start autopilot?

zh: 该设施可能在外人看上去是一个贴有图克尔标志的标准组件工厂，其实在外壳做了大量不易觉察的改装。坚固的装甲使它固若金汤，根本无法进入一探究竟。
en: This facility may look to outsiders like a standard component factory adorned with Thukker markings, but there are numerous subtle alterations in the outer shell. Heavy armoring makes it impossible to tell what's inside without forcibly disassembling it.

zh: 该货柜请运送到以下地址
en: Please deliver this container to the address below

zh: 该货柜请送到以下地址
en: Deliver this container to the address below
It's time to pay your debt, Thales.

zh: 该连接设施上有一些长长地连在一起的太空舱，没人知道它们的作用。考古学者猜测其中可能是逃生舱、食物仓库、燃料库或者惩戒设备。还有人说可能这些东西都有。
en: The long capsules in the coupling array offer no hints as to their purpose. Archaeologists conjecture that the Array contained escape vessels, food bins, fuel resources or equipment for punishment. Some theories purport that all of the above are true.

zh: 该邮件存在异常情况，删除失败
en: Error in the mail, failed to delete

zh: 该重型护盾保驾的物体能对远处物体发射隐形力场，将其隐身。
en: This heavily shielded structure remotely emits a cloaking field over far away structures, hiding them from sight.

zh: 该阵列负责为本地的远程后勤设施判别敌友。虽然看上去坚不可摧，但克隆飞行员还是可以从里面破坏其中精密的电子元件。
en: This array is responsible for determining friend or foe status for local remote logistics facilities. Although formidable, a Capsuleer should be able to subvert the sophisticated electronics within.

zh: 诱导力场是一种用作伪引力场的空间异常。只要有正确的校准信息，星际跳跃引擎就能锁定力场并在宇宙中生成一个通往目的地星系的通道。
en: A cynosural field, also known colloquially as a "cyno", is a cosmic anomaly that acts as a pseudo-gravity well. With the correct calibration information, interstellar jump drives can lock onto the field and create a portal into the destination system.

zh: 诱饵的事情我们会安排好，你要做的就只是在海盗出现以后给他们沉重一击！
en: We'll arrange the bait. All you need to do is hit the pirates hard when they show up!

zh: 说实话，古斯塔斯海盗们的作战技巧常常令人惊叹。
en: To be honest, the Guristas pirates often have incredible combat skills.

zh: 说实话，就算是海军的人来，我觉得他们也很难搞定这些海盗。
en: To be honest, these pirates would still be hard to deal with even if the Navy were here.

zh: 说起来，你可能不太知道。艾玛达也由曾是米玛塔尔七大部族之一的内凡达人组成。
en: Come to think of it, you might not know about this. The Ammatar were once the Nefantar, one of the Seven Tribes of Minmatar.

zh: 请你确认好了再发言，小姑娘，你已经过了童言无忌的年纪了。
en: Be sure of what you want to say before saying it, little girl. You're beyond the age where you can get away with saying anything.

zh: 请你耐心等待……共和国，不会抛下任何一个米玛塔尔人。
en: Please wait patiently... The Republic won't abandon any Minmatar.

zh: 请先输入要发送的内容

en: Please claim your rewards from any station

zh: 请在空间站应用装配方案
en: Please apply fitting inside a space station

zh: 请您无论如何想想办法，先生！我们会在空间站机库等您！
en: Please, you've got to help us! We'll be waiting for you in the hangar!

zh: 请打开面板,输入此次运输保证金
en: Open the panel and enter the collateral for this delivery

zh: 请打开面板,输入运输集装箱体积
en: Open the panel and enter the container volume

zh: 请打开面板,选择送货目的地
en: Open the panel and select the delivery destination

zh: 请换上一艘跃迁速度较快的舰船，我们可能有很多路要赶。
en: Please switch your ship to one with faster warping speed. We have a lot of distance to cover.

zh: 请接通卡拉吉塔集团的事务官。
请检查物品和收货地址
en: Please check items and recipient address

zh: 请等待上一个操作完成
en: Please wait for the last operation to complete

zh: 请等待上次操作完成后再进行操作
en: Please wait until the previous operation is complete

zh: 请继续攻击另一个目标，直至击毁目标。
en: Choose another target and fire until it is destroyed.

zh: 请选择仓库容量范围内数量
en: Please select an amount that does not exceed the warehouse capacity

zh: 请选择需要拆分的数量
en: Please select the quantity to be split

zh: 诺·托图哈的茶隼级飞船
诺巴雅斯的因卡萨斯级飞船
诺库扎·塔芒的茶隼级飞船
诺翰·沙得拉克是一位维洛奇亚萨满，不过他的名声却不太好，维洛奇亚部族的CEO伊萨德森·乌巴尔曾经形容他为“一个彻底的疯子”。作为一个坚定的传统主义者，他经常以言论——有时候也以实际行动——来反对统合部反毒品运输的法律规定。
en: Rohan Shadrak is a Vherokior Shaman of somewhat eccentric repute - he was once described by Isardsund Urbrald, CEO of Vherokior tribe to be "Mad as a biscuit". A staunch traditionalist, he is a vocal - and occasionally physical - opponent of CONCORD laws against drug transportation.

zh: 诺翰·沙得拉克的挑战级飞船
诺莫·卡福宁的鹏鲲级飞船
诺萨·法拉特的检察官级飞船
谁也不清楚，除了四大帝国之外，几大海盗势力是否也在暗中进行着不为人知的交易与合作。但是联邦情报部就在最近发现了天蛇集团与天使企业联合体之间可能暗藏的交易。
en: The four major nations are always engaged in secret trades and cooperation, but no one knows whether similar things take place between the large pirate factions. But the Federal Intelligence Office recently discovered a possible hidden transaction between Serpentis and the Angel Cartel.

zh: 谁会无聊到让一个不朽者送水？
en: Who would be bored enough to send an immortal just to transport water?

zh: 调料已经准备好了，都在这边！
en: The seasonings are ready. They're all here!

zh: 谐振能量作战越来越重要，卡尼迪集团对主宰级的某个亚型进行了改造，用于这类战斗。
en: Energy resonance is playing a greater and greater role in combat operations. Khanid Innovations modified one of the Arbitrator models to make it better suited to this kind of combat.

zh: 谢天谢地，您终于来了，所有的斯塔科马尼人都会感谢你的，飞行员先生。现在，请把这些烧肉交给我吧。
en: Thank God! You're finally here. All Starkmanir will be in your debt. Now, please hand over the food to me.

zh: 谢天谢地，最后一批工人也救出来了！
en: Thank heavens. The last workers are saved as well!

zh: 谢天谢地，终于有人接这个委托了！我最近真是被部族整合的事情搞得焦头烂额。
en: Thank heavens! Someone has finally accepted the commission! I've simply been overwhelmed by the integration of the tribes recently.

zh: 谢谢你的帮助，这周应该能过一个完整的周末了。
en: Thank you for your help. I can finally enjoy my weekend this week.

zh: 谢谢你！你真是我们的救命恩人！
en: Thank you! You saved our lives!

zh: 谢谢你！飞行员，如果你再晚点到，不知道事情会糟糕成什么样子。
en: Thank you, pilot! I don't know how things would've played out if you'd arrived any later!

zh: 谢谢你，好心人。我们采矿站上的工人们可能也需要你的帮助，你可以顺道去看看吗？
en: Thank you, kind soul. Our workers on the mining station might need your help, too. Could you please go take a look?

zh: 谢谢你，飞行员，虽然那个新来的被吓得够呛，但好歹小命还在。
en: Thank you, Capsuleer. Though that rookie certainly got enough of a fright, fortunately he didn't die there.

zh: 谣言分子 刽子手级²
谣言分子 巨神兵级²
责任心和纪律性是加达里公民的必备素养，无条件忠心效力于所属军团是加达里人一生的宿命。
en: Duty and discipline are required traits in Caldari citizens, plus unquestioning loyalty to the corporation they live to serve.
This account is not linked to a serial number

zh: 货柜仓库—装箱的合成油
en: Cargo Warehouse - Crates of Synthetic Oil

zh: 货柜仓库—装箱的硅酸盐玻璃
en: Cargo Warehouse - Crates of Silicate Glass

zh: 货柜舱—加密的数据芯片
货柜舱—布鲁特部族名册
货柜舱—异株湖集团记录
货柜舱优化改造蓝图 I
货柜舱优化改造蓝图 II
货柜舱优化改造蓝图 III
货柜舱优化改造蓝图 IV
货柜集装箱—损坏的采矿设备
货柜集装箱—米纳·德拉比
质疑神学理事会的地位就是质疑帝国的根基。
en: To question the legitimacy of the Theology Council is to question the foundation of the Empire.

zh: 贪得无厌的阿狄莎波，敢惹我萨拉姆，就是在挑衅艾玛女皇。
en: How dare the Ardishapur provoke me? Their greed knows no bounds! To provoke Sarum is to provoke the Amarr Empress.

zh: 贫瘠行星拥有典型的“死亡地貌”：干燥、多岩石、大气稀薄、矿物构成简单。这些星球的表面通常会有沟壑，很多沟壑的宽度之大甚至可以在行星轨道上用肉眼看见。大多数此类行星在形成过后的很长时间里都存积了大量的冰，但是它们无法将这些水份保持在自己的表面上。行星表面的液体会快速地蒸发，留下稀薄的大气。不过也会有例外的情况，它们会反方向渗透到更深的土层中，凝结起来等待下一次温度升高而再次向上突破。
en: Barren planets are archetypical "dead terrestrials": dry, rocky worlds with a minimal atmosphere and an unremarkable composition. They are commonly etched with flood channels, which are often broad enough to be visible from orbit; most such worlds have accumulated significant quantities of ice over their lifetimes, but cannot retain it on their surface. Generally surface liquid evaporates rapidly, contributing to the thin atmosphere, but occasionally it will seep back into the ground and refreeze, ready for another breakout in future when the local temperature rises.

zh: 购买后打开仓库即可获取
en: Can be retrieved from Inventory after purchasing

zh: 购买商品所需所需货币不足
贵族在艾玛的世界里是一个有趣的群体，总有好事者四处散播贵族们的谣言博取关注或者钱财，但他们却万万没有想到塔什蒙贡家族对付这样的好事者从未留情。
en: The nobles are one of the most interesting groups of people in the Amarr Empire. There have always been people who like to spread rumors about them in pursuit of attention or money. But none of those people were expecting that the Tash-Murkon Family would deal so mercilessly with them.

zh: 贵族间的礼尚往来，在帝国中是再正常不过的事情了。虽然暗地里争得你死我活，但是表面上，大家依旧维持着身为统治者的体面。
en: As a matter of course, exchanges between Amarrian nobles are nothing short of polite and courteous. Although there has always been ferocious competition behind closed doors, in public everyone strives to uphold etiquette, as is becoming of the ruling class.

zh:
贵金属对腐蚀和氧化具有较高的抵抗性，它们的资源也相对基础金属更为稀缺，而它们特有的电子、材料以及化学特性也使得市场对其有非常高的需求。通过复杂的工艺精炼和净化后，一些贵金属矿石能够生产出“稀有金属”。

可以从下列类型的行星开采获得：
熔岩行星
温和行星
海洋行星
en:
Highly resistant to corrosion and oxidation, noble metals are somewhat rarer than base metals, yet they are just as sought after for their different electrical, material, and chemical attributes. When painstakingly refined and purified, some noble metal ores can produce "precious metals."

Can be obtained by mining the following types of planets:
Lava Planet
Temperate Planet
Oceanic Planet

zh: 费图萨·坎尼姆的天鹤级飞船

费多是一个海绵一般的杂食动物。它的皮肤呈浅红色，生长有多个爪子一般的触角用来保护自己。作为原始的史前动物，费多进食和消化的方式十分缓慢和低效，食物通常会在费多的体内呆上很长时间，多数时候这些食物会完全的腐烂变得一团糟。费多不时会从身上排放出大量的气体，就像前面所描述的一样，这些气体具有十分恶心的味道。费多拥有非常敏锐的嗅觉，它们通过释放气体来进行相互间的交流，这也是因为它们完全没有视觉和听觉的缘故，甚至没有生长有这些器官。费多的嘴长在他们身体的下面，它们进食的时候会把整个身体都压在食物上，并逐渐地向下压。
en: The Fedo is an omnivorous, sponge-like creature. It has reddish skin and numerous small claw-like tentacles which it uses to move around and protect itself. A primitive being, the Fedo's process of eating and absorbing nutrition is slow and inefficient. This means that food stays for a long time in the Fedo's body, and will most often have rotted or turned foul before the animal passes it out of its system. Fedos eject fumes from their body which, for the reasons explained above, have a most horrible odor. They possess a fantastic sense of smell and use these fumes to communicate with each other; however, they are both blind and deaf, having no eyes or ears. The Fedo's mouth is located on its underside, and it feeds by positioning itself over its food and lowering itself down onto it.

zh: 赛塔德洱是宇宙中防御工事最强的星域之一，它既是一座意识形态的堡垒，也是抵抗侵略的物理屏障。尽管喜欢吵架拌嘴、明争暗斗，但几乎每个加达里集团都在这里派驻力量，同心协力地保护自己的家园。在被从一个家园逐出之后，加达里人不想再次遭受同样的命运。 赛塔德洱正是对这一决心的骄傲证明。
en: Acting as both an ideological fortress and a physical impediment to invasion, the Citadel is among the most well fortified regions in the cluster. Despite their penchant for quarrelling and competing with each other, nearly every Caldari corporation keeps a presence here, all working together to diligently defend their home. After having been ejected from one homeland, the Caldari are not prepared to suffer such a fate again. The Citadel stands as a proud testament to that resolve.

zh: 赫法卡·楚比的战鹰级飞船
赫特失踪后，他之前掌握的股份逐渐被各集团瓜分。
en: After Heth's disappearance, the shares he had previously acquired were gradually divided among the corporations.

zh: 赫特还有不少的秘密——究竟是什么样的人能一夜之间从一个车间工人，变成八大集团的大股东。
en: There are still a lot of mysteries surrounding Heth. How did an insignificant worker become a major shareholder of all eight Corporations overnight?

zh: 走吧，大明星，到牢里再听你申诉。
en: Let's go, big shot. Save your complaints for prison!

zh: 走私者 伊米卡斯级³
走私者的巢穴音效物体
起点和目的地我已经发送给你了，祝你好运！
en: I have sent you the starting point and the destination. Good luck!

zh: 超大型工业阵列默认排列布局
en: XLarge Industrial Array Placement State Default

超空间速度调节器 II

超空间速度调节器蓝图 IV

en: Mission Beacon: Super Soft Drink II
Mission Beacon: Super Soft Drink I

zh: 越是高贵之人的鲜血，越能激起血袭者的狂热。纵使是女王所出身的萨拉姆家族的成员，也难以逃脱血袭者的魔爪。
en: The more noble a person's blood, the more the Blood Raiders covet it. This time the Blood Raiders even managed to capture a member of the Sarum Family – the family to which the Empress herself was born.

zh: 越来越多的呼声要求对刺客级进行改造，使其成为一艘符合军事化标准的舰队作战舰船。共和舰队批准了改造方案，于是一种速度稍慢，但更加坚固、火力更加强劲的战舰由此诞生了。因为服役时间不长，战士级舰队型还没有参与过任何大型的战斗，但它的设计师以及舰队指挥层都对它的潜力满怀信心。
en: Responding to voices stating that the Stabber needed an upgrade to be viable as a military-standard fleet vessel, the Republic Fleet commissioned the creation of the Fleet Issue Stabber; a slower, hardier version of the original that packs quite a bit more firepower. Being as new as it is on the battlefield, the Fleet Issue Stabber hasn't seen many large engagements yet, but its engineers as well as fleet command are very optimistic about its performance.

zh: 跃迁中，无法停靠空间站
en: Cannot dock with the station while warping

zh: 跃迁中，无法再进行跃迁
跃迁扰断炸弹作用范围

距离箱子太远，正在自动接近箱子。
en: Too far away from the cargo. Auto-approaching.

zh: 跨越星河的行商是维系这片宇宙生存的关键，运输技术可以提升运输工业舰的性能以及物流平台相关的管理能力。
en: Trade across galaxies is the blood that keeps the universe alive. Upgrading transport technology can enhance the performance of industrial transport ships and improve deliveries management.

en: Enter the number of processes to start manufacturing

en: Thank you, Capsuleer. You will get the reward payments you deserve.

zh: 达利塔·达克伯的永灭级飞船

zh: 达姆塞尔 娱乐城_任务
达姆塞尔 监狱_任务
达尔娴的纳维达斯级飞船
达尔斯·阿门的布鲁提克斯级飞船
达库莫的惩罚者级飞船
过去1小时击毁逃生舱数
en: Escape pods destroyed in last 1 hour

zh: 过去24小时击毁逃生舱数
en: Escape pods destroyed in last 24 hours

zh: 过去24小时被击毁的舰船
en: Ships destroyed in the last 24 hours
Stay the course! We're gonna finish what we started!

zh: 近年来，不断有图克尔移民选择回归共和国的怀抱，移民船作为极易受到海盗袭击的目标，护卫工作非常重要。一艘图克尔移民船在{2|system_name:_tr}被天使企业联合体海盗所拦截。共和安全局正在紧急征募一名有战斗经验的飞行员前往进行救援。
en: Many Thukker immigrants have returned to the Republic in recent years. But immigrant ships are among those most frequently targeted by pirates. Escorting them is important work. A Thukker immigration ship was intercepted by pirates from the Angel Cartel in {2|system_name:_tr}. The Republic Security Services are urgently looking for a pilot with combat experience to rescue them.

zh: 近期常有不法分子蹲点打劫酷菲，必须打击他们这种可耻的行为。
en: Some outlaws have been robbing Quafe recently. Such disgraceful actions must be stopped.
We're turning back and taking out those drones.

zh: 还好我把他们都收拾掉了。
en: Fortunately, I took care of them once and for all.

zh: 还是部族居住地的问题，新居住地的一处正在建造的资源采集设施被一帮海盗打劫了。
en: It's about the tribal settlements again. A resource harvesting facility under construction in the new settlement was looted by a gang of pirates.

zh: 还有一个信标，我已经迫不及待想要知道凶手了。
en: There's another beacon. I can't wait to find out who's behind this.

zh: 还有什么可犹豫的？我们都快渴死了！
en: Why are you still hesitating? We're dying of thirst!

zh: 还有别的要求？真是一帮刁民……
en: There are more requests? Bunch of good-for-nothing bastards...
What? Did you not get them?

zh: 这一小团残骸看上去以前很可能是一架穿梭机。也或许只是一些被抛弃的垃圾。这里面肯定是有某种盖伦特科技混杂在其中。
en: This small ball of debris looks like it might once have been a shuttle. Or possibly some jettisoned garbage. There is definitely some Gallente technology mixed in here somewhere though.

zh: 这一期的矿石请送到{2|station_name:_tr}处理，这段时间可能会需要不少的矿物，咳咳。
en: Please deliver this batch of ores to {2|station_name:_tr} for refining. They may need quite a bit of ore in the foreseeable future, cough.

zh: 这一次学院派在长老会中再次刷了一波存在感，隐形跑路然后突然出现在想不到的位置上，然后倾泻大量的炮弹，这很长尾鲛。
en: These people from the Republic University just showed up during the Elder's meeting, hid themselves, then reappeared at an unexpected location, spraying tons of ammunition. Just what you would expect from a Thrasher.

zh: 这下又可以开工了！哦耶！
en: We can start working again! Hooray!

zh: 这下就能让他们知道，内瓦达人不是好惹的。
en: Now they will know that the Nefantar are not to be messed with.

zh: 这下帝国海军的后勤部队就能畅通无阻了。
en: Now the logistics force of the Imperial Navy can transport without worries.

zh: 这不是一次简单的报复，这支商队运送的是向女皇进献的贡品。
en: This is not simple revenge. This caravan is carrying the tribute for the Empress.

zh: 这两个驻留点在原始记录中是存在的，但是不知道被什么人抹去了记录。
en: These two refuges exist in the original record, but an unknown person erased them.

zh: 这个上了栓的集装箱悄然无声地在星际之间漂移，丝毫不向人们透露其中可能隐藏了什么宝藏。
en: The bolted container drifts silently amongst the stars, giving no hint to what treasures it may hide.

zh: 这个中型审计安全密码集装箱安装了密码保护安全锁装置。
en: This medium audit log container is fitted with a password-protected security lock.

zh:
这个中型集装箱安装了由密码保护的安全锁。



注意：安全货柜必须在锚定过后才能启动密码保护功能。只能在安全等级等于或者低于0.7的恒星系锚定安全货柜。
en:
This medium container is fitted with a password-protected security lock.

Note: The container must be anchored to enable password functionality. Anchoring containers is only possible in solar systems with a security status of 0.7 or lower.

zh: 这个亚空间信标有非常强大的护盾发生器保护着。
en: This subspace beacon is protected by a powerful shield generator.

zh: 这个仓库为周围的设施提供燃料。
en: This depot contains fuel for the surrounding structures.

zh: 这个仓库里储藏了勘探所需要的基本设备，包括克隆飞行员训练中所需要用到的扫描设备。
en: This storage facility contains a basic supply of exploration scanning equipment for use by Capsuleers-in-training.

zh: 这个任务是为第一次使用视角传媒际遇委托平台的飞行员准备的。
en: This mission is for pilots who are using the Scope's Encounter mission platform for the first time.

zh: 这个位标所指向的地点聚集了一群十恶不赦的犯罪份子，不过我觉得对于一个克隆人来说，解决他们应该是小菜一碟。
en: These coordinates point to a group of unscrupulous criminals. But dealing with them should be a piece of cake for a Capsuleer like you, I'd imagine.

zh: 这个位置对我们的物流通道非常关键，危险系数极高。
en: This location is critical to our logistics route and has a very low security level.

zh: 这个信标会自动排斥任何靠近它的物体。
en: This beacon repels any object that comes near it.

zh: 这个信标揭示了某个解除隐形的建筑指挥节点的位置。
en: This beacon marks the location of a decloaked Structure Command Node.

zh: 这个信标标记着一个中级的军事设施。入口通道似乎被设定为允许一级科技和二级科技的护卫舰、巡洋舰以及一级科技、二级科技和三级科技的驱逐舰进入。
en: This beacon marks a medium military location. The entry gate is likely configured to admit Tech I and Tech II frigates, Tech I, Tech II and Tech III destroyers and Tech I and Tech II cruisers.

zh: 这个信标标记着一个初级的军事设施。入口通道似乎被设定为允许一级科技的护卫舰进入。
en: This beacon marks a novice military location. The entry gate is likely configured to admit only Tech I frigates.

zh: 这个信标标记着一个小型的军事设施。入口通道似乎被设定为允许一级科技和二级科技的护卫舰和驱逐舰进入。
en: This beacon marks a small military location. The entry gate is likely configured to admit Tech I frigates, Tech II frigates, Tech I destroyers and Tech II destroyers.

zh: 这个信标标记着一个自由的军事设施，没有使用加速轨道。
en: This beacon marks a large free-standing military location with no acceleration gate

zh: 这个信标标记着一个重要的军事设施。入口通道似乎被设定为允许所有非旗舰级的舰船进入。
en: This beacon marks a major military location. The entry gate is likely configured to admit all non-capital vessels.

zh: 这个信标装配有强力闪光电池，能把信号传送到整个恒星系中。
en: Fitted with a power flash-battery, this beacon sends out signals throughout the entire solar system.

zh: 这个信标闪烁着橙色的光，似乎标示着一个有趣的地点，也可能是某条大航线的一个航标。
en: With its blinking orange light, this beacon appears to be marking a point of interest, or perhaps a waypoint in a greater trail.

zh: 这个信标闪烁着红色的光线，似乎标示着一个有趣的地点，也可能是某条大航线的一个航标。
en: With it's blinking red light, this beacon appears to be marking a point of interest, or perhaps a waypoint in a greater trail.

zh: 这个储藏单元里充满了爆炸性物体，注意小心操作。
en: This storage unit is filled with volatile materials. Handle with care.

zh: 这个储藏库严重损坏了，但对其详细分析仍然可能找到有价值的东西。
en: This storage depot is badly banged up and most of its contents probably destroyed, but a detailed analysis might still reveal something of value.

zh: 这个储藏库似乎并未受损，仓库内应该存有完好的物品，只需要遗迹分析就可以获得。
en: This storage depot seems to be in pristine condition. Whatever is stored inside should be completely unscathed and is only a relic analyzing away from being available.

zh: 这个储藏库似乎相对完整，仓库内很有可能存有值钱的物品。你可以使用遗迹分析仪对其解锁。
en: This storage depot seems relatively intact, meaning there is a good chance of something lucrative lurking inside, waiting to be unlocked with a relic analyzer.

zh: 这个储藏库的墙壁非常厚，无法从远处探测里面的东西。你需要靠近它才能知道里面有些什么。
en: This storage depot has thick walls, making it hard to gauge its contents from afar. You need to get close to get a read on what is hidden inside.

zh: 这个储藏库被彻底打捞过了，没有值钱的东西剩下了。很难说清楚这个仓库是由于附近的爆炸损毁的还是被凶残扫荡过了，也许两者皆有。
en: This storage depot has been completely wrecked, with nothing of value remaining. It is hard to tell whether the depot was destroyed by nearby explosions or through savage scavenging. Probably a bit of both.

zh: 这个储藏库被用作容纳附近居民区废弃物的垃圾箱。
en: This storage silo is being used as a dump for unwanted material from a nearby habitation.

zh: 这个储藏库遭受了重创，但如果熟练使用你的分析仪对其分析仍然可能找到有价值的东西。
en: This storage depot has seen some rough treatment, but you should still find something of value intact, if you employ your analyzer with skill.

zh: 这个储藏集装箱是用来存放一批一支帝国军事运送队运来的高科技激光手枪。
en: This storage container is used to store a batch of high-tech laser pistols which were recently stolen from an Imperial military convoy.

zh: 这个储藏集装箱是视角传媒的财产，如果你想动它的话，可得自己承担后果。
en: This storage container is property of The Scope.  Tamper with it at your own risk.

zh: 这个冬眠者数据库设备一定是遭受了严重的冲击，但它还处于工作状态。你可以尝试使用你的数据分析仪找出其中有用的信息。
en: This databank has clearly been the site of a serious impact, but it remains online. You may be able to extract something with your Data Analyzer.

zh: 这个前盖伦特人娱乐胜地已经被艾玛人大幅改造，现被用于生产食品加工所需的生化物。其物资主要来源于周围的隐匿空间层以及从远处母星运送来的补给。
en: This previous Gallentean pleasure resort has been heavily modified by the Amarrians and is now used for the production of biochemicals for food production. It uses substances harvested from the surrounding deadspace pockets as well as supplies flown in from distant starbases.

zh: 这个力场围绕着一个亚空间电离聚合点。它的主要作用是在人们找到驾驭这种能量的方法前，先抑制从这个聚合点中发出的能量。
en: This bubble was built around a subspace ionization convergence.  Its main purpose is to contain the energy emanating from the convergence until a way can be found to properly harness it.

zh: 这个加固的集装箱在宇宙中悄然无息地旋转着，由一些比巨大货柜平台周围的巡逻舰还要强大的战舰看护着。
en: This reinforced container revolves silently in space, and is guarded by somewhat stronger ships than what you've seen patrolling the enormous cargo rigs around it.

zh: 这个加速门已被关闭，普通人无法使用。
en: This acceleration gate has been locked down and is not usable by the general public.

zh: 这个加锁的集装箱似乎曾经是某个大型建筑的一部分。
en: This bolted storage container seems to have once been a part of a larger structure.

zh: 这个医疗补给物资只剩一些绷带还有蜘蛛网了。
en: The "Medical Supply Hold" is down to a few bandages and cobwebs.

zh: 这个发电器为周围的建筑提供能源。
en: This generator provides power to nearby structures.

zh: 这个发电器向附近的设施提供能源。它配备有小型护盾装备，似乎还装备了轻薄型装甲附甲。
en: This generator provides power to nearby structures. It is fitted with a small shield module and appears to be coated with a thin layer of armored plates.

zh: 这个哨站是隐匿空间复合体的内部环形防线安全控制的基地。
en: This outpost is the base of security operations in this deadspace complex's inner perimeter.

zh: 这个圆形碎片可能曾是某个大型物体的一部分。它现在已被抛弃，在黑暗的空间中孤独地旋转。
en: This circular piece may have once been a part of something larger. Now it is derelict, spinning alone in the blackness of space.

zh: 这个圣坛里埋葬了霍特克家族的某个重要人物，很有可能是它们的血脉消失前的最后一任领导人物。
en: This shrine entombs someone of significant standing within the Hauteker family, most likely one of their last leaders before the bloodline vanished into obscurity.

zh: 这个多功能的设施为各种加达里人员提供临时住宿，那些人通常都是负责这个星系安全事务的人。
en: This multi-purpose structure acts as temporary housing for all kinds of Caldari State personnel in their efforts to secure this system.

zh: 这个多功能的设施为各种盖伦特人员提供临时住宿，那些人通常都是负责这个星系安全事务的人。
en: This multi-purpose structure acts as temporary housing for all kinds of Gallente Federation personnel in their efforts to secure this system.

zh: 这个多功能的设施为各种米玛塔尔人员提供临时住宿，那些人通常都是负责这个星系安全事务的人。
en: This multi-purpose structure acts as temporary housing for all kinds of Minmatar Republic personnel in their efforts to secure this system.

zh: 这个多功能的设施是临时用做于为各种艾玛人员提供住宿，他们通常都是负责这个星系安全事务的人。
en: This multi-purpose structure acts as temporary housing for all kinds of Amarr Empire personnel in their efforts to secure this system.

zh: 这个大型实验室复合体曾经是超过10,000名科学家、雇员以及安保人员生活的地方，他们在这里夜以继日地工作，为了解开神经病毒的秘密。在米玛塔尔长老会回归以及奥图·高伊斯为共和国留下荧索莱姆遗产之后，这个设施基本上被废弃了。但是少数一些科学家舍不得放弃这里，仍然致力于完成他们一开始所追寻的目标并且寻求更多商业上的用途。绝大多数的科学研究都转移到附近新成立的模拟生态舱中去了，但是还有一些小型的实验机构及它们的研究人员仍然驻守在这艘古老的泰坦里面。
en: This massive laboratory complex was once home to over 10,000 scientists, their staff and security personnel, working day and night to unravel the mysteries of Vitoc. Since the return of the Minmatar Elders and Otro Gariushi's bequest of Insorum to the Republic, the facility has largely fallen into disuse, but some few scientists cling on, pushing to finish what they started before they too seek more commercial roles.For the most part, research continues inside the newer biodome nearby, but a few smaller laboratories and their staff still insist on basing out of the aging titan.

zh: 这个大型审计安全密码集装箱安装了密码保护安全锁装置。
en: This large audit log container is fitted with a password-protected security lock.

zh: 这个大型容器中装满了爆炸物。
en: This large container is full of explosives.

zh: 这个大型建筑不断地向周围以及整个复合体区域发送信号，以此来处理并协调各项行动。超大型鱼雷炮台、停滞缠绕光束以及先进的维修系统使得这个本就十分强大的建筑如虎添翼。
en: This massive structure sends signals to its neighbors and the rest of the complex constantly, processing and coordinating all functions. An armament of XL torpedo batteries, stasis webifiers and advanced repair functions reinforce the already formidable structure.

zh: 这个大型建筑中存有多种用于维护和修理重要的中心档案端脑的材料。注意，这个建筑可能连向档案防御系统，破译时要小心操作。
en: This large structure contains various materials used to maintain and repair the important Central Archive Cerebrum structure. Note that it is possible this structure is linked into the archive defense system, so hack with caution.

zh: 这个大型建筑似乎是用来使大型地点隐形用的，有迹象表明它是最近由于无法继续服役才被摧毁的。是谁毁坏了这个建筑，为什么毁坏它，恐怕不得而知了。
en: The purpose of this large structure seems to have been to cloak a section of space - section big enough to conceal a sizable site. There are indications that this structure was damaged recently, to the point where it could no longer serve its purpose. Who damaged the structure or why is impossible to tell.

zh: 这个大型的无线电传输器负责中转萨沙舰队的指令信息。这些指令一般都出自当地的指挥官，但诸如控制中枢之类的其他设施也能发出一些有限的战术指令。
en: This large radio transmitter relays orders and information to Sansha fleets. Typically these orders come from a local commander, but other facilities such as a central control nexus are also capable of issuing limited tactical commands.

zh: 这个大型的设施内部安置了成百上千的超级电脑，全部都是用于研究和存储用途。这些超级电脑中储藏了无限创造在冬眠者技术上最新的发现和研究成果。
en: This massive complex houses hundreds of supercomputers, all dedicated to research and storage. One such superconductor contains the latest Sleepers research from Boundless Creations.

zh:
这个大型集装箱安装了密码保护安全锁装置。



注意：安全货柜必须在锚定过后才能启动密码保护功能。只能在安全等级等于或者低于0.7的恒星系锚定安全货柜。
en:
This large container is fitted with a password-protected security lock.

Note: The container must be anchored to enable password functionality. Anchoring containers is only possible in solar systems with a security status of 0.7 or lower.

zh: 这个太空舱里面装的是艾玛海盗克里斯坦·帕休斯。这个太空舱的内置曲速跃迁装置看起来在母舰爆炸的时候遭受了严重的损伤，它现在被困住了。
en: This capsule contains the Amarrian pirate Kritsan Parthus. The internal warp drive of the pod appear to be heavily damaged from the explosion of his ship, leaving him stranded.

zh: 这个奇异的信号……我似乎在之前几天的古斯塔斯海盗的清剿任务的报告中见过……
en: This signal... I think I've seen it before, when checking the reports on the purging of the Guristas pirates...

zh: 这个家伙遭到了残酷的太空环境的永久遗弃。
en: The inhospitability of space no longer bothers this individual.

zh: 这个封闭的储藏舱静静地飘浮在太空中。
en: The enclosed storage bin drifts quietly in space.

zh: 这个封闭的储藏舱静静地飘浮在太空中，耐心地等着饥渴的寻宝者将它开启。
en: The enclosed storage bin drifts quietly in space, waiting patiently to be pried open by a hungry looter.

zh: 这个封闭的货柜静静地漂浮在太空中，耐心等待着饥渴的寻宝者将它撬开。
en: The enclosed flotsam drifts quietly in space, waiting patiently to be pried open by a hungry looter.

zh: 这个封闭的集装箱静静地漂浮在太空中，由欧克勒恩最臭名昭著的海盗团伙——卡兹卡强盗严密监视。
en: The enclosed flotsam drifts quietly in space, closely monitored by the infamous pirate gang in Okkelen, the Kazka Bandits.

zh: 这个小型审计安全密码集装箱安装了密码保护安全锁装置。
en: This small audit log container is fitted with a password-protected security lock.

zh:
这个小型集装箱安装了密码保护安全锁装置。



注意：安全货柜必须在锚定过后才能启动密码保护功能。只能在安全等级等于或者低于0.7的恒星系锚定安全货柜。
en:
This small container is fitted with a password-protected security lock.

Note: The container must be anchored to enable password functionality. Anchoring containers is only possible in solar systems with a security status of 0.7 or lower.

zh: 这个小型飞行器已经遭受到了严重损伤，所有的推进组件已经完全地被损毁了。
en: This tiny craft is badly damaged. All propulsion units have been completely disabled.

zh: 这个小插曲就让它这样过去吧，相信乌拉姆大人会不会深究。
en: Let's put this behind us. I believe Mr. Uriam won't ask too much about this.

zh: 这个就是老牌天使企业联合体成员颐养天年的地方。他们中的许多人会随身带一些以前的战利品过去，有时甚至在这个与世隔绝的静寂空间内从事一些项目。
en: This is where elderly Angel Cartel members are supposed to enjoy the last few years of existence. It is popular amongst them to bring with them memorabilia from past conquests and even work on some projects in the quiet and solitude of the Deadspace Complexes.

zh: 这个居住有粮食救济会人员的储藏设置完全没有任何防备能力。里面有大量的补给和事物，当然还有一些工人和志愿者。
en: A defenseless storage facility housing Food Relief workers. Inside the station are loads of supplies and food, as well as personnel workers and a few volunteers.

zh:
这个巨型集装箱安装了由密码保护的安全锁。



注意：安全货柜必须在锚定过后才能启动密码保护功能。只能在安全等级等于或者低于0.7的恒星系锚定安全货柜。
en:
This Giant container is fitted with a password-protected security lock.

Note: The container must be anchored to enable password functionality. Anchoring containers is only possible in solar systems with a security status of 0.7 or lower.

zh: 这个巨大的上层建筑配备了内部码头来接待到此度假胜地观光的游客。疲劳的走私者喜欢将这里作为一个休憩之所。
en: This gigantic suprastructure has been fitted with internal docking bays to receive the guests visiting this pleasure resort. It is a popular chill-out spot for weary smugglers.

zh: 这个巨大的无人机母体内存放着中央处理器，控制着整个地区的自由无人机。
en: This gargantuan mother drone holds the central CPU, controlling the rogue drones throughout the sector.

zh: 这个巨大的残骸看上去曾经应该是某个战列舰或空间的外壳。
en: This massive hulk of debris seems to have once been a part of the outer hull of a battleship or station.

zh: 这个巨大的电池柱可能曾是某座已被毁的发电厂的一部分。目前它仍然涌动着能量。
en: This massive battery column was probably a part of a destroyed power plant. It still surges with energy.

zh: 这个巨大的空间站是天蛇集团的军事设施之一，是守护天使集团与天蛇集团所达成联盟的结晶产物。虽然体积巨大，但它不提供商业性空间站服务，也没有接引客人的船坞。
en: This gigantic station is one of the Serpentis military installations and a black jewel of the alliance between The Guardian Angels and The Serpentis Corporation. Even for it's size it has no commercial station services or docking bay to receive guests.

zh: 这个巨大的空间站是天蛇集团的军事设施之一，是守护天使集团与天蛇集团联盟的结晶产物。虽然体积巨大，但它不提供商业类空间站服务，也没有接引客人的船坞。
en: This gigantic station is one of the Serpentis military installations and a black jewel of the alliance between The Guardian Angels and The Serpentis Corporation. Even for its size, it has no commercial station services or docking bays to receive guests.

zh: 这个巨大的钻孔机曾经在某个早已遗忘的采矿作业中发挥作用。它的技术过时已久，并且其传动装置已经无法修复。
en: This colossal drill once served a purpose in some forgotten outfit's mining operation. Its technology is long since outdated and it's actuators are beyond repair.

zh:
这个巨大的集装箱安装了密码保护安全锁装置。



注意：安全货柜必须在锚定过后才能启动密码保护功能。只能在安全等级等于或者低于0.7的恒星系锚定安全货柜。
en:
This Colossal container is fitted with a password-protected security lock.

Note: The container must be anchored to enable password functionality. Anchoring containers is only possible in solar systems with a security status of 0.7 or lower.

zh: 这个已磨旧的集装箱藏安静地漂浮在太空中，周围有海盗严密把守。
en: The worn container drifts quietly in space, closely guarded by pirates.

zh: 这个已磨旧的集装箱静静地飘浮在太空中。
en: The worn container drifts quietly in space.

zh: 这个已磨旧的集装箱静静漂浮在太空中，耐心等待着饥渴的寻宝者将它开启。
en: The worn container drifts quietly in space, waiting patiently to be pried open by a hungry looter.

zh:
这个庞大的集装箱安装了密码保护安全锁装置。



注意：安全货柜必须在锚定过后才能启动密码保护功能。只能在安全等级等于或者低于0.7的恒星系锚定安全货柜。
en:
This Huge container is fitted with a password-protected security lock.

Note: The container must be anchored to enable password functionality. Anchoring containers is only possible in solar systems with a security status of 0.7 or lower.

zh: 这个建筑是用来对加密数据的传输进行中继和放大的。看上去它正处于满负荷运转状态。
en: A structure tasked with relaying, boosting, and encrypting data. It seems to be operating at full capacity.

zh: 这个建筑的用途是艾玛帝国内星域的当地指挥和控制中心。通常由几个军事单位负责防卫。这个要塞在战争期间起到军事基地的作用，而在和平时期则用作政府办公楼。
en: This building functions as the command and control center for the local region within the Amarr Empire. Usually guarded by several military units. This stronghold is designed to function as a military base during times of war aswell as a government office during peace times.

zh: 这个建筑组成了这个系统中主要的控制网络，协调整个艾玛帝国的军事行动。
en: This structure forms part of the primary command net for this system, co-ordinating all Amarr Empire military operations.

zh: 这个情况必须尽快向高层反应。
en: We must report to the higher-ups about this.

zh: 这个战役空间站因遭受攻击受损，或是由于过度使用和缺乏维护而损坏。它仍能运作，但无法发挥全部性能。
en: This battle-station has been damaged or been worn out from overuse and lack of maintenance.  It is still functional, but not at its full capacity.

zh: 这个护盾发生器通过一股加密的数据流阻扰着加速轨道。发生器内含有通过加速轨道到主监狱区必需的密码。
en: This shield generator is disrupting the acceleration gate through an encoded datastream. The generator contains the cypher required to ride the gate into the main prison block.

zh: 这个损坏的设备残片原本可能属于一个发电站或者中继站。
en: This damaged hunk of machinery could once have been a part of a powerplant or relay station.

zh: 这个损毁的船只遗骸静静地漂浮在太空中，被一群烧焦的碎片围绕着，一点也看不出事故发生时它原来的样子。
en: The mangled wreck floats motionless in space, surrounded by a field of scorched debris, leaving no hint to its form of demise.

zh: 这个改装件模组可以集成转化多个改装件的效果，提高综合效率。
en: This rig can integrate the effects of multiple rigs and improve overall efficiency.

zh: 这个改装过的居住舱现在是一个存储设施，用于储存海盗势力生产毒品所需的各种物品。这里通常都有强大的守卫力量。但毫无疑问，一旦击破了守卫力量，只需略用一些破解技术，就肯定能拿到好东西。
en: This modified habitat module is being used as storage facility for various items that the pirate factions use for drug manufacturing.  Usually heavily guarded this would undoubtedly reap a bounty with a bit of hacking once past the security.

zh: 这个曾经启用过的数据库被摧毁了，已经无法修理。毁坏原因不明。
en: This once functional databank has been destroyed beyond repair. The cause of destruction is unknown.

zh: 这个曾经启用过的数据片被摧毁了，已经无法修理。毁坏原因不明。
en: This once functional info shard has been destroyed beyond repair. The cause of destruction is unknown.

zh:
这个曾经海盗活动猖獗的古斯塔斯运输设施，如今暗影斑驳地游荡在太空中。透过部分保存完好的残迹，袭击者向它的旧主彰显着强有力的信息。靠近了你会发现，这个设施的悲惨信标已经被劫持和重新设置，反复播放着一段挑衅语句：



>>CQD/NULL-REBROADCAST/30001445



“你把我们当成猎物，却反倒成了被追逐的目标。你以为能够压制我们，却遭到了我们的奋起反抗。你也许能左右命运，可我们铸就不朽。

我们证明正受到上苍的庇佑。 



别再挑衅我们。如果你一意孤行，你将会命丧于瓦尔基里和我们最忠诚娴熟的飞行员之手。 



快从这儿滚出去。”



数据传输中附上了一个统合部档案的数据包，列出了多名参与援助瓦尔基里抵抗古斯塔斯海盗的飞行员名单：



Jaret Victorian

Kev Lar

Krastor Sandoval

Morwen Lagann

Asher Kagen

Walter Islands

Pelea Ming

Dr Seti

Sheldon d'Albion

Imperator Trajanus

MINIMA16

OneWay Trip Hunter

Angelina Fortrueks

BUISNESSWOMAN

Maja Chou

Antarah ibn Shaddad

Alvarez Akachi

Angeli Inferna

slphy vansyl

Sargeant Summers
en:
Once a hive of pirate activity, this Guristas Transport Facility now drifts in space blackened and scarred, left partially intact by its attackers to serve as a message to its former owners. As you draw closer, it is apparent that the facility’s distress beacon has been hijacked and reprogrammed to loop an audio message of defiance:

>>CQD/NULL-REBROADCAST/30001445

“You believed you could hunt us, but you have become the quarry. You believed you could subdue us, but we have risen up. You may be Fatal, but we are immortal.
We have proven that the Empyreans stand with us. 

Do not test us again. If you attempt to do so, you will burn at the hands of the Valkyrie and our most loyal and skilled Capsuleer wingmen. 

Kavik out.”

A data packet is attached to the transmission, listing the DED profiles of a number of Capsuleers known to have aided the Valkyrie during their fight against Guristas forces:

Jaret Victorian
Kev Lar
Krastor Sandoval
Morwen Lagann
Asher Kagen
Walter Islands
Pelea Ming
Dr Seti
Sheldon d'Albion
Imperator Trajanus
MINIMA16
OneWay Trip Hunter
Angelina Fortrueks
BUISNESSWOMAN
Maja Chou
Antarah ibn Shaddad
Alvarez Akachi
Angeli Inferna
slphy vansyl
Sargeant Summers

zh: 这个样本留给你们，将来可以成为威胁女皇的重要工具。
en: Keep this sample. It will come in useful if you wish to threaten the Empress.

zh: 这个核心是一个小规模的信息库，包含了一些普通民用科技领域的知识。
en: This datacore is a minor storehouse of information, containing a fair portion of mankind's collected knowledge in the field of ordinary civilian technology.

zh: 这个核心是一个庞大的数据库，包含了大量关于人类在分子工程方面的科研资料和信息。
en: This datacore is a veritable storehouse of information, containing a considerable portion of mankind's collected knowledge in the field of molecular engineering.

zh: 这个核心是一个庞大的数据库，包含了大量关于人类在引力子物理方面的科研资料和信息。
en: This datacore is a veritable storehouse of information, containing a considerable portion of mankind's collected knowledge in the field of graviton physics.

zh: 这个核心是一个庞大的数据库，包含了大量关于人类在机械工程方面的科研资料和信息。
en: This datacore is a veritable storehouse of information, containing a considerable portion of mankind's collected knowledge in the field of mechanical engineering.

zh: 这个核心是一个庞大的数据库，包含了大量关于人类在核芯物理方面的科研资料和信息。
en: This datacore is a veritable storehouse of information, containing a considerable portion of mankind's collected knowledge in the field of nuclear physics.

zh: 这个核心是一个庞大的数据库，包含了大量关于人类在激光物理方面的科研资料和信息。
en: This datacore is a veritable storehouse of information, containing a considerable portion of mankind's collected knowledge in the field of laser physics.

zh: 这个核心是一个庞大的数据库，包含了大量关于人类在火箭科学方面的科研资料和信息。
en: This datacore is a veritable storehouse of information, containing a considerable portion of mankind's collected knowledge in the field of rocket science.

zh: 这个核心是一个庞大的数据库，包含了大量关于人类在电子工程方面的科研资料和信息。
en: This datacore is a veritable storehouse of information, containing a considerable portion of mankind's collected knowledge in the field of electronic engineering.

zh: 这个核心是一个庞大的数据库，包含了大量关于人类在电磁物理方面的科研资料和信息。
en: This datacore is a veritable storehouse of information, containing a considerable portion of mankind's collected knowledge in the field of electromagnetic physics.

zh: 这个核心是一个庞大的数据库，包含了大量关于人类在磁流体物理方面的科研资料和信息。
en: This datacore is a veritable storehouse of information, containing a considerable portion of mankind's collected knowledge in the field of hydromagnetic physics.

zh: 这个核心是一个庞大的数据库，包含了大量关于人类在等离子物理方面的科研资料和信息。
en: This datacore is a veritable storehouse of information, containing a considerable portion of mankind's collected knowledge in the field of plasma physics.

zh: 这个核心是一个庞大的数据库，包含了大量关于人类在纳米工程方面的科研资料和信息。
en: This datacore is a veritable storehouse of information, containing a considerable portion of mankind's collected knowledge in the field of nanite engineering.

zh: 这个核心是一个庞大的数据库，包含了大量关于人类在量子物理方面的科研资料和信息。
en: This datacore is a veritable storehouse of information, containing a considerable portion of mankind's collected knowledge in the field of quantum physics.

zh: 这个核心是一个庞大的数据库，包含了大量关于人类在高能物理方面的科研资料和信息。
en: This datacore is a veritable storehouse of information, containing a considerable portion of mankind's collected knowledge in the field of high energy physics.

zh: 这个核心是一个庞大的数据库，包含了大量关于加达里星舰工程的资料和信息。
en: This datacore is a veritable storehouse of information, containing a considerable portion of mankind's collected knowledge in the field of Caldari starship engineering.

zh: 这个核心是一个庞大的数据库，包含了大量关于盖伦特星舰工程的资料和信息。
en: This datacore is a veritable storehouse of information, containing a considerable portion of mankind's collected knowledge in the field of Gallentean starship engineering.

zh: 这个核心是一个庞大的数据库，包含了大量关于米玛塔尔星舰工程的资料和信息。
en: This datacore is a veritable storehouse of information, containing a considerable portion of mankind's collected knowledge in the field of Matari starship engineering.

zh: 这个核心是一个庞大的数据库，包含了大量关于艾玛星舰工程的资料和信息。
en: This datacore is a veritable storehouse of information, containing a considerable portion of mankind's collected knowledge in the field of Amarrian starship engineering.

zh: 这个隐匿空间区域里的高层人员居住在这里。
en: The highest ranking personnel within this deadspace pocket reside here.

zh: 这个残骸里面还有23名幸存者。
en: This wreck appears to have twenty three survivors in it

zh:
这个母巢的体积连宏伟的冬眠者包体都相形见绌，它将恐惧的碎片深埋在任何有幸见它一眼的人的心中。
它的高墙傲慢地耸立在环境严苛的黑色虚空之中，它的建筑结构，是冬眠者神秘莫测的超凡科技的完美体现。 

它冰冷而锋利的边沿似乎要将宇宙中的尘埃都撕成碎片，让人有恍如隔世的感觉。
任何人，只要想一想这样规模的建筑是用来做什么用的，就会因恐惧而战栗不已。
en:
Dwarfing the majestic enclave in size, the scale of this Hive sends shivers of awe into all those who bear witness to its grandeur.
Its walls stand defiant against the harsh black vacuum. Its structure, testament to the unfathomable technological prowess of the Sleeper race. 

Cold, sharp edges seem to tear at the very fabric of space, distorting reality around it.
One can only cower in fear at the thought of what a construction of this magnitudes purpose could be.

zh:
这个热核触发机关虽然破碎了，但它的核封闭立场似乎完好无损，而且等离子也处于近乎热能平衡状态。如果只是因为它破了相就把它扔了，实在太可惜了。

可以从下列物品中提炼获得：
盖伦特4级受损结构
盖伦特5级受损结构
盖伦特6级受损结构
艾玛4级受损结构
艾玛5级受损结构
艾玛6级受损结构
联合矿业受损结构
星捷运受损结构
en:
This Thermonuclear Trigger Unit, while smashed, still seems to have its nuclei containment field intact, and the plasma seems to be near thermal equilibrium. It would be a shame to waste this unit just because of its cosmetic damage.

Can be obtained by reprocessing the following items:
Gallente Ship Debris 4
Gallente Ship Debris 5
Gallente Ship Debris 6
Amarr Ship Debris 4
Amarr Ship Debris 5
Amarr Ship Debris 6
ORE Ship Debris
InterBus Ship Debris

zh: 这个物件应该是很久很久以前从某种大型的设施之上脱落出来的，可能是遭受了小行星的撞击。一个先进的能源供给系统提供了足够的能量让这个设备依然处于运转状态。你可以尝试使用你的数据分析仪找出其中有用的信息。
en: This object was severed from some larger structure in the distant past, perhaps as the result of an asteroid strike. Fortunately, a once-redundant power source has provided just enough energy to keep its databank operable. You may be able to extract something with your Data Analyzer.

zh: 这个狂妄的尤朵人，如果没有什么有用的东西，我下次绝对让她尝尝我的厉害。
en: Damn that arrogant Udorian! If there's nothing of use there, she will definitely have a taste of my anger.

zh: 这个生物技术园区用来培养动植物。米玛塔尔集团已将该业务外包给天使企业联合体。此处生产的奢侈食物能够带来大量利润。买家主要是一些新富阶层。
en: This biodome is used for cultivation of plants and animals alike. Minmatar corporations have contracted the operation to the Angel Cartel and there is a healthy profit to be made from the luxury foods manufactured here. The prime buyers are the newly rich.

zh: 这个盖伦特战役空间站装备了多个强大的防御系统。
en: This Gallente Battlestation has several formidable defensive systems.

zh: 这个研究设施是天蛇用来进行危险而机密的试验的。
en: This research facility is use by the Serpentis to conduct dangerous and secretive experiments.

zh: 这个神秘的岩层似乎曾经是一个由几种矿物质构成的大型小行星的一部分。在太空中漂浮了亿万年后，柔软的岩石已经粉碎，只剩下晶体化合物的骨架。
en: This mysterious rock formation seems to have once been a part of a larger asteroid made of several mineral types. After eons of drifting through space, the soft rock has crumbled away, leaving a skeleton of crystalized compounds.

zh: 这个神秘的建筑物看上去容纳了无数的工程之系统构件。它的外围防御系统依然处于活跃状态，可在建筑物遭受攻击的时候提供保护。在设施的内部，无数的数据网络模块被各种电缆线路相互连接交织在一起。
en: This enigmatic structure appears to house numerous engineering subsystems. An outer defense system is still online, shielding the installation from any hostile actions. Inside the facility there is a maze of data networks tangled amongst the cables and conduits that sustain them.

zh: 这个神秘的裂隙看上去很像一种能将任何靠近的人扔到遥远的未知地点的罕见空间现象。谨慎的旅行者都会避开它们；曾经有些人大着胆靠近它们，结果从此失去了踪迹。
en: This uncanny rift is similar to rare spatial phenomena that are thought to hurl those who come too close to faraway places. Wary travelers stay away from them, as some that have ventured too close have never been seen again.

zh: 这个神秘的高级建筑能够在很短时间内为附近的舰船提供大规模的维修和保护协助。成功破译就能激活它。不过不到万不得已，最好不要使用。
en: This enigmatic, but highly advanced structure has massive repairing and protection capabilities for ships in its vicinity, but will only last for a very short time. It can be activated by successfully hacking it. This should be done only when in a dire situation.

zh: 这个移动居住舱包含兹纳·凯撒的科学实验室。建筑内有高毒性化学物质。除非经特别授权，否则严禁进入。
en: This mobile habitation module contains Tsuna Qayse's science laboratory.  Highly toxic chemicals on board, entry is strictly prohibited without proper authorization.

zh: 这个空间裂隙表面上看上去像是宇宙中随处可见的自然现象，实际上是由一座塔洛迦静态星门阵列人工生成的。据观察，这个裂隙中不断放射出大量危险的伽玛射线和X射线。如果它通向什么地方的话，那里一定充满着危险。
en: Superficially similar to natural phenomena observed throughout space, this spatial rift appears to be artificially generated by a Talocan static gate array. Observations have shown that large quantities of dangerous gamma radiation and x-rays are pouring out of the rift. If this tear in space-time leads anywhere it is likely to be very inhospitable.

zh: 这个箱子被安全地看守着。
这个粒子加速器正处于毁灭边缘。电子粒子从它的外壳中泄露出来，填满了周围的虚空，使整个机器放出一种奇异的光芒。
en: This particle accelerator is on the brink of destruction.  Electronic particles ooze from its hull, filling the surrounding void and causing the structure to illuminate with an eerie glow.

zh: 这个精炼厂是所有工业哨站的中心，通过减少运输时间来提高采矿作业的效率。虽然它们的精炼效率不及成熟的空间站，但无需运送矿石的优越性足以弥补其这一缺陷。
en: The refinery is the heart of any industrial outpost, increasing the efficiency of any mining operation through reduced travel time. They are less efficient than full fledged stations, but the benefits of not having to move unrefined ore outweighs this drawback considerably.

zh: 这个繁殖设施专门培育米玛塔尔婴儿，使他们成为可供艾玛人使唤的奴仆。一旦到了少年时期，男孩就会被送到艾玛的下层社会去从事相应的工作。而女孩却都留在这里。她们的工作场所就在这，四肢张开躺在冰冷的金属桌面上，沉默而紧张。这座繁殖设施的繁殖原料都用完了，不过没关系；更多原料一直在源源不断地生产着。这里时不时就会来一支船队，装载着目光冷漠、双手焦躁不安的男人，他们非常愿意协助这里的繁殖活动。
en:
This breeding facility produces Minmatar children ready to assume their place as servants to the Amarr. Once they reach puberty, the boys are sent away to take their place amongst the lower classes in Amarr society.

The girls, on the other hand, are left behind. Their place is here, stretched out on cold metal tables, silent and tense. The facility wears out its brood, but that's all right; more are created all the time.

And every now and then, a caravan will arrive, carrying men with cold eyes and clammy hands, ready and willing to help with the production.

zh: 这个纪念碑旨在怀念在主权保卫战中英勇捐躯的74位泰坦驾驶员。它由新伊甸中的一个非官方矿工组织构思并出资建造。
en:
This monument serves to honor the 74 Capsuleers who sacrificed their Titan-class starships in the Battle of B-R5RB. It was conceived of and funded by an informal coalition of the Tritanium miners of New Eden.

Aerallo
Aiyashia Morgan
Anna Valerios
Anndy's Wife
Aphillo
