zh: 这个经加固的箱子静静地在太空中转动，不向人透露其中可能藏了什么宝物。
en: The reinforced container revolves silently in space, giving little hint to what hoard it may hide.

zh: 这个经加强的集装箱配备了一种捕获装置，可以获取来自附近感应器阵列的数据。
en: This reinforced container is outfitted with a capturing mechanism to pick up data from nearby sensor arrays.

zh: 这个经加强的集装箱配备了一种捕获装置，可以获取来自附近感应器阵列的数据。运送这个集装箱的飞船似乎已遭不幸。
en: This reinforced container is outfitted with a capturing mechanism to pick up data from nearby sensor arrays. The cargo ship carrying this to its destination seems to have met some kind of disasterous end.

zh: 这个绝版唱片只在……唔，我查查记录……只在{2|station_name:_tr}有卖。
en: This record is only on sale at... let me see... at {2|station_name:_tr}.

zh: 这个老鼠猖獗的监狱由马鲁人员严密守卫。
en: This rat-infested prison is being closely guarded by Maru personnel.

zh: 这个肮脏的监狱隶属于天蛇集团。
en: This rat-infested prison owned by the Serpentis organization.

zh: 这个背后似乎有人在做着什么。
这个船坞可以承担大型的建造项目。
en: Large construction tasks can be undertaken at this shipyard.

zh: 这个虫洞看上去形成的时间并不长。对于现在来说，它还是稳定的，不过过多的穿行流量和时间终究会把它拖垮的。
en: This wormhole appears to be relatively new. For the time being, it is stable, though excessive traffic and time will eventually cause it to vanish.

zh: 这个补给储藏库显然已被遗弃，飘荡在太空中。或许某个军队或海盗组织仍在用它储备物资。
en: This supply storage has apparently been left here drifting in space. Perhaps some military or pirate organization still uses it for storing goods.

zh: 这个装备可以对舰队成员投射一个纳米增益力场，提高他们的能力。
en: This module can cast a Nano Booster Force Field on a fleet member to increase their power.

zh: 这个装置收集恒星的伽玛射线，对其进行放大并指向到这个装置朝向的地方。你可能需要一个伽玛射线调节盘来正确地校准它。
en: This unit catches gamma rays from the sun, amplifies them and redirects elsewhere based on how the unit is aligned. It may require a Gamma Ray Modulate Disc to align correctly.

zh: 这个装置收集恒星的无线电波，对其进行放大并指向到这个装置朝向的地方。你可能需要一个无线电调节盘来正确地校准它。
en: This unit catches radio rays from the sun, amplifies them and redirects elsewhere based on how the unit is aligned. It may require a Radio Ray Modulate Disc to align correctly.

zh: 这个装置收集恒星的红外线，对其进行放大并指向到这个装置朝向的地方。你可能需要一个红外线调节盘来正确地校准它。
en: This unit catches infrared rays from the sun, amplifies them and redirects elsewhere based on how the unit is aligned. It may require an Infrared Ray Modulate Disc to align correctly.

zh: 这个装置的建筑类型暗示它被设计用来无限期保存单人躯体。
en: The structure of this device suggests that it is designed to preserve a singular occupant for an undefined period of time.

zh: 这个装置记录距离其100千米范围内出现的船只。
en: This object registers the presence of ships within 100km

zh: 这个装置记录距离其10千米范围内出现的船只。
en: This object registers the presence of ships within 10km

zh: 这个装置记录距离其20千米范围内出现的船只。
en: This object registers the presence of ships within 20km

zh: 这个装置记录距离其30千米范围内出现的船只。
en: This object registers the presence of ships within 30km

zh: 这个装置记录距离其40千米范围内出现的船只。
en: This object registers the presence of ships within 40km

zh: 这个装置记录距离其50千米范围内出现的船只。
en: This object registers the presence of ships within 50km

zh: 这个装置记录距离其60千米范围内出现的船只。
en: This object registers the presence of ships within 60km

zh: 这个装置记录距离其70千米范围内出现的船只。
en: This object registers the presence of ships within 70km

zh: 这个装置记录距离其80千米范围内出现的船只。
en: This object registers the presence of ships within 80km

zh: 这个装置记录距离其90千米范围内出现的船只。
en: This object registers the presence of ships within 90km

zh: 这个装饰过的建筑物是一个宗教场所。
en: This decorated structure serves as a place for religious practice.

zh: 这个设备很明显是由放射物监测卫星匆忙改装而来的，当做应急通信中继站使用。它表面看上去没什么损坏，但似乎被激光炮精准地击中了处理核心，所以已经不能用了。
en: Apparently a hastily converted radiation monitoring satellite, this device seems to have briefly functioned as an emergency communications relay. It shows relatively few signs of damage but seems to have been knocked out of commission by several precise energy weapon strikes to its processing cores.

zh: 这个设施是盖伦特军事行动的信息中继中心，负责收集和传送战场的情报。
en: This structure acts as a relay station for the Gallente Federation's operations in this structure, collecting, receiving and transmitting battlefield intelligence.

zh: 这个设施是艾玛帝国军事行动的信息中继中心，负责收集和传送战场的情报。
en: This structure acts as a relay station for the Amarr Empire's operations in this structure, collecting, receiving and transmitting battlefield intelligence.

zh: 这个设施组成了这个星系主要指挥系统的一部分，负责指挥及协调所有米玛塔尔的军事行动。
en: This structure forms part of the primary command net for this system, co-ordinating all Minmatar Republic military operations.

zh: 这个设施组成了这个星系的主要指挥系统的一部分，指挥和协同所有的加达里军事行动。
en: This structure forms part of the primary command net for this system, co-ordinating all Caldari State military operations.

zh: 这个设施组成了这个星系的主要指挥系统的一部分，指挥和协同所有的盖伦特军事行动。
en: This structure forms part of the primary command net for this system, co-ordinating all Gallente Federation military operations.

zh: 这个设施被天蛇集团的研究团队用作将货物在联合企业空域和源泉星域之间运输的基地。
en: This facility is used by Serpentis research teams to ship goods out of Cartel space and back towards Fountain.

zh: 这个设施负责为加达里进行战术供给。它的主要职能是在当地星系为军事行动提供后勤支援。
en: This structure is a tactical supply station for the Caldari State. It acts as a logistical depot for military operations throughout the system.

zh: 这个设施负责为盖伦特进行战术供给。它的主要职能是在当地星系为军事行动提供后勤支援。
en: This structure is a tactical supply station for the Gallente Federation. It acts as a logistical depot for military operations throughout the system.

zh: 这个设施负责为艾玛帝国进行战术供给。它的主要职能是在当地星系里为军事行动提供后勤服务。
en: This structure is a tactical supply station for the Amarr Empire. It acts as a logistical depot for military operations throughout the system.

zh: 这个设有路障的仓库是加达里无限基金集团的雇员乌兹·帕克里的藏身处。
en: This barricaded warehouse is the hiding place of Uchi Pakkori, employee of Caldari Funds Unlimited.

zh:
这个货柜中装有“目标证据：异常现象”这份文件，它是用来作为证明参训飞行员使用舰载扫描设备发现这个异常空间的实物证据。要完成第一项教程任务必须要获取这份文件。

如果你再找到这个货柜的时候发现它是空的，那么请等待片刻，一份新的文件会被重新生成在里面。
en:
This container houses the “Proof of Discovery: Anomalies” document, which serves as physical proof that a Capsuleer-in-training has been able to locate the anomaly through the use of On-Board Scanning. It must be retrieved to complete the first tutorial mission. 

If at first the container appears empty, please wait a few minutes for a new document to be provided.

zh: 这个货柜中装有“目标证据：气云”文件，它是用来证明受训飞行员使用核心扫描探针发现这个气云地点的实物证据。要完成气云地点教程任务必须要获取这份文件。如果你在找到这个货柜的时候发现它是空的，那么请等待片刻，一份新的文件会被重新生成在里面。
en:
This container houses the “Proof of Discovery: Gas” document, which serves as physical proof that a Capsuleer-in-training has been able to locate the Gas site through the use of Core Scanner Probes. It must be retrieved to complete the Gas training mission.  

If at first the container appears empty, please wait a few minutes for a new document to be provided.

zh: 这个货柜中装有“目标证据：采矿”文件，它是用来证明受训飞行员使用核心扫描探针发现这个采矿地点的实物证据。要完成采矿地点教程任务必须要获取这份文件。如果你在找到这个货柜的时候发现它是空的，那么请等待片刻，一份新的文件会被重新生成在里面。
en:
This container houses the “Proof of Discovery: Ore” document, which serves as physical proof that a Capsuleer-in-training has been able to locate the site through the use of Core Scanner Probes. It must be retrieved to complete the Ore site training mission. 

If at first the container appears empty, please wait a few minutes for a new document to be provided.

zh:
这个货柜必须要使用民用打捞设备才能够被打开。一旦对它所进行的打捞作业成功，那么这个货柜就会自动解锁。在这个货柜里面储藏有一份“目标证据：磁力”文件。

如果你再找到这个货柜的时候发现它是空的，那么请等待片刻，一份新的文件会被重新生成在里面。
en:
This container must be accessed using a Civilian Salvager. As soon as a successful salvage attempt is detected, it will unlock. Inside, the “Proof of Discovery: Magnetometric” document can be retrieved.

If at first the container appears empty, please wait a few minutes for a new document to be provided.

zh: 这个货柜必须要使用民用数据分析仪才能打开。一旦尝试成功，它就会自动解锁。货柜里有一份“目标证据：数据”文件。如果你在找到这个货柜的时候发现它是空的，那么请等待片刻，一份新的文件会被重新生成在里面。
en:
This container must be accessed using a Civilian Data Analyzer. As soon as a successful hacking attempt is detected, it will unlock. Inside, the “Proof of Discovery: Data” document can be retrieved.

If at first the container appears empty, please wait a few minutes for a new document to be provided.

zh: 这个货柜必须要使用民用遗迹分析仪才能打开。一旦尝试成功，它就会自动解锁。货柜里有一份“目标证据：遗迹”文件。如果你在找到这个货柜的时候发现它是空的，那么请等待片刻，一份新的文件会被重新生成在里面。
en:
This container must be accessed using a Civilian Relic Analyzer. As soon as a successful attempt is detected, it will unlock. Inside, the “Proof of Discovery: Relic” document can be retrieved.

If at first the container appears empty, please wait a few minutes for a new document to be provided.

zh: 这个货柜是姐妹会用来接收和存放朱庇特DNA链的。
en: This container is accepting and storing Jovian DNA Strands on behalf of the Sisters of EVE.

zh: 这个货柜用来存放各种资源。
en: This container is used to store resources of all kinds.

zh: 这个货柜箱里装满了海盗带来的所有额外补给。
en: This cargo container is filled with all the extra supplies the pirates brought along with them.

zh: 这个货柜集装箱并不是很结实，无法在环境恶劣的太空中长时间保存。
en: This cargo container is flimsily constructed and will not survive the rigors of space for long.

zh: 这个货柜集装箱里装着机库弹射出来的物品。比其它集装箱更持久，如果没人拾取物品，它会在几天后才消失。
en: This cargo container holds the ejected contents of a hangar. While it is more durable than other containers it will burn up within a few days if not collected.

zh: 这个通信中心由电子安全系统锁定保护。你需要数据分析仪才能打开它。
en: This communications hub is locked with an electronic security system. You will need a Data Analyzer to open it.

zh: 这个阵列能为那些处于控制炮塔护盾范围外的建筑物投射一个有密码保护的力场。
en: This array projects a password-protected force field around structures outside the range of a control tower's shields.

zh: 这个飞船可以增加飞船装甲的最大值。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase a ship's total armor hit points.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以减小导弹爆炸的信号半径。
en: This ship modification is designed to decrease the signature radius factor for missile explosions.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以减少护盾回充增量设备的循环周期。
en: This ship modification is designed to reduce the activation time of shield boosters.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以减少护盾回充增量设备的电容消耗。
en: This ship modification is designed to reduce the capacitor need of shield boosters.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以减少装甲维修装备的电容需求。
en: This ship modification is designed to reduce the capacitor need for a ship's armor repairers.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以增加导弹最大飞行时间。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase maximum missile flight time.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以增加护盾回充增量设备的效能。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase the efficiency of a ship's shield boosters.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以增加无人机的射击速度。
en: This ship modification is designed to enhance drone firing speed.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以增加舰船的最大速度。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase ship's max velocity.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以增加舰船的机动性。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase ship's maneuverability.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以增加舰船的货柜容量。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase a ship's cargo capacity.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以增加舰船跃迁强度。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase a ship's warp stability.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以增加装甲维修器的维修量。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase the repair amount of a ship's armor repairers.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以增加锁定速度。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase ship's scan resolution.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以增加飞船护盾的动能抗性。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase the kinetic resistance of a ship's shield.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以增加飞船护盾的容量。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase shield hitpoints.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以增加飞船护盾的热能抗性。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase the thermal resistance of a ship's shield.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以增加飞船护盾的爆炸抗性。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase the blast resistance of a ship's shield.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以增加飞船护盾的电磁抗性。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase the EM resistance of a ship's shield.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以增加飞船结构值。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase a ship's structure hit points.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以增加飞船结构的动能抗性。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase a ship's structure kinetic resistance.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以增加飞船结构的热能抗性。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase a ship's structure thermal resistance.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以增加飞船结构的爆炸抗性。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase a ship's structure explosive resistance.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以增加飞船结构的电磁抗性。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase a ship's structure EM resistance.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以增加飞船装甲的动能抗性。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase the kinetic resistance of a ship's armor.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以增加飞船装甲的热能抗性。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase the thermal resistance of a ship's armor.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以增加飞船装甲的爆炸抗性。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase the explosive resistance of a ship's armor.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以增加飞船装甲的电磁抗性。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase the EM resistance of a ship's armor.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以增大无人机的最佳射程。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase a ship's drone optimal range.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以增大舰船对无人机的控制范围。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase a ship's drone control range.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以提升采矿器单次运转的采矿量。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase the mining yield of a ship's miner.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以提高发射器的发射速度。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase a ship's missile launchers' rate of fire.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以提高导弹伤害。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase missile damage.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以提高无人机的伤害。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase a ship's sentry drone damage.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以提高采矿器的工作距离。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase the mining range of a ship's miner.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以提高飞船的跃迁速度。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase ship's warp speed.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以缩减飞船装甲维修器的运转周期。
en: This ship modification is designed to reduce the cycle duration of a ship's armor repairers.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以降低目标舰船高速逃离导弹爆炸半径的效果。
en: This ship modification is designed to decrease the effect of a target's velocity in avoiding the radius of missile explosions.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以降低采矿器单次循环的耗时，加快效率。
en: This ship modification is designed to reduce the activation time of a ship's miner to mine faster.

zh: 这个飞船改装件可以降低采矿器单次运转的电容需求。
en: This ship modification is designed to reduce the activation cost of a ship's miner.

zh: 这个飞船改装件用于增加舰船扫描探针的扫描强度。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase a ship's scan probe strength.

zh: 这个飞船改装件用于增加舰船电容器的回充速度。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase a ship's capacitor recharge rate.

zh: 这个飞船改装件用于增加船只的能量栅格容量。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase a ship's powergrid capacity.

zh: 这个飞船改装件用于来增加舰船的电容器电容量。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase a ship's capacitor capacity.

zh: 这个飞船改装件用于降低舰船遗迹分析装备的误差。
en: This ship modification is designed to increase the efficiency of a ship's relic modules.

zh: 这个高技术的集装箱是老式无人机感应器的储藏库。
en: This high-tech container is a storage for old drone sensors.

zh: 这么快就搞定了？噢，我还以为可以等我舒舒服服的吃个饭，然后再到人造沙滩上躺一会儿。
en: Done already? I thought I had time for a leisurely meal and a quick sunbathe on the artificial beach...
There's way too many of them!

zh: 这事儿就交给你办了，请务必把这些败类消灭干净。
en: I'll leave this to you. Make sure those scum are eliminated.

zh: 这些一次性使用的注射器内置有预先计算好计量的自适应性疫苗，可以用于对抗几乎所有已知的病毒。
en: These single-use syringes contain a predetermined dose of adaptive vaccines designed to counteract almost any known virus.

zh: 这些东西确实体积不小，你去换一艘更大的船吧。
en: These things are pretty big. You'd better go switch to a bigger ship.

zh: 这些为即时分析战术和环境数据而造的平台经常散布在隐匿空间复合体周围。
en: Built for up-to-the-minute analysis of tactical and environmental data, these pads can be found dotted around many a deadspace complex.

zh: 这些冬眠者包体的残余碎片倾诉着宇宙的残酷无情。
en: The remnants of this Sleeper Enclave are a stark reminder of the harshness of space.

zh: 这些哨站的建造目的是为了实时分析战术及环境数据，它们经常散布在隐匿空间复合体周围。
en: Built for up-to-the-minute analysis of tactical and environmental data, these outposts can be found dotted around many a deadspace complex.

zh: 这些基本元件存在于所有机械硬件设备中，形状各异，大小不一，不过现在的市场上还是模块化的部件更具竞争优势。工厂和制造商将这些部件拿来组装为成品，然后再在市场出售。
en: These basic elements of all mechanical hardware can come in virtually any shape and size, although composite or modular functionality is highly advantageous in today's competitive market. Factories and manufacturers take these parts and assemble them into finished products, which are then sold on the market.

zh: 这些多功能建筑都配备了各种科学观察和娱乐设施，虽然其规模还达不到空间站的标准，但对游客和专业人士来说仍然极具使用价值。
en: Equally equipped for scientific observation and entertainment of all sorts, these multi-purpose structures, while not quite big enough to be classified as stations, nonetheless see quite a bit of use by both tourists and professionals.

zh: 这些大型的空间设施用来储藏从粮食到军备的各种物资。
en: These huge spacebound facilities are used to stock anything from ammunitions to agricultural supplies.

zh: 这些小型的建筑内可以安置上百个办公室职员，通常被大型集团用做在搬迁时侯的廉价临时办公场所。
en: These small compounds can house hundreds of office workers, and are typically used as a cost-efficient temporary solution for large corporations moving their workforce between stations.

zh:
这些小方块是很多简单结构建筑的组成单元，它们可以用于建造基本的护墙、门等等，也可以用于修建整座住宅，甚至是一片工业办公区。当把足够的灵巧单元建筑模块放在一起后，再对它们输入同样的程序指令，它们就能够自动地组合在一起构成所要建造的建筑的不同部分，然后再自动固化。只要配合详细的蓝图，它们几乎可以构成任何复杂的结构。

可以从下列类型的行星开采获得：
熔岩行星
温和行星
en:
These tiny cubes form the building blocks of many simple structures, from basic walls and doors to entire homes and even industrial office spaces. Whenever a sufficient number of Smartfab Units are placed together and have been programmed with the same instructions, they will automatically combine to form some portion of that object and then become inert in their new form. With adequately detailed blueprints, there is theoretically no limit to the complexity of object or structure these clever devices can create.

Can be obtained by mining the following types of planets:
Lava Planet
Temperate Planet

zh: 这些层出不穷的苍蝇真是令人头疼，希望你能帮我们把这事儿办好。
en: This relentless swarm of flies is really giving me headaches. I hope you can help us solve this.

zh: 这些居所有为小行星采矿准备的办公室和加工设施。
en: These habitats house offices and processing utilities for the asteroid mining facility.

zh: 这些岩石块和钢梁似乎已被人工智能生命体占据。
en: This block of rock and girders seems to be infested with independant artificial life.

zh: 这些庞然大物天生就有很高的攻击承受力，每个能装载大约850万立方米的材料。
en: Built to withstand assault, these behemoths can each hold roughly 8.5 million m³ worth of materials.

zh: 这些建筑内是血袭者的培育场，专门培育供恐怖的血袭者仪式使用的活人、身体器官和人血。
en: Inside these structures are breeding grounds for humans, body parts and human blood used in sinister Blood Raider rituals.

zh: 这些毁坏的废墟上高雅装饰表明，它可能曾经是座极其重要的仪式寺庙。
en: The elegant decorations on these broken ruins indicate that it may once have been a ceremonial temple of high importance.

zh: 这些水实在是重要至极！天！飞行员先生您总算到了！
en: This water is of utmost importance! Thank heavens, Mr. Capsuleer, you're finally here!

zh: 这些烦人的活实在是不是和交给我这样的老年人来处理了。
en: I'm really too old for tedious tasks like this.

zh: 这些物品只有{match_count}个可以立即交易
en: Only {match_count} of these items are available for trading

zh: 这些物品可以立即交易并获得货款
en: These items can be traded immediately in return for payment

zh: 这些狡猾的海盗，毫无身为加达里人的自尊！请代合众国铲除这些害虫！
en: Those treacherous pirates are a disgrace to the Caldari! Please purge these pests for the good of the State!

zh: 这些疯狂的买家，买的东西连一艘太空飞船都装不下，唉……
en: These crazy buyers. They've already filled a whole ship yet they keep buying more. Argh...

zh: 这些矿石暂时不能给你
en: We can't give you these ores just yet

zh: 这些破旧的走私门由米玛塔尔叛军和许多海盗组织联合建造，提供了在太空外部区域之间快速隐秘穿行的手段。喜爱这些走私门的人通常都无法抵挡帝国空间的诱惑，但又想避免撞上统合部里高度警惕的舰队指挥官员。
en: The old smuggling route gates were built by a coalition of Minmatar rebels and various pirate factions as a means to travel quickly and discreetly between the outer regions of space. They are favored by many to whom Empire Space is too high-profile and wish to keep a good distance from the vigilant fleet commanders of CONCORD.

zh: 这些聒噪的苍蝇，总是拍了一个又冒出来一个。
en: These noisy flies just keep on appearing.

zh: 这些能源阵列能够提供非常可观的补充能源，让母星能装配更多的外部建筑。
en: These arrays provide considerable added power output, allowing for an increased number of deployable structures in the starbase's field of operation.

zh: 这些药是治愈葳砣柯的药物！

en: Can these drugs really control the plague?

zh: 这些药非常珍贵，没有人知道怎么制造，各部落只保存着少量存货。
en: These medicines are rare. No one knows how to make them, each tribe only keeps a small stock.

zh: 这些该死的盖伦特人，飞行员，请帮我消灭他们。
en: These damn Gallenteans. Capsuleer, please help me destroy them.

zh: 这些遗物会暂时存放在空间站里，你准备好了以后自己取走吧。
en: These relics will be temporarily stored in the station. Come pick them up when you're ready.

zh: 这些面目可憎的异教徒，不论处决多少都不解恨。
en: No matter how many of those vile heretics are executed, it would not make me any less angry.

zh: 这些飞行员都是做买卖的高手，腰缠万贯，掌握着新伊甸运行的命脉。如果你希望坐上带皮革的老板椅，左手拿雪茄右手点钞票的话，就加入这个行业吧。
en: These pilots are masters of trade who keep the lifeblood of New Eden's economy flowing with their immense wealth. Join this profession if you like the idea of sitting in a leather executive chair and counting bills while smoking a cigar.

zh: 这以前是威风凛凛的战列舰，很显然岁月没有对它很客气——它原有的外观现在已经完全无法辨认了。
en: This used to be a battleship of some description, although time has clearly not been kind to it - its original form is now completely unidentifiable.

zh: 这件事情必须引起重视，并进行更加深入的调查。
en: This matter must be taken seriously. We have to conduct further investigation.

zh: 这份基因样本根本无法从中得到任何和女皇有关的内容。
en: I can't get anything from this gene sample about the Empress.

zh: 这具撕裂的残骸静静地漂浮在太空中，周围散布着大片烧焦的碎片。
en: The mangled wreck floats motionless in space, surrounded with a field of scorched debris.

zh: 这具身体看来质量不错，但愿别太快报废。走起，开工！
en: New body looks great! Let's hope it doesn't get wasted any time soon. Alright, let's get to work!

zh: 这具遇难舰船的货柜无声地漂浮在星辰之间，你的感应器侦测到里面有东西在滚动。
en: The wrecked container drifts silently amongst the stars, your sensors pick up signs of something rolling within it.

zh: 这具遇难船只的货柜无声地漂浮在星辰之间，丝毫不向人们透露其中可能隐藏了什么宝藏。
en: The wrecked container drifts silently amongst the stars, giving no hint to what treasures it may hide.

zh: 这具遇难飞船的货柜在群星间静静地漂浮。
en: The wrecked container drifts silently amongst the stars.

zh: 这只是普通的可食用香料，事实上，克隆舱营养液也是用这个东西配的。
en: These are just ordinary edible spices. You know, the nutrient solution in the clone vat bay is also made from these.

zh: 这只逃生舱已经损坏，丧失了操控能力和跃迁能力。
en: This Escape Pod has been damaged and has lost its ability to maneuver, as well as its warp capability.

zh: 这可不是小事，我得赶快向上面汇报。
en: This is no trivial matter. I need to report this quickly.

zh: 这可是件麻烦事，我的朋友。鬼知道古斯塔斯里有多少曾经的加达里军人。
en: This is quite a problem, my friend. God knows how many former Caldari soldiers are now part of the Guristas Pirates.

zh: 这可能以前是一个引擎上的重要部件，但要是没有分析仪的那也拿它没办法。
en: This might once have been an important piece of an engine, but now you're not getting anything out of it without the help of an analyzer.

zh: 这可能是我职业生涯中见过最蠢的海盗了。
en: These are perhaps the dumbest pirates I've ever seen.

zh: 这块太空垃圾看上去原本是一个超大型舰船外部输电系统的一部分。
en: This space debris appears to have served as an external power conduit system on a gigantic vessel.

zh: 这块岩石是某次超新星爆炸或者小行星碰撞的碎片，就像一座行星山脉点缀着星空。
en: Fragments from an asteroid collision or a supernova, this rock formation decorates the starscape as a planetary mountain range.

zh: 这块巨大的岩石看上去被自由无人机占据了。
en: This massive hulk of rock appears to be infested with rogue drones.

zh: 这块巨大的物体是某个星际建筑的一部分，它萦绕着一种忧郁的氛围。
en: This enormous part of a stellar construct carries a melancholic atmosphere.

zh: 这块机械硬件已经超出了它的使用寿命，可以被回收了。很多空间站的维护部门通过回收这些没用的金属来重新制成新的金属板用于空间站的外壳维护。大多数空间站的管理层都认为这是一种节约成本的有效方法，而尽量不在这些上面花费功夫去开采和提炼。尽管如此，这些金属垃圾还是很难满足需求。
en: This mechanical hardware has obviously outlived its use, and is now ready to be recycled. Many station maintenance departments use the material gained from recycling these scraps to manufacture steel plates which replace worn out existing plates in the station hull. Most station managers consider this a cost-effective approach, rather than to send out a costly mining expedition for the ore, although these scraps rarely are enough to satisfy demand.

zh: 这块标牌似乎在一场早已忘却的冲突中被毁了。
en: This billboard seems to have been destroyed in some long forgotten skirmish.

zh: 这块残骸是一艘毒蝎级战列舰船体的下半部分。这块区域原本主要是用于装载舰船大部分的系统设备，所以因上面这些严重的开放性创伤所造成的人员损失应该不大。
en: This piece of wreckage is part of the lower hull of a Scorpion-class battleship. This area is mainly given over to ship systems, so loss of life resulting from the multiple hull breaches should have been comparatively minimal

zh: 这块残骸是乌鸦级战列舰的机翼部分，被连根从舰体上拔了出来，谁也不知道它原本所属于的舰船的剩余部分都到哪儿去了。
en: This piece of wreckage is the starboard wing of a Raven-class battleship, sheared off at the root. Where the rest of the ship ended up is anyone's guess.

zh: 这块漂浮在太空中的残片看起来有点意思，但需要分析设备才能探究其中的秘密。
en: This piece of floating debris looks intriguing, but requires analyzing equipment before it yields any of its secrets.

zh: 这块漂浮在太空中的残片看起来有点意思，但需要遗迹分析设备才能探究其中的秘密。
en: This piece of floating debris looks intriguing, but requires relic analyzing equipment before it yields any of its secrets.

zh: 这块漂浮在太空中的残骸看起来有点意思，但需要分析设备才能探究其中的秘密。
en: This piece of floating remains look intriguing, but requires analyzing equipment before it yields any of its secrets.

zh: 这块漂浮在太空中的碎片看上去应该是属于某个外层船体或者装甲板的，被整块从原来的位置上撕裂下来，而且还经历了剧烈的爆炸或者陨石撞击。
en: This floating debris appears to have once been a part of an outer hull or armor, ripped apart by an explosion or asteroid impact.

zh: 这块漂浮在太空中的碎片看起来有点意思，但需要分析设备才能探究其中的秘密。
en: This piece of floating rubble looks intriguing, but requires analyzing equipment before it yields any of its secrets.

zh: 这块漂浮的碎片对懂行的人来说也许会有些价值。
en: This Floating piece of debris looks like it might be of some value to the right person

zh: 这块漂浮的碎片看起来令人迷惑，需要使用分析设备来提取中间可能隐藏的秘密。
en: This piece of floating rubble looks intriguing, but requires analyzing equipment before it yields any of its secrets.

zh: 这块船壳上还有一个无障碍的数据库接入点。你可以尝试使用你的数据分析仪找出其中有用的信息。
en: This hull plate still has an unobstructed access point for the databank it holds. You may be able to extract something with your Data Analyzer.

zh: 这块飘浮的残片也许会对懂行的人有些价值。详尽的分析可能会揭示更多信息。
en: This floating piece of debris looks like it might be of some value to the right person. Detailed analysis might reveal more.

zh: 这堆故障重重的霓虹和金属曾令其母公司感到骄傲和喜悦，但它们现在不过象征了资本主义的衰败。
en: Once the pride and joy of its parent corporation, this broken-down heap of neon and metal is now no more than a symbolic manifestation of capitalistic decline.

zh: 这对女皇的安全是一个重大的威胁，希望你能帮助我们进行调查。
en: This is a major threat to the Empress's safety, I hope you can help us investigate it.

zh: 这将是一个绝佳的营救机会，救出船上的米玛塔尔同胞。
en: This will be a great opportunity to save our Minmatar brothers on the ship.

zh: 这就是为什么我最讨厌和这种人打交道，一旦磕上药就对危险毫无知觉。
en: That's why these people are the ones I most hate dealing with. Once they became addicted they can't sense the dangers anymore.

zh: 这就是你在{6|system_name:_tr}举办太空演唱会时留下的箱子。
en: This is the box you left when you hosted the space concert at {6|system_name:_tr}.

zh: 这帮移民滞留有一段时间了，老兄，你来带走他们真是太好了。
en: These immigrants have been stranded for quite some time, man. It's great that you're here to take them away.

zh: 这帮粉丝出手真是越来越大方了。
en: These fans are getting more and more generous.

zh: 这帮警察是来送死的吗？
en: Do these cops have a death wish?

zh: 这座不起眼的防护哨站正在等待安检，然后才能投入使用。
en: This inconspicuous guard post is awaiting security clearance before taking any action.

zh: 这座人类农场是用来养人的。
en: The human farm is for farming humans.

zh: 这座令人叹服的建筑是某高阶神职人员的宝座和殿堂，同时也是一个宗教活动场所。
en: This impressive structure operates as a place for religious practice and the throne of a high ranking member within the clergy.

zh: 这座加达里式的控制塔最初由卡拉吉塔集团设计，但其蓝图很快被古斯塔斯安插在合众国内的特工窃取，如今已被古斯塔斯挪为己用。
en: Originally designed by the Kaalakiota, the Caldari Control Tower blueprint was quickly obtained by the Guristas, through their agents within the State, to serve their own needs.

zh: 这座可怕的建筑实在是建筑界的瑰宝。
en: This terrifying structure is really a jewel of architecture.

zh: 这座哨站内部有个居住核心层，其外环绕着一种填充了用途不明的古怪液体的外壳，该哨站可能是某个无名“忠实劳工”工程师的创造物。
en: Containing an inner habitation core surrounded by an outer shell filled with a curious fluid, the purpose of which remains unclear, this outpost is no doubt the brain-child of some nameless True Slave engineer.

zh: 这座哨站由埃拉克兰大人的随从建造。
en: This outpost was constructed by Lord Arachnan's henchmen.

zh: 这座哨站由梅多尔斯大人的随从建造。
en: This outpost was constructed by Lord Methros' henchmen.

zh: 这座塔洛迦干扰塔楼是塔洛迦最神秘的建筑。它虽然是塔洛迦空间站的一部分，但从其连接设备及推进系统来看，更像已经准备好要脱离这空间站了。但仔细一看，又不像是武器。与其说这塔楼是座防御炮台，不如说它是个机械设施。不管怎么说，这座干扰塔楼都是个让人不安的塔洛迦遗物。
en: The Talocan disruption tower is the most mysterious of the Talocan structures. Although certainly a part of the Talocan station, its hinges and propulsion systems imply ready removal from stations, but the peaks and points are unlike any current weapon grouping or turret structure. The tower appears as more of a mechanical syringe than a defense turret, but that may be just speculation. Regardless of the theories, the disruption tower is an unsettling relic of the Talocans.

zh: 这座塔洛迦建筑物看上去和现在的加速轨道有几分神似。塔洛迦传说的守护着常常谈论到有关塔洛迦人对宇宙航行学科技的深入掌握。这座门或许能提供给我们一些信息，来窥视这个古老种族的魅力。
en: This standing structure shares many similar aspects with modern acceleration gates. Whispers among Talocan lore-keepers tell of the Talocan's firm grasp of astronautical engineering, and this gate may offer some insight into this ancient race's knowledge.

zh: 这座塔洛迦空间站的中心就是这座极地之星，是整个建筑群的神经中枢和心脏所在。它已经残破不堪不再能够发挥作用，外壳也发生了多出的破裂，推进器和迷你发电站已经完全被摧毁。从推进喷嘴周围的灼烧痕迹可以看出，这座极地之星已经被弹射过好几次，这种做法在一个经常迁徙的文明中是常见的。
en: The central piece of this Talocan station is the Polestar, the nerve center of the complex and the heart of Talocan survival. Though dilapidated and unusable, the Polestar's outer hull holds many propulsion jets and mini-generators, implying its use as a self-sufficient structure with independent capabilities. From the burn marks around the propulsion thrusters, this Polestar has been jettisoned many times as a necessary structure for a migrant culture.

zh: 这座塔状的建筑物拥有普通储藏库的各种设置：巨大的仓库、储藏区、厚厚的外壁及复杂的通风系统等等。根据对它的扫描结果可以看出，无论之前这座仓库装过什么东西，现在它已经空无一物。内部的残留物都是现今世界所不知的物质，甚至连生物残留的遗传信息都难以理解。不管它装的是什么，这座建筑的存在实在让人感到诡异。
en: This towering structure contains all the basic elements of a regular silo: cavernous storage areas, thick walls, extensive ventilation, etc. Based on the scans of this silo, however, the silo's previous contents are unknown. The residue from inside reveals nothing known in modern times, or even odd genetic combinations. Whatever its contents, the silo emits an unfamiliar – and uneasy – presence.

zh: 这座塔行使着网络中继站的职能。技术到位的人有可能会从其主机中“解放”出一些有趣的信息。
en: This Tower acts as a Network relay. It might be possible for the right person to "liberate" some interestin information from its mainframe

zh: 这座天使空间站已经过改装，装配了巨大的超大型鱼雷炮塔和远距离停滞光束发生器。
en: This Angel Station has been refitted with huge XL torpedo batteries and a long range stasis web generators.

zh: 这座天蛇战役空间站拥有多个强大的防御系统。
en: This Serpentis Battlestation has several formidable defensive systems. Although used to store small quantities of their drugs, it is also able to detect and attack hostile forces.

zh: 这座导弹岗哨将向对其视为威胁的目标发射导弹。
en: This missile Sentry will Launch missiles at any target it considers to be a threat.

zh: 这座小型军械库有一层厚厚的强化三钛合金装甲以及特制的护盾装备用以抵抗外来攻击。
en: This small armory has a thick layer of reinforced tritanium and a customized shield module for deflecting incoming fire.

zh: 这座岗哨塔将对其视为威胁的目标进行电容核心干扰。
en: This sentry tower will disrupt the capacitor core of any target it considers to be a threat.

zh: 这座巡航导弹岗哨将向其视为威胁的目标发射导弹。
en: This cruise missile sentry will Launch missiles at any target it considers to be a threat.

zh: 这座工业设施是储藏仓库的平台并用来分类各种货柜。
en: This industrial structure serves as a platform for warehouses and the sorting of cargo containers.

zh: 这座巨型建筑运用了电磁导体来采集恒星能源。
en: This gigantic construction uses electromagnetic conductors to harvest solar power from the system's sun.

zh: 这座巨型设施由天蛇建造，用于处理联邦/合众国边境的造假和其他走私相关事务，比如将非法货物再包装以降低其可疑性。
en: This huge installation was constructed by the Serpentis to take care of forgery and other smuggler related things for the Federation/Republic border, such as repackaging illegal goods to look more innocent.

zh: 这座巨大的射电望远镜里装有脆弱却非常先进的传感设备。
en: This huge telescope contains fragile but advanced sensory equipment.

zh: 这座巨大的射电望远镜里装有脆弱却非常先进的传感设备。其扫描范围很大，能以极快速地侦察到星系里几乎任何移动的物体。鉴于它在战斗中体现出的优势，大多数政府明令禁止非国家军队的人使用这种东西。
en: This huge telescope contains fragile but advanced sensory equipment.  Its scanning range is huge, and it is able to detect almost any moving object in the solar system it's deployed in at an astoundingly fast rate.  Due to the advantage it gives in combat, use of this prototype outside national militaries has been banned by most governments.

zh: 这座巨大的移动空间站彰显了萨沙卓越的工程技术，其上层住满了天才型的机械师与设计巨匠。该空间站在加强状态下几乎坚不可摧。它对萨沙的军事研究人员与技术人员来说是座理想的避风港。
en: This enormous mobile station stands as an example of the engineering excellence found within Nation's endless ranks, the upper part of which is filled with mechanical geniuses and masters of design. Virtually indestructible in its hardened state, the station has very few weaknesses and serves frighteningly well in its role as a mobile safe haven for Nation's military researchers and technicians.

zh: 这座巨大的超建筑物是成千上万的自由无人机共同建造的。然而建筑似乎并未完成，它的最终形态对于人类这种主要由碳构成的生物而言是个谜。
en: This gigantic superstructure was built by the effort of thousands of rogue drones. While the structure appears to be incomplete, its intended shape remains a mystery to clueless carbon-based lifeforms.

zh: 这座巨大的超级建筑是古斯塔斯海盗集团的军事设施之一。虽然体积巨大，但它不提供商业性空间站服务，也没有接引客人的船坞。
en: This gigantic suprastructure is one of the military installations of the Guristas pirate corporation. Even for its size it has no commercial station services or docking bays to receive guests.

zh: 这座巨大的超级建筑是天使企业联合体的军事设施之一。虽然体积巨大，但它不提供商业性空间站服务，也没有接引客人的船坞。
en: This gigantic suprastructure is one of the military installations of the Angel Cartel. Even for its size, it has no commercial station services or docking bay to receive guests.

zh: 这座巨大的超级建筑是天使海盗集团的军事设施之一。虽然体积巨大，但它不提供商业性空间站服务，也没有接引客人的船坞。
en: This gigantic suprastructure is one of the military installations of the Angel pirate corporation. Even for its size, it has no commercial station services or docking bay to receive guests.

zh: 这座巨大的超级建筑是萨沙混沌国家的军事设施之一。众所周知，它能容纳大量萨沙飞船，但是还有奇怪的传言说，在其凹凸不平的外表之下，存在着比战争更为黑暗的东西。
en: This gigantic warstation is one of the military installations of Sansha's slumbering nation.  It is known to be able to hold a massive number of Sansha vessels, but strange whispers hint at darker things than mere warfare going on underneath its jagged exterior.

zh: 这座巨大的超级建筑是萨沙混沌国家的军事设施之一。众所周知，它能容纳大量萨沙飞船，而且还有奇怪的传言说，在其凹凸不平的外表之下，存在着比战争更为黑暗的东西。
en: This gigantic war station is one of the military installations of Sansha's slumbering nation.  It is known to be able to hold a massive number of Sansha vessels, but strange whispers hint at darker things than mere warfare going on underneath its jagged exterior.

zh: 这座巨大的超级建筑是血袭者海盗集团的军事设施之一。虽然体积巨大，但它不提供商业性空间站服务，也没有接引客人的船坞。
en: This gigantic suprastructure is one of the military installations of the Blood Raiders pirate corporation. Even for its size, it has no commercial station services or docking bay to receive guests.

zh: 这座巨大的通信塔装有脆弱却非常先进的感应设备，这类建筑物所具有的强大性能可以轻易处理来自邻近星系和星座的探测数据。
en: This huge Communication Tower contains fragile but advanced sensory equipment. A structure such as this has enormous capabilities in crunching survey data from nearby systems and constellations, as well as communicating over enormous distances.

zh: 这座巨大的通迅塔内安放了脆弱但非常先进的感应器设备。
en: This huge communications tower contains fragile but advanced sensory equipment.

zh: 这座建筑外观庄严宏伟，巨大的圆顶代表了古老冬眠者科技的强大力量。尽管已经历千年的岁月，内部数以万计的复杂电子系统依然可以同当代科技相媲美，甚至有一些还远远超越当代科技的技术。这座建筑独特的轮毂式设计表明它曾经可能是被用作为一座中心数据节点，是数字大都会的心脏所在。尽管它完整且处于运转状态，但内部唯一活着的只是电流和永不停息的数据交换。
en:
Imposing in its majesty, this giant dome stands as a testament to the technological might of the ancient Sleeper race. Even millennia old, the innumerable electronics systems within are still comparable to contemporary technology, in some cases even exceeding it. The distinctive hub-like design of this particular structure suggests that it operated as some kind of central data nexus, a shining capital amongst a digital metropolis.

Although entirely functional and intact, the only signs of life within are electrical currents and the eerily constant transfers of data.

zh: 这座建筑是血袭者安置巨大发电机的地方。
en: The building where the Blood Raiders are housing their immense power generator.

zh: 这座建筑曾有过风光的日子。
en: This structure has seen better days.

zh: 这座建筑能在有效范围内降低舰船受到的所有伤害。
en: This construction dampens all damage inflicted to ships within range.

zh: 这座建筑运用了电磁导体来采集恒星能源。
en: This construction uses electromagnetic conductors to harvest solar power from the system's sun.

zh: 这座建筑里面都是些研究人员、工程师以及秘书。它也同样武装到了牙齿，并装配了最尖端的军用反舰炮台。
en: This structure houses a full staff of research techs, engineers, and pencil pushers. It is also heavily armored and upgraded with the latest in military grade anti-spacecraft batteries.

zh: 这座控制塔负责协调并加强周围建筑的护盾防御。像周围许多其他设施一样，该控制塔曾归统合部所有。现在它落到了萨沙手里，没人知道萨沙会将它用于何种目的。统合部非常重视自主技术的保密工作。这些已被萨沙掌控的设施中毫无疑问藏有类似机密。当地的统合部指挥官按照命令负责协调克隆飞行员针对萨沙的反击行动。他们拿到了大笔由上面拨下来的资金，利用这些资金，他们就可以激励克隆飞行员去收复那些被抢占的工业设施。
en:
This control tower is responsible for coordinating and powering the shield defenses on nearby structures. Like many other neighboring facilities, the tower was once CONCORD property. Now it rests in the hands of Sansha pirates, who use it for their own unknown ends. CONCORD guards proprietary technologies fiercely; some valuable secrets of theirs are no doubt hidden inside these complexes, which are now under Sansha control. 

Local CONCORD commanders have been instructed to coordinate Capsuleer resistance against the Nation forces, and they have been granted hefty funds to help incentivize the recapture of lost industrial facilities.

zh: 这座无人机空间站拥有多个强大的防御系统。
en: This Drone station has several formidable defensive systems.

zh: 这座无人机空间站拥有多个强大的防御系统。它似乎遭到损坏，无法发挥全部效用。
en: This Drone station has several formidable defensive systems. It appears to be damaged and not functioning up to its full potential.

zh:
这座星城由理性思维社团建造，在新纪元119年初京诺瘟疫在全宇宙的一系列爆发事件之后作为研究该事件的研发中心。

学术界普遍认为它是新伊甸最大的研究设施，人类历史上众多顶尖科学家在它的实验室中从事项目研究。

新纪元119年4月这里举行了京诺瘟疫勘验活动，并见证了对京诺瘟疫这一史上最可怕且致命的病原体的治疗手段的成功研发。

若没有数以千计的克隆飞行员参与此次活动并对研发工作提供支持，这项突破可能永远没有成功的一天。

时至今日，它仍旧由理性思维社团管理，作为对那些被京诺瘟疫夺去生命的人们的纪念。它的研究实验室已被租给了全宇宙的生物科技公司使用。
en:
This Keepstar was constructed by the Society of Conscious Thought to act as a research and development center for the study of the Kyonoke Plague, after a series of outbreaks across the cluster during early YC119.

Widely considered by academics to be the single largest research installation in New Eden, its laboratories have hosted research projects from some of the most intelligent minds in human history.

In April YC119 it hosted the Kyonoke Inquest, which saw the successful research of a cure to the Kyonoke Plague, one of the most voracious and deadly pathogens in recorded history.

This breakthrough would not have been possible without the assistance of thousands of independent Capsuleers who attended the inquest in order to assist with research and development.

Today it remains under the administration of the Society and is maintained as a memorial to all those lost to Kyonoke, with its cutting edge research labs leased out to biotech corporations from across the cluster.

zh: 这座星门是根据共和国的设计建造而成。必须拥有正确的授权代码才能使用。
en: This stargate has been manufactured according to Republic design.  It is not usable without the proper authorization code.

zh: 这座星门是根据联邦的设计建造而成。必须拥有正确的授权代码才能使用。
en: This stargate has been manufactured according to Federation design.  It is not usable without the proper authorization code.

zh: 这座毁坏的星门还留下了数个内部发电机，但目前已经无法运作，不能将星际飞船送往遥远的星系。
en: This ruined stargate has at least a few internal power generators left but is nevertheless currently inoperational, unable to serve its intended function of hurling starships to distant solar systems.

zh:
这座毁坏的空间站看上去是它所在行星上的殖民地的协调中心，不过现在可能是远征席拉之梦破碎的最佳佐证了。席拉VIII已经在巨大的地震中支离破碎，殖民的设想也已变为不可能之事。  

这座空间站遭受了如此巨大的破坏，相信不会有什么人生还。空间站里有大片的储藏区域，存放了许多明显是从地质情况稳定的贫瘠或温和行星上采来的岩石样本。
en:
Perhaps the saddest testament to the shattered dreams of the expedition to Thera, this wrecked station seems to have been established as a coordinating center for the colonization of the planet it orbits. As Thera VIII is shattered and wracked by titanic quakes, such an effort would seem improbable unless the shattering happened relatively recently.  
While the damage to this station is extensive and very little survives, there are large storage areas containing bins of rock samples that apparently originated from a geologically stable barren or temperate planet.

zh: 这座研究空间站倾侧的外壳悬挂在太空中；在这座超建筑的无数裂口周围飘散着尸体，描绘了这里曾遭受到何等可怕的攻击。由于光与影的作用，有时可以瞥见一些动态的闪光，不过不可能有生物在这样一场毁灭性的打击中存活下来。
en:
This listing husk of a research station hangs in space; bodies litter the numerous breaches in the superstructure, illustrating what must have been a horrific attack.

Betrayed by the play of shadows and light, glimpses of activity can be observed, although no biological life could have possibly survived such devastation.

zh: 这座神殿安葬着一位在艾玛/艾玛达宗教中地位显赫的人物。
en: This shrine entombs someone of significant standing within the Amarr/Ammatar religion.

zh: 这座移动实验室的移动和定锚相对较容易，而且它还针对某些特性进行过特别的设计，因此在那些建设一座完备的静态设施困难重重的地方，许多海盗势力更喜欢使用这种移动实验室。这座特定的移动实验室正被用作一个化学研究实验室，只要略加破解，很可能会在其中找到些实验室主人的有用物品。
en:
This mobile laboratory can be moved and anchored with relative ease, and also tailored towards certain specialties which has led many pirate factions using them in places where creating a fully fledged static facility would be a massive liability.

This particular one is being used a chemical research laboratory and is liable to contain some useful items for the entrepreneur after a small amount of hacking.

zh: 这座移动矿石精炼厂运用的技术与标准的精炼厂很相似。在其中放置爆炸性的物体可以摧毁它。
en: This mobile ore refinery works in much the same way as standard Capsuleer-issue technology. It should be possible to sabotage by placing volatile materials inside.

zh: 这座空间站明显是为了研究附近的塔洛迦科技而建立的，现在已经被巨大的冲击破坏，很有可能是被旁边毁坏的行星上喷射出的物质击中了。奇怪的是，附近的塔洛迦静态星门阵列仍保持完好，可能在某种程度上还能运作。
en: Apparently set up to study nearby Talocan technology, this station has been buckled and broken by numerous impacts, possibly from material thrown up from the devastated planet below. The array of Talocan static gates nearby is eerily intact and seems to be functional to some degree.

zh: 这座空间站是两座守卫基地之一，进入隐匿空间复合体的来往船只在这里被严密监视。
en: This station is one of two guard bases where access to the SCCCCCS deadspace complex is monitored.

zh:
这座空间站还有大部分保持完整，应该是和它旁边的建筑一样因为行星的遮挡而少受了很多冲击。这个星系中的天体环绕机制已被破坏，所以上面的猜想无从证实，但是席拉III如此靠近主星，而这空间站的主体又得以保存，的确发人深思。有些人提出了更大胆的理论，与附近的塔洛迦科技有关。

这座空间站看上去是用来储存从这星系中采集到的材料与标本的。现在已经没剩下什么了，大量的放射性富勒烯气云从那些破碎的储藏舰船中飘散出来。
en:
Wrecked and battered, though largely intact, this station and its neighbor must originally have been sheltered in the lee of the planet to some extent. Disruption of orbital mechanics in this system make it difficult to be sure but the proximity of Thera III to the central star and the survival of recognizable station ruins requires an explanation of this kind. Some have suggested wilder theories concerning the nearby Talocan technology.
The station itself seems to have functioned as a vast storehouse of materials and specimens gathered from the core of the system. Not much remains and large quantities of radioactive fullerene gas seem to have bled from the ruptured storage vessels.

zh: 这座空间站遭受过毁灭性的破坏，它之前显然是避难会远征席拉的一处指挥哨站。它被等离子体、气云和尘埃包裹着，虽然没有被完全毁坏，受损程度也相当惊人，内部空间也被火焰和爆炸掀了个底朝天。
en: Scarred and scorched by devastating forces, this wrecked station apparently served as the command post for the Sanctuary expedition to Thera. Wreathed in clouds of plasma, gas and dust, the station's destruction, while not absolute, is profound and the interior has been gutted by fire and explosions.

zh:
这座纪念碑旨在缅怀于49-U6U大会战中英勇献身的84位泰坦驾驶员。它由新伊甸中的一个非官方矿工组织构思并出资建造。
