zh: 这座纪念碑是为了纪念马克思·杨以及其他英勇无畏地探索未知世界的探险家们。
en: This is a monument to Marcus Yeon and all other intrepid explorers who put their lives (and, more often than not, the lives of everyone in the neighboring vicinity) on the line for the glory of exploring the unknown.

zh: 这座统合部工厂已由忠实制造与萨沙的人接管。它的MTAC船体产量很稳定，这种船体能进行各种改造。虽然每个帝国都各有一套生产工业舰的方法，但出自统合部工厂的船才是公认最好的。
en: This CONCORD factory has been commandeered by True Creations members and other members of Sansha's Nation. It is capable of producing a steady supply of basic MTAC chassis, which can then be modified in various ways. Each empire has its own methods of manufacturing these hulking industrial colossi, but CONCORD factories are known for producing the best.

zh: 这座老鼠满地的监狱被严密的把守着。
en: This rat-infested prison is being closely guarded.

zh: 这座船坞可能是最近才被移到这里的。在这里，大型舰船的零部件被分门别类储藏在不同的仓库里，这些仓库突出到空间站外面，能够在需要使用的时候更容易取得。
en: This shipyard was probably moved here recently. For now, parts for large vessels are stored in easily accessible silos jutting from the station's surface.

zh: 这座萨沙中枢堡垒外布满了电子设备和防御炮台，每天要协调并核对亿万字节的信息。它通常位于萨沙本地网络的中心，同时也是萨沙高级舰船装备的一个常规存放点。
en: Brimming with electronics and defensive batteries, the Sansha central bastion coordinates and collates hundreds of petabytes of Nation neural traffic daily. Frequently found at the heart of a Sansha local network, the bastion also serves as a common storage point for advanced Sansha starship modules.

zh: 这座血袭者哨站看上去似乎有一些惊人的东西……
en: This Blood Raider outpost looks as if it could hold some surprises...

zh: 这座血袭者空间站已经过改装，装配了巨大的超大型鱼雷炮台和远距离停滞光束发生器。
en: This Blood Raider station has been refitted with huge XL torpedo batteries and a long range stasis web generators.

zh: 这座设施有着红色的外表，这是莱登船业设施所具有的典型特征。
en: This facility bears the red color scheme particular to Roden Shipyards.

zh: 这座轻型导弹岗哨将向其视为威胁的目标发射导弹。
en: This Light missile Sentry will Launch missiles at any target it considers to be a threat.

zh: 这座重型导弹岗哨将向其视为威胁的目标发射导弹。
en: This heavy missile sentry will launch missiles at any target it considers to be a threat.

zh: 这怪兽真是大得离奇！只能拜托陆战队员们了！
en: The monster is much bigger than normal! We can only count on the marines!

zh: 这批军火是非常重要，弄丢了你可担不起责啊！
en: These munitions are very important. You can't afford to lose them!

zh: 这批旅客已经在空间站滞留了一天之久，我现在就把坐标发给你。
en: Travelers have been stranded in the station for a whole day. I'm sending you the coordinates now.

zh: 这批海盗的行为模式之前从未见过，所以资料并不完善。
en: We've never seen pirates act like this before, so the information is not perfect.

zh: 这批疫苗我还要再看看
en: I need to take another look at this batch of vaccines

zh: 这批药很珍贵，你可当心着点。
en: These medicine are very precious. Please be careful.

zh: 这批设备总算到了，请在此处卸货。
en: This batch of module is finally here. Please unload here.
We can't give you the equipment just yet

zh: 这批陆战队员个个能干，就委托你送到艾玛达了。
en: These marines are capable men. Please send them to Ammatar.

zh: 这批难民的身体状况不大乐观，需要立即将他们转移到医疗条件较好的{3|station_name:_tr}。
en: The health of these refugees is poor. They need to be transferred to {3|station_name:_tr} to get better medical treatment.

zh: 这批难民的身体状况很不好了，先生，救救他们！
en: The conditions of these refugees are not looking good, mister. Please save them!

zh: 这支共和国警察的精英部队就拜托你啦。
en: These elite Republic police officers are now under your care.

zh: 这是BH岗哨炮，它会杀了你的。
en: This is the BH Sentry Gun, it will kill you.

zh: 这是一个危险的工作，斯普尔（Spool），你很勇敢。
en: This is a dangerous job, Spool. You really are brave.

zh: 这是一个古老的数据晶体。只有那些精通解译古代信息中枢系统的人才有机会揭开它的秘密。
en: This is an old data crystal. Only those proficient in decyphering ancient information centrals stand a chance of unraveling its mysteries.

zh: 这是一个大型导弹供给仓库。
en: This is a supply storage for large missiles.

zh: 这是一个好机会，请务必赶在艾玛人之前把我们的同胞救出来。
en: This is our best chance, please rescue our people before the Amarr arrive.

zh:
这是一个小小的、不起眼的纪念花园，为了缅怀当代科学家米什卡拉·奥斯纳多特博士的功绩而设立。在一次超光速粒子轰击阵列的严重实验事故中，博士很可能失去了生命。不过有些人推断说，她并没有死，而是转移到别的地方去了，也可能是在反物质的轰击下彻底改变了量子形态。
这个纪念花园中种满了树木，用钨制的架子弯曲成优雅的形状，还有博士最喜欢的花——阿尔伏塔，这是一种小型寄生植物，开着精致的银色花朵，花瓣像皮毛一样柔软。在很多赛毕斯托部族中，这种花象征着梦想与回忆。而在这个花园中，恰恰充满着梦想与回忆的气息，与花的气质相得益彰。
en:
A small and humble memorial to the work of the late scientist Dr. Mishkala Osnirdottir, whose life was most likely lost when an experiment with the Tachyon Bombardment Array went horribly wrong. Others, however, theorize that she was not killed, but relocated, or in some way altered on a quantum level by the barrage of antimatter. 
The memorial gardens features great trees contorted into elegant shapes with tungsten scaffolds and the doctor's favourite bloom, Ulfurtar - a small parasitic plant with delicate silvery flowers, noted for the soft, almost furred quality of its petals. In many Sebiestor clans, the blossom is believed to symbolise both dreams and memories and the atmosphere of the gardens is rich with both for those that tend it still.

zh: 这是一个标准的储藏仓库。
en: This is a standard storage facility.

zh: 这是一个由高级人工智能控制的无人机制造设施。它会攻击任何其视为威胁的目标。
en: This drone manufacturing facility is controlled by a highly advanced AI.  It will attack anyone it perceives as a threat.

zh: 这是一个艾玛无人机地雷。
en: This is an Amarr drone mine.

zh: 这是一个高科技研究哨站。
en: This is a high tech research outpost.

zh: 这是一具空间站集装箱。它安装了由密码保护的安全锁装置和电脑化的存货审查系统。尽管空间站集装箱的构造与其他货物集装箱的构造很相似，但是由于空间站集装箱非常大，根本无法装载到飞船上，所以只能在空间站里用于储存和货物管理。
en: This is a Station Container. It is fitted with a password-protected security lock and computerized inventory auditing. Although the construction of a Station Container is much like that of other Cargo Containers a Station Container is far too big to fit in a ship's cargo hold and is only used for storage and inventory management at stations.

zh: 这是一则警告，让我们提防其他家族在暗中的行动。
en: This is a warning. We should beware the actions undertaken by the other families in secret.

zh: 这是一座冬眠者联动结构。
en: This is a Sleeper linkage structure

zh: 这是一座塔洛迦工程空间站。
en: This is a Talocan engineering station

zh: 这是一座由天使经营的维修部门，负责清理修理古老堡垒。
en: This is an Angel operated repair unit charged with cleaning and fixing the old citadel.

zh: 这是一座雄伟的档案建筑的残骸，里面存有数不尽的宝藏和信息。它倒在一片废墟中，向周围释放着有害物质。深藏于内部的档案管理机器应该能够弹出有用的东西，但是通过外部观察无法断定，所以你必须先激活它们。
en: These are the remains of a majestic Archive structure, containing untold riches and knowledge. It now lies in ruins, emitting dangerous materials into space around it. It is impossible to determine from the outside if anything of value remains, though the dormant Archive worker machines inside might be able to eject whatever is left. They will have to be activated first, though.

zh: 这是一架用来监测临近区域的射电望远镜。
en: This is a radio telescope used for scouting nearby territory

zh: 这是一种标准化、可按自身要求修改并且能发射飞船的建筑，其设计上就是要便于移动与部署。该建筑已被修改用于幼儿教育。
en: A standard, customizable, space-faring  structure designed to be easily moved and deployed.  This one has been configured for early childhood education.

zh: 这是一种高级隐形装置的原型，曾是克莱勒瑞实验室的最后几项科技突破之一。尽管它能够发挥作用，但还不是最终的成品，其中还有一些严重缺陷，最明显的就是：该装置在装配后会产生很强的感应器扰乱信号，而且只有飞船以最小速度航行时才可使用该装置。注意：使用两个或者多个隐形装置将会导致其作用抵消，因为不同步的光反射会造成相互干扰。
en: This advanced cloaking mechanism prototype was one of the last major technological breakthroughs to come out of Crielere Labs. Although it does work, it is not really a finished product and has some serious drawbacks, most notably the fact that the module creates high sensor disruption while fitted and cannot operate unless the ship is at minimum velocity. Note: Fitting two or more cloaking devices to a ship negates their use, as unsynchronized light deflection causes mutual interference.

zh: 这是一艘古斯塔斯战舰。它保护着古斯塔斯的产业，会主动攻击任何它认为可能造成威胁或者极易对付的飞船。
en: This is a Guristas combat ship. It is protecting the Guristas Pirates assets and may attack anyone it perceives as a threat, or someone it perceives as easy pickings.

zh: 这是一艘在战斗中毁灭的运输舰的残骸。
en: The remnants of a transport ship lost in battle.

zh: 这是一艘天使战舰。它保护着天使的产业，会主动攻击任何它认为可能造成威胁或者极易对付的飞船。
en: This is an Angel combat ship. It is protecting the Angel Cartel's assets and may attack anyone it perceives as a threat, or someone it perceives as easy pickings.

zh: 这是一艘天蛇战舰。它保护着天蛇的产业，会主动攻击任何它认为可能造成威胁或者极易对付的飞船。
en: This is a Serpentis combat ship. It is protecting Serpentis' assets and may attack anyone it perceives as a threat, or someone it perceives as easy pickings.

zh: 这是一艘早已被摧毁的舰船留下的逃生舱。
en: A life pod from a long since destroyed ship.

zh: 这是一艘最近失踪的科考船的残骸。
en: The remnants of a science ship lost recently.

zh: 这是一艘神使级泰坦的残骸，曾由ASCN联盟的CYVOK所有，后来在联盟战争中被BOB联盟摧毁。它标志着EVE世界中第一艘有人驾驶的泰坦的沉没。
en: These are the remnants of the Avatar-class titan piloted by CYVOK of Ascendant Frontier. It was destroyed by Band of Brothers in the war between the two alliances. The event marked the destruction of the first Capsuleer owned titan in existence.

zh: 这是一艘统合部战舰。它保护着统合部的产业，会主动攻击任何它认为可能造成威胁或者极易对付的飞船。
en: This is a CONCORD combat ship. It protects CONCORD's assets and may attack anyone it perceives as a threat, or someone it perceives as easy pickings.

zh: 这是一艘萨沙战舰。它保护着萨沙的产业，会主动攻击任何它认为可能造成威胁或者极易对付的飞船。
en: This is a Nation combat ship. It is protecting Nation's assets and may attack anyone it perceives as a threat, or someone it perceives as easy pickings.

zh: 这是一艘血袭者战舰。它保护着血袭者的产业，会主动攻击任何它认为可能造成威胁或者极易对付的飞船。
en: This is a Blood Raider combat ship. It protects the Blood Raider Covenant's assets and may attack anyone it perceives as a threat, or someone it perceives as easy pickings.

zh: 这是个被遗弃的能源耗尽的空间站炮塔，它曾经是这个复合体重要部分。而现在，这堆冰冷的金属静静地漂浮着，提醒人们虚空才是宇宙中唯一永恒不变的事物。
en: Forlorn hulk of a depleted station battery. Once a vital part of the complex, it now only serves to remind us that in space the only thing eternal is death.

zh: 这是发射核心扫描探针的发射器，用来扫描太空中的空间信号。
en: Launcher for Core Scanner Probes, which are used to scan down Cosmic Signatures in space.

zh: 这是在种植园工作的艾玛血统的工人们下班后居住的地方。这也是客人们停留的地方，无论他们是什么种族。
en: This is where the workers on the plantation which are of Amarrian descent reside while off-duty.  This is also where guests stay, regardless of race.

zh: 这是天使企业联合体存放计算机硬件的地方。
en: This is where the Angel Cartel stores its computer hardware.

zh: 这是天蛇集团在{2|system_name:_tr}内的一个小型据点。
en: This is a small Serpentis stronghold in {2|system_name:_tr}.

zh: 这是矿工和深度空间探索者使用的西顿工业居住模块的豪华型。里面挤满了勤劳的矿工。
en: This is a luxury version of the CreoDron Habitation Module for miners and deep space explorers. It is packed with hard working prospectors.

zh: 这是等离子室的遗址，过去用来储藏大量爆炸性物体。等离子室被毁坏，导致有毒物质流出到周围环境中。
en: These are the remains of a plasma chamber, used to store large quantities of volatile materials. The destruction of the chamber has released the hazardous materials into the surrounding space.

zh: 这曾经是由企业家卢沃·阿拉姆赞助的解密大赛的获胜者纪念碑。在这里昂然屹立了5年之后，新纪元113年，克隆飞行员由于无法忍受星际事务的现状而发动了一场叛乱，纪念碑在叛乱中被毁。现在，这个曾经的艺术杰作只剩下了一堆废墟，成为了“改变是宇宙唯一永恒不变的真理”这一事实的有力佐证。
en: This was once a memorial to the winners of a riddle contest sponsored by late entrepreneur Ruevo Aram. After standing proud for half a decade, it was destroyed in late YC113 by Capsuleers who were staging a mass uprising against an intolerable status quo of intergalactic affairs. Today, the ruins of this once-great work of art stand as a testament to the fact that change is the universe's only constant.

zh: 这极有可能是剩下的七大集团中的某一个在暗中指使。
en: It is highly probable that one of the remaining seven mega corporations is ordering them to do it in secret.

zh: 这枚电子勋章，请你转交给柯埃佐家族的人。
en: Could you please give this digital medal to a family member of Kor-Azor?

zh: 这栋建筑物内居住着扎塔科波斯血袭者流派的高级成员。
en: This structure houses the senior members of the Zatah corpus blood raider sect.

zh: 这栋建筑物通常只用作办公室和员工住处，但是宽敞的大厅与特别设备使其功能具有一定的灵活性。
en: This is a building dedicated to offices and staff quarters mostly, though spacious halls and special installments allow for some flexibility in function.

zh: 这样一个庞然大物般的飞船目前正在建造中。在准备测试飞行之前，还有一些细节需要处理。
en: This mighty behemoth of a ship is currently under construction.  Only the last few touches of polish remain before it is ready for test flight.

zh: 这样匪夷所思的事情已经发生好几次了——他们不要钱，就要酷菲。
en: Unbelievable things like this have happened several times – they don't want money, they only want Quafe.

zh: 这次的奖励你想要什么呢？是柠檬口味的酷菲呢？还是樱桃口味的酷菲呢？
en: What do you want in reward this time? Lemon-flavored Quafe? Or do you prefer the cherry flavor?

zh: 这次的恒星风暴辐射区域太广，这批电池可帮忙解决了不小问题。
en: Radiations from this star storm spread further than expected. These batteries saved us from a lot of trouble.

zh: 这次的目标是枢密院的一个新晋办事员。
en: This time the target is a new clerk in the Privy Council.

zh: 这次盖伦特联邦的军方走在了前面，在巨鸟级下水之后的第二天，就宣布了托勒克斯级拦截型的改造方案。
en: This time, it was the Gallente Federation's military who took the lead. Just one day after the Moa's maiden voyage, they announced the modification plans for the Thorax Type Interdictor.

zh: 这次袭击事件非常蹊跷，希望你能为我们提供一些调查上的帮助。
en: This incident seems really odd. I hope you can help us with the investigation.

zh: 这活儿挺适合你的，嗝，再联系啊！
en: You're made for this job! *Hic*, talk to you later!

zh: 这片漂浮在太空中的废墟看起来有点意思，但需要分析设备才能探究其中的秘密。
en: This piece of floating ruins looks intriguing, but requires analyzing equipment before it yields any of its secrets.

zh: 这看上去像一个来源不明的储藏装置。对其进行详细分析可能有助于进一步了解。
en: This look like a storage device of unknown origin. Detailed analysis might reveal more.

zh: 这看上去像是一只被蹂躏到极限的塔洛迦舰船。就这种破坏程度已经没有任何打捞的意义了。
en: This appears to be the much-mangled remains of a Talocan vessel. It's too damaged to recover anything useful from

zh: 这看上去就是一个由半个飞船改造过来的陆地居所。有几块面板上雕有装饰性的图案。有一系列大型长方形箱子中含有破损的电路板，这些电路板的一面上镶嵌着数排手指大小的晶体管；有些晶体管还完好无损，包含有一种雾状的气体物质。这个居所的某一部分看上去像是温室，其中含有几盘有机物质，不过在卫星的酸性环境与稀薄氮氩大气的双重作用下，已经石化。
en: This looks like little more than half a starship modified into ground-based living quarters. Several panels are inscribed with decorative symbols. A series of large rectangular cases contain corroded circuit boards with rows of finger-sized crystalline vials anchored to one face; some of the vials are still intact and contain a foggy gaseous substance. A section from what appears to have been a hydroponics lab contains trays of organic matter, fossilised from exposure to the moon's arid conditions and thin, nitrogen-argon atmosphere.

zh: 这看似一个起源不明的古代数据存储设备。详尽的分析可能会揭示更多信息。
en: This look like a ancient data storage device of unknown origin. Detailed analysis might reveal more

zh: 这真的太奇怪了，他们似乎在有意识地进行着什么，我们却无从判断。
en: This is really strange. It seems to me that they have a objection in their mind that we cannot figure out.

zh: 这种发射器专为拦截舰级飞船设计，可以生成一种球状跃迁扰断场，能迫使通行船只脱离跃迁状态。
en: This launcher is designed for Interdictors. It can create a warp disruption sphere that forces passing ships out of warp.

zh:
这种发射器专为拦截舰级飞船设计，可以生成一种球状跃迁扰断场，能迫使通行船只脱离跃迁状态。

每艘船只能装配一个。
en:
Built for use with interdictor-class vessels, this launcher produces a warp disruption sphere capable of pulling passing vessels out of warp.
Limited to one per ship.

zh: 这种合成织物不仅可以用来做衣物，也可以在气候恶劣的人员聚集地充当临时遮蔽物。
en: This synthetic fabric is used for clothing as well as makeshift shelters on hard-climate colonies.

zh: 这种哨站对通讯尝试没有任何反应，但是似乎定期维护，人员齐备。
en: This outpost does not respond to any communication attempts, however it appears to be actively maintained and staffed.

zh: 这种基地拥有一个停靠平台用来接收和处理大型集装箱出货。
en: This outpost has a docking pad designed to receive and process large shipments of cargo.

zh: 这种奇特的炼化，也只有天蛇集团那帮疯子才能做得出来吧……
en: Refining like this... I mean, who would do things like this except those Serpentis maniacs...

zh: 这种富勒烯-钪复合物是通过将一个单一的钪原子包覆在一个碳原子框架中做成的。钪这种灰白色元素曾经非常难以被发现。镶接有钪的导弹因其强大的装甲穿透能力而著称，唯一阻碍这种技术在军事武器工业领域得到大力发展的原因只是在于这种物质非常的稀有。
en: A fullerene-scandium compound made by encasing a single scandium atom in a cage of carbon atoms. Scandium is a grey-white element that has historically been incredibly hard to find. Scandium-tipped missiles were once valued for their armor-piercing qualities, which allowed them to wreck havoc deep inside starship hulls. The only thing holding the weapons industry back from these and other similar applications has been the low supply of the material.

zh: 这种富勒烯-锰复合物是通过将一个单一的锰原子包覆在一个碳原子框架中做成的。科学家原本预计将这种物质用于非应用科学的研究，但是他们发现松散包裹在富勒烯框架中的锰原子具有超强的爆炸潜能，很快这种物质就被用于武器制造的研究中。
en: A fullerene-plutonium compound made by encasing a single plutonium atom in a cage of carbon atoms. Scientists originally envisaged this compound as a useful substance for non-applied research, but when the huge explosive potential of loosely-packed plutonium atoms inside a rigid fullerene cage was discovered, what little material there was quickly disappeared into the research labs of weapons manufacturers.

zh: 这种富勒烯-镧复合物是通过将一个单一的镧原子包覆在一个碳原子框架中制作的。镧合金所具有的超高熔点使它成为铸造一些特殊部件的理想材料，这些部件长期遭受高温和极限热能的考验，使武器系统能够长期保持运转效率。
en: This fullerene-lanthanum compound is made by encasing a single lanthanum atom in a cage of carbon atoms. The incredibly high melting point of lanthanum compounds make them ideal for the construction of offensive hardpoints, where heat dissipation is critical to keeping weapons systems operating effectively.

zh: 这种富勒烯冷凝物用于链接太空舰船的气体贮藏罐。这种液体的独特性质提升了热效率，降低了操作易燃易爆物质的危险性。
en: This mixture of fullerene condensates is most commonly used to line gas storage tanks on starships. The unique qualities of the liquid provide increased thermal efficiency and reduced the risk of combustive malfunctions.

zh:
这种小型的红白色恒星相对比较古老，可能已经处于氢聚变枯竭的时期，即将变为红巨星。



这些恒星的周围通常有行星系，大量的重金属物质也十分常见。
en:
Small, red-white stars of this kind are relatively old and may be on the verge of exhausting their hydrogen fusion fuel before becoming red giants.

Planetary systems can often be found around these stars and an abundance of heavier metals is not uncommon.

zh: 这种小巧、敏捷的护卫舰绰号“胖子”，联邦主要用它执行护航任务或短程巡逻任务。由于特里斯坦级广泛的用途，它长期以来在盖伦特空间内非常受欢迎。它的价格相当昂贵，不过绝对物有所值，因为特里斯坦级是市面上火力较强的护卫舰之一。
en: Often nicknamed the Big Man, this nimble little frigate is mainly used by the Federation for escort duties or on short-range patrols. The Tristan has been very popular throughout Gallente space for years because of its versatility. It is rather expensive, but buyers will definitely get their money's worth, as the Tristan is one of the more powerful frigates available on the market.

zh: 这种小巧、敏捷的护卫舰，绰号叫“小胖”，联邦主要用它执行护航任务或短程巡逻任务。由于特里斯坦级广泛的用途，它长期以来在盖伦特空间内非常受欢迎。它的价格相当昂贵，不过绝对物有所值，因为特里斯坦级是市面上火力更强的护卫舰之一。
en: Often nicknamed the Big Man, this nimble little frigate is mainly used by the Federation for escort duties or on short-range patrols. The Tristan has been very popular throughout Gallente space for years because of its versatility. It is rather expensive, but buyers will definitely get their money's worth, as the Tristan is one of the more powerful frigates available on the market.

zh: 这种情况在米玛塔尔设计的舰船中并不是罕见的，这艘狂暴级在战斗中强大的火力下被打成了好几块。看来这是这艘船承受火力的主要部分。
en: As is common with Minmatar designs, this Tempest battleship has fragmented into multiple sections under heavy fire. This midsection seems to have taken the brunt of the damage in this case

zh: 这种情况在米玛塔尔设计的舰船中并不是罕见的，这艘狂暴级在战斗中强大的火力下被打成了好几块。这块下层船体看上去没有任何声明的迹象。
en: As is common with Minmatar designs, this Tempest battleship has fragmented into multiple sections under heavy fire. This lower section appears largely inert, with only a few arcing connectors showing any signs of activity

zh: 这种情况在米玛塔尔设计的舰船中并不罕见，这艘狂暴级在战斗中强大的火力下被打成了好几块。一些红色的灯光在残骸内部舰桥的部分有气无力地亮着，但飘散在周围的尸体残骸显示整艘船已经没有任何生命的迹象。
en: As is common with Minmatar designs, this Tempest battleship has fragmented into multiple sections under heavy fire. A few red lights still blink forlornly within the bridge section, but the corpses drifting inside make clear that there are no other signs of life on board

zh: 这种情况在米玛塔尔设计的舰船中并不罕见，这艘狂暴级在战斗中强大的火力下被打成了好几块。有迹象表明在主反应堆机舱内可能还会有生命存在，但是放射性探测读数表明基本上不可能有船员幸存。
en: As is common with Minmatar designs, this Tempest battleship has fragmented into multiple sections under heavy fire. The sparking power relays at the forward end of this drive section suggest there is still some life in the main reactors, but the radiation readings indicate that this was probably not a good thing for any surviving crew.

zh:
这种无色无味、通常不具燃烧性的物质，是已知的七种单原子气体之一，这些气体不会轻易同其他原子结合。它们的这种特性使其被用于多种生产制造程序之中。

可以从下列类型的行星开采获得：
熔岩行星
气体行星
离子行星
en:
This colorless, odorless, and usually nonflammable substance is one of seven known monoatomic gases, or those that do not easily combine with other atoms. They are thus well suited for a variety of manufacturing implementations.

Can be obtained by mining the following types of planets:
Lava Planet
Gas Planet
Plasma Planet

zh:
这种特殊的混合液体是十分理想的热传导物质，可将热能从敏感的机器和电脑元件上导离，并传导至散热槽从而将多余的热能从系统中消除。

可以从下列类型的行星开采获得：
海洋行星
冰体行星
气体行星
en:
This specially blended fluid is ideal for transferring thermal energy away from sensitive machinery or computer components, rerouting it to heat sinks so it can be eliminated from the system.

Can be obtained by mining the following types of planets:
Oceanic Planet
Ice Planet
Gas Planet

zh: 这种独特的改装件能产生拖拽，对抗舰船自身的空间能量场，装配舰船能在大幅降低最大速度的同时增加质量、降低灵活性。
en: This special rig generates drag against the spatial energy field of the ship itself. Ships fitted with it will gain mass, while their max speed is drastically reduced and their agility is also affected.

zh:
这种类型的橙色和红橙色的恒星数量很大，它们构成了迄今为止新伊甸中数量最多的主序星。然而，许多这样的恒星比较昏暗，属于矮星，不如这种类型中辐射更强的其它成员那样为人所知。



非常寒冷，通过对流经历不断的氢燃料再混合，人们相信这种恒星会在数万亿年的时间内保持稳定，持续发亮。按照这个规模，由于宇宙的年龄相对较短，所有这种类型的恒星都处于其生命周期的早期阶段。
en:
Orange and red-orange stars in this class are very abundant, making up by far the largest number of main-sequence stars in the locale of the New Eden cluster. However, many such stars are dim and in the dwarf category with the more radiant members of the class being the better known.

Rather cool and experiencing constant remixing of their hydrogen fuel by convection, it is believed that stars of this kind could potentially remain stable, at constant luminosity, for trillions of years. By this scale, all stars of this kind are young in terms of their potential lifetime due to the relatively short age of the universe.

zh:
这种类型的橙黄色和橙色恒星相当稳定，人们相信要经过数百亿年的热核聚变过程，它们内核中的氢气储备才会燃烧殆尽。 



稳定性和长生命周期，加上行星系的共同存在，标志着它们是进行殖民化和探索活动的可行性目标。
en:
Yellow-orange and orange stars of this type are rather stable and believed to take tens of billions of years to burn through their core hydrogen reserves in a process of thermonuclear fusion. 

This stability and long life, combined with the common presence of planetary systems marks these as viable candidates for colonization and exploration efforts.

zh: 这种装置通过内置的广播信标发射波。它配备有小型护盾装备，似乎还装备了轻薄型装甲附甲。
en: This piece of equipment emanates waves from its built-in broadcasting beacon. It is fitted with a small shield module and appears to be coated with a thin layer of armored plates.

zh: 这种装置通过内置的广播信标发射波。它配备有小型护盾装备，似乎还装备了轻薄型装甲附甲。这个改良的版本可以发射高频脉冲。
en: This piece of equipment emanates waves from its built-in broadcasting beacon. It is fitted with a small shield module and appears to be coated with a thin layer of armored plates. This modified version sends out bursts of high-frequency waves.

zh: 这种货柜集装箱构造十分脆弱，在严酷的太空环境下大概只能坚持一小时左右。
en: This cargo container is flimsily constructed and may not survive the rigors of space for more than an hour or so.

zh: 这种集装箱里通常装着值钱的东西。
en: A container like this one often holds some valuables.

zh: 这笔钱归你了，记住，只有偏执狂才能生存。
en: This money is yours. Remember, only the paranoid can survive.

zh: 这笔钱给你，希望你能帮我们老板把盘踞在这个位标附近的海盗清理干净。
en: The money is yours. I hope you can help our boss clean up the pirates hovering near these coordinates.

zh: 这箱子里装的是能用钱买到的最好的矿业炸药，再大的障碍也被它炸成粉末。
en: A crate of the finest TNT money can buy. Guaranteed to blow even the largest of problems into smithereens.

zh:
这类主序星会有红白色彩，无时不刻不在进行的氢聚变使其非常明亮。



这些恒星周围发现了大量陆地和气体巨星，而居住区通常包含一个或多个行星。
en:
Main-sequence stars of this kind can have a slight red-white tint and are generally bright and in the process of fusing vast quantities of hydrogen every second.

Various numbers of planets of the terrestrial and gas giant types are found around these stars and the habitable zones often contain one or more planets.

zh: 这类哨站配备了临时感应器阵列和二手战术数据分析设备，对于不晓内情的人来说，它们看上去就像一堆一无是处的垃圾。玛塔利正希望别人有这样的想法。
en: Outfitted with makeshift sensor arrays and second-hand tactical data analysis equipment, these outposts will, to anyone not in the know, look like useless scrapyards.  Which is exactly what the Matari would have you think.

zh: 这类基地通常被用作定点采矿哨站或居住地。它们通常位置隐蔽，不易受到攻击，因此许多海盗都喜欢在其中安家，有时甚至得到了其中居民的完全同意。这座控制站看起来非常暴露且脆弱，这主要是因为它正在进行大修。
en: Bases such as this one are commonly used as on-site mining posts or colonies. They are often obscurely located and vulnerable as well and therefore it is common that pirates make their homes in them, sometimes with the resident's full consent. This one looks unusually exposed and vulnerable due to what appear to be major renovations.

zh: 这类的封锁设施在整个已知宇宙中到处都有，通常都是用作高安全性的监狱。不过这一座似乎已经过高度强化。它的外壳上有多个裂口，但这些裂口似乎是从建筑内部产生的，而不是外部。这使人不禁要问，里面究竟关押着怎样的怪物？
en:
Containment facilities like this exist throughout known space, usually serving as high security prisons. This one, however, appears to have been heavily reinforced.

There are multiple breaches in the hull, but they appear to originate from within the structure rather than without. Which begs the question; what kinds of monstrosities were being held inside?

zh: 这组特征信号虽然经过精心地隐藏，但是还是能从中解析出不属于血袭者的通讯信号。
en: Although these signals are well hidden, we can still pick up communication signals that are not from the Blood Raiders.

zh: 这群不肯好好干活的懒猪，下地狱真是便宜他们了。
en: Those layabouts couldn't even manage a decent day's work. They probably thought that going to hell was getting off lightly.

zh: 这群人不是普通的海盗，他们在各个星域为奴隶提供葳砣柯的解药，煽动叛乱
en: These are no ordinary pirates. They are providing Vitoc antidotes to slaves all across New Eden and sparking rebellions.

zh: 这艘“恩赐者”级工业舰正在进行维护。
en: This Bestower-class industrial is currently undergoing maintenance.

zh: 这艘“恩赐者”级工业舰正在进行维护。虽然拉菲马是一名优秀的军事战术家，但他不是以自己在战斗中的勇猛而出名，他更喜欢在后方驾驶一艘装甲厚实的工业舰，让他的手下去作战。
en: This Bestower-class industrial is currently undergoing maintenance.  Although an excellent military tactician, Lafema is not known for his bravery in combat, rather opting to fly in a heavily armored industrial behind the scene while his men do the fighting.

zh: 这艘“恩赐者”级工业舰正在进行维护。虽然祖拉克是一名优秀的军事战术家，但他不是以自己在战斗中的勇猛而出名，他更喜欢在后方驾驶一艘装甲厚实的工业舰，让他的手下去作战。这虽然很反常，但他却声称这会使他避免引起别人不必要的注意，因为很少有人会想到重要人物会驾驶“恩赐者”级飞船。
en: This Bestower-class industrial is currently undergoing maintenance.  Although an excellent military tactician, Zulak is not known for his bravery in combat, rather opting to fly in a heavily armored industrial behind the scene while his men do the fighting.  This is highly unusual, but he claims it has helped him avoid unneccessary attention in the past, as few suspect anyone of importance would choose to fly a Bestower.

zh: 这艘“恩赐者”级工业舰正在进行维护。这艘特殊的船经过大规模改造，成为一艘秘密娱乐游艇。
en: This Bestower-class industrial is currently undergoing maintenance. This particular vessel has been greatly modified and set up as a covert pleasure barge.

zh: 这艘万王宝座级只有一部分建造完成，很多甲板层和内部结构系统都暴露在冰冷的太空中。
en: This Megathron battleship is partially complete, with decks and inner-hull systems exposed to the cold of surrounding space.

zh: 这艘万王宝座级战列舰的船体遭受到了非常严重的损伤，大部分的外部结构都被剥落了。残骸中依然有求救信号，但里面已经没有一点生命空气的存在了。
en: This Megathron hull has weathered significant damage, with most major protrusions ripped away. Distress beacons still function within the wreckage, but it seems unlikely that any pockets of atmosphere remain

zh: 这艘万王宝座级的船头还能用，它是在不断炮轰之下才从船体上断裂下来的。
en: This Megathron bow section functioned as designed, tearing cleanly away from the rest of the hull under sustained fire

zh: 这艘乌鸦级战列舰的双翼和船头已经完全被切掉了，从保留下来的中央部分船体结构来看，还依然可以辨认出是属于加达里的工程工艺。
en: While the wings and bow have been sheared off this Raven-class battleship, the central hull structure has lived up to Caldari engineering standards and remained intact. Any remaining crew will likely have evacuated or perished by now.

zh: 这艘伊特龙V工业舰正在进行维护。
en: This Iteron V-class industrial is currently undergoing maintenance.

zh:
这艘冥府级超级航母残骸上残留的标记显示它的名字为梅蒂翰·拉卡罗。船身上到处可见图克尔部族的标识，以及数不清的商队标记，看上去和失落已久的拉卡罗大商队有关系。 

这样一艘船出现在席拉星系中已经引起了这里的图克尔先遣队和避难会的注意，但目前双方都还未对此事发表任何评论。早先进入残骸内部的探险者发现里面的所有数据存储设备都被仔细地格式化并毁掉了。
en:
Surviving markings on the wreck of this Hel-class supercarrier identify it as the Matyrhan Lakat-Hro. In many places symbols of the Thukker Tribe are present along with numerous caravan markings that appear to confirm a link to the lost Lakat-Hro Great Caravan. 
The presence of such a vessel in the Thera system has drawn attention to the Thukker contingent working with the Sanctuary here but no comment on the matter has been forthcoming from either party. Early delvers into the wreck's scorched interior soon discovered that all data storage devices had been carefully purged and destructively irradiated.

zh: 这艘冬眠者无人机崭新的装甲意味着它在不久前才被激活，甚至可能是新近制造的。尽管它看上去就像是这个团队的新人，但是毫无疑问它也搭载了和它那些年长的表兄们一样致命的武器。
en: The pristine condition of this Sleeper drone's armor suggests it has only recently been activated, perhaps even newly-manufactured . Even though it appears to be a relative newcomer to the swarm, there is little questioning that it bears the same deadly technology as its more elderly and experienced kin.

zh: 这艘冬眠者无人机装甲上无数的维修痕迹说明它已经坚守了千年守卫这片空间。它机械地、分毫不差地执行着自己的使命，每一个动作都经过严密计算，完美精准地一步步运转。
en: An abundance of repair seams in this Sleeper drone's armor tell the story of millennia spent on duty, protecting the same unchanging area. The drone moves about with a mechanical indifference to the monotony of its task, executing each new maneuver with a flawless, unthinking precision.

zh:
这艘加装了特别改造的自由无人机扫描技术的护卫舰仅供设备鉴定及异常事件调查局（ECAID）的精英代理人使用。其扫描分辨率可精细至毫微米级别，使得驾驶员几乎可以辨别分析小至原子的任何物体，将一切不完美的瑕疵降低到不可思议的程度。

能够驾驶这样一艘船是至高成就的体现，有幸驾驶这艘船的ECAID代理人可以说已经达到了其职业生涯的顶峰，值得所有飞行员顶礼膜拜。
en:
Rogue drone that was specifically adapted to scan technology integrated into this unique frigate-sized platform. Used exclusively by the elite agents in the Equipment Certification and Anomaly Investigations Division (ECAID). The femtometer wavelength scan resolution allows the pilot to virtually dissect and analyze any object at a subatomic scale, divining all flaws and defects with an uncanny level of quality.

Flying one of these amazing ships is also a great mark of achievement. Any ECAID agent worthy of such a command can be said to have reached the pinnacle of their career and is worthy of all Capsuleer's deep respect.

zh: 这艘原本威猛的探险船现在就剩下这堆废铁了。
en: The remains of a once mighty exploration vessel, now reduced to scarred metal and blackened fragments.

zh: 这艘姐妹会战列舰被摧毁了， 已经无法修理。船上已经没有生命迹象。
en: This SOE battleship has been destroyed beyond repair. No life signs are present on board.

zh: 这艘恩赐者级工业舰目前在卸货，向这个设施提供补给。
en: This Bestower-class industrial is currently offloading and loading supplies to this installation.

zh:
这艘战列舰的船体和护盾系统非常先进，统合部对它的分析遇到了不小的麻烦。它的推进系统前所未见，有人猜想这艘船是直接与时空结构进行交互而实现星际穿梭的。它的标准武器系统似乎具有一定的自主性，面对各种目标都能发挥不俗的威力。



DED线人报告说那些暴露在外的炮台不过是辅助武器，真正危险的主武器系统只有在舰长认为受到了巨大威胁的时候才会出马。



威胁等级：致命
en:
CONCORD's analysis of this battleship has been hampered by its advanced hull and shielding. The propulsion system is unfamiliar but tentative theories have suggested that the vessel somehow directly interacts with the fabric of space-time while moving. The standard weapon systems of this ship appear to be semi-autonomous and effective against a range of targets.
DED contact briefings suggest the free floating turrets are a secondary weapon, with an extremely dangerous primary weapon held in reserve against those this ship's commander considers a significant threat.
Threat level: Critical

zh: 这艘战舰由里夫·赫比安指挥，他是米雅安安全部队的头儿。
en: This battleship is commanded by Riff Hebian, head of Lord Miyan's security forces.

zh: 这艘战舰隶属统合部组织的DED部门，负责追杀罪犯。任何在统合部巡逻空间内犯下刑事罪者都视其为威胁。
en: This is a fighter-ship belonging to DED, a division in the CONCORD organization responsible for tracking down and eliminating criminals.  Consider it a threat to anyone that has commited a criminal offense within CONCORD patrolled space.

zh: 这艘护卫舰就剩下一坨扭曲纠缠在一起的钢架、残片以及各种电子垃圾了。
en: A small crumpled tangle of structural beams and fragments of electronics is all that remains of this frigate

zh: 这艘灾难级战列舰断成了两截；船头大部分虽然还保持完整，但已经没有任何生命迹象的存在。
en: This Apocalypse-class battleship has been torn in half; the bow section is largely intact, although there are no obvious signs of life.

zh: 这艘灾难级战列舰断成了两截；船尾部分的结构还保持着完整性，严重的反应堆泄漏使得里面有幸存者的可能性几乎为零。
en: This Apocalypse-class battleship has been torn in half; while the stern appears to be maintaining structural integrity, the obvious signs of reactor breaches make it very unlikely that anyone is left alive inside.

zh: 这艘狐鼬级工业舰正在进行维护。
en: This Tayra-class industrial is currently undergoing maintenance.

zh: 这艘猛犸级工业舰正在进行维护。
en: This Mammoth-class industrial is currently undergoing maintenance.

zh: 这艘猛犸级的工业舰似乎正在维护中，但你的感应器显示，不知什么原因，它被极其强大的护盾保护着…………
en: This Mammoth class industrial seems to be undergoing maintainance, but your sensors indicate that for some purpose, it is protected behind an extremely powerful shield...

zh: 这艘神示级战舰曾经几多风光，但是现在已经支离破碎了。
en: This Revelation has seen better days, generally the ones in which it was still in one piece.

zh: 这艘舰船目前正在进行维护。
en: This ship is currently undergoing maintenance.

zh: 这艘船的主人是谁现在已经不重要了。重要的是卡斯蒂勒博士的数据可能还在里面。
en: It doesn't really matter whose ship this was, now. What matters is that Dr. Castille's data may be still be inside.

zh: 这艘运输船的引擎已经被失效，所以它不能移动了。
en: The engines of this cargo vessel have been disabled so that it cannot move.

zh: 这艘飞船因受损而无法操纵，同时也丧失了跃迁能力。
en: This ship has been damaged and has lost its ability to maneuver, as well as its warp capability.

zh: 这让我想起几年前的那场哗变，这个手法，太像了……
en: This reminds me of the mutiny a few years ago. They seem so similar...

zh: 这话应该我问你！为什么？为什么要离开部落！？
en: I need to ask you this! Why? Why have you left the tribe!?

zh: 这都是之前长者们建造的……
en: These were built by the Elders...

zh:
这里到处充斥着巨大舰船的残骸，无声地诉说着新纪元116年1月27-28日在这里爆发的那场宏大战役。 

两个飞行员联盟在这里用上千条战舰谱写了一曲壮烈的战争史诗，造就了一场史无前例的大决战。在征求了各大帝国的意见后，统合部决定留下几条战舰残骸在这里，供后来者瞻仰唏嘘。表面上看这是对克隆飞行员的警告，提醒他们冲动是魔鬼，不过了解那些拥有不死之身的好战分子的人自会明白，这只会激励他们为死亡与毁灭的事业奉献终身。
en:
Here lie the wrecks of monstrous ships, commemorating a battle that blotted out the sky on Jan 27-28 in YC 116. 
Two coalitions of Capsuleers clashed in vessels numbering in the thousands, causing destruction on a scale of war never before seen by human eyes. CONCORD elected - after advising with the various empires - to leave a few wrecks left on the field for all spacefarers to see. Ostensibly this was a warning to Capsuleers of where their folly would lead them, but those who've encountered the immortals will know it was more likely taken as an ideal of death and destruction to which they can aspire from now until the end of time.

zh:
这里到处充斥着巨大舰船的残骸，无声地诉说着新纪元116年3月25-26日在这里爆发的那场宏大战役。 

两个阵营的飞行员和他们的舰队群在这里用几千艘战舰谱写了一首壮烈的战争史诗，成就了一场史无前例的大决战。在征求了各大帝国的意见后，统合部决定留下几条战舰残骸在这里，以供后来者瞻仰唏嘘。表面上看这是对克隆飞行员的警告，提醒他们冲动是魔鬼，不过，如果你熟悉那些拥有不死之身的舰长们，你自然明白，这只会激励他们为战斗与毁灭的事业奉献终身。
en:
这里到处充斥着巨大舰船的残骸，无声地诉说着YC116年3月25-26日在这里爆发的那场宏大战役。 

两个阵营的飞行员和他们的舰队群在这里用几千艘战舰谱写了一首壮烈的战争史诗，成就了一场史无前例的大决战。在征求了各大帝国的意见后，统合部决定留下几条战舰残骸在这里，以供后来者瞻仰唏嘘。表面上看这是对克隆飞行员的警告，提醒他们冲动是魔鬼，不过，如果你熟悉那些拥有不死之身的舰长们，你自然明白，这只会激励他们为战斗与毁灭的事业奉献终身。

zh: 这里是每个米玛塔尔人的家啊。
en: This is the home of every Minmatar.

zh: 这里曾经是一座军火库，它被重新装修用来接待那些疲惫的旅行者，为他们提供一个安静的休息场所，或者至少能减缓在星系之间跳跃穿梭的痛苦。这里的居住设施非常的经济，它的设计就是用来保持一个固定的客流量的。这里的房源并不多，员工也很少，整个建筑看上去都很杂乱。墙上散发这一种奇怪的味道，几乎所有的东西都带有星币刷卡槽。大厅里到处都是年老的男人和女人们，如果不是过于陈旧他们穿着的装束还能算得上是具有激情，看上去总是为欢乐的时刻做好了准备。跃迁核心宾馆：只按钟点计费
en:
Formerly an old  armory, this building has been refurbished to accommodate weary travelers for a peaceful nights rest, or at least a temporary reprieve while on the jump between systems. The accommodations are efficient, designed to maintain a steady stream of customers. The rooms are sparse, the staff light, and the entire structure is rather unkempt. An odd smell permeates the walls, and most everything operates by ISK-slots. Older men and women loom around the lobby. Their attire would be provocative if they weren't so haggard and worn, though they always seem ready for a good time.

Warp Core Hotel: Hourly rates only

zh: 这里生产所有飞船都在使用的基本零件。
en: This is where small parts are built to be used in all kinds of spaceships further down the production line.

zh: 这里面，难道有什么关联……

这颗小型白色恒星主要由正在退化的物质构成，并在缓慢冷却中，热核聚变反应也因燃料枯竭而停止。这种恒星的温度从内到外基本相同，这得益于退化中的电子的优秀的热传导效果。



其表层极大的重力使得各种元素被分离且提纯，这种主要由碳和氧构成的恒星的大气成分中更多的是质量较轻的元素。
en:
This small white star is largely made up of degenerate matter and is slowly cooling, having ceased thermonuclear fusion after exhausting its fuel. The temperature of these stars is generally uniform through the body due to the excellent thermal conduction of degenerate electrons making up the bulk of their mass.

High surface gravity leads to separation and purification of elements in these stars such that, while generally composed mostly of carbon and oxygen, the atmosphere is rich in lighter elements.

zh:
这颗小型蓝色恒星属于一种常见的矮星类别，常常伴有行星或尘埃云。



这类恒星通常旋转快速，这种类型的星体以高氢含量和恒星光谱学中的离子金属线而著称。
en:
A small blue sun belonging to a class of relatively common dwarf stars that are often planet-bearing or accompanied by planetary dust clouds.

Many stars of this kind rotate quickly and the class is known for strong hydrogen and ionized metal lines in stellar spectroscopy.

zh: 这颗巨大的小行星似乎遭受了强力冲击，已经裂成了许多碎片。
en: This towering asteroid seems to have suffered a tremendous impact, splitting it into multiple pieces.

zh: 这颗巨星小行星的表面布满了洞，直通内部空腔。这是矿工或时空变迁的杰作。
en: This massive asteroid's surface is covered in gaping holes, giving way to an internal chamber. The work of miners or the winds of space and time.

zh:
这颗明亮的蓝色恒星属于恒星风及其猛烈而且旋转迅速的那一种类型。他们的大部分能量产生于其质量中心，通过包括了碳-氮-氧（CNO）催化循环的热核聚变过程而来。



这种类型的恒星会发出强烈的非电离氦线条，有些还会因化学反应而放出及其强烈的线条，由此得名为“强氦星”。
en:
This luminous blue star belongs to a class known for powerful stellar winds and rapid rotation. These stars generate most of their energy at the center of their mass in a thermonuclear fusion process involving a carbon-nitrogen-oxygen (CNO) catalytic cycle.

Stars of this type generally show strong non-ionized helium lines and some have a chemistry that results in very strong lines, leading to the designation 'helium-strong'.

zh:
这颗红色恒星已经耗尽了内核中的氢燃料，正在消耗地壳中仅存的氢，慢慢扩张成一颗红巨星。 



扩张成一颗完全红巨星的过程要持续数亿年，最终这颗恒星会吞没任何附近环绕的行星系。
en:
This large red star has exhausted its core hydrogen fuel and is slowly expanding into a red giant, consuming all remaining hydrogen in the stellar shell. 

While the process of expansion into a full red giant will take hundreds of millions of years, eventually the star will engulf any planetary system orbiting close to it.

zh: 这，是在开玩笑吗？可电池就要没货了呀。
en: Is-is this a joke? The batteries are running out of stock.

zh: 进入低安区域可能面临一些危险，但也拥有更好的机遇，您是否接受前往自由交战区域？
en: Entering low-security space may be dangerous, but could also lead to better opportunities. Accept and enter free-fire space?

zh: 进攻作战相关技能，涵盖武器炮台，导弹发射器和战斗无人机等技术。
en: Skills related to offense, including a wide range of techniques that'll help you understand turrets, missile launchers, combat drones, etc.

zh: 进站请求已被批准，准备停靠
en: Docking request accepted, ready to dock

zh: 进阶加力燃烧器操作技术
进阶古斯塔斯发明原理
进阶战列巡洋舰制造技术
进阶战列巡洋舰工程学
进阶战列巡洋舰防御升级
进阶空间干扰装置操作
进阶米玛塔尔发明原理
进阶联合矿业发明原理
远古压缩加里多斯冰矿
远程护盾回充增量器最佳射程
远程护盾回充增量器能量栅格需求
远程装甲维修器失准范围
远程装甲维修器最佳射程
远程装甲维修器能量栅格需求
远程装甲维修器装甲维修量
远程访问支持查看、出售等操作。
en: Accessing remotely allows you to view and sell items.

zh: 远骑兵 中型护盾回充增量器
连接服务器超时，请重新连接。
en: Server connection timed out, please reconnect.

zh: 迪拉·尼科利的激进级飞船
迪沃克把一组皮特管教所第三加速轨道的新密钥放在了这个集装箱内。这些钥匙的守卫力量非常强大。
en: Inside this container, Dewak regularly puts a new set of ciphers for the third acceleration gate in the Pith's Penal Complex. The keys are especially well guarded.

zh: 迪沃克的第一军官总部
迪玛珐·埃斯西兹的堡垒
迷幻 磁性力场稳定器
追查可疑的通缉犯(专家)
en: Test 追查可疑的通缉犯(专家)

zh: 追查可疑的通缉犯(进阶)
en: Test 追查可疑的通缉犯(进阶)

zh: 追查可疑的通缉犯委托信标
en: Mission Beacon: Tracking Suspicious Wanted Criminal

zh: 送是送到了，但是对方似乎对我送去的东西有所不满。
en: The delivery itself went fine, but it seems they weren't satisfied with what I sent.
Deliver to the destination for a reward

zh: 适度游戏益脑 沉迷游戏伤身
en: Moderate gaming benefits your brain; game addiction is unhealthy

zh: 逃亡者亚米埃·迈达住在这里。
en: The fugitive Yamia Mida resides here.
The remains of a pod. The remains of the dead pilot are still inside.

zh: 逃生舱被击毁的飞行员
逃脱的奴隶 富豪级³
逃脱的奴隶 强制者级³
逃脱的奴隶 惩罚者级³

en: Select the blueprint you want to confirm

zh: 选择设施，更改制造场所
en: Select a facility and change the manufacturing location

zh: 通信中继站用于干扰严重的环境下，当地海盗用它来聊关于增效剂工业的信息。它由密码保护，不过保护力度可能并不强。
en: The com relay is used in environments with high interference. It is used by the local pirates to chat about the booster industry. It is password protected, but probably not all that well.

zh: 通用知识包括了那些提升舰船基础性能的重要技能，包括提升能量栅格和引擎效率等等，是对于每一位飞行员来说都非常重要的能力。
en: General knowledge includes important skills that help you improve a ship's basic components, including its powergrid and drive efficiency. These are essential abilities for every pilot.

zh: 通讯干扰筛查委托信标
通过个人资产可进行查看、出售等操作。
en: You can view and sell items in Personal Assets.

zh: 通过使用微能流来降低对方舰船的最大速度，该装备可以有效地暂时束缚目标，降低其速度。
en: Reduces the maximum speed of a ship by employing micro energy streams which effectively entangle the target temporarily, thereby slowing it down.

zh: 通过切换仓库可以访问其他空间站内的物品。
en: By switching warehouses, you can access items on other stations.

zh: 通过发射高频的电磁脉冲，这个扫描岗哨可以极高的效率吸收和储存环境数据。它特别擅长捕获扫描范围内粒子场里的细小波动。
en: Emitting a high-frequency electromagnetic pulse, this scanner sentry is able to assimilate and store environmental data with remarkable efficiency.  Particularly effective at picking up miniscule fluctuations in the particle field within its range.

zh:
通过将从自给养生物中提取的工业纤维放入活性气体活塞中进行高压处理，人们便得到了聚芳酰胺纺织品。它能够吸收大量的动能，这种材料制成的薄板能够用于各种不同的结构之上，以增强其对武器级别冲击之外其他力量冲击的抵抗。

可以从下列类型的行星开采获得：
海洋行星
熔岩行星
气体行星
en:
Polyaramid textiles are produced when industrial fibers are harvested from autotrophic life forms and subjected to intense pressure using reactive gas pistons. Able to absorb a startling amount of kinetic energy, sheets of this miraculous material can be form-fitted to just about any structure, protecting it from anything but weapons-grade impact forces.

Can be obtained by mining the following types of planets:
Oceanic Planet
Lava Planet
Gas Planet

zh: 通过微能流来降低目标舰船的飞行速度。
en: Uses a micro-energy flow to reduce the target ship's velocity.

zh: 速度很快，难以捕获的高级舰船，擅长给敌人“定身”。
en: An advanced ship with high velocity. Excels at "locking" enemies in place.

zh: 道瑞·法提马尔的惩罚者级
遗失的冬眠者人工物件
遗忘的冬眠者人工物件
遭遇了前来销毁证据的海盗?
en: What? You encountered pirates who have come to destroy the evidence?
Avoid Systems on Your Avoidance List

zh: 那个人是法芙娜祭司，我不敢告诉大家。
en: That someone is Priestess Fafna. I'm too afraid to tell anyone.

zh: 那个可怜的货船驾驶员昨天才刚刚上任，我真担心他被海盗吓尿了裤子。
en: That poor cargo hauler pilot only started yesterday. I'm really worried that he'll be scared to death by the pirates.

zh: 那个目标要跃迁逃跑了，异株湖改良型海燕级驱逐舰这时就可以大显身手了。
en: Whenever a target tries to warp away, Ishokune's custom Cormorant has a perfect opportunity to demonstrate its abilities.

zh: 那个，克隆人先生，就请您高抬贵手顺道给解决一下，位标我给你发过去。
en: Um, Capsuleer, could you please help me with this? I'm sending you the coordinates right away.
So, about the thing we discussed before...

zh: 那么，就这样，拜拜，待会儿见！
en: That's it, then. Bye, see you later!

zh: 那些在商业竞争中破产的人，常常会做出一些非常不理智的暴力行为。然而，对于那些获胜的商业巨贾来说，失败者的愤怒，嫉妒和绝望，只不过是供他们消遣的一种娱乐罢了。
en: Those whom business competition leaves bankrupt often let out their frustration and anger through irrational violence. However, to the corporate giants who won, the rage, jealousy and despair of losers are nothing but entertainment.

zh: 那些幻想着瓦解加达里合众国的恐怖分子，甚至不惜冒着激怒整个合众国的风险，把应用知识学院当作恐怖袭击的目标。应用知识学院与八大集团均有合作，且合作紧密。
en: Those terrorists, who dream of seeing the Caldari State disintegrate, even risked bringing the entire State's wrath down upon themselves by making the School of Applied Knowledge a target of their terrorist attacks. The School of Applied Knowledge cooperates closely with all of the eight mega corporations.

zh: 那些都是黑钱！你拿了以后没有人敢找你算账的！
en: It's all dirty money! No one will dare to give you trouble over it!

zh: 那我应该找哪个集团要账？
en: Then which one of them has my money?

zh: 那是一份基因样本，而且这个帝国最显赫之人的基因样本。
en: That is a gene sample. A gene sample of the most prominent figure in the entire empire.

zh: 那本该是一场练习性质的入门战斗，但是却意外遭遇了精锐的海盗舰队……
en: It was supposed to be a practice battle, but they ran into an elite pirate fleet...

zh: 那真是太好了，希特修女。事成之后，您的那份儿也不会少的。
en: That's great, Sister Sayite. After it's done, I'll give you your share as promised.

zh: 邮件中尚有奖励未领取，确定删除吗？
en: Message contains unclaimed rewards, confirm delete?

zh: 邮件主题为空，无法发送邮件（需要填写邮件主题与内容）
en: Failed to send mail, because topic is blank (topic and content required)

zh: 邮件内容为空，无法发送邮件（需要填写邮件主题与内容）
en: Failed to send mail, because content is blank (topic and content required)

zh: 部分物品出售成功，剩余部分已转为出售订单
en: Items partially sold. Remaining items converted into sell orders

zh: 部分物品购买成功，剩余部分已转为购买订单
en: Items partially purchased. Remaining items converted into purchase orders

zh: 部落宴会在即，如果能够在宴会上燃起一束斯塔科马尼人的传统烟花——啊！那绝对是非常美妙的。
en: A tribal feast is just around the corner. If only there could be traditional Starkmanir fireworks during the feast. Oh, that would be absolutely fabulous!

zh: 酷菲劫匪 伊米卡斯级³
酷菲是新伊甸最受欢迎的软饮料，市面上流传着很多相关传闻。有人称，酷非其实是克隆人的尸体炼制的，还有人相信船舱里带一罐酷菲可以减小被点名的几率。近期常有不法分子蹲点打劫酷菲，必须打击他们这种可耻的行为。
en: Quafe is the most popular soft drink in New Eden and there are many rumors surrounding it. Some say Quafe is actually made from the bodies of dead clones, and some believe that placing a can of Quafe in the ship's hold can reduce the chances of the ship being targeted. Some outlaws have been robbing Quafe recently. Such disgraceful actions must be stopped.

zh: 酷菲狂热者 伊米卡斯级³
酷菲狂热者 促进级³
采矿器冷凝调节器 I

采矿安全问题委托信标
en: Mission Beacon: Mining Area Safety Issue

zh: 采集矿石制造更强大的战舰
en: Mine ores and manufacture powerful spaceships

zh: 里夫·赫比安的末日沙场级飞船
里尔·伊万纳斯的灾难级
里斯蒂杰的挑战级飞船
里贝得·塔加的裂谷级飞船
里鲁克·希的徘徊者级飞船
重复完成此任务暂时不影响故事线状态
en: Completing this mission repeatedly will not affect your story progress.
Mission Beacon: Bad Hare Day II
Mission Beacon: Bad Hare Day I

zh: 量子元可用于商城购物，获得途径是进行充值
en: AUR can be used in the Store to purchase items. You can get AUR by topping up.

zh: 金属、纺织品、合成织物和各种机械的分类部件—空间哨站安装和运作的基本建筑块。
en: Assorted metals, textiles, composite fabrics and miscellaneous machinery – the basic building blocks for the assembly and operation of a space station.

zh:
金属支架、塑性钢混凝土和纤维模块都是宇宙中使用非常普遍的生产资料和大规模建筑材料。

可以从下列类型的行星开采获得：
风暴行星
熔岩行星
贫瘠行星
en:
Metal girders, plasteel concrete, and fiber blocks are all common construction materials used in almost every large-scale building or manufacturing project throughout New Eden.

Can be obtained by mining the following types of planets:
Storm Planet
Lava Planet
Barren Planet

zh: 金纳泽星域在与加达里的大战期间饱受蹂躏。由于处于多数冲突的前线，该星域的许多小型殖民地都被加达里小规模侵袭部队无情摧毁了，他们当时执行的焦土政策誓要根除该星域的所有工业能力。如今，该星域是联邦内经济实力最雄厚的星域之一，这充分证明了人类精神的坚韧顽强，而且具有讽刺意味的是，该边境星域的重建要归功于在这里许多哨站和空间站中进口和交易的大量加达里货物。
en: Sinq Laison suffered terribly during the war with the Caldari. On the front lines for much of the conflict, many small settlements were ruthlessly destroyed by small Caldari raiding parties employing a scorched-earth policy with the aim of make any industrial use of the region impossible. It is a testament to the hardiness of the human spirit that it is now economically one of the strongest regions in the Federation, ironically owing much of its rebuilding to the vast quantities of Caldari goods that are imported and traded at the many outposts and stations in the border region.

zh: 金融学入门技能，能够降低星际市场税费。
en: Financing skill 101. Reduces taxes in interstellar markets.

zh: 鉴于米玛塔尔护卫舰队数量增长惊人，皇家海军制定了关于捍卫者级的制造计划，该战舰被设计用来专门搜寻并消灭机动性良好的团伙护卫舰舰群。
en: Noticing the alarming increase in Minmatar frigate fleets, the Imperial Navy devised the Coercer, a vessel designed specifically to seek out and destroy the droves of fast-moving frigate rebels.

zh: 针对加达里的货舰渡神级，联邦设计了方尖塔级。两者拥有相似的特性，但方尖塔级货舰的适应力更佳。这个庞然大物代表了盖伦特最新最优秀的运输技术。
en: The Obelisk was designed by the Federation in response to the Caldari State's Charon freighter. Possessing similar characteristics but placing a greater emphasis on resilience, this massive juggernaut represents the latest, and arguably finest, step in Gallente transport technology.

zh: 钱我一分都不会少你的，下次有好活还找你！
en: Your reward payments will be made in full. I'll come to you next time I have a job that needs doing!

zh: 钱我会吩咐人给你打过去，这是尤尼斯大人给的赏金，别忘了。
en: I'll get people to wire you the money. Remember, this reward is from Mr. Eunice.

zh:
铁和镍容易辨识，且分布较广，是两种典型的基础金属，它们很容易氧化。基础金属在很多的领域都有极大的用处，这使得对它们的需求从来都高居不下。幸运的是，它们在很多星球上都有普遍的存在。

可以从下列类型的行星开采获得：
贫瘠行星
气体行星
冰体行星
温和行星
en:
Iron and nickel are two widespread, easily recognized examples of base metals, or those metals that oxidize relatively easily. Their tremendous usefulness in numerous applications ensures that base metals are always in high demand. Thankfully, so is their abundance on most planetary surfaces.

Can be obtained by mining the following types of planets:
Barren Planet
Gas Planet
Ice Planet
Temperate Planet

zh: 铁血 弹道控制系统
锁定系统辅助控制器 I
锁定系统辅助控制器 II
锁定系统辅助控制器 III
锁定系统辅助控制器 IV
锁定系统辅助控制器蓝图 I
锁定系统辅助控制器蓝图 II
锁定系统辅助控制器蓝图 III
锁定系统辅助控制器蓝图 IV
锁定守卫属于危险行为，如果开火将会被守卫击毙。确定要继续吗？
en: Locking on to police vessels is dangerous. The police will shoot you down if you open fire. Proceed?

zh: 锦标赛抗性减弱指示信标
长久以来的战争创伤以及被盖伦特人逐出母星的屈辱，让加达里人有着远胜于新伊甸任何势力的爱国心。每一个加达里人都自愿成为维持这个超级集团的螺丝钉，并时刻准备为之献出生命。
en: Bearing the wounds of long-standing wars and the humiliation of being expelled from their homeworld by the Gallente, the Caldari are more patriotic than any other faction in New Eden. Every Caldari is willing to play their part to keep the corporate nation going, and is ready to sacrifice themselves for the greater good.

zh: 长尾鲛级的设计是对其兄长飓风级的补充，其强劲的炮台性能和先进的跟踪计算机使它能保护它巨大的兄长不受更小更快的敌船侵袭。
en: Engineered as a supplement to its big brother the Cyclone, the Thrasher's tremendous turret capabilities and advanced tracking computers allow it to protect its larger counterpart from smaller, faster menaces.
Tap and hold the skill to drag

zh: 长者在黑暗之日后隐藏多年，又在长者战争中一鸣惊人。
en: The Elders hid themselves for years after the Day of Darkness, and suddenly reappeared in the Elder War.

zh: 长者的意志，已经不复存在了吗……
en: The Elders' will... is no more...

zh: 长者？你是说那些不负责任却自诩为米玛塔尔的救星的战犯？
en: The Elders? You mean those irresponsible war criminals who claim to be the saviors of the Minmatar?

zh:
闭合电气网络，配备有众多自控接电装置。这个部件的所有断路器都已经损坏了，但并不是无法修复。

可以从下列物品中提炼获得：
米玛塔尔9级受损结构
米玛塔尔10级受损结构
加达里9级受损结构
加达里10级受损结构
天使受损结构
古斯塔斯受损结构
莫德团受损结构
en:
A closed loop electrical network with redundant autonomous switchgear. This unit has all of its breakers tripped but isn't beyond repair.

Can be obtained by reprocessing the following items:
Minmatar Ship Debris 9
Minmatar Ship Debris 10
Caldari Ship Debris 9
Caldari Ship Debris 10
Angel Ship Debris
Guristas Ship Debris
Mordu's Legion Ship Debris

zh: 间谍的位标已经确认，我们很快就能知道是谁在背后捣鬼了。
en: The spy's coordinates have been confirmed. We'll soon find out who's behind all this.

zh: 阐述加力燃烧器核心机制的技能，掌握后能够提升加力燃烧器的各项性能。
en: Skill in understanding the core mechanism of Afterburners. Master it to increase the overall performance of Afterburners.

zh: 队长要求你跟随他/她一起行动，确定跟随吗？
en: Your fleet commander invited you to join them. Accept and follow?

zh: 防御作战相关技能，涵盖舰船防御，装甲修理和护盾回充等技术。
en: Skills related to defense, including a wide range of techniques that'll help you understand ship defense, armor repairs, shield recharging, etc.

zh: 防御可靠，带领舰队推进，活跃于正面战场。
en: Has good defense. Well-suited for leading a fleet in direct conflict.

zh: 防御能力得到强化的高级舰船，用于大规模交战。
en: An advanced ship with enhanced defensive power. Used in large-scale warfare.

zh: 防火墙 信号放大器
阿东·达赛内的纳维达斯级飞船
阿克尔夫·奥塔的狂暴级飞船
阿勒门氏 中型群体电容传输器
阿勒门氏 大型掠能器
阿勒门氏 大型能量中和器
阿勒门氏 大型装甲维修器
阿勒门氏 小型群体电容传输器
阿勒门氏 自适应装甲增强器
阿孚拉·阿尔卡斯的幽灵级飞船
阿尔格斯级狙击型蓝图
阿尔格斯级突击型蓝图
阿尔格斯级训练舰蓝图

阿尔格斯级，正如其开发方一样，靠的是迅雷不及掩耳的速度，在一定的远程距离上，来完成任务。它很好地反映了盖伦特人的价值观：不必非要等到一致舆论的出现，在给自己留一定余地的同时，找准机会便下手，因为很多事情在现实中与教科书上描述的完全是两码事。

所以，阿尔格斯级的特点便是利用快马加鞭的无人机来快速打击对方。
en:
The Algos, as is customary with the Gallente, relies on swiftness of action—preferably at a respectable distance—to accomplish its goals. In this, it reflects the long-established Gallente value of taking independent action without waiting for committee deliberations. This is done, if at all possible, in a fashion that allows a safe time buffer for an immediate retreat; because theory is one thing, and practice is quite another. 

As such, the Algos focuses on hitting its targets in a rapid-fire fashion, with drones that race through space with destructive intent.

zh: 阿尔贝都·瓦兹科的裂谷级飞船
阿库娜·贝耶的托勒克斯级飞船
阿斯顿·塔克洛的共和舰队狂暴级
阿格的万王宝座级飞船
阿梅索尔的恩尤级飞船
阿特龙级小而强悍，它的能量传输系统很先进，但货舱空间非常有限。尽管阿特龙级可以很好地胜任采矿工作，但它主要还是被用作战舰。
en: The Atron is a hard nut to crack, with an advanced power conduit system but little space for cargo. Although it is a good harvester in terms of mining, its main strength is its efficacy as a combat vessel.

zh: 阿特龙级小而强悍，它的能量传输系统很先进，但货舱空间非常有限。尽管阿特龙级可以很好地胜任采矿的工作，但它主要还是被作为战舰使用。
en: The Atron is a hard nugget with an advanced power conduit system, but little space for cargo. Although it is a good harvester when it comes to mining, its main ability is as a combat vessel.

zh: 阿狄沙波 强制者级³
阿狄沙波 惩罚者级³
阿狄沙波家族的矿队受到了未知势力的攻击，但是他们有足够的理由相信，这一切都是另一个家族在暗中作祟。愤怒的阿狄沙波人，现在在想尽各种办法搜罗凶手的踪迹。
en: The mining team of the Ardishapur family were attacked by an unknown faction. However, they have reason to believe another family was behind the attack. The furious Ardishapur are doing everything they can to track down the perpetrators.

zh: 阿狄莎波家族的封地范围内的一个礼拜堂被血袭者占领了。五大家族在各自的封地上有高度的自治权，帝国舰队并不会轻易插手家族自身的防务。这使得阿狄莎波家族不得不调用自己的力量解决血袭者的威胁。
en: A chapel was occupied by the Blood Raiders within a stretch of space belonging to the Ardishapur Family. The five major families have a high degree of autonomy in their respective regions, and the Imperial Fleet will not intervene in a family's own defenses lightly. Therefore the Ardishapur Family must rely on their own strength to counter the threat posed by the Blood Raiders.

zh: 阿玛基特的长尾鲛级飞船
阿薇耶·安卡的彗星级飞船
阿费塔·泽纳孔的裂谷级飞船
阿达基塔的狞獾级飞船
阿迪兰的毛鲁斯级飞船
阿门·考特的拉克希斯级
附近星系的一个行星上出现了前所未见的巨型生物，严重影响到当地居民的日常安全。当地安全部门紧急调配了陆战队员前往解决此事，现在需要一名飞行员运送这批陆战队员。
en: Unknown gigantic creatures have appeared on a planet in a nearby system. Their arrival poses a serious threat to local residents. The security department there assigned a team of Marines to deal with this situation. Now they need a pilot to bring these Marines to their destination.

zh: 际遇平台入门指引委托信标
降低目标舰船感应器的性能。

降低舰队中舰船的信号半径。

作战网络是专业的舰队指令系统，专为战列巡洋舰和高级指挥舰船而设计。

通常在同一时间只允许一个此类设备运作，不过某些高级单位允许多系统并行。

注意：只有当你被指定为舰队加成官时，舰队加成才有效。这个装备不能在母星力场内使用。
en:
Lowers the signature radius of ships in the fleet.

Warfare Links are dedicated fleet command systems designed for use on battlecruisers and advanced command class ships.

While only one of these units can normally be operated at any given time, certain advanced units allow the use of multiple systems.

Notes: The Fleet bonus is only available if you are the assigned fleet booster. This module cannot activate inside a starbase force field.

zh:
降低舰队的护盾回充增量器和护盾传输装备的电容消耗。



作战网络是专业的舰队命令系统，专为战列巡洋舰和高级指挥舰船而设计。



通常在同一时间只允许一个此类设备运作，不过某些高级单位允许多系统并行。



注意：只有当你被指定为舰队加成官时，舰队加成才有效。这个装备不能在母星力场内使用。此装备提供的舰队加成不适用于旗舰级自身护盾回充增量器装备。
en:
Reduces the capacitor need of the fleet's shield boosters and shield transporters.



Warfare Links are dedicated fleet command systemd designed for use on battlecruisers and advanced command-class ships.



While only one of these units can normally be operated at any given time, certain advanced units allow the use of multiple systems.



Notes: The Fleet Bonus is only available if you are designated as the Fleet Booster. This module cannot be activated inside a starbase force field. The Fleet bonus provided by this module does not apply to Capital ships' local shield booster modules.

zh: 限制设备首次登陆%s小时内可激活礼包
en: The limited device can activate the gift pack within %s hours after the first login

zh: 限制：只能同时激活一个这种装备。
en: Restriction: Only one of this module type can be activated at a time.

zh: 限制：只能同时装配一个这种装备。
en: Restriction: Only one of this module type can be fitted at a time.

zh: 除此之外，完成一系列带有势力图标的新闻任务可以赢得四大帝国势力的信任。
en: In addition, completing a series of news missions bearing faction icons will earn you trust from the four nations.

zh: 除非系统收到统合部发出的准入指令，任何飞行员不得在该空间站停靠。
en: Docking has been prohibited for Capsuleers into this station until the system has been given the all clear by CONCORD.

zh: 陨命者默默无名，只剩下这些最后的纪念，就托付给你了。
en: He wasn't well known when he was alive. These are the only things to remember him by. Please take good care of them.

zh: 陷阱 小型护盾扩展装置
随从 小型远程电容传输装置
隐形战术一直都是新伊甸的特殊流派，几个家族联合起来加强了强制者级的隐形作战能力，不过最后某个家族强势的占有了这个技术改造的所有权。
en: Stealth tactics have always played a special role in New Eden. Several families pooled their efforts to improve the Coercer's stealth abilities, but in the end only one of them seized the rights to the new technologies.

zh: 难度设置成功，将在下一次刷新生效
en: Difficulty settings saved. Settings will take effect after next refresh.

zh: 难度越高，就越有可能接触到一些稀有的任务！
en: The higher the difficulty, the higher the chance of getting rare missions!

zh: 难民涌入，使米玛塔尔本不发达的医疗体系显得更加捉襟见肘。{3|station_name:_tr}再次爆发流感疫情，药物供给短缺。核心局面公司正在征募飞行员执行药物运输工作。
en: With the influx of immigrants, the underdeveloped Minmatar medical system is facing big trouble. Another flu epidemic broke out in {3|station_name:_tr}. They're running short of medicine. Core Complexions Inc. is looking for pilots to transport medical supplies there.

zh: 雅克·罗扎克的特里斯坦级
雅瓦·拉迪耶的万王宝座级飞船
雅科提·金布的咒灭级飞船
雅达·温基瓦斯的毒蜥级
集装箱只能在空间站才能打开
en: Containers can only be opened at a station

zh: 零重力状态下所能实现的科学程度是既美丽又令人吃惊的，就像这座粒子加速超建筑一样。
en: The science allowed by zero gravity can be as mind-boggling as it is beautiful, as demonstrated by this particle accelerating superstructure.

zh: 需要开启语音权限才能语音聊天
需要更新客户端才能进行游戏
en: Please update the client to enter the game

zh: 需要的文件就在这里，请确保文件安全。
en: These are the required documents. Please keep them safe.

zh: 需要科技水平达到{level}级才能学习该技能
en: Tech level {level} required to learn the skill

zh: 霍克级是外空联合矿业集团制造的第二代采矿舰船中最为巨大的一艘。采掘舰船，相对于它的兄弟采矿驳船来说，装备了专门配合露天采矿设备的电子子系统。同时它们也更加强健，能够在危险的深空区域相对安全地作业。霍克级，毫无疑问的是最优秀的一种采矿舰船。
en: The Hulk is the largest craft in the second generation of mining vessels created by the ORE Syndicate. Exhumers, like their mining barge cousins, are equipped with electronic subsystems specifically designed to accommodate Strip Mining modules. They are also far more resilient, better able to handle the dangers of deep space. The Hulk is, bar none, the most efficient mining vessel available.

zh: 霍利尔·费尔冯的分裂级飞船
静止的海军型狞獾战舰
非常古老的物体，似乎曾是这个空间的守卫者。它此时处于非活跃状态，可能是出了故障。
en: A very old object that seems to once have acted as a guardian of this space. It is not active at the moment and perhaps it has malfunctioned.

zh: 非常好，请保持攻击状态，直至击毁目标。（开启后会自动攻击，不需重复启动）
en: Well done! Please keep attacking until the target is destroyed. (Turret will keep firing after activation – you don't need to activate it again.)

zh: 非常感谢您能承接这次旅行任务，我们会有专业的导游为您服务。
en: Thank you very much for taking on this travel mission. A professional tour guide will be at your service.

zh: 非常感谢，您真是做了一桩大好事，我这就把委托金发到您的账上。
en: Thank you very much, you did a very good job. Your commission will be paid right away.

zh: 非常感谢，我的克隆人先生，您真是帮了大忙！
en: Thank you so much, Capsuleer. You've been a great help!

zh:
非常有韧性的金属矿物，颜色为暗沉至明亮的银绿色。它可以和三钛合金混合制作极其坚硬的合金，它本身也具有多种用途。在大多数星域非常常见。

可以从下列矿石中提炼获得：
片麻岩
灰岩
杰斯贝矿
水硼砂
斜长岩
干焦岩
en:
Very flexible metallic mineral, dull to bright silvery green in color. Can be mixed with Tritanium to make extremely hard alloys or it can be used by itself for various purposes. Fairly common in most regions.

Can be obtained by reprocessing the following ores:
Gneiss
Spodumain
Jaspet
Kernite
Plagioclase
Pyroxeres

zh: 以战斗为生的战斗飞行员，有着难以估量的破坏能力。如果你对激光与导弹有兴趣，喜欢凭拳头说话，那加入此行便可发挥你的真正才能。
en: These pilots live for battle and are champions at wreaking destruction. If you're interested in lasers and missiles and like to let your fists do the talking, join this profession to put your talents to good use.

zh: 项终止项目后不会返还任何原材料，也不会返还耗费的金钱，是否终止项目？
en: If you terminate the job, you will lose all raw materials/ISK spent. Confirm termination?

zh: 预祝新伊甸之旅愉快！再会。
en: Have a good trip in New Eden! Goodbye!

zh: 领取商品必须在空间内操作
en: You can only claim items inside a station

zh: 领取成功,物品已被放置在空间站机库中
en: Claimed. The item has been stored in the station hangar.

zh: 领取该任务需要完成上一环任务
en: You need to complete preceding missions in order to accept this one.

zh: 领取该任务需要完成所有新手任务
en: You need to complete all tutorial missions in order to accept this one.

zh: 额拉尔·斯丁的德拉米尔级
额拉尔·斯丁，邪恶的天使。
风暴行星通常也是属于类地行星的范畴，但是乍看上去它们还更像气体行星一些，这都是因为他们稠密的高压大气层所致。不过从地貌学上来说，两者之间的差异是非常明显的：相较于一个气体星球来说，风暴行星的大气稀薄得多，所含的主要化学成份也更加复杂，并且整个星体的大部分质量都来自其岩石球体。之所以称之为风暴行星，是因为在这类星体上层大气中无序的闪电与大规模的雷暴，范围可达整个大陆。
en: Storm worlds are usually considered terrestrial planets, although to a casual eye they may appear more similar to gas planets, given their opaque, high-pressure atmospheres. Geomorphically, however, the distinctions are clear: compared to a gas world, the atmosphere of a storm world is usually considerably shallower, and generally composed primarily of more complex chemicals, while the majority of the planet's mass is a rocky terrestrial ball. Their name is derived from the continent-scale electrical storms that invariably flash through their upper atmospheres.

zh: 飞船上的位置似乎不太够了，移民就先安置在你的机库里了。
en: It seems your ship doesn't have enough seats. The immigrants will wait in your item hangar.

zh: 飞船还能正常运行，委托到此为止，剩下的路让他们自己继续吧。
en: The ship can still operate normally. Your job is done here. Let them worry about the rest.

zh: 飞行员先生，我们听说你要送一批陆战队员过来，早就候着了！
en: Capsuleer, we heard you were going to carry a batch of Marines here. We've been expecting you!

zh: 飞行员教程有助于掌握宇宙的生存技巧
en: The Pilot Tutorial can help you master the basics of surviving in space

zh: 飞行员认证文档可在这个办公室中领取。
en: The Pilot Certification Documents can be retrieved from inside this office.

zh: 飞行员，{2|system_name:_tr}星系内马上就会有一场不得了的交易。
en: Capsuleer, an incredible deal is about to be sealed in the {2|system_name:_tr} system.

zh: 飞行员，你好啊。请你帮忙把一些水运到{3|station_name:_tr}去。
en: Hello, pilot. Please send some water to {3|station_name:_tr}.

zh: 飞行员，你的伊甸币已转账至钱包内，请注意查收
en: Capsuleer, your PLEX have been transferred to your wallet, please check it.

zh: 飞行员，你的星币已转账至钱包内，请注意查收
en: Capsuleer, your ISK have been transferred to your wallet, please check it.

zh: 飞行员，你的物品已递送至本空间站的物品机库内，请注意查收
en: Capsuleer, your items have been delivered to the item hangar in the station, please check them.

zh: 飞行员，你要多少钱都可以，我只想看到这些血袭者挫骨扬灰！
en: Capsuleer, I'll pay you whatever you want. What I want is to see these Blood Raiders turned to ashes!

zh: 飞行员，可以请你助我们一臂之力吗？
en: Pilot, can you lend us a helping hand?

zh: 飞行员，可否请你对周边星系进行搜索，间谍是不可能这么容易就消失不见的。
en: Pilot, can you please search the nearby systems? The spy can't have disappeared without a trace that easily.

zh: 飞行员，学会观察周围的环境，才能及时发现潜藏的危险与机遇。
en: Capsuleer, it is important to observe your surroundings. This is the only way that you can discover hidden danger and opportunities before it's too late.

zh: 飞行员，很不幸，最近在{2|system_name:_tr}附近的天使海盗活动猖獗。
en: Capsuleers, unfortunately, Angel Cartel pirate activity has been unacceptably high near {2|system_name:_tr} recently.

zh: 飞行员，我希望你能用你最快的速度让他闭嘴。
en: Capsuleer, I hope you can shut him up as fast as possible.

zh: 飞行员，我很敬佩你的战斗技巧，但是你却办了一件坏事。
en: I admire your combat skills, pilot, but what you did was a bad thing.

zh: 飞行员，接收到统合部通讯，请确认是否接受统合部新手飞行员训练任务？
en: Incoming communication from CONCORD. Do you wish to start CONCORD's training program for novice pilots?

zh: 飞行员，最近在{2|system_name:_tr}的天蛇集团犯罪分子非常猖獗。
en: Capsuleer, Serpentis criminals have been running wild in {2|system_name:_tr} recently.

zh: 飞行员，检测到通讯信号丢失
飞行员，活着回来，是一件值得庆幸的事情。
en: Pilot, getting back alive is something that deserves celebration.

zh: 飞行员，若改变主意，可以到际遇-新手教程中领取新手训练任务。
en: If you change your mind, you can accept tutorial missions under Encounters > Beginner's Tutorials.

zh: 飞行员，请你带上这些资料到{4|station_name:_tr}去一趟，我们需要更深入的调查。
en: Pilot, please convey this information to {4|station_name:_tr}. We need to investigate it further.

zh: 飞行员，请你马上把战斗数据的原本带到{6|station_name:_tr}去。
en: Pilot, please bring the original combat data to {6|station_name:_tr}.

zh: 飞行员，通讯信号已经完全丢失
en: Capsuleer, your connection has been lost

zh: 飞行员，那个陌生人人在哪？

飞行速度+25%|i;
电容回充时间+50%|d;
飞马集团是一个业务范围广且运营良好的零售公司，其经营范围遍布整个盖伦特联邦。通常他们都在运营自己的物流系统，偶尔也会雇佣克隆飞行员送货。
en: FedMart is an efficiently managed retail corporation with a wide range of business operations. Their retail stores can be found all over the Gallente Federation. Usually they run their own shipping systems, but sometimes they hire Capsuleers too.

zh: 飞马集团是新伊甸中最大的零售商，然而，一次数据的泄露，使得飞马集团的数据库在黑客的威胁下岌岌可危。
en: FedMart is the largest retailer in New Eden. However, a data leak has made their database vulnerable to hacker threats.

zh: 飞龙级航母是基于古代拉塔帝国的海上旗舰欧利昂尼-哈鲁的详细设计文档而建造的。根据历史资料，这艘海船在传统上常被作为皇帝的座舰，用于在提基纳大陆和王宫所在地马利约克列岛之间巡游。而今，它也成了加达里合众国荣耀及骄傲的象征。与它传奇一般的祖先相比较，今天的星际航行版也毫不逊色，它被广泛运用于深层空间的各个领域里，很可能成为加达里合众国的伟大象征。
en: The Wyvern is based on documents detailing the design of the ancient Raata empire's seafaring flagship, the Oryioni-Haru. According to historical sources the ship was traditionally taken on parade runs between the continent of Tikiona and the Muriyuke archipelago, seat of the Emperor, and represented the pride and joy of what would one day become the Caldari State. Today's starfaring version gives no ground to its legendary predecessor; with its varied applications in the vast arena of deep space, the Wyvern is likely to stand as a symbol of Caldari greatness for untold years to come.

zh: 食灵者 大型掠能器
首先……是这个……我们的采购员已经在{2|station_name:_tr}准备好了。
en: First... this... Our buyers are ready at {2|station_name:_tr}.

zh: 首先，际遇任务是视角代理为了能够更便捷地处理飞行员和普通民众之间的合作需求而创立的平台。
en: First of all, "Encounters" is a platform established by the Scope. Its goal is to provide a more convenient means of cooperation between pilots and other people.

zh: 马图瓦，怎么回事？我没有看到你所谓的仓库，这里全是海盗。
en: Matua, what happened? I didn't find the warehouse you mentioned. And there are pirates all over this place.

zh: 马尔拉·奥格恩的分裂级飞船
马布拉·阿勒农的幽灵级飞船
马敏·切文卡的十字军级飞船
马泽德·卡拉多恩的末日沙场级飞船
马科尔·迪斯托的狂暴级飞船
马维诺瓦·罗敏的特里斯坦级飞船
马维隆·阿特里特的奥卡托级飞船
马雷·伊格尔的纳维达斯级飞船
马默·格尔的万王宝座级飞船
驱逐小型太空盗贼团委托信标
en: Mission Beacon: Repelling a Small Space Pirate Gang

zh: 驱逐舰：轻巧灵活，且火力毫不逊色
en: Destroyer class: high mobility with a good weapon system

zh: 骑士 中型远程电容传输装置
骑士 大型装甲维修器
骑士 大型远程电容传输装置
骰子，扑克，比赛，为女士准备的轮盘赌。除了脱衣女郎外，都请着正装。
en: Dice, cards, races, Splinterz, roulette for the ladies. Formal attire except for strip-kani.

zh: 高安和低安会受到岗哨炮打击
en: Will be attacked by Sentry Guns in low-security space

zh: 在高安地区会遭到统合部强力打击
en: Will be attacked by CONCORD in high-security space

zh: 在高安地区无法启动跃迁引擎
en: Cannot use warp drives in high-security space

zh: 高超的星舰制造技术帮助人类走向了太空。随着制造技术的升级，制造的速度的原材料效率将会进一步的提升。
en: Advanced starship manufacturing technology helped humanity venture into the stars. As manufacturing technology continues to develop, the speed and efficiency of manufacturing will be further improved.

zh: 魔女级是有史以来驰骋在帝国区小行星带里最可怕的护卫舰之一。理由也很有说服力：它已经多次击败尺寸是其两三倍的舰船了。无论你是否相信这理由，魔女级还是会让你不寒而栗。
en: The Succubus is one of the most feared frigates ever to harrow the space lanes and asteroid belts of civilized space, and with good reason. Tales are told about it overpowering ships twice or three times its size. Whether you believe this to be fact or fiction, the Succubus will still strike fear into your heart.

zh: 魔符级是维鲜集团在老式奴隶运输船的基础上加以改造而成的新船。
en: The Sigil is a recent ship designed by Viziam, based on an old slave transport design.

zh: 鲁尼·尤鲁克的马克瑞级飞船
鲁特逊·普尔科的守夜者级飞船
黄绿色晶体，在大型小行星或卫星内部深处的高压环境中形成。用于电子和武器制造业。仅在少数地区储量丰富。
en: Mykoserocin is a crystalline compound formed by intense pressure deep within large asteroids and moons. The crystals are commonly used in electronics and weapon manufacturing, as well as the creation of legalized Synth booster variants. Mykoserocin can only be found in abundance in a few areas, such as interstellar gas clouds within high security space.

zh: 黑名单中暂无任何联系人
黑客抓捕行动委托信标
黑客的位置我马上给你发过去，请快去快回，我准备下班了。
en: I'll send you the location of the hacker right away. Please deal with it quickly – I'm about to get off work.

zh: 黑暗恐怖的金属结构从这个碎裂的小行星中向外突出来。扫描结果显示，这块坚硬岩石深处有个年代久远的能量源。
en: Dark and ominous metal structures jut outwards from this crumbled asteroid. Scanners indicate a distant powersource far within the adamant rock.

zh: 黑暗血袭者 中型掠能器
黑暗血袭者 中型群体电容传输器
en: Dark Blood Medium Group Capacitor Transmitter

zh: 黑暗血袭者 中型群体装甲维修器
en: Dark Blood Medium Group Armor Repairer

zh: 黑暗血袭者 中型能量中和器
黑暗血袭者 中型装甲维修器
黑暗血袭者 中型远程电容传输装置
en: Dark Blood Medium Remote Capacitor Transmitter

zh: 黑暗血袭者 中型远程装甲维修器
en: Dark Blood Medium Remote Armor Repairer

zh: 黑暗血袭者 停滞缠绕光束
黑暗血袭者 反应式装甲增强器
黑暗血袭者 大型掠能器
黑暗血袭者 大型能量中和器
黑暗血袭者 大型装甲维修器
黑暗血袭者 大型远程电容传输装置
en: Dark Blood Large Remote Capacitor Transmitter

zh: 黑暗血袭者 大型远程装甲维修器
en: Dark Blood Large Remote Armor Repairer

zh: 黑暗血袭者 小型掠能器
黑暗血袭者 小型群体电容传输器
en: Dark Blood Small Group Capacitor Transmitter

zh: 黑暗血袭者 小型群体装甲维修器
en: Dark Blood Small Group Armor Repairer

zh: 黑暗血袭者 小型能量中和器
黑暗血袭者 小型装甲维修器
黑暗血袭者 小型远程电容传输装置
en: Dark Blood Small Remote Capacitor Transmitter

zh: 黑暗血袭者 小型远程装甲维修器
en: Dark Blood Small Remote Armor Repairer

zh: 黑暗血袭者 散热槽
黑暗血袭者 自适应装甲增强器
黑暗血袭者 跃迁扰断器
黑暗血袭者 跃迁扰频器
黑鸟级是加达里海军新近启用的一种小型高科技巡洋舰。它更擅长对战术局面精巧的操控而非正面交锋，因此经常出现在团队战中，或是扮演僚机的角色。
en: The Blackbird is a small high-tech cruiser newly commissioned by the Caldari Navy. Commonly seen in fleet battles or acting as wingman, it is not built for head-on slugfests, but rather for delicate tactical situations.

zh: 默认中型精炼排列布局
默认堡垒中型排列布局
默认堡垒大型排列布局
默认堡垒超大型排列布局
默认大型精炼排列布局

龙骑兵级很好地诠释了古老的宗教信条（尽管在宇宙的其他地方被视为黑暗的象征，但在艾玛人眼中这再正常不过了），那就是，天选之人的意志永远是正确且不容置疑的。这不仅包括通过古老且行之有效的洗脑手段来将神的意志强加于人，还包括从他人的身上汲取能量来滋养自己。

因此，龙骑兵级的优势是用海量的无人机在最短的时间内干掉目标，或是在交战初始就对敌人造成巨量伤害。此外，龙骑兵级还能同时吸取敌人的能量，让对方变成一具行尸走肉。
en:
The Dragoon is a precise interpretation of the ancient religious belief (viewed as dark superstition in other parts of the universe, but perfectly normal to the Amarr) that the Will of the Chosen is always unquestionably correct. This creed leads to not only the use of ancient and effective ways of brainwashing to impose the true God's Will, but also to the practice of draining energy from others to nourish oneself.

Thus, the Dragoon uses a huge amount of drones to defeat its target in the shortest time possible, or at least to deal massive damage to it. Moreover, it can drain energy from its enemies, transforming them into walking corpses.

zh: 勇气之心的历史要追溯到盖伦特-加达里战争时期，这枚奖章是为了纪念那些坚持驻守在加达里首星的勇敢战士。当时其他所有人都已逃散，只有他们留下来与盖伦特人顽强作战。这个奖章在历史上仅颁发过十几次，专门授给那些将国家利益放在个人利益之上的人。
en: Dating back to the Gallente-Caldari War, the Onyx Heart was created in memory of those brave souls that stayed behind on Caldari Prime to fight the Gallenteans while the rest of the population fled. Awarded only a few dozen times throughout the duration of the war, the Onyx Heart was only given to those who prioritized the well-being of the State takes over their own.

zh: 奥贝尔石虽然是一种普通的矿石，但对采矿新手来说，它仍然是一个不错的矿种，因为它含有大量的同位聚合体，以及一些三钛合金和类晶体胶矿。新手只要进行几趟开采奥贝尔石的旅程，他的资历就会显著提升。这种矿石是比原矿石密度更高的压缩版。
en:
Omber is a common ore that is still an excellent ore for novice miners as it has a sizeable portion of isogen, as well as some tritanium and pyerite. A few trips of mining this and a novice is quick to rise in status. 

This ore is a compressed and much more dense version of the original ore.

zh: 这些棍子，在未收训练的人眼中，和从树上掉下来被虫咬过的树枝没什么区别。但是，克鲁夏部族利用这种棍子在艾玛先知的眼皮底下秘密传递讯息。横线和竖线的组合，有时还加上曲线和锐角，代表了一种严格保密的书面交流语言。有学者推测这种语言的起源可能在隆哈达谷地，在那里，斥候会在路上留下刻过的棍子给大队捕猎人马作为线索。
en: These sticks, to the untrained eye, appear to be nothing more than twigs bereft of bark and chewed upon by hungry bugs. However, the Krusual Tribe used sticks such as these to communicate secretly under the paranoid eyes of their Amarr overseers. A combination of vertical and horizontal lines, occasionally intersected by curves or sharp angles, represents a fiercely guarded nonverbal language. Academics speculate the source of such a language could be traced back to hunts in the Tronhadar Valley region, where scouts would leave carved sticks on the trail for the main hunting party to read.

zh: 以提升工业制造能力为主，可以用更少的材料更快速地制造出物品。
en: Focus on improving industrial manufacturing capabilities, which allows you to manufacture items with less materials and time.

zh: 克洛基石是一种非常重的矿石。它是宇宙中超新星诺克石含量最高的矿石，因此需求量一直居高不下。另一方面，假克洛基石因为常常让缺乏经验的采矿者上当受骗而臭名昭著。  它看上去很像真的克洛基石，但实际上毫无价值可言。
en: Crokite is a very heavy ore that is always in high demand because it has the largest ratio of nocxium for any ore in the universe. Fools Crokite on the other hand is infamous for making inexperienced miners look like fools.  It closely resembles the real Crokite, while having very little usable mineral content.

zh:
当含有同位原矿的小行星靠近恒星或其他大量热源的时候，其中的同位原矿会玻璃化。结果就产生了玻璃状同位原矿。其精炼产量较普通同位原矿高5%。 

由于含有大量超新星诺克石和同位聚合体，同位原矿很抢手。同位原矿同时也产出一些类晶体胶矿和晶状石英核岩。

这种矿石是经过压缩形成的密度更高的种类。
en:
When asteroids containing hedbergite pass close to suns or other sources of intense heat can cause the hedbergite to glassify. The result is called vitric hedbergite and has 5% better yield than normal hedbergite. 

Hedbergite is sought after for its high concentration of nocxium and isogen. However hedbergite also yields some pyerite and zydrine.

This ore is a compressed and much more dense version of the original ore.

zh:
闪耀黑色光芒的条纹赭块看起来非常漂亮，有时被用于制作装饰品。而采矿者真正看重的是其含有的大量超新星诺克石。对任何事物而言，美丽的外表只是锦上添花。 

黑赭石曾一度被当作一种无价值的矿石而受到忽略，直到提炼得到技术改进，最终从中提炼出了巨量的同位聚合体。黑赭石也含有数量不少的三钛合金和超新星诺克石。

大多数情况下，你可以在安全等级0.0及以下的星系找到它。
en:
Shiny black nuggets of onyx ochre look very nice and are occasionally used in ornaments. But the great amount of nocxium is what miners are really after. Like in all else, good looks are only an added bonus. 

Considered a worthless ore for years, dark ochre was ignored by most miners until improved reprocessing techniques managed to extract the huge amount of isogen inside it. Dark ochre also contains useful amounts of tritanium and nocxium.

Available primarily in 0.0 security status solar systems or lower.

zh:
艾克诺精华岩是罕见品中的罕见品，是矿石之王。它比艾克诺岩的矿物含量高10%，能使那些发现一条这种矿脉的幸运儿成为亿万富翁。

它是已知世界中最稀有、最令人向往的矿石。一大块这种矿石足以让任何人瞬间从乞丐变成富翁。艾克诺岩矿石的超噬矿含量是所有矿石中最高的，同时也含有一些类银超金属和三钛合金。

大多数情况下，你可以在安全等级0.0及以下的星系找到它。
en:
Prime arkonor is the rarest of the rare; the king of ores. Giving a 10% greater mineral yield than regular arkonor, this is the stuff that makes billionaires out of people lucky enough to stumble upon a vein.

One of the rarest and most sought-after ores in the known universe. A sizable nugget of this can sweep anyone from rags to riches in no time. Arkonor has the largest amount of megacyte of any ore, and also contains some mexallon and tritanium.

Available primarily in 0.0 security status solar systems or lower.

zh: 玛塔尔的翡翠海岸得名于它闪亮的绿色矿物砂，它在隆哈达河三角洲地带积聚成了富有观赏性的冲积层，成为了当地的主要地标。多年之前，在米玛塔尔的上古时代，这种坚硬的翡翠被用来制作工具，也被用作装饰物品。 今天，翡翠海岸成为了一个美妙的度假胜地，沿着海岸线以及三角洲平静的水中分布着众多赌场。翡翠骰子是这些赌场中的珍品，来此的游客一般被建议只参与那些使用透明聚合物骰子的赌局。
en: The Jade Coast of Matar, named so because of its vibrant green mineral sands, actually produces a considerable amount of the ornamental material in the alluvial deposits of the Tronhadar river delta that is a dominant feature of the local geography. Long ago, in the ancient past of the Minmatar, the hard-wearing jade would be used as a material for tools as well as ornamental objects. Today, the Jade Coast serves as an ideal vacation destination, and many casinos operate along its beaches and on the placid waters of the delta. Jade dice are staple curios of such casinos, although tourists are advised to seek only games where transparent polymer dice are being used.

zh:
玻璃化基腹断岩在黑暗中闪闪发光，犹如神话中的女神一般。玻璃化基腹断岩非常稀少，也非常珍贵，因为它的矿石含量比普通基腹断岩高10%。

基腹断岩是一种密度很大的矿石，必须用专业的深层核心采矿技术来开采。它含有大量特殊的矿物——莫尔石，但其他有价值的矿物含量很少。

你可以在安全等级0.0及以下的星系找到它。
en:
Vitreous mercoxit gleams in the dark, like a siren of myth. Found only in rare clusters in space vitreous mercoxit is very rare, but very valuable, due to its much higher 10% yield.

Mercoxit is a very dense ore that must be mined using specialized deep core mining techniques. It contains massive amounts of the extraordinary morphite mineral but few other minerals of note.

Available in 0.0 security status solar systems or lower.

zh:
固体干焦岩，有时也被称为达姆·图尔撒德的火焰，是普通干焦岩的近亲。“火焰”比它平凡的兄弟多含5%的矿物。 

干焦岩是一种有趣的矿石，它在很多方面都很普通，只有一点除外，即经过深层核心提炼，干焦岩可以产出一小点超新星诺克石，从而使其价值突升。它还含有大量的三钛合金，以及一些类晶体胶矿和类银超金属。 

这种矿石是经过压缩形成的密度更高的种类。
en:
Solid Pyroxeres, sometimes called the Flame of Dam'Torsad, is a relative of normal Pyroxeres. The Flame has 5% higher yield than its more common cousin. 

Pyroxeres is an interesting ore type, as it is very plain in most respects except one - deep core reprocessing yields a little bit of nocxium, increasing its value considerably. It also has a large portion of tritanium and some pyerite and mexallon. 

This ore is a compressed and much more dense version of the original ore.

zh:
金色奥贝尔石曾在空间开拓的早期掀起过史上最大的掘金狂潮之一，当时同位聚合体还是矿物之王。它比普通奥贝尔石多出的10%的矿物含量是它蝉联了好几年最受欢迎矿石宝座的主要原因。

奥贝尔石虽然是一种普通的矿石，但对采矿新手来说，它仍然是一个不错的矿种，因为它含有大量的同位聚合体，以及一些三钛合金和类晶体胶矿。新手只要进行几趟开采奥贝尔石的旅程，他的资历就会显著提升。

你可以在安全等级0.7及以下的星系找到它。
en:
Golden Omber spurred one of the largest gold rushes in the early days of space faring, when isogen was the king of minerals. The 10% extra yield it offers over common Omber was all it took to make it the most sought after ore for a few years.

Omber is a common ore that is still an excellent ore for novice miners as it has a sizeable portion of isogen, as well as some tritanium and pyerite. A few trips of mining this and a novice is quick to rise in status.

Available in 0.7 security status solar systems or lower.

zh:
当恒星聚变的过程发生在诸如星际冰域这种硅酸盐尘埃聚集的区域时，就会形成白釉冰。虽然白釉冰富含氮-14以及其他一些稳定的氮同位素，但有一些类似这个的稀有样本，从未遭受辐射污染，因此比其他非纯品种含有更丰富的同位聚合体 。

你可以在安全等级0.0及以下的星系找到它。
en:
When star fusion processes occur near high concentrations of silicate dust, such as those found in interstellar ice fields, the substance known as White Glaze is formed. While White Glaze generally is extremely high in nitrogen-14 and other stable nitrogen isotopes, a few rare fragments, such as this one, have stayed free of radioactive contaminants and are thus richer in isotopes than their more impure counterparts.

Available in 0.0 security status solar systems or lower.

zh:
斜长岩并不是最值钱的矿石，但它含有大量的类晶体胶矿，因此总是有稳定的需求。它也含有一些三钛合金和类银超金属。

这种矿石是经过压缩形成的密度更高的种类。
en:
Plagioclase is not amongst the most valuable ore types around, but it contains a large amount of pyerite and is thus always in constant demand. It also yields some tritanium and mexallon.

This ore is a compressed and much more dense version of the original ore.

zh:
单晶双多特斜岩是双多特石的一类变种，晶体结构稍有不同。它很抢手，因为它的精炼产量较标准的双多特石稍高。

双多特石是价值极高的矿石，因为它富含宇宙中最稀有的两种矿物——晶状石英核岩和超噬矿。它还含有较多的类晶体胶矿。

这种矿石是经过压缩形成的密度更高的种类。
en:
Monoclinic bistot is a variant of bistot with a slightly different crystal structure. It is highly sought-after, as it gives a slightly higher yield than its straightforward counterpart.

Bistot is a very valuable ore as it holds large portions of two of the rarest minerals in the universe, zydrine and megacyte. It also contains a decent amount of pyerite.

This ore is a compressed and much more dense version of the original ore.

zh: 是否要重新发送舰队指令：{command_name:_tr}？

星际里的冰通常都是由气体分子不断附着于硅酸盐尘粒而形成。蓝冰因其特有的化学构成和形成环境，比其他冰矿含有更多的氧同位素。

这种矿石是经过压缩形成的密度更高的种类。
en:
Interstellar ices are formed by accretion of gas molecules onto silicate dust particles. Due to its unique chemical composition and the circumstances under which it forms, blue ice contains more oxygen isotopes than any other ice asteroid.

This ore has been compressed into a much more dense version.

zh:
浓缩灼烧岩是普通灼烧岩的近亲，但比后者的矿物含量高5%。虽然这点增量似乎微不足道，但是这对那些星币紧缺的新采矿者来说，这种差别是不容忽视的。

灼烧岩是已知宇宙中最常见的矿石之一。它含有大量的三钛合金以及一些类晶体胶矿。对刚开始采矿生涯的人来说，它是一个不错的选择。

你可以在安全等级1.0及以下的星系找到它。
en:
Condensed Scordite is a close cousin of normal Scordite, but with 5% better yield. The increase may seem insignificant, but matters greatly to new miners where every ISK counts.

Scordite is amongst the most common ore types in the known universe. It has a large portion of tritanium plus a fair bit of pyerite. Good choice for those starting their mining careers.

Available in 1.0 security status solar systems or lower.

zh:
凡晶石的集束被称为富凡晶石，有时存在于遍布普通凡晶石的地方。

凡晶石是已知宇宙中最常见的矿石，几乎到处都能找到。它富含人们大量使用的三钛合金，因此需求仍然十分稳定。

你可以在安全等级1.0及以下的星系找到它。
