斜长岩并不是最值钱的矿石，但它含有大量的类晶体胶矿，因此总是有稳定的需求。它也含有一些三钛合金和类银超金属。 

这种矿石是经过压缩形成的密度更高的种类。
en:
Azure plagioclase was made infamous in the melancholic song prose Miner Blues by the Gallentean folk singer Jaroud Dertier three decades ago.

Plagioclase is not amongst the most valuable ore types around, but it contains a large amount of pyerite and is thus always in constant demand. It also yields some tritanium and mexallon. 

This ore is a compressed and much more dense version of the original ore.

zh: 被泥土包裹着的未知物品，或许能发现什么有趣的东西呢？
en: An unknown item covered in mud. Could it be something interesting?

zh: 是否保存当前的总览配置？

星际里的冰通常都是由气体分子不断附着于硅酸盐尘粒而形成。聚合冰体因含有大量的氢同位素而闻名，但这块矿石的高度表面扩散性意味着它所含的氢同位素比更粗糙的同类矿石高得多。

这种矿石是经过压缩形成的密度更高的种类。
en:
Interstellar ices are formed by accretion of gas molecules onto silicate dust particles. Glacial masses are known to contain hydrogen isotopes in abundance, but the high surface diffusion on this particular mass means it has considerably more than its coarser counterparts.

This ore has been compressed into a much more dense version.

zh: 默认方案无法修改，是否创建新的方案？
en: You can't modify the default profile. Create a new one?

zh:
星际里的冰通常都是由气体分子不断附着于硅酸盐尘粒而形成。蓝冰因其特有的化学构成和形成环境，比其他冰矿含有更多的氧同位素。

你可以在安全等级1.0及以下的星系找到它。
en:
Interstellar ices are formed by accretion of gas molecules onto silicate dust particles. Due to its unique chemical composition and the circumstances under which it forms, blue ice contains more oxygen isotopes than any other ice asteroid.

Available in 1.0 security status solar systems or lower.

zh: 当恒星聚变的过程发生在诸如星际冰域这种硅酸盐尘埃聚集的区域时，就会形成白釉冰。白釉冰富含氮-14以及其他一些稳定的氮同位素。有些稀有碎片，如这一块，没有受到放射性污染，因此其氮同位素的含量比不纯的同类矿石更为丰富。这种矿石是经过压缩形成的密度更高的种类。
en:
When star fusion processes occur near high concentrations of silicate dust, such as those found in interstellar ice fields, the substance known as White Glaze is formed.  While White Glaze generally is extremely high in nitrogen-14 and other stable nitrogen isotopes, a few rare fragments, such as this one, have stayed free of radioactive contaminants and are thus richer in isotopes than their more impure counterparts.

This ore has been compressed into a much more dense version.

zh: 这种无价的矿石是在一个世纪前的加达里—盖伦特战争期间，由一队盖伦特探险家发现的。它是莫尔石的近亲，成分只有一点点差别，但却无法像莫尔石那样去使用它。全宇宙只有几块完整的样本，都落到了那些最富有的收藏家手里。
en: This priceless mineral was discovered by a band of Gallente explorers during the Caldari-Gallente war over a century ago. Closely related to morphite, its composition is only slightly different yet enough so that it has not been able to serve the same function. Only a few samples of it are known to remain intact, in the possession of some of the most wealthy collectors in the known universe.

zh:
在中等尺寸以上的小行星中，巨大的压力会使普通的凡晶石凝结成人们所知的厚质凡晶石，也使其矿物含量提高了10%。 

凡晶石是已知宇宙中最常见的矿石，几乎到处都能找到。它富含人们大量使用的三钛合金，因此需求仍然十分稳定。

你可以在安全等级1.0及以下的星系找到它。
en:
In asteroids above average size, the intense pressure can weld normal veldspar into what is known as dense veldspar, increasing the yield by 10%. 

The most common ore type in the known universe, veldspar can be found almost everywhere. It is still in constant demand as it holds a large portion of the much-used tritanium mineral.

Available in 1.0 security status solar systems or lower.

zh: 艾克诺岩是已知世界中最稀有、最令人执着的矿石。假艾克诺岩却是最没有人想要的东西，实际上，有好些没有经验的矿工在发现他们“宝贵”的货物实际上是假货，只值一点可怜巴巴的星币后，他们脸都绿了……
en: Arkonor is one of the rarest and most sought-after ore in the known world. Flawed Arkonor on the other hand is very rarely sought after. In fact more than a few inexperienced miners have turned red-faced when discovering their 'valuable' cargo was in fact flawed and worth only a handful of ISK ...

zh:
星际里的冰通常都是由气体分子不断附着于硅酸盐尘粒而形成。聚合冰体因含有大量的氢同位素而闻名，但这块矿石的高度表面扩散性意味着它所含的氢同位素比更粗糙的同类矿石高得多。

你可以在安全等级0.0及以下的星系找到它。
en:
Interstellar ices are formed by accretion of gas molecules onto silicate dust particles. Glacial masses are known to contain hydrogen isotopes in abundance, but the high surface diffusion on this particular mass means it has considerably more than its coarser counterparts.

Available in 0.0 security status solar systems or lower.

zh:
星际里的冰通常都是由气体分子不断附着于硅酸盐尘粒而形成。这些晶体散布在许多冰域中，被认为是宇宙中氦同位素的最主要来源。

你可以在安全等级1.0及以下的星系找到它。
en:
Interstellar ices are formed by accretion of gas molecules onto silicate dust particles. These crystalline formations can be found scattered around many an ice field, and are known as the universe's primary source of helium isotopes.

Available in 1.0 security status solar systems or lower.

zh: 这块数据板上共有超过7500条注释，并带有全部的数学计算过程，它体现了克隆飞行员Mark726试图精确描绘出新伊甸中每个未知星系的位置的努力尝试。尽管规模惊人，但是这些星图的准确性从未得到过统合部的官方确认。
en: Totaling over 7500 entries annotated with all manner of mathematical calculation, this datapad is packed with the results of Capsuleer Mark726's efforts to accurately depict the stellar positioning of every unidentified system in New Eden. While impressive in its scope and scale, the accuracy of this collection of stellar cartography has never been verified by the CONCORD Assembly.

zh:
黑赭石曾一度被当作一种无价值的矿石而受到忽略，直到提炼得到技术改进，最终从中提炼出了巨量的同位聚合体。黑赭石也含有数量不少的三钛合金和超新星诺克石。

这种矿石是经过压缩形成的密度更高的种类。
en:
Considered a worthless ore for years, dark ochre was ignored by most miners until improved reprocessing techniques managed to extract the isogen inside it. Dark ochre also contains useful amounts of tritanium and nocxium.

This ore is a compressed and much more dense version of the original ore.

zh:
当恒星聚变的过程发生在诸如星际冰域这种硅酸盐尘埃聚集的区域时，就会形成白釉冰。白釉冰富含氮-14以及其他一些稳定的氮同位素，因而成为某些类型控制塔维持运行的必需品。

你可以在安全等级1.0及以下的星系找到它。
en:
When star fusion processes occur near high concentrations of silicate dust, such as those found in interstellar ice fields, the substance known as White Glaze is formed. White Glaze is extremely high in nitrogen-14 and other stable nitrogen isotopes, and is thus a necessity for the sustained operation of certain kinds of control tower.

Available in 1.0 security status solar systems or lower.

zh:
因为富含四种需求量最大的矿物，灰岩几乎是人们最想获得的矿石品种。精炼这种矿石可以获得大量三钛合金和类晶体胶矿，还有一定数量的类银超金属和同位聚合体。

你可以在安全等级0.2至-1.0的星系找到它。
en:
Spodumain is amongst the most desirable ore types around, as it contains high volumes of the four most heavily demanded minerals. Huge volumes of tritanium and pyerite, as well as moderate amounts of mexallon and isogen can be obtained by refining these rocks.

Available in 0.2 to -1.0 security status solar systems.

zh:
斜长岩并不是最值钱的矿石，但它含有大量的类晶体胶矿，因此总是有稳定的需求。它也含有一些三钛合金和类银超金属。

你可以在安全等级0.8至0.3的星系找到它。
en:
Plagioclase is not amongst the most valuable ore types around, but it contains a large amount of pyerite and is thus always in constant demand. It also yields some tritanium and mexallon.

Available in 0.8 to 0.3 security status solar systems.

zh:
双多特石是价值极高的矿石，因为它富含宇宙中最稀有的两种矿物——晶状石英核岩和超噬矿。它还含有较多的类晶体胶矿。

你可以在安全等级-0.4至-1.0的星系找到它。
en:
Bistot is a very valuable ore as it holds large portions of two of the rarest minerals in the universe, zydrine and megacyte. It also contains a decent amount of pyerite.

Available in -0.4 to -1.0 security status solar systems.

zh:
杰斯贝矿石含有三种贵重矿物，因此销路一直很好。它含有大量的类银超金属以及一些超新星诺克石和晶状石英核岩。

你可以在安全等级0至-1.0的星系找到它。
en:
Jaspet has three valuable mineral types, making it easy to sell. It has a large portion of mexallon plus some nocxium and zydrine.

Available in 0 to -1.0 security status solar systems.

zh:
灼烧岩是已知宇宙中最常见的矿石之一。它含有大量的三钛合金以及一些类晶体胶矿。对刚开始采矿生涯的人来说，它是一个不错的选择。

你可以在安全等级1.0至-1.0的星系找到它。
en:
Scordite is amongst the most common ore types in the known universe. It has a large portion of tritanium plus a fair bit of pyerite. Good choice for those starting their mining careers.

Available in 1.0 to -1.0 security status solar systems.

zh:
黑赭石曾一度被当作一种无价值的矿石而受到忽略，直到提炼得到技术改进，最终从中提炼出了巨量的同位聚合体。黑赭石也含有数量不少的三钛合金和超新星诺克石。

你可以在安全等级0.4至-1.0的星系找到它。
en:
Considered a worthless ore for years, dark ochre was ignored by most miners until improved reprocessing techniques managed to extract the isogen inside it. Dark ochre also contains useful amounts of tritanium and nocxium.

Available in 0.4 to -1.0 security status solar systems.

zh:
片麻岩是一种很受欢迎的矿石，因为它富含三种广泛使用的矿物，所以提升了它的利用价值。它富含类银超金属，还含有类晶体胶矿和同位聚合体。

你可以在安全等级0.4至-1.0的星系找到它。
en:
Gneiss is a popular ore type because it holds significant volumes of three heavily used minerals, increasing its utility value. It has a quite a bit of mexallon as well as some pyerite and isogen.

Available in 0.4 to -1.0 security status solar systems.

zh:
克洛基石是一种非常重的矿石。它是宇宙中超新星诺克石含量最高的矿石，因此需求量一直居高不下。这种稀有矿石中含有贵重的晶状石英核岩和三钛合金。

你可以在安全等级-0.2至-1.0的星系找到它。
en:
Crokite is a very heavy ore that is always in high demand because it has the largest ratio of nocxium for any ore in the universe. Valuable deposits of zydrine and tritanium can also be found within this rare ore.

Available in -0.2 to -1.0 security status solar systems.

zh:
干焦岩是一种有趣的矿石，它在很多方面都很普通，只有一点除外，即经过深层核心提炼，干焦岩可以产出一小点超新星诺克石，从而使其价值突升。它还含有大量的三钛合金，以及一些类晶体胶矿和类银超金属。

你可以在安全等级0.4至-1.0的星系找到它。
en:
Pyroxeres is an interesting ore type, as it is very plain in most respects except one - deep core reprocessing yields a little bit of nocxium, increasing its value considerably. It also has a large portion of tritanium and some pyerite and mexallon.

Available in 0.4 to -1.0 security status solar systems.

zh:
它是已知世界中最稀有、最令人向往的矿石。一大块这种矿石足以让任何人瞬间从乞丐变成富翁。艾克诺岩矿石的超噬矿含量是所有矿石中最高的，同时也含有一些类银超金属和三钛合金。

你可以在安全等级-0.6至-1.0的星系找到它。
en:
One of the rarest and most sought-after ores in the known universe. A sizable nugget of this can sweep anyone from rags to riches in no time. Arkonor has the largest amount of megacyte of any ore, and also contains some mexallon and tritanium.

Available in -0.6 to -1.0 security status solar systems.

zh:
奥贝尔石虽然是一种普通的矿石，但对采矿新手来说，它仍然是一个不错的矿种，因为它含有大量的同位聚合体，以及一些三钛合金和类晶体胶矿。新手只要进行几趟开采奥贝尔石的旅程，他的资历就会显著提升。

你可以在安全等级0.6至0.3的星系找到它。
en:
Omber is a common ore that is still an excellent ore for novice miners as it has a sizeable portion of isogen, as well as some tritanium and pyerite. A few trips of mining this and a novice is quick to rise in status.

Available in 0.6 to 0.3 security status solar systems.

zh:
水硼砂是一种很常见的矿石，可以提炼出大量类银超金属。除了类银超金属，水硼砂还含有一些三钛合金和同位聚合体。

你可以在安全等级0.6至0.1的星系找到它。
en:
Kernite is a fairly common ore type that yields a large amount of mexallon. Besides mexallon the kernite also has a bit of tritanium and isogen.

Available in 0.6 to 0.1 security status solar systems.

zh:
凡晶石是已知宇宙中最常见的矿石，几乎到处都能找到。它富含人们大量使用的三钛合金，因此需求仍然十分稳定。

你可以在安全等级1.0至-1.0的星系找到它。
en:
The most common ore type in the known universe, veldspar can be found almost everywhere. It is still in constant demand as it holds a large portion of the much-used tritanium mineral.

Available in 1.0 to -1.0 security status solar systems.

zh:
由于含有大量超新星诺克石和同位聚合体，同位原矿很抢手。同位原矿同时也产出一些类晶体胶矿和晶状石英核岩。

你可以在安全等级0至-1.0的星系找到它。
en:
Hedbergite is sought after for its concentration of nocxium and isogen. However hedbergite also yields some pyerite and zydrine.

Available in 0 to -1.0 security status solar systems.

zh:
希莫非特含有少量超新星诺克石，因此找到这种矿石总是美事一桩。它并非十分罕见，即使是采矿新手也可能与它不期而遇。希莫非特也含有少量的三钛合金、同位聚合体和晶状石英核岩。

你可以在安全等级0.2至-1.0的星系找到它。
en:
With a small portion of nocxium, hemorphite is always a good find. It is common enough that even novice miners can expect to run into it. Hemorphite also has a bit of tritanium, isogen and zydrine.

Available in 0.2 to -1.0 security status solar systems.

zh:
基腹断岩是一种密度很大的矿石，必须用专业的深层核心采矿技术来开采。它含有大量特殊的矿物——莫尔石，但其他有价值的矿物含量很少。

你可以在安全等级-0.8至-1.0的星系找到它。
en:
Mercoxit is a very dense ore that must be mined using specialized deep core mining techniques. It contains massive amounts of the extraordinary morphite mineral but few other minerals of note.

Available in -0.8 to -1.0 security status solar systems.

这种屹立市场中心服务装备安装在昇威科技建筑内，能够使用逆向工程服务。



屹立专用系统采用了昇威建筑分控纳米装配装置，由集成模版软件、纳米装配阵列和许多纳米块体构成。安装在采用昇威科技建造的建筑上的专门槽位中可以制造各种服务装备、建筑装备和建筑改装件。
en:
This Standup Market Center service device can be fitted to Upwell tech structures to provide reverse engineering services.



Standup is an exclusive system that uses a Structure Autonomous Nanoassembly Device (Upwell) containing integrated template software, a nanoassembler array and sufficient nanomass to enable the construction of a variety of service modules, structure modules and structure rigs when fitted into the appropriate slots on a structure built with Upwell technology.

The Standup Warp Disruptor is a powerful propulsion jamming system that will interfere with a target ship's navigation computer, disabling warping, jumping, and the use of microwarpdrives and micro jump drives. Warp Scramblers can be fitted to Upwell tech structures.



Standup is an exclusive system that uses a Structure Autonomous Nanoassembly Device (Upwell) containing integrated template software, a nanoassembler array and sufficient nanomass to enable the construction of a variety of service modules, structure modules and structure rigs when fitted into the appropriate slots on a structure built with Upwell technology.

zh: YC113年，共和国安全局获悉艾玛帝国在建造一种能够装配战列舰级武器系统的新型战列巡洋舰。为了不在尖端科技上落于敌人之后，共和舰队委托无限创造集团建造一种足以匹敌的炮舰。这就是龙卷风级的由来。它的建造处于完全机密状态，而且创造了共和国舰船制造时间的记录，是米玛塔尔工程技术的有力证明。它的飞翼设计源自古代的行星轰炸机，能够装载多个大型加农炮，可以在维持较小信号半径的同时造成极大的杀伤力。
en: In YC113, Republic Security Services discovered that the Amarr Empire was building a new battlecruiser capable of supporting battleship-class weapons. Determined not to lose their technological edge to their adversaries, the Republic Fleet commissioned Boundless Creation to construct a gunboat to match. What they designed was the Tornado. Developed in record time and total secrecy, the Tornado is a testament to Minmatar engineering. Modeled loosely on flying-wing designs of ancient planetary bombers, the Tornado supports multiple large cannons, dealing massive damage while maintaining a small signature radius.

zh: 短管磁轨炮的工作原理与来复磁轨炮基本一致，不同点在于它们发射的是以磁场约束的亚原子微粒球体。单纯就破坏力而言，没有其他级别的炮台可以比得上短管磁轨炮。但由于炮弹约束力场会快速扩散，所以短管磁轨炮的射程是所有炮台中最短的。
en: Snubnosed railguns operate on a similar principle to rifled railguns, except that they fire a magnetically contained ball of subatomic particles. No other turret class can match the sheer destructive power of snubnosed railguns, but due to the rapid dispersion of the containment field, they also have the worst range of all turrets.

zh:

At the end of days when they descend
Watch for the coming of the Ark
For within it
Salvation is carried.

-The Scriptures, Apocalypse

This is a message from the CONCORD Clone Service Center. We have received the following clone report: your Corporation's Omega Clone service has partially expired. Please make another purchase if you wish for your Corp to enjoy the Omega Clone service again.

Thank you,
CONCORD - Clone Service Center

zh:
微型跳跃引擎是一种能够提升发动机推力，使舰船瞬间跳跃到正前方100km处的装备。跳跃后，舰船的朝向和原始速度不变。这种装备可被跃迁扰频器干扰。

微型跳跃引擎由度沃勒实验室下属的高级管道理论部门研发，其最初的构想来源于阿瓦格·扎拉希，他是一位天才科学家，曾主导了该领域的数个革命性创新成就。
en:
Micro Jump Drive is a module that can raise the thrust of the engine, jumping the ship 100km forward instantly. The ship's orientation and speed will be maintained after the jump. These modules can be disrupted by Warp Scramblers.

The Micro Jump Drive was developed by the advanced conduit theory department of Duvolle Labs. The initial proposal came from technological pioneer Avagher Xarasier, who had led many revolutionary initiatives in his field.

en: Designed for carrying out quick assaults to wreak havoc on weak spots in the enemy's defenses.

zh: 磁轨炮冲击加速器 原型
干扰对方舰船的导航计算机，防止其跃迁、跳跃、使用微型跃迁推进器或微型跳跃引擎。
en: Disrupts the target ship's navigation computer, disabling warping, jumping, microwarpdrives and micro jump drives.

zh: 磁轨炮冷凝混合管理单元 原型
反热能聚合器 原型
抗爆破屏障强化器 原型
采矿器冷凝调节器 原型
反电磁横贯舱壁 原型
弹头强化辅助系统 原型
富勒烯 中型微型跳跃引擎
一种占用导弹发射器槽位的装备，能够预备和部署炸弹。
en: A device that occupies a slot in a missile launcher, capable of preparing and deploying missiles for attack.

zh: 相对于作战，更擅长使用扫描仪探索广袤的宇宙。
en: Not designed for battle; it is more adept at sweeping through space with its scanner.

zh: 磁轨炮节能设备 原型
{item_name:_tr}提交成功。感谢你的慷慨捐赠，知识无价！
en: {item_name:_tr} submitted! Thank you for your donation. Knowledge is priceless!

zh: 在舰船上的仓库中单击物品，选择移动至，将物品移动至空间站的物品机库中。
en: Tap the item in the warehouse on the ship, select Move to, and move the item to the item hangar in the space station.

zh: 磁轨炮射速调节装置 原型
激光炮释放过滤器 原型
辅助纳米聚合器 原型
任务超时，请点击此处重新领取任务。
en: The mission has timed out. Please tap here to claim it again.

zh: 重视攻击，适合中远距离发挥火力优势。
en: Focused on offense. Good for gaining firepower advantage at medium and long range.

zh: 抗热能屏障强化器 原型
跃迁核心优化系统 原型
反动能横贯舱壁 原型
专为电子战而设计，擅长降低目标舰船的性能。
en: Designed for Electronic Warfare. Reduces the target ship's performance.

zh: 当前舰船货柜容量不足以运输任务所需物品，是否接受任务？
en: Not enough cargo capacity to transport the items needed for the mission. Accept anyway?

zh: 拥有定制的舰载电脑，可安装隐秘行动装置，从在而隐形状态下跃迁。
en: Possesses its own custom-made ship computer capable of installing a Covert Ops Cloaking Device, enabling it to warp while cloaked.

zh: 反爆破聚合器 原型
激光炮范围扩大设备 原型
在空间站的物品机库中单击物品，选择移动至，将物品移动至舰船上的仓库中。
en: Tap the item in the item hangar of the space station, select Move to, and move the item to the warehouse on the ship.

zh: 提高无人机的飞行速度，短时间内过载可以使其获得更强的效果。
en: Increases the flying speed of drones. Overheating it temporarily can amplify its effects.

zh: 三角装甲聚合器 原型
无人机射速加强装置 原型
辅助能量路由器 原型
纳米机器人加速器 原型
这是为装配扫描器和侦测探针而改进的导弹发射支架。也可以用于发射测量探针。
en: A missile launcher shell modified to fit scanners and recon probes. Can also be used to launch survey probes.

zh: 停靠至你想设置为基地的空间站，在空间站服务中找到“基地空间站”并进行设置
en: Dock to the space station you want to set as a base, go to Station Services > Base Station, and set it as your base.

zh: 研究认知活动的脑机制,包括知觉、注意、记忆、语言和思维以及智能和意识等心理功能。掌握后能提高技能训练速度。
en: The study of the neural mechanisms of cognitive activities, including perception, attention, memory, language, thinking, and mental functions such as intelligence and consciousness. Master it to improve skill training speed.

zh: 抗电磁屏障强化器 原型
造价便宜，用于训练新手飞行员，也可用于人海战术。
en: Cheap; can be used to train Novice Pilots as well as to outnumber enemies.

zh:
降低采矿激光器、气云采集器和冰矿采集器的电容消耗。

先锋网络是专门为协助工头协调开采活动而设计的采矿操作系统。

通常在同一时间只允许一个此类设备运作，不过某些高级单位允许多系统并行。

注意：只有当你被指定为舰队加成官时，舰队加成才有效。
en:
Reduces the capacitor need of mining lasers, gas cloud harvesters and ice harvesters.

Foreman Links are mining operation systems designed to assist foremen in coordinating mining activities.

While only one of these devices can normally be operated at any given time, certain advanced units allow the use of multiple systems.

Note: The Fleet Bonus is only available if you are designated as the Fleet Booster.

zh: 你无法对启用中的装备进行编组，请先停用它们。
en: You cannot group active modules, please deactivate them first.

zh: 由于你最近的攻击性行为，该星门目前拒绝你的跳跃请求。
en: The stargate denies you permission to jump for the moment due to your recent acts of aggression.

zh: 无法找到你要移动的弹药。
en: Unable to locate the charge you are trying to move.

zh: 高级旗舰级建造组件蓝图
太空舱不能安装到另一个太空舱里。
en: Capsule cannot be fitted within another capsule.

zh: 诱导力场系统干扰器蓝图
激活自毁导致安全下线中止
en: Activating self-destruct has caused safe logoff to abort

zh: 冬眠者的古老工程设备
冬眠者的古老推进装备
物品不能被放回战利品集装箱内。
en: Item cannot be moved back to a loot container.

zh: 纳米体修复粘合剂蓝图
在太空中无法对无人机挂舱进行装载或卸载。
en: You cannot load to or unload from the drone bay while in space.

zh: 无法将自己的飞船锁定为目标。
en: You cannot target your own ship.

zh: 这艘飞船不能交易或出售。飞船上还有人！
en: This ship cannot be traded or sold; there are people on board!

zh: 你只能对已经锚定在太空内的此类物品重新命名(而且你必须有相应的权限)。
en: You can only rename this type of object if it is anchored in space (and you have a right to do so).

zh: 不能将一个普朗克发生器容器放到另外一个普朗克发生器里，这会导致引力子谐波连锁反应，其后果不可预料。
en: You cannot place a Planck generator container within another Planck generator, as it will cause a graviton harmonics chain reaction whose end cannot be determined.

zh: 站住！你不能进入驾驶舱。请去乘客区。
en: Whoa there! You are not allowed in the cockpit. Please take a seat in the passenger area.

zh: 你不能在武器装填时对它们进行编组。
en: You can't group weapons while they are being loaded with charges.

zh: 移动式微型跳跃装置蓝图
无法移动那个物品，因为它已不在你可以触及的范围之内。
en: You fail to move that because it is no longer within your reach.

zh: 货柜舱是空的，没有东西可投弃。
en: The cargo hold is empty so there is nothing to jettison.

zh: 这个跳跃目标不再有效。
en: This jump destination is no longer valid

zh: 除非有一个发射器，否则无法将弹药装到那个槽里。
en: You cannot load charges into that slot unless a launcher is present.

zh: 无法那样做，因为你并未驾驶这艘飞船，而且也没有操作它的权限。
en: You cannot do that because you are not piloting the ship and do not have access to it.

zh: 该飞船或其所有者正与当地警力交战。在战斗结束前，统合部禁止你登上该飞船。
en: That ship, or its owner, are currently engaged with local police forces. CONCORD prohibits you from boarding it until the engagement is over.

zh: 没有足够的弹药来填满所有装备。有些装备只能部分装填或者放空。
en: There are not enough charges to fully load all of your modules. Some of your modules have been left partially loaded or empty.

zh: 只能自毁你自己的飞船。
en: You can only self-destruct your own ships.

zh: 要保存装配方案，你必须给它起一个名字。
en: Fittings need to have a name in order to be saved.

zh: 微型跳跃力场发生器蓝图
无法对审计安全密码集装箱进行提炼，因为它在最近三周内有一条审计记录。
en: The Audit Log Secure Container can not be reprocessed as it has a log entry that is less than three weeks old.

zh: 死亡空间监察官的建筑

en: Item specified for sell is not valid

zh: 此邮件中采用的格式过多，导致其尺寸过大。请尽量减少颜色或粗体字等格式的使用，然后再试。
en: The message contains too much text formatting and as a result it is too large. Please reduce the amount of coloring, bolding, etc. and try again.

zh: 由于前往新手训练复合体要跃迁进入，而逃生舱不符合该跃迁系统的要求。去弄一艘真正的飞船，然后重试。
en: Making your way to the tutorial dungeon requires you be warped there, and capsules just aren't fitted with the systems required for this to happen. Get a real ship and then try again.

zh: 这艘飞船上已有一名飞行员。
en: This ship already has a pilot.

zh: 你不能那样航行到选中物体处，因为距离太远。试试朝着它的方向移动。
en: You cannot navigate that way with the selected object as it is too far away. Try moving in its direction instead.

zh: 锁定尝试失败，因为目标物体已经不存在。
en: Targeting attempt failed as the designated object is no longer present.

zh: 一种配合大型发射架使用，载荷量适中的基础型导弹。使用了如今已经不合标准的牛眼制导系统。
en: A very basic missile for large launchers with reasonable payload. Utilizes the now substandard technology of bulls-eye guidance systems.

zh: 你的装备安装是不正确的。很有可能你的能量槽布局发生了变化，其中某个装备所占用的能量槽已经不再存在。尝试卸载所有的装备并重新安装一次。
en: Your modules are incorrectly fitted. Possibly your slot layout has changed and a module is in a slot that is no longer valid. Try unfitting your modules and fit them again.
You cannot do that while docking.

zh: 远程船体维修装置蓝图
无人机操控范围增强单元
你已经获得了该涂装的无限期使用许可。
en: You already have permanent license for this SKIN.

zh: 你无法将东西放入该货柜集装箱中，因为它正在发生内向爆炸。
en: You are unable to put anything in the cargo container because it is imploding.

zh: 你正处于跳跃状态，其所造成的干扰阻止你的系统在此时正常运作。
en: Interference from the jump you are doing is preventing your systems from functioning at this time.

zh: 感应抑阻波发射台蓝图
移动式扫描抑制装置蓝图
无法查看箱子中的物品
死亡空间监视者的物品
你不能这样做，因为统合部现在仅允许帝国内获得授权的代理人在受统合部保护的空间中发射、锚定或者控制那种类型的装置。
en: You cannot do that as CONCORD currently restricts the launching, anchoring or control of that type of equipment within CONCORD-protected space to authorized agents of the empires.

zh: 该物品不是你的，不能拿
en: The item is not yours to take

zh: 只有以下级别的飞船适合进入舰船维护舱：采矿驳船、采掘者、工业舰、运输舰和采矿护卫舰。
en: Only ships of the following classes can fit inside the ship maintenance bay: Mining Barges, Exhumers, Industrials, Transports and Mining Frigates.

zh: 你好像没有飞船点火开关所需的合适钥匙。也许你把它忘在另一件外套里了？
en: You don't seem to have the right keys for the ship's ignition switch. Perhaps you left them in your other jacket?

zh: 你只能在太空中组装位于你货柜舱中的船只。
en: You can only assemble ships in space if they are inside your cargo hold.
The pilot seat is already taken.

zh: 你还不能从船里弹射出来，因为你最近激活过武器系统。
en: You cannot eject from your ship at this time due to the recent activation of your weapon systems.

zh: 由于你的舰船隐身，因此你不能锁定。
en: Your targeting attempt fails because your ship is cloaked.

zh: 你的跃迁受到了干扰，只能移动很小一段距离。
en: Something is affecting your warp, causing your warp distance to be too short.

zh: 那个技能已在队列中，不能再添加。
en: You cannot add that skill to the queue as it appears to already be present.

zh: 你不能在装备之间移动装药。请先把装药移动到你的货柜舱，或者机库再从那里移动到另外的装备。
en: You cannot move charges between modules. move it first to your cargo hold or hangar and from there to your other module.

zh: 你近期的安全等级变化可能会导致你需要上交比预期更多的铭牌。请再试一次。
en: Recent change in security status would have caused more tags to be consumed than you agreed to. Please try again.

zh: 你不能将物品放入该货柜，因为它并非你所有，你所在的军团和舰队也未被授权访问。
en: You cannot put items into that container because it does not belong to you, and you are not a member of the fleet or corporation registered for access.

zh: 冬眠者的古老电子装备
将装有改装件的船只拆卸装箱？
你没有技能点可供分配。
en: You do not have any unallocated skill points.

zh: 该技能不能排在技能队列里的这个位置
en: This position in the training queue is invalid for this skill

zh: 你不能解散处于激活状态的装备编组，请先关闭这些设备。
en: You cannot ungroup active modules, please deactivate them first.

zh: 市场此时尚未准备就绪。请稍后再试。
en: The Market is not ready at the moment. Please try again later.

zh: 只有在空间站机库里才能组装飞船
en: Ships can only be assembled in station hangars

zh: 超级克尔诱导纳米涂层
你不能启用该装备，因为它所处的槽位已经不存在于这艘船上。该装备应当尽快被卸载。
en: You cannot bring this module online because it is located in a slot that no longer exists on this ship. The module should be unfitted as soon as possible.

zh: 投弃货物集装箱导致安全下线中止
en: Jettisoning cargo has caused safe logoff to abort

zh: 远程护盾回充增量器蓝图

en: You cannot move items into that location.

zh: 你已经在尝试安全下线。
en: You are already trying to log off safely.

zh: 由于该人物正驾驶载有乘客的飞船，你目前无法销毁他。解决乘客问题，然后重试。
en: You cannot terminate this character at the moment as they are piloting a ship that has passengers. Get rid of the passengers and then try again.

zh: 在太空中发射或部署物体导致安全下线中止
en: Launching or deploying object into space has caused safe logoff to abort

zh: 无法那样做，因为目前在帝国辖区内发射、锚定或控制这种类型的物体是违反法律的。
en: You cannot do that because it is currently against empire policy to launch, anchor or control objects of that type within their jurisdictions.

zh: 你不能对那种类型的物体进行重命名。
en: You can't rename that type of object.

zh: 由于你最近的攻击性行为，空间站目前拒绝你的停靠请求。
en: The station denies you permission to dock for the moment due to your recent acts of aggression.

zh: 你不能那样做，因为你船上的某个舱室超载了。
en: You cannot do that because you have somehow overloaded one of the cargo compartments in your ship.

zh: 无法安装这些弹药，因为在接到相关请求后，它们已经被移动。
en: You cannot fit the charges as they have been touched since the request was made to do so.
The item is no longer within your reach.

zh: 激活装备导致安全下线中止
en: Activating a module caused safe logoff to be aborted

zh: 这个技能正在训练中。请暂停训练后再次尝试。
en: This skill is currently in training. Pause your skill training and try again.

zh: 你正处于隐形状态，其所造成的干扰阻止你的系统在此时正常运作。
en: Interference from the cloaking you are doing is preventing your systems from functioning at this time.

zh: 正将航向设置为停靠区域

en: Not all of the items were moved.

zh: 你不能将物品放入该货柜，因为它并非你所有。
en: You cannot put items into that container because it does not belong to you.

zh: 请求的任务需要键入通用密码。
en: The requested task requires the general password to have been entered.
This bookmark does not belong to you

zh: 那个物品不是一个建筑。
en: That item is not a structure.

zh: 那艘飞船受损严重，无法登船。不过，它竟然没有四分五裂。
en: That ship is too damaged to board. Somehow it is still holding together though.

zh: 无法从那个位置移走物品。
en: You cannot remove items from that location.

zh: 你有处于激活中的装备
无法将物品移入一个正在交易中的货柜。
en: Item cannot be moved to a container being traded.

zh: 无法将所有物品拆卸装箱
由于舰船正在进行跳跃，因此你不能锁定。
en: Your targeting attempt fails because your ship is jumping.

zh: 你不能在如下情形改变舰船外观：隐形、锁定目标，或处在诱导力场中、舰船模式转换中等禁用效果中。
en: You cannot change your ships appearance while cloaked, having a target locked, or under a disabling effect such as cynosural fields or being in ship transforming modes.

zh: 由于未知技术原因，目前无法销毁人物。
en: The character cannot be terminated at the moment due to an unknown technical reason.

zh: 能量不足，不能直接跃迁到目的地，将跃迁到能量所允许的最大距离处。
en: There is insufficient power to warp all the way to the target, proceeding to warp as far as power permits.

zh: 你试图发射的对象不存在。
en: The object you are trying to launch from is not present.

zh: 你身处逃生舱中，逃生舱不具备可以使你移动物品的设施。
en: You are in a capsule, which does not have the facilities to allow you to move items.
You cannot do that while cloaked.

zh: 你参与对一个飞行员的攻击导致安全下线中止
en: Your involvement in aggression towards another Capsuleer caused safe logoff to abort

zh: 无法在这里激活该装备，因为自然现象干扰其正常运作。
en: You cannot activate this module here because natural phenomena are disrupting its operation.

zh: 隐形时无法锁定任何目标。
en: You cannot target anything while you are cloaked.

zh: 敌军干扰了提炼服务，使其不能正常工作了。空间站所属联盟的成员可以使用己方的侵噬链接重新启用该服务。
en: Hostile Capsuleers have interfered with the Reprocessing service, disrupting normal operation. Members of the alliance that control this station can re-enable the service using their own Entosis Links.

zh: 这个坚固的逃生舱是你在茫茫太空中仅存的避风港，想从这里弹射出去非但不明智，而且还会死翘翘。所以逃生舱内是不配备弹射器的。很抱歉。
en: Seeing as how this solitary capsule is your only remaining sanctuary from the silent oblivion of space, attempting to eject from its warm embrace is not only unwise, but also invariably fatal. For this reason, explosive pilot-ejection bolts are not standard equipment on starship capsules. So sorry.

zh: 冬眠者的古老攻击装备
跃迁扰频波发射台蓝图
你驾驶的飞船不能进行锁定。
en: The ship you are piloting cannot lock.

zh: 你不能销毁该物品，因为它已被锁定。
en: You cannot trash this item because it is locked.

zh: 敌军干扰了维修服务，使其不能正常工作了。空间站所属联盟的成员可以使用己方的侵噬链接重新启用该服务。
en: Hostile Capsuleers have interfered with the Repair service, disrupting normal operation. Members of the alliance that control this station can re-enable the service using their own Entosis Links.

zh: 这个物品不能放入货柜集装箱中。
en: This item cannot be put into cargo containers.

zh: 飞船跃迁时无法执行该操作。
en: You cannot do that while warping.

zh: 诱导力场发生阵列蓝图

en: The training queue has not been uploaded yet
There is already something in that location.

zh: 舰船正在向一个物体接近、环绕或对其保持距离
en: Ship was approaching, orbiting or keeping an object at range

zh: 你已不再是这个建筑的控制者。
en: You have been removed as the controller of this structure.

zh: 辅助远程护盾回充增量器
被别人锁定导致安全下线中止
en: Someone target locking your ship caused safe logoff to abort

zh: 操作失败，因为你的飞船在运送中。
en: An operation failed because your ship is in transit.

zh: 你无法递送所有物品，因为这里已经有太多东西了。
en: You can't deliver everything as there are simply too many items there already.

zh: 你最近参与了对一个飞行员的攻击
en: You have recently been involved in aggression towards another Capsuleer

zh: 你的舰船处于隐身状态

en: Ship in the process of warping

zh: 该装备已经在进行某种装配操作。请等待该操作结束再重新尝试。
en: That module is already involved in some kind of fitting operation. Please wait until it has finished before trying again.

zh: 邮件系统的处理能力已饱和。不要着急，请慢点儿。
en: The mail system is overflowing with your request. Please take it easy.

zh: 你没有执行这个命令的权限。
en: You do not have permission to execute that command.

zh: 由于跃迁引擎无法瞄准选定的物体，所以你不能将船头转向该物体，也不能跃迁至那里。
en: You are unable to align or warp to the selected object because your warp drive is unable to lock onto it.

zh: 无法激活该装备，因为目标已不存在。
en: You cannot activate that module as the target is no longer present.

zh: 装备仍处于激活状态时无法被移除。
en: You cannot remove a module while it is still activated.

zh: 你不能在异地查看此带密码的箱子里的物品。
en: You cannot remotely view the contents of this password protected container.

zh: 你要保存的装配方案不包含任何内容。
en: The fitting you're trying to save contains no hardware information to save.

zh: 超大型巡航导弹发射器
当你被别人锁定时，无法将飞船隐形。
en: You cannot cloak your ship as you are being targeted by someone.

zh: 只能在新手起步的星系访问培训死亡复合体。返回你初次进入游戏时的星系，然后重试。
en: The tutorial dungeons are only available in starting solar systems. Return to the solar system you entered the game into and try again there.

zh: 你必须先放弃对建筑的控制，然后才能重新掌控你的舰船。
en: You must relinquish control of the structure first in order regain control of your ship.

zh: 当你在控制其他物体时，无法激活任何装备。
en: You are unable to activate any modules while you are controlling some other objects.

zh: 该位置正有物品被添加或移除。请等待该操作结束再重新尝试。
en: There is already something being added to or removed from that location. Please wait until it has finished before trying again.

zh: 装甲抗性变换增强器蓝图
无法将所有指定物品拆卸装箱，请查看余下的物品并重试。
en: We were unable to repackage all the requested items, please review the remaining items and try again.

zh: 有外部因素禁止你的跃迁引擎执行该指令。
en: External factors are preventing your warp and/or jump drive from responding to this command.

zh: 你不能堆叠不同类型的物品。
en: You cannot stack things of different types.

zh: 有外部因素阻止你停靠。
en: External factors are preventing you from docking.

zh: 你在太空里有联络中的无人机
en: You have connected drones in space

zh: 客户端的本地进程信息损坏，这可能是一次断线后的清理失败引起的。在这种状态下连接服务器可能会让您的游戏运行不畅。请重新启动客户端再登录。
en: The client's local session information is corrupt, probably as a result of failed cleanup during a disconnect. Connecting to the server in this state could lead to a rather unpleasant game experience. Please restart the client prior to logging in.

zh: 无法进站停靠，因为你处于隐形状态。
en: You fail to dock because you are cloaked.

zh: 无法把你的太空舱储存在那里，因为这样做没有实际意义。
en: You cannot store your capsule there because it is not practical.

zh: 你无法递送这件物品，因为它不属于你的军团。请确定你要递送的物品位于军团机库中。
en: You cannot deliver this item as it does not belong to your corporation. Make sure the items you are delivering are in a corporation hangar.

zh: 移动式诱导抑制装置蓝图
只有无人机可以放在飞船的无人机挂舱内。
en: Only drones may be placed in the ship's drone bay.
Skill levels need to be trained in the right order

zh: 你的飞船没有装备跳跃引擎技术
en: Your ship is not equipped with jump drive technology

zh: 这类飞船没有投弃通道。
en: A ship of this type doesn't have a jettison tube.

zh: 无法在此星域市场登记处找到指定订单
en: The specified order could not be found in this region's market registry

zh: 无法部分维修设备。如果你想使用该设备，那你必须完全修复它。
en: Modules can not be partially repaired. If you want to use this module you have to repair it completely.

zh: 不能在任务包裹里那样做。
en: Can't do that in a mission package.

zh: 货柜不能在飞船内装配。
en: Containers cannot be assembled inside a ship.

zh: 该人物被转移到另一个帐号，无法销毁。
en: This character is being transferred to another account and cannot be terminated

zh: 你不能对此物品执行这项操作。
en: Your are not allowed to perform this operation on this item

zh: 这种级别飞船的货舱只能装载这类集装箱(经打包后)。
en: The cargo of this class of ship can only carry a container of this type if it is packaged.

zh: 加入一支舰队导致安全下线中止
en: Joining a fleet cause the safe logoff to abort.

zh: 飞船正在重新调整磁场，请稍候。
en: Your ship is realigning its magnetic field, please wait a moment.

zh: 由于当前有武器计时器存在，不能在太空中重新装配。
en: Cannot refit in space due to active Weapons Timer.

zh: 你想要装填弹药的装备已经不存在了。
en: The module you tried to load with charges is no longer present.

zh: 由于以下原因无法安全下线：
en: Unable to log off safely for the following reasons:

zh: 你正处于跃迁状态，其所产生的干扰阻止了你的系统正常运作。
en: Interference from your warp prevents your systems from functioning at this time.

zh: 由于受到干扰，无法对目标激活该装备以进行协助。
en: You cannot activate that module on the target as interference prevents assistance from being given to them.

zh: 有些装备在离站时未能启动。尝试停用和启用一下你的装备，然后再次离站。
en: Some of your modules failed to be onlined when undocking. Try onlining and offlining your modules and try undocking again.

zh: 你的飞船位置已改变，所以无论你曾试图进行什么操作，都将失败。
en: Your ship is no longer in the same location, so whatever it was you were trying to do fails.

zh: 你不能解散正在装填弹药的武器编组。
en: You can't ungroup weapons while they are being loaded with charges.

zh: 敌军干扰了装配服务，使其不能正常工作了。空间站所属联盟的成员可以使用己方的侵噬链接重新启用该服务。
en: Hostile Capsuleers have interfered with the Fitting service, disrupting normal operation. Members of the alliance that control this station can re-enable the service using their own Entosis Links.
You cannot warp while you are cloaked.

zh: 目标锁定扰断装置蓝图
你不能切分该堆叠，因为它不在你的军团机库中。
en: You cannot split this stack as it is not in your corporation hangar.

zh: 安装了一个以上的隐形装备时，你的飞船无法隐形。这种设备会相互干扰，影响正常运行。
en: You cannot cloak your ship with more than one cloaking device installed. The interference from one device being installed prevents any other from working.

zh: 由于附近没有可用设施，你无法在太空内装配舰船。
en: You cannot assemble ships in space while there are no usable facilities nearby.

zh: 你已经有一个使用此名称的标签。
en: You already have a label with this name.

zh: 你现在不能启用任何装备。
en: You are unable to activate any modules at this time.

zh: 由于受到干扰，无法对目标激活这种类型的装备。
en: You cannot activate that module on the target as interference prevents modules of that type from being used on them.

zh: 目前无法执行该操作，因为你的系统刚使用过隐形装备，正在进行重新校准。
en: You cannot perform that action at this time as your systems are still recalibrating after the use of a cloaking device.

zh: 由于你的舰船正欲进入虫洞，因此其无法进行锁定。
en: Your targeting attempt fails because your ship is entering a wormhole.

zh: 无法把装备安装到逃生舱。它是逃命用的飞行器，没有任何容纳装备的空间或设施。
en: You cannot fit modules to a capsule. It is a survival craft that does not have the space or facilities to take advantage of fittings.

zh: 远程电容传输装置蓝图
无法登上一艘正被锁定的无人舰船。
en: You cannot board a ship that does not belong to you while it is being targeted.

zh: 你还不能存放你的舰船，因为你最近激活过武器系统。
en: You cannot store your ship at this time due to the recent activation of your weapon systems.

zh: 你驾驶的飞船没有安装锁定系统。
en: The ship you are piloting does not have targeting systems installed.

zh: 你不能驾驶你当前激活的飞船进入别人的机库。如果你有其他飞船，那么激活它后再重试。如果你没有，那就去弄一艘，激活它后再重试。
en: You can't fly your active ship into someone else's hangar. If you have another ship then activate the other ship, and try again. If you do not have another ship then get one and activate that ship and try again.

zh: 该人不是你舰队的成员或者不在这个星系。
en: This person is either not a member of your fleet or not present in this solar system.

zh: 你不能破坏那种类型的已装配物品。
en: You cannot destroy that type of fitted item.

zh: 无法跳跃，因为你处于隐形状态。
en: You fail to jump because you are cloaked.

zh: 你不能这样做，因为最近对这个建筑的攻击行为禁用了它的一些服务。
en: You cannot do that because recent aggression to this structure has disabled some of its services.

zh: 由于有一个或多个装备处于下线状态，你无法激活这个编组。请先在装配窗口中启用所有的装备。
en: You cannot activate this group because one or more of its modules are offline. Please use the fitting window to turn all individual modules online first.

zh: 出于某种未知原因，你的人物一直无法在服务器上加载。请联系我们的客户支持人员，我们会帮助查明该问题是否由服务器端引起。我们对由此带来的不便深表歉意。
en: For some reason, your character has repeatedly failed loading on the server. Please file a Support Ticket so that Customer Support can investigate the matter and see whether the issue lies with the game server. Apologies for the inconvenience.

zh: 该空间站没有军团办公室。
en: This station does not have a corporation office.

zh: 空间中可被击毁的代理人
你的飞船被困住了，服务器认为它不在机库里。请联系客服解决此问题。
en: Your ship is stuck, as server does not think that it is in a hangar. Please contact customer support to resolve this problem.

zh: 只能登上位于登机门的飞船。
en: Only ships at boarding gates can be boarded.

zh: 你不能那样做，因为建筑目前已损坏。
en: You cannot do that because the structure is currently damaged.

zh: 你舰船的槽位设计已发生改变，有些原先装配在上的装备已被移入你的机库里。
en: The slot layout of your ship has changed and as a result of that you can no longer fit all the modules you had fitted. Some modules have been removed and placed in your hangar.

zh: 由于选定的技能不在队列中，所以该操作无法进行。请先关闭队列窗口然后再将其打开进行刷新。
en: That operation cannot be performed, as the selected skill is not actually present in the queue. Please close and reopen the training queue window to refresh it.

zh: 在太空中无法对铁骑舰载机挂舱进行装载或卸载。
en: You cannot load to or unload from the fighter bay while in space.

zh: 跳跃时不能操纵飞船航向
敌军干扰了医疗服务，使其不能正常工作了。空间站所属联盟的成员可以使用己方的侵噬链接重新启用该服务。
en: Hostile Capsuleers have interfered with the Medical service, disrupting normal operation. Members of the alliance that control this station can re-enable the service using their own Entosis Links.

zh: 你因为最近的攻击行为而无法跳跃和停靠
en: You are currently locked from jumping and docking due to recent aggressive activities

zh: 舰船离开太空导致安全下线中止
en: Your ship has left space causing safe logoff to abort

zh: 你的舰船正在靠站进程中
en: Your ship is in the progress of docking to a station

zh: 你没有获得该涂装的使用许可。
en: You do not have an active license for that SKIN.

zh: 你的舰船从太空中离开导致安全下线中止
en: Your ship being remove from space caused safe logoff to abort

zh: 该堆叠中物品数量不足，无法完成操作。
en: There are not enough items in that stack to complete this operation.

zh: 该装备损坏过度，无法启用。
en: The module is too damaged to be onlined

zh: 你不能在启动微型跳跃引擎的情况下那样做。
en: You can't do that while Micro Jump Drive is activating.

zh: 经纪人没有发现与你的订单相匹配的条目。可能别人已抢先一步，或者你的报价已经过期。
en: Broker found no match for your order. Others might have been before you, or your quotes might be outdated.

zh: 那些物品无法合并，因为它们属于不同种类。
en: Those items cannot be merged because they are not of the same type.

zh: 飞船上没有空余的槽位。要先拆下一些设备。
en: There are no free slots on the ship. Unfit some modules first.

zh: 客户端正在连接至服务器(无论登录进程条显示与否)。请稍等。
en: The client is already connecting to the server (whether or not the login progress bar is showing). Please wait.

zh: 锁定目标导致安全下线中止
en: Acquiring a target lock caused safe logoff to abort
The specified item is in the trash.

zh: 你选择的人物名字不符合规定
en: The name you have selected for your character is not valid

zh: 冬眠者的古老防御装备
飞船进行星门跳跃时无法执行该操作。
en: You cannot do that while your ship is engaging in a stargate jump.

zh: 停用的装备不能并组，请先启用它们。
en: You cannot group offline modules, please online them first.

zh: 这个名字可能含有非法字符、已被使用或禁止使用。
en: The name contains either illegal characters, is already taken or is not allowed.

zh: 你的舰船正在进行自毁
en: You are ship is currently self-destructing

zh: 你驾驶这艘船的时候从事了非法活动。为了防止你销毁证据，统合部禁止你目前更改舰船。
en: You have been involved in illegal activity whilst piloting this ship. CONCORD prohibits you from destroying evidence by changing ships at this time.

zh: 由于你目前是统合部或玩家的通缉对象，你不能存放你的舰船。
en: You cannot store your ship as you are currently a criminal on the run from Concord or are trying to escape player retribution.

zh: 当你飞船上有一个或更多装备处于超载状态时，你不能维修装备
en: You can not repair module while one or more modules on your ship are overloaded

zh: 你已经或正在锁定一个目标
en: You have a target lock or are in the process of acquiring one.

zh: 飞船进站时不能那样做。
en: You cannot do that while your ship is docking.

zh: 双生 大型炮台扫射设备
招募广告的语言偏好不能为空
en: Recruitment Ad language preference cannot be empty

zh: 皮特X 大型护盾力场模块蓝图
en: Pith X-Type Large Shield Module Blueprint

zh: 烟幕 隐秘行动装置蓝图
联邦海军 战锤蓝图
纪律 中型导弹发射器
大型岗哨无人机，以热能伤害著称。
en: Large Sentry Drone, dealing mainly thermal damage.

zh: 萨沙爱国者 大型群体电容传输器
en: True Sansha Large Group Capacitor Transmitter

zh: 该建筑没有工业制造服务
en: This structure does not provide a Construction Manufacture service

en: Republic Fleet Small Shield Field Module Blueprint
You are already in a Corporation

MK5 小型护盾力场模块蓝图

en: You cannot apply to join your own Corporation

希望你抓紧时间，展开搜救行动。
en: I hope you hurry up and begin a search and rescue operation.

en: Pith C-Type Large Shield Field Module Blueprint

搜索的军团名字不能为空
en: Corporation Name search field cannot be empty

zh: 熔炉 中型电容注电器
卫星科技 隐秘行动装置蓝图
en: Moon Tech Covert Ops Cloaking Device Blueprint

zh: 吉斯迪伊A 小型护盾力场模块蓝图
en: Gistii A-Type Small Shield Field Module Blueprint

静电 灵敏度抑制发射器
输入你的联盟申请内容
en: Please enter the content of your application to join the alliance

血脉 中型装甲连接模块

en: Moon Large Armor Link Module Blueprint

MK7 大型群体护盾回充增量器蓝图
en: MK7 Large Group Shield Booster  Blueprint

zh: MK9 大型群体护盾回充增量器蓝图
en: MK9 Large Group Shield Booster  Blueprint

zh: 火炬 游击作战网络
您确认将({})移入这个军团欧米伽位置么？
en: Are you sure you want to move ({}) to this Corporation's Omega slot?

zh: 血脉 小型装甲连接模块
MK5 中型装甲连接模块蓝图
en: MK5 Medium Armor Link Module Blueprint

en: MK7 Medium Armor Link Module Blueprint

zh: MK9 中型装甲连接模块蓝图
en: MK9 Medium Armor Link Module Blueprint

zh: 加达里海军 大型护盾力场模块蓝图
en: Caldari Navy Large Shield Field Module Blueprint

zh: 工程师 大型群体装甲维修器蓝图
不单单是你发现的这个母巢，其他飞行员发现的母巢同样有一样的信息碎片……
en: Not just in the hive you found. Identical Info Shards were found in other hives by pilots...

zh: 军团可用数量最多保存{max_month_card}个，请先使用后再增加。
en: A Corporation's number of available Omega Clones can't exceed {max_month_card}. Please use some before adding more.

zh: 迅捷 导弹制导计算机
处于增强模式，不能设置结构增强解除时间
en: Structure is in reinforced. Unable to set Structure Reinforcement Exit Time.

zh: 森塔姆C 大型群体电容传输器蓝图
en: Centum C-Type Large Group Capacitor Transmitter  Blueprint

zh: 皮希伊B 小型护盾力场模块蓝图
en: Pithi B-Type Small Shield Field Module Blueprint

zh: {structureName}的这项服务对你不可用。请联系空间站的拥有者寻求帮助
en: This service of {structureName} is unavailable to you. Please contact the station owner for assistance.

zh: 空间站是相对安全的地方，必要时能救你一命。同时，装甲受损的舰船也可以在空间站内进行修复。
en: Stations are relatively safe, and can save your life during an emergency. You can repair ships with damaged armor in stations.

zh: 加达里海军 中型护盾力场模块蓝图
en: Caldari Navy Medium Shield Field Module Blueprint

en: Gistii C-Type Small Shield Field Module Blueprint

主天使 大型群体护盾回充增量器蓝图
en: Domination Large Group Shield Booster Blueprint

zh: 旗手 中型群体护盾回充增量器蓝图
卫星科技 大黄蜂蓝图
共和舰队 大型群体护盾回充增量器
en: Republic Fleet Large Group Shield Booster
This position cannot be set to inactive

zh: 您好，飞行员，这里是卢克，来自视角传媒。
en: Hi, pilot. This is Luke from the Scope.

zh: 大型攻击无人机，以爆炸伤害著称。
en: Large Attack Drone, dealing mainly explosive damage.

zh: 明镜 中型护盾力场模块
飞行员，你已掌握控制视角的基本操作。根据所处环境调整合适的视角，可以极大提高你的生存能力。
en: You have mastered the basic controls of operating the camera. Adjusting your camera based on your environment can greatly increase your chances of survival.

zh: 飞行员，现在请打开军团界面。
en: Now open the Corporation page, pilot.

zh: 航行至星门处进行跳跃
en: Travel to the Stargate to jump

zh: 卫星科技 战锤蓝图
富勒烯 监护官蓝图
我们很少会收到统合部的公开委托，但是这一次似乎他们真的遇到了棘手的问题。
en: It's very rare for CONCORD to publicly reach out to us for help. Perhaps they really have a tough situation on their hands this time.

zh: 富勒烯 大型群体装甲维修器蓝图
en: Fullerene Large Group Armor Repairer  Blueprint

zh: 卫星科技 隐形装置蓝图
科波斯A 大型装甲连接模块蓝图

en: A tourist shuttle was attacked by rogue drones. Its whereabouts are unknown.

en: MK5 Covert Ops Cloaking Device Blueprint

该设施包含一个大型流体路由器阵列。通过向统合部网络建立一条替代数据路径，主权宣布设施赋予其所有者管理控制该设施所处星系的实际权力。主权宣布设施（TCU）代表该联盟向全宇宙宣布，将此星系完全纳入自己控制之下。至于其他联盟是否认同这种声明就是另一回事了。

要为你的联盟夺取一个无主权星系，首先在行星旁部署一个主权宣布设施，然后对它使用侵噬链接，直到取得完全控制。

你必须是某个克隆飞行员联盟的一员才能部署或夺取一座主权宣布设施。每个星系中只能部署一个主权宣布设施。主权宣布设施不能被部署在NPC势力控制的星系中，也不能被部署在虫洞空间中。

zh: 理性思维社团(真理会)至今已有三百多年的历史，由一位名叫艾尔·勒布朗的朱庇特人建立，他一直追寻精神启迪。从那时起，社团以很多面貌存在于世——从隐士聚集的宗教派系，到玩弄权力游戏的政治机构。如今，理性思维社团主要以他们的学术成果而闻名，他们的学校被公认为是新伊甸里最好的，有钱有势的父母们争相要将他们的孩子送来读书。不过即使支付高额费用也未必能被录取，因为理性思维社团有自己的筛选流程，而且这种筛选在外界看来毫无规律可循。理性思维社团活跃于偏僻区域，在那里他们建立起称为“基兹”的要塞，但不是每个“基兹”都被用作学校——有些仍然是探索精神启迪或科学研究的专门机构。

zh: 统合部安全分类：欧米伽银（失效）  埃利亚巡逻队：被占据的星域报告，新纪元119年5月10日  自代号：埃利亚调查结束已过去了十年，被占据的星域的现状仍不乐观。自由无人机的侵袭由于克隆飞行员的活动而保持着一种微妙的平衡，但这种平衡随时可能被打破，被占据星域的母巢意识的威胁性仍然巨大。
en: CONCORD security classification: Omega Silver (expired) Elia Patrol: reports from the occupied Region: YC5/10/119. Ten years have passed since the last investigation in Elia, and we are still not optimistic about the occupied regions. The level of Rogue Drone invasion is kept at a delicate balance by the Capsuleers. However, the scales could be tipped at any time by the great threat of the hive mind in this occupied region.

zh: 探知者 无人机导航电脑

卡尼迪王国也被称作黑暗艾玛，是在几个世纪前选举最后一任艾玛皇帝时建立的。那时的卡尼迪是其中一位皇室继承人，依据传统，没有继承皇位的他应该自尽。但卡尼迪拒绝那么做，并将自己广阔的领土割裂出艾玛帝国。艾玛为此进行了报复性的军事行动，然而只征服了一些力量薄弱的卡尼迪边境地区。卡尼迪王国依然保留着许多艾玛社会的传统，但同时也融入了加达里的一些习俗。在众多来卡尼迪的游客眼中，卡尼迪王国是艾玛帝国和加达里合众国的超现实主义融合。
en: The Khanid Kingdom, also known as the Dark Amarr, was founded a few centuries ago when the last Amarr Emperor was chosen and after Garkeh Khanid, one of the royal heirs at the time, refused to kill himself after failing to become Emperor as he should have done, in accordance with tradition. Refusing suicide, he instead split his vast domains from the Amarr Empire. This open rebellion against which the Empire retaliated, but was only able to conquer some of the vulnerable outer regions from Khanid territory. The Kingdom still upholds many of the traditions of Amarr society, but has also wholeheartedly embraced the customs of others, mainly the Caldari. Many visitors to the Kingdom feel like it is a surreal mix between the Amarr and Caldari empires.

zh: 火炬 护盾作战网络
AC故事线 长尾鲛级舰队型⁵
成立于新伊甸纪元105年初艾玛继承审判仪式，一些商业安全委员会的企业家意识到组织周到的公开赛非常受飞行员欢迎，独立竞技委员会随即从一个兴趣项目小组一跃成为统合部进行各种竞技项目的举办方。  由于自身高超的工程师团队技能和造船艺术造诣，独立竞技委员会针对最受欢迎的舰船型号定制出小体积版本作为奖励发放，在竞赛组织、资金赞助和竞赛裁决等方面保持了一贯的高水准。
en: Formed in YC105 in the wake of the Amarr Succession Trials when a group of entrepreneurs at the Secure Commerce Commission realized how popular structured combat tournaments were among Capsuleers, the Independent Gaming Commission has grown from a small passion project into the CONCORD Assembly's regulatory body for all competitive sports. With its own highly skilled team of engineers and state-of-the-art shipyards that produce bespoke streamlined versions of the most popular hulls in the cluster as prizes, the IGC maintains a healthy bottom line from event organization, sponsorship and adjudication across the cluster.

zh: 不能超过4个字母或数字
在欧莎等八个星域的星门失效后，许多散落在新伊甸各处的无人机母巢不约而同地陷入沉寂。但是，统合部安全防御专家在最近的调查研究中发现，一些曾经已经被清除干净的无人机母巢，在最近又开始变得活跃。虽然这只是个别现象，但是它对整个地区的太空航行安全是一个非常大的潜在威胁。
en: After the stargates to eight regions, including Oasa, failed, many rogue drone hives in different corners of New Eden all fell silent simultaneously. However, according to a recent investigation conducted by CONCORD's security and defense experts, some previously cleared-out drone hives are starting to show signs of activity. Although there are few such cases, this phenomenon still poses great potential threat to the security of space travel in the region.

zh: 联合矿业中型受损结构
一种非常珍贵的消耗型植入芯片，使用后，可直接学会新技能，并且其搭载的自适应神经感应系统能够根据已经掌握的技能情况而返还一定技能点。
en: Extremely valuable consumer-model implantable chip. You can use it to directly master new skills, and its adaptive neurosensory system can refund you a certain amount of skill points according to how much of that skill you already learned.

zh: 梅京二哈的狞獾级海军型
卫星科技 宏粒子稳定器
创建公开物品交换合同时，你至少要求索求1000星币或者一些物品做为交换，否则别人会把你的东西偷走!
en: When creating a public Item Exchange contract, you need to request 1000 ISK or some items in exchange, or the other party might steal your items!

zh: 建造框架，用来生产部署逆向工程实验室的设施；逆向工程实验室可以提高此星系的逆向工程完成指标。
en: Build Frame: A facility used to produce and deploy Experimental Laboratories, which increase the Reverse Engineering metrics of a system.

zh: 你最多可以关注5名成员
en: You can follow up to 5 members.
Auction starting price is too low.

zh: 建造框架，这是贸易中心提供防御的设施，提高市场贸易中心的防御指标。
en: Build Frame: A facility that provides defense to Trading Centers, increasing their defense metrics.

zh: 这个残破的设备在EVE之门附近大量存在，姐妹会最先公布其发现数据；此设备与殷郡有关，据可靠的人士解释，这个设备并非是推进型的引擎，而是可以使用力场技术构筑一个引力强劲的奇点扭曲空间，然后利用高度扭曲的空间运送物资。现在新伊甸大部分科研机构都拿到了这个设备，相信不久可以逆向出相关的产品。某科研机构匿名专家说：请慎重同时启动过多的设备，可能导致空间过度扭曲而产生巨大的破坏力。
en: This type of broken device exists in large quantities near the EVE Gate. The Sisters of Eve were the first to publicize data regarding its discovery. The device has some connection with the Yan-Jung. According to a trustworthy source, this device is not a propulsion engine, but a device that uses force field technology to generate a warp in space with a strong gravitational pull, which is then used to transport materials. Most research facilities in New Eden have acquired examples of this device, so reverse-engineered products based on it are expected to emerge in near future. One anonymous research scientist commented: "Please do not activate multiple such devices simultaneously, as this may warp space excessively and cause massive damage."

en: Build Frame: A facility used to produce and deploy Habitation Modules. Habitation Modules are the most basic of space structures. They are a convenient accommodation solution for many people occupied in the service industry, and thus increase the amount of Capsuleer Outposts that can be anchored in a system.

zh: 梅京二哈的狞獾级海军型(进阶)
一位名不见经传的小商人渴望拥有一艘自己的狞獾级海军型巡洋舰。他通过在废弃的空间站遗骸中搜寻材料来制造自己的狞獾，不幸的是，他在运输材料时，被一群海盗给拦截。如果你能帮他一把，或许他的梦想就实现了。
en: A little-known merchant dreamed of owning his own Caracal Navy Issue cruiser. He's been diving into abandoned station debris and salvaging materials to build his own Caracal. Unfortunately, he was intercepted by some pirates while he was transporting materials. If you can help him out this time, he might just be able to realize his dream.

MK2 军团逆向工程实验室框架
MK3 军团逆向工程实验室框架
MK4 军团逆向工程实验室框架
MK5 军团逆向工程实验室框架
古斯塔斯加强防御哨站
建造框架，可以更高效的检测当前星系内的隐蔽信号和数据源，提供探索的位置给飞行员，这也是飞行员的重要财富来源之一。
en: Build Frame: Can improve the efficiency of invisible signals and data source detection within the system, and provide exploration locations for Capsuleers. This is one of the most important sources of income for Capsuleers.

zh: 超级中心化市场，可以连接整个新伊甸其他遥远地区的贸易中心，能建设这个设施的组织，都是一方赫赫有名的霸主。
en: This hyper-centralized market can connect to the Trading Centers of other remote areas in New Eden. Organizations capable of building such a facility are major people with great reputations.

zh: 由于超新星导致EVE之门发生扰动，新伊甸大部分扫描和定位设备都受到影响，统合部紧急调整了星门连接拓补结构数据，恢复星门使用，但小功率的舰载扫描仪需要单独调校，这份指南提供给克隆人飞行员，使大家能短暂的应对这次自然灾难。另：舰载扫描设备恢复时间未定，统合部联合多个科研机构正在解析扰动，有明确的数据表明这个扰动正在减轻，相信我们什么都不做，很快小功率的舰载扫描设备也能恢复使用。---著名科学评论家 图.阿金松 （Tu Arkinson）
en: When a supernova caused disturbance to the EVE Gate, most scanning and positioning devices in New Eden were affected. CONCORD urgently adjusted the topological structure data of the stargate connection to restore the stargates, but ship scanners with less power require separate adjustment. This guide teaches Capsuleers how to do this as a temporary measure for dealing with this natural disaster. Although the restoration time for shipboard scanning devices is still unknown, multiple research facilities are analyzing the disturbance under CONCORD's direction. The data shows that the disturbance is dying away, so even if we do nothing, low-power shipboard scanners will become operational again in no time. - Acclaimed scientist & commentator Tu Arkinson

zh: 星际攻击导弹可以在极远的地方部署，然后攻击一些太空中位置固定的建筑，尤其适合主权建筑的摧毁工作。
en: Interstellar attack missiles can be deployed in extremely distant places, then used to attack structures whose location in space is fixed. They are especially suitable for bringing down Sovereignty Structures.

zh: 殷郡力场科技的产物，使用高速电子冲击铯原子，构筑出不稳定的中间态，并引导其发射到目标处，造成动能和爆炸伤害。
en: A product of Yan-Jung's force field technology. Blasts caesium atoms with electrons moving at a high speed, generating an unstable intermediate state which is then launched towards the target, dealing kinetic and explosive damage.

zh: 修改失败，修改价格与原订单价格相同
en: Failed to modify: the modified price is the same as the original price of the order.

en: Build Frame: A facility that can detect pirate activity within the system. When the rats hiding in this system have been found and marked out, that leaves you with a decision: leave them be, or plunder the plunderers?

en: A large residential outpost which can also serve as a base for organizations. Within its hull are housed the dreams of countless spacefarers. It is common for organizations to build their own such hubs.

zh: 可以更好的监控此星系内的海盗势力活动情况；当然，也会发现更多的危险区域，克隆人的财富和风险都可能发生巨大的变化。
en: Can better monitor the activity of pirate factions within the system. It will lead you to more dangerous areas, which carry a greater risk—but also a chance of greater rewards.

en: Build Frame: A facility used to produce and deploy Corp Factories, which increase the Production metrics of a system.

zh: 很好，请继续依照指示执行。
en: Good. Now please continue following the instructions.

zh: 在市场出售物品并以此获得{tar_cnt:_tr}星币
en: Sell items on the Market to earn {tar_cnt:_tr} ISK

zh: 停靠成功。{player_name}，如果你在本空间站内并无其他舰船，则统合部联合安全局将会免费为你提供一艘新手舰船。
en: Docking successful. If you don't have any other ships in the station, {player_name}, CONCORD will provide you with a starter ship for free.

zh: 为了更好地发展，克隆飞行员互相联合创建了属于自己的军团。加入这些克隆飞行员的军团，结交一些志同道合的伙伴。当你遇到问题，可以向军团成员寻求帮助。
en: To help them better develop, Capsuleers have united and established Corporations. Join these Corporations established by Capsuleers and make friends with other Capsuleers you share the same interests with. You can request help from your Corporation members when you're in trouble.

zh: 飞行员，恭喜你完成进阶任务，可以前往智能助手-教程中领取奖励。
en: Congratulations on completing the advanced mission, pilot. You can claim your rewards in Intelligent Assistant - Tutorials.

zh: 扩大观察视野，有利于掌握周围环境。
en: Having a greater field of view can help you learn more about your surrounding environment.

zh: 对于一名刚刚完成新手训练课程的飞行员，统合部建议先做一些简单任务，以熟悉新伊甸世界，更好地融入飞行员这个身份。
en: For Capsuleers who have just finished the beginner tutorials, CONCORD recommends completing some simple missions first. This will teach you more about New Eden and introduce you to life as a pilot.

zh: 现在，请依照指示执行下一步操作。
en: Now, please follow the instructions for the next step.

zh: 飞行员，遭遇恒星风暴，无法准确定位目的地。
en: We've encountered a star storm, pilot. We're unable to lock our destination for now.

zh: 而近距离观察，更利于掌握自身舰船的状态。
en: If you observe it closely, you can get a better view of your own ship's status.

zh: 装配适合的武器装备，可以极大提高舰船战斗力。
en: Fitting the correct weapon can greatly enhance a ship's power.

zh: 飞行员，驾驶更高级的舰船，可以提升你的生成率。
en: Piloting more advanced ships can increase your chances of survival, pilot.

zh: 警告：发现多个敌方目标，请飞行员快速锁定目标。
en: Warning: Multiple enemy targets found, please lock them.

zh: 群体护盾回充增量器作用范围
中型鱼雷能量栅格需求
大型鱼雷能量栅格需求
拦截泡发射器作用范围
群体装甲维修器作用范围
拦截泡发射器飞行速度
远程克隆服务中心蓝图

科技等级是划分克隆人飞行员各阶段所拥有能力的标准。

依据统合部规定，对于不同科技等级的舰船，飞行员必须达到对应的科技等级才可以激活驾驶。
当技能点达到要求数量后就可以提升科技等级。
训练技能或购买欧米伽克隆都可以提升技能点的增加速度。
en:
Tech Levels are the standard used to classify Capsuleers' abilities into levels.

In accordance with CONCORD regulations, to pilot ships with higher Tech Levels, pilots need to reach the corresponding Tech Level first.
You can raise your Tech Level by reaching the required amount of skill points.
Training skills or purchasing Omega Clones can boost your skill point gains.

zh: 民用 小型跃迁推进器
民用 无人机导航电脑

空间站是相对安全的地方，必要时能救你一命。

空间站是位于太空内的大型人造天体，通常建造在行星或卫星的同步轨道上。
对于克隆人飞行员来说，空间是他们漫游星际的临时港湾，可以让时时紧绷的精神暂时放松一下。
此外，飞行员还可以使用空间站提供的多种服务：仓库、工业、市场、舰船装配与维修、办公室租赁等等。当然，有些服务是免费，而有些服务，则是收费的。
en:
The space station is a relatively safe place and can save your life if necessary.

The space station is a large artificial celestial body located in space, usually built in the synchronous orbit of a planet or moon.
For the pilots, the station is a temporary harbor when they are roaming the galaxy, which can temporarily relax their tense spirit.
Besides, pilots can also use a variety of services provided by the space station: hangar, industry, market, ship maintenance, corporation office leasing, etc. Of course, some services are free, while others are charged.

zh: 在仓库-舰船机库，激活舰船<color value="0x9afdd07a">{ship_name:_tr}</color>
en: Activate the ship <color value="0x9afdd07a">{ship_name:_tr}</color> under Inventory > Ship Hangar

zh:
请将5个技能训练至4级。
不论是军事、工业、商业，都有对应的技能可供训练。作为一名飞行员，你的日常就是不间断训练技能，以提升自己的各项能力。
提示：如果是新手飞行员，建议优先训练统合部推荐的技能。可以在技能界面或智能助手-职业规划中查看各科技等级的推荐技能。
en:
Train 5 skills to Level 4.
Whether it's military, industry, or business, there's always a skill that you can train. As a pilot, training your skills to improve your abilities should be a part of your daily routine.
Tip: Beginner pilots are advised to start by training CONCORD-recommended skills. You can view the recommended skills for each Tech Level on the Skills page or under Intelligent Assistant > Career Plan.
How do I go to other systems?

zh: 卫星科技 中型震荡裂解炮
好的，训练课程已备份到<color value="0x9afdd07a">“智能助手-基础教程”</color>，你可以随时查看。
en: Alright, the training courses have been backed up to <color value="0x9afdd07a">"Intelligent Assistant > Basic Tutorials."</color> You can check them at any time.

zh:
在这里您可以向军团成员群发邮件，并设置军团的录取邮件和欢迎邮件。
录取邮件会在您通过军团成员的申请之后，自动向该成员发送。可以在录取邮件中写上军团福利，吸引申请者选择你的军团。
欢迎邮件会在军团成员正式加入军团后，自动向该成员发送。可以在欢迎邮件中写上入团须知，让新成员更快融入军团。
en:
You can send mail to Corporation members, as well as set the acceptance and welcome mail of your Corporation.

Acceptance mail will be automatically sent to members after you accept their applications. To attract applicants to your Corporation, you can list the benefits of joining in your acceptance mail.

Welcome mail will be automatically sent to new members after they have officially joined your Corporation. You can include a short guide in your welcome mail to help new members quickly familiarize themselves with their Corporation duties.

How do I quickly lock onto targets?

zh:
助人为乐是一种美德，这一点，也常常被心怀不轨之人利用。

遨游茫茫宇宙，总会遇到一些过客。他们可能是行走各大星域的商人，也可能是探索神秘未知的宇宙漫步者；可能是追逐海盗的赏金猎人，也可能是布置陷阱等待猎物的星际海盗。
每一次启航，都是一段经历与结局均未知的旅程。也许可以安全归来，也许只是太空舱凄凉返航，也许又是一次克隆体的重新激活。
须知道，灭绝是例行章程，存活则是意外收获。
请常怀警惕之心。
en:
Generosity and willingness to help are a virtue, but one that is commonly exploited by people with ulterior motives.

You'll meet all kinds of fellow wanderers in the course of your travels through the vast universe. They may be merchants trading between regions, or explorers braving the great unknown. They may be bounty hunters chasing pirates, or pirates awaiting their next victims.
A trip into the unknown awaits you every time you set sail. You may make it back with your ship in one piece, or in only your capsule—or even worse, you may wake up as one of your backup clones.
Please bear in mind that death is routine, whereas survival is merely a bonus.
Stay vigilant.

zh: 暴风级的攻击力足以让敌军支离破碎，然后像死寂的太空垃圾到处飘荡。作为一艘适应性强的战舰，它拥有足够多的炮塔安装座，能够发动全面的猛烈炮击，同时也不失灵活地拥有较强的导弹攻击能力。它的航速让敌舰望尘莫及，充足的电容器电容量使它能打赢任何消耗战。这是研发过程中的一个测试版本舰船，也被不少克隆人飞行员认为是性价比的选择。
en: The impact of this ship is more than sufficient to leave a trail of shattered enemies floating around like lifeless debris. It is an adaptable vessel, that has enough turret hardpoints for a full-scale assault while remaining versatile enough to allow for plenty of missile fire, and has both sufficient speed to outrun its enemies and sufficient capacitor charge to outlast them. This particular ship is one of the pre-production test mules, which typically offer great value for money according to Capsuleers.

en:
The Corporation wallet is used for storing funds shared by Corporation members. These funds can be used to pay for various public services for the Corporation, and can only be viewed and used by members with wallet permissions.

There are two wallet permissions: withdrawal and deposit. You can view the account info of the corresponding wallet as long as you have at least one of these permissions.

zh: 托勒克斯级巡洋舰是最近被联邦编入现役的战舰。尽管托勒克斯级体现了典型的现代盖伦特设计理念，适合任何距离的作战，不过它还是最擅长在极短的距离内用疾速炮将哪怕最为顽强的敌人撕成碎片。这是研发过程中的一个测试版本舰船，也被不少克隆人飞行员认为是性价比的选择。
en: The Thorax-class cruiser is the latest combat ship commissioned by the Federation. The Thorax is a very effective ship at any range, but typical of modern Gallente design philosophy, it is most effective when working at extremely close range, where its blasters tear through even the toughest of enemies. This particular ship is one of the pre-production test mules, which typically offer great value for money according to Capsuleers.

Awarded to the second wave of Capsuleers to arrive in the world of EVE Echoes.

zh:

当技能点达到要求数量后就可以提升科技等级。
训练技能、购买欧米伽克隆都可以提升技能点的增加速度。
en:
Increase your Tech Level to {1|skill_level:_tr}.
In accordance with CONCORD regulations, to pilot ships with higher Tech Levels, pilots need to reach the corresponding Tech Level first. Work hard to increase your Tech Level, pilot.
You can raise your Tech Level by reaching the required amount of skill points.
Training skills or purchasing Omega Clones can boost your skill point gains.

zh: 精英克尔利伊 星空级拦截型⁸
加达里岗哨炮塔 A型

这是一个弱肉强食的黑暗宇宙，作为克隆人飞行员，战斗是立身之本。

在新伊甸世界，只有高安星域禁止对其他飞行员使用武器；低安星域与危险星域，都有随时爆发战斗的可能。
在这里，你可能遭遇到任何事情，请提高自身警惕，不要轻易相信任何人。
据统合部安全局统计，平均每天有2333艘舰船因飞行员的大意而被击毁。
请牢记一句话：在新伊甸，没有胆大的老飞行员。（摘自胡安·里科退休仪式上的讲话，YC15年）
en:
In space, the weak are nothing but prey for the strong. As a Capsuleer, combat ability is essential to survival.

In the world of New Eden, pilots are only forbidden to use weapons on each other in high-sec regions. In low-sec and dangerous regions, battles may break out at any moment.
In those places, anything can happen—so stay vigilant, and think twice before trusting anyone.
According to CONCORD's data, on average, 2333 ships are destroyed on a daily basis due to carelessness.
Please remember: in New Eden, there are no daring old pilots. (From Juan Rico's retirement speech, YC15)

将货物运送至指定的空间站，即可获取星币。
提示：领取物流任务需要缴纳一定的押金，请量力而行。
en:
Complete {1|tar_amount:_tr} delivery requests.
Prepare a ship with a sufficiently large cargo hold and some collateral, and you can start taking delivery requests.
Deliver cargo to specified stations to earn ISK.
Tip: You need to pay a certain amount as collateral to claim delivery requests, so assess your own strength and make judgments accordingly.

zh: 民用 小型集束激光炮

在市场出售物品并以此获得{1|tar_cnt:_tr}星币。
作为一名商人，可以在市场中通过低价买入、高价售出物品获取其中的差价利润。
也可以囤积大量的资源操控市场物价。
提示：阿尔法克隆只能在贸易中心进行交易。
en:
Sell items on the market to receive {1|tar_cnt:_tr} ISK.
As a dealer, you can earn a profit by purchasing items on the Market and selling them at a higher price.
You can also stock up on certain resources to control their market price.
Tip: Alpha Clones can only trade at Trading Centers.

en: This ship modification can increase the damage of decomposers.

zh:
请将2个技能训练至5级。
不论是军事、工业、商业，都有对应的技能可供训练。作为一名飞行员，你的日常就是不间断训练技能，以提升自己的各项能力。
提示：如果是新手飞行员，建议优先训练统合部推荐的技能。可以在技能界面或智能助手-职业规划中查看各科技等级的推荐技能。
en:
Train 2 skills to Level 5.
Whether it's military, industry, or business, there's always a skill that you can train. As a pilot, training your skills to improve your abilities should be a part of your daily routine.
Tip: Beginner pilots are advised to start by training CONCORD-recommended skills. You can view the recommended skills for each Tech Level on the Skills page or under Intelligent Assistant > Career Plan.

这些飞行员顺利通过了这个宇宙为他们设置下的重重阻碍，并最终成为了组成新伊甸世界的重要成员。
en:
Awarded to Capsuleers who passed the CONCORD combat assessment.

These Capsuleers successfully overcame the obstacles this universe laid in their path and became important figures in the world of New Eden.

zh:
如果您希望其他克隆人飞行员能够加入您的军团，您需要支付一笔代理费用于在视角传媒的招募平台发布广告。每次发布的广告将持续存在一周，且不可撤回。
只有发布了招募广告的军团，才能被搜索到，如果希望修改招募广告的内容需要重新发布，用新的广告覆盖旧的广告。
en:
If you want other Capsuleers to join your Corporation, you need to pay an agent's fee to have your recruitment ad posted on the Scope's recruiting platform. Each ad you put up will remain there for a week and cannot be withdrawn.
Only Corporations that advertise themselves show up in search results. If you want to change the content of your advertisement, you'll need to post a new advertisement to replace the old one.

获取{1|tar_cnt:_tr}星币赏金。
在新伊甸各个星系的深处，游荡着大量的海盗。这些海盗的聚集点，会产生异常信号并被监测到。
根据难度分为普通异常（分小中大三种）、基地与检察官异常。
剿灭这些海盗既可以获得赏金，还有几率获得武器装备（赏金并非实时获得，而是每隔一段时间统一打入钱包内）。
提示：当你所在的星系没有异常信号时，不妨通过星门跳跃至其他星系去看看。
en:
Obtaining {1|tar_cnt:_tr} ISK from bounties.
Large amounts of pirates roam the depths of New Eden. Their gathering places will emit abnormal signals, or anomalies, which your equipment can detect.
Anomalies are classified by difficulty: normal anomalies (small, medium and large), bases, and inquisitor anomalies.
Wipe out pirates to obtain bounties. You'll also have also a chance of obtaining weapons and modules. Bounties are not issued immediately; they are transferred into your wallet periodically.
Tip: If there are no anomalies in your current system, you can jump to other systems using stargates and try your luck there.

你必须了解舰船甚于了解自己，你必须如此，才能在各种情况下做出准确判断。


不同势力的舰船，其属性、特性都有不同。
对于新手飞行员，统合部的建议是：打开智能助手-职业规划，根据个人喜好选择职业，参考对应职业的舰船推荐；这样会少走一些弯路。
请牢记来自《银河系漫游指南》的忠告：慎重选择舰船，这关乎你能否完成任务、安全返航。
en:
You must know your ship better than you know yourself. Only this way can you make accurate judgments in any situation.


Ships of different factions have different attributes and characteristics.
For beginner pilots, CONCORD recommends referring to the ship recommendations in Intelligent Assistant > Career Plan to choose the ship best suited to your preferred career path. This will help you save time.
Please remember this advice from CONCORD's Guide to New Eden: Choose your ship wisely. The decision you make will determine whether or not you will complete your missions and return in one piece.

zh: 审判对手 黑鸟级隐匿型⁷

军团机库可以存放军团成员共有的物资。
使用军团机库首先需要在空间站内租用军团办公室，租金从军团钱包中按周自动扣除。
拥有权限的成员可以在有军团办公室的空间站内自由地使用军团机库。
当办公室扣除租金失败时，会自动进入暂停服务阶段，暂停服务期间无法在军团机库取出或放入任何物品,需要军团中拥有财务管理权限的玩家结清欠款后才能恢复使用。
en:
The Corporation hangar can be used to store items shared by Corporation members.
To gain access to a Corporation hangar, you need to rent a Corporation office at a station. The rent is automatically deducted from the Corporation wallet.
Authorized members can access Corporation hangars freely at stations with Corporation offices.
If you fail to pay the office rent, your use of the office will be suspended. During the suspension, you won't be able to store items in your Corporation hangar or take any items out of it. You can only resume using the office after corporation members with finance management permissions pay the due fee.

en: Have access to all advanced ships.

zh: 精英克尔利伊 狂怒者级海军型⁶

舰船是克隆人飞行员的第二生命，沿着太空舱密布的输送管道，是在这里，人类意识才真正觉醒了。

当你驾驶一艘更高级的舰船，请不要被强大的力量所蒙蔽。
自取灭亡的第一步，往往是由认不清自身而起。
要知道，在宇宙戏剧中，我们不是主角。
请常怀敬畏之心。
en:
A ship is a Capsuleer's second life. Only when connected to a vessel via the tubes that surround their capsule can their human consciousness truly awaken.

When switching to a more advanced ship, do not let yourself be blinded by its power.
Confidence without recognition of one's real strength is the beginning of self-destruction.
We are not the main characters on the universe's grand stage.
Stay humble.

zh:
授予在蒲公英行动中英勇奋战的飞行员。

YC121.9.19，新世界爆发了第一场大规模舰队战。超过500名飞行参与了这场战斗，成功阻止了“蒲公英”特别部队的邪恶计划。谨以此勋章，嘉奖所有在“蒲公英”行动中英勇奋战，保护了首次新伊甸探索成果的飞行员。
en:
Awarded to pilots who fought bravely during Operation Dandelion.

On YC121.9.19, the first large-scale fleet battle broke out in the new world. Over 500 pilots joined the cause and put a stop to the evil scheme of the "Dandelion" special forces team. This medal commends all the pilots who fought bravely during Operation Dandelion to protect the fruits of the first exploration into New Eden.

zh: 统合部 第二等哨兵
选择<color value="0x9afdd07a">任意一个星门</color>进行跳跃，前往另一星系
en: Jump to another system via <color value="0x9afdd07a">any stargate</color>

zh: 先驱者级战列巡洋舰自从出现在战场的那一刻起，便奠定了自己强大杀伤力武器的地位，它就像一束能直穿异教徒心脏的灼热激光。它所具备的一切都是为了实现这一使命——其机鼻和机翼的照明灯可以令异教徒无所遁形，而数量众多的高能量炮台槽位将把他们彻底摧毁。即使有人侥幸逃脱了先驱者的首轮攻击，也必定会丧命于它的无人机轮番攻击之下。这是研发过程中的一个测试版本舰船，也被不少克隆人飞行员认为是性价比的选择。
en: Right from its very appearance on the battlefield, the Harbinger proclaims its status as a massive weapon, a laser burning through the heart of the ungodly. Everything about it exhibits its focused intent, from the lights on its nose and wings that root out infidels, to the large number of high-energy turrets that serve to destroy them. Should any heathens be left alive after the Harbinger's initial assault, the drones will take care of them. This particular ship is one of the pre-production test mules, which typically offer great value for money according to Capsuleers.

YC122.1.10，在虫洞即将关闭时，一群携带者精良装备的天蛇集团的克隆人飞行员突袭了暗涌之域。超过500名飞行员，不畏强敌，英勇奋战，在最后的时刻消灭了所有的敌人（并且引发了时空错乱）。谨以此勋章，嘉奖所有为保护第二次殖民成果而英勇奋战的飞行员。
en:
Awarded to pilots who fought bravely during the battle against the Serpentis traitors.

On YC122.1.10, as the wormhole was closing, a group of well-armed Serpentis Capsuleers raided Black Rise. Over 500 pilots stepped up to the challenge and eliminated all enemies in the nick of time (distorting space and time in the process). This medal commends all the pilots who fought bravely to protect the fruits of the second migration.

开采{1|tar_cnt_0:_tr}立方米的矿石。
在新伊甸各个星系的深处，有着大大小小的小行星带，其中储藏着丰富的矿石资源。
可以驾驶装备有采矿器的舰船前往开采。
开采小行星后获得的矿石可以提炼出各种矿物，用于工业制造。
提示：当你所在的星系没有小行星带时，不妨通过星门跳跃至其他星系去看看。
en:
Mine {1|tar_cnt_0:_tr}m³ of ore.
Asteroid belts can be found in all shapes and sizes in the depths of New Eden. They are rich in ores.
You can mine them using ships equipped with Miners.
The ores you mine can be processed into various minerals, which can then be used for manufacturing items.
Tip: If there are no asteroid belts in your current system, you can jump to other systems using stargates and try your luck there.

zh:
如何赋予舰船更强大的能力是一门无止境的学问。

每艘舰船都有自身的特性，按照特性装配合适的武器装备，才能发挥出最大的威力。
对于新手飞行员，胡乱尝试并不是一个好方法。你可以去尝试加入克隆人飞行员创建的军团，或是找信得过的老飞行员寻求帮助。
在新伊甸世界，武力的强大，才是保证自身利益不受侵犯的根本。
en:
When it comes to improving a ship's abilities, the possibilities are endless.

Every ship has its own characteristics which you need to take into consideration when fitting weapons and modules. Only in this way can you maximize your ship's potential.
For beginner pilots, it is not advised to experiment with this on your own. Instead, try joining a Capsuleer-founded Corporation or asking trustworthy veterans for help.
In the world of New Eden, firepower is fundamental to safeguarding one's personal interests.

zh:
请将1个技能训练至4级。
不论是军事、工业、商业，都有对应的技能可供训练。作为一名飞行员，你的日常就是不间断训练技能，以提升自己的各项能力。
提示：如果是新手飞行员，建议优先训练统合部推荐的技能。可以在技能界面或智能助手-职业规划中查看各科技等级的推荐技能。
en:
Train 1 skills to Level 4.
Whether it's military, industry, or business, there's always a skill that you can train. As a pilot, training your skills to improve your abilities should be a part of your daily routine.
Tip: Beginner pilots are advised to start by training CONCORD-recommended skills. You can view the recommended skills for each Tech Level on the Skills page or under Intelligent Assistant > Career Plan.

en:
Awarded to the outstanding recruiters who assembled an elite group of pilots for the Minmatar Republic during the Recruit-a-Friend event.

Never give in. Even in suffering and separation, our soul stays true to Matar.

zh:
完成{1|task_amount:_tr}次际遇-新闻任务。
在新伊甸中，各个势力会将委托任务发布在统一的公告板上。
打开际遇，在新闻页签可以领取公告板任务，包括战斗、运输、采矿等任务类型，可根据自身情况进行选择。
某些稀有任务完成后还可获得任务委托书，完成新闻委托可以解锁故事线。
en:
Complete {1|task_amount:_tr} Encounters > News Missions.
In New Eden, all factions will post missions on a common-use billboard.
Open the News page under Encounters to accept billboard missions, which are sorted into categories including combat, transport, mining, etc. Feel free to pick the missions that best suit your own abilities.
Some rare missions will grant you Mission Assignments. Complete News Missions to unlock Storylines.

zh:
授予第一批来到EVE Echoes世界的克隆人飞行员。

YC121.8.26，通向联结两个平行的新伊甸世界的虫洞首次打开。谨以此勋章，嘉奖首批抵达EVE Echoes世界的克隆人飞行员。他们的到来为新世界的构筑做出了巨大贡献，他们孜孜不倦的探索精神值得我们铭记。
en:
Awarded to the first wave of Capsuleers to arrive in the world of EVE Echoes.

On YC121.8.26, the wormhole between the two parallel worlds of New Eden was first opened. This medal commends the Capsuleers who first arrived in the world of EVE Echoes. They made a great contribution to the construction of New Eden. Their spirit of exploration is an inspiration to us all.

整个新伊甸，星门数量过万，你有没有什么大胆的想法？

新伊甸浩瀚无垠，数千个星系由星门相连，形成巨大的交通网络。
星门是远古文明科技的遗留物，一种宇宙空间传送方式，可令旅行者瞬间抵达目的地，实现星际穿越。
然而，在跳跃星门之前，你却无法知道星门另一侧等待你的是什么。很刺激，不是吗。
不要惧怕，身为克隆人飞行员，群星是我们的归属。
en:
There are tens of thousands of stargates across New Eden. Have you ever had the urge to do something bold?

New Eden is vast and boundless. Thousands of systems, all connected by stargates, form a massive transport network.
Stargates are the technological legacy of an ancient civilization. As portals in space, they can help travelers reach their destination in an instant, greatly facilitating interstellar travel.
However, you'll never know what's waiting for you on the other side of a stargate before you jump in. Pretty exciting, isn't it?
Don't be afraid. As Capsuleers, the stars are where we belong.

对于克隆人飞行员而言，学会观察周围环境是保证自身安全的基础。

新伊甸浩瀚无垠，包含了数千个已知星系。
其中，艾玛、加达里、盖伦特、米玛塔尔四大帝国势力控制着位于中心区的高安星域与低安星域；而十几个财团与海盗势力则盘踞于边缘的危险星域，这里是黑暗混乱的无法之地。
在新伊甸世界中，你可以做任何想做的事情：战斗、采矿、制造、交易、运输，甚至创建属于自己的势力；当然，也需要对应的能力并做好承受各种意外与失败的准备。
这里充满了危险与机遇，一切皆有可能。
en:
For Capsuleers, learning to observe your surroundings is survival lesson number one.

New Eden is vast and boundless, encompassing thousands of known systems.
Four great factions—the Amarr, Caldari, Gallente, and Minmatar—control both the high-sec and low-sec regions in the center, while a dozen or so consortiums and pirate forces occupy the dangerous regions along the edge, where law and order give way to lawlessness and chaos.
In the world of New Eden, there are all kinds of ways to spend your time: combat, mining, manufacturing, trading, transportation, and even creating your own faction. Of course, you need to have the skills to match and to always be prepared for accidents and failure.
Danger awaits, but so does opportunity. Anything is possible.

喜欢漫游星际的，终归不会是无趣的人。

对于一名刚刚完成新手训练课程的飞行员，统合部建议先做一些简单任务，以熟悉新伊甸世界，更好地融入飞行员这个身份。
不要慌，智能助手会一直伴随着你。虽然这个助手可能不太智能。
最后，推荐一本《新伊甸漫游指南》，可以让你的宇宙旅程不那么枯燥。
en:
Those who roam among the stars always have interesting stories to tell.

For Capsuleers who have just finished the beginner tutorials, CONCORD recommends completing some simple missions first. This will teach you more about New Eden and introduce you to life as a pilot.
Do not worry, as your Intelligent Assistant will provide help if needed (though there may be limits to its intelligence).
Last but not least, we recommend bringing a copy of the Hitchhiker's Guide to New Eden to make your journey in space less boring.

漫游星际的人，总喜欢在各处留下些物资，万一会用到呢？

每个空间站都有提供免费的仓库服务：移动、装配、激活、提炼、出售、销毁等等。
在空间站内，飞行员可以拥有专属个人的物品机库与舰船机库。如果想将物品随身携带，则需要将物品移动至当前驾驶舰船的货舱内。
这让克隆人飞行员享受到了便利，但随之而来的，还有管理个人资产的烦恼。
为了帮助新手飞行员，统合部在智能助手-操作教程中专门添加了一些关于个人资产管理的操作教学。
en:
Those who wander the galaxy always like to leave some supplies along the way, in case they need them later.

Every station offers free inventory services: transfer, fitting, activation, reprocessing, selling, destruction, and so on.
Pilots can own personal items and ship hangars in stations. If you wish to carry items with you, you'll need to transfer them to your current ship's inventory.
This is convenient for Capsuleers, but it leads to the troublesome necessity of personal asset management.
To help beginner pilots, CONCORD has provided personal asset management tutorials under Intelligent Assistant > Operation Tutorial.

技能是衡量克隆人飞行员能力强弱的重要指标之一。

统合部制定了军事、工业、商业三种职业的基础技能推荐，建议新手飞行员遵循推荐进行技能训练。可以在技能界面或智能助手-职业规划中查看各科技等级的推荐技能。
作为一名飞行员，你的日常就是不间断地训练技能，以提升自己的各项能力，变得更强大。
数据证明，随时留意自身的技能训练队列状态，是一个好习惯。
en:
Skills are an important indicator of a Capsuleer's abilities.

CONCORD provides basic skill recommendations for military, industrial and business career paths. Beginner pilots are advised to follow these recommendations to train their skills. You can view the recommended skills for each Tech Level on the Skills page or under Intelligent Assistant > Career Plan.
As a Capsuleer, you should be constantly training your skills to improve your abilities and become stronger.
Statistics indicate that frequently checking your skill training queue is a good habit.

zh: 酷菲狂热者 狂怒者级海军型⁶

血袭者 先知级守卫型⁹

舰船是克隆人飞行员的第二生命，沿着逃生舱密布的输送管道，是在这里，人类意识才真正觉醒了。

当你驾驶一艘更高级的舰船，请不要被强大的力量所蒙蔽。
自取灭亡的第一步，往往是由认不清自身而起。
要知道，在宇宙戏剧中，我们不是主角。
请常怀敬畏之心。
en:
A ship is a Capsuleer's second life. Only when connected to a vessel via the tubes that surround their life pod can their human consciousness truly awaken.

When switching to a more advanced ship, do not let yourself be blinded by its power.
Confidence without recognition of one's real strength is the beginning of self-destruction.
We are not the main characters on the universe's grand stage.
Stay humble.
