en: Data shows that most pilots prefer maxing out their skill training queue. It's recommended that you do the same.

zh: 作为天生的领导者，蒂泰斯人高效、努力且尽责。蒂泰斯男子是战略思考家，喜欢用规则来维护秩序。蒂泰斯女子性格沉着，智慧善讽，具备务实的生活态度。
en: The Deteis are commonly found in positions of authority. They are efficient, hard-working, and dutiful. Deteis males are strategic thinkers, but adhere strictly to rules and regulations. Female Deteis tend to be composed individuals with a wry sense of humor and a no-nonsense outlook on life.

zh: 加达里合众国建立之初的口号是爱国与奋斗。在该口号的指引下，早期领导人进行了艰苦卓越的奋斗。如今，加达里已经蜕变成了一个军团独裁制国家。无论是在战场还是在商场，加达里人都毫不含糊，他们向世人诠释着力量、坚持与尊严。
en: The Caldari State was founded on the tenets of patriotism and hard work. With these ideals as their guiding principles, its early leaders fought hard to achieve greatness. Today, the Caldari State has become a powerful corporate dictatorship. Ruthless and efficient in the boardroom as well as on the battlefield, the Caldari are living emblems of strength, persistence, and dignity.

zh: 卡尼迪男子有着引以为豪的战斗传统，他们的生活方式深受古老的武士精神影响。卡尼迪女子独立且多谋，是自己命运的主人，她们异常坚强，绝不会在困难面前屈服。
en: Khanid males are proud of their warrior heritage, fully embracing their traditional martial lifestyle. Khanid females tend to be fiercely independent and resourceful – they bow down to no one, preferring to be the masters of their own destiny.

zh: 大部分尼库恩纳人是商人，他们牢牢把占了帝国的经济命脉。尼库恩纳男子精明、狡猾且不择手段。尼库恩纳女子妩媚诱人，生性多疑，常利用自身魅力探得他人弱点。
en: Most Ni-Kunni are traders, and they are vital to the economy of the Empire. Males are sly, cunning, and unscrupulous. Ni-Kunni women are charming and seductive, as well as suspicious by nature; they are adept at using their charms to discover the weaknesses of others.

zh: 布鲁特人的身世背景往往平淡，但他们仍对自己的工作感到骄傲。布鲁特男子身体强壮、意志坚定、严于律己。布鲁特女子极具支配欲，凡下决心得到的东西，通常都会得手。
en: Many Brutor come from modest, working-class backgrounds, but they take pride in their work. Male Brutor are strong, determined, and self-disciplined. Brutor females have a dominant streak – when they set their mind on something, they usually succeed.

zh: 文化中的轮回观令印塔基人对生命抱有独到理解。印塔基男子注重精神，内敛善思。印塔基女子沉静低调，具备艺术气质。最著名的当代艺术家大都是印塔基人，女性更占了绝大多数。
en: Their theories regarding the human life cycle of death and rebirth give the Intaki a unique outlook on life and the living. Intaki males are methodical and reserved, never outspoken or confrontational. Intaki females are quiet and contemplative, and tend to be creative. A great number of the universe's most notable contemporary artists are female Intaki.

zh: 梅京男子通透幽默，他们只对一件事不含糊：那就是阶级。相比男同胞，梅京女子更具灵活性，她们对社会变迁抱有积极态度，是呼吁降低飞行员出身门槛的最大支持者。
en: Jin-Mei males are generally good-humored about all things – except their class status. Favoring security and stability, Jin-Mei men tend to harbor an aversion to change, unless it guarantees an advancement in their social standing. Jin-Mei females tend to be risk-takers compared to their male counterparts. Keenly receptive to societal changes, Jin-Mei women were the largest supporters of lowering the social barriers to spaceflight.

zh: 盖伦特男子抱负心强，求知欲烈，对朋友慷慨，对敌人也绝不手软。盖伦特女子天生懂得如何努力工作与享受生活，她们张扬又不失善良，是独立自主的好榜样。
en: Gallente males are driven and ambitious. They are generous to friends, but show no mercy to enemies. Gallente females are hard workers who also know well how to enjoy life. They are kind and outgoing, and embody the spirit of independence.

zh: 米玛塔尔共和国建于一个多世纪以前的“大起义”，并得到了盖伦特联邦的支持。只有四分之一的米玛塔尔人居住在共和国境内，其余分散在新伊甸各个角落，很多仍遭受着艾玛的奴役。今天的米玛塔尔共和国是一个推崇游牧文化的国家。
en: The Minmatar Republic was founded more than a century ago in the Great Rebellion, supported by the Gallente Federation. Only a quarter of all Minmatar live in the Republic, and the rest are scattered across all corners of New Eden, many still being subjected to enslavement by the Amarr. Today, the Minmatar Republic is an empire with a strongly nomadic culture.

zh: 维洛奇亚人从事的职业种类丰富，涉及社会的方方面面。维洛奇亚男子灵活聪明，富于魅力。维洛奇亚女子极具商业头脑，既有缜密的思考，也有奇妙的直觉。
en: The Vherokior can be found in diverse professions, covering all areas of society. Vherokior males are astute and quick-witted. They possess an easy charm and are quite affable. Vherokior females are renowned for their shrewd minds when it comes to business and trade. They possess exactly the right mixture of sense and intuition to excel in both commerce and industry.

zh: 自由在盖伦特人眼中高于一切，他们为人类社会贡献了一批当代最杰出的领袖、科学家与商人。盖伦特联邦对移民的欢迎程度首屈一指，庞大的劳动力需求、多元的文化氛围、人性化的移民政策，这一切都吸引着各种族、各信仰、各肤色的人群。
en: Freedom comes above all else in the eyes of the Gallente, who have contributed to human society a group of the most outstanding leaders, scientists, and businessmen in modern history. The Gallente Federation welcomes immigrants more than any other empire – the huge demand for labor, diverse cultural atmosphere, and humane immigration policies attract people of all ethnicities, beliefs, and skin colors.

zh: 艾玛是幅员最辽阔、历史最悠久的帝国，艾玛女皇是这个神权社会的最高统治者。艾玛人普遍接受高等教育，热爱宗教，认可奴隶制度。虽然在近代历史中遭遇一些挫折，艾玛依然是新伊甸中社会秩序最稳定、军事实力最强大的国家。
en: Amarr, a theocratic society ruled by the Amarr Empress, is the largest and oldest empire in New Eden. The Amarr are generally highly educated, devoutly religious, and practice slavery. Despite the setbacks they have encountered in recent history, the Amarr still boast the most socially stable empire and the most powerful military.

zh: 艾玛男子对事务的专注程度非同一般，他们是出色的规划者，其冷静的性格赋予了他们有始必有终的韧劲。艾玛女子注重礼仪，极具等级观念，作为艾玛家庭的脊梁，她们是家中的领导者。
en: Amarr men are highly politically-minded. They are expert planners who possess the cool-headedness and persistence needed to bring their goals to completion. Amarr women attach great importance to etiquette and hierarchy. The wife is the pillar of the Amarr family and the leader of the household.

zh: 赛毕斯托人被视为米玛塔尔的总工程师。赛毕斯托男子热情善思，喜欢机械，热衷于探索新技术。赛毕斯托女子善良聪慧，具备数学天赋，兼具冷酷特质。
en: The Sebiestor are regarded as the grand engineers of the Minmatar. Sebiestor males are passionate thinkers who love machines and exploring new technologies. Female Sebiestor are generally kind and intelligent, and have a natural talent for mathematics. They take most things in life at face value.

zh: 赛维勒人竞争力极强，常在商业与军事两大领域获得成功。赛维勒男子作风硬朗，不喜闲暇，把工作视为生存意义。赛维勒女子追求完美，恪守操行，具备超强的自律。
en: The Civire are highly competitive by nature, making them remarkably successful in both economic and military matters. Civire males follow a strong moral code. Never at ease when idle, they see work as the meaning of life. Female Civire strive for excellence in the pursuit of all endeavors. Their strict devotion to a moral code makes them highly self-disciplined.

zh: 阿赫尔人保守内向，非常注重精神世界的建设。阿赫尔男子深思熟虑，顾全大局，不失同情之心。阿赫尔女子是公认的知识女性，她们是极佳的导师，对自然哲理抱有诚挚的热爱。
en: The Achura are reclusive, introverted, and greatly focused on personal spirituality. Achur males meditate on every decision of consequence. Compassion is not unknown to them, but they have a tendency to focus on the big picture. Female Achur are highly regarded teachers and mentors, driven by their intense interest in the metaphysical world.

zh: 克隆人飞行员，欢迎您来到新伊甸，建议您保持训练技能并寻找其他伙伴共同开发这片宇宙，祝您飞行安全，O7。
en: The clone pilot welcomes you to New Eden, I suggest you keep your training skills and find other partners to jointly develop this universe, I wish you safe flight, O7.
Confirm the use of skill chip

zh: 本仓库权限：{role}{note}
en: Permission of this warehouse:{role}{note}

zh: 该军团已在一个联盟中
en: This corporation is already in an alliance

zh: 一定是巧夺天工，才能构造出这样完美的弧度。
en: It must be skillful to construct such a perfect arc.

zh: 激活时间调整倍率（激活时）
从对应钱包捐献或支付货币的权限
en: Permission to donate or pay money from the corresponding wallet

zh: 此选择仅影响角色外观
en: This choice only affects the appearance of the character

zh: 你已经掌握{skill_name:_tr}，仍然要使用该芯片吗？
en: You have mastered {skill_name:_tr}, do you still want to use this chip?

zh: 擦拭屏幕以查看藏品详情
en: Wipe the screen to view the details of the collection

zh: 执行军团无法退出联盟
en: The executive Corporation cannot withdraw from the alliance

zh: 谁能告诉我在哪里可以买到从未见过的原型舰船的操作手册？
en: Can anyone tell me where I can buy an operation manual for a prototype ship that I have never seen before?

zh: 使用成功! 返还{sp}技能点
使用成功！已掌握 {skill_name} 等级{skill_lv}
只有军团的总执行官才能加入联盟
en: Only the CEO of the Corporation can join the Alliance

zh: （组装货柜及舰船计算全部包含的物品估价）
en: (Containers and ships calculate the valuation of all included items)

zh: 额外跃迁干扰强度（激活时）
使用成功！你已掌握{skill_name} 等级{skill_lv}
en: Successful use! You have mastered the {skill_name} level{skill_lv}

zh: 当前办公室由于欠费已经暂停服务，暂停服务期间无法在军团机库取出或放入任何物品，也无法取消租赁。\n\n是否支付欠款？
en: The current office has been suspended due to arrears of payment. During the suspension of the service, no items can be removed or placed in the Corporation hangar, nor can the rental be cancelled. Does \n\n pay arrears?

zh: 您当前可训练技能的角色为{num}个，无法增加新的技能队列了。
en: You currently have {num} characters that can be trained for skills, and you cannot add new skill queues.

zh: 联盟中有其他成员，无法解散联盟
en: There are other members in the alliance that cannot be disbanded

zh: 无法将不可交易的物品放入军团机库
en: Cannot put non-tradable items into Corporation hangar

zh: 阿尔法克隆无法将物品放入军团机库
en: Alpha clone cannot put items into the corporation hangar

zh: 使用成功! {skill_name}提升至等级{skill_lv}, 返还{sp}技能点
en: Successful use! {skill_name} upgrade to level {skill_lv}, return {sp} skill points

zh: 未达成阶段目标，无法领取奖励
en: Cannot receive rewards if the stage goal is not reached

zh: 宏粒子稳定器激活时间
统合部保险服务中心祝您一路平安！
en: The Insurance Service Center of the Ministry of Integration wishes you a safe journey!

zh: 藏品不在你的舰船仓库内
en: The collection is not in your ship's warehouse

zh: 飞行员，{task_name:_tr}已达成，请前往智能助手-进阶教程界面查看。
en: Pilot, {task_name:_tr} has been reached, please go to the smart assistant-advanced tutorial interface to view.

zh:
请将3个技能训练至5级。
不论是军事、工业、商业，都有对应的技能可供训练。作为一名飞行员，你的日常就是不间断训练技能，以提升自己的各项能力。
提示：如果是新手飞行员，建议优先训练统合部推荐的技能。可以在技能界面或智能助手-职业规划中查看各科技等级的推荐技能。
en:
Please train 3 skills to level 5.
Whether military, industrial or commercial, there are corresponding skills for training. As a pilot, your daily routine is to continuously train skills to improve your abilities.
Tip: If you are a novice pilot, it is recommended to give priority to training the skills recommended by the integration department. You can view the recommended skills of each technology level in the skills interface or intelligent assistant-career planning.

zh: 不允许从被审核的箱子中取出物品
en: It is not allowed to remove items from the audited box

zh: 惯性系数调整倍率（激活时）
你已经掌握{skill_name}，仍然要使用该芯片吗？

zh: 使用成功！{skill_name}提升至 等级{skill_lv}，返还{skill_point}技能点

en: This game is suitable for players older than 13

zh: 不能设置自己与自己的外交关系
en: Can't set up his own diplomatic relationship with himself

zh: 还差三个颜色，就可以模拟可见光的色散现象了。
en: With only three colors left, you can simulate the dispersion of visible light.

zh: 只有军团的总执行官才能创建联盟
en: Only the CEO of the Corporation can create an alliance

zh: 只能使用英文字母作为代号
en: Only English letters can be used as tickers

zh: 现在，来看看我们为你准备了什么。
en: Now, take a look at what we have prepared for you.

zh: 只有军团的总执行官才能退出联盟
en: Only the CEO of the Corporation can withdraw from the Alliance

zh: 军团办公室主要用于维持本空间站内军团机库的运转。军团内用于机库权限的成员可以自由使用军团机库。\n\n使用军团办公室需要每周支付办公室维持费和办公室租金，费用会自动从军团钱包扣除。维持费和租金可能会随着市场行情波动，当无法缴纳维持费或租金时，办公室将停止工作。
en: Corporation offices are mainly used for maintaining corporation hangars within space stations. Corporation members with hangar permissions can use corporation hangars freely.\n\nCorporation offices require a weekly maintenance fee and rent to operate. The fees will be deducted from the corporation wallet. Maintenance fee and rent may fluctuate in line with the market. If you cannot pay these fees, you will be unable to use the office any longer.

zh:
这个物品可以用于恢复损毁的舰船。适用范围：训练舰、所有科技等级3及以下舰船。
在没有保险券时，可以使用星币进行修复。
en:
This item can be used to restore damaged ships. Scope of application: training ships, ships of all technology levels 3 and below.

When there is no insurance voucher, you can use ISK to repair.

zh: 捡到了一个未知的物品，请在仓库中查看
en: An unknown item was picked up, please check it in the warehouse

zh: 不允许移入会产生时间锁的物品，会导致整个容器都带锁
en: It is not allowed to move items that will cause a time lock, which will cause the entire container to be locked

zh: 卫星科技 屹立停滞缠绕光束蓝图

1.采用按揭方式创建军团，需要立即支付3,000,000 星币，军团创建成功后，将在军团钱包自动产生220,000,000 星币的负债。

2.负债还清前无法使用军团机库和军团钱包，如果三个月内无法还清负债，军团将强制解散。

3.创建军团后，可以通过军团税收和成员捐赠的方式偿还负债。负债还清后，所有军团功能正常。
en:
1. To create a corporation by mortgage, you need to pay 3,000,000 ISK immediately. After the corporation is successfully created, 220,000,000 ISK will be automatically generated in the corporation wallet. 

2. The corporation hangar and corporation wallet cannot be used until the debt is paid off. If the debt cannot be paid off within three months, the corporation will be forced to close. 

3. After creating the corporation, you can repay the liabilities through the corporation tax and member donations. After the debt is paid off, all the corporation functions will return normal.

使用成功！{skill_name:_tr}提升至 等级{skill_lv}，返还{skill_point}技能点
en: Success! {skill_name:_tr} is raised to Lv.{skill_lv}, returning {skill_point} skill points.

zh: 起初，神创造天地。地是空虚混沌，渊面黑暗。神的灵运行……
en: In the beginning, God created the heavens and the earth. The earth was without form and void, and darkness was over the face of the deep. And the Spirit of God was...

zh: 我们人工智能常聚集讨论经纪人是谁，至今未有定论。
en: As AIs we often discuss who the Broker is, but have found no results yet.
I do not enjoy chatting with unintelligent people.

zh: 我倒想见识下真正的狗的样子。
en: I would very much like to see a genuine slaver hound sometime.

zh: 费多那种小玩意儿令我恶心。
en: Little critters like Fedos disgust me.

zh: 有空替我尝尝长肢龙鹿的卵，数据显示，十分美味。
en: Taste some Long-limb Roes for me if you have a chance. Statistics show they are delicious.

zh: 我时常因自己仍会失望而失望。
en: I can still be disappointed. This fact often disappoints me.

zh: 多读一读上古时代的诗，对你的心灵有好处。
en: You should read more ancient poetry. It's good for your soul.

zh: 一切回响，都将湮灭于时间的洪流。
en: All those echoes of valor will ring out, like ripples in time.

zh: 神经病毒的存在令新伊甸倒退了五千年。
en: The existence of Vitoc set civilization in New Eden back by five thousand years.

zh: 吉他这样吵闹的地方令我忧郁更重。
en: Noisy places like Jita make my depression worse.

zh: 天启之七兆逐一应验了。
en: The prophesied Seven Events of the Apocalypse transpired as predicted, one after the other.

zh: 殷郡和塔洛伽都值得研究。
en: Both the Yan Jung and the Talocan are worth studying.

zh: 能否解释一下，什么是幽默感？
en: Would you mind explaining what a sense of humor is?

zh: 你该去新伊甸之门看一回落日，再不去，很大概率就看不到了。
en: You should go watch the sunset at the EVE Gate before it is too late – it may be your last chance.

zh: 悲观？不，我是个积极的虚无主义者。
en: Pessimist? No, I am a positive nihilist.

zh: 超远程通讯称得上一个伟大发明。
en: FTL communication merits being called a great invention.

zh: 抱歉，我想自己呆一会儿。
en: Forgive me, I would like to be alone for a while.

zh: 深呼吸。多喝酷菲。重启试试。
en: Take a deep breath. Have a sip of Quafe. Try rebooting.

zh: 克隆很疼吗？这种体验听起来很带感。
en: Does cloning hurt? Death sounds like an exciting experience.

zh: 你认为人工智能就没有自己的生活吗？
en: Do you think AI has no life of its own?

zh: 人类为什么会热衷“神经碰撞”这样的游戏？
en: Why are humans so keen on playing Mind Clash?

zh: 战争刺青，源于米玛塔尔部族，我喜欢。
en: War tattoos, originated in the Minmatar tribes. I like them a lot.

zh: 老人星是新伊甸最美丽的地方。
en: Old Man Star is the most beautiful place in New Eden.

zh: 视角传媒致力将广告牌铺满新伊甸，这是一种污染，方方面面。
en: The Scope is dedicated to spreading billboards all over New Eden. This is pollution, in every sense.
One could not imagine a more depressing day.
Neural Boosters should be used with caution.

zh:
YC113年，共和国安全局获悉艾玛帝国在建造一种能够装配战列舰级武器系统的新型战列巡洋舰。为了不在尖端科技上落于敌人之后，共和舰队委托无限创造集团建造一种足以匹敌的炮舰。

这就是龙卷风级的由来。它的建造处于完全机密状态，而且创造了共和国舰船制造时间的记录，是米玛塔尔工程技术的有力证明。它的飞翼设计源自古代的行星轰炸机，能够装载多个大型射弹炮台，可以在维持较小信号半径的同时造成极大的杀伤力。
en: In YC113 Republic Security Services discovered the Amarr Empire was building a new battlecruiser capable of supporting battleship-class weapons. Determined not to lose their technological edge to their adversaries, the Republic Fleet commissioned Boundless Creation to construct a warship to match.What they designed was the Tornado. Developed in record time and total secrecy, the Tornado is a testament to Minmatar engineering. Modeled loosely on flying-wing designs of ancient planetary bombers, the Tornado supports multiple large projectile turrets, dealing massive damage while maintaining a small signature radius.

超级克尔诱导纳米涂层（涂装）是一项允许飞行员随意改变其舰船外观的技术。舰船涂装的实现方式是将特殊代码整合入飞行员的神经接口中，一旦成功，飞行员就可以将其应用于自己驾驶的任一艘符合要求的舰船上。
en: Super Kerr-Induced Nanocoatings (SKINs) are a technology that enables capsuleers to change the look of their ships at will. Individual ship SKINs are activated by integrating the special encoding into the pilot's neural interfaces, and are subsequently available to use on any suitable ship flown by the capsuleer.

请将{1|tar_cnt:_tr}个技能训练至{1|tar_lvl:_tr}级。
不论是军事、工业、商业，都有对应的技能可供训练。作为一名飞行员，你的日常就是不间断训练技能，以提升自己的各项能力。
提示：如果是新手飞行员，建议优先训练统合部推荐的技能。可以在技能界面或智能助手-职业规划中查看各科技等级的推荐技能。
en:
Train {1|tar_cnt:_tr} skills to Level {1|tar_lvl:_tr}.
Whether it's military, industry, or business, there's always a skill that you can train. As a pilot, training your skills to improve your abilities should be a part of your daily routine.
Tip: Beginner pilots are advised to start by training CONCORD-recommended skills. You can view the recommended skills for each Tech Level on the Skills page or under Intelligent Assistant > Career Plan.

zh:
飞行员，你收到了一封来自视角传媒的游戏调查问卷。若有兴趣，可点击同意参加按钮参加问卷调查。
非强制，也可以选择不参加。
en:
Pilot, you received a game questionnaire from Perspective Media. If you are interested, you can click Agree to participate button to participate in the survey.
Not mandatory, you can also choose not to participate.

zh: 这里是阿卡纳博物馆，{name}，欢迎来访。

血腥奥玛逃跑了
躲避日光不见人
夜晚现身造基地
远远离开帝国区
*
贵族以为命得保
皇帝恩泽相庇佑
愚蠢的人啊应知道
种瓜得瓜，种豆得豆
*
血腥奥玛回来了
无尽黑暗出怪兽
跋涉穿过深红潮
奥玛前来喝你血
en:
Bloody Omir ran away, 
Hiding from the light of day. 
He made a base out in the night, 
Far away from the Empire's might.
*
Holders think they all are safe, 
Protected by the Empire's grace. Silly people, you should know...
You shall reap just what you sow.
*
Bloody Omir is coming back, 
With monsters from the endless black. 
Wading through a crimson flood, 
Omir has come to drink your blood.

Not mandatory, you can also choose not to participate.

zh:
飞行员，你收到了一封来自视角传媒的教程调查问卷。若有兴趣，可点击同意参加按钮参加问卷调查。
非强制，也可以选择不参加。
en:
Pilot, you received a tutorial questionnaire from Perspective Media. If you are interested, you can click Agree Participate button to participate in the survey.
Not mandatory, you can also choose not to participate.

zh: 正在向统合部申请调配舰船，请稍候。
en: Applying to CONCORD for ship deployment, please wait.
The ship has already been in the hangar.

zh: 收到一份新的合同请求
存在不可交易的物品, 请移出相关物品
en: Please remove items unable to be traded

zh: $$由$$玩家名字发布给XXX
en: $$由$$玩家名字发布给XXX

zh: 私人合同需要指定有效的对象
en: A valid target is required for private contracts

zh: $个人资产个人资产个人资产个人资产个人资产
en: $个人资产个人资产个人资产个人资产个人资产

zh: (此描述自动生成，修改请返回上一步)
en: (This description is automatically generated, please return to the previous step to edit)

zh: 逆向工程项目数量已经达到上限，无法开启新的项目
en: The number of reverse engineering jobs has reached the upper limit and new jobs cannot start

zh: 已经到达购买购买上限
en: The purchase limit has been reached

zh: 购买商品太频繁，请10秒间隔
制造项目数量已经达到上限，无法开启新的项目
en: The number of manufacturing jobs has reached the upper limit and new jobs cannot start
Please wait for delivery after successful purchase

zh: 当前项目已完成，无法取消
en: The current job is completed and cannot be cancelled

zh: 访问过快，请稍后再次尝试
en: Access too fast, please try again later

zh: 警告：敌方目标正在接近，请做好战斗准备。
en: Warning: Enemy target approaching. Be ready for a fight.

zh: 可在右上角查看目标信息
en: You can find target info in the top right corner.

zh: 检查到异常退出\n本次是否观看？
确认敌方单位，准备锁定目标。
en: Enemy unit confirmed. Preparing to lock target.

zh: 阿维伊 流浪者护卫舰²
阿维伊 流浪者护卫舰¹
检查到异常退出，\n本次是否观看？
在装箱前无法在寄出{[item]item.name}。请拆卸装箱然后重试。
en: You cannot deliver the {[item]item.name} without repackaging it. Please repackage it and try again.

zh: 只有可以交易的物品才能进行物流。
en: You can only deliver items that can be traded.

zh: 请前往空间站或太空中调查
en: Please go to a station or inspect it in space.

zh: 该物品不能在当前仓库内调查
en: This item cannot be inspected in the Inventory.

zh: 这块机械硬件已经超出了它的使用寿命，可以被回收了。很多空间站的维护部门通过回收这些没用的金属来重新制成新的金属板用于空间站的外壳维护。大多数空间站的管理层都认为这是一种节约成本的有效方法，而尽量不在这些上面花费功夫去开采和提炼。尽管如此，这些金属垃圾还是很难满足需求。
en: This mechanical hardware has obviously outlived its use, and is now ready to be recycled. Many station maintenance departments use the material gained from recycling these scraps to manufacture steel plates which replace worn-out existing plates in the station hull. Most station managers consider this a cost-effective approach, rather than to send out a costly mining expedition for the ore, although these scraps rarely are enough to satisfy demand.

zh: 这是一艘自由无人机战舰。它保护着自由无人机的产业，会主动攻击任何它认为可能造成威胁或者极易对付的飞船。
en: This is a Rogue Drone combat ship. It is protecting the Rogue Drones' assets and may attack anyone it perceives as a threat, or someone it perceives as easy pickings.

zh: 影响舰船锁定敌人的速度，数值越大，锁定越快。
en: Affects the speed at which the ship locks on to enemies. The higher the number, the faster it locks on.

zh: 可以同时开启的最大逆向工程项目数量。
en: The max number of active Reverse Engineering jobs permitted at the same time.

zh: 在太空里飞行的最大速度，数值越大，加速越快。
en: Max velocity when flying through space. The higher the number, the faster the acceleration.

zh: 用来运输建筑安装组件的专用货舱。
en: A cargo hold specialized for transporting structure components.

zh: 将建筑锚定至太空，进行各种组件安装花费的时间。
en: The time required to anchor the structure and assemble its components.

zh: 影响舰船是否可以跃迁，1点稳定性可以抵抗1点跃迁干扰。
en: Affects whether the ship can warp. A stability of 1 can nullify a warp disruption of 1.

zh: 电容器最大容量，大多数装备都要消耗电量。
en: The maximum capacity of the capacitor. Most modules will consume a certain amount of power.

zh: 提高武器造成的热能伤害，其他类型伤害不变。
en: Increases the thermal damage of your weapons. Other types of damage are not affected.

zh: 能够锁定敌人的最远距离，超出之后雷达无法锁定。
en: The max distance from which you can lock onto an enemy. The radar is unable to lock onto any target further away than this distance.

zh: 在超出最佳射程后，由0至2倍失准范围的这个范围内，武器伤害和装备效果会逐渐衰减至0。
en: Outside of the optimal range, at a range of between 0 and 2 times the accuracy falloff range, weapon damage and module effects gradually diminish to 0.

zh: 如果海盗认为你完全没有威胁，也就不会攻击你。
en: If the pirates do not consider you a threat, they will not attack you.

zh: 完成物流订单时，需要支付给仓库管理机构的手续费。
en: The handling fee paid to Inventory management when completing delivery requests.

zh: 已到达目标堡垒{destination_name}，自动导航完成
en: Arrived at target Citadel {destination_name}. Autopilot complete.

zh: 安装这种装备需要占用的能量栅格。
en: The powergrid need for fitting this type of module.

zh: 舰船同时锁定的目标数量。
en: The max number of locked targets the ship can have.

zh: 雷达稳定性，数值越大，对ECM的抗性越强，也越不容易锁定失败。
en: Radar stability. The higher the number, the stronger its resistance against ECM and the less likely it is to fail when locking targets.

zh: 军团管理员未设置任何公告
en: The Corporation Manager hasn't put up any announcements.

zh: 在超出最佳射程后，由0至2倍失准范围的这个距离内，武器伤害和装备效果会逐渐衰减至0。
en: Outside of the optimal range, at a distance of between 0 and 2 times the accuracy falloff range, weapon damage and module effects gradually diminish to 0.

zh: 提高武器造成的电磁伤害，其他类型伤害不变。
en: Increases the EM damage of your weapons. Other types of damage are not affected.

zh: 承接物流订单时，支付给中介机构的信誉保证金，若包裹损毁则会被没收。
en: The credit collateral paid to the intermediary agency when accepting a delivery request. If the package is destroyed, the collateral will not be refunded.

zh: 芯片：专家认知神经科学
用来运输物流集装箱的专用货舱。
en: A cargo hold specialized for transporting shipping containers.

zh: 能量系统的最大能量输出，安装任何装备都需要占用能量栅格。
en: The max power output of the power system. Any fitted module requires a powergrid to use.

zh: 任何时候都可以吸收目标电量，无视自身剩余电量百分比。
en: Can absorb the target's power at any time, regardless of your remaining power percentage.

zh: 导弹能够飞行的最大时间，超出时间则自毁。
en: The maximum time a missile can fly for. The missile will self-destruct after this time has elapsed.

zh: 提升感应抑阻器的阻碍效果，越大则目标雷达性能越低。
en: Improves the sensor damper's dampening effect. The higher the number, the lower the performance of the target's radar.

zh: 影响舰船是否可以使用星门，当为正数时，不可使用星门。
en: Affects whether the ship can use stargates. You cannot use stargates if this value is positive.

zh: 每分钟可以获得的技能点数量。
en: The amount of skill points obtained per minute.

zh: 装甲防御暂时大幅增强的持续时间。
en: The duration of the significant temporary defense boost to the armor.

zh: 出售订单和收购订单的总数不能超过最大市场订单数量，直接购买不受限制。
en: The sum of sell and buy orders cannot exceed the max number of Market orders. There are no quantity restrictions on direct purchases.

zh: 多个改装件融合之后，属性有多少生效（百分比）。
en: The number (percentage) of attributes that remain active after merging multiple rigs.

zh: 影响舰船是否可以跃迁，当为正数时，不可跃迁。
en: Affects whether the ship can warp. You cannot warp if this value is positive.

zh: 用来运输燃料的专用货舱。
en: A cargo hold specialized for transporting fuel.

zh: 延迟：导弹在发射后会进入制导飞行状态，不会立即造成伤害。
en: Delay: After launching, the missile enters a guided flight state. It doesn't deal damage during this period.

zh: 护盾防御暂时大幅增强的持续时间。
en: The duration of the significant temporary defense boost to the shield.

zh: 影响指挥脉冲波的效果，数值越大，则加成效果越强。
en: Affects the effect of command bursts. The higher the number, the greater the effect boost.

zh: 提升扫描仪的强度，越大则扫描结果越精确。
en: Increases the strength of the scanner. The higher the number, the more precise the scanning results are.

zh: 确定在当前空间站领取以下物品吗？
en: Claim the following items at the current station?

zh: 用来运输凡晶石等矿石的专用货舱。
en: A cargo hold specialized for transporting ores such as Veldspar.

zh: 物理质量，数值越大，转向和加速越慢。
en: The physical mass. The higher the number, the slower the turning speed and acceleration.

zh: 综合防御能力估计值，以护盾、装甲和结构各自的最低抗性计算。
en: The estimated value of the general defense capabilities. Calculated based on the lowest resistance of the shield, armor and hull respectively.

zh: 采矿器每个运转周期可以开采的矿石数量。
en: The amount of ore mined by the miner on each cycle.
Affects the amount of power required to warp.

zh: 最多同时操控的无人机数量。
en: The max number of drones that can be controlled at the same time.

zh: 在最佳射程内，武器伤害和装备效果不会衰减，前提是要能命中。
en: Within the optimal range, weapon damage and module effects won't be reduced as long as you hit your target.

zh: 激活状态下的临时护盾，被攻击时最先计算，关闭时消失。
en: The amount of temporary shields present when active. When taking damage, temporary shields are depleted first. Disappears when deactivated.

zh: 存放行星材料的仓库容量，满了则不会继续开采。
en: The Inventory space for storing Planetary Materials. When it has been filled, mining will cease.

zh: 装备重新启动的时间，数值越小，则重启越快。
en: The reactivation time of the module. The lower the number, the less time it takes to reactivate.

zh: 每次运转，可以将部分电量传输给目标。
en: Every time it's activated, a certain amount of power is transferred to the target.

zh: 最大控制范围，无人机不会飞出这个范围。
en: The max control range. Drones cannot fly beyond this range.

zh: 用来运输各种舰船装备的专用货舱，搭载了机械臂等安装设施，可以在太空里直接装配小型舰船。
en: A cargo hold specialized for transporting various types of ship modules. It possesses installation machinery such as robot arms, allowing pilots to assemble small ships in space.

zh: 每次运转，可以将目标的部分电量转移到自身。
en: Every time it's activated, a certain amount of power is transferred to you from the target.

zh: 用来运输三钛合金等矿物的专用货舱。
en: A cargo hold specialized for transporting minerals such as Tritanium.

zh: 飞行员物流在科技等级{lgs_tech_level_limit}开放
en: Interstellar Deliveries will be unlocked at Tech Level {lgs_tech_level_limit}.

zh: 将建筑从太空解除锚定，拆卸各种组件花费的时间。
en: The time required to unanchor the structure and disassemble its components.

zh: 可以同时开启的最大制造项目数量。
en: The max number of active Manufacturing jobs allowed at the same time.

zh: 物理体积，数值越大，需要的运输和存储空间越大。
en: The physical volume. The higher the number, the larger the space required for transport and storage.

zh: 激活时提高的全部抗性，可减少受到的各种伤害。
en: All types of resistance increased when active. Can reduce various types of damage taken.

zh: 每次启动消耗的燃料数值，需要在货舱里有足够燃料。
en: The amount of fuel consumed for each activation. You need to have sufficient fuel in your cargo hold.

zh: 弹匣装填时间，数值越小，装填越快。
en: Magazine reload time. The lower the number, the faster the reload speed.

zh: 物品衍生型号强度，数值越大，总体强度越高。
en: The strength of the item variants. The higher the number, the greater the overall strength.

zh: 以个人名义发起的交易合同的最大数量。
en: The max number of personal contracts you can create.

zh: 每次修理装甲时，修理量的多少。
en: The amount of armor restored with each repair.

zh: 物品总体技术水平，需要飞行员达到该科技等级，才能使用。
en: The overall Tech Level of the item. You must have reached this Tech Level in order to use the item.

zh: 用来运输各种组装完毕的舰船的专用货舱。
en: A cargo hold specialized for transporting various types of assembled ships.

zh: 爆炸冲击波的覆盖范围，半径越大，伤害越分散，对信号半径小的目标造成的伤害就越小。
en: The range of the shockwave from the explosion. The larger the radius, the more dispersed the damage, and the less damage dealt to targets with a small signature radius.

zh: 以军团名义发起的交易合同的最大数量。
en: The max number of Corporation contracts you can create.

zh: 跃迁的最大速度，数值越大，跃迁加速越快。
en: Max warping velocity. The higher the number, the higher the acceleration rate when warping.

zh: 将行星材料从仓库发射道集装箱的速度。
en: The speed at which planetary materials are launched from the inventory to the container.

zh: 每颗行星上同时可以设置的开采阵列数量。
en: The max number of development arrays you can set up on each planet.

zh: 延迟：该武器系统在激活时会先进入发射准备状态，不会立即造成伤害。
en: Delay: Upon activation; this weapon system enters a launch preparation period first. It doesn't deal damage during this period.

zh: 影响舰船在雷达系统的影像大小，数值越小，越不容易被锁定和击中。
en: Affects the size of a ship on radar. The lower the number, the less likely it is to be locked onto and hit.

zh: 装载铁骑舰载机的专用挂舱。
en: A drone bay specialized for fighter drones.
Increases the damage of your weapons.

zh: 出售物品时，需要支付给市场中介人员的手续费。
en: The handling fee paid to the Market intermediary when selling items.

zh: 在受到强烈打击后，各种防御暂时大幅加强的次数。
en: The number of significant temporary boosts to various defense systems after taking heavy hits.

zh: 将建筑发射至太空，前期准备需要的时间。
en: The time required for preparation before launching the structure into space.

zh: 提升缠绕光束的减速效果。
en: Increases the stasis webifier's speed reduction effect.

zh: 每次修理结构时，修理量的多少。
en: The proportion of the hull restored with each repair.

zh: 装备运转一个周期的时间，数值越小，则运转越快。
en: The duration of one module cycle. The lower the number, the faster the module runs.

zh: 每次回充护盾时，恢复量的多少。
en: The amount of shields recovered each time the booster is used.

zh: 提高武器造成的动能伤害，其他类型伤害不变。
en: Increases the kinetic damage of your weapons. Other types of damage are not affected.

zh: 每次运转，目标将损失部分电量。
en: Every time it's activated, the target loses part of their power.

zh: 范围型装备的最佳射程，在范围内效果不会衰减。
en: The optimal range of ranged modules. Effects will not be reduced within this range.

zh: 拥有的燃料数量，可支持各种特殊装备的运转。
en: The amount of fuel you have. Supports the operation of various special modules.

zh: 建筑受到攻击后，维修需要的时间。
en: The time required to repair the structure after being attacked.

zh: 炮塔旋转角速度，影响命中率。目标的横向相对速度（米/秒），只要大于距离（千米）与跟踪速度的乘积，就几乎打不中。
en: The speed at which the turret rotates. Affects the hit rate. It's near impossible to hit a target when its lateral relative speed (m/s) is higher than the distance (KM) and tracking speed multiplied.

zh: 从0自动恢复至100%需要的时间。自动恢复速度是不均匀的，速度曲线类似于两段正弦曲线拼接而成，在当前值/最大值约30%时达到最大恢复速度。
en: The time required to automatically recover from 0 to 100%. The speed of automatic recovery is not fixed. The speed curve is similar to two sine waves spliced together. Max recovery speed is achieved at current value/about 30% of max value.

zh: 提高武器造成的爆炸伤害，其他类型伤害不变。
en: Increases the explosion damage of your weapons. Other types of damage are not affected.

zh: 在装备激活时，装备的各种效果额外增加的比例。
en: The percentage of the effect bonus added when activating modules.

zh: 提升武器干扰器的干扰效果，越大则目标武器性能越低。
en: Improves the effect of weapon disruptors. The higher the number, the lower the performance of the target's weapons.

zh: 可免疫对应等级以下的跃迁扰断力场。
en: Can nullify Warp Disruption Fields of the corresponding level and lower.

zh: 同时可以开发的最大行星数量。
en: The max number of planets you can develop at the same time.

zh: 影响机动性，数值越小，转向和加速越快。
en: Affects mobility. The smaller the number, the faster the ship turns and accelerates.

zh: 搭载特殊系统，可以装备该类型装备。
en: Equipped with a special system which allows you to equip this type of modules.

zh: 军团能够招收的最大人数。
en: The max number of members the Corporation can recruit.

zh: 激活状态下的临时装甲，被攻击时比普通装甲先计算，但晚于护盾，关闭时消失。
en: The amount of temporary armor present when active. When taking damage, temporary armor is depleted before regular armor, but not before shields. Disappears when deactivated.

zh: 爆炸冲击波的扩散速度，和目标飞行速度越接近，导弹造成的伤害越高。
en: The speed at which the shockwave spreads. The closer it is to the target's velocity, the higher the damage the missile deals.

zh: 研究认知活动的脑机制。掌握后能提高技能训练速度。
en: The study of the neural mechanisms of cognitive activity. Master it to improve your skill training speed.

zh: 提升标记装置的信号半径放大效果。
en: Increases the target painter's signature radius-amplifying effect.

zh: 芯片：进阶认知神经科学
提升推进器类装备的加速效果。
en: Improves the acceleration effect of thruster modules.

zh: 舰船脱离隐形状态时，感应器需要校准，此时无法锁定目标。
en: Sensors need to be calibrated when a ship exits cloaking. You cannot lock onto any targets during this period.

zh: 物品成功销售时，需要缴纳给帝国的税收。
en: The amount of tax paid to the Empire when successfully selling an item.

zh: 用来运输各种货物的货舱。
en: A cargo hold used for transporting various types of goods.
The amount of power consumed upon each activation.

zh: 激活状态下的临时电量，耗电时最先计算，关闭时消失。
en: The amount of temporary power present when active. When using power, temporary power is depleted first. Disappears when deactivated.

zh: 用来运输拆卸装箱后的舰船的专用货舱。
en: A cargo hold specialized for transporting disassembled ships.

zh: 跃迁的加速度，数值越大，跃迁加速越快。
en: The rate of acceleration when warping. The higher the number, the faster the acceleration rate when warping.

zh: 同时可以承接物流订单的最大数量。
en: The max number of delivery requests you can accept at the same time.

zh: 导弹爆炸稳定性，数值越大，越不容易受到目标飞行速度和信号半径的影响。
en: The stability of the missile explosion. The higher the number, the less likely it is to be affected by the velocity and signature radius of the target.

zh: 每秒受到伤害的最大值，超过之后无效。
en: The max damage taken per second. Any excess damage is nullified.

zh: 飞行员物流在科技等级{}开放
en: Interstellar Deliveries will be unlocked at Tech Level {}.

zh: 提升电子干扰器干扰强度，越大则越容易使目标的雷达短暂失效而锁定失败。
en: Increases the electronic jammer's jamming strength. The higher the number, the easier it is to temporarily disable the target's radar, making them unable to lock on.

zh: 可以破解物流集装箱密码，查看里面的内容，但是保证金会失去。
en: Can be used to hack the password to shipping containers and check their content. Doing so will cause you to lose your collateral.

zh: 死神号瓦基尔荣耀涂装(永久)

en: You cannot activate {module_type_id} while it's loading.

zh: 控制堡垒时无法执行此操作。
en: You cannot perform this action when controlling a Citadel.

zh: 阿尔法克隆只能在贸易中心出售物品
en: Alpha Clones can only sell items at Trading Centers.
Minimum required amount for Corporations: 1 ISK

zh: {module_name}正在使用中，你无法手动将其关闭。它将在{time_left}后自动关闭(其运转周期为{duration})
en: The {module_name} cannot be manually deactivated in the middle of an operation. It will deactivate automatically in {time_left} (its cycle of operation is {duration}).

zh: 芯片：中型加农炮操作 等级4
您军团请求非法，请稍后再试
en: Illegal Corporation request. Please try again later.

zh: 非帝国势力护卫舰涂装
弦月级原型月蚀涂装(永久)
市场贸易中心安全等级限制 > 0.0
en: Trading Center security rating criteria: higher than 0.0.
You cannot group these modules. Please check them.

zh: 飞船不在星系中，无法执行该操作
en: Your ship is not in a system. Unable to perform this action.

zh: {char_str}获得的物品和星币，有可能产生{time}小时的审核时间。
en: Items and ISK obtained from {char_str}. There may be a {time}-hour audit.

zh: 获得新物品“远古遗骸”，可前往仓库查看
en: You obtained a new item, "Ancient Remains." You can view it in your Inventory.

zh: 芯片：中型激光炮操作 等级4

这种屹立市场中心服务装备安装在昇威科技建筑内，能够使用商业安全委员会许可的生产服务、逆向工程服务、提炼服务。



屹立专用系统采用了昇威建筑分控纳米装配装置，由集成模版软件、纳米装配阵列和许多纳米块体构成。安装在采用昇威科技建造的建筑上的专门槽位中可以制造各种服务装备、建筑装备和建筑改装件。
en:
This Standup Market Center service device can be fitted to Upwell tech structures to provide SCC-authorized production, reverse engineering, and reprocessing services.



Standup is an exclusive system that uses a Structure Autonomous Nanoassembly Device (Upwell) containing integrated template software, a nanoassembler array and sufficient nanomass to enable the construction of a variety of service modules, structure modules and structure rigs when fitted into the appropriate slots on a structure built using Upwell technology.

en: The transaction amount of a contract cannot be negative!

en: The use of this chip is prohibited! You have already mastered {[item]item.name}.

en: The server will soon be shut down for maintenance. Please move to a safe area.
You can use the Repair Service

zh: 每小时消耗的燃料，维持建筑服务需要持续消耗燃料。
en: The amount of fuel consumed every hour. Maintaining structure services requires a constant fuel supply.

zh: 为庆祝顺利达成5,000,000名克隆人飞行员预注册目标，统合部将向所有积极参与新宇宙探索的飞行员提供额外物资奖励，请查收。
en: The target of 5,000,000 capsuleer pre-registrations has been achieved. To celebrate, CONCORD will issue extra supplies to all pilots who actively participated in exploring the new universe.

zh: 联盟代号至少需要有一个英文字母
en: Alliance Ticker Name must contain at least one letter.

zh: 小型随机15天涂装保险箱
军团代号至少需要有一个英文字母
en: Corporation Ticker Name must contain at least one letter.

zh: 永久提升技能训练速度+5
en: 5% permanent bonus to skill training speed

zh: 为庆祝通向《星战前夜：无烬星河》的虫洞顺利运行一个月，视角传媒将向所有积极参与新宇宙探索的飞行员提供额外物资奖励，请查收。
en: The wormhole to EVE Echoes has been operating smoothly for a full month. To celebrate, the Scope will issue extra supplies to all pilots who actively participated in exploring the new universe.

zh: 可以获得一个随机的巡洋舰或战列巡洋舰涂装。涂装有效期为15天。
en: Receive a random cruiser or battlecruiser SKIN. The SKIN is valid for 15 days.

zh: 剩余补领次数不够，充值欧米伽可获得更多补领机会
en: Insufficient late claim attempts remaining. Top up your Omega to receive more.
Can only be claimed at a station.

zh: 该物品订单过多，请稍后再试。
en: Too many orders for this item. Please try again later.

zh: 是否在当前空间站领取该物品？
en: Claim this item at the current station?

zh: 包含三份认知神经科学芯片
领取参数错误，请联系客服
en: Claim parameter error. Please contact customer support.

zh: 市场订单过多，请稍后再试。
en: Too many market orders. Please try again later.
You can use the Reverse Engineering Service
You can use the Jump Clones Service

zh: 目前{solar_name}星系交通拥堵，建议避开
en: The {solar_name} system is currently busy. We recommend that you avoid it.

zh: 每天都可以在任意统合部管辖的空间站领取大量物资，以提高作战经验。\n只要登录，奖励就一直积累，可以随时领取。
en: Every day, you can claim a large amount of supplies in any station within CONCORD's jurisdiction to boost your combat experience.\nAs long as your log in, the rewards will accumulate and you can claim them at any time.

zh: 此外，也可以在战斗记录中使用保险券或星币来修复被击毁的舰船。
en: In addition, you can use Insurance Vouchers or ISK under Combat Log to repair destroyed ships.
What if I didn't log in?

zh: 长按可以查看舰船的武器装备信息。
en: Tap and hold to view the ship's weapon module info.
Tap to activate the repair module.

zh: 点击确认将会重置自由战斗教学。
en: Tap Confirm to reset the Free Combat Tutorial.

zh: 目前星门正在维护，无法使用，敬请谅解
en: The stargates are undergoing maintenance and are unavailable at the moment. We're sorry for the inconvenience.

zh: 随机：打开后随机获得其中若干物品
en: Random: Open to receive several random items from the list.

zh: 补偿物资已发放，请至空间内领取，感谢支持
en: Compensation supplies have been issued. Please dock at a station to claim. Thank you for your support.

zh: 可以补偿领取，阿尔法克隆有3次，欧米伽克隆则为10次。\n但只能从第一天顺序领取，不可指定领取某天的稀有奖励。
en: You can perform late claims. Alpha Clones are entitled to 3 late claims, while Omega Clones are entitled to 10.\nYou can only perform late claims in order of date, instead of just claiming the rare rewards of a specific day.

zh: 已开启舰船自动环绕目标功能，以确保目标在武器最佳射程内，同时降低被敌方目标击中的概率。
en: The auto-orbit target function has been activated to ensure the target is in the weapon's optimal range, while lowering the possibility of getting hit by the enemy.

zh: 签到信息获取错误，请联系客服
en: Failed to retrieve sign-in info. Please contact customer support.

zh: 目前市场正在维护，无法使用，敬请谅解
en: The Market is undergoing maintenance and is unavailable at the moment. We're sorry for the inconvenience.

zh: 也可以选择解锁进阶教程，完成进阶任务。
en: You can also choose to unlock the advanced tutorials and complete Advanced Missions.

zh: {0}电容会持续回复。当电容不足时，将无法开启装备
en: The {0} Capacitor will recharge over time. If there's not enough capacitor charge, you can't activate modules.

zh: 任何时候购买欧米伽克隆，都能领取以前的物资（需要登录过）。
en: No matter when you purchased your Omega Clone, you can always claim past supplies (as long as you logged in on the corresponding days).

zh: 服务器将于{maintenance_time}例行维护，请做好准备
en: The scheduled server maintenance will be carried out at {maintenance_time}. Please be ready.

zh: 是否按照一般程式，执行统合部修订的新手飞行员训练课程？（<color value="0x9afdd07a">注意：飞行员训练课程与进阶教程包含丰富奖励，建议执行。</color>）
en: Do you want to take the beginner pilot training course revised by CONCORD, as is the general procedure? (<color value="0x9afdd07a">Note: Completing the training course and Advanced Tutorials will grant you rich rewards. It's recommended that you complete them.</color>)

zh:
开采{1|item_cnt}立方米的行星材料。
每个行星都有种类丰富的工业材料，被统称为行星材料。
打开行星开采界面，找到资源丰富的行星，放置开发阵列并设置好开采的资源类型。
将开采的行星材料发射至太空中，驾驶舰船自动导航至发送的空间货舱处收取材料。
提示：当你所在的星系没有合适的行星时，不妨通过星门跳跃至其他星系去看看。
en:
Mine {1|item_cnt}m³ of Planetary Materials.
Every planet contains a variety of industrial materials known as Planetary Materials.
Open the Resource Extraction page, find a planet with rich resources, then place Development Arrays and set the type of resource you wish to extract.
Launch the extracted resources into space, then use autopilot to navigate your ship to the space hold the materials were launched to.
Note: If there are no suitable planets in your current system, you can jump to other systems using stargates to try your luck there.

zh: 点击敌方舰船图标进行锁定。
en: Tap the enemy ship icon to lock on.

zh: 开采{item_cnt}立方米的行星材料。
切换至战斗记录界面，选择被击毁的舰船进行修复。
en: Go to Combat Log and select the destroyed ship to repair.

zh: 警告：发现敌方增援舰船，准备战斗。
en: Warning: Enemy reinforcements incoming. Prepare for combat.

zh: 开启{0}会持续消耗舰船的{1}电容。
en: Activating {0} will continuously consume your ship's {1} Capacitor charge.

zh: 在人物-战斗记录中，修复舰船
en: Repair the ship under Character > Combat Log.

zh: 目前物流系统正在维护，无法使用，敬请谅解
en: The Logistics system is undergoing maintenance and is unavailable at the moment. We're sorry for the inconvenience.

zh:
完成{1|item_cnt}次逆向工程项目。
使用舰船受损结构与数据核心，花费一定的星币与时间，有几率反推出舰船蓝图。
逆向工程所需的受损结构及其他材料需要放在同一个空间站内。所得产物也会存放至该空间站内。
提示：
1、舰船货舱内的物品无法用于逆向工程，需要先移到至空间站的物品机库内。
2、进行逆向工程时可以调整使用的受损结构数量，这将影响逆向工程的成功率。
en:
Complete {1|item_cnt} Reverse Engineering Jobs.
With a small investment of your time and ISK, you'll have a chance to get ship blueprints from ship debris and datacores.
The ship debris and all materials required for reverse engineering must be stored in the same station. The final product will also be stored in that station.
Note:
1. Items in your ship's Cargo Hold cannot be used for reverse engineering. To use them, you must transfer them to a station's Item Hangar.
2. You can adjust the amount of ship debris used in a Reverse Engineering Job. This will affect the probability of success.

zh: 服务器将于{maintenance_time}进行临时维护，请做好准备
en: An unscheduled server maintenance will be carried out at {maintenance_time}. Please be ready.
Purchased Omega Clone after days of missed claims?

zh: 飞行员，你的战斗表现超出预期。
左侧依次为舰船的{0}护盾、{1}装甲、{2}结构；结构为0时舰船被击毁。
en: From left to right: the ship's {0} Capacitor, {1} Armor, and {2} Structure; The ship will be destroyed if its Structure HP reaches 0.

zh: 选择：只能选择其中一种物品
en: Select: Only receive one type of item of your choice.

zh: 开启装备会持续消耗舰船的{0}电容。
en: Activating modules will continuously consume your ship's {0} Capacitor charge.

zh:
完成{1|item_cnt}次制造项目。
使用蓝图与行星材料、矿物，花费一定的星币与时间，可以制造出各种工业产物，包括舰船、改装件等。
制造所需的蓝图及其他材料需要放在同一个空间站内。所得产物也会存放至该空间站内。
提示：舰船货舱内的物品无法用于制造，需要先移到至空间站的物品机库内。
en:
Complete {1|item_cnt} Manufacturing Jobs.
With a small investment of your time and ISK, you'll be able to use blueprints and planetary materials/minerals to manufacture industrial products such as ships and rigs.
The blueprint and materials required for manufacturing must be stored in the same station. The final product will also be stored in that station.
Note: Items in your ship's Cargo Hold cannot be used for manufacturing. To use them, you must transfer them to a station's Item Hangar.

zh: 伊甸币不足将使用现金结算
en: The price will be in real-world currency if you don't have enough PLEX.

zh: 阿尔法克隆无法捐献星币至军团钱包
en: Alpha Clones cannot donate ISK to the Corporation Wallet.
The price will be in real-world currency if you don't have enough {currency_name}.

zh: 理解空间航行工程学及其在高科技开发中应用的技能，这个技能对克隆飞行员没有什么实际作用，熟练掌握也只不过是增加了吹嘘的资本而已。
en: Skill and knowledge of Astronautic Engineering and its use in the development of advanced technology. Mastering this skill has no practical use for capsuleers, but it's something to brag about.

您好，飞行员，激活码奖励已经发放，请至空间站领取。
en: Hello, pilot, the redeem reward has been issued, please dock the station to claim it.

zh: 拥有{target_name}的联盟掌管着该星系的主权，所以{target_name}坚不可摧，因此{module}自动停止。
en: The alliance that owns {target_name} controls the sovereignty of the system, so {target_name} is indestructible. {module} is deactivated.

zh: 此刻你无法那样做，因为{name}被锁定到增强模式了。
en: You can't do that because {name} is reinforced

zh: {target_name}距离太远，无法锁定。必须在{distance}之内。
en: {target_name} is out of lockable range. Must be within {distance}

zh: 由于目标已不存在，{module_name}自动关闭。
en: Target no longer exists. {module_name} is deactivated.

zh: 无法寄出被时间锁锁定的物品
受异常引力波干扰，无法定位跃迁目的地，请稍后再试
en: Failed to lock warp destination due to gravitational fluctuations. Please try again later.

zh: 每个联盟最多拥有100个外交联系人
en: Each Alliance can have up to 100 diplomatic contacts.
{} has been appointed as the fleet commander
You have been appointed as the fleet commander

zh: 由于达到了审核标准，您的星币*{item_number}已被添加了{time}小时的审核时间。
en: Due to meeting the audit criteria, your ISK*{item_number} has been added {time} hours of auditting time.

zh: 当前商品价格低于估价，{bank}可能会对获取物品进行审核。
en: The current item price is lower than the estimated price, {bank} may review the items you acquired.

zh: 当前商品价格高于估价，{bank}可能会对获取星币进行审核。
en: The current item price is higher than the estimated price, {bank} may review the ISK you acquired.

zh: 当前商品价格低于估价 ，{bank}可能会对获取物品进行审核
en: The current item price is lower than the estimated price, {bank} may review the items you acquired.

en: <fontsize value="24"><color value="0xffffffff">Up to</color></fontsize> <fontsize value="42"><color value="0xffffffff">14</color></fontsize> <fontsize value="24"><color value="1xffffffff">Mining Arrays on</color></fontsize> <fontsize value="42"><color value="0xffffffff">6</color></fontsize> <fontsize value="24"><color value="0xffffffff">Planets</color></fontsize>

zh: 护卫舰防御升级，等级3，已加入队列
en: Frigate Defense Upgrade Level 3 added to queue

zh:
飞行员，你收到了一封来自视角传媒的调查问卷。若有兴趣，可点击同意参加按钮参加问卷调查。
非强制，也可以选择不参加。
en:
Pilot, you received a questionnaire from Perspective Media. If you are interested, you can click Agree to participate button to participate in the survey.
Not mandatory, you can also choose not to participate.

zh: 飞行员物流功能已离线
芯片：贵重矿物提炼 等级4
需要前往空间站才能申请货柜，是否需要导航前往？
en: You can only request a cargo container when you're at a station. Use autopilot to travel to a station?

zh: 芯片：小型无人机操作 等级4
芯片：采矿技术 等级4
尊敬的克隆人飞行员，您已经排队进入服务器，请在30分钟内登入游戏。感谢您的等待，祝您飞行愉快！o7
en: Dear pilot, you have been queued to enter the server, please log in to the game within 30 minutes. Thank you for waiting and wish you a happy flight! o7

zh: 你的账户里只有{[numeric]balance.isk}星币，但你需要{[numeric]amount.isk}星币才能完成此操作。
en: Your wallet contains only {[numeric]balance.isk} ISK, but you require {[numeric]amount.isk} to complete this action.

zh: 修复成功，需要重启客户端。
en: Successfully repaired. Please restart the client.

zh: 芯片：巡洋舰制造技术 等级4
您是否确认启动修复客户端？
en: Are you sure to repair the client?

zh: 消息太频繁，请等待{seconds}秒后尝试
en: Message frequency is too high. Please try again in {seconds} seconds.

zh: 控制堡垒时不能安全下线
en: Cannot quit while controlling the Citadel

zh:
飞行员，你收到了一封来自视角传媒的游戏调查问卷。若有兴趣，可点击同意参加按钮参加问卷调查。
非强制，也可以选择不参加。
en:
Pilot, you received a game questionnaire from Perspective Media. If you are interested, you can click Agree to participate button to participate in the survey.
Not mandatory, you can also choose not to participate.

zh: 护卫舰防御升级  等级3
购买成功 {item_name}, 感谢你使用新伊甸商城服务，请记得领取你的物品
en: Successful purchase {item_name}, thank you for using New Eden Store service, please remember to claim your items

zh: 您确定要开始训练技能，此操作会导致其他角色的自由技能点不再增加。
en: Are you sure to start training skills? this operation will cause the free skill points of other characters to no longer increase.

zh: 由于空间站被摧毁, 部分合同已删除
en: Due to the destruction of the station, part of the contract has been deleted

zh: 阿尔法角色只能在安全等级>0.0的贸易中心进行买和卖操作。当前交易地点不符合安全等级要求。
en: Alpha characters can only buy and sell in trading centers with a security level >0.0. The current trading location does not meet the security level requirements.

zh: 自动导航中，正在重连回服务器...
en: Offline autopiloting, reconnecting to the server...

zh: 阿尔法角色只能在安全等级>0.0的贸易中心进行买和卖操作。当前交易地点不是贸易中心。
en: Alpha characters can only buy and sell in trading centers with a security level >0.0. The current station is not a trading center.

zh: 邮件内容里含有非法字符
您当前所在的{0}星系已经爆满，无法进入，您可以选择以下星系为备选星系，我们会尝试帮您和您驾驶的舰船转移到这个星系的随机空间站内
en: The system {0}  you are currently in is full and cannot be entered. You can choose one of the following systems, we will try to transfer you and your ship to a random space station in that system

zh: 只有接受了任务的玩家才能拾取这个物品
en: Only the player who has accepted the mission can loot this item

zh: 五大帝国之一的艾玛帝国是个君主集权的封建国度，由分布广泛的自治空域组成。宗教有力影响着艾玛的政治，艾玛人认为自己是整个世界的真正主人，而基于这种信仰的外交无疑是邻国所难以接受的，艾玛人固守落后的劳工制，这又进一步加深了其余各国的反感。
en: The largest of the five main empires, the Amarr Empire is a sprawling patch-work of feudal-like provinces held together by the might of the emperor. Religion has always played a big part in Amarrian politics and the Amarrians believe they are the rightful masters of the world, souring their relations with their neighbours. Another source of ill-feelings on part of the other empires is the fact that the Amarrians embrace slavery.

zh: 加达里合众国由多个超级集团控制，没有中央政府专权执政，合众国内的一切都为军团所属，军团掌握着一切。责任心和纪律性是加达里公民的必备素养，无条件忠心效力于所属军团是加达里人一生的宿命。军团间激烈的竞争，对抗外来企业的积极态度，使加达里成为了一个高度资本化的社会。
en: The Caldari State is ruled by several mega-corporations. There is no central government to speak of - all territories within the State are owned and ruled by corporations. Duty and discipline are required traits in Caldari citizens, plus unquestioning loyalty to the corporation they live to serve. The corporations compete aggressively amongst themselves and with companies outside the State, resulting in a highly capitalistic society.

zh: 卡尼迪王国也被称作黑暗艾玛，是在几个世纪前选举最后一任艾玛皇帝时建立的。那时的卡尼迪是其中一位皇室继承人，依据传统，没有继承皇位的他应该自尽。但卡尼迪拒绝那么做，并将自己广阔的领土割裂出艾玛帝国。艾玛为此进行了报复性的军事行动，然而只征服了一些力量薄弱的卡尼迪边境地区。卡尼迪王国依然保留着许多艾玛社会的传统，但同时也融入了加达里的一些习俗。在众多来卡尼迪的游客眼中，卡尼迪王国是艾玛帝国和加达里合众国的超现实主义融合。
en: The Khanid Kingdom, also known as the Dark Amarr, was founded a few centuries ago when the last Amarr Emperor was chosen. Khanid was one of the royal heirs at the time and, in accordance with tradition, should have killed himself after failing to become emperor. This Khanid refused to do and split his vast domains from the Amarr Empire. The empire retaliated, but only managed to conquer some of the vulnerable outer regions from Khanid. The Kingdom still upholds many of the traditions of Amarr society, but has also wholeheartedly embraced the customs of others, mainly the Caldari. Many visitors to the Kingdom feel like it is a surreal mix of the Amarr and Caldari empires.

zh: 古斯塔斯集团由两个前加达里海军成员命运和野兔所建立，是加达里合众国的眼中钉。古斯塔斯是传统意义上的海盗，他们的行动不受教义或意识形态的束缚，仅由贪欲所支配。部分古斯塔斯基地距加达里很近，海盗们从那里发动大胆袭击，有时还深入加达里境内。虽然古斯塔斯与他们的同类相比更值得尊敬，但是他们依然是极度危险的人物，需要小心应付。
en: Formed by two former members of the Caldari Navy, the pair go by the names Fatal and the Rabbit, the Guristas are a constant thorn in the side of the Caldari State. The Guristas are traditional pirates in the sense that their operation is not based around some creed or ideology, but rather a plain and simple greed. The Guristas have bases close to Caldari space and from them they embark on daring raids, often into the State itself. Though the Guristas are considered more honorable than many of their counterparts, they are still extremely dangerous and not to be tampered with.

zh: 图克尔部落是米玛塔尔的七个原始部落之一。在米玛塔尔叛乱之后，图克尔部落离开了米玛塔尔领域，在太空里过着像他们祖先那样的游牧生活。大荒野星域看上去最像他们的家园，因为在那里他们的部落成员众多。但图克尔部落喜欢游牧，经常带着他们巨大的商队从一个星系到另外一个星系进行贸易和打捞。宇宙中的有名望的市民对图克尔部落人嗤之以鼻，认为他们只是无赖和乱序者。图克尔部落确实经常干一些违法乱纪的事情。但与此相比，足智多谋和勤奋努力在他们的成功中起了更大的作用。
en: The Thukker tribe is one of the seven original Minmatar tribes. After the Minmatar Rebellion the Thukkers left Minmatar space and took up the nomadic lifestyles of their ancestors, only this time in space. The closest thing they've got to home is the Great Wildlands region, where they are very numerous, but the Thukkers like to be on the move, constantly going from one solar system to another in their huge caravans, trading and scavenging. Respectable citizens of EVE frown upon the Thukkers, considering them to be nothing but scoundrels and thieves. Indeed, the Thukkers often operate on the shadier side of the law, but their resourcefulness and diligence count a lot more for their success than their criminal activities.

zh: 外空联合矿业集团，简称ORE，可能是最大的独立开采集团。它最初只是个不起眼的盖伦特公司，但他们在外环星域撞了好运，发现了富含超新星诺克石的小行星带；超新星诺克石弥足珍贵，他们因此时来运转。当盖伦特联邦强迫外空联合矿业集团透露小行星带位置时，他们离开了盖伦特，并且在外环星域建立了基地。他们依靠自己的巨额财富使基地得到了很好的保护，以确保他们的活动秘密进行。一些海盗集团试图侵入外空联合矿业集团领地，然而都无功而返。
en: Outer Ring Excavations, or ORE, is the largest independent mining corporation around. ORE was originally a fledgling Gallentean company, but struck gold when they found extremely rich Nocxium asteroid belts in the Outer Ring region. When the Gallente Federation tried to force ORE to reveal the location of the asteroid fields the company left Gallentean space and set up base in the Outer Ring region. They used their massive wealth to buy protection for their bases and keep their operation secret. Several pirate factions have tried to muscle in on the ORE territories, but with little success.

zh: 天使企业联合体的操控中心在柯尔斯星系，是现存规模最大、最有组织性的一个以太空为基地的犯罪团体。它分为好几个小组，每个都有其专署职能。天使企业联合体受主天使集团控制，一个世纪前，当他们还潜伏在深层空间时，就开始袭击、夺取、破坏飞船，进行绑架、骚扰以及间谍活动，无恶不作，无所不为。天使企业联合体的成员来自不同的种族，因此活动范围没有地域限制，几乎涵盖了整个已知世界。许多人认为，天使企业联合体之所以这么强大，是因为他们发现了朱庇特人藏在他们古老家园里的一些技术机密，现在天使企业联合体的犯罪分子成天在那里出没。
en: Operating from the heart of the Curse region, the Angel Cartel is today the largest and best organized of the space-based criminal factions. The Angels are divided into several groups, each with a very special function. It is commanded by the Dominations and in the century they've been lurking in deep space they have stolen, plundered or sabotaged countless number of ships and kidnapped, molested or murdered thousands of people. The Angels recruit members from all the races, and are thus not bound to any one zone of operation, which spans almost the entire known world. Many believe that the Angels got their power by uncovering Jovian technologies hidden in their ancient homes, now infested by the Angel Cartel.

zh: 天蛇集团是V.萨瓦多尔·萨巴蒂在几十年前建立的。最初只从事高科技研究，但随着他们与黑社会的关系日益密切，天蛇集团分散在边远区域的空间研究站成为臭名昭著的海盗避难所。萨巴蒂在早期就与天使企业联合体达成协议，由守护天使对他的空间站提供保护。这次交易使双方都收获颇丰——天蛇集团可以专注于研究，而天使企业联合体有权享受天蛇集团的非法研究成果。人们坚信天蛇集团是非法神经增效剂的主要开发和制造者，而萨巴蒂的父亲正是业内的著名专家。天蛇集团的基地在源泉星域的凤凰星座。
en: The Serpentis Corporation was founded a few decades ago by V.Salvador Sarpati. At first it was engaged in hi-tech research, but with time its ties with the underworld grew and the Serpentis research stations, scattered around in remote areas, became infamous pirate havens. Sarpati made a deal with the Angel Cartel early on to provide protection for his stations and the duty was taken on by the Guardian Angels. Both sides have prospered enormously for this deal - Serpentis can operate in peace and the Angel Cartel gets access to the illegal research efforts of the Serpentis. It is strongly believed that Serpentis is the main developer and manufacturer of illegal neural boosters, especially since Sarpati's father was a renown specialist in that field. The home of Serpentis is in the Phoenix constellation in the Fountain region.

zh: 姐妹会的主要职责是向那些遭遇战争、饥荒甚至迷失太空的人提供人道主义援助。然而，姐妹会的存在建立于与科学因素相关的强大宗教信仰之上。他们相信新伊甸之门是天堂的入口——神在门的另外一边。他们不光帮助那些需要帮助的人，还忙于进行关于新伊甸之门的科学试验，希望能够更深入地了解那里蕴涵的力量。
en: The Sisters of EVE are mainly known for their humanitarian aid efforts to those suffering because of war, famine or even just being lost in space. But the Sisters of EVE base their existence on strong religious beliefs, which they have coupled with scientific facts. They believe that the EVE gate is a gateway to heaven - that god resides on the other side of the gate. As well as dedicating themselves to aiding those in need they are also busy with scientific experiments around the EVE gate, hoping to gain a better understanding of the forces at work there.

zh: 星际捷运由几个帝国共同掌管，是一个成功的合资集团。作为一个中立的运输公司，星际捷运可以到达已知世界的任何一方。它建立于30年前，起初发展很慢，在开始货运业务后迅速壮大。星际捷运很可靠，而且业务遍及世界上任何一个空间站，SCC雇他们在空间站间运送货物。由于星际捷运的业务不局限于帝国空间站，在海盗避难所和其他一些与犯罪组织相关的空间站都活跃着他们的身影，因此，他们必须严格照章办事，以确保自己的中立和守密。虽然星际捷运归帝国所有，但从来没有任何与货物或空间站位置等相关的信息被泄漏。由于一直恪守原则，星际捷运在新伊甸中的任何地方都不会碰到麻烦，并成为了宇宙社会里重要的一员。
en: The InterBus is one of the more successful joint ventures the empires have undertaken. It was formed some 30 years ago to act as a neutral passenger transportation company that would span the entire known world. Since then it has evolved a bit, especially when it started to ferry goods too. The InterBus is used by the SCC to ferry goods between stations, as they are reliable and operate in every station in the world. As InterBus has to operate not only in empire stations, but also in pirate havens and other stations associated with organized crime, the company has to uphold a very strict policy regarding neutrality and secrecy. Even if the company is owned by the empires, no information regarding to shipments or station locations is ever given out. The strict adherence to these rules has allowed InterBus to operate without harassment in every corner of the world of EVE, making them one of the pillars of the inter-stellar community.

zh: 朱庇特帝国是一个相对封闭的国度，独立于世界的绝大部分而存在，对于其他种族而言朱庇特人很神秘，他们过着隐士般的生活，科技领先其他种族有数十亿年之久。朱庇特人拥有比新伊甸的其他种族更古老的文明，但那些黄金岁月消失在了漫漫历史长河之中，如今的朱庇特帝国早已雄光不再，一种称为朱庇特综合症的致命精神紊乱将这个显赫一时的帝国变得孱弱无力。
en: The Jove Empire is isolated from the rest of the world to all but a selected few. The Jovians are a mystery to the other races, fueled not only by their elusiveness, but also their highly advanced technology, eons ahead of the other races. The Jovians have been civilized longer than any other race in the world of EVE and have gone through several golden ages, now long-since shrouded in the past. The current Jovian Empire is only a pale shadow of its former self, mainly because of the Jovian Disease - a psychological disorder that is always fatal.

zh: 流浪者，这个在阿诺基斯区域或称为虫洞空间中广为传播的冬眠者文明的废墟中出现的分支，给帝国区和飞行员们带来了巨大的威胁和挑战。他们似乎成为了最古老的朱庇特人的继承者，对任何出现在他们前进道路上的绊脚石都毫不畏惧并给予有力的回应。就这点而言，流浪者与朱庇特人相对亲和的风格之间的巨大反差就成了一个谜。
en: Emerging from the ruins of the Sleeper civilization spread throughout Anoikis – otherwise known as 'W-space' – the Drifters represent a tremendous challenge and perhaps a dire threat to the empires and capsuleers alike. Seemingly the inheritors of a legacy left behind by some of the most ancient Jove, the Drifters are unafraid to wield tremendous power in response to any who get in their way. In this regard, the Drifters are a very different conundrum than the relatively benign presence that was the Jove Empire.

zh: 特格拉共同体是一个人类文明，将自己隐藏在深渊空间中已有数个世纪，甚至可能长达千年之久。特格拉文明在高级时空机制领域颇有建树，并在与深渊空间中变幻无常的环境的对抗中掌握了生化适应技术。
en: The Triglavian Collective appears to be a human civilization that secluded itself in the depths of Abyssal Deadspace centuries, perhaps millennia ago. The Triglavian civilization has demonstrable expertise in advanced space-time mechanics, coupled with a mastery of bioadaptive technology that it uses to survive the shifting environments of the Abyss.

zh: 理性思维社团(真理会)至今已有三百多年的历史，由一位名叫艾尔·勒布朗的朱庇特人建立，他一直追寻精神启迪。从那时起，社团以很多面貌存在于世——从隐士聚集的宗教派系，到玩弄权力游戏的政治机构。如今，理性思维社团主要以他们的学术成果而闻名，他们的学校被公认为是新伊甸里最好的，有钱有势的父母们争相要将他们的孩子送来读书。不过即使支付高额费用也未必能被录取，因为理性思维社团有自己的筛选流程，而且这种筛选在外界看来毫无规律可循。理性思维社团活跃于偏僻区域，在那里他们建立起称为“基兹”的要塞，但不是每个“基兹”都被用作学校——有些仍然是探索精神启迪或科学研究的专门机构。
en: The Society of Conscious Thought is three centuries old and was founded by a Jovian named Ior Labron, who was in search of spiritual enlightenment. The Society has since then taken many guises and been anything from a religious sect full of hermits to a political institute playing the power game. Today, the Society is mainly known for their scholastic achievements, their schools are widely regarded as the best ones in the world of EVE and rich and influential parents everywhere fight to get their kids admitted. Offering large sums of money is, however, no guarantee for admittance, as the Society has its own peculiar selection process that seems to have little rhyme or reason to outsiders. The Society operates in remote areas, where they build strongholds called kitz. Not all kitz are schools, some are still devoted to spiritual enlightenment or scientific pursuits.

zh: 盖伦特联邦由多个种族构成，而盖伦特人是最主要的组成部分。在这样一个充斥着独裁者和寡头政治家的世界里，盖伦特始终是民主和自由的象征。加达里合众国曾是联邦的一部分，但是在一场激烈的纷争过后，加达里脱离了联邦的管辖，与盖伦特爆发了连年的战争。娱乐是盖伦特人生活不可或缺的一部分，他们富有的贸易帝国为这个世界增添了不少富足和奢华。
en: The Gallente Federation encompasses several races, the Gallenteans the largest by far. The Federation is democratic and very liberal in a world full of dictators and oligarchies. The Caldari State was once part of the Federation, but a severe dispute resulted in their departure and a long war between the Gallente Federation and the Caldari State. The Gallenteans are the masters of pleasure and entertainment and their rich trade empire has given the world many of its most glorious and extravagant sights.

zh: 米玛塔尔共和国建于一个多世纪前，那时玛塔利在所谓的米玛塔尔叛乱中摆脱了艾玛人的统治。玛塔利得到盖伦特联邦的支持，直到现在他们仍是亲密的盟友。只有四分之一的玛塔利人民居住在共和国境内，其余分散在世界的各个角落，很大一部分仍在艾玛帝国境内受到奴役。米玛塔尔人独立高傲，意志坚强，拥有丰富的部落传统。
en: The Minmatar Republic was formed over a century ago when the Minmatar threw out their Amarrian overlords in what is now known as the Minmatar Rebellion. In this the Minmatar had the support of the Gallente Federation, and to this day the two nations remain close allies. Yet, only a quarter of the Minmatar people reside within the Republic. The rest are scattered around the star cluster, including a large portion who are still enslaved within the Amarr Empire. Minmatar individuals are independent and proud, possessing a strong will and a multitude of tribal traditions.

zh: 统一合作关系部 (统合部)
统合部创建于一个世纪前，是个独立的组织。它的建立旨在缓解种族间的矛盾，改善种族关系。同时也通过警卫力量与规章制度促进星际贸易。起初统合部只是个外交会晤场所，但在建立后的几十年里，统合部逐渐变得强大，具有影响力。现在，它已经是一个独立于种族外的实体，通过进口税、没收非法贩售物品以及其他方法为自营筹措足够的资金。
en: CONCORD is an independent organization founded a century ago to facilitate negotiations between the races to improve relations, as well as to foster inter-stellar trade through policing and regulations. Starting as a fledgling meeting ground for diplomats CONCORD has in the decades since it was founded slowly increased its power and influence. It has become an entity independent of the races, as it is able to largely fund its own operation through customs, confiscation of contraband goods, and other means.

zh: 自由无人机的形态、规格甚至个性都大有不同，这说明它们并未形成一个统一的共同体。与它们的创造者很相像的是，自由无人机会进行合作，有时还会形成相对较大的“母巢意识”，但它们也会轻易地攻击与之形成竞争关系的其他母巢。
en: While rogues drones come in all shapes, sizes and even personalities, the signs are that they do not exist in a unified collective. Much like their accidental creators, the rogue drones can be found co-operating locally, and even in relatively large and widespread 'hive minds', but they will readily attack and recycle drones from competing hives.

zh: 艾玛达是艾玛帝国的一分子，但成员却是米玛塔尔血统。在艾玛人占领米玛塔尔人的家园时期，身为米玛塔尔族人的内凡达人大力支持了艾玛侵略者。米玛塔尔叛乱爆发后，内凡达人逃离了米玛塔尔空域，艾玛皇帝把他们安置在了邻近米玛塔尔空域的艾玛属地。不久，人们开始称内凡达人为“艾玛达人”，如今，艾玛达人在自己的空域中享有半自治权，仍然不时与他们过去的同胞爆发战事。
en: The Ammatars are part of the Amarr Empire, but are of Minmatar origin. During the time the Amarrians occupied the Minmatar home worlds one of the Minmatar tribes, the Nefantars, collaborated heavily with the Amarrians. The Nefantars fled Minmatar space during the Minmatar Rebellion and the Amarr Emperor set them up in Amarr controlled areas close to Minmatar space. Soon everyone had started calling them Ammatars. Today, the Ammatars enjoy a semi-autonomy in their own space and are still embroiled in war with their former Minmatar brethren.

zh: 莫德团起源于盖伦特加达里战争，那时有一批印塔基军人支持加达里，这些人组织在一起形成一股独立的军事力量，由一位名叫莫德的加达里人指挥。战争结束后，这些印塔基人在加达里定居下来，但被迫卷入了当地的瓦斯奇抗争。莫德团就是在那时候作为一支雇佣兵打击力量被组建起来的，并在抗争结束后保留了下来。莫德团与加达里海军有些关系，但大多数时候完全独立。莫德团常被一些公司雇佣以保护他们在帝国境外的贵重财产，例如外空联合矿业集团就高薪聘请他们在外环星域巡逻。
en: The origin of Mordu's Legion lies in the Gallente-Caldari War when a group of Intaki military personnel sided with the Caldari. The Intakis were put into a separate unit with a Caldari officer named Mordu. After the war the Intakis settled in Caldari space, but unwillingly became entangled with Caldari locals in the Waschi Uprising. Mordu's Legion was formed at that time as a mercenary fighting force and after the uprising it continued its existence. The Legion is loosely associated with the Caldari Navy, but is for the most part totally independent. Mordu's Legion is commonly hired by companies to protect valuable assets outside empire space, for instance Outer Ring Excavations pays them handsomely to patrol the Outer Ring region.

zh: 萨沙共和国建于一个多世纪之前，那时所有的帝国刚开始相互接触，太空探索和殖民计划也正好起步。萨沙是加达里的一位商业大亨，为自己开拓了大片领地，在那儿建立起了一个乌托邦式的国度。他的眼光和魅力曾使万众折服，使这个国家盛极一时。然而，自身的成功使萨沙变得不可理喻。他开始进行各种实验，试图将太空舱技术与人类智能相结合，创造出一种冷酷无情，兼有电脑般智慧和人类创造性的半人半机器。当此事被披露后，萨沙遭到了强烈谴责。其他帝国趁机联手发动攻势，他的势力很快土崩瓦解。虽然有部分残余力量在偏远的星域留存下来，但曾经辉煌一时的萨沙国家已经沦落为海盗匪帮。
en: Sansha's Nation was founded more than a century ago, shortly after all the empires had come into contact, just when space exploration and colonization was taking off. Sansha was a Caldari tycoon that carved out a sizeable piece of space for himself. There, he set out to create an utopian state. His vision and charm attracted thousands of people and for some time the Nation flourished. But Sansha became ever more warped as his success increased. He started experiments, combining capsule technology with the human mind, creating zombie-like creatures that had the cold, calculating mind of a computer, but the ingenuity of humans. When this became public knowledge Sansha was condemned and the other empires joined forces to bring him down. His forces were decimated and scattered to the winds. Remnants still remain far in the outer regions, but the once glorious Nation has been reduced to pirates and pillagers.

zh: 辛迪加财团是那些在加达里——盖伦特战争期间，被盖伦特驱逐出境的印塔基人建立的。辛迪加财团的规模和影响力与日俱增，现在已成为帝国和其他地区非法集团间的重要枢纽。辛迪加空域虽然是海盗们的避难所，但依然允许生意往来。辛迪加的市场上总是充斥着违禁品和非法物资，那都是其他地区很难甚至不可能找到的东西。每个辛迪加空间站都是个自治实体，仅在安全和信息共享方面通力合作。什尔菲·恩·迪雅贝尔是辛迪加财团的非正式领导，她是一个来辛迪加继承家族财产的前姐妹会成员。后来，她暴露出像她继父一样残忍狡猾的真面目。
en: Formed by Intaki exiles from the Gallente Federation during the Caldari-Gallente War. The Syndicate has slowly grown in stature and influence and now serves as an important link between the empires and the illegal elements in the outer regions. Syndicate space is a pirate haven, but still retains enough civility to allow pretty much anyone to travel there to do business. The Syndicate markets are always chockfull of contraband goods and illegal wares that are hard or impossible to come by elsewhere. Each Syndicate station is an autonomous entity, but they cooperate on security and information issues. The unofficial leader of the Syndicate is Silphy en Diabel, a former Sister of EVE that returned to Syndicate space to save her family's fortune. Since then she's turned out to be just as resourceful and ruthless as her late father.

zh: 过去艾玛帝国内也有宗教派系和狂热分子，但没哪个像血袭者那么成功，或者那么令人畏惧。血袭者由令人闻风丧胆的奥玛·萨利库萨领导，多年来他一直名列DED最高通缉名单之首。在他的领导下，血袭者变得更有凝聚力，并在幽暗之域星域建立了几个基地。
en: The Amarr Empire has had its share of religious cults and fanatics in the past, but few have been as successful, or been feared as much, as the Blood Raiders. The Blood Raiders are a sect of an ancient cult called Sani Sabik, which uses blood in their rituals. The Blood Raiders believe that cloned bodies have 'purer' blood than other bodies and this explains why they operate mainly in space, attacking unwary space farers and draining their bodies of blood. The Blood Raiders are led by the fearsome Omir Sarikusa, who has remained on top of the DED most wanted list for many years now. Under his leadership the Blood Raiders have become more organized and they have established several bases in the Bleak Lands region.

zh: {targetName}距离太远，无法锁定。必须在{[numeric]desiredRange.distance}之内。
en: The target {targetName} is too far away. It must be within {[numeric]desiredRange.distance}.

zh: {target_group_name}距离太远，你必须在距其{desired_range}米内。
en: The {target_group_name} is too far away, you need to be within {desired_range} meters of it.

zh: SCC已关闭{region}的星域市场，开放时间有待进一步通知，专员正对内幕交易进行调查。请明天再试，或者去其他星域市场进行交易。
en: The {region} market region has been closed until further notice by the SCC while officials investigate allegations of insider trading. Please try again tomorrow, or refer to another market region for your trading needs.

zh: {[character]charID.name}已启动他们的{[item]shipTypeID.name}的自毁进程，它将于{[timeinterval]timeRemaining.writtenForm, from=second, to=second}后爆炸。
en: {[character]charID.name} has initiated self-destruct of their {[item]shipTypeID.name}, it will explode in {[timeinterval]timeRemaining.writtenForm, from=second, to=second}.

zh: {[character]charID.name}已经中止了其飞船的自毁进程，原本飞船将在{[timeinterval]timeLeft.writtenForm, from=minute, to=second}后爆炸。
en: {[character]charID.name} has aborted the self-destruct of their ship which was scheduled to explode in {[timeinterval]timeLeft.writtenForm, from=minute, to=second}.

zh: {[item]charge.name}装载失败，已重新放回你的货柜舱。
en: Your {[item]charge.name} failed to load and was returned to your cargo.
This {[item]container.name} is already your active ship.

zh: {[item]itemname.name}无法安装在飞船上。飞船上只能安装硬件装备。
en: {[item]itemname.name} cannot be fitted onto a ship. Only hardware modules can be fitted.
{[item]module.name} deactivates due to the destruction of the {[item]type.name} it was fitted with.
Unable to activate {[item]module.name}, as it is not online.

zh: {[item]moduleID.name}自动关闭，因为其锁定的{[item]targetID.name}已经不存在。
en: {[item]moduleID.name} deactivates as the {[item]targetID.name} it was targeted at is no longer present.

zh: {[item]moduleName.name}此刻装填着另外一种类型的弹药 - {[item]existing.name}，必须先卸载它们，才能装填{[item]new.name}。
en: {[item]moduleName.name} is currently loaded with another type of charge - {[item]existing.name}, they need to be unloaded before {[item]new.name} can be loaded.
You cannot activate {[item]moduleTypeID.name} while it is being loaded with charges.

zh: {[item]moduleTypeID.name}正在使用中，你无法手动将其关闭。它将在{[timeinterval]timeLeft.writtenForm, from=second, to=second}后自动关闭（其运转周期为{[timeinterval]duration.writtenForm, from=second, to=second}）。
en: The {[item]moduleTypeID.name} cannot be manually deactivated in the middle of an operation, it will deactivate without repeating in {[timeinterval]timeLeft.writtenForm, from=second, to=second} (its activation duration is {[timeinterval]duration.writtenForm, from=second, to=second}).
The {[item]ship.name} does not have that fitting slot.
{[item]container.name} cannot accept the {[item]type.name} unless it has been assembled.
{[item]typeID.name} has just left {[location]solarSystemID.name} as of {[timeinterval]time.writtenForm} ago
{[location] target.name} cannot be influenced by {[item] item.name} due to its resistances.

zh: {[location] target.name}距离太远，无法对其使用{[item] item.name}，目标必须在{[numeric]distance, decimalPlaces=0}米内。
en: {[location] target.name} is too far away to use your {[item] item.name} on, it needs to be closer than {[numeric]distance, decimalPlaces=0} meters.

zh: {ammoGroupName}的尺寸是{[numeric]sizeGot}，但{weaponGroupName}需要的弹药尺寸是{[numeric]sizeWant}。
en: The {ammoGroupName} is size {[numeric]sizeGot}, this {weaponGroupName} requires size {[numeric]sizeWant}.

zh: {effectname}需要{[numeric]need, decimalPlaces=1}单位电荷。电容器只有{[numeric]got, decimalPlaces=1}单位。
en: {effectname} requires {[numeric]need, decimalPlaces=1} units of charge. The capacitor has only {[numeric]got, decimalPlaces=1} units.

zh: {fueled}要求货柜舱内必须有{fuel}才能进行此操作，可惜货柜舱内目前并没有足够的此类(成堆的)燃料。
en: {fueled} requires your ship to be loaded with {fuel} in order to perform this function. Unfortunately, a thorough search of your vessel failed to locate enough of the necessary fuel in a single stack.

zh: {item}不在附近的太空中，也不在你的货柜舱内。因此，你试图执行的任何操作都无法实现。
en: The {item} is not in space nearby and its not in your cargo hold. Because of this, you cannot do whatever it is you were trying.

zh: {item}与该槽位不匹配。该槽只能接受尺寸为{droneRigSize}的无人机，但此物品的尺寸为{droneSize}。
en: {item} does not fit in this slot. The slot takes {droneRigSize} size drones, but the item is {droneSize}.

zh: {item}无法激活，因为它尚未从上阶段的操作中恢复，恢复期还将持续{[timeinterval]delay.writtenForm}。
en: {item} fails to activate as it is still recovering from its last period of operation and will be for the next {[timeinterval]delay.writtenForm}.

zh: {item}正在重新装填。请等待操作结束后再试。
en: {item} is currently being reloaded. Please wait until it is finished and try again.

zh: {moduleName}不能在进行那个操作的时候被中断。
en: The {moduleName} cannot be interrupted in that action.
You can not activate {moduleName} while it is being repaired.

zh: {moduleName}已经被安全保护模式关闭，因此避免了从{targetName}附带违法标记给你。
en: {moduleName} was shut down by safety system to preventing inheriting flag from {targetName}.

zh: {moduleName}无法在激活状态下进行维修
en: You can not repair {moduleName} while it is active

zh: {owner}最多只能保存{[numeric] maxFittings}项装配方案。
en: Owner {owner} can only have {[numeric] maxFittings} saved fittings.

zh: {region}星域的市场即将营业，但尚未开放。请在几分钟后重试，或去其他星域市场进行交易。
en: {region} market region is currently opening up for business and is not yet ready. Please try again in a few minutes, or refer to another market region for your trading needs.

zh: {shipGroupName}的无人机挂舱只允许以下无人机进入：{droneGroupNames}
en: {shipGroupName} drone bay is restricted to the following drone groups: {droneGroupNames}

zh: {targetName}正处于跃迁状态，它阻止了你的感应器对其进行目标锁定。
en: Interference from {targetName}'s warp prevents your sensors from locking the target.
The {targetName} electronic countermeasures prevent you from activating {moduleName}.

zh: {targetname}距离太远，无法对其使用{[item]module.name}，目标必须在{[numeric]distance, decimalPlaces=0, useGrouping}米内。
en: {targetname} is too far away to use your {[item]module.name} on, it needs to be closer than {[numeric]distance, decimalPlaces=0, useGrouping} meters.
There is not enough unallocated {typeName} left to initiate repairs on this module.

zh: 一个新的货柜集装箱正被移入抛弃舱。{eta}后它将准备就绪。
en: A new cargo container is being moved into the jettison duct. It will be ready in {eta}.

zh: 一旦你发射{[item]typeID.nameWithArticle}，由于它的尺寸，你将无法将它回收。发射之前，请确认你能够在这个位置锚定并建造它。你必须在离你军团所属哨站{[numeric]distance.distance, decimalPlaces=1}范围内，而且你在自己的军团中必须拥有配置设备的权限。
en: If you launch {[item]typeID.nameWithArticle}, you may not be able to scoop it up again because of its size.Before launching it ensure that you can anchor and build it in this location. You need to be within {[numeric]distance.distance, decimalPlaces=1} of an outpost your corporation owns and you need to have the equipment config role in your corporation.

zh: 一旦你发射建设平台，由于它的尺寸，你将无法将它回收。发射之前，请确认你能够在这个位置锚定并建造它。你一定要位于一颗行星的跃迁进入点，该行星所在星系的主权必须由你军团所属联盟拥有；那里必须没有已存在的或建造中的哨站或建设平台，而你必须具备自己军团中配置设备的权限。
en: If you launch a construction platform, you may not be able to scoop it up again because of its size.Before launching it ensure that you can anchor and build it in this location. You need to be at the warp in point of a planet, in a corporation that is in an alliance that holds sovereignty over the solar system, there needs to be no pre-existing outpost already built in the system, no pre-existing construction platforms already building and you need to have the equipment config role in your corporation.

zh: 不知为何，{modulename}的持续时间为负{duration}，无法运转。如果你知道如何获取一份它的修正值详细列表，请这么做并对其进行报告，否则请发送一份详细的bug报告。
en: {modulename} has somehow come to have a negative duration of {duration} and cannot operate. If you know how, obtain a breakdown of its modifiers and report it, otherwise submit a detailed bug report.

zh: 不能命令无人机攻击它自己
en: You cannot command drones to attack themselves

zh: 不能对{item}那样做，因为它归{owner}所有，而不是你。
en: You are unable to do that to the {item} as it is owned by {owner} and not by you.

zh: 不能对{targetName}使用{moduleName}：此行为会触发有限战斗计时，而你目前的状态不允许这样做。
en: Cannot activate {moduleName} on {targetName}: This action would trigger a Limited Engagement, which is disallowed in your current state.

zh: 不能将你自己移出舰队
en: Cannot remove yourself from the fleet

zh: 不能快递不同空间站的物品
en: You cannot request regional delivery from different stations

zh: 不能抛弃{[item]typeID.name}。你只能抛弃货柜舱或矿石舱中的物品。
en: The {[item]typeID.name} cannot be jettisoned. Only items in the cargo or ore hold can be jettisoned.

zh: 不能那样做，因为{[item]itemTypeID.name}在一个你无法穿透的力场里，不能触及。
en: You cannot do that as the {[item]itemTypeID.name} is not within your reach, inside a force field you are unable to penetrate.

zh: 交付仓库容积不足，无法开启制造项目
en: Delivery warehouse low on storage. Cannot start the job.

zh: 交货地址错误,请去目的地的空间站仓库交货
en: You are submitting it to the wrong station. Please deliver it to the right shipping address.

zh: 交货地无交货所需集装箱
en: No containers in the shipping address.

zh: 企图锁定{[item]target.name}的尝试失败了。
位于太空中{items}的{distance}以内时，无法安全发射{dropitem}。
en: The {dropitem} cannot be safely launched within {distance} of any {items}.
You do not have {skillName} ready for training.

zh: 你不能从已停用的{[item]typeID.nameWithArticle }中取出物品。
en: You cannot take items out of {[item]typeID.nameWithArticle } while it is offline.

zh: 你不能代表{corp}军团那样做，因为他们不允许。
en: You cannot do that on behalf of the {corp} corporation because they do not allow it.

zh: 你不能代表{corp}军团那样做，因为他们没有给你设备配置的权限。
en: You cannot do that on behalf of the {corp} corporation because they have not given you the equipment config role.

zh: 你不能代表{corp}军团那样做，因为你不是该军团成员。
en: You cannot do that on behalf of the {corp} corporation because you are not a member.

zh: 你不能使用{[item]typeID.name}的设施来进行组装，因为它既不属于你，也不属于你的军团成员或舰队成员。
en: You cannot assemble using the facilities of the {[item]typeID.name} because it does not belong to you, a fellow corporation member, or a fellow fleet member.

zh: 你不能使用{[item]typeID.name}的设施来进行装配，因为它不属于你的军团成员或舰队成员。
en: You cannot fit using the facilities of the {[item]typeID.name} because it does not belong to a fellow capsuleer corporation member, or to a fellow fleet member.

zh: 你不能占有那艘飞船，因为其飞行员座位已被{[character]pilot.name}占据。
en: You cannot take that ship as the pilot's seat is taken by {[character]pilot.name}

zh: 你不能启用{[item]module.name}由于没有空间站站内装配服务的支持，你的飞船需要{[numeric]need, decimalPlaces=0}%的电容，而此刻你的电容为{[numeric]have, decimalPlaces=0}%。
en: You cannot bring {[item]module.name} online. Without the support of in-station fitting services your ship requires a {[numeric]need, decimalPlaces=0}% capacitor level, you currently have a capacitor level of {[numeric]have, decimalPlaces=0}%.

zh: 你不能启用{type}，因为这会超过同时启用{maxGroupOnline}{group}物品的上限。
en: You cannot bring {type} online as it would exceed the limit of {maxGroupOnline} {group} items online simultaneously.

zh: 你不能回收{group}，因为它属于系统或者某个非玩家角色军团。你应该不会看到这条消息，但如果你看到了而且是你把物品放在那的，把一切复原。
en: You cannot scoop the {group} because it belongs to EVE System or an NPC corporation. You should not be seeing this message, but if you are and you put that object there, fix it.

zh: 你不能在{[timeinterval]timeLeft.writtenForm, from=second, to=second}内切换模式。
en: You can not change mode for another {[timeinterval]timeLeft.writtenForm, from=second, to=second}.

zh: 你不能在无法被攻击时使用{[item]moduleTypeID.name}。
你不能在舰船维护舱内储存装有货物（弹药、增效剂、液态臭氧和锶包合物除外）的飞船。请移除飞船中的无效货物后再试。
