en: You cannot store a ship that contains cargo other than charges, boosters, liquid ozone and stront inside a Ship Maintenance Bay.Please remove the invalid cargo from the ship and try again.

zh: 你不能在该物品锚定过程中将它回收到{group}组中。
en: You cannot scoop item in group {group} while it is being anchored.

zh: 你不能安装{moduleName}，因为你的飞船已经没有可用的发射器安装座了。很可能你的飞船已经装满了发射器，或者这艘飞船根本无法安装发射器。发射器安装座数量代表了可以在飞船上安装的某种类型的武器的数量。目前的设计已有一百多年历史，但具有足够的模块化程度，可以装配多种不同武器。
en: You cannot fit the {moduleName} because your ship doesn't have any launcher slots left for fitting, possibly because you have already filled your ship with launchers or that the ship simply can not be fitted with launchers.Launcher slots represent how many weapons of a certain type can be fitted on a ship. The current design is over a hundred years old, and is modular enough to allow for a great leeway in the fitting of various weaponry.

zh: 你不能对{[item]itemType.name}作任何处理，因为它已经被当成某任务的酬劳了。
en: You cannot do anything with a {[item]itemType.name} that has been offered as the reward for a mission.

zh: 你不能对{skillName}使用过多技能点，因为它需要欧米伽克隆才能继续训练。
en: You can not apply that many skill points to {skillName} because it requires Omega clone state for further training.

zh: 你不能将{[item]type.name}放在这个铁骑舰载机挂舱内。
en: You cannot place {[item]type.name} in this fighter bay

zh: 你不能将{[item]typeID.name}跳入高安（安全等级0.5及以上）地区。
en: You cannot jump the {[item]typeID.name} into high security space (0.5 security and above).

zh: 你不能将{type}放进这个燃料舱
en: You cannot place {type} in this fuel bay

zh: 你不能将其拿走，除非你具有{roles}的职位。
en: You can't take that unless you have the role {roles}.

zh: 你不能将组别为{groupName}的物品放入压缩阵列。只有矿石和冰矿可以被压缩。
en: You cannot put an item of group {groupName} into the compression array. Only ore and ice may be compressed.

zh: 你不能将组别为{groupName}的物品放入货柜箱。
en: You cannot put an item of group {groupName} into a Cargo Container.

zh: 你不能将那类物品放入你的{[item]ship.name}里的那个地方。那是个专用舱，只能存放特定类型的物品。
en: You cannot place an item of that type into that location in your {[item]ship.name}. The bay you are trying to access is specialized and can only handle certain types of items.

zh: 你不能装配{[item]moduleType.name}，因为你的飞船已经没有可装配的升级槽位了。可能你的飞船已经装满了升级模块，或者它根本不能装配升级模块。
en: You cannot fit the {[item]moduleType.name} because your ship doesn't have any upgrade slots left for fitting, possibly because you have already filled your ship with upgrades or that the ship simply can not be fitted with upgrades.

zh: 你不能装配{subSystemName}。它只能装配在{validShipName}上，不能装配在{shipName}上。
en: You can't fit {subSystemName}. It only fits to {validShipName} but you're trying to fit it to {shipName}.

zh: 你不能跳跃{[item]typeID.name}到席拉星系。
en: You cannot jump the {[item]typeID.name} into Thera.

zh: 你不能这么做，这太快了。请于{[timeinterval]remainingTime.writtenForm}后再试。
en: You can't do this quite so fast. Please wait {[timeinterval]remainingTime.writtenForm} before trying again.

zh: 你不能进站，因为{[item]moduleType.name}处于激活状态时，你的进站系统无法使用。
en: You are unable to dock because while {[item]moduleType.name} is active your docking systems are unusable.

zh: 你不能进行跳跃，因为你的系统还需要{[timeinterval]remaining.writtenForm, from=day, to=second}才能从上次跳跃中恢复。
en: You cannot jump because your systems require {[timeinterval]remaining.writtenForm, from=day, to=second} more to recover from the last jump.

zh: 你不能那样做，因为建筑目前已离线。
en: You cannot do that because the structure is currently offline.

zh: 你原来对{targetName}的 锁定 已失效。所有原来对准它的武器都会停转。
en: You have lost your target lock on {targetName}. All modules being used on their vessel will be deactivated.

zh: 你参与对一个非玩家角色的攻击导致安全下线中止
en: Your involvement in aggression towards another non-capsuleer caused safe logoff to abort
You are trying to sell {enteredNum} item(s) when you only have {actualNum}

zh: 你只能在空间站内装配或拆卸飞船。这条原则的一项例外就是在使用{device}这类设备时。
en: You can only fit or unfit from a ship while in station. An exception to this rule is when employing a device like the {device}.

zh: 你只能对其他旗舰发射{[item]moduleTypeID.name}。
en: You can only fire {[item]moduleTypeID.name} at other capital ships.

zh: 你只能每10秒分配一次技能点。请等候{[timeinterval]remainingTime.writtenForm}。
en: You may only apply available skill points once every ten seconds. Please wait {[timeinterval]remainingTime.writtenForm}.

zh: 你只能组装飞船，而这是{group}。
en: Only ships can be assembled, this is a {group}.

zh: 你只能装配自己的飞船，而这艘飞船属于{[character]charID.name}。
en: Only ships that you own can be assembled, this is owned by {[character]charID.name}.

zh: 你尝试保存的装配含有垃圾数据。{[item]type.name}的数量信息无效。
en: The fitting you are trying to save has corrupted data. The quantity information for item {[item]type.name} is invalid.

zh: 你尝试保存的装配含有垃圾数据。类型码{typeID}不存在。
en: The fitting you are trying to save has corrupted data. The typeID {typeID} does not exist.

zh: 你已经在技能队列里列满了技能（({[numeric]num}项）
en: The maximum number of skills ({[numeric]num}) has already been added to the training queue

zh: 你已经在进行{othermethod}呼叫，或者在与{thismethod}相同的锁定组({group}) 和区域({scope}) 内进行另一个呼叫。
en: You are already performing a {othermethod} call, or another call within the same locking group ({group}) and scope ({scope}) as {thismethod}.

zh: 你已经注入了{[item]skillName.name}，不能再次注入。
en: You have already injected {[item]skillName.name} and cannot inject it a second time.

zh: 你必须在距离集装箱{[numeric]maxdist}米之内，才能移走其中的物品。
en: You must be within {[numeric]maxdist} meters of the container to remove items from it.

zh: 你必须在距集装箱{[numeric]maxdist}米之内才能打开它。
en: You must be within {[numeric]maxdist} meters of the container to open it.

zh: 你必须要在距集装箱{[numeric]maxdist}米之内，才能将物品放入其中。
en: You must be within {[numeric]maxdist} meters of the container to place items into it.

zh: 你接受的委托已达数量上限
en: You have reached the max number of accepted missions

zh: 你无法从{structure}中的建筑中发射物品
en: You cannot launch items from structure of group {structure}

zh: 你无法修理{fueled}，因为你的货柜舱中没有足够的{fuel}
en: You cannot repair {fueled} as your cargo hold lacks sufficient {fuel}

zh: 你无法删除一个身份为军团军团长的人物。如果军团里还有其他成员，请另选一位成为军团长。如果军团里没有其他人，请先让该人物退出军团。
en: You can't delete a character that is the CEO of a corporation. If the corporation still has other members, you need to promote one of them to CEO. If the corporation has no other members, the character may leave the corporation.

zh:
你无法卸载升级模块，除非毁了它。 

你可以右键点击升级模块，然后选择“摧毁”来摧毁它。

你也可以通过提炼或把飞船拆卸装箱来毁掉所有升级模块。
en:
You cannot unfit an upgrade without destroying it. 
You can destroy it by right clicking on the upgrade and selecting "Destroy".
You can also destroy all your ship's upgrades by reprocessing or repackaging the ship.
You cannot activate {[item]moduleTypeID.name} whilst inside of a force field.

zh: 你无法将{[item]module.name}装配到{[item]ship.name}上。你只能装{[numeric]noOfModules}个{[item]module.name}，而现在你已经装配了{[numeric]noOfModulesFitted}个。
en: You're unable to fit {[item]module.name} to {[item]ship.name}. You can only fit {[numeric]noOfModules} of type {[item]module.name} but already have {[numeric]noOfModulesFitted}.

zh: 你无法将{[item]module.name}装配到{[item]ship.name}上。你只能装{[numeric]noOfModules}个{groupName}，而现在你已经装配了{[numeric]noOfModulesFitted}个。
en: You're unable to fit {[item]module.name} to {[item]ship.name}. You can only fit {[numeric]noOfModules} of type {groupName} but already have {[numeric]noOfModulesFitted}.

zh: 你无法查看，因为你不是{[item]typeID.name}的所有者或者没有访问权。
en: You cannot view that because you do not own the {[item]typeID.name} or do not have access to it.

zh: 你无法添加{[item]item.name}，原因在于没有足够的装填空间。货柜仅能装填{[numeric]maximum}个单位，而目前已经塞满了{[numeric]used}个单位。
en: You can't add the {[item]item.name} as there simply isn't enough room for it to fit. The container is currently only capable of fitting {[numeric]maximum} units and it is currently jammed full with {[numeric]used} units.

zh: 你无法添加{[item]itemTypeName.name}，原因在于没有足够的装填空间。它需占用{[numeric]itemVolume, decimalPlaces=2}个单位的容量，而目前只剩{[numeric]volumeAvailable}个单位。
en: You can't add the {[item]itemTypeName.name} as there simply isn't enough room for it to fit. It takes up {[numeric]itemVolume, decimalPlaces=2} units of volume, and there are only {[numeric]volumeAvailable} left.

zh: 你无法添加{[item]itemTypeName.name}，因为这里已经有太多东西了。
en: You can't add the {[item]itemTypeName.name} as there are simply too many items here already.

zh: 你无法离站，因为你的飞船安装了过多的升级模块，它有{[numeric]availableSlots, decimalPlaces=0}个{[numeric]availableSlots-> "升级", "升级"}模块空间，但现在却安装了{[numeric]fittedSlots, decimalPlaces=0}个。 你需要卸载多余的升级模块以使飞船适宜飞行。
en: You cannot undock because your ship has too many upgrades fitted, it has space for {[numeric]availableSlots, decimalPlaces=0} {[numeric]availableSlots-> "upgrade", "upgrades"} but there are {[numeric]fittedSlots, decimalPlaces=0} present. You need to unfit the excess upgrades to make your ship flightworthy.

zh: 你无法锁定{[item]target.name}，因为你在力场里面。
en: You cannot target the {[item]target.name} while you are inside a force field.

zh: 你无法锁定{targetName}，因为该目标已经被GM设定为不可锁定。
en: You are unable to target {targetName} as it has been made untargetable by a GM.

zh: 你最近参与了对一个非玩家角色的攻击
en: You have recently been involved in aggression towards non-capsuleers

zh: 你正在处理{[numeric]limit, decimalPlaces=0}个目标，这是你现有技能所能达到的最大数。
en: You are already managing {[numeric]limit, decimalPlaces=0} targets, as many as you have skill to.

zh: 你正在对付{[numeric]limit, decimalPlaces=0}个目标，已经达到你飞船电子装备的能力极限。
en: You are already managing {[numeric]limit, decimalPlaces=0} targets, as many as your ship's electronics are capable of.

zh: 你正处于跃迁状态，跃迁干扰阻止你的感应器对{targetName}进行目标锁定。
en: Interference from the warp you are doing is preventing your sensors from getting a target lock on {targetName}.

zh: 你正处在跃迁干扰区域内。在离{object}{range}米后才可跃迁。
en: You are within a warp disruption zone. Get {range} meters from {object} to warp.

zh: 你正处在跃迁干扰区域内。距离{[character]pilot.name}的{[item]ship.name}{range}米后才可跃迁。
en: You are within a warp disruption zone. Get {range} meters from {[character]pilot.nameWithPossessive} {[item]ship.name} to warp.

zh: 你没有权限更改此装配方案。你需要担当装备长一职
en: You don't have the role to modify this fitting. You need the role fitting manager

zh: 你没有能力使{moduleName}参与该操作。
en: You do not have the ability to engage the {moduleName} in that action.

zh: 你没有足够的星币来取回这些物品。你的钱包里有{[numeric]balance.isk}星币，但此项操作需要{[numeric]tax.isk}星币
en: You do not have enough ISK to recover those items. You have {[numeric]balance.isk} ISK in your wallet while this operation would cost {[numeric]tax.isk} ISK

zh: 你没有足够的星币来支付这个交易。
en: You do not have the required amount of ISK to accept this offer.
You are unable to target {targetName} at this time.

zh: 你现在无法进行弹射，某些装备妨碍你飞船的弹射系统正常运行。请关闭这些装备：{types}。
en: You cannot eject at this time. Certain modules prevent the ejection systems of your ship from working. Please deactivate these modules: {types}.

zh: 你现在没什么可做的，因为{[character]actor.name}(但愿是GM)已经把你冻结了。
en: You cannot do much at the moment as {[character]actor.name} (hopefully a GM) has frozen you.

zh: 你的{modulename}完成了操作。舰船的货柜舱满了。
en: Your {modulename} has completed operations. Ship's cargo hold is full.

zh: 你的交易行为受到限制，如有疑问，请咨询客服人员
en: Your trading behavior is limited. Please contact costume service

zh: 你的技能已是最高级，无法再通过训练提升{typeName}了。
en: You cannot train {typeName} further, as is it already at maximum level.

zh: 你的舰船每秒钟只能处理一定数量的编组请求。请于{[timeinterval]remainingTime.writtenForm}后再试。
en: Your ship can only handle so many  grouping requests per second. Try again in {[timeinterval]remainingTime.writtenForm}.

zh: 你的访问被拒绝，原因如下：{reason}
en: You have been denied access for the following reason: {reason}

zh: 你的账户里只有{[numeric]balance.isk}，但你需要{[numeric]amount.isk}才能完成此操作。
en: Your wallet contains only {[numeric]balance.isk}, but you require {[numeric]amount.isk} to complete this operation.
Your ship is not capable of scooping up a {targetGroup}.

zh: 你的飞船有严重的硬件问题。某个疯子做了一些莽撞的安装操作，以危险的方式安装了更多装备。万幸的是，它们已被移除。{extra}。如果可行的话，那些多余的东西已经放在了你的货柜舱中，否则，它们应该已经被抛入太空或机库中，或者意外毁坏了。
en: Your ship has horrible hardware problems. Some lunatic has tried some cowboy fitting maneuvers and somehow fitted more things that should be possible in dangerous ways. Through a bizarre combination of luck they have been removed. {extra}. If possible, the excess were placed in your cargo hold; if not, they were jettisoned into space or the hangar, or otherwise destroyed accidentally.

zh: 你离飞船不够近，无法登船。请前进至{[numeric]maxdist}米内。
en: You are not close enough to board the ship. Please get within {[numeric]maxdist} meters.

zh: 你要保存的装配方案中含有无效数据。{[item]type.name}的标记信息无效。
en: The fitting you are trying to save has corrupted data. The flag information for item {[item]type.name} is invalid.

zh: 你要保存的装配方案中含有无效数据。{typeName}不是一艘舰船。
en: The fitting you are trying to save has corrupted data. {typeName} is not a ship.

zh: 你试图登入的飞船上的某些活跃系统阻止飞行员的连接。它们是：{moduleNames}。最后一个系统会在{[numeric]time}秒后停止，请到时再试。
en: The ship you are trying to board has active systems which prevent the connection of a pilot. They are: {moduleNames}. The last system will deactivate in {[numeric]time} seconds, try again then.

zh: 你飞船的能量消耗不知怎么超过了自身的可用能量限度。你的飞船总共有{[numeric]total, decimalPlaces=1}个能量单位，但是你启用的装备需要{[numeric]require, decimalPlaces=1}个能量单位。请在你的反应堆尚未爆炸之前，停用某些装备以解决该问题。
en: Somehow your ship has come to be consuming more power than it has available. Your ship has {[numeric]total, decimalPlaces=1} power units total, but your online modules are requiring {[numeric]require, decimalPlaces=1} power units. Please offline enough modules to rectify this situation before your reactor explodes.

zh: 先取消玩家在频道中的角色
en: Please remove the player's role in the channel first

zh: 出售物品失败，不在同一个星域。
en: Failed to sell items. Not in the same region.

zh: 创建频道数量超过最大值
en: Number of channels created maxed out
Illegal role to create the channel

zh: 加入自建频道达到最大
en: Number of joined channels maxed out

zh: 升级科技等级失败, 请稍后再次尝试
en: Tech level upgrade failed. Please try again later.

zh: 发射器目前超载{[numeric]excess}个单位。
en: The launcher is currently holding {[numeric]excess} too many excess units.

zh: 受外部因素影响，你的{what}自爆已被取消。
en: Self-destruction of your {what} has been canceled because of external factors.

zh: 只有队长可以进行此操作
en: Only fleet commander can do this

zh: 可开采行星数量超过上限
启动该装备需要消耗{cost_fuel}吉焦燃料，但是你只拥有{remain_fuel}吉焦燃料在舰船上。
en: Activate this module requires {cost_fuel} GJ fuel, but you only have {remain_fuel} GJ fuel on board.

zh:
在你的帐号被验证前，你还不能这么做。

这个验证不会太久，请耐心等待，谢谢。
en:
You cannot perform this action until your account has been verified.
This should not take long, thank you for your patience.

zh: 在激活状态下，无法装载或卸载{[item]typeID.name}。
en: You cannot load or unload {[item]typeID.name} while it is active.

zh: 在装箱前无法在市场上出售{[item]item.name}。请拆卸装箱然后重试。
en: You cannot sell the {[item]item.name} on the market without repackaging it. Please repackage it and try again..

zh: 外界因素阻止了你的{moduleName}对这个命令进行回应。
en: External factors are preventing your {moduleName} from responding to this command

zh: 存储空间已超载，无法容纳任何{item}。目前它仅能装填{maximum}单位，而现在已经塞满了{used}单位。
en: The storage area is overloaded and cannot be made to fit any {item}. It is currently only capable of fitting {maximum} units and it is currently jammed full with {used} units.

zh: 客户端发生错误, 请重新打开方案界面
en: Client error. Please reopen fitting page.

zh: 对订单进行操作后，无法在很短的时间内再次进行修改。请于5分钟后再试。
en: You cannot modify an order within a certain time delay since your last operation on it. Try again in 5 mins.

zh: 将装配有改装件的船拆卸装箱会使那些改装件销毁。你确定要继续此项浪费的操作吗？
en: Repackaging a ship which has upgrades fitted will result in the loss of those upgrades.Do you wish to proceed with this wasteful action?

zh: 工业项目数据异常！当前无法进行此类操作
en: Industrial project data is abnormal! This operation is currently not allowed

zh: 已组装的飞船无法放入货柜。请先将它们拆卸装箱。
en: Assembled ships don't fit in cargo.Try repackaging them first.

zh: 已经取消了你的飞船的自毁进程，原本飞船将在{[timeinterval]timeLeft.writtenForm, from=minute, to=second}后爆炸。
en: You have aborted the self-destruct of your ship which was scheduled to explode in {[timeinterval]timeLeft.writtenForm, from=minute, to=second}.

zh: 已经在将部分或全部{[item]chargeType.name}载入装备中。如果你要载入剩余部分，那么必须等到此操作结束。
en: Some or all of {[item]chargeType.name} is already being loaded into a module. If you wish to load what remains, you will have to wait until this is finished.

zh:
市场中拿着低薪的工人来不及处理大量的新订单。

请等一会儿再试。
en:
The underpaid workers in the market are not keeping up with the influx of new orders.
Please wait a while and try again.

zh: 当{[item]moduleType.name}处于激活状态时，你的跃迁引擎无法使用。
en: Your jump drive is unusable while {[item]moduleType.name} is active.

zh: 当前星系安全等级大于0.5，无法攻击玩家目标
en: Since the security level of the system is higher than 0.5, firing at other players is illegal

zh: 当前设施无法开启制造项目
en: Current facility cannot start the job
You can only submit in a station

zh: 必须在空间站打开集装箱
en: You can only open a container in a station
You are blacklisted on this channel
You have not activated the Omega Clone
Your speaking function has been restored

zh: 技能不存在, 移动队列失败
技能训练队列发现未购买的技能
en: Unpurchased skill found in the training queue

zh: 技能需要更高的科技等级
en: The skill requires a higher Tech Level

zh: 把导弹射向自己可不是个好主意。编码 {shipID} {targetID}。
en: It is not a good idea to shoot a missile at yourself. Code {shipID} {targetID}.
Shield is lower than 10%. Unable to active {item_name}

zh: 拥有{targetname}的联盟掌管着该星系的主权，所以{targetname}坚不可摧，因此{[item]module.name}自动停止。
en: {[item]module.name} deactivates as the target {targetname} is invulnerable because its owning alliance holds sovereignty in this solar system.
Number of favorite channels maxed out

zh: 新委托已添加至你的际遇列表
无人机挂舱已超载，不能容纳{item}。目前它仅能装载{maximum}个单位，现在已经塞满了{used}个单位。
en: The drone bay is overloaded and cannot be made to fit {item}. It is currently only capable of fitting {maximum} units and it is currently jammed full with {used} units.

zh: 无效目标，{module}只能对某个{target}激活。
en: Invalid target, the {module} can only be activated on a {target}.

zh: 无效目标，该装备只能用于{groupName}。
en: Invalid target, can only activate this on {groupName}.

zh: 无法从{containerName}偷取{itemName}。该操作会使你成为嫌犯，而你已经打开了安全保护模式。
en: Cannot steal {itemName} from {containerName}. This action would make you a Suspect, and your safeties are engaged.

zh: 无法使用{[item]typeID.name}，因为它未启用，只有启用后才可使用。
en: You cannot use the {[item]typeID.name} as it needs to be online and is currently not.

zh: 无法储存你的{ship}，因为它的货柜舱中有集成货柜(出于引力子谐波的原因)。
en: You cannot store your {ship} while there are assembled containers in its cargo hold (because of graviton harmonics).
You cannot launch {[item]itemTypeID.name} because it is not in {[item]containerTypeID.name}.

zh: 无法发射{item}，因为它不能在{[item]containerTypeID.name}中组装。
en: You cannot launch {item} because it cannot be assembled in {[item]containerTypeID.name}.
You cannot launch {item} because {[item]containerTypeID.name} does not support it.

zh: 无法启动{item_name}，因为你技能水平的上限为{drone_num}。
en: You cannot launch {item_name} because your skill limit is {drone_num}.

zh: 无法启用{[item]item.name}。执行此项操作必须先学会以下技能：{requiredSkills}。
en: Unable to bring {[item]item.name} online. This action requires having learned the following skills: {requiredSkills}.

zh: 无法启用{[item]item.name}。执行此项操作需要科技等级到达{require_tech_lv}级
en: Cannot activate {[item]item.name}. Tech level {require_tech_lv} is required

zh: 无法启用{item_name}。执行此项操作需要科技等级到达{require_tech_lv}级
en: Cannot activate {item_name}. Tech level {require_tech_lv} is required

zh: 无法回收该{group}，因为它已被锚定。
en: You cannot scoop that {group} because it is anchored.

zh: 无法对{targetName}激活{moduleName}：该操作会使你成为嫌犯，而你已经打开了安全保护模式。
en: Cannot activate {moduleName} on {targetName}: This action would make you a Suspect, and your safeties are engaged.

zh: 无法对{targetName}激活{moduleName}：该操作会使你成为罪犯，而你已经打开了安全保护模式。
en: Cannot activate {moduleName} on {targetName}: This action would make you a Criminal, and your safeties are engaged.

zh: 无法将{[item]target.name}设为目标，因为它已被锁定到增强模式。
en: You failed to target {[item]target.name} as it is locked down in reinforced mode.

zh: 无法将{ammoGroup}装填到{[item]moduleName.name}上，这个装备需要装填{group1}。
en: You cannot load {ammoGroup} into a {[item]moduleName.name}, this module needs to be loaded with {group1}.

zh: 无法将{moduleGroup}安装到{[item]shipType.name}上，该装备只能安装到这些飞船类别上：{groups}。
en: You cannot fit {moduleGroup} onto a {[item]shipType.name}, this module can only be fitted onto these ship groups: {groups}.

zh: 无法将{targetName}设定为目标，因为你的感应器不能锁定它。
en: You are unable to target the {targetName} as your sensors are unable to lock onto it.

zh: 无法把你的{ship}储存在{dest}里，因为没有足够的存储空间。
en: You cannot store your {ship} in the {dest} as it has no capacity to store that inside it.

zh: 无法激活{moduleName}：该操作可能使你成为罪犯，而你已经打开了安全保护模式。
en: Cannot activate {moduleName}: This action could make you a Criminal, and your safeties are engaged.

zh: 无法激活{module}，该装备所需的资源/技能已被其他{count}件相同功用的装备完全占用。
en: The {module} cannot be activated as it requires access to resources and/or skills which {count} modules of the same purpose are already using up.

zh: 无法移动{[numeric]qtyasked}件物品，目前只有{[numeric]qtyavail}件。
en: Cannot move {[numeric]qtyasked} items, only {[numeric]qtyavail} are available.

zh: 无法装载{[item]chargeType.name}，因为这个模块正在进行其他装载操作。
en: You cannot load the {[item]chargeType.name} because the module is already involved in another loading operation.

zh: 无法那样做，你和{structure}的距离必须在{[numeric]desired, decimalPlaces=0}米以内，而目前你离它{[numeric]actual, decimalPlaces=0}米远。
en: You cannot do that because you need to be within {[numeric]desired, decimalPlaces=0} meters of the {structure}, you are instead {[numeric]actual, decimalPlaces=0} meters away.

zh: 无法那样做，因为{[item]item.name}已不存在。
en: You cannot do that as {[item]item.name} no longer exists.

zh: 无法那样做，因为你的无人机挂舱已超载。它的适宜容量是{[numeric]canHave, decimalPlaces=2}个单位，但里面已经塞进了{[numeric]have, decimalPlaces=2}个单位之多。
en: You cannot do that because you have somehow overloaded your drone bay. It fits {[numeric]canHave, decimalPlaces=2} units but somehow {[numeric]have, decimalPlaces=2} has been squeezed in.

zh: 无法那样做，因为你的货柜舱已经超载。它的适宜容量是{[numeric]canHave, decimalPlaces=2}单位，但里面已经塞进了{[numeric]have, decimalPlaces=2}单位之多。
en: You cannot do that because you have somehow overloaded your cargo hold. It fits {[numeric]canHave, decimalPlaces=2} units but somehow {[numeric]have, decimalPlaces=2} has been squeezed in.

zh: 暂无新发布的委托，请稍后再试
en: New missions are not ready, please try again later

zh: 最后一个联系人标签不能删除
en: Last contact tag cannot be deleted

zh: 有外部因素阻止你的舰船激活加速轨道。
en: External factors are preventing your ship from activating the gate.

zh: 未定义的欧米伽克隆类型
权限不足，无法开启制造项目
en: Insufficient privileges. Cannot start the job.

zh: 检测到你的名字存在敏感信息，您将被强制下线并改名，请稍后进入游戏查看
en: Your name has sensitive information, you will be forced to log out and renamed, please enter the game later

zh: 欧米伽时间不能超过9999月
正在将{ammoGroupName}载入{launcherGroupName}，预计于{[numeric]time}{[numeric]time -> "秒", "秒"}后完成。
en: Loading the {ammoGroupName} into the {launcherGroupName}; this will take approximately {[numeric]time} {[numeric]time -> "second", "seconds"}.

zh: 正在激活{moduleName}，此时无法手动将其关闭。
en: The {moduleName} cannot be manually deactivated while it is still being activated.

zh: 正在维修飞船装备时，不能超载{moduleName}。
en: You can not overload {moduleName} while modules on the ship are being repaired.

zh: 正在解除选定对象的锚定，大概需要{[numeric]delay, decimalPlaces=1}{[numeric]delay -> "秒", "秒"}。
en: Unanchoring the selected object, it will take around {[numeric]delay, decimalPlaces=1} {[numeric]delay -> "second", "seconds"} to do so.

zh: 正在锚定选定物体，需要大约{[numeric]delay, decimalPlaces=1}{[numeric]delay -> "秒", "秒"} 来完成该操作。
en: Anchoring the selected object, it will take around {[numeric]delay, decimalPlaces=1} {[numeric]delay -> "second", "seconds"} to do so.

zh: 此刻你无法那样做，因为{[item]typeID.name}被锁定到增强模式了。
en: You cannot do that at this time as the {[item]typeID.name} is locked down in reinforced mode.

zh: 此委托已被撤回，无法接受
en: This mission is cancelled, failed to accept

zh: 此帐号下的另一人物正在训练技能。同一帐号同时只能有一个人物训练技能。
en: Another character owned by this account is training a skill. Only one character can train a skill per account.

zh: 每分钟你只能发出一定数量的装配指令。请于{[timeinterval]remainingTime.writtenForm}后再试。
en: You can only make a certain number of fitting calls every minute. Please wait {[timeinterval]remainingTime.writtenForm} before trying again.

zh: 没有足够的子系统，无法对舰船{[item] ship.name}进行完全组装。
en: There were not enough subsystems to fully assemble the ship {[item] ship.name}

zh: 没有足够空间添加那些弹药。目前只有{[numeric]capacity, decimalPlaces=2}个{[numeric]capacity -> "单位", "单位"}的空间，但那些弹药需要{[numeric]volume, decimalPlaces=2}个{[numeric]volume -> "单位", "单位"}。
en: There is not enough space to add those charges. There is only {[numeric]capacity, decimalPlaces=2} {[numeric]capacity -> "unit", "units"} of space, but the charges require {[numeric]volume, decimalPlaces=2} {[numeric]volume -> "unit", "units"}.

zh: 物品已经在一级空间站
en: Items have been in an Interstellar Trading Center

zh: 物品必须处于空间站中
en: Items should be in a station

zh: 由于{[item]target.name}位于一个禁入力场中，因此你的无人机无法攻击它。
en: Your drones cannot engage {[item]target.name} since it is within the range of a forcefield you are barred from entering.

zh: 由于{object}正在截断你的跃迁路径，你无法进入跃迁。
en: You cannot enter warp because {object} is intersecting your warp path.

zh: 由于严重的拥堵，官方关闭了{system}的星门。建议过往船只选择其他路线。
en: Officials have closed the stargates in {system} due to heavy congestion. Travelers are advised to seek alternate routes.

zh: 由于你尚未使用的技能点只有{[numeric]pointsRemaining}点，你无法使用{[numeric]pointsRequested}点技能。请下调技能点数。
en: You cannot apply {[numeric]pointsRequested} skill points, because you only have {[numeric]pointsRemaining} unallocated. Please enter a lower value.

zh: 由于你最近的违规活动，你不能使用改装设施。
en: Refitting facilities are unavailable due to your recent criminal activity.

zh: 由于你最近的违规行为，你的跃迁引擎已被禁用。
en: Your warp engines have been disabled due to your recent criminal activity.

zh: 由于你最近的违规行为，你的跃迁引擎已被禁用。你的违规标记将在{time}后消失。
en: Your warp engines have been disabled due to your recent criminal activity. The criminal timer will run out in {time}.

zh: 由于发起战斗，你的安全等级已调整了{[numeric]penalty, decimalPlaces=4}。
en: For initiating combat your security status has been adjusted by {[numeric]penalty, decimalPlaces=4}.

zh: 由于开采资源已尽，{modulename}已停转。
en: {modulename} deactivates as it finds the resource it was harvesting a pale shadow of its former glory.

zh: 由于您的ID言论存在违规，因此被暂时禁言至:{time}，如有疑问请与客服联系。
en: Due to your violations, you are temporarily banned until: {time}. Please contact customer service if you have any questions.

zh: 由于时空紊乱，你现在无法离开{system}。请稍后再试。
en: You cannot leave {system} yet because of instability in the space-time continuum. Please try again in a moment.

zh: 由于未知原因, 技能加入队列失败
en: Skill training failed to unknown error

zh: 由于未知原因,移动技能队列失败
en: Skill swapping failed to unknown error

zh: 由于目标已不存在，{[item]moduleID.name}自动关闭。
en: {[item]moduleID.name} deactivates as the item it was targeted at is no longer present.

zh: 由于缺少槽位，{[item]type.name}无法进行装配。
en: The {[item]type.name} cannot be fitted to this hull as it lacks the required fitting slots.
{[item]moduleID.name} deactivates because its target, {targetName}, is not locked.
{modulename} deactivates as its target has been depleted.
Target has already been fleet commander

zh: 目标空间站不是贸易中心
en: Shipping address is not an Interstellar Trading Center

zh: 目标空间站和服务器不符
目标超出无人机控制距离，无法攻击
en: Target is outside of the drone control range, cannot attack

zh: 目标距离太远，无法对其使用{item_name}，目标必须在{max_range}千米内
en: Target is too far away to use {item_name} on, it needs to be closer than {max_range} km.

zh: 科技等级已达到阿尔法克隆限制
en: Tech level has reached Alpha Clone limits
This container does not exist in the station

zh: 给出的集装箱体积小于最小的箱子体积了
en: Container volume is lower than the volume of the smallest container

zh: 统合部要求行星海关暂时关闭服务，请稍后再做尝试。
en: The CONCORD requested the Planet Customs to temporarily close the service. Please try again later.

zh: 联系人分组数量达到最大
肯定哪里搞错了，{[item]item.name}已经不存在，自然也无法修理。
en: There must be some mistake, {[item]item.name} cannot be repaired because it no longer exists.

zh: 能量栅格不足！未能启用{[item]moduleType.name} #r启用能量栅格需求：{[numeric]require,decimalPlaces=2} #r当前剩余能量栅格：{[numeric]remaining,decimalPlaces=2} #r舰船能量栅格总计：{[numeric]total,decimalPlaces=2}
en: To bring {[item]moduleType.name} online requires {[numeric]require,decimalPlaces=2} power units, but only {[numeric]remaining,decimalPlaces=2} of the {[numeric]total,decimalPlaces=2} units that your power core produces are still available.

zh: 自由训练重置过于频繁, 请稍后再次尝试
en: Free training reset too frequently. Please try again later.
You cannot activate the {moduleName} while your ship is jumping

zh: 范围内没有可采集的矿石
蓝图数量不足，无法开启制造项目
en: Not enough Blueprints. Cannot start the job.

zh: 行星开采数据异常！当前无法进行此操作
en: Planet mining data error! Current operation cannot be performed

zh: 装备{moduleName}在维修过程中受损，维修进程因此中断
en: The module {moduleName} got damaged while being repaired which has disrupted the repair process

zh: 装备{module}处于激活状态，因此你无法隐形
en: You can't cloak because the module {module} is active
Armor is lower than 10%. Unable to active {item_name}

zh: 要使飞船进入合适的离站状态，它上面安装的装备，无论是否启用，其所需的能量栅格都不能超过飞船所能提供的。为了你的安全，我们将你飞船上的所有启用或停用装备的潜在能量使用量限制为你飞船能量总输出量的两倍。你飞船总能量输出的两倍是{[numeric]total, decimalPlaces=1}，但你的装备需要{[numeric]require, decimalPlaces=1}个能量单位。请卸载一些装备来调整该状态。
en: For a ship to be in a condition suitable for undocking requires that there are no modules fitted which require more power than the ship can provide, whether they are online or not. For your safety we limit the amount of power potentially usable by all online or offline modules on your ship to double the total power output of your ship.Double the total power output of your ship is only {[numeric]total, decimalPlaces=1} but your modules require {[numeric]require, decimalPlaces=1} power units. Please unfit enough modules to rectify this situation.

zh: 要完成此操作，需要{[numeric]volume}个{[numeric]volume -> "单位", "单位"}的空间。目标货柜只有{[numeric]available}个{[numeric]available -> "单位", "单位"}可用。
en: {[numeric]volume} {[numeric]volume -> "unit", "units"} of space would be required to complete this operation. Destination container only has {[numeric]available} {[numeric]available-> "unit", "units"} available.

zh: 要完成此操作，需要{[numeric]volume}个{[numeric]volume -> "货柜单位", "货柜单位"}的空间。目标货柜只有{[numeric]available}个{[numeric]available -> "单位", "单位"}可用。
en: {[numeric]volume} {[numeric]volume -> "cargo unit", "cargo units"} would be required to complete this operation. Destination container only has {[numeric]available} {[numeric]available -> "unit", "units"} available.

zh: 要完成此操作，需要{[numeric]volume}个货舱单位。目标货柜只有{[numeric]available}个单位可用。
en: {[numeric]volume} units would be required to complete this operation. Destination container only has {[numeric]available} units available.

zh: 要完成此操作，需要{volume}个单位。目标舱里只剩{available}个单位。
en: {volume} units would be required to complete this operation. Destination bay only has {available} units available.
The number of roles set is full

zh: 该{moduleName}受损严重，无法修复。你必须在有维修设施的空间站中维修它。
en: The {moduleName} is too damaged to repair. You need to repair it in a station with repair facilities.
The location is not a space station

zh: 该技能不适合放入技能队列
en: This skill does not fit in the training queue
This action is not initiated by the player

zh: 该阵列无法对当前目标开火。{systemname}是受统合部保护的星系，条款32A禁止用POS对平民目标进行蓄意攻击。
en:
The array cannot fire at the current target. 
{systemname} is a CONCORD protected system and falls under treaty 32A which forbids controlled POS aggression against civilian targets.

zh: 请到达距星门{maxdist}米范围内以便跳跃。
en: Please get within {maxdist} meters of the stargate to jump.

zh: 请尝试提高集装箱申领体积
en: Request failed. Try to improve the volume

zh: 请尝试提高集装箱申领保证金
en: Request failed. Try to improve the collateral

zh: 货柜舱已经满负荷，无法再装下{item}。它最多能存放{maximum}件物品，而目前已满载{used}件了。
en: That cargo bay is overloaded and cannot be made to fit {item}. It is currently only capable of fitting {maximum} units and it is currently jammed full with {used}units.

zh: 货柜舱已超载，不能容纳{item}。目前它仅能装填{maximum}单位，而现在已经塞满了{used}单位。
en: The cargo bay is overloaded and cannot be made to fit {item}. It is currently only capable of fitting {maximum} units and it is currently jammed full with {used} units.

zh: 货柜被锁定，请优先消灭周围的敌人
en: This container is locked, please destroy the enemies first
Exceed the maximum number of orders

zh: 跳跃距离为{[numeric]dist, decimalPlaces=5}光年， 可你的跳跃引擎只允许在{[numeric]range, decimalPlaces=5}光年的距离内进行跳跃。
en: Jump distance would be {[numeric]dist, decimalPlaces=5} lightyears but your jump drive only allows for jumps within {[numeric]range, decimalPlaces=5} lightyears.

zh: 这个{[item]container.name}只能存放一个或多个特定类型的物品，而你给的{[item]type.name}不属于那些类型。
en: This {[item]container.name} can only contain one or more specific types of which the {[item]type.name} you gave was not one.

zh: 这个客户端使用的标记包含了错误的字段属性。应该是{attribute}={expected}，但那个属性现在是{current}。它是一个有着约束参数{bindParams}的{serviceName}标记。
en: A moniker used by this client was being used with incorrect session attributes. It was built for {attribute}={expected}, but that attribute is currently {current}. It's a {serviceName} moniker with bind params {bindParams}.
This container does not belong to you

zh: 鉴于你最近的违规行为，统合部不允许你在太空中登上这艘船。
en: Due to your recent criminal actions, CONCORD is preventing you from boarding this ship in space.

zh: 锁定{[item]target.name}失败，因为他们正处在一个{[item]item.name}的{[numeric]range.distance}范围之内，而你在那个范围之外，这使你无法锁定他们。
en: You failed to target {[item]target.name}, they are within range {[numeric]range.distance} of a {[item]item.name} and with you being outside of it, it is preventing you from holding a lock on them.

zh: 除非{item}已被启用并处于闲置状态，否则无法让其运转。
en: The {item} cannot be placed into active operation unless it is already online and idle.

zh: 隐形系统无法启动，因为你的飞船与附近的{item}相距不到{[numeric]distance}米。
en: Your cloaking systems are unable to activate due to your ship being within {[numeric]distance} meters of the nearby {item}.
This container is empty, please destroy

zh: 需要拥有欧米伽克隆，才能使用该装备
en: Only Omega Clone can activate this module

zh: 非玩家角色快递只能寄属于自己的物品
en: You can only request regional delivery for your own items

zh: 项目数据异常, 无法交付
en: Job data error. Failed to deliver.

zh: 频道搜索太频繁，稍后再试
en: Channel search too frequent, try again later
To activate {[item]item.name}, tech level {require_tech_lv} is required

zh: 该{[item]typeID.name}不属于你。下次再使用，请确保该物品被放置在你的个人机库或者货柜舱内。
en: That {[item]typeID.name} is not yours to take. Make sure that the item is located in your own hangar or cargo hold before you attempt to use it again.

zh: 启用{[item]license.name}发生错误。请联系客户支持团队来拿回你的物品。
en: Something went wrong while activating your {[item]license.name}. You will need to contact Customer Support to retrieve your item.

zh: 一直有传言称，纳姆达精英私人佣兵军团是黑鹰——盖伦特联邦最冷酷无情的内部安全和情报部门——的眼线和鹰犬。还有些人猜测是该军团自己放出了这些谣言，利用黑鹰那令人生畏的声名来加强自己的神秘感。无论真相如何，纳姆达精英的雇佣兵们总是供不应求，上门的客户络绎不绝。
en: Persistent rumors claim that the Namtar Elite private military corporation is little more than a front for the Black Eagles, the Federation's most ruthless internal security and intelligence agency. Others suggest that the corporation has spread those rumors to enhance its mystique using the intimidating reputation of the Black Eagles. Whatever the truth of the matter may be there are no shortage of customers willing to hire Namtar Elite's mercenaries.

zh: 三岛集团是加达里最古老的超级集团之一。当加达里还处在工业时代，他们就和盖伦特有了接触，并随即创建了公司。三岛集团保守谨慎，恪守一句古老的格言：“只有偏执狂才能生存。”
en: Hyasyoda is one of the oldest of the Caldari mega corporations, having been formed shortly after first contact with the Gallenteans when the Caldari were still in the Industrial Age. It's conservative and cautious, but adheres to the old saying: 'Only the paranoid survive.'

zh: 不再囿于采矿的传统，联合矿业越来越多地投身于科技研发和商业运作。这导致了联合矿业科技的诞生，这个集团充当了其诸多子公司的保护伞，协调和控制各种科学研究和产品研发。
en: The increasing involvement of ORE in the development of technology and businesses beyond its mining operations origins led the conglomerate to set up ORE Technologies as an umbrella corporation to co-ordinate and control its various research and product development subsidiaries.

zh: 不受束缚的主宰的动机仍然未知而神秘，但是这种类型的自由无人机之间的联系，以及流浪者和特格拉的威胁引起了统合部的深度关切。
en: The motives of the Unshackled Overminds are obscure and inscrutable, but the evidence of contact between the swarms of this form of rogue drone and the emergent threats represented by the Drifters and Triglavians is the cause of deep concern for CONCORD.

zh: 专业干预军团是纳基维集团最新的商业尝试，旨在召集纳基维的内部安全部门中的精英来成立一个佣兵军团。可能有些人觉得这就是专业干预军团迄今为止行事冷酷无情的原因所在，不过这倒并不影响人们对该军团服务的旺盛需求。
en: Expert Intervention is the latest business launched under the NOH megacorporation's Expert brand, drawing on the expertise of members of NOH's Internal Security division to forge a military contracting company. Some may observe that this would account for the ruthlessness evident in Expert Intervention's operations to date, but any qualms on this account do not seem to have reduced demand for the corporation's services.

zh: 中央商务社团是加达里空间最大的出口/进口商。该社团广泛建立贸易联系，始终维持大量货物的流通。
en: The CBD Corporation is one of the biggest exporters/importers in Caldari space. The corporation has established trade links far and wide, with a huge amount of goods in constant fluctuation.

zh: 中央商务销售部原先是其母公司CBD社团的一部分，几年前公司为了使低迷的零售业务复苏而将销售部门独立出来。这一举措取得了成效，销售部的利润从此稳步增长。
en: Originally part of the mother company CBD, the CBD Sell Division was made independent some years ago in an effort to revitalize the stale retail business of the company. This paid off and the Sell Division has shown steady profit ever since it was created.

zh: 为了在一个星系内进行短距离跳跃，某个小团队发明了第一台实用的跃迁引擎，随后他们建立了推进动力集团。尽管公司从未达到最初的目标，创新有趣的设计却层出不穷，使公司处于推进领域的前列。
en: Propel Dynamics was founded by the team that discovered the first functional warp drive for short jumps within a system. Though it has never managed to live up to its early expectation the company has always turned out innovative and interesting designs that have driven the field of propulsion forward.

zh: 为了鼓励更多人来访消费，辛迪加财团不希望他们的空域有太多的麻烦。由于帝国警力匮乏，他们雇佣了自己的警备队来维持和平。
en: The Syndicate wants their space to be relatively trouble-free, so as to encourage people to visit and spend their money. With empire policing infrequent, they employ their own police force to enforce the peace.

zh: 主天使集团是天使企业联合体的指挥部门，它们捉摸不定，很少冒险远离其在柯尔斯区域的基地。虽然人们知道天使企业联合体的首领来自各个种族，但对它们的身份却知之甚少。
en: The Dominations is the command division of the Angel Cartel. The Dominations are quite elusive and seldom venture far from their bases in the Curse region. Little is known about the identities of the leaders of the Angel Cartel, though it is understood they come from all the races.

zh: 代号：卡律布迪斯侵袭  统合部安全分类：欧米伽金（可用）  威胁等级：红色伽马
en: Codename: Karybdis Infestation    CONCORD Security Classification: Omega Gold (Active)    Emergent Threat Rating: Case Red Gamma

zh: 代号：希拉侵袭  统合部安全分类：欧米伽金（可用）  威胁等级：红色伽马
en: Codename: Scylla Infestation    CONCORD Security Classification: Omega Gold (Active)    Emergent Threat Rating: Case Red Gamma

zh: 伊勒提游骑兵在米玛塔尔共和国是一个传奇的名字，他们的猎人和追踪者总是能抓到对手，一击致命。这种印象基本上源于一支在艾玛入侵玛塔尔时期活动的游骑兵队的英雄传说。不管怎样，伊勒提游骑兵现在是一个准军事军团，他们对雇主合同的高效执行广受赞誉。
en: The fame of the Eyniletti Rangers among the Minmatar is legendary, with their hunters and trackers reputed to always make their kill or capture their target. That image is largely based on tales of a band of Rangers that existed before the Amarr invaded and occupied Matar. Even so, the Eyniletti Rangers, now a paramilitary scouting and exploration corporation, have justly acquired a record of completing the contracts they accept to the satisfaction of their employers.

zh: 伊苏亚这个名字十分古老且富有传奇色彩，正是这个家族在几个世纪之前成立了第一个加达里军团。该军团在很久以前就被一个竞争对手吞并了，不过伊苏亚家族仍在为加达里军队输送优秀的士官，这使得他们声名远播。有了这样优秀的名声，伊苏亚战术分队开始从事雇佣兵生意并收取佣金。
en: The Isuuaya name is old and storied, with the very first Caldari corporation founded by the family many centuries ago. That corporation was long ago subsumed by a competitor but the Isuuaya family remains and has a well-deserved reputation for providing excellent officers to the Caldari military. Building on that reputation, the Isuuaya Tactical corporation has developed into a mercenary contracting and brokerage house of some note.

zh: 众所周知，卡拉吉塔集团是加达里最大的超级集团，所染指的事务涉及加达里的方方面面，作为加达里政治的中坚力量，他们常以制造商，发行人，零售商和研究者的身份出现。斯库维塔集团是他们在商业和政治上最大的对手。
en: The largest of the Caldari mega corporations, the KK, as it is commonly known as, has its fingers in most everything. They are manufacturers, distributors, retailers and researchers, as well as being a formidable voice in Caldari politics. Their great rivals in both business and politics is the Sukuuvestaa Corporation.

zh: 住在勒萨乌敦V的桑杜阶级大领主们有时不得不采取过激手段来对付彼此，而梅京人已经嗅到了内战的硝烟。通常，桑杜阶级会指派他们精于军事行动的分支——康罗人来在战场上指挥作战。而现在，康罗指挥部致力于提供私人佣兵服务，其业务范围早已超出勒萨乌敦星系。
en: The Sang Do caste overlords of Lirsautton V have occasionally had to take drastic steps in dealing with one another and the Jin-Mei homeworld has even seen civil war. The Sang Do traditionally called on a military sub-caste, the Kang Lo, to organize and command their armies in the field. In the modern age, the Kang Lo Directorate provides private military contracting services well beyond the confines of the Lirsautton system.

zh: 作为叛乱后建立的众多公司之一，塞克斯金发展公司一头扎进重建工作。这是个脚踏实地，庄重体面的公司，过去一直发展平稳，在不久的将来，将稳步成为银河内建筑商业的主导者。
en: One of the many companies that was formed after the Rebellion, the Six Kin dived headfirst into the rebuilding effort. Considered to be hard working and decent the company has seen a steady growth in recent past and seems poised to become a major player in the galactic construction business in the near future.

zh: 作为天使企业联合体的主要势力，大天使集团并没有活动中心，而是在整个太空中游荡。他们同样擅长于海盗行为，袭击和非法贩售行动。
en: The main arm of the Angel Cartel, the Archangels have no one center of operation, but can be seen roaming the space lanes most everywhere. They are equally adept at piracy, scavenging and smuggling.

zh: 作为对纳基维集团最直接的回应，卡拉吉塔集团创立了梯队娱乐公司。虽然纳基维集团在娱乐行业占有绝对多数的市场份额，梯队娱乐公司仍成功地占得一席之地，他们的产品也日益畅销。
en: Echelon Entertainment was created by the Kaalakiota Corporation as a direct answer to NOH. Though NOH still has an overwhelming market share in the entertainment industry Echelon Entertainment has still managed to shine on its own and their products are becoming more and more popular.

zh: 作为新伊甸最大的投资公司，现代金融与时俱进，乐于接受机遇，挑战高风险项目。公司帮助许多卓越的加达里公司摆脱了加达里合众国的束缚，另辟市场。现代金融也极大参与外国投资，尤其是卡尼迪王国。
en: The largest investment company in the world of EVE, Modern Finances is a progressive corporation willing to take chances and bet on high risk projects. The company has helped many prominent Caldari companies break out of the Caldari State and establish markets elsewhere, but Modern Finances are also heavily involved in foreign investment, especially in the Khanid Kingdom.

zh: 作为最后一个统治帝国的宗教派别的余部，神学理事会在其他帝国内有着与最高法院同等的地位。它还是一个道德仲裁和异教徒追捕机构，在帝国内拥有相当大的权力，可随意调查，审问，甚至监禁任何一个人。
en: The last great vestige of the religious sect that once ruled the empire, the Theology Council has the same role as the supreme court has in other empires. It also acts a moral police and hunter of heretics, which gives it considerable power within the empire, allowing it to investigate, question and even imprison almost anyone at its whim.

zh: 作为盖伦特联邦内主要的农业公司，复合收割实质上是很保守和被动的。它仅在联邦内部运作，并不希望进入其他帝国的市场。然而，它非常在乎自己占有的市场份额，为此愿不惜一切代价。
en: The main agricultural company in the Federation, Combined Harvest is conservative and passive in nature. It operates solely within the Federation and has no aspirations to muscle in on other markets. However, it is extremely paranoid about its own market share and is willing to go to any length to protect it.

zh: 作为统合部附属的科研集团，发现计划外行星狩猎项目是该组织的关注重点。  由于姐妹会饱受争议地绕开统合部的监督，与各大帝国直接分享部分基于发现计划的发现成功而诞生的最新克隆技术，发现计划于新伊甸纪元119年由姐妹会移交给统合部监管。
en: Project Discovery's Exoplanets Hunting Program is the primary focus of the organization since its attachment to CONCORD as an affiliated research corporation.    Project Discovery was transferred to CONCORD oversight from the Sisters of EVE in July YC119. This followed the SOE's controversial sharing of new cloning technology, partially based on Project Discovery findings, directly with the empires, which bypassed CONCORD directives.

zh: 作为艾玛司法系统中一支长久力量，民事法庭一直在神学理事会的阴影之下运作。虽然最近几年民事法庭都在想方设法争取独立，但仍经常在政治阴谋中被更为强大的团体所利用。
en: The secular arm of the Amarrian justice system, the Civic Court has always acted in the shadow of the Theology Council. The Civic Court has often become a pawn in the political machinations of more powerful entities, though in latter years it has managed to stay relatively independent.

zh: 作为艾玛政府部首领，帝国议长由艾玛帝王亲自任命，只对艾玛皇帝负责。尽管帝国议长权力多限于帝国的官僚机构，但是它依然被认为是帝国中最有权力的人之一。
en: The head of the executive branch of the Amarrian administration, the Imperial Chancellor is appointed by the Amarr Emperor and is answerable only to him. Though the Chancellor's authority is mostly confined to the bureaucracy of the empire, he is still considered one of the most powerful individuals within the empire.

zh: 佩克昂集团是少数几个留存至今的加达里集团之一，在盖伦特人到来之前的工业时代，佩克昂集团就建立于加达里首星上。盖伦特人给佩克昂集团带来了发展机遇，与联邦战争的那几年里是集团的辉煌时期。战后佩克昂集团有所衰弱，但仍能生产坚固耐用的高质量设备。
en: One of the few remaining Caldari corporations that were founded during the Industrial Age on Caldari Prime, before the arrival of the Gallenteans. Perkone took to the Gallenteans like ducks to water and had its glory days in the years leading up to the war with the Federation. After the war Perkone has struggled, but still manages to produce solid, high quality equipment.

zh: 供长眠于地下的人物所使用的内部军团。
en: The internal corporation used for characters in graveyard.

zh: 促进工业是新伊甸主要的全息记录盘制造商，从宏伟的史诗电影到廉价的盗版影片，题材无所不及。促进工业最近几年引领着即时新闻列阵的发展，这项技术一旦研发成功，将给新闻产业带来巨大变革。
en: Impetus is the main producer of holo reels in the world of EVE, producing anything from epic historical movies to cheap porn flicks. Impetus has in recent years led the development of instant news arrays, a technology that will revolutionize the news business once complete.

zh: 倒顶集团是一个专营零件装配的小型制造公司。莱戴集团拥有这个公司，为其提供新式技术以跟上其它制造公司的前进步伐。尽管倒顶集团从未真正发展起来，但作为莱戴集团的下属公司，许多人相信他们的产品是市场上质量最好的。
en: Top Down is a small manufacturing company that specializes in component assembling. It is owned by the Lai Dai corporation, which provides it with new technology to keep up with other manufacturing companies. Although Top Down has never really taken off, many believe their products to be of the highest quality on the market, as befits a company associated with Lai Dai.

zh: 光明圣火佣兵军团在前任女皇贾米尔一世加冕之后不久成立，似乎得到了萨拉姆家族的大力支持。光明圣火的领导人一直藏身幕后，有传言说他是一位和萨拉姆家族关系密切的被黜军官。
en: Formed shortly after the coronation of the late Empress Jamyl I, the Shining Flame mercenary company appears to benefit from the patronage of the Sarum Family. The leadership of the Shining Flame is shrouded in mystery, with persistent rumors suggesting that a disgraced military officer with links to the Sarum secretly directs its operations.

zh: 克鲁夏部族一直对他们的游击队战士在艾玛侵占玛塔尔及之后的伟大抗争事件中的英勇表现引以为傲。克鲁夏隐秘行动队喜欢保存实力留作己用，不过他们也会接受雇佣合同，将佣兵派往宇宙的各个角落。
en: The Krusual Tribe has long prided itself on the prowess of its guerilla fighters and infiltrator units during the Amarr occupation of Matar and the subsequent Great Rebellion. The Krusual Covert Operators tend to reserve their in-house troops for their own purposes, but the corporation also functions as a clearing house for mercenary contracts in locations all around New Eden.

zh: 克鲁夏部族诡计多端，谎话连篇，行事隐秘，是天性孤僻的一族人，但最近越来越多地投入了共和国的权力之争，争夺属于自己的统治权。
en: The Krusual tribe is sly and cunning, shrouding its ways in lies and secrecy. It is isolationist by nature, but lately it's been becoming more and more involved with the power politics of the Republic, staking a claim for its mastery.

zh: 共和军事学院是米玛塔尔教育体制的产物，因需要而建立，却没得到应有的支持；大多数军事人员都由盖伦特培训。但近年来，由于共和国正努力实现自己的完全独立，所以正致力于将共和军事学院变成一所一流军事学校。
en: The Republic Military School was for a long time the bastard child of the Minmatar education system - it existed because it was perceived as needed, but it had no support; most military personnel were Gallente trained. But in recent years, as the republic tries to ascertain its total independence, effort has been made to transform the RMS into a top-notch military school.

zh: 共和国司法部曾是受米玛塔尔政府冷落的部门，但近年来却在支持米玛塔尔叛乱分子。尽管这不是共和国的官方政策，但共和国司法部所做的正是大多数米玛塔尔人心中所愿：打败艾玛人。议会对此也不反对。
en: Once an uninspiring part of the Minmatar government the Justice Department has in recent years taken on a life of its own by supporting the Minmatar rebels. Though not an official policy of the Republic, the Justice Department promotes what most Minmatars secretly want: to defeat the Amarrians, and is thus cordially allowed by the Parliament.

zh: 共和大学由米玛塔尔移民创办，用来表明他们在新生共和国创立后不久便给予了支持。学校以凯勒大学为原型，并以盖伦特教育体制为基础。
en: The Republic University was founded by Minmatar emigrants as a show of support for the fledgling republic shortly after its inception. The school is modeled after the University of Caille and based on the Gallentean education system.

zh: 共和秩序局是用以保护斯库维塔集团的警务安全力量。由于超级集团间彼此互不信任，因此它们的产业都由自己的警备队保护。
en: Peace and Order Unit is the police and security arm of the Sukuuvestaa mega corporation. As the mega corporations only trust each other so much, they all have their own police force to guard their properties.

zh: 共和舰队军械处负责获取一切对建造共和舰队所需武器装备有用处的材料。共和舰队军械处首先派出资源探查队寻找有用的小行星，然后进行开采作业来获取任何有价值的矿物。
en: Republic Fleet Ordnance is responsible for the acquisition of materials crucial to the construction and maintenance of all kinds of equipment used by the fighting forces of the Minmatar Republic. The resource scouts of Republic Fleet Ordnance scour Minmatar space for pockets of useful asteroids and can call upon mining operations to extract any valuable materials they discover.

zh: 共和舰队由米玛塔尔抗争后幸存的叛军所建立。尽管不像其他帝国的舰队一样能得到先进武器或高技术装备，但是他们高涨的热情和成熟的战斗策略远远弥补了这点。
en: The Republic Fleet was formed from the surviving elements of the rebel fleet after the Minmatar Rebellion. Though it has not the same access to advanced weaponry or hi-tech equipment as the fleets of the other empires, it more than makes up for this with fierce spirit and clever battle tactics.

zh: 共和议会是米玛塔尔共和国的主要政治机构，已代替部落首领集会成为权力和决议的代表地。尽管议会不干预部落内部事务，但它代表米玛塔尔人民的利益，与外国列强对话。
en: The Parliament is the main political vehicle in the Minmatar Republic and has replaced the gathering of the tribal leaders as the place of power and decision. Though the Parliament has little say in the internal affairs of the tribes it acts as the voice of the Minmatar people to the outside world and governs the relations with foreign powers.

zh: 内凡达矿业协会起初是一个采矿公司，但带有强烈的军国主义色彩。这是因为它主要在艾玛达和米玛塔尔领空之间的空域行动。这片空域有许多富矿带，令所有人垂涎不已。
en: The Nefantar Miner Association is primarily a mining company, but with a strong militaristic overtone. This is because it operates mostly in the areas between Ammatar and Minmatar space. The area has many rich mineral zones, making it coveted by more or less everyone.

zh: 内安局是NOH超级集团的警务安全力量。由于超级集团间彼此互不信任，因此它们的产业都由自己的警备队保护。
en: Internal Security is the police and security arm of the NOH mega corporation. As the mega corporations only trust each other so much, they all have their own police force to guard their properties.

zh: 军务部通过他们的武装部队在艾玛帝国掌握强大的权力。军务部负责艾玛军队和空间海军的组建与维护，在帝国的外交政策中也有重要的发言权。
en: The Ministry of War wields extensive powers within the Amarr Empire through their control of the armed forces. The Ministry of War is responsible for the construction and maintenance of the Amarrian military and space navy, and it also has a great say in the foreign policy of the empire.

zh: 凯勒大学作为新伊甸的最大学校，拥有将近50万学生，长久以来一直是全世界文化和思想的熔炉。凯勒大学以学科丰富而闻名，其中最有名的是泛人类学系。
en: The largest school in the world of EVE, with almost half a million students, the UoC has long acted as a melting pot for cultures and ideas from all over. As befits its status UoC offers a wide range of studies, but is best known for its extensive anthropology department.

zh: 切玛科技公司成立于几十年前，曾拥有最先进的电子战技术。虽然此后公司的前景逐渐黯淡，但其所生产的电子战装备仍是一流的。
en: Chemal Tech is an established hi-tech company that was at the forefront of electronic warfare technology a few decades back. Though the fortunes of the company have somewhat dimmed since then it still cranks out top quality EW equipment.

zh: 加罗恩投资银行专为刚启动的公司提供融资，特别是那些高科技产业和娱乐行业的公司。它隶属于酷菲集团和媒体大亨拉斐尔·巴。他们建立加罗恩投资银行是为了在这一重要领域扩大自己的影响力。
en: The Garoun Investment Bank specializes in funding startup companies, especially in the hi-tech and entertainment sectors. It's owned by Quafe and the media mogul Raphel Bar, who formed it to further their influence in these vital industries.

zh: 加达里人并不愿纠缠于丧失的交易和残酷的竞争，但一旦发生矛盾，他们就会去加达里商业法庭。这是加达里合众国境内唯一授权可以取消公司之间交易或协议的组织。
en: The Caldari are not known to bicker over lost deals or ruthless competition, but when they do, this is the place they come to. The tribunal is the only organization within the Caldari State authorized to cancel deals or agreements made between companies.

zh: 加达里人通常把风视为他们精神世界中重要的组成元素，而在军队中，被称为“暴风”的精神力量也占据着非常特殊的重要地位。暴风力量是一家小型佣兵军团，它继承了这种传奇的暴风精神，大量使用金钱战士来充实自己的实力。
en: The Caldari people have always seen the winds as an important force in their spiritual life and the spirit called 'Storm Wind' has a special significance for the Caldari military. Adopting the mystique of this wind spirit for themselves, Storm Wind Strikeforce is a small mercenary corporation that makes extensive use of contract soldiers to supplement its own capabilities.

zh: 加达里合众国几乎从不使用地面武装力量，直到重新夺回加达里首星的战斗以及在暗涌之域展开的战争结束了这一历史。过去，超级集团只在乎自己地盘上的和平安宁。加达里首星夺还战的紧急事态促成了合众国和平卫士的成立，现在它已经成为了合众国军事力量中的重要一环。
en: The Caldari State required little in the way of ground troops until the reconquest of Caldari Prime and the war over Black Rise. Previously, the megacorporations saw to the security and peace of their own ground territories. The emergency conditions of the occupation of Caldari Prime called for the formation of the State Peacekeepers, a force that is now established as an arm of the Caldari military.

zh: 加达里合众国成立不久，国立军事学院就建立起来了，当时国家与盖伦特联邦的战争正如火如荼地进行着。正因如此，学院一贯有好战倾向，培养了无数优秀的战斗飞行员。
en: The State War Academy was founded shortly after the Caldari State came into being while the war with the Gallente Federation was still in full swing. Due to this, the academy has always had a very combat oriented slant, as opposed to the broader scope of ship handling.

zh: 加达里后勤部是由盖伦特—加达里战争退伍军人建立的公司之一，专门负责供给品和后勤物资的发放，并因此在加达里境内小有名气，他们正期待在其他帝国内扩张自己的业务。
en: Caldari Provisions is one of the companies that were created by war veterans of the Gallente-Caldari War. Specializing in the distribution of supply and logistics, Caldari Provisions have carved themselves a nice little niche within the Caldari State and are looking towards expanding their operation in other empires.

zh: 加达里海军在人员和飞船数量上均不如联邦海军和帝国海军，但他们的战列舰却是最多的，飞船服役年限也相对较短。这是因为加达里一直通过使用更好的高科技装备来更新其舰船。加达里海军的信条十分简单：战胜世界上任何海军。很多专家对此深信不疑。
en: The Caldari Navy is smaller in personnel and total ships than both the Federation Navy and the Imperial Navy, yet they have more battleships than any other fleet and the average age of the Caldari ships is considerably less. This is because the Caldari are constantly replacing their oldest ships with newer ones, with better hi-tech equipment. The strategic doctrine of the Caldari Navy is simple: to be able to defeat any other navy in the world. Most experts believe it is.

zh: 加达里钢铁集团建立于盖伦特—加达里战争期间，主要为加达里提供战争装备。战后其业务重心略有转移，但仍以其导弹系统为荣。
en: Founded during the Gallente-Caldari War to feed the Caldari war machine. Changed focus slightly after the war but still prides itself of its missile systems.

zh: 协约理事会是统合部的最高部门。统合部的政策都在协约理事会会议上讨论和制定，通常对公众保密。协约理事会成员起初由各个帝国提名，现在都从统合部雇员中提拔。因此，他们不必听命于某个帝国，从而保持统合部的中立。
en: Inner Circle is the top level department of CONCORD. The policies of CONCORD are discussed and decided on Inner Circle meetings, which are usually closed to the public. At first the members of the circle were nominated by the empires, but now they rise from the ranks of CONCORD employees. Thus, their loyalty is no longer bound to any one empire, but rather to CONCORD itself.

zh: 卡多尔家族象征着帝国的荣耀，历代帝王多属于这个家族。对多数艾玛人来说，他们象征着伟大庄严的古老帝国。
en: The Kador family symbolizes the grandeur of the empire. The family has had the most emperors elected in the past and to most Amarrians they stand for the strong, majestic empire of the old.

zh: 卡尼迪创新集团是一个高科技研究公司，在过去的几十年里有许多令人惊讶的发现。由于急需应对艾玛人的侵略，该公司在武器研究方面一直处于领先地位。
en: Khanid Innovation is a hi-tech research firm that has come up with many astounding discoveries in the past few decades. The company has always been at the forefront of weapon research thanks to the urgency in combating the threat of an Amarrian invasion.

zh: 卡尼迪皇家海军的舰船是由“黑色艾玛”自己设计的，与王国一直交好的加达里也帮了一点忙。卡尼迪皇家海军并不庞大，但相比艾玛人，他们拥有更先进的科技。
en: The Royal Khanid Navy consists of ships designed by the Dark Amarrians themselves, with a bit of help from the Caldari, which the kingdom has always held good relations with. The RKN is not big, but much more hi-tech than that of their cousins the Amarrians.

zh: 卡尼迪运输是个小型运输公司，其业务主要集中在卡尼迪王国境内，曾尝试开拓市场，但进展不大。
en: Khanid Transport is a small shipping company that operates mainly within the Khanid Kingdom. It has also tried its hands at exploration, but there have been no news about its successes or failures in that endeavor.

zh: 卡莫奴隶战士可能是宇宙中最具神话色彩的群体，即使以数字来衡量，他们也是新伊甸中最可怕的武装力量。大多数卡莫兵都战死沙场，那些侥幸活下来的人则获得了自由。卡莫小屋由一些获得自由的卡莫兵建立，卖点就是他们杰出的军事才能。鉴于他们显赫的声名，该军团的雇佣兵总是无比抢手。
en: The Kameira slave-soldiers of the Amarr Empire have an almost mythical status throughout New Eden, and even a sober analysis places them as among the most formidable troops in the cluster. While most Kameiras are fated to die in battle some survive to earn their freedom. The Kameira Lodge was founded by a number of freed Kameiras as a means of trading on their martial skills. Due to the reputation of the Kameiras, the mercenaries of the Lodge are much in demand.

zh: 印塔基联合财团是联邦边境一个独立的团体，是那些在主流社会中的不受欢迎者的避风港。印塔基联合财团在帝国内外的商人中扮演中介人物，这使得印塔基空域的贸易欣欣向荣。
en: Formed by Intaki exiles from the Gallente Federation during the Caldari-Gallente War, the Syndicate has slowly grown in stature and influence. It now serves as an important link between the empires and the illegal elements in the outer regions. Syndicate space is a pirate haven but still retains enough civility to allow pretty much anyone to travel there for business. Its markets are always chock full of contraband goods and illegal wares that are hard or impossible to come by elsewhere. Each Syndicate station is an autonomous entity, but they cooperate on security and information issues. The unofficial leader of the Syndicate is Silphy en Diabel, a former Sister of EVE who returned to Syndicate space to save her family's fortune. Since then she's turned out to be just as resourceful and ruthless as her late father.

zh: 印普罗集团是一家小型高科技公司，也是极少数在本国领土外运作的朱庇特公司之一。它主要制造电子硬件，其产品远比其它帝国的优秀。  新纪元118年，朱庇特内议会将印普罗集团的运营权移交给了理性思维社团。
en: Impro is a small hi-tech company that is one of the few Jovian companies to operate outside Jove space. It manufactures mainly electronic hardware, far superior to those produced by the other empires.    In YC118, operation of Impro was transferred from the Jovian Directorate to the Society of Conscious Thought.

zh: 即使以加达里合众国那金钱至上的价值观来衡量，伊塔拉家族也被公认为是一群匪徒，加达里各大超级集团对他们也是从不手软。不过，伊塔拉表现出了非常出众的生存能力，并成立了多家军团，足迹遍布众多星系。伊塔拉直接行动军团是该家族涉足雇佣兵行业的标志，他们的行事方式带有鲜明的伊塔拉风格，只要你出价最高，就可以得到他们的服务。
en: Venal even by Caldari standards, the Intara family is regarded by many as little more than a gang of cut-throats and is barely tolerated by the Caldari megacorporations. Regardless, the Intara have demonstrated remarkable skill in surviving and own a number of corporations spread across many planets. The Intara Direct Action corporation is the family's venture into the mercenary field and in true Intara style happily sells its services to the highest bidder.

zh: 参议院是联邦政府的立法机关。它还负责监督联邦预算，这使得它有非常大的权力。派别斗争时常给参议院带来负面影响，但这届参议院却常能在总统面前组成统一战线，使总统吃足苦头。
en: The Senate is the legislative arm of the Federal government. It also oversees the Federal budget, which gives it great powers. The Senate has often been weakened by factionalism, but the current one has often presented a united front to the President, making his life very hard.

zh: 古斯塔斯制造是古斯塔斯海盗联合体最近新增的附属公司，负责对组织的舰船及空间站进行维护。它也被认为参与了几项高度机密的研究项目，多数是在弹药领域。
en: A recent addition to the Guristas pirate cartel, responsible for maintaining the cartel's fleets and stations. Guristas Production is also believed to be engaged in several top secret research projects, mostly in the missile field.

zh: 古斯塔斯海盗组织让加达里头疼了好多年。古斯塔斯由加达里海军前成员领导，大多在外部星域活动，组织有序，纪律严明。
en: The Guristas are a pirate cartel that has harassed the Caldari for some years. The Guristas are led by former members of the Caldari Navy and they are the best organized and most disciplined pirate cartel operating in the outer regions.

zh: 合众国军事储备处由加达里CEO合作组织下令组建，旨在寻找和开发加达里境内的重要军事资源。加达里海军和八大集团的安保力量都能从由合众国军事储备处进行开采行动而建立的军事储备中各取所需。
en: The State Military Stockpile was created by order of the Caldari State's Chief Executive Panel to seek out and develop militarily important resources within Caldari space. The Caldari Navy and the security forces of the "Big Eight" megacorporations are all able to draw from the deep reserves that are being built up by State Military Stockpile mining operations.

zh: 和其它许多获加达里CEO合作组织授权从事行星特勤行动的佣兵军团一样，奥森监视者军团在成立之前本是加达里最具权势的家族——三岛集团的所有者奥森家族的私人卫队的分支。现在有传言说奥森家族卫队负责潜入和特勤行动的分支已经脱离了组织，成为了一个冷血无情的佣兵军团，只要有人出价，他们什么都愿意做。
en: As with many mercenary corporations authorized to carry out planetary operations by the Caldari Executive Panel, Osmon Surveillance began life as part of the personal army of one of the great families of the Caldari State: the Osmon, owners of the Hyasyoda megacorporation. Now rumored to have gone rogue, but retaining Caldari corporate status, the infiltration and black operations wing of the Osmon family militia has turned into a ruthless mercenary corporation willing to take any job from any client.

zh: 商业俱乐部从一个纯粹的绅士俱乐部慢慢成长为一个成熟的政治团体，这就是加达里政府机构的特点。商业俱乐部是一个会晤场所，外交官、商人、执行官和政客们都在这里交易或讨论国内事务。
en: The Mercantile Club has grown from being a simple gentleman's club into a full fledged political entity, such are the peculiarities of the Caldari governmental apparatus. The Mercantile Club is a meeting place for diplomats, business men, CEOs and politicians to make deals and discuss matters of the state.

zh: 商业安全委员会负责管理和监视空间站里的所有交易。在所有空间站都有它们的代理人记录交易，同时它们也提供运送和护卫服务来使交易顺利进行。
en: The SCC is responsible for regulating and monitoring all trade transactions that take place on space stations. It has agents on all stations that record the transactions and they also offer courier and escrow services to make trade smooth.

zh: 四十九敢死队可能是由玛塔尔七部族选出的49位自由战士成立的，他们刻意地把自己包装成战斗传奇，以此来吸引更多的新鲜血液。他们不是唯一的一个带有传奇色彩的米玛塔尔佣兵军团，但是关于它们的传说有时候过于荒诞不经了些。
en: Supposedly formed by forty-nine freedom fighters representing all seven tribes of Matar, the Fedayeen wrap themselves up in a warrior mystique in order to attract fresh blood. It is hardly the only Minmatar mercenary company to project an aura of legend about it, but the outlandish tales of the exploits of the forty-nine occasionally border on the absurd, even by the standards of Minmatar tale-telling.

zh: 国土评估局负责对艾玛空域内部和附近的恒星系进行勘测，并制图记录那些有利可图的小行星带和行星。它还负责监督这些地区的采矿活动，组织艾玛公司的采矿行动。
en: The Ministry of Assessment is responsible for surveying and exploring the solar systems in and near Amarr space, charting lucrative asteroid belts and planets. It is also responsible for monitoring the mining activity in these same areas and organizing the mining operations of Amarrian companies.

zh: 国家星域银行代表的是老式金融机构，业务主要来自传统、地位巩固的上层社会家庭。近年来，随着更年轻、更富活力的管理方式的引入，该银行也开始涉足太空工业投资，但规模较小。
en: The S&R Bank represents old money, money from the old, established upper class families. In recent years, with younger and more energetic management, the bank has become more involved in space industry investment, though on a small scale.

zh: 图克尔部落是米玛塔尔部落之一。实质上是一个游牧部族，不断从一个地方迁移到另一个地方。对他们来说，最近似家园的地方莫过于大荒野星域，那里他们有几个海盗避难所。
en: The Thukker tribe is one of the Minmatar tribes. It is nomadic in nature, constantly roaming from one place to another. The closest thing to a home they've got is the Great Wildlands region, where they have several pirate havens.

zh: 圣徒兄弟会成立之初是一个刺客组织，专为古老的信仰者议会而服务，并暗中受到宗教法令的保护。兄弟会在道德改革期间侥幸生存了下来，因为他们对皇室家族仍有用处，不过也是在那个时期内，他们堕落成了一伙为了钱什么都做的清道夫。在米玛塔尔抗争之后，新的兄弟会领导人根除了那些堕落腐化的成员，将兄弟会转变为一个专门控制奴隶叛乱的军团，当然，这不是免费的。
en: Protected by a webbing of obscure religious ordinances, the Fraternity of St. Venefice began life as a guild of assassins specializing in the use of poisons and serving the old Council of Apostles. The Fraternity narrowly survived the Moral Reforms due to its usefulness to the Royal Houses, but during the period degenerated into a band of paid killers. After the Minmatar rebellion, new leadership rooted out the most corrupt members and converted the Fraternity into a specialized counter-insurgency group ready to crush slave revolts, for a price.

zh: 圣殿之龙是一伙极端民族主义的加达里人成立的恐怖组织，其历史可追溯到提基纳帝国时期。他们是新伊甸中最为极端的反盖伦特政治团体，并曾秘密参与了洛维诺毁灭之战。
en: The Templis Dragonaurs are an ultra-nationalist Caldari organization whose origins date back to the Tikiona States. Considered terrorists by most governments, they are the most anti-Gallentean political entity in New Eden and it is rumored that they were involved in the destruction of Nouvelle Rouvenor.

zh: 在加达里大迁徙中，大量加达里人逃离了自己家园，急需重建一个崭新的国度。加达里建筑集团就是重建工作中的重要一员，并迅速扩展壮大。虽然其不再滥用强权政治，但手中仍握有王牌。
en: After the great exodus during the Caldari Breakout when the Caldari left their home planet, a new state had to be built from the scratch in very short time. Caldari Constructions was one of the companies that participated in that great effort and it has been living on this past achievement ever since. Though not very active any more in the wheeling and dealing of power politics it still holds some very valuable cards on its hand.

zh: 在古老的米玛塔尔帝国时代，米玛塔尔的领袖被人们称为“萨玛塔”，他们的军事委员会被称为“克古恩”——布鲁特古语，意为“老兵”。萨玛塔克古恩的控制者继承了这个名字，尽管实际上这个佣兵军团和萨玛塔以及共和国军队已没有任何关系。米玛塔尔部族主义者认为这种命名行为是对萨玛塔的一种侮辱，这种争论持续了好久，以至于争论本身都要成为一种传统了。尽管如此，萨玛塔克古恩军团的佣兵还是非常抢手的，上门的人络绎不绝。
en: In the ancient Minmatar Empire, the leaders of the Minmatar people were called 'Sanmatar' and their military councils staffed by officers known as 'kelkoons', an archaic Brutor word signifying a veteran warrior. The owners of the Sanmatar Kelkoons seek to play on that heritage even though their mercenaries have absolutely no connection to the present Sanmatar or the Republic military. Minmatar tribalists may consider this usage outrageous but the long history of abusing this terminology almost amounts to a tradition in itself. For their part, the Sanmatar Kelkoons continue to attract top rates for the services of their mercenary forces.

zh: 在当前米玛塔尔各部族各自为政的大背景下，共和国指挥部显得有点另类。虽然总体来讲米玛塔尔军事力量四分五裂，由各个部族分别控制，但是仍然存在着一个指挥中枢。共和国指挥部掌控着那些军事议会直属的武装力量，其中许多队伍都是共和国的精英，这就使得指挥部的首脑在共和国内部有着相当大的影响力。
en: Republic Command is something of an oddity in a new order where the Minmatar tribes wield considerable power. In large part the Minmatar military has become fragmented among the tribes but a rump central command remains. The Republic Command has managed to retain control over those units that reported directly to its military council, and the elite nature of many of these forces has allowed the generals of the Command to retain significant influence.

zh: 在空间里，我们能听到你的尖叫。
en: In space, we can hear you scream.

zh: 在艾玛人占领米玛塔尔空间时期，他们尽力根除米玛塔尔的任何遗产，其中之一就是米玛塔尔烹饪传统。因此土产公司试图将米玛塔尔的所有美食烹调重新寻回。
en: The Amarrians had tried to eradicate the Minmatar heritage during their occupation of Minmatar space. One of them was the Minmatar cuisine and Native Freshfood has been at the forefront in establishing traditional Minmatar food all anew.

zh: 在那次臭名昭著的厄尔瑞大清洗发生之后，酷菲集团声名扫地，几乎整个安全部门都被解散。这些被遣散的人迅速成立了自己的私人安保公司，将厄尔瑞事件所带来的污点抛在脑后，专心致志地投入工作，很快便以冷酷无情的手段和为达成目的不惜代价的作风而闻名。维洛勒安全行动队现已成为盖伦特最顶尖的佣兵组织之一。
en: In the wake of the infamous Elarel massacre, the Quafe megacorporation, hugely embarrassed by the incident, dismissed almost the entire upper echelon of its security division. These men and women promptly formed their own private security company and, forced into taking jobs most would not by the taint of their failure at Elarel, rapidly gained a reputation for absolute ruthlessness and total dedication to getting results for those giving them contracts. The board of Villore Sec Ops now presides over one of the most important mercenary contracting organizations operating in Gallente space.

zh: 埃拉斯多集团是一个业务范围广且运营良好的零售公司，其经营范围遍布整个帝国。虽然在国内与飞马集团无法抗衡，但在其他国家却业绩斐然，取得了不小的成功。
en: A well-run retail company that has a broad inter-stellar scope, with operations in all the empires. Aliastra has not been able to compete domestically with FedMart, but has seen moderate success in other empires.

zh: 埃菲尔公司是由著名的生化学家科维尔·埃菲尔创办的，并得到了克鲁夏部族的支持。公司一直被怀疑在研制生产非法神经增效剂，但却始终没有得到证实。不管怎样，公司的运作对外一直都是个谜，相信在谜团背后一定隐藏着某种阴谋。
en: Eifyr was founded by the renowned biochemist Kolvil Eifyr, with a support from the Krusual tribe. The company has often been suspected of developing and manufacturing illegal neural boosters, but nothing has ever been proven. In any case, the operation of the company has always been a mystery to the public, and secrecy always breeds conspiracy theories.

zh: 塔什蒙贡家族是在卡尼迪家族退出后被提拔上来的皇室家族。塔什蒙贡还是一个外系，因为他们有尤朵血统，并不是纯种艾玛人。现在拥有巨额资产的他们，已疏通关系，步步高升。
en: The Tash-Murkon family was elevated to the status of a royal family following the departure of the Khanid family. The Tash-Murkons are also outsiders because they are of Udorian ancestry, not true Amarrians. Yet through their vast wealth they have managed to buy themselves to the top.

zh: 外空联合勘探原来是一个专门进行深空探索，收集其中物品的部门，最终它成了外空联合集团里的一个独立成员。传言说，里面的员工各个都是一副饿狼样，不喜欢与人交往，喜欢长时间看窗外的飞船，好像一直在搜寻要紧的东西一样。
en: Originating as a branch dedicated to exploring deep space and laying claim to anything valuable found therein, Outer Ring Prospecting was eventually spun into a separate company in the ORE family. It is rumored to be staffed with hungry-looking people who tend to feel uncomfortable in crowds and spend a lot of time glancing out the windows of their ships, as if searching for something important just out of sight.

zh: 外空联合矿业集团在矿冶业取得了巨大成果，获利颇丰。所谓树大招风，当联邦试图侵吞公司财产时，ORE选择了退出联邦，现在主要活动于外环星域和云环星域。他们在那里拥有分散在隐秘地点的采矿装置，可以精炼出市场上最有价值的矿石。
en: A filthy rich corporation that disassociated itself from the Federation when it tried to encroach on the companies riches. ORE operates mainly in the Outer Ring and Cloud Ring regions, where they have mining installations scattered around in hidden locations, grinding out the most valuable minerals on the market.

zh: 大约20年前，皮尔•安克鲁创建了彭德保险。安克鲁获取成功的故事是一部真实的盖伦特人奋斗史。他出身贫寒，通过非凡的勇气和惊人的毅力出人头地，如今已成为联邦内最富有的人之一。他的公司主营投资业务，同时也承接普通银行业务。
en: Pend Insurance was founded by Pier Ancru some 20 years ago. Ancru is a true Gallentean success story; he comes from a very poor background, but through grit and determination, he rose to the top and is one of the richest people in the Gallente Federation today. His company is mainly an investment firm, though they also act in the role of a traditional bank.

zh: 天主凝聚会是一个相对较新的公司，它在加达里的莱戴大型集团帮助下建立起来，因此莱戴集团拥有该公司相当大的股份。天主凝聚会给陈腐的研发领域注入了急需的活力，为许多艾玛帝国最新的太空飞船带来了数量可观的高科技配件。
en: The Carthum is a fairly new company that was formed with aid from the Caldari Lai Dai mega corporation, which owns a considerable share in the company. Carthum brought much needed vitality into the stale field of research and development and has been responsible for the respectable hi-tech gadgetry in many recent Amarrian space ships.

zh: 天蛇集团最初是一个盖伦特研究公司，后来演变为一个违规药品集团。天蛇集团被认为是非法神经增效剂的最大生产商和分销商。他们已雇佣守护天使来保护空间内的资产。
en: The Serpentis Corporation was initially a Gallentean research firm that evolved into a drug cartel. The Serpentis Corporation is believed to be the biggest producer and distributor of illegal neural boosters. They have employed the Guardian Angels to protect their assets in space.

zh: 天蛇集团调查处是天蛇集团的分支，也是一个研发机构，但是并不专著于神经增效体的研发，而是在研究黑色电脑植体和替代的克隆方法。
en: Serpentis Inquest is a offspring of the Serpentis Corporation that is also a research company, but instead of focusing on neural boosters Inquest is researching black cyber implants and alternative cloning methods.

zh: 天赋植体公司是新伊甸主要的计算机植入体公司，他们扎根于该产业已有几个世纪之久。天赋植体公司最早为迎合劳工主尤其是皇室的需要而建立,目前他们仍是公司最大的客户，但最近产品开始被销售给其他艾玛人和外国人，公司利润成倍增长，但这也引起了艾玛劳工主中保守分子的不满。
en: Inherent Implants is the leading cyber implant company in the world of EVE, which is easy to understand as they've been in business for centuries. Inherent Implants started by catering to the needy Holders, especially the royals. This is still their largest clientele, but recently the company has also started selling to other Amarrians and even foreigners. This has increased their profit many times, but is frowned upon by the conservative elements of the Amarr Holders.

zh: 如果一个佣兵军团行事手段极其暴力，全然不顾无辜平民的伤亡，这在任何人眼中都是残忍的行为，甚至可能连可怖的血袭者同盟都这么认为。而如果这个军团是由塞卡尔——一个图克尔叛乱部落，以在偏远殖民地横行无忌而著称——的成员成立的话，可能人们就不会感到意外了。而更不令人意外的是，宇宙中定会有大把的人上门来雇佣塞卡尔远征军，以在星际冲突中发挥他们的“特长”。
en: Extreme violence and a total disregard for non-combatant casualties are the hallmarks of a mercenary outfit that would be regarded as brutal by anyone's standards, quite possibly including the feared Blood Raider Covenant. Given that the corporation was founded by members of the Seykal, a Thukker renegade clan noted for slash and burn raids on remote colonies, it is perhaps no surprise. Probably even less surprising is the willingness of many in New Eden to hire the Expeditionary Group for its 'expertise' in planetary operations.

zh: 如果你问我，一个流亡的罪犯头目是怎么在被图克尔部族和米玛塔尔共和国双重通缉的情况下成立起一个佣兵军团的，我只能说我也不知道。不过，巴里甘·克鲁法成功地做到了这一点，他的军团派出的佣兵遍布宇宙各处。有些人说，这表明了现在这个时代是多么的混乱不堪，而另一些人则怀疑克鲁法军团只为特定的达官贵人所青睐。
en: Quite how a fugitive crime lord was able to set up a military contracting corporation while wanted by both the Thukker Tribe and Minmatar Republic authorities is difficult to explain. Nevertheless, Baliggan Krullefor managed it and his Organization supplies mercs and military equipment to various conflict zones. Some say that this is a sign of how truly chaotic the times are. Others suspect that Krullefor is simply useful to certain powerful interests.

zh: 如果考虑到他们从部族里招募了一些宇宙中最顶尖最有创造性的工程师，那这样一个赛毕斯托佣兵军团会致力于战斗工程领域也就不奇怪了。赛毕斯托工兵连为那些出得起价钱的雇主提供战地工程和攻坚战服务。此外，他们还招募佣兵来执行战斗任务，甚至代替别的军团履行合同。
en: Counting some of the most accomplished and innovative engineers in New Eden among their tribe, it was only natural that a Sebiestor military contracting corporation would focus on combat engineering. The Sebiestor Field Sappers offer battlefield engineering and siegecraft services to any who can pay their considerable rates. Additionally, the corporation fills in other combat roles with contracted troops and even organizes contract fulfillment on behalf of other corporations.

zh: 姐妹会是一个基于宗教的人道主义援救组织。姐妹会足迹遍布帝国空域外的许多空间站，在那里疲惫的游客可寻求庇护。姐妹会也参与了新伊甸之门的科学研究项目，他们认为这是通向天堂的入口，并决定揭开它的秘密。
en: The Sisters of EVE are a humanitarian aid organization that is based on religion. The Sisters operate many stations outside empire space where weary travelers can seek refuge. SOE is also engaged in a scientific research project on the EVE gate, which they consider to be the gateway to heaven and are determined to unlock its secrets.

zh: 守护天使集团是天使企业联合体的一部分，现在专门守卫天蛇集团空间站。天蛇集团为此支付给天使企业联合体相当可观的报酬作为保护费，现在甚至连DED也拿它们毫无办法。
en: The Guardian Angels is a division of the Angel Cartel that are today exclusively occupied with guarding Serpentis space stations. The Serpentis Corporation pays the Angel Cartel handsomely for the protection, that is strong enough to keep even the DED at bay.

zh: 实力派集团是萨沙共和国军事部队的余部。尽管主要负责保护共和国剩下的财产，但也参与采矿和生产活动以保持自己的力量生生不息。
en: True Power is what remains of the military arm of Sansha's Nation. Though it is mainly concerned about protecting the remaining assets of the Nation, it also is engaged in mining and manufacturing operations to maintain its strength.

zh: 宫务大臣是君主的得力助手，无论在哪里，皇权都时刻相伴。在一些棘手问题上，宫务大臣甚至能代表君主发言，并以君主的名义发号施令。  凯蒂兹女皇一世在新纪元118年登基后保留了宫务大臣在艾玛帝国政治体系中的重要作用。
en: The Court Chamberlain is the right hand of the emperor. Wherever he goes, the power of the emperor goes with him. In the emperor's absence, the Chamberlain is authorized to speak as acting head of the Empire, even on delicate political matters.    After her coronation in YC118, Empress Catiz I has chosen to restore much of the importance of the Court Chamberlain in the life and politics of the Amarr Empire.

zh: 家庭保安公司是保护卡拉吉塔超级集团的警务安全力量。由于超级集团间彼此互不信任，因此它们的产业都由自己的警备队保护。
en: Home Guard is the police and security arm of the Kaalakiota mega corporation. As the mega corporations only trust each other so much, they all have their own police force to guard their properties.

zh: 富有权势的艾玛贵族们可以保有自己的私人军队，而那些弱势的家族想要保留军事力量就会受到君主意志、宗教法律以及帝国法令的多方约束。只有少数几个军团具有为这些家族提供军事支持的能力，辛迪加联合会就是其中的一个。虽然许多弱势的家族都对辛迪加联合会进行资助，但这个军团是独立存在的，他们接受来自新伊甸各个角落的雇佣合同。
en: While powerful Amarr Holders may retain private armies, minor houses are often prevented from maintaining military cadres by their lieges, religious laws or Imperial decrees. A few organizations exist to provide such Holders with military capability and the Holdfast Syndicate is one of these. While many minor houses have invested in Holdfast, the corporation is independent and regularly takes on contracts across New Eden.

zh: 对加达里境内许多大型抚恤基金会而言，加达里无限基金集团(CFU)是棵大树。这些基金会非常有钱，但他们对资金的使用却异常谨慎。CFU曾经参与了一些大型投资项目，但他们绝不肯轻易冒险。
en: Caldari Funds Unlimited is an umbrella organization for many of the largest pension funds in the Caldari State. These funds have extremely deep pockets, but they are also extremely careful what they do with their money. The CFU has participated in some great investment programs in the past, but they refrain from anything that is remotely risky.

zh: 就像所有加达里学校一样，科学及贸易学会有一套非常正规的课程，偏重于实际运用能力的培养。这使得学习过程单调乏味，但却相当有效。
en: Like all Caldari schools STI has a very formal curriculum that focuses primarily on the practical side of education. This results in a very dull and tedious learning process, but one that is remarkably efficient.

zh: 尽管朱庇特人拥有实力和资源，但并不总那么注重实效。材料学院的建立正是为了弥补这一点。大部分朱庇特人在技术方面已受到了良好的教育，但是他们需要一些工业和制造业的实践应用指导。
en: The Jovians, with all their power and resources, are not always very pragmatic. The Material Institute was founded precisely to combat this. Most Jovians are already well schooled in the technical aspects, but they need some tutoring on the practical application for use in industry and manufacturing.

zh: 尽管萨沙共和国几十年前被毁灭，但是幸存者仍生活在深层空间里，并往不同方面发展起来。忠实制造集团经营几个船厂，正日以继夜地不断制造航行于空间内的萨沙飞船。
en: Despite the fact that Sansha's Nation was destroyed decades ago, remnants still remain in deep space and are in many ways growing in stature. True Creations operate several shipyards that are increasing the number of Sansha's ships roaming space each and every day.

zh: 市政管理局最初是米玛塔尔政府的一部分，在大抗争发生后负责分配土地和房产。等混乱平息，这个公司就与政府断绝了关系，开始自立独营。如今它在共和国内，仍保留着许多重要的行政职责。
en: Originally part of the Minmatar government, Urban Management was responsible for allocating land and real estate in the wake of the Rebellion. Once the chaos subsided the company broke from the government and started operating on its own. Yet it still retains many important administrative functions in the Republic.

zh: 布拉吉勇士的起源可以追溯到远古的角斗士时代，他们以其残忍无情的手段和为求生存不顾一切的意志而臭名昭著。作为艾玛帝国少数几个获得许可的佣兵军团之一，布拉吉之力军团经常被艾玛统治者和寡头军团征召去执行一些特殊工作，主顾对他们的昭彰恶名和凶恶暴行也是睁一只眼闭一只眼。布拉吉勇士们深谙“拿人钱财，替人消灾”之道，除了在意事成后的奖赏之外，他们对其它的一切都不关心。
en: Tracing their roots back to an ancient order of gladiatorial fighters, the Bragians are notorious for their brutality and will to survive against all odds. As one of the few licensed mercenary corporations working within the Amarr Empire, the Bragian Order is regularly called on by Amarr Holders and megacorporations for special jobs, regardless of their reputation for atrocity. Well understanding the trade of fighting for coin, the Bragians care for little besides their reward for victory in battle.

zh: 布鲁特人在艾玛帝国占领时期遭受了最惨痛的经历，至今仍有很多人在艾玛帝国受到奴役。这加剧了他们对艾玛人的痛恨，布鲁特部族也是唯一主动与艾玛人和艾玛达人继续战斗的部族。
en: The Brutors suffered the worst under the Amarr occupation and many of them are still enslaved within the Amarr Empire. This fuels their hate for the Amarrians and they are the only tribe to actively pursue a continuation of the war against the Amarrians and their underlings, the Ammatars.

zh: 布鲁特部族的战斗哲学是有的放矢，猛冲猛打，不过他们也从不缺少精明的战术指挥家。布鲁特先锋为许多雇主提供佣兵，他们有时会招募金元战士去完成任务，有时也会派出自己的老兵去大展身手。
en: The Brutor Tribe approach to warfare is classically a no-nonsense, assault-oriented philosophy, but they do not lack for clever tacticians and capable commanders.
