The Brutor Vanguard accepts mercenary work from many employers, sourcing contract soldiers to fulfill the needs of each job as well as deploying its own seasoned troopers.

zh: 帕特工学院旨在帮助有天赋的米玛塔尔孩子胜任高级职务，这也是共和国所急需的。当时共和国政府和行政部门都是新建的，毫无基础，他们急需这样的人才。时至今日，共和国已根基稳健，但这样的原则并未有丝毫动摇。
en: Pator Tech School was founded on the principle of helping gifted Minmatar children to be better qualified for high-level positions; something the republic was in dire need of when assembling a new government and administration virtually from scratch. This principle has held intact to this day, even if the foundations of the republic were firmly set a long time ago.

zh: 帝国十字军第二十四军团
帝国学院注重传统，和其它帝国中的一些现代军事机构相比，显得十分落伍。然而，艾玛帝国内此类学院只此一家，因此其作用不可小视。
en: The Imperial Academy is rooted in tradition and generally considered sub-par to the more modern military institutes found in the other empires. However, it is the only one of its kind within the Amarr Empire, thus serving a vital function.

zh: 帝国总装部是新伊甸最大的武器制造商。公司制造从轻武器到战列舰的各类军备。和庞大的艾玛帝国一样，公司更看重武器的数量，因此从技术角度而言，他们的产品没有什么特别，但十分可靠、耐用。
en: Imperial Armaments is the largest weapon manufacturer in the world of EVE. The company manufactures a full range of weaponry, from small arms to battleships. Typically of the huge Amarr Empire, the company has always preferred quantity over quality, thus its equipment is not particularly interesting from a technological standpoint, but it is reliable and durable.

zh: 帝国战争后备处是艾玛国土评估局和军务处联合成立的，旨在建立并维护大量的重要战略物资储备。该军团负责在艾玛帝国境内探测资源并组织开采行动。
en: The Imperial War Reserves were established as a joint effort to build up and maintain a vast reserve of strategically vital materials by the Amarr Ministry of Assessment and the Ministry of War. The corporation is charged with surveying the Amarr Empire for resources and organizing their exploitation by mining operations.

zh: 帝国海军信奉在任何情况下动用强大武力的简单信条。虽然帝国海军的很多飞船由于年久失修而几近报废，但其拥有的飞船数量仍几乎是相邻两国海军飞船总数的两倍。
en: The Imperial Navy operates under the simple doctrine of applying overwhelming force to any given situation. The Imperial Navy has almost twice as many ships as the next two empire navies put together, though the quality of some of the Amarrian ships are questionable as many of them have not been refitted for decades and are almost obsolete.

zh: 帝国运输刚开始是艾玛帝国的官方运送服务部门，几十年前转变成了个运输公司，业务遍及整个艾玛帝国。
en: Imperial Shipment started out as the official courier service of the Amarr Emperor, but evolved some decades ago into a full fledged shipping company that operates throughout the Amarr Empire.

zh: 应用知识学院主要偏重于技术研究，是有志工程师的理想修学之地。学院与许多加达里主要集团之间的合作，使学校，集团以及学生都受益匪浅。
en: The School of Applied Knowledge focuses mainly on technical studies and is considered the best school for aspiring engineers. The school collaborates with many leading Caldari corporations, which benefits the school, the companies and not the least the students.

zh: 度沃勒实验室是少数几家注重于研究而不是对成果进行实际应用的公司之一。度沃勒实验室开展着数量巨大的各种研究，涵盖了高科技武器、纳米机器人和克隆设备等等。
en: Duvolle Laboratories is one of these rare companies that focus more on the research than the practical application of their discoveries. Duvolle is engaged in a myriad of R&D, ranging from hi-tech weaponry to nano-robots to cloning equipment.

zh: 异株湖安全部队是保护异株湖超级集团的警务安全力量。由于超级集团间彼此互不信任，因此它们的产业都由自己的警备队保护。
en: Ishukone Watch is the police and security arm of the Ishukone mega corporation. As the mega corporations only trust each other so much, they all have their own police force to guard their properties.

zh: 异株湖集团曾在很长一段时间内是加达里超级集团的软肋，但自从他们和朱庇特人接触后，这一切都改变了。异株湖集团是第一个和朱庇特人建立贸易关系的公司，从朱庇特人那里得到了太空舱技术。这使得异株湖集团独树一帜，赚取了数百亿星币。异株湖集团目前仍从其与朱庇特的良好关系中获益，他们拥有朱庇特空域外最先进的技术。
en: Ishukone was for a long time the feeblest of the Caldari mega corporations, but contact with the Jovians changed that. Ishukone was the first company to establish trade links with the Jovians and received the capsule technology from the Jovians, which made Ishukone billions of ISK in revenue before other companies could catch up. Ishukone is still reaping the rewards of their good relations with the Jovians and it possesses the most advanced technology outside Jove space.

zh: 很多人认为图克尔人都是无赖或海盗，但他们中的许多人其实是合法行事的。信任伙伴集团将自己树立成一个正派的船运和贸易公司，甚至著名的帝国集团也开始与他们有生意来往。
en: The Thukkers are by many considered to be scoundrels and pirates, but many of them actually operate on the right side of the law. Trust Partners has established itself as a decent shipping and trading company that even respectable empire corporations have started dealing with.

zh: 很多人认为星形矿业是新伊甸中运营最好的矿业公司。公司组织良好，有明确的勘测、采矿和销售部门，这使得星形矿业每年都成为整个世界中最大的赢利者。
en: Astral Mining is considered by many the best run mining company in the world of EVE. It is well organized, with well defined surveying, mining and selling divisions that year after year make Astral Mining one of the biggest earners in the corporate world.

zh: 很多朱庇特人都通过基因工程抑制甚至消除了他们激进的本能。负责训练太空飞行学员的战争行为学院使用最新的基因疗法重新引入这些本能，从而保证学员能在战斗中爆发出本性中凶残的一面，夺取最终的胜利。
en: Most Jovians have had their aggressive instincts curbed or even removed through genetic engineering. The Academy for Aggressive Behaviour, responsible for training space cadets, uses the latest in gene therapies to re-introduce the base instincts to their students to ensure the animalistic nature of humans, so important for fighting, is alive and fresh in them.

zh: 总统是联邦政府行政部的领袖。他拥有强大的权力，就很多方面而言，是新伊甸最具权威的人。现任总统佛里坦非常体恤民情。
en: The President is the head of the executive branch of the Federal government. In many respects he is the most powerful individual in New Eden. The current President, Jacus Roden, is a self-made trillionaire industrialist who leads with extreme cunning and a steely resolve.

zh: 成立于新伊甸纪元105年初艾玛继承审判仪式，一些商业安全委员会的企业家意识到组织周到的公开赛非常受飞行员欢迎，独立竞技委员会随即从一个兴趣项目小组一跃成为统合部进行各种竞技项目的举办方。  由于自身高超的工程师团队技能和造船艺术造诣，独立竞技委员会针对最受欢迎的舰船型号定制出小体积版本作为奖励发放，在竞赛组织、资金赞助和竞赛裁决等方面保持了一贯的高水准。
en: Formed in the wake of the YC105 Amarr Succession Trials when a group of entrepreneurs at the Secure Commerce Commission realised how popular structured combat tournaments were among capsuleers, the Independent Gaming Commission has grown from a small passion project into the CONCORD Assembly’s regulatory body for all competitive sports.    With its own highly skilled team of engineers and state of the art shipyards that produce low volume bespoke versions of the most popular hulls in the cluster as prizes, the IGC maintains a healthy bottom line from event organization, sponsorship and adjudication across the cluster.

zh: 我们是一个主权独立的国家，我们夺回了失去已久的家园。现在我们开战了，联合起来！集中我们全部的怒火冲向我们的目标！祖国在召唤你，克隆飞行员们，祖国需要你的力量和智慧来反击盖伦特人制造的恐怖。祖国永远不会倒下！加入我们，为了战斗！为了征服！
en: We are the State, and we have claimed our long-lost homeland. Now we are at war; united, whole and full of fire and purpose. The State calls you, capsuleer, for it needs your strength and your leadership to fend off the encroaching Gallente menace. The State will not fall. Join us. Fight. Conquer.

zh: 执行官合作组织是由加达里的大公司联合拥有并运营的政治团体。该组织的成员均为超级集团的执行官，在组织中他们能够畅所欲言，缓解集团之间的潜在矛盾，从而确保集团在竞争过程中不走向极端。该组织同时也左右加达里的外交方针，处理与政府部门最息息相关的事宜。
en: The Chief Executive Panel is a political entity jointly owned and run by the Caldari mega corporations. The CEOs of the mega corporations sit on the board of the Panel and make sure the mega corporations don't go overboard in competing with each other, smoothing over potential conflicts before they escalate out of control. The Panel also handles the foreign policy of the Caldari State. It is the closest thing to a Caldari government as there ever will be.

zh: 探索和测量是星际商务往来的重要组成部分，艾玛帝国和其它国家一样深谙这一点。帕拉丁侦察连是众多为艾玛测量远征事业提供武装先遣军的军团之一。在嗅到了日益增长的护送押运和设施安保服务需求之后，该军团开始向全宇宙派遣金元战士执行战斗任务。
en: Exploration and surveying is a vital part of interstellar commerce, and the Amarr Empire understands this as keenly as any other nation. The Paladin Survey Force is one of a number of corporations that provide military contingents to Amarr survey expeditions. Seeing increasing market demand for more aggressive services than escort and facilities security, the corporation has eagerly provided soldiers for combat operations across the cluster.

zh: 救赎天使集团是天使企业联合体中的非战斗集团。救赎天使负责建造和维修天使空间站和太空船。正因如此，它们经常要从其他天使伙伴遗留下来的残骸中打捞需要的物品。
en: The Salvation Angels are the non-combat division of the Angel Cartel. The Salvation Angels are responsible for building and maintaining the Angels stations and space ships. For this, they frequently salvage what they need from the wrecks their fellow Angels have left behind.

zh: 斯库维塔集团，通常叫做斯维，是加达里合众国境内最大的房地产商，据估计集团与其下属公司拥有几乎40%的加达里空域。斯维是加达里的第二大超级集团，以其无情，不道德的商业作风闻名于世。
en: Sukuuvestaa, or SuVee as it is commonly called, is the largest real estate dealer within the Caldari State, it is estimated that they and the companies under them own nearly 40% of all land in Caldari space. SuVee is the second largest of the Caldari mega corporations and is known for its ruthless, often unethical, business practices.

zh: 新伊甸纪元108年4月，为了应对在库拉克斯星座的考古学新发现，盖伦特联邦组建了一支特别行动队，直属于联邦情报部门。联邦到底在库拉克斯发现了什么无人知晓，当时那些带队远征的人现在也都在联邦政府中担任机密要职。库拉克斯特别行动队后来被私有化，接受联邦政府领导，获准为军团安全部门执行一些准军事行动。
en: In April YC108, following certain archaeological discoveries in the Crux constellation, the Gallente Federation assembled a special tasks group reporting directly to the Federal Intelligence Office. Whatever the Crux discoveries amounted to has never been made public and those who led the expedition are currently listed as working for the Federal government in various confidential roles. The Crux Special Tasks Group was eventually privatized under Federal directive and licensed to carry out paramilitary operations in the corporate security sector.

zh: 新伊甸纪元117年末，联合矿业霜线品牌旗下的冰矿采集类产品开始投向市场。该品牌的旗舰产品永恒者级勘探护卫舰的大获成功促使联合矿业设立了一个子公司，专门用来从事冰矿采集工业全新产品的研发。
en: ORE began to market ice-mining related products under its Frostline brand at the end of YC117. The success of the brand's flagship Endurance class expedition frigate encouraged ORE to set up a subsidiary corporation to manage research and development of new products for the ice-mining industry.

zh: 新君主一旦被选立后，他就必须和自己的皇室家族分离，而加入神圣的君主家庭，从而拥有整个帝国中的大量产业，掌控着相当大的政治权利。  凯蒂兹女皇一世在新纪元118年登基后，开始运用她早期经营积累下的人脉的经验和智慧来力求使艾玛帝国的繁荣和权势达到全新高度。
en: Once a new emperor has been chosen, all ties to his old royal family are severed and he joins the holy family of the emperors, which owns vast estates throughout the empire and wields considerable political power.    Empress Catiz I, crowned in YC118, has shown signs of using the experience and wisdom of her relations in her early efforts to usher in a new age of prosperity and power for the Amarr Empire.

zh: 昌隆集团是一个财团，近年来在世界各地投资了几家高科技公司。它不以抢夺公司所有权为目标，而是实行互不干涉的政策。尽管如此，大多数公司还是热情欢迎他们的资本流入，因为引进朱庇特投资会带来很多好处。
en: Prosper is a financial corporation that has in recent years invested in several hi-tech companies around the world. It has never sought a majority ownership in any company and has a policy of non-interference. Nevertheless, most companies welcome their capital with open arms, simply for the prestige that having a Jovian investor gives.

zh: 星际捷运由各大帝国合营，在各方面保持中立使得公司能将人和货物运抵新伊甸中的任何一处。星际捷运拥有最完备的恒星制图和空间站数据，他们对这些信息极为保护。
en: InterBus is jointly owned by the empires, but it has been careful to maintain its neutrality in all aspects. This has allowed the company to fulfill its intended role as a freighter company that ferries people and goods to and from any place in the world of EVE. InterBus has the best stellar charts and station data of anyone, but they guard this information very carefully.

zh: 最近建立的一个小型生产公司，还有待发展。其主要资产是研究设施，米玛塔尔人十分希望在不久的将来这些设施可以投入生产。
en: A small, recently formed manufacturing corporation that has still to take off. Its main asset is its research facility, which the Minmatars have high hopes will produce for them in the near future.

zh: 最近盖伦特媒体都在报道某家佣兵军团雇佣行为卑劣的盖伦特军队成员执行任务的事情，奥斯机构军团被认为是最可疑的一个，因为他们经常因为自己的行为而见诸报端。不过该机构的日常生意往来仍在如常进行，将雇佣兵和其他服务人员派往新伊甸的各处。
en: A mercenary corporation that has made a practice of hiring dishonorably discharged members of the Gallente military, the Ostrakon Agency is considered a rather suspect organization by the Gallente media and they regularly run stories about its activities. Unperturbed, the Agency carries on with its business of contracting soldiers and other personnel for service in conflicts throughout New Eden.

zh: 朱庇特内议会被认为是朱庇特帝国的最高政府部门，不过，这点从未得到确认或证实，议会的内部操作更是无人知晓。
en: The Jovian directorate is believed to be the highest governmental authority in the Jove Empire, though this has never been confirmed or denied by the Jovians. The inner workings of the directorate are also uncertain.

zh: 杜厦铸造是少数几个在边境以外寻找商机的艾玛公司之一。这是个充满活力的采矿公司，愿意冒险寻找富矿。公司会派遣全副武装的采矿探险队深入外层空间。很少有公司愿意冒这样的风险。
en: One of the few Amarr companies that has ventured outside its borders in search of business opportunities. Ducia Foundry is an energetic mining company that is willing to take chances in their search for rich minerals. The company has been known to send heavily armed mining expeditions deep into the outer regions, a risk that few respectable companies are willing to take.

zh: 柯埃佐家族历来在艾玛政治风波中保持中立，为各种问题积极寻求折中办法，力求和平解决。他们的外交风格为公众所喜欢，但也因此树立了许多强敌。
en: The Kor-Azor have traditionally been in the middle of Amarrian politics, actively trying to find compromises and peaceful solutions to any problem. Their diplomatic style is favored by the public, but has created many powerful enemies that are biding their time.

zh: 核心局面公司作为米玛塔尔商业的成功典范，是为数不多的在全宇宙范围内获得成功的商家之一。该公司将独创的设计与低成本的生产方式相结合，生产出来的设备十分热销。
en: The great success story of Minmatar business, Core Complexion is one of very few Minmatar corporations that have managed to succeed on a universal scale. The company combines innovative designs with cost-effective production methods to create equipment that gives much bang for the buck.

zh: 格鲁汀集团是宇宙中克隆技术领先的公司。它不仅是第一个向公众提供克隆的公司，而且从那以后大大改进了克隆技术，后来进入该领域的公司纷纷追随效仿其技术。  新伊甸纪元118年，朱庇特内议会将格鲁汀集团的运营权移交给了理性思维社团。
en: Genolution is the leading cloning company in the world of EVE. Not only was it the first company to start offering clones to the public, but since then it has improved the cloning technique considerably, paving the way for others to follow in their footsteps.    In YC118, operation of Genolution was transferred from the Jovian Directorate to the Society of Conscious Thought.

zh: 正是我们，将文明带到了这个原本阴暗肮脏的世界。也正是我们，带着博爱、奋进和勇气一直支持着这个宇宙的发展。我们需要你帮助我们将米玛塔尔从他们自己的水深火热中解放出来。我们会帮助那些迷途的人们重新走上正道，但这个艰巨的任务需要像你这样的克隆人才拥有的永恒力量才能真正实现！
en: It was us who brought civilization to this dark and perilous world, and it is us who uphold it, with compassion, strength and courage. We need you to help us save the Minmatar from themselves. We will help the lost ones find their way, capsuleer, and we will do it with the deathless force only you can wield.

zh: 每当涉及到档案、交易和通信记录之类的问题时，分治的加达里政府就显得缺乏效率。国家档案所是由加达里国内的一些超级集团共同创建的，意图将这里作为上述信息的资源中心。国内所有关于交易、商业和政府事务的信息都必须送到这里，储存进大型数据库。
en: The fragmentation of the Caldari government has often proved to be problematic when it comes to documenting events, deals and communications. The House of Records was set up by the Caldari mega corporations to act as a central source for all this information. Information on all transactions, business deals and governmental involvements within the State must be sent here and are stored in huge data banks.

zh: 泛星船运作为新伊甸最大的船运公司，在各地提供便宜可靠的服务。泛星船运是仅次于星际捷运的第二号星际船运公司，而它也是通过纯粹市场操作发展壮大起来的大公司的典型。
en: The largest shipping company in the world of EVE, TransStellar Shipping offers a cheap and reliable service almost anywhere. Considered the next best thing to InterBus in interstellar shipping, TransStellar Shipping is a stellar example of a big company getting bigger due to pure marketing muscle.

zh: 波斯矿业股份由一群独立的矿工建立，通过精明的生意买卖和固定的采矿收入，波斯矿业股份慢慢跻身于加达里强大集团的行列。
en: Poksu was founded by a group of independent miners. Through shrewd business deals and solid mining income Poksu has slowly grown to join the ranks of the big boys in Caldari corporate politics.

zh: 波特克集团是新伊甸的主要生物技术集团之一。在它渊远流长的历史中，创造了不少奇迹，拓展了大量人类疾病的治疗方法。目前它正致力于联邦政府的一个最高机密研究项目，应该不久就会有结果。
en: Poteque is one of the leading biotech corporations in the world of EVE. In its rich history it has often worked small miracles in discovering or developing cures for a host of human sicknesses. It is currently embroiled in a top secret research project for the Federal government, the result of which should come to fruitition in the near future.

zh: 泰罗曼军团以第一位成为圣徒的尤朵人的名字命名，保护着塔什蒙贡家族的商业利益。尤朵人的后裔一直以来都是皇室家族中最具外向型思维的群体，该军团的雇佣兵远赴各地，无数次地在新伊甸中留下战斗的身影。
en: Named for the first Udorian to achieve sainthood, the Tal-Romon Legion is known to be among the business interests of the Tash-Murkon Family. The Udorian Heirs are traditionally the most outward-looking among the Royal Houses and the Legion's mercenaries travel far afield, plying their deadly trade in innumerable brush fire conflicts on the planets of New Eden.

zh: 洛维诺佣兵团是仿照盖伦特首星国王统治时期的旧式佣兵团的组织结构而建立的，不同的是他们使用的是最尖端的武器装备和军事科技。这个威名远播的私人佣兵军团的生意总是好的出奇。
en: Very much formed in the image of a traditional mercenary regiment from the time of kings on Gallente Prime, the Condotta Rouvenor nevertheless uses the most modern equipment and military techniques. The services of this prestigious private security corporation are always in demand.

zh: 深核矿业公司是一家年轻的公司，它的建立基于一种突破性的采矿钻孔新技术。虽然这项新技术的细节从未被透露，但却使产量大幅提高，从而使该公司很快成为了采矿公司中的领头羊。
en: Deep Core Mining is a young company that was founded on the basis of a revolutionary new mining drill technology. This new technology, details of which have never been revealed, gives much higher yield than older techniques and has promoted DCM to the top echelon of mining companies very quickly.

zh: 物资集团成立后，在极短的时间内占有了大量市场份额。这主要是因为它的商业运作方式和取向十分极端，甚至以出钱购买竞争者的财产为手段，使其退出市场。酷菲集团是物资集团的母公司，对其投入了大量资金，想将其打造为联邦内最大的采矿公司。
en: Material Acquisition has grabbed a sizeable market share in the short time since it was founded, mainly due to its ruthless business practices and tendency to buy out competitors. MA's mother company is Quafe, which has poured money into MA in an attempt to make it the largest mining company in the Federation.

zh: 特格拉共同体的社会结构非常复杂，外人难以理解，迄今为止观察到的证据也十分有限。该文明的一个重要组成要素被称为“演化枝”，在特格拉文明的方方面面都扮演着重要角色。  佩伦演化枝大概由许多分枝组成，似乎在时空技术、高脉冲超光速引擎制造和电子系统领域颇有建树。佩伦演化枝显然在特格拉的战略领导层中占据主导地位。
en: The Triglavian Collective has a complex social structure that is not easy for outsiders to understand on the strength of the limited observations made so far. One important element of the civilization is the so-called 'Clades', which clearly play a vital role in all aspects of the Collective.    The Perun Clade seems to be made up of many subclades and appears to be accomplished in space-time mechanics, high-impulse and FTL engine construction, and electronic systems. The Perun Clade apparently exerts itself in the sphere of strategic leadership of the Collective to a greater degree than others.

zh: 特格拉共同体的社会结构非常复杂，外人难以理解，迄今为止观察到的证据也十分有限。该文明的一个重要组成要素被称为“演化枝”，在特格拉文明的方方面面都扮演着重要角色。  斯瓦罗格演化枝显然由许多分枝组成，擅长制造战斗舰船、开发新型武器系统以及广泛应用生化适应突变质体技术。斯瓦罗格分枝可能是最激进且传统的，倾向于不断探索新机遇。
en: The Triglavian Collective has a complex social structure that is not easy for outsiders to understand on the strength of the limited observations made so far. One important element of the civilization is the so-called 'Clades', which clearly play a vital role in all aspects of the Collective.    The Svarog Clade is apparently made up of many subclades and the evidence so far indicates strengths in combat vessel construction, the development of novel weapon systems and extensive use of bioadaptive mutaplasmid technology. The Svarog Clade seems the most aggressive and traditional, while inclined to explore new opportunities.

zh: 特格拉共同体的社会结构非常复杂，外人难以理解，迄今为止观察到的证据也十分有限。该文明的一个重要组成要素被称为“演化枝”，在特格拉文明的方方面面都扮演着重要角色。  韦莱斯演化枝大概由许多分枝组成，似乎在重型太空工业、通信技术和高能量异种粒子物理领域颇有建树。韦莱斯演化枝似乎青睐在冲突之后使用演说和外交手腕——如果对现有证据解读正确的话。
en: The Triglavian Collective has a complex social structure that is not easy for outsiders to understand on the strength of the limited observations made so far. One important element of the civilization is the so-called 'Clades', which clearly play a vital role in all aspects of the Collective.    The Veles Clade seems to be made up of many subclades and is seemingly very strong in the fields of heavy space industry, communications technology and high-energy exotic particle physics. The Veles Clade seems to prize discourse and diplomacy, after a fashion, over strife – that is, if the evidence has been understood correctly.

zh: 玛塔尔境内的米克拉姆卡地区的极地是共和国军事机构的一处训练基地。只有那些退伍之后转行作佣兵的米玛塔尔老兵才会去提起这片不毛之地，以此作为他们不惧任何艰险的勇气象征。米克拉姆卡突击队以善于发动快速猛烈的袭击而闻名，他们能够以最小的损失来保护设施或其它目标。所以，他们的佣兵总是供不应求。
en: The arctic terrain of the Mikramurka region on Matar serves as a fierce training ground for the Republic military's ground forces. It was only natural for a group of Minmatar veterans turned mercenaries to evoke that inhospitable land as symbolic of their ability to conquer any adversity. The Mikramurka Shock Troop have a reputation for executing swift and stunning assaults, securing facilities and other targets with a minimum of collateral damage. As a result, their services are much in demand.

zh: 理性思维社团几个世纪前由一个朱庇特人一手建立，起初作为精神机构而存在，几经周折后，如今以其开办的学校而远近闻名，这些学校开设在偏远的空域，被认为是新伊甸中最棒的，各地家长争相让自己的孩子进入就读。
en: The Society was formed several centuries ago by a Jovian as a spiritual institution. Since then it has taken on many guises, but today it is mainly known for its excellent schools, which it operates in remote areas around space. These schools are considered the best in the world of EVE and parents everywhere fight to get their children admitted.

zh: 由于贸易，尤其是星际贸易是盖伦特社会不可或缺的一部分，因此联邦海关局拥有如此大的权力和影响也就不足为奇了。货物经常出入联邦，因此海关经常忙于检查通关流程是否规范。
en: With trade, especially inter-stellar trade, such an integral part of Gallentean society, it is no wonder that the Customs office has gained so much power and influence. Goods are constantly flowing in and out of the Federation and the Customs have its hands full in monitoring that everything is done by the book.

zh: 疾速快递是一家快递公司，主要活动在加达里合众国内。他们的服务迅速，有效，质量一流，但代价是他们必须把公司维持在小而紧凑的状态。
en: Prompt Delivery is a express delivery company that operates mainly within the Caldari State. They have a fast, efficient, quality service, but the price of this excellence is that they must keep the company small and compact.

zh: 皇家枪骑兵军团由卡尼迪皇家海军及其机械化步兵团中的精英所建立，旨在保卫卡尼迪王国和人民不受武力所侵袭。自从卡尼迪和艾玛帝国建立正常邦交以来，皇家枪骑兵越来越频繁地在艾玛帝国领土上出现，并被认为是可以与现存的艾玛佣兵军团相提并论的一支有生力量。有传言说商业大亨塔什蒙贡家族最喜欢雇佣他们去下黑手了。
en: Founded by veterans of the Royal Khanid Navy and its Uhlan mechanized infantry regiments, the Royal Uhlans hold themselves loyal to the martial ideals of the Khanid Kingdom and its people. Since the rapprochement between the Kingdom and the Amarr Empire, the Uhlans have increasingly been seen on Empire holdings and are a well-regarded alternative to the existing Amarr mercenary companies. Rumor has it that the business-oriented Tash-Murkon house especially favors them as a go-to force for deniable ops

zh: 盖伦特国家银行位于盖伦特首星上，有着数百年的历史，网罗整个联邦境内的金融业务。雄厚的实力，广泛的影响使它能够参与或干预盖伦特社会的多方面事务。
en: The national bank of the Gallenteans, located on Gallente Prime. The bank has been in operation for many centuries and has a web of vested economical interests throughout the Federation, allowing it to participate or interfere with most aspects of Gallentean society.

zh: 盖伦特的上流人士每每为纠缠不休的地面战斗而感到发愁，而在联邦领土上，对强大战斗力的需求也日趋强烈。无论是抵御海盗进攻、阻挡军队入侵、还是防卫工业设施，艾迪姆战士都能够应付自如。
en: Hipsters drinking coffee in the Caille boulevards wrinkle their noses at the thought of ground warfare but in a surprising number of Federal districts there is a real need for serious combat power. Whether it be countering pirate raids, fending off frontier incursions by militia troops, or taking and holding industrial facilities, the Edimmu Warfighters are well able to meet the needs of any merc contract.

zh: 盖伦特联邦多样化经济的一个特点就是几乎每个工业或服务领域内都有独立的佣兵军团存在着。查特林快速反应部队是这众多的私人佣兵军团中的一个，主要为盖伦特军团在低安区的领地提供保卫服务。像其它盖伦特佣兵军团一样，查特林快速反应部队在盖伦特边境以外也能游刃有余。
en: One of the features of the Gallente Federation's diverse economy is the proliferation of independent contracting corporations in every sphere of industry and services. Chatelain Rapid Response is one of many private military contractors used by Gallente corporations in low-security territories. Like other Gallente mercenary corporations, Chatelain Rapid Response has no difficulty with working outside the frontiers of the Federation.

zh: 短途物流是个专门从事原材料整装货运的小型运输公司，由于安全体系完备，泛光银行最近收购了它的绝大多数股份，并雇佣它在空间站间运输金钱和其他贵重物品。
en: A small shipping company  that specializes in the bulk shipment of raw materials. The Bank of Luminaire bought a majority share recently and has employed IZS in shipping money and other valuables between stations, due to IZS' excellent security system.

zh: 矿钻集团的历史可以追溯到和联邦交战的时期。当时它是加达里海军的一支别动队，在小行星上安置爆炸物，设置陷阱。战争以后，该小队成员创建了矿钻集团，运用他们的特殊知识很快在采矿业取得了显著成就。
en: Minedrill traces its history back to the war with the Federation, to a special force unit within the Caldari Navy that rigged asteroids with explosives and used them as booby traps. After the war the personnel in the unit created Minedrill and used their special knowledge to quickly gain prominence within the mining industry.

zh: 祖玛利机动部队并不怎么参与加达里各大超级军团和家族之间的冲突，他们更加注重于冷酷且坚定地完成任务，然后收取酬金。这个佣兵军团由著名的海军将领米纳托·祖玛利建立，所以它的组织架构几乎和加达里军事机构没什么两样。不过，在祖玛利家族看来，效率是最重要的，是公司获取利润的不二手段。
en: Standing somewhat above the internecine fray of the Caldari megacorporations and great families, Zumari Force Projection represents a cold and implacable focus on getting the job done, and collecting on its contracts. Founded by the famed Navy commander Minato Zumari, the tactical organization of the mercenary company is almost indistinguishable from Caldari State military structures. Nevertheless, this is seen as nothing more than efficiency by the Zumari board, and is secondary to the pursuit of profit by the company.

zh: 科金恩风险控制军团过去专业从事于提供电子战防御方案，后来则致力于研究最尖端的军事科技。最后，该军团从一份科研合同中接触到了最新的战斗植入体，并且获准对该技术进行开发。那么接下来，成立一个佣兵军团就是顺理成章的事情了。
en: Kirkinen Risk Control specialized in developing and supplying cyber-warfare defense solutions before it diversified into researching other leading-edge military technologies. Ultimately, the corporation acquired access to the latest combat implants through a research contract and was able to gain a license to exploit the technology. The evolution into a mercenary contracting house was the next logical step.

zh: 科马努是一个备受赞誉的安保军团，曾为加达里和其它帝国的众多公司提供服务。科马努执行者是该军团旗下的一个分支，如果你想在商务谈判中展现力量，或是在冗长的法律纠纷中抢得先机，那他们一定不会让你失望。
en: Ikomari-Onu is a respected security firm consulted by many corporations in the Caldari State and beyond. The Ikomari-Onu Enforcement subsidiary is regularly hired for those occasions when a demonstrated ability to directly seize assets is preferable to business negotiations or a lengthy case before the courts.

zh: 空间航线巡管局是CBD超级集团的警务安全力量。由于超级集团间彼此互不信任，因此它们的产业都由自己的警备队保护。
en: Spacelane Patrol is the police and security arm of the CBD mega corporation. As the mega corporations only trust each other so much, they all have their own police force to guard their properties.

zh: 米玛塔尔人从很早开始就已懂得只有通过保密和欺骗才能获得自由。共和安全局的存在帮助共和国在建国初期站稳脚跟，免除了足以吞噬共和国的威胁。共和安全局与新伊甸的地下组织有密切联系，通过情报交换和黑市买卖来互惠互利。
en: The Minmatars learnt early on in their freedom that it can only be kept by wrapping it in secrets and deceit. The vigilance of the RSS has helped the Republic weather many storms that threatened to engulf the fledgling state. The RSS has strong links with the underworld elements in the world of EVE, the information exchange and black marketing strengthens both sides.

zh: 米玛塔尔的心为了自由而歌唱，米玛塔尔的灵魂为了开阔的星空而奋斗！但米玛塔尔的心却被奴役而摧残。现在，一切都将由你们做主，克隆飞行员们。你们有这样的力量，来解放我们的人民，你们是时代的英雄！加入到我们为了自由的战斗，将死亡送给艾玛人；米玛塔尔万岁！
en: The Minmatar heart sings for freedom and the Minmatar soul strives for open skies, but the Minmatar heart has been withering away in captivity. It is now up to you, capsuleer. You hold the power to free our people. You are the heroes of your generation. Join us in the struggle for freedom. Death to Amarr; long live the Minmatar Nation.

zh: 米玛塔尔的某些军团被称为“圆环”，它们成立的目的与其它国家的军团没什么两样。胡斯卡之环就是一个专业从事私人保镖服务的军团。随着新生的米玛塔尔共和国羽翼渐丰，胡斯卡之环开始专为其他国家或军团的来访者提供保卫服务。既有在各大军团中露脸的机会，还能赚取可观的利润，胡斯卡之环很快就转型成为佣兵军团。
en: The Minmatar organizations known as 'circles' are formed for as many purposes as corporations or societies found in other nations may be, and the Circle of Huskarl specialized in providing bodyguards to any who could pay their price. As the fledgling Minmatar Republic expanded and developed, the Circle's services began to be especially called for by visitors from other nations and corporations. Exposure to the ways of interstellar corporations, and the allure of incredible profits, soon led the Circle of Huskarl to diversify into mercenary services.

zh: 米玛塔尔矿业联合体是唯一现存的在艾玛征服米玛塔尔空域前就已建立的公司。它能在艾玛统治米玛塔尔时期幸存下来的原因就是它对艾玛人有用。现在它为共和国服务，提供组建太空舰队所需的原材料，以保护共和国免遭艾玛帝国及其走狗们的攻击。
en: Minmatar Mining Corporation is the only Minmatar corporation still in existence that can trace its foundation to before the conquest of Minmatar space by the Amarrians. It managed to stay in business while the Amarrians ruled the Minmatars only because it was useful to the Amarrians. Now it is useful to the Republic by providing the raw materials to build a space fleet to defend the Republic against the Amarr Empire and its minions.

zh: 粮食救济会是姐妹会的人道主义救助团队。公司收集来自整个新伊甸的捐助，用于购买食品和药物，并分发给需要的人。
en: Food Relief is the humanitarian aid arm of the Sisters of EVE. The company collects donations from all over the world of EVE and uses them to buy food and medicine, which it then distributes to those in need.

zh: 红银之手是一个与阿狄莎波家族关系密切的准军事组织，并被特许可以在行星间开展军事行动。最初这些战士们只是通过完成委托来获得土地，到了今天，他们则更喜欢实实在在的金钱，当然电子货币也可以。
en: Closely linked to the Ardishapur Family, the Red and Silver Hand are a paramilitary organization holding a charter granting them the right to conduct planetary operations. Originally the soldiers of the Hand performed their duties in return for a grant of land. Today they prefer payment in cold hard coin, or its electronic equivalent.

zh: 纳基维集团是唯一一个以娱乐业为主的加达里超级集团。纳基维集团，通常被叫做NOH，被怀疑和加达里黑社会有紧密联系。主要原因是他们许多产品都迎合黑社会需求，并和法律打擦边球。
en: The only Caldari mega corporation that has focused on the entertainment industry. NOH, as they're commonly called, have always been suspected of strong ties to the Caldari underworld, mainly because many of their products cater to that social element or are on the borderline of legality.

zh: 纳夫卡主宰是一种自由无人机蜂群形态，在有特格拉建筑存在的深渊空间中经常大量出现。“纳夫卡”似乎属于以所谓的“演化枝”组成的特格拉种族的一个分枝。  看起来纳夫卡主宰要么完全听从特格拉的指令，要么以自己的意志而战，而后者显然更为令人忧心。
en: The Navka Overminds are a form of rogue drone swarm that can be encountered in significant numbers throughout Abyssal Deadspace wherever Triglavian infrastructure is present. The designation 'Navka' seems to have some relationship to a subdivision of the Triglavian race that runs across the so-called 'clades'.    It would seem that the Navka Overminds are either entirely suborned to Triglavian purposes or, perhaps more worryingly, are willingly working with them.

zh: 统合部安全分类：欧米伽银（失效）  埃利亚巡逻队：被占据的星域报告，新纪元119年5月10日  自代号：埃利亚调查结束已过去了十年，被占据的星域的现状仍不乐观。自由无人机的侵袭由于克隆飞行员的活动而保持着一种微妙的平衡，但这种平衡随时可能被打破，被占据星域的母巢意识的威胁性仍然巨大。
en: CONCORD Security Classification: Omega Silver (Revoked)    Aria Patrol: Infested Regions Report YC119.05.10    Ten years after the Code Aria Inquiry, the situation in the Infested Regions remains troubling. While the rogue drone infestations have been held in a tense equilibrium by the activities of independent capsuleers, the balance is assessed as unstable and the threat from the infested region hiveminds remains critical.

zh: 统合部指令情报处是DED的一个分支机构，为统合部提供一系列的情报收集和报告服务。统合部指令情报处还制作了面向克隆飞行员的资料手册和系列全息影像：指令情报处密件。
en: The CONCORD Directive Intelligence Agency is an offshoot of the DED that provides a range of intelligence gathering and reporting services to CONCORD. The CDIA is also known for producing the CDIA Interstellar Fact Book and its series of briefing holos for capsuleers: the CDIA Files.

zh: 统合部收到情报表明这支流浪者军事编队由一个名为“暴君推进统治集团”的割据势力组织所控制。我们除了监视到这些舰船在四处散播该组织的标识外，对这支军队的动机和目标目前仍不得而知。
en: CONCORD intelligence reports indicate that Drifter military formations are operating under a single command structure represented by an enclave level organization with the designation 'Vigilant Tyrannos'. Despite monitoring the movements of ships broadcasting the identifier of this organization, no further information as to the motivation or goals of this force has been gleaned.

zh: 统合部是一个多世纪前由所有帝国共同建立的，其意图在于改善各国之间脆弱的关系，并在发生分歧时充当会晤地点，找到和解方法。后来统合部成为一个独立的机构，并以此为荣，坚决履行职责。
en: CONCORD was jointly formed a century ago by all the empires. The intention of it was to foster the fragile relationship between the empires and act as a meeting place where they could discuss their differences and hammer out a compromise solution. CONCORD has since taken on a life of its own, proud of its independence and determined to uphold its duties.

zh: 统合部紧急干预和安全局
统合部紧急干预和安全局于新纪元120年成立，旨在应对星际航运业频频受到骚扰和打击的状况。
en: CONCORD's Authority for Emergency Interdiction and Security (AEGIS) was set up in response to increasing losses of interstellar shipping in YC120.

zh: 统合部联合安全局在流浪者危机的早期就注意到该设计已经不能满足需要。于是统合部航天局实施了“不可抗力计划”，进入到加强衍生版本的舰船研发中。  就在统合部航天局通过超先进技术成功升级了统合部舰船的同时，该计划也造成了对统合部资源的严重消耗。因此，作为促进这些设计发布的新辟附属集团，核心集团授权发布了简化版的设计，剥离了统合部先进的快速部署和电子战套件，并通过授权经销商向市场投放。
en: CONCORD's Directive Enforcement Department became concerned early in the Drifter Crisis that its inventory of ships could no longer meet its needs. The CONCORD Aerospace division therefore embarked on its "Force Majeure Program" to develop enhanced variants.    While CONCORD Aerospace successfully upgraded DED's stable of vessels with hyper-advanced technology, the program became a severe drain on CONCORD's resources. Consequently, the Inner Circle authorized a limited release of CONCORD Aerospace's designs, stripped of CONCORD's advanced rapid-deployment and electronic warfare suites. The division was established as a subsidiary corporation to facilitate the release of these designs to the capsuleer market via authorized dealers.

zh: 维克米和平工业是维克米超级集团的警务安全力量。由于超级集团间彼此互不信任，因此它们的产业都由自己的警备队保护。
en: Wiyrkomi Peace Corps is the police and security arm of the Wiyrkomi mega corporation. As the mega corporations only trust each other so much, they all have their own police force to guard their properties.

zh: 维克米集团是加达里两大超级集团之一，它的最大股东是一个家族。维克米仍由创建者萨托达家族拥有，这个家族的名称在加达里商业中一直与荣耀和信任联系在一起。
en: Wiyrkomi is one of the two Caldari mega corporations where the largest shareholders is a family. Wiyrkomi is still owned by the founding Seituoda family, a name that has always been associated with honor and trustworthiness in Caldari business.

zh: 维洛奇亚部族也许是最平静的米玛塔尔部落，不渴望权力，甘愿过着平淡的生活。维洛奇亚人大都是店主或小商人，很少冒险涉足大人物的产业。
en: The Vherokior tribe is perhaps the least troubled of the Minmatar tribes, with little aspirations for dominance, content to live on the fringe. Most Vherokiors are shop-keepers or small scale businessmen, seldom venturing into the big boy's league.

zh: 维洛奇亚部族并不擅长正面战斗，他们更适于管理复杂的后勤供应链，使得星际冲突不至于难以为继。维洛奇亚战斗后勤队除了精于后勤管理外，还能够寻找雇佣兵来履行客户提出的要求，这样就有更多的机会来兜售自己的军事供给网络了。
en: The Vherokior Tribe's talents lie away from frontline combat as such, and are more suited to organizing the complicated and often extended chains of logistics required to keep an interstellar conflict ticking over. In addition to its specialist services, Vherokior Combat Logistics also works as a brokerage house matching mercenary units to appropriate contracts, a role that gives it ample opportunity to sell access to its extensive military supply network.

zh: 维鲜集团只有几年的历史，是从一个没落高技术公司的基础上发展起来的。维鲜得到了天主凝聚会的帮助，并快速成长为艾玛帝国工业领域的领头企业。
en: Viziam is only a few years old, having been founded around the remnants of a hi-tech company that floundered. Viziam received support from the Carthum Conglomerate and has quickly risen to prominence in the industrial sector of the Amarr Empire.

zh: 耶利集团作为一个外国公司，却能在加达里合众国里立足，这种例子并不多见。耶利从前是一个地下非法贩售公司，后来为了进入合众国内调整了经营策略。自那以后，公司不断繁荣兴旺，成为加达里空域内发展最快的公司之一。
en: Ytiri is a rare example of an outsider company that manages to establish itself within the Caldari State. Formerly an underworld smuggling company, Ytiri adjusted its operation to gain admittance into the State. Since then the company has flourished and is one of the fastest growing companies in Caldari space.

zh: 联合安全局是统合部的治安武装，主要负责追捕出名的罪犯并攻击犯罪设施。他们经常在帝国以外的空间行动，让罪犯知道法网恢恢，疏而不漏。
en: The police enforcement arm of CONCORD. DED has the responsibility of tracking down known criminals and attacking criminal facilities. They frequently operate outside empire space, wanting criminals to understand that they are nowhere safe from the long arm of the law.

zh: 联合收割诞生于十年前，由几个农业采矿公司联合兼并而成。它是新伊甸最大的原材料公司之一，在艾玛帝国内外进行各种各样的资源采集运作。
en: Joint Harvesting was formed a decade ago when several agricultural and mining companies joined together to form one giant company. One of the largest raw material companies in the world of EVE, Joint Harvesting conducts a wide variety of resource gathering and operates both inside and outside the Amarr Empire.

zh: 联合警备队是三岛超级集团的警务安全力量。由于超级集团间彼此互不信任，因此它们的产业都由自己的警备队保护。
en: Corporate Police Force is the police and security arm of the Hyasyoda mega corporation. As the mega corporations only trust each other so much, they all have their own police force to guard their properties.

zh: 联邦情报处直接为总统工作，行事诡秘，总在暗处秘密进行。据说其操纵的特工网络范围之广只有朱庇特人才能与之抗衡。
en: The FIO answers directly to the President and its works are shrouded in secrecy and covert operations. It is believed to operate an extensive spy network that is only rivaled by the Jovians.

zh: 联邦战略军需处由盖伦特联邦总统杰科斯·莱登下令组建，旨在寻找和开采盖伦特境内的重要军事资源。联邦战略军需处对发现的资源进行开采作业已经成为了联邦一道常见的风景线。
en: The Federal Strategic Materiel corporation was founded by executive order of President Jacus Roden and is tasked with finding and extracting resources vital to the Federal armed forces throughout Gallente space. The mining operations sent out to harvest resources from sites discovered by the Federal Strategic Materiel corporation have become a common sight in the Federation.

zh: 联邦政府对当前的威胁已经非常警觉，在这个时候，武力应当被赋予实施。尽管我们期待和平，但现在却面对战争，由那些走向毁灭的加达里人发动的战争。我们需要勇敢的飞行员，飞到战斗的前沿，不光光是为了我们的理想而战，也是为了在黑暗的岁月中守护他们的联邦政府而战！加入我们，克隆飞行员们。通过你们的力量和信仰，我们将屹立不倒！
en: The Federation has awoken to the threat, and now its strength shall be tried. We wanted peace, and now we are faced with war, provoked by the destructive Caldari. We need brave pilots to fly into the fray and protect not only the ideals for which we stand, but the Federation that upholds them in these dark times. Join us, capsuleer. With your strength and your conviction we shall endure.

zh: 联邦政府部在太空的影响力比其他帝国的官僚机构更大，这主要是因为相比其他帝国，太空航行在盖伦特的普通百姓中更早普及，而且联邦内的星际贸易也比其他地方多得多。
en: The Federal Administration has greater presence in space than the bureaucratic apparatus of the other empires. This is mainly due to the fact that space travel became a common thing for the ordinary Gallentean citizen much earlier than for the other empires and also because inter-stellar trade is proportionally much larger in the Federation than elsewhere.

zh: 联邦最高法院是联邦内的最高司法机构。它确保联邦宪法得到遵守，但它主要负责权力的公正性，努力使行政公开严明。
en: The Supreme Court is the highest judicial institution in the Federation. It makes sure the  Federal constitution is upheld, but it is mainly concerned about the higher truths of authority, striving to make the administration as open and honest as possible.

zh: 联邦海军正遵照最新的政策强化学员的职业精神，这使得普通学院的录取要求更为苛刻，而学院教育也更为严格。
en: The Federation Navy acts upon a recent policy of upgrading the professionalism of its cadets. The result is a leaner, meaner academy with much stricter entry requirements than before and even stricter tutoring.

zh: 联邦海军陆战队有着悠久而光辉的历史，无论在空中还是地面上都是盖伦特联邦的一把利剑。它是联邦军事力量中的一支精英队伍，自从联邦开始大力介入宇宙中的行星军事冲突以来，它更是长年活跃在第一线。
en: The Federal Marines have a long, proud history of serving the Gallente Federation in space and on planetary bodies. They are among the elite troops of the Federal military and typically at the forefront when the Gallente Federation goes to the extreme of intervening militarily in planetary conflicts across New Eden.

zh: 自从与盖伦特联邦分开以来，ORE在卫星开采与太空殖民方面的研究让他们在多年里都有创新。为了能更加独立，ORE召集了一批思想更前卫，更极端，更奇异的人组成了一个被称为“外空联合开发”的新部门。有传言说他们正在研发一种可以消化黑赭石然后吐出纯正的超新星诺克石的转基因费多，不过这一说法并未被证实也未被否定。
en: ORE’s research efforts in fields as diverse as moon mining and space colonization have brought the mining conglomerate many innovations over the years since it broke with the Gallente Federation. In its efforts to become ever more independent, ORE has assembled its most far-thinking, radical and slightly eccentric minds in a new division incorporated as Outer Ring Development. Persistent rumors of a program to create a genetically-modified Fedo capable of digesting Dark Ochre and excreting pure Nocxium have neither been confirmed nor denied.

zh: 自从印塔基银行决定将所有帐目对外保密以后，它的事业开始活跃起来。众所周知这家银行洗黑钱，但辛迪加财团一致认为：即使它不提供这项服务，也会有别人这么做的。
en: The Intaki Bank has seen brisk business in the decade since it decided to keep the names on all accounts secret and inaccessible to anyone. Everyone knows that dirty money pours in and out of the bank, but the general consensus of the Syndicate is that if it doesn't provide this service, then someone else will.

zh: 自从结束了与加达里的战争并且改善了与艾玛帝国的关系之后，联邦海军的预算被大大削减。这支无人机舰队急需新鲜血液加入。
en: The Federation Navy has seen better days, since the end of the war with the Caldari and the thawing in relations with the Amarrians the budget for the Navy has been slashed severely. It still relies on its drone armada to defeat opponents, but ship wise the Federal Navy is lacking.

zh: 自尊集团在音乐行业有着特殊的地位。他们采用了一种特殊的音乐播放技术，现在已经变得非常流行，尤其是在年轻一代中。自尊集团雇了自己的音乐制作人，根据听众的不同品位度身定制音乐。但不是所有人都喜欢这样的技术，艾玛帝国已经将该项技术视为非法。
en: Egonics holds a unique place in the music industry. The company uses a special technology for broadcasting sound, which has become extremely popular, especially amongst the younger generations. Egonics employs its own music makers and can tailor the music to the individual taste of every listener. Not everyone is happy with the Egonics technology and it has been outlawed from the Amarr Empire.

zh: 自由扩张集团由大抗争后移居盖伦特联邦的米玛塔尔人建立，但为促进关系，公司又回到了米玛塔尔共和国境内开展业务。自由扩张集团效仿盖伦特快递公司的经营模式，很快就奠定了自己在米玛塔尔境内主要运输公司的地位。
en: Freedom Extension was founded by Minmatars that moved to the Gallente Federation following the Rebellion, but returned to the Republic to foster the good relationship between the two races. Freedom Extension is a courier company modeled after Gallentean ones and quickly established itself as the main shipping company in Minmatar space.

zh: 艾玛帝国允许艾玛达人拥有自己的舰队，因为他们深知艾玛达舰队会主动对抗米玛塔尔人，防止其骚扰艾玛帝国。艾玛达军队十分精简，但却足以牵制米玛塔尔人。
en: The Amarrians allow the Ammatars to operate their own fleet, knowing that it will be employed against the Minmatars that otherwise would harass the Amarr Empire. The Ammatar Fleet is neither big nor sophisticated, but it's strong enough to keep the Minmatars at bay.

zh: 艾玛帝国内唯一得到皇室授权的官方通讯社。尽管艾玛认证通讯社不像其他帝国通讯社那样独立自主，事实上被审查的案例却十分少。
en: The official news agency of the Amarr Empire, the only one that is sanctioned to report from the royal court. Though Amarr Certified News lack some of the independence that news agencies in the other empires enjoy, actual cases of censorship are few and far between.

zh: 艾玛帝国分裂以后，卡尼迪二世做的第一件事就是建立一个组织，打造一支全新的太空舰队来抵御艾玛人的入侵。卡尼迪工作室的第一艘飞船只用了几周时间就问世了。艾玛人此后再也没有入侵卡尼迪王国，它的成功不言而喻。
en: One of the first things that Khanid II did after separating from the Amarr Empire was to set up a company capable of building a brand new space fleet to deter the Amarrians from invading. Khanid Works cranked its first ship out within weeks and its success is evident as the Amarrians have never invaded the kingdom.

zh: 艾玛帝国是一个十分官僚的强大国度，艾玛内政部在政府机关和公共机构的巨大网络中承担着重要的责任。内政部是帝国中最大的雇主，掌控着重要的政治权力，因此可以掩盖或加快处理某些事情。
en: The Amarr Empire is a bureaucratic juggernaut and the Amarr Civil Service has taken on a life of its own at the center of the vast web of governmental offices and institutions. The civil service is the largest employer within the empire and wields considerable political power through its ability to smother or speed up cases.

zh: 艾玛建设是一个低调保守的建设公司，不喜欢成为公众的焦点。当艾玛人首次进入太空，艾玛建设进入鼎盛时期，参与建设了最早的星门。虽然企业仍保留着自古而来的威严和权力，但其创新思想却早已不复存在。
en: A low-profile, conservative construction company that likes to keep out of the lime-light. Amarr Constructions had its heyday when the Amarrians were first entering space and participated in the construction of the first star gates. The innovative side of the company is long gone, though it still retains much of its old power and majesty.

zh: 艾玛政府对于推进集权很有心得。内务府负责追捕并驱逐在社会中不受欢迎的人，还负责监督外国人，尤其是米玛塔尔恐怖分子在艾玛境内的活动。
en: The Amarr authorities have vast experience in molding their citizens as they want. The Ministry of Internal Order is responsible for hunting down disgruntled elements in the society and eradicating them. Since first contact the Ministry of Internal Order is also responsible for monitoring the activities of foreigners within the Amarr border, especially Minmatar terrorist cells.

zh: 艾玛政府总是试图控制其居民生活的方方面面，尤其是与贸易通信有关的每一件事。艾玛商管局拥有艾玛境内所有的交易记录，同时也监控着境内所有的外来贸易和投资。
en: The Amarr government seeks to control as many aspects of the daily life of its citizens, especially everything that has to do with trade and communication. The Amarr Trade Registry has records of all transactions within Amarr space and also monitors all foreign trades and investment made within the empire.

zh: 艾玛有一整个专门生产食物的行星。这个人口众多的国家有过饥荒的苦难经历，现在再也不希望重新遭受一次大规模的饥荒。努图拉集团是艾玛最大的农业公司之一，向其他帝国出口基础食料。
en: The Amarrians have whole planets dedicated to food production, the populous state has bitter experience from famine and wants to make sure it never experiences famine again on a large scale. Nurtura is one of the larger Amarrian agricultural companies, one that has been in the forefront of exporting basic foodstuff to the other empires.

zh: 艾玛皇家学院是新伊甸最古老的教育机构之一，它的起源要追溯到帝国和“大归御”之前，那时艾玛人仍旧只能在艾玛首星大陆上生活。
en: One of the oldest educational facilities in the world of EVE, the institute's origin date from the era when the Amarr were still confined to their continent on Amarr Prime; before the empire and the Great Reclaiming.

zh: 艾玛达共和国是隶属于艾玛帝国的半主权国家。艾玛达领事馆是其最高政府机关，掌管着国内各项事务。领事馆由艾玛达人操控，但他们都必须服从艾玛达统治者的指挥，这位统治者是艾玛人。
en: The Ammatars have a semi-sovereign state bound to the Amarr Empire. The Ammatar Consulate is the highest governmental office for the Ammatars and takes care of the general running of the Ammatar state. It is manned by Ammatars, but they all bow to the Ammatar governor, who is an Amarr.

zh: 莫德军团是一个在加达里和盖伦特境外活动的佣兵集团。很多诸如外空联合矿业集团这样的知名集团都会雇佣莫德团来为他们的行动提供保障。起初军团的成员大部分是印塔基人和加达里人，不过最近他们开始吸收各种族的成员加入。
en: Mordu's Legion is a mercenary corporation that operates outside Caldari and Gallente space, hired by respectable companies such as ORE to protect their operation. Originally the members of the legion were mostly Intakis and Caldari, but lately they've started accepting members from most races.

zh: 莱戴护卫服务公司是用以保护莱戴超级集团的警务安全力量。由于超级集团间彼此互不信任，因此它们的产业都由自己的警备队保护。
en: Lai Dai Protection Service is the police and security arm of the Lai Dai mega corporation. As the mega corporations only trust each other so much, they all have their own police force to guard their properties.

zh: 莱戴集团一贯主张质量至上，他们的产品总是最高水准的。莱戴集团有一个能量研究项目，与异株湖集团在科技成就上相抗衡。
en: Lai Dai has always advocated quality over quantity and their products have always been of the highest standard. Lai Dai has an energetic research program and rivals the great Ishukone in technological achievements.

zh: 莱登船业的所有人是臭名昭著的杰科斯•莱登，史上最恶劣的强盗资本家和恶棍。凭着他的狡诈领导技术，该公司成为了联邦内领先的护卫舰和穿梭机制造商。该公司还运营着一所实力雄厚的研发部门。莱登致力于网罗各地一流人才，通常以名誉和金钱为诱饵，从其他公司挖人。
en: Owned by the infamous Jacus Roden, a robber baron and scoundrel if there ever was one. Under his cunning leadership the company has established itself as a leading manufacturer of frigates and shuttles in the Federation. The company also operates a strong R&D division, Roden has been active in hiring the best talents out there, often by prying them from other companies with promises of fame and fortune.

zh: 萨拉姆家族一直都是皇室中最好战的，无论何时需要都愿意拿起武器。这个家族在艾玛军事和军火工业中利益双收。他们是唯一一个想要复兴大开拓时代荣光的皇室家族。
en: The Sarum family has always been the most belligerent of the royal families, always willing to take up arms whenever required. The family has vested interest in the Amarr military and the armaments industry. They are the only royal family that wants to revive the Reclaiming efforts of old.

zh: 虽然就人数上而言，朱庇特海军并不算庞大，但没人知道其真正实力如何。它被公认为是帝国舰队中最强大的，并因此而普受敬畏。在艾玛—朱庇特战争中，朱庇特海军一战成名，仅在一场战役中，就消灭了整支艾玛舰队。
en: No one knows how big the Jove Navy is, though judging by the number of Jovians it can't be all that big. Yet it is universally revered and feared, considered the most powerful of all the empire's fleets. Its reputation dates from the Amarr-Jove War when it decimated a whole Amarrian armada in a single battle.

zh: 虽然早已不在加达里八大超级集团之列，佩克昂集团仍然具有在市场上呼风唤雨的能力。佩克昂突击队是集团在进军装备制造工业之后成立的，这使得它侧重于为新殖民地和偏远领土上的集团设施提供安全保卫。
en: While its star has long faded in favor of the Big Eight megacorporations, the Perkone corporation maintains a strong presence in the market. The Commando Perkone subsidiary was established after its interests in the construction equipment industry made it aware of a demand for troops to defend corporate facilities on new colonies and in remote territories.

zh: 虽然联邦货运局比其他很多货运公司都小，但它仍是盖伦特境内最被认可的货运公司。公司历史悠久，主要致力于联邦内的工作，即使有时候对外扩张更有利可图，但他们仍不改初衷。
en: Even though Federal Freight is smaller than many other shipping companies it is still the most recognized shipping brand within the Federation. The company is old and established and has always concentrated their efforts within the Federation, even at times when it seemed lucrative to expand out of it.

zh: 血袭者由一个古老的艾玛派系演变成一群凶狠的强盗，他们沉溺于作恶。统合部将其视为太空中最危险残忍的海盗团体，并建议人们远离他们在幽暗之域的活动区域。
en: The Blood Raiders evolved from an ancient Amarrian cult into a gang of cut-throat bandits that revel in killing and maiming. They are considered among the most dangerous and depraved of all pirate elements operating in space. CONCORD strongly advises people to stay out of their zones in the Bleak Lands.

zh: 行家住宅公司与行家物流公司同时建立，但境遇却迥然不同。在行家物流公司连续取得成功的同时，住宅公司却在地产市场上遭遇了强有力的挑战。公司现急需投资基金，这样才能使其重新复苏。
en: Expert Housing was founded at the same time as Expert Distribution, but the two sibling companies have fared very differently. While Expert Distribution has been a continuous success story Expert Housing has suffered in a tough, highly competitive real estate market. The company is on the lookout for investment funds, which it hopes will help revive it.

zh: 行家物流的商标如今在新伊甸的各大主要城市中已是赫然在目。该零售公司在过去的十年取得了长足发展，这得益于自助式销售模式的推行和低廉的管理费用。行家物流公司作为纳基维集团家族的成员之一，对抗着盖伦特的大型零售连锁店，这些连锁店在过去主导了整个市场。
en: The Expert brand can today be seen in all major cities in the world of EVE, this retail company has seen phenomenal growth in the last decade, thanks to their self-service policy and low overhead. Part of the NOH family, Expert Distribution is Caldari's answer to the large Gallentean retail chains that have dominated the market in the past.

zh: 被占据的星域母巢意识
西顿工业是由“老家伙达列克斯”从奥佩里亚星系的奇异旅行回来之后创立的，多年来，它一直都是无人机研制和生产的主要厂商。
en: Founded by Old Man Darieux after his return from his fantastic journey to the Ouperia system, CreoDron has been the leading corporation in drone manufacture and development for many years.

zh: 视角传媒是新伊甸里的主导通讯社。尽管总部设在联邦境内，但公司却自豪于自己的完全独立，在世界各地都有着不同的星际代理处。视角传媒稍微有点左倾，但也足够保守，被公认为是一个可靠的通讯社，甚至最麻烦的商人和政客也这么认为。
en: The Scope is the leading news agency in the world of EVE. Though based in the Federation the company takes pride in its total independence and operates separate agencies throughout the world. The Scope swings slightly to the left, but its conservative enough to be considered a reliable news agency even to the toughest businessmen and politicians.

zh: 谜一样的科维尔·埃菲尔是罗述集团的一个大股东，而这也使公司与米玛塔尔强权政治阴影下的犯罪分子关系紧密。罗述集团是一个娱乐公司，以其提供的肆无忌惮，动人心魄的欢愉而闻名。
en: The enigmatic Kolvil Eifyr is a large shareholder in the Leisure Group and this ties the company in with the criminal elements so strong in the shady world of Minmatar power politics. The Leisure Group is an entertainment company that is known for its barbaric, yet stirring, pleasure nodes.

zh: 贾米尔·萨拉姆女皇的第一任私人保镖，神权之守护者。
en: The personal guard of the ruler of the Amarr Empire are drawn from the finest troops the Imperial military can offer. While its core duties revolve around safeguarding the occupant of the Imperial Throne, the Imperial Guard is a large and very well-equipped body. The Guard can project impressive force across New Eden with fanatical devotion to its orders.

zh: 赛毕斯托部族偏重于技术和机械，米玛塔尔的大多数技术也来源于它们。尽管赛毕斯托当局曾多次受到其主要政敌，狡诈的克鲁夏部族攻击，但这并没影响赛毕斯托部族在米玛塔尔共和国的主导地位。
en: The Sebiestors are technically and mechanically inclined, most Minmatar technology comes from them. The Sebiestors have always been the leading tribe in the Minmatar Republic, though their authority has many times been under attack from the crafty Krusual tribe, their main rivals in Republic politics.

zh: 赫泽奥精炼集团是个采矿公司，规模很小但野心勃勃，其主要业务都集中在米玛塔尔和艾玛达间争夺中的空域内。这片空域的大部分都有十分富饶的矿藏资源，因此近几年赫泽奥精炼集团效益很好。艾玛达当局和萨拉姆家族都是公司的坚实后盾。萨拉姆家族给予赫泽奥精炼集团所需的军事保护，以确保其采矿运作顺利进行。
en: A small, but aggressive mining company that has concentrated its operation in the highly disputed regions between Minmatar and Ammatar space. Many of these areas are very mineral rich and HZO Refinery has shown a hefty profit in recent years. The company is backed by the Ammatar authorities and the Sarum family, which has given the company the military power it needs to operate safely in this hotly contested space.

zh: 赫迪农大学位于赫迪农星系—第一个被艾玛殖民的恒星系。这个大学由高尚而崇尚自由的学者们创建，避开了君王以及他的神学家们的严密监视。
en: Hedion University's central campus is located on the planet Apha in the Hedion system - the first solar system colonized by the Amarr after their own. The university was founded by spirited and liberal scholars free from the scrutinizing eye of the emperor and his theologians.

zh: 超感集团生产的医疗设备行销整个宇宙。当生产神经增效剂还是合法行为的时候，超感集团也是该领域的主要生产商之一。增效剂被视为非法之后，他们很自然就停止了生产。  新伊甸纪元118年，朱庇特内议会将超感集团的运营权移交给了理性思维社团。
en: X-Sense manufacture medical equipment that it sells all over the world of EVE. When neural boosters were legal X-Sense was also one of the leaders in that field, though it naturally stopped producing them once they became illegal.    In YC118, operation of X-Sense was transferred from the Jovian Directorate to the Society of Conscious Thought.

zh: 辛迪加财团是新伊甸最大的黑市交易商，为外部星域阴暗商人和帝国贸易商的交易提供便利。印塔基商业局专营此类交易，为辛迪加财团牟取暴利。
en: The Syndicate is the biggest black market dealer in the world of EVE, a place where shady traders from the outer regions can meet merchants from empire space. Intaki Commerce handles these transactions, making a nice profit for the Syndicate.

zh: 这个佣兵军团由已淡出人们视线的萨托达家族所建立，并以萨托达的名字命名，由在争夺维克米集团统治权的家族斗争中失败的一方所掌控。该军团最近执行的一些合同似乎有点玷污了萨托达家族的荣耀之名，不过他们的佣兵执行任务的效率还是证明了他们无可置疑的可靠性。
en: Founded by the reclusive Seituoda family, the mercenary company that bears their name is believed to be controlled by one of the losers in a bitter family war for supremacy over the military-industrial powerhouse that is the Wiyrkomi megacorporation. While some of the contracts lately fulfilled by the Command may have tarnished the Seituoda reputation for honor, the unimpeachable reliability of their word has, if anything, been enhanced by the lengths to which its mercenaries go to complete a job.

zh: 这是一家历史悠久的公司，可以追溯到大概1500年前的道德改革时期。佐洱是一个很有影响力的人物，与皇室关系紧密。他利用皇室关系将自己的公司推上了主导地位。佐洱死后，公司遭到对手和政敌的打压，很快衰败下来。但是它艰难地幸存了下来，目前保持着中等发展水平。
en: An old company that dates back to the Moral Reform some 1500 years ago. Zoar was an influential Holder with strong ties to the royal court. He used his imperial connections to propel the company into the leading rank. After Zoar's death the company came under attack from rivals and political enemies and declined rapidly. But it managed to stay afloat and enjoys today a moderate success.

zh: 这是一家研究公司，专注于人类太空居住舱和其他生命保障装备的研发。在无过载研究公司的全盛时期，它受到了加达里人民的欢迎，被视为加达里的希望，但是公司在过去的几十年里不断衰落。
en: A small research firm that specializes in space habitats and other life support modules for humans. In its heyday Zero-G was hailed as the great hope of the Caldari people, but the company has been in a steady decline for the last few decades.

zh: 这是由古怪的托杜•科金恩建立的一家生物技术公司，他是将思想转变为机器的第一人。载诺集团从一开始就是涉足生物化学和纳米力学的研究领域，它的总部仿佛是疯狂科学家实验室和野生动物园的混合体。
en: A biotech company founded by the eccentric Todo Kirkinen, the first man to have his mind transferred into a machine. Zainou has from its inception been at the forefront of bio-chemical and nano-mechanical research, its headquarters are described as a combination of a mad scientist's lab and a jungle zoo.

zh: 速装工业作为廉价用品和低质设备的生产商，决不是生产领域的主力军。他们也许并不受所有人欢迎，但通过迎合低端买家，他们已经成为了一股不可或缺的力量。
en: Manufacturer of cheap gadgets and low-level equipment, Rapid Assembly is by no means a driving force in the manufacturing sector. By catering to low-budget buyers they fill an important niche, unsexy as it may be.

zh: 避难会是姐妹会对新伊甸之门进行科学研究的中心。与其它姐妹会空间站一样，它也作为一个典型的避难场所而存在，但是首先还是以科学研究为主。
en: The Sanctuary is the center of the science research the Sisters are undertaking on the EVE gate. It also acts as a typical refuge haven as all other SOE stations, but this activity is secondary to its scientific pursuits.

zh: 那些曾经历了所谓的“辩护战争”的艾玛贵族们在上流社会中获得了“行军之王”的称号。在艾玛达边界地区的敌对局势逐渐趋于平静之后，几个贵族决定建立一个军团，为帝国培养并武装军事力量，支援前线。在艾玛皇帝希德伦七世的庇佑下，行军之王军团通过提供最优秀的雇佣兵精英而赚得盘满钵满。
en: Those True Amarr nobles who were veterans of the so-called 'Vindication Wars' gained the cognomen 'Marcher Lords' in Holder circles. After the hostilities on the border of the Ammatar Mandate died down to a low level, several of these nobles decided to form a corporation to train and equip militia forces on the frontiers of the Empire. With the blessing of Emperor Heideran VII, the Company of Marcher Lords generated a large income by offering its most elite troops as mercenaries.

zh: 酷菲集团作为新伊甸最大的集团之一，它的巨大成功是基于它们极受欢迎的酷菲饮料。公司在许多其他领域也有投入，因而具有相当大的政治影响力。
en: One of the largest corporations in the world of EVE, Quafe bases its phenomenal success on their extremely popular Quafe drink. But the company operates in many other fields and its power is such that it has a considerable political clout.

zh: 金商这个名字暗示了古老的拉塔帝国以金钱雇佣高手的传统，以及更加古老的通过剑的数量来估算敌人军队规模的方法。现在，该军团致力于在行星战场上留下自己的印记。
en: With a name alluding to an old Raata Empire practice of hiring skilled generals for gold, and an even older tradition of reckoning the size of armies by the number of swords that could be commanded, Kinsho is a corporation determined to make its mark in the lucrative planetary warfare field.

zh: 金纳泽近卫队在成立之初是一个准军事组织，致力于改善边境星系的安全局势。起初他们获得了一些成功，不过自从势力战争爆发以来，战火蔓延整个宇宙，近卫队所取得的成就也不足道了。现在，该组织已经转型为一个佣兵军团，为往来客户提供金元战士以供驱使。
en: The Sinq Laison Gendarmes began life as a paramilitary organization that aimed to improve the security situation in the numerous frontier systems of their crossroads region. While the Gendarmes had some limited success, the increasing tempo of conflict since the beginning of the Empyrean War has eroded those gains. The organization has recently turned to mercenary work and supplements its ranks with contract troops on a regular basis.

zh: 锋锐工业是朱庇特舰船和舰船装备的主要生产商，经营范围只在朱庇特空域内，拒绝所有来自外国的交易，不愿将产品卖给朱庇特以外的人。
en: Shapeset is the main manufacturer of Jovian ships and ship modules. It operates solely within Jovian space and has refused all approaches from abroad to sell the products to non-Jovians.

zh: 长足食品是家由阿狄莎波家族和萨拉姆家族共同拥有的小型农业公司，其产品大多被这两个家族的人所享用，只有剩余的一小部分允许在公开市场上出售。虽然这使阿狄莎波和萨拉姆家族永不缺乏美食，但也大大遏止了公司扩张的机会。
en: A small agricultural company jointly owned by the Ardishapur and Sarum families. The products of Further Foodstuffs are mostly used by the subjects of these two families, with what little is left surplus allowed to be sold on the open market. This has curbed the expansion opportunities of the company, though it means the fleets of Ardishapur and Sarum will never lack for food.

zh: 阿根塔之核最初是一个军团的附属军事机构，致力于研究阿根塔星座的自由无人机。他们总是对所从事的事情表现出一丝不苟的态度，即使是在脱离了最初的研究机构身份之后也仍然如此。军团生涯无疑为阿根塔之核的创建者增添了一些愤世嫉俗的意味，这与他们曾在在军事服务部门工作脱不了干系。
en: Originating as a military unit seconded to corporate interests studying the behavior of rogue drones in the Algintal constellation, the Algintal Core have maintained a clinical care and attention in everything they do, even after cutting formal ties with the original research effort and Federation military alike. Exposure to the realities of corporate life has inevitably added a certain cynicism to the attitudes of the founding operatives, which has served them well as suppliers in the military services sector.

zh: 阿梅特保安军是帝国运输集团旗下的一个分支，成立的初衷是为集团的开疆辟土提供安全保卫。而现在，任何人付得起钱，他们都可以出人出力。
en: An offshoot of the Imperial Shipment corporation, originally formed to provide planetary security for the shipping giant on frontier worlds and new colonies. Ametat Security now offers troops and equipment to anyone willing to pay their rates.

zh: 阿洛特工业是莱登船业的分公司，创立于几年前，研制并生产顶级飞船装备。虽然公司仍处于发展初期，但其出色的产品使得公司的未来非常光明。
en: Allotek Industries is an offshoot from Roden Shipyards, founded several years ago to develop and manufacture top quality ship modules. Though the company is still in its infancy it already has an impressive product catalog that promises great things for this company in the future.

zh: 阿狄莎波家族是传统皇室家族，他们十分保守，尊崇艾玛人的信仰。虽然他们的地位在许多方面都有所减退，但还算稳定可靠。
en: The Ardishapur family is the traditionalists of the royal families. They are conservative and champions of the Amarrian religion. Their domain is in many ways backward, but it is stable and secure.

zh: 隆哈达自由护卫军的起源可追溯到克鲁夏部族在沦陷的玛塔尔的群山中奋勇抵抗艾玛侵略者的那个时期。那段历史，使得他们早已扬名新伊甸。这个军团由几个克鲁夏领主所建立，像古斯塔斯海盗一样行事坚决果断，对金钱和权利有着极度的嗜求。没人知道现在隆哈达自由护卫军是被什么人所控制，有传言说神秘的科维尔·埃菲尔也参与其中。
en: The Tronhadar Free Guard claim to trace their origins back to Krusual clans who held out against the Amarr invaders in the mountains of occupied Matar. That, at least, is the branding. While it seems true that it was founded by a pair of Krusual warlords, the company displays the utter lack of scruples one would expect in a Guristas interstellar pirate, and a like appetite for profit and power. No-one is quite sure who stands behind the Free Guard today but the rumor is that the enigmatic Kolvil Eifyr has a hand in its operations.

zh: 雷瑟夫星际战略军团是盖伦特联邦境内的一个佣兵军团，专注于为星系间的武装冲突提供战略和后勤服务。最新的科技发展为该军团的业务扩展提供了很大帮助，越来越多来自盖伦特以外的客户也找上门来了。
en: The strategy and logistical requirements of planetary conflict in multiple star systems is the speciality of Resheph Interstellar Strategy, a military contracting corporation based in the Gallente Federation. Recent technological developments have seen Resheph considerably expand their operations and take an increasing number of contracts outside Federation space.

zh: 飞马集团是新伊甸中最大的零售商，它们在盖伦特联邦内几乎处于垄断地位，这使得联邦政府部非常担心。
en: The largest retail corporation in the world of EVE, FedMart is close to having a monopoly within the Federation, something that is of great concern to the Federal administration.

zh: 马纳尔人有时会被那些已被盖伦特和印塔基文化迷惑得晕头转向的联邦新成员所忽视，不过他们从来都是联邦的重要一份子，尤其是他们对联邦军队的贡献更是举足轻重。马纳尔战斗团由一些马纳尔老兵所建立，是一个广为人知的佣兵军团。
en: The Mannar people are sometimes overlooked by newcomers to the Federation bedazzled by Gallente and Intaki culture but they have always been an important member race, particularly in terms of their contribution to the Federation military. The Mannar Focused Warfare corporation was founded by a group of Mannar veterans and is a well-regarded military contracting firm.

zh: 高尚用具公司是专门为超级富豪定制珠宝的小型制造公司。但是公司的管理者十分精明，扩充了他们的生产线以增强其灵活性和安全性。现在公司的产品名目繁多，有奢华的，也有普通的，大都是些高品质而且限量发行的物品。
en: A small manufacturing company that specializes in customized jewelry for the very wealthy. But the company's managers have been shrewd enough to expand its production line to increase its flexibility and security. Today, the company manufactures many kinds of both luxury and mundane items, usually in high quality and small numbers.

zh: 高级教育中心原打算作为切玛科技公司研究员的智囊团，但其随后演变成了一个独立的教育机构，如今，它被认为是新伊甸中最好的技术学校。
en: Originally conceived as a think-tank for researchers at Chemal Tech the CAS evolved into an independent education facility that today is considered one of the very best technical schools in the world of EVE.

zh: 高高在上的皇室家族的商业活动极少为人所知晓，但是他们参与成立了艾玛圣殿骑士佣兵军团的事情还是在帝国内引起了广泛关注。圣殿骑士们是虔诚的信仰追随者，为表达自己的忠诚不惜利用一切手段，这使得他们成为了那些想要“接管”艾玛行星上的设施的军团的最爱。
en: The business interests of the secretive Emperor Family rarely come under close scrutiny but their involvement in the establishment of the Amarr Templars mercenary company could hardly escape the attention of the wider Empire. Keen to convey an image of austere piety and ruthless loyalty, the Templars are a favorite with those corporations wishing to carry out 'hostile takeovers' of facilities on Amarr planets.

zh: 鬼棒旅团的名字与在加达里首星活动的一个有组织犯罪集团紧密相连，所以大多数加达里人都对该军团唾弃不已。不过这并没有影响到加达里各大超级集团青睐他们的佣兵服务，鬼棒旅团在接受合同时也从无畏惧。
en: Bearing an extremely sinister name linked to an organized crime clan from Caldari Prime, the Onikanabo Brigade is regarded with some disdain by most Caldari. This does not stop Caldari megacorporations making use of the services of this independent mercenary brigade when it suits them, and the Onikanabo accept contracts without fear or favor.

zh: 从行星带或者星云里吸取化学药品。
从行星带或者星云里面开采矿物。
储存产品以及把货物运送给商栈。
en: Stores products and freights goods to Trading Post.

zh: 储存产品以及把货物运送给外部零售商或者生产工厂。
en: Stores products and shifts goods to external retailers or production corporations.

zh: 储存产品以及把货物运送给零售中心。
en: Stores products and freights goods to retail center.

zh: 储存产品和把货物送到生产工厂。
en: Stores products and shifts goods to production corporations.

zh: 储存产品并把货物运送给外部的零售商。
en: Stores product and freights goods to external retailers.

zh: 储存办公署用的数据和帐户信息。
en: Stores data and kredit sheets for the Bureau to work with.

zh: 储存即将运送给零售商的飞船。
en: Stores ships before freighting them to retailers.

zh: 储存和回收被划为生化污染物的材料。
en: Stores and recycles materials classified as biohazards.

zh: 储存银行用的数据和信用表格。
en: Stores data and kredit sheets for the Bank to work with.

zh: 制造运送给工厂的设计图和蓝图。
en: Makes plans and blueprints that are shipped to Factory.

zh: 制造运送给装配车间的设计图和蓝图。
en: Makes plans and blueprints that are shipped to Assembly Plant.

zh: 发表报告和公布办公署领域的相关章程和宣言。
en: Delivers reports and publishes rules and manifestos concerning the Bureau's field.

zh: 发表报告和提供办公署领域的相关信息。
en: Delivers reports and provides information concerning the Bureau's field.
Distributes administrative information to the public.

zh: 在运送给零售商之前储存其他工厂的货物。
en: Stores cargo for other corps before shipping it to retailers.

zh: 培训人员和出售技能书。
en: Produces personnel and sells skill packages.

zh: 存储产品及货物，以供应生产部门。
en: Stores product and freights goods to production corps.

zh: 对司法问题进行仲裁的法庭设施。
en: Court facilities where judicial matters are arbitrated.

zh: 把仓库里的东西出售给消费者，服务空间站。
en: Sells goods from warehouses to consumers, and to service stations.

zh: 生产储存舰船使用的武器和弹药。
en: Produces weapons and ammunition that are shipped for storage.

zh: 生产完成的高科技产品。
生产并复制娱乐类用品然后把它运送给零售商。
en: Stores and multiplies the entertainment material and ships it to retailers.

zh: 生产恒星飞船，运送给贮存舱里的储存工厂。
en: Produces starships that are shipped for storage in Storage Bay.

zh: 生产要运到仓库的食品。
en: Makes food that is shipped to warehouses.

zh: 生产要运送给出版商的娱乐类用品。
en: Produces entertainment material that is shipped to Publisher.

zh: 生产运送到食品加工厂的家畜和粮食。
en: Makes livestock and grain that is shipped to food processing units.

zh: 精炼收集的化学物品，制造瓶装的产品。
en: Refines the harvested chemicals, making bottled products.

zh: 精炼矿石，生产纯净的钢锭和礁石材料。
en: Refines the minerals, making purified ingots and rock materials.

zh: 行政系统内部以及生产人员发布的报告。
en: Studies issues within the administration system and produces personnel.

zh: 这座空间站中的设备专为处理富含富勒烯的气云及其副产品而打造。产出的聚合物被用于席拉各地，为避难会的扩张和后勤保障提供支持。  来访的克隆飞行员只能在限定的地区活动，不过混合反应生产线只能由获授权的避难会工作人员使用。
en: This station contains equipment dedicated to the delicate task of processing and manipulating fullerene-rich gases and their byproducts. The resulting polymers are used in multiple applications throughout Thera, enabling continued expansion and maintenance of the Sanctuary’s expedition.  Capsuleer guests at the stations are welcome within clearly designated zones, however use of the hybrid reaction lines is restricted to authorized Sanctuary personnel only.

zh: 这座空间站中集结了避难会最优秀的冬眠者无人机行为学和解剖学专家，旨在对古老却仍能发挥作用的人工智能系统进行研究。  新伊甸纪元116年一份未证实的报告披露，这里的研究人员已经获得了之前被认为不可能的突破：捕获并控制了仍能行动的冬眠者无人机。这座空间站的大部分地区只允许获授权的避难会工作人员进出，并有非常严格的安保措施防止窥探行为发生。
en: Tasked with investigating ancient yet still functioning artificial intelligence systems, this station is home to the Sanctuary’s foremost experts in the behavior and anatomy of the enigmatic Sleeper drones.  Unconfirmed reports leaked in YC116 suggest that researchers at this institute may have succeeded in what was once considered unachievable: capturing and containing operational Sleeper drone subjects. The vast majority of the station is accessible only to authorized Sanctuary personnel, and a heavy security presence discourages snooping.

zh: 这座空间站配备的先进的全光谱感应阵列可以观测并追踪这个庞大星系中任何地方的冬眠者活动。  这座设施还能对遍布席拉各地的避难会空间站中的引力场感应器收集到的数据进行集中处理。只要附近发生了时空异常，无论能不能用普通的扫描探针探测，这座建筑都能迅速观测到。
en: The advanced omni-spectral sensor arrays equipped to this station enable detailed observation and tracking of the Sleeper activity anywhere in this massive star system.  This facility also serves as the central processing location for data fed from gravitational field sensors fitted to each of the Sanctuary stations spread across Thera. This infrastructure allows rapid trilateration of nearby irregularities in space-time, whether they are detectable through normal scanner probes or not.

zh: 避难会的最尖端引力物理研究设施就位于这座空间站内。任何进出的舰船都须小心遵循交通控制员的指示，因为附近随时都可能出现危险的空间扭曲。  人们普遍认为阿斯特罗级和斯特修斯级先进的隐形技术就得益于这座实验室之前取得的突破性成果。实验室和行政楼层是严格禁止进入的，所有的飞行员访客都被限制只能在自己的舰长室中活动，从无例外。
en: This station houses the Sanctuary’s cutting-edge graviton physics research facility. Approaching vessels are advised to carefully follow all instructions from traffic controllers, as potentially hazardous spatial distortions may be present in the immediate vicinity.  It is widely assumed that this laboratory’s previous breakthroughs are responsible for the advanced cloaking capabilities of the Astero and Stratios class vessels. Access to the laboratory and administrative levels are restricted and all capsuleer guests are confined to their quarters without exception.

zh: 销售从生产工厂送来的陶器。
en: Sells wares received from production corps.

zh:
“一个污秽之所，满是乱序者、恶棍、强盗、黑市贩子、赌徒、老板和舞女。总之，是个度假的好地方”

--某盖伦特议员。
en:
A den of thieves, scoundrels, bandits, black market dealers, gamblers, pimps and prostitutes. All in all, a nice place for a holiday

- Unnamed Gallente Senator.

zh: “他们所代表的是一种野性，一种难以驾驭的蛮荒，在这个我以为已经把所有的危险都消除掉了的时代，这些东西深深地让我们恐惧，那就是我们自己。” ——布隆戴尔博士，哲学大师，凯勒大学
en: They represent a certain savagery, an untamed wild, something to fear in an era where we thought to have exterminated all dangers to ourselves, but ourselves. - Professor Blondal, Master of Philosophy, University of Caille.

zh: “以上帝之名，艾玛人重新收复了我们的全部世界。现在，凭借上帝赐予的圣谕，我们将触及其他世界。从近旁的赫迪农，到遥远的米萨巴，再到烧灼的南方之星佩尼尔格曼，以及这之间的所有土地。它们是我们的与生俱来之物，我们的责任，我们的领土。”--皇帝希德伦三世，公元21290年，新伊甸之门坍塌后的第一座星门启动之时。
en: In God's name, the Amarr have reclaimed the entirety of our world. Now, blessed with the divine mandate of God, we spread our reach unto other worlds. From nearby Hedion, to the distant Misaba, to the burning southern star Penirgman, and all lands in-between. They are our birthright, our duty, our Domain. - Emperor Heideran III, 21290 AD upon the opening of the first stargate since the collapse.

zh: “你们这些年轻的太空舱飞行员运气太好了！怎么着，在我们那会儿，我们可没有黑渊星域和混浊星域这些花里胡哨的无法律约束星域！我们只有源泉之域！我们必须跑到源泉之域！要穿过艾里迪亚，来回都要！那里可到处都是血袭者！他们抢我们的血，我们一点怨言也没有。我们还挺喜欢的！毕竟另一条路必须穿过普罗维登斯，那里的萨沙人可是要抢你脑子的！所以，当你抽着上好烟草，喝着上好香料酒，开着上好霍克级采矿时，别忘了：就在不久以前，我们必须把自己的第一个孩子献给皇帝才能有资格申请源泉之域的采矿许可！所以知足吧！”--老矿工尤尔斯科尔德对任何愿意听他说话的人所说的一番话。
en: You young pod pilots have it lucky! Why, back in my day, we didn't have these fancy pants lawless regions like Pure Blind and Stain! We had Fountain! We had to go to Fountain! Through Aridia, both ways! And it was infested with Blood Raiders! They stole our blood and we didn't complain. We liked it! Because the other option was going to Providence, and they had Sanshas who stole your BRAIN! So when you're out there, smoking your fancy tobacco, drinking your fancy spiced wine, and mining with your fancy Hulks, remember: it wasn't so long ago that we had to give our first born to the Emperor just for a chance to apply for a permit to mine in Fountain! So be thankful for what you have! - Old Prospector Yurskeld to anyone who will listen to him.

zh: “只要我的国家有一个国民幸存，我的梦就能延续。”
en: So long as a single citizen of my nation survives, my dream lives on.

zh: “国家越强大，其治下的人民才会越繁荣富强。”
en: The greater the State becomes, the greater humanity under it flourishes.

zh: “图克尔舰船一艘艘接近着。一只不可见的大手把它们撕裂，壮观地抛入彼此相吸的群星间的虚空。甚至连巨大的城市级舰船也被俘获了，这些呈几何状排列的船只一条条被吸入死亡，从视线中消失。等这冰冷、死寂的太空又只剩我一个之后，我意识到，我目击了一个可怕的巨大秘密。”--《哥蒙尼·费鲁什游记》
en: One by one the Thukker ships approached. An invisible hand tore them away and flung them visibly into the void that lies between the stars grabbed each. As even the great city-ships were seized, one by one the geometrically aligned vessels were sucked into their wake, disappearing from view. After I was alone once again in the cold, dead space, I knew I witnessed a great and terrible secret. - Travels of Germone Ferush

zh: “如果人类的创造物反叛了，这并不是一件值得惊奇的事情。这只是神在提醒着人类——我们不是他”—— 人工智能科学的禁区
en: When man's creations rebel, it is no great surprise. It is simply God's reminder that mankind is not Him. - The Forbidden Science of AI

zh:
“就像远古众神从天而降，递予我们火种，赋予我们超出智慧的力量……然后消失。”

--论飞行员的崛起。
en:
It was like the gods of old, descending from the heavens and handing us fire, empowering us far beyond our comprehension.. and then vanishing.

- Treatise on the rise of the capsuleer.

zh: “我不会接受一些语无伦次的傻瓜的发号施令，让我在事业尚未成功之前就结束我的性命。你无法夺走我的任何东西--我的王国，我的人民，以及我的轻微生命。”--卡尼迪二世
en: I will not be ordered by some whimpering fool to destroy myself when my work is unfinished. You will not take anything from me - not my kingdom, not my people and least of all my life. - Khanid II

zh: “我不能确认也不能否认那些指控……我们被控什么来着，野兔？”“这次吗？超-超-超级海盗行为、六级多-多-多重犯罪、恐怖主义、乱扔垃圾，如-如-如果我没念错的话”“对，就是那些。无可奉告”
en: I can neither confirm nor deny the allegations that... what are we being accused of again, Rabbit?    "This time? G-g-grand piracy, sixth-degree m-m-multiple-homicide, terrorism and littering, i-i-if I'm reading this right"    "Yeah, that. No comment"

zh: “我们不能在这里停下，这是无人机的地盘。”
en: We can't stop here, this is drone country

zh: “我们的调查显示，这些星系中的许多行星有维持生命的能力。不过，由于缺乏适当的星门网络，我们完成任务所需的航行时间显著增加了。我觉得花这些时间值得。那些肆意放纵的盖伦特人，我对他们的信任程度就跟我能抓起他们一个扔出去似的——非常有限。对降落位置的最初估计似乎是可行的，但我们有一个潜在问题。我们发出去的远程探测器送回来一些奇怪的读数。我们的科学小组认为他们从中读出了星门和一个相邻的星域，这令人非常不安。我觉得盖伦特人不可能已经跑得那么远了。除非我们能核实这些读数并弄清那些星门属于什么人或什么东西，否则要把我们自己投放到一个活动受限的位置中去是非常不明智的。”——米纳托·祖玛利，加达里海军指挥官
en: Our surveys show that there are many planets capable of sustaining life in these systems. However, the lack of a proper stargate network has drastically increased the travel time for our mission. I think it is worth it. I don't trust those Gallente further than I could throw one, and that isn't very far, given their indulgences. The initial speculation for a fallback position seems to be sustainable, but we have one potential problem. The long-range probes we sent out have been reporting some strange readings. Our science teams think they are reading stargates and an adjoining region, which is disturbing. I do not think it possible that the Gallente have yet moved that far. Until we can confirm these readings and determine who or what these stargates belong to, it would be ill-advised to place ourselves in a position where we have our movement restricted on multiple fronts. -Minato Zumari, Caldari Navy Commander

zh: “我压根不知道，我为隐藏飞船而做的努力都是一场空”--《哥蒙尼·费鲁什游记》
en: Little did I know that all my efforts to hide my ship were for naught - Travels of Germone Ferush

zh: “我曾经亲眼见识过霍格·卡哈蒂尔的厉害，就是那个自称为非凡先驱者的人，他卖了一堆垃圾给一个笨蛋还让那人相信这是一艘已拆卸的裂谷级飞船，他把一个切下的头颅当作某个著名血袭者的头颅给当了，还有一名可怜的艾玛记者，她本以为霍格是条很好的独家新闻，结果最后却连自己被卖了都不知道是怎么回事--这一切都只发生在30分钟里。”--《哥蒙尼·费鲁什游记》
en: I once witnessed Hog Khatir, Outrider extraordinaire by his own admission, sell a pile of trash he convinced some pour soul was a dismantled Rifter, dismembered head who he pawned off as some famous blood raiders nonce and a poor Amarrian reporter who thought he was a good news story and ended up being sold without her realizing it all in the space of 30 minutes. - Travels of Germone Ferush

zh: “我的飞船颤巍巍地脱离了跃迁状态，在我眼前漂浮的是我从未见过的壮观景象。称其为大篷车实在是低估了它的无序和壮丽，这简直就是一座飞行的城市，一个太空中异常忙碌的蜂巢。”--《哥蒙尼·费鲁什游记》
en: My ship shuddered out of warp and before me floated the most fantastic vista I have ever laid my eyes on. To call it a Caravan would be to deny its chaotic splendor, it was a floating City, a space borne hive bustling with activity. - The Travels of Germone Ferush
Get the pod, Get the Pod!

zh: “联邦不是一个对空间、星球、山峦、河流或树木的定义区域。它是一种视野。”
en: The Federation is not a defined region of space, of planets, of mountains, rivers, or woods. It is a vision.

zh: “艾玛人试图‘收复'我们。他们失败了。现在轮到我们重拾曾经的本我了。漫游于荒野的自由民。”--图克尔历代记：大迁离
en: The Amarr tried to 'Reclaim' us. They failed. Now it is time for us to reclaim who we once were. Freemen, roaming the wilds. The Thukker Chronicles : Exodus

zh: “萨沙虽只是个凡人，但却敢于梦想天堂世界，并立志要将梦想变成现实。在他的有生之年，他把真正的乌托邦带给数以百万计的人，将他们从黑暗引向光明。但这种代价是高昂的，因为只要有一个灵魂上升到极乐世界，就会有另一个被永远打入地狱。天堂在凡间再现的机制对人类来说过于沉重，无法承受，于是萨沙挑出那些没有资格的人，并以邪恶的力量对他们进行再生，这样他们才能有所贡献 而在最后，这种浮士德式的契约终于导致了他自己的毁灭。四大帝国看到他的创造物以及他的成果可能会导致什么，他们感到了惧意。他们两两对视，他们在心里非常清楚，这个人的梦想比他们任何一个帝国都强大。所以他们决心站在一起，共同前进并摧毁萨沙的所有造物，这样才能保证自己的帝国不会被征服 他们来了，他们的舰队向萨沙的产物发射如雨点般的火力，力图将它们毁灭。善良的事物被焚毁了，而邪恶的力量却幸存下来，因为邪恶长存。所以，当一切结束后，重生的种子埋在了萨沙黑暗机器的废墟中，当平静再次到来时，这些种子重新发芽开花 今天，萨沙的巨大机器在他空旷的殿堂中骄傲且没有瑕疵地矗立着。虽然他的理想国已化为尘土，但他的共和国仍然健在，这是对他已破碎梦想的最好证明”--古里瓦尔博士在凯勒大学的演讲，不久即因发表煽动性言论而遭到起诉
en: Sansha was but a man, but he dared to dream of heaven, and willed to bring his dreams to life. In his time he brought true utopia to countless millions, delivering them from darkness into the light. But the price was high - for every soul elevated to Elysium, another was damned to hell for eternity. The machinery of heaven on earth was too heavy for men to bear, so Sansha took those he found undeserving, and through great evil made them again so they could do good work    And in the end, this faustian bargain proved his undoing. The four Empires saw what he had created and what his work could become, and were afraid. They looked at one another and knew, in their hearts, that this one man's dream was more powerful than any of them. So they resolved to stand together, to march together and to destroy all that Sansha had created, in order to ensure that they would not themselves be overcome    They came, and their fleets rained down fire on Sansha's works and sought to unmake them. And that which was good burned away, but that which was evil survived, for evil endures. And so, when it was done, the seeds of renewal remained in the ruins of his dark machinery, and when all was quiet again they bloomed anew    Today Sansha's great machines stand proud and unblemished in his empty halls. Even though his utopia is dust, his nation endures, a testament to the power of his shattered dream    <i>- Dr Gullivaire at the Caille University, shortly before his prosecution for sedition</

zh: “螺旋！我的上帝，那是螺旋之域！快警告所有的人，警告你的兄弟姐妹，你的父母还有朋友！我的天，还要警告上帝，不知道他老人家知道么？快去告诉他，那是螺旋星域！你必须要告诉他！”
en: The Spire! Oh God, the Spire! Warn everyone, warn your brothers, your sisters, warn your parents and your friends! Oh no, no, warn God, does he know? Warn him, the Spire! You must warn him!
This is not the system you are looking for

zh: “这儿不是硅的天堂？太荒谬了，那些自由无人机都能够到哪儿去？
en: No silicon heaven?  Preposterous!  Where would all the rogue drones go?

zh: “这就像是一只食蚁兽撞见了一个特别多汁美味的蚁巢。尽管蚂蚁可以反抗，它们撕咬、蜇刺，但这些反抗对食蚁兽数万年的进化毫无意义，它甚至根本就感觉不出来。对于食蚁兽来说，它所知道的就是这些东西都仅仅是食物而已，要用它们来填饱自己的肚皮，然后再回去好好的睡一觉。蚂蚁们也不会悲哀，它们都没有时间去悲哀。它们重建了自己的巢穴，希望食蚁兽以后会远离自己，同时它们也很明白，食蚁兽的再次光临是根本不可避免的”--《哥蒙尼·费鲁什游记》
en: It's as if an anteater has stumbled upon a particularly juicy nest of ants. The ants can try to fight back, to bite and sting, but the anteater has long evolved to ignore them. He doesn't even feel them. He just knows they are food. He'll gorge himself, then wander off to sleep. The ants do not mourn; they have no time for it. They merely rebuild in the hope that the anteater will stay away while knowing its return is inevitable. - The Travels of Germone Ferush

zh: “这是一趟长久、乏味的旅程。虽然我的制图师认为，从铎沃的中心地带到这的距离并不远，但出于许多原因，在到达这里的途中却充满艰辛，而且极其无聊，难以尽数。矿物调查报告也非常严峻。似乎将我们引诱前来的丰富矿藏根本无处可寻。这个星域没有任何有价值的东西，这就像没有绿洲的沙漠，就连我的信仰也似乎要枯萎死亡了。也许其他人能在这找到有价值的东西。而我不能。”--摘自第51探测兵团指挥官索鲁玛·阿奎恩的日志。
