en: It has been a long, tedious journey. Whilst my cartographer maintains that the distance from the central Throne Worlds is not great, the travails of getting here were, for many reasons, too tiresome to enumerate. The mineral survey report is also grim. It seems the riches we were led to expect are nowhere to be found. This region seems literally devoid of anything of worth, a desert with no oasis in sight, where even my faith seems to shrivel and die. Perhaps others will find worth here. I cannot. - From the journal of Soruma Aquiun, Commander 51st Exploration Corps.

zh: “那些恶魔害死了我们的长老。你们不会了解这对部族造成了什么……不会了解。我不知道历史将怎样评判我们，我不知道图克尔人会被描绘成什么样子--谁知道呢。我知道的只是，我们不能停留，我们已失落。我们将无尽地漂流，直到我们重新找到自我。”--图克尔部落酋长在共和国成立时的发言
en: Those demons killed our Elder. You can have no idea what that did to the tribe.. none. I wonder how history will judge us, I wonder what picture the Thukkers will paint – who can say. All I know now is that we cannot stay, we are lost. And we will wander the infinite until we find ourselves again. - Thukker Tribal Chief at the formation of the Republic

zh: 万物开始皆为一。上帝将其分离并赐予其造物生命 划分了世界，并赋予每人各自的领地 还赠与每人各自的使命。--圣典，第一卷，诗篇1:4
en: In the beginning all things were as one. God parted them and breathed life into his creation Divided the parts and gave each its place And unto each, bestowed purpose. - The Scriptures, Book I Verses 1:4

zh: 云环星域由著名的印塔基天文学家阿尔纳迪尔·尤贝尔命名，从一场远古巨型天体灾难中喷出的灰尘和气体形成的大型圆环环绕着这里。尤贝尔是首位在宁静之域的天文台观察到并详细记录这一宇宙现象的科学家，接着他提出理论，认为对这一圆环的范围、密度和扩张速度进行分析有助于了解是什么巨大事件造成了这种现象以及可能的发生时间。他进一步提出理论，这类爆炸可能具有深远的引力影响，也许能影响虫洞的稳定，甚至还有可能促成新伊甸之门的坍塌。虽然之后的研究对他的许多观点提出质疑，但尚无法绝对否定其理论的正确性。值得注意的是，姐妹会在宁静之域运行着好几座基地，并在那里部署前往云环星域进行研究的科学远征队。
en: Named by noted Intaki astronomer Alnadil Jouber, Cloud Ring is notable for its central constellations, which are encompassed by a massive ring of dust and gas expelled from an ancient stellar catastrophe of colossal proportions. The first scientist to observe and detail this phenomenon from observatories in the Placid region, Jouber went on to theorize that analysis of the ring's extent, density, and rate of expansion could give insight as to what monumental event could have caused such a disturbance and when it might have occurred.     He further theorized that such an explosion might have had far-reaching gravitic effects that could destabilize wormholes, and might have been a contributing factor in the collapse of the EVE Gate. While later researchers have discounted many of his ideas, the validity of his theories has yet to be categorically disproven. It is noteworthy that the Sisters of EVE maintain several bases in Placid, from which scientific expeditions to study the Cloud Ring are coordinated.

zh: 伊梅瑟亚星域的星图由一支艾玛达探路者部族经世代努力最终完整绘成。受到南方深处有大量艾克诺岩的传言的引诱，这支部族不断深入未探索的领域，结果绘制出了一个似狭长通道的空间的星图。最终，他们遇到了散布在南方空间的许多巨大虚空，因此无法继续前进。由于未找到任何储量巨大的珍贵矿物，他们不情愿地回到了文明空间，不过令他们感到满足的是，他们比之前的任何人类都更深入南方。可是等他们回国后才得知，在他们出发许多年后有一支艾玛远征队也出动了，他们使用了许多先进的技术，在现在称为特里菲斯的星域打通了一条平行路线，在未知领域中进一步穿行了几乎10光年的距离，而且早在数十年前就回来了。这支进行了远征的部族名称如今已淹没在历史的海洋中。
en: Immensea was mapped entirely by successive generations of an Ammatar Wayfinder clan. Driven by tales of massive clusters of Arkanor in the deep south, they forged deeper and deeper into unexplored territory, mapping out a long corridor of space. Eventually they encountered one of the many great voids littering the southern expanses and could go no further. Failing to locate precious minerals in any extraordinary volumes, they reluctantly turned back and returned to civilized space, content with the knowledge that they had pushed further south than any previous human.     It was only on their repatriation that they learnt of the Amarrian expedition launched many years later that, capitalizing on a number of technological advancements, had pushed down a parallel route through what is now Tenerifis, penetrating almost ten light years further into uncharted territory and returning decades earlier. The name of the clan who mounted the expedition is now lost to history.

zh: 作为一座在宇宙“北方”四散蔓延的星域，静寂谷星域是EVE中著名的最不祥的星域之一。很多人认为静寂谷星域是闹鬼的古代遗物，而那些在该区域巡游、打捞资源的古斯塔斯海盗令这种说法更加可信。还有很多谣言说，朱庇特人在这里进行秘密试验，但从没人提供过有关证据。该星域是最靠近朱庇特空间的区域之一，不过这里已经没有能通向朱庇特空间的尚能正常运作的星门了。许多其他帝国曾试图在这里建造间谍站以期探测出朱庇特的秘密，但在环境如此严酷的区域，没有空间站能维持多长时间。现在，这块区域已完全是飞行员的世界，他们证明了自己比之前的到访者要顽强勇敢得多。
en: A sprawling region in the galactic "north," the Vale of the Silent has a reputation as one of the most foreboding regions in the cluster. The Guristas pirates who prowl the area, scavenging for resources, do little to dispel the notion that the Vale is a haunted relic of times past. Rumors of secret Jovian experiments in the area abound, though no one has ever given proof of such things. The region is one of the closest areas to Jovian space, despite no longer having any functioning stargates leading there. Many of the other Empires have made attempts to set up spying stations in an attempt to probe out Jovian secrets, but none have lasted long in the harsh area. Now, the area is left totally to capsuleer control and they have proven hardier than those who came before them.

zh: 作为东南部宇宙的核心，该星域长久以来是天使企业联合体的心脏，也是图克尔先驱者经常光顾的地方。在该星系漫长、劣迹斑斑的历史中，它以其迷宫般的星系、中央式的位置以及众多出口成为了许多臭名昭著的犯罪分子钟爱的藏身所。某些史上最恶劣的罪犯(包括连环种族灭绝犯黑哈罗德，大魔头鲁西亚斯和谜一般的苏萨塔)都逃到了邪恶湾流的黑暗怀抱中(其中也有一些被人追踪至此并抓获)。
en: Forming the core of the southeastern cluster, this has long been a heartland of the Angel Cartel, as well as a frequent stomping ground of Thukker outriders. Its maze of systems, centralized position and multiple exits have also made it a favored hideaway of many particularly notorious criminals over the course of its long, tainted history. Some of the most infamous villains in living memory (including serially genocidal Black Harold, the arch-defiler Lucias, and the enigma that was Susa'tah) have run to - and occasionally been run to ground in - the Creek's dark embrace.

zh: 卡彻星域长期以来是具有重要战略意义的星域。在向边缘地区扩张的初期，它将卡尼迪王国、萨沙共和国和天使企业联合体连接起来，而且由于与普罗维登斯星域相连，它被艾玛帝国赋予“南方大门”的重要地位。但是与黑渊星域等星域不同，该星域的重要性并未随着飞行员时代的到来而褪去，因为它东西纵横的分支连接确保了其持续的实用性。结果，它落得了一个非常血腥的名声--有人说，这里的星星反射着无数陨落灵魂的垂死气息。
en: Catch has long been a strategically important region. During the initial expansion into the rim territories, it linked the Khanid Kingdom, Sansha's Nation and the Angel Cartel to one another, and through its connections to Providence was given considerable status as the "Southern Gateway" by the Amarr Empire. Unlike regions such as Pure Blind, however, its importance did not fade with the dawn of the capsuleer era, as its branching links east and west ensured continued relevance. As a consequence it has earned itself a bloody reputation - some say the very stars reverberate with the dying breaths of the countless lost souls.

zh: 只有通过许多苦难 人才能被剥落到最本真的状态 而且，在这种状态下 没有干扰 他的灵魂才能自由翱翔 这时 他最接近上帝 --圣典，使命诗篇42:5
en: Only through many hardships Is a man stripped to his very foundations And in such a state Devoid of distractions Is his soul free to soar And in this He is closest to God - The Scriptures, Book of Missions Verses 42:5

zh: 各个大国对名为因斯姆尔的星域了解得并不是很多。该星域一直是天使企业联合体的出没之地，它在密集的东南部宇宙与神秘的地窖星域之间形成了一道纠结繁复的壁垒。这里曾只是一个人迹罕至的偏僻守卫地，但在频谱突破事件之后，这里成为了南部广袤空间和无人机肆虐的东部星域之间的主要通道。
en: Little is known by the Empires about the region known as Insmother. Long a haunt of the Angel Cartel, it forms a tangled barrier between the dense south-eastern cluster and the barbed mystery of the Cache region. Once the guardian of a little-visited backwater volume, in the wake of the Spectrum Breach incident it now serves as the primary corridor between the southern expanse and the drone-infested eastern regions.

zh: 各种探险家和开拓者都必然到达的终点，钴蓝边域就直接同无人机星域次级星团所接壤，就像一把星星做成的利剑直插到星际空间之中。它在四周的地势中凸显出的优势吸引了一些非常具有冒险兴趣的自由无人机，还有那些患有严重流浪癖和淘金癖的克隆飞行员。那些飞行员从钴蓝边域将许多奇异的故事带到了临近星域的各个殖民区和每个道口车展：那些关于幽魂一般游荡着的无人机的故事，它们精通于做一些超乎常人理解的事情；也有关于一些孤独的游客被自由无人机群所猎捕的故事；还有“独行者”在危急情况中帮助克隆飞行员的故事。很多这些传闻都被否定了，至少除了那个自由无人机助人为乐之外的谣传都被否定了。不过那些声称见证过这些谣传的人都坚持它们的真实性，并且还源源不断地有人把一些新的故事从钴蓝边域带到沙龙的聊天中来。
en: A natural destination for explorers and adventurers of all kinds, Cobalt Edge juts up and out of the Drone Regions subcluster, thrusting a long wicked blade of stars out into intergalactic space. Its status as a prominence in the local geography seems to have attracted the attentions of some of the more adventurous rogue drones, as well as capsuleers motivated by wanderlust as well as greed for untapped resources.     Many strange tales have been brought back from the Edge to the stopping points and waystations of the growing colonies in the neighboring regions: tales of rare solitary drones, specialized beyond normal experience, wandering the systems; stories of these lone wanderers being hunted by packs of 'normal' rogue drones; weird rumors of the 'lonesome ones' actually helping capsuleers in dire circumstances. Most of these tales, not least those claiming aid from rogues, are dismissed out of hand. Yet they persist and are joined by more every time an explorer from the Cobalt Edge sets down in a bar to drink and talk.

zh: 在一段相当长的时间里，加达里合众国在这片他们常称为“北方壁垒”的星域非法部署了数量可观的军队，他们在这个月牙形的星域中巡逻，以期发现并截获来自维纳尔星域的古斯塔斯要塞的侵袭部队。不过，飞行员联盟的到来使加达里的监听哨站既难以维系也毫无必要，因此他们疏散了自己的资产并从该星域撤退。虽然各帝国视该星域为壁垒，飞行员们却认为它是条运输通道，如今，“特布特星域管道”已成为具有战略意义的路线，推动着合众国和北方区域间的贸易。
en: For a long time, the Caldari State maintained an illicit but considerable military presence in the region they often referred to as "The Northern Barrier," patrolling the crescent-shaped region in an attempt to detect and intercept raiding parties from the Gurista strongholds in Venal. The arrival of capsuleer alliances made their listening posts both untenable and unnecessary, so they evacuated their assets and retreated from the region. Where the Empires saw a barrier, the capsuleers see a transit corridor, and the "Tribute Pipeline" is now a strategically important route carrying trade between the State and the northern territories.

zh: 在宇宙南部的延伸区域，底特里德星域就座落在其强大的邻居之后。这个低调的星域是被称为“死亡风暴”的宇宙现象的故乡，这种现象目前还没有在别处发现过。它们会随机出现，以某些行星为中心，在该区域肆意破坏好几天，然后突然消失。科学家们几乎没有机会前往该星域研究死亡风暴，因为底特里德曾经是朱庇特帝国的边界，如今它属于天使企业联合体的地盘。当前的理论指出，这些风暴如同太空中的撕口。它们为什么会出现，为什么以某些星球为中心，这些都是难以解释的谜团，而且在相当一段时间里都将如此。
en: In the outer reaches of the south, nestled behind its formidable neighbors, lies Detorid. This unassuming region is home to what have become termed dead storms, a phenomenon thus far not found anywhere else. They appear randomly, centered around certain planets, ravage the area for days, then abruptly vanish.    Scientists have had relatively few chances to travel to the region to study dead storms, as Detorid once marked the edge of the Jove Empire and now lies within the Angel Cartel's territory. Current theory points to the storms being tears in the fabric of space. Why they exist in the first place, or the reason for their being focused around certain planets, remain mysteries and will no doubt do so for some time yet.

zh: 在新伊甸之门坍塌之前，人类就已经游离散居在新伊甸的各个星系了。在许多区域，许多文化与其他文明之间切断了联系，处于孤立繁荣状态。非塔波利斯就是这类星域之一，它是一个由进步思想家和平等主义政治哲学家组成的相对较小的帝国。不幸的是，这个国家在科学技术方面远远落后于其他帝国，他们近期刚开始对本地空间进行殖民时，残酷的天使企业联合体就闯了进来试图统治这里。这个初出茅庐的帝国被天使企业联合体的军队完全压倒并轻而易举地征服，其所有人民如今都对天使俯首称臣。
en: The human diaspora throughout the systems of New Eden was quite widespread prior to the collapse of the EVE Gate. In many areas, cultures cut off from other civilizations thrived in isolation. One of these regions was Feythabolis, a relatively small empire of progressive thinkers and egalitarian political philosophers. Unfortunately, this state lagged behind other empires significantly in technological advancement, having only recently started to colonize the local space just as the ruthless Angel Cartel was moving in to establish their control. Completely outclassed by the military forces of the Cartel, the fledgling empire was defeated with ease and its entire population bent to the will of the Angels.

zh: 在无人机占据的星域次成星团心腹地带，糟粕之域成为了很多粗心大意之人的坟地，并以此为名。在克隆飞行员扩张时代的早期，这里复杂交错的航道让无数饥渴的探险者迷失方向。死于自由无人机之手很快成为海盗袭击和战争之外的又一个主要死亡因素。由于克隆飞行员们已经习惯了在其他很多外围星域所养成的行为模式，糟粕之域的名声让他们很多人都会在自己航线中避开这里，转而到别的地方寻求发展的机会。
en: At the heart of the Drone Regions subcluster, Malpais quickly gained a reputation as a graveyard for the unwary, its twisting routes leading many eager explorers astray in the early days of the capsuleer expansion into the region. Death by rogue drones was before long joined by death by piracy and war. As capsuleers settled into the patterns of behavior seen in so many other outer regions, the region's reputation led many to avoid it in favor of opportunities elsewhere.

zh: 在欧米斯特，文明要给对生存的渴望让路。在这里，不是一家军团与另一家军团竞争。而是部落之间展开血腥战斗，这并非出于意识形态差异或其他崇高的理由。人们在欧米斯特争斗仅仅是出于人性最基本的渴望。这就是在前线的最前线的生活方式。它很黑暗、残忍而且不可宽恕。从某种意义上说，欧米斯特是宇宙其他部分提炼出的最基本属性。 那些能在这里生存并茁壮成长的人对那些文明空间的享乐者来说就像是难以驾驭的神灵。
en: Out in Omist, civilization gives way to survival. Here, it is not one corporation against another. It is one tribe fighting in a blood war against another, not out of differing ideologies or any higher reasoning. It is only for the basest necessities of humanity that men wage war in Omist. Such is the way of life on the frontier's frontier. It is dark, brutal, and unforgiving. In a way, Omist is the rest of the galaxy, distilled down to its most elementary nature. Those who can survive and thrive here seem as untamed gods to those who luxuriate in more civilized space.

zh: 在萨沙共和国的最初扩张期间，帝国法庭的某些势力预见到将与他们曾经支持的对象发生冲突，因此开始构想侵略计划。事情从一开始就很清楚，如果要穿越埃索特亚星域，就必然要遭到来自混浊星域的交叉攻击，这对萨沙非常有利，所以帝国势力委派了一支军事远征队去搜寻另一条可行路线。远征队的首领，巴利尔斯海军准将最初取得了不错的进展，但不久就在他们的路线遭遇了一大块虚空。他的舰船在该虚空东部边界的群星间高低穿行，绘制了许多星系的星图，但无法再向前行进。最终，他承认失败，向舰队指挥部发了一条直率的讯息：“长官，我们遇到了死路。”
en: During the initial expansion of Sansha's Nation, some factions in the Imperial Court foresaw the coming conflict with that which they once supported and began formulating plans for an invasion. It was clear right from the beginning that the inability to penetrate into Esoteria without running the gauntlet of Stain would play in Sansha's favor, so they commissioned a military expedition to search for an alternate route in. Its leader, Commodore Barius, made good progress initially but soon ran into a great empty expanse blocking their path. His ships roamed high and low through the wall of stars marking the void's eastern edge, mapping many systems but failing to make any forward progress. Eventually, admitting defeat, he sent a single blunt transmission to Fleet Command: "Sir, we have reached an impasse."

zh: 在试图确定各星域间的通用计时标准时，在提出方案的团体中有一支被称为算数者。算数者主要由工程师和物理学家组成，他们主张用自然发生的现象和由此得出的数列来确定“纯粹”的时钟。在此期间，如今人们所知的贝斯星域成为了研究密集区域。由于各种频率的脉冲星超乎寻常地聚集在这一星域，物理学家们试图找出所有谐频中的最小通用分母，也就是天文学家卡伦图斯·霍尔辛所给的浅显定义：“一种可以粗略测量最短周期的基数，所有较大的时间单位都将表示为该基数的倍数。”但在传统主义者以他们对地球标准时钟的历史性重建得胜之后，该星域众多科学探索的重要性也就立刻下降了，如今，这里数量众多的脉冲星和其他天体现象在人们眼里不过是些有趣的玩意。
en: When attempting to determine a universal timekeeping standard between regions, one of the factions attempting to make their case came to be known as the Arithmetics. Comprised mainly of engineers and physicists, the Arithmetics sought to use naturally occurring phenomena and mathematical permutations thereof to dictate a "pure" clock. During this time, the region now known as Period Basis was an area of intensive research. The region's inordinately high concentration of pulsars of various frequencies led the physicists to try to find some lowest common denominator among the harmonics, or in the common parlance of astronomer Callentus Holzine, "a basis from which the shortest period can be rigorously calculated, with all larger units of time expressed as multiples of that period." Once the Traditionalists carried the day with their historical reconstructions of the Earth-standard clock, extensive scientific exploration of the region lapsed in importance, and today the region's large number of pulsars and other stellar phenomena are largely considered merely a curiosity.

zh: 在超新星诺克石得以发现并带来工业变革之前，外环星域仅被视为一块平平无奇的空间。 这就是为什么外空联合矿业集团能以这里为事业起点，一边挖着“低级”矿石，一边勇敢探索非法空间。但精炼超新星诺克石的流程一经发现之后，外环星域立刻成为一座金矿。 外空联合矿业集团快速成为小行星采矿领域的先锋。当然，伴随着这种巨额财富的始终是挑战。数十年来，ORE一直称莫德团的天使成员为其最亲密的盟友。这些训练极其有素的雇佣兵在外环星域巡逻，防止有人制造麻烦，尤其盯着那些经常在该区域进行侵袭的天蛇。不过当天蛇购买了ORE的大半股份时，他们确实笑到了最后。现在，天蛇可以在外环星域任意巡游，没有人敢阻拦。
en: Before the discovery of nocxium changed the way industry functioned, the Outer Ring was considered nothing more than an average parcel of space. That was why Outer Ring Excavations was able to get their start here, mining the "low end" ores while braving unlawful space. But once the process of refining nocxium was discovered, the Outer Ring became a gold mine. Outer Ring Excavations quickly became leaders in the field of asteroid mining. Of course, such wealth always brings challenges.    For decades, ORE called Mordu's Angels their closest allies. The highly trained and proficient mercenaries patrolled the Outer Ring for troublemakers, focusing in particular on the Serpentis who made regular raids into the area. The Serpentis had the last laugh, though, when they bought a majority share in ORE. Now the Serpentis prowl the space lanes of the Outer Ring virtually unopposed.

zh: 地窖星域的历史一直笼罩在迷雾之中，甚至四大帝国中最神通广大者对其也了解甚少。关于该星域最初的探索者以及他们的探索内容没有任何记录。该星域如同狂乱的利爪一般深入东部黑暗的宇宙，将四散的星辰串接起来，形成一条扭曲的项链，那些星星就是挂在上面的冰冻泪珠。那些无名的航行者究竟希望在这坟墓般冰冷、无迹可寻的空间中找些什么呢？这座星域在非常不可思议的位置戛然而止，那么那些航行者到底找到他们的目标了吗？还是说，他们遭遇了可怕的命运？
en: The history of Cache is shrouded in mystery, even among the highest levels of the four Empires. No record remains of its original explorers, or what they were after. The region stretches out into the eastern darkness like a mangled claw, stringing far-flung stars into a twisted necklace of frozen tears. What did the nameless voyagers hope to find out in the cold tomb of trackless space? And given the abrupt end to which the region comes, did they find it, or did some darker fate befall them?

zh: 塔伊斯 VIII (京诺矿井) - 卫星 1

孤独之域名不符实，根本不是个和平宁静的地方。它本质上同联邦其他领地脱离，挤在辛迪加和艾玛帝国之间。但尽管空间狭小且隔离，孤独之域在联邦中具有非常重要的作用。这不仅是因为它地处战略要地，还因为联邦大多数最具影响力和魅力的政治家均来自孤独之域。当前参议院中的15%，比如前总统候选人布拉克参议员，要么代表孤独之域，要么就是在该星域出生然后移民到别处。有人怀疑，正是因为这样，所以在联邦政治的某些部分存在着好战和孤立主义倾向。
en: Despite its name, Solitude is hardly peaceful and quiet. Physically separated from the rest of the Federation it lies wedged between the Syndicate and the Amarr Empire. But for such a small, segregated sector of space, Solitude commands a great deal of influence in the Federation. Not only for its strategic location but the fact that many of the Federation's most influential and charismatic politicians come from Solitude. Over 15% of the current Senate, such as former Presidential candidate Senator Blaque, either represent Solitude or were born in the region and later migrated to others. This, some speculate, is what has led to the somewhat more warlike and isolationist tendencies within some quarters of the Federations politics.

zh:
孩子们。

别打扰我们。

对于很多人来说，这里是通往无人机星域的大门，琉蓝之穹很快被大量的殖民区所充斥，这些人都期望能在那些新星域里找到自己的财富。实际上，米玛塔尔共和国比其他所有的国家都更仔细地考虑了它的战略价值，而且在相邻的星系就有便捷快速的通道可以直接抵达琉蓝之穹，这不得不说是一个巨大的引诱。斯卡尔克恩事件在其他事物吸引到米玛塔尔部族的注意力之前就展示了这种战略价值的脆弱性。尽管如此，图克尔商贸大亨们依然在大荒野临近的一个区域维持着自己的利益，并且在那儿成为自由无人机的管理者。在这里，精明的图克尔人从探索和钻研的古老传统中所获得的价值，不仅仅是只有那些个懂得如何将自由无人机技术件转化成生产力的专家。
en: Considered by many to be the gateway to the Drone Regions, Etherium Reach rapidly became extensively colonized by those drawn to the opportunities opened up in the newly-accessible systems. Briefly, the Minmatar Republic pondered its strategic advantage over most other empires, with proximity to the regions through relatively short routes into the Reach no doubt tempting.     The Skarkon Incident showed how tenuous its advantage really was before other matters demanded the full attention of the Minmatar tribes. Even so, some Thukker caravan masters continue to maintain an interest in an area abutting onto their Great Wildands domains and have become authorities on the rogue drones. Expertise on the uses to which rogue drone parts can be put is not the least of the advantages the wily Thukker derive from their age old traditions of exploration and specialization.

zh: 尤普林古尔 IV (诺多黎雅)
尤普林古尔 IV (诺多黎雅) - 卫星 1

尽管拥有可观的矿物储量，但血脉星域作为北方的偏远地区仍然是个荒凉且少有人烟的星域。与人口稠密的其他北方星域不同，血脉星域及其相邻的特纳星域的空间位置正处在古斯塔斯海盗滋生的维纳尔星域之后，因此访问这两个星域比一般情况要危险得多。但从一个有违情理的角度说，这种难以到达性正是其最大的魅力之一。许多飞行员势力认为这块隔绝的僻静之地非常适合建立他们统治下的防御核心。
en: The northern hinterland of Branch remains a dismal and largely desolate region, despite its considerable mineral wealth. Unlike the rest of the densely-packed northern cluster, Branch and its neighbor Tenal occupy a sector of space located behind the vast tracts of Guristas-infested Venal, making access to them even more hazardous than usual. Perversely, this inaccessibility is also one of its greatest attractions: many capsuleer regimes have found this isolated fastness perfect for establishing the fortified core of their dominion.

zh: 尽管被古斯塔斯侵占着，但对舞之域仍是理性思维社团的家园。他们的总部就位于该星域的中部，距文明空间有相当的距离。许多人声称，该社团最有天赋的学生均被带到这来了解社团的最高机密，远远躲开了他们父母和各帝国的窥探。虽然这些说法相当古怪，但考虑到古斯塔斯为空间站提供了相当宽敞的停泊处，那么有谣言说理性思维社团并非人们认为的那样消极被动也就不足为奇了。
en: Despite being overrun by Guristas, Geminate is home to the Society of Conscious Thought. Their headquarters are located in the middle of the region, quite a distance from civilized space. Many contend that the Society's most gifted students are brought here to learn the innermost secrets of the Society, far from the prying eyes of their parents and the Empires. Though the claims appear quite outlandish, the fact that the Guristas give the station a wide berth has lead to rumors that the Society isn't nearly as passive as many think.

zh: 帕多尔 III (乌加尔) - 卫星 1
帕多尔 III (乌加尔) - 卫星 2
帕多尔 IV (玛塔尔) - 卫星 1
帕多尔 V (瓦基尔) - 卫星 1
帕多尔 VII (库海姆) - 卫星 1
帕多尔 VIII (欧林) - 卫星 1

当萨沙共和国仍如日中天时，埃索特亚星域是其最富庶的领地。学者、哲学家、科学家以及许多最富裕的“忠实公民”都以这里为家。这些居住者仰仗着该星域的偏远位置来保证自身的安全，而且他们认为，混浊星域中的忠实劳工军团将是一道任何人都无法穿越的屏障。当帝国盟军如潮水般冲击了萨沙共和国时，那道屏障被彻底击碎，他们的部队在盟军的压倒性力量下四分五裂。然后，像古代的野蛮人一样，艾玛帝国的军团势如破竹地冲入埃索特亚，对眼前的一切进行夺取和消灭。如今，在这里一度无比显赫的萨沙帝国只剩下漂浮的残骸；巨大的遗迹既是对萨沙旧梦的挽歌，也是对任何可能激怒四大帝国的人的严厉警告。萨沙共和国仍不断派船只到该区域来，企图从中搜寻出一些失落的技术以使他们在实现复兴萨沙梦想的努力中获得优势。
en: When Sansha's Nation was at the height of its power, Esoteria was one of its richest territories. Scholars, philosophers, scientists, and many of its most affluent True Citizens made it their home. The occupants relied on the remoteness of the region to keep them safe, anticipating that the legions of True Slaves in Stain would remain an impenetrable shield that none could pass.    When the Alliance of Empires swept down upon the Nation, the shield was shattered and their forces crushed under the alliance's unassailable might. Then, like barbarians of old, the forces of the Amarr Empire crashed into Esoteria, pillaging and slaughtering all before them.    Now, all that remains of the Nation's once-pervasive presence in the area is floating husks; great ruins that stand as both a eulogy to Sansha's former dream and a stark warning to any who might provoke the ire of all four Empire. The Nation continues to send their own ships into the area, scouring it for any bit of lost technology that might give them an edge in their attempt to resurrect Sansha's dream.

zh: 当萨萨比克教徒首次被信仰者议会定为异教团体后，他们被逐出了他们在艾玛帝国的家园。他们中的许多人逃亡到了幽暗之域，他们在那里躲藏了数世纪，忙着内部斗争，直到有一支派系以胜利者姿态出现——血袭者。幽暗之域在新伊甸纪元107年6月之前一直是血袭者的权力老巢，但在玛布冷的恐怖事件发生之后，愤怒的帝国海军驾临幽暗之域，迫使血袭者从那里撤离。但他们的身影仍在该星域出没，毕竟这里对最警惕的旅行者来说也是个不受法律约束的危险之地。  近期以来，这块向来被忽视的星域再次获得了某些重要的地位。反抗之战的主要战争几乎都是在这座星域进行的，那一冲突的余波及其炽烈的后果至今仍在传播。许多人认为，当艾玛帝国和其之前的奴隶爆发不可避免的冲突之时，幽暗之域必将成为中心战场，这使得某些人仍有着在该星域大干一番的计划。
en: When the Sani Sabik cults were first deemed heretical by the Council of Apostles millennia ago, they were driven out of the homelands of the Amarr Empire. Many of them fled to the Bleak Lands, where they sulked in hiding for centuries fighting amongst themselves until one stood victorious, The Blood Raiders. The Bleaks remained their seat of power until June 107 when, following the horrors of Mabnen, the Imperial Navy descended upon the region with all their fury and rage, forcing the Blood Raiders to retreat out of the Bleak Lands. Their presence is still felt, as the region remains a lawless danger to even the most wary traveler.  Recent times have pushed this traditionally neglected region once more back into a position of some prominence. The brief War of Defiance was fought almost entirely within this region, and the ripples of that conflict and its fiery conclusion are still spreading. Many see the Bleaks as a central battlefield in the oft-predicted conflagration between the Empire and its former slaves, ensuring that some at least still have serious plans for the volume.

zh: 当黑渊星域首次被正式绘成星图时，它被标记为即将成立的加达里第四行政区。但一长串的物流和政治困难随即出现，因此该计划被无数次搁置，但从未彻底取消。最近的民众压力又使该计划起死回生，而且有一阵子看来，它也许真能取得进展。但结果表明，创建第四行政区的最佳时机已经过去--该星域现在已被著名的莫德团的加达里效忠者部队和公开表示中立的姐妹会占据，余下的空间由各种飞行员势力牢牢控制，尽管他们的资源相对缺乏，但并未因此受挫。尴尬万分的合众国只能把注意力转向别处；看来，在可以预见的将来，黑渊星域仍将是竞争性传统力量与飞行员力量的大熔炉。
en: When Pure Blind was first properly mapped, it was earmarked to become the Caldari's Fourth District. A long chain of logistical and political difficulties ensued, and the plan was shelved numerous times but never quite died. Recent population pressures brought the plans back from death yet again, and for a while it seemed as if they might finally go ahead. However, it turned out that the moment had already passed - the region was now home to both the Caldari Loyalist forces of Mordu's famous Legion and the avowedly neutral Servant Sisters of EVE, and the remaining volumes were gripped tightly by various capsuleer factions who were undeterred by its comparative lack of resources. Frustrated, the State turned its attentions elsewhere, and it seems that Pure Blind will remain a turgid melting pot of competing traditional and capsuleer forces for the foreseeable future.

zh: 德克廉星域是一条狭长恒星带，由帝国空间外某些最古老的星门松散连接。这座星域就如同一根指向虚空的指骨，它是如此遥远，以致于该星域首次被探索时建立的某些星门目前仍在使用中。虽然在大多数星域，星门员工每五年左右就会换一次，但在德克廉星域，有些最古老的星门已由同一家族操作了数百年。这些家族对于他们的星门及其形成的网络有着丰富的知识。曾经有这样一种做法，有抱负的星门管理人要前往德克廉星域生活一年，然后获得“经德克廉星域培训”的头衔并回来，这种荣誉头衔几乎能保证他们在返回时获得首席星门操作员的职位。当然，有些人永远也回不来……随着古斯塔斯势力在该区域不断增强，这种做法停止了，不过那些家族仍然存在，维持着星门网络的运行，将他们广博的知识传递给那些勇于穿越火力找到他们的星门操作员。
en: Deklein is a narrow band of stars loosely connected by some of the most ancient gates outside of empire space. Reminiscent of a skeletal finger pointing out toward the void, it is such a remote region that some of the gates found when the area was first explored are still in use. While in most regions gate crews swap out every five years or so, in Deklein some of these ancient gates have been run by the same family for hundreds of years.    These families have intricate knowledge of their gates and the network they're connected to. It was once the practice that aspiring gatemen would travel to Deklein to do their year and come back “Deklein-trained” – a title of some honor which would almost guarantee them a chief gate operator position upon their return. Of course, some never would return...    With the gradual influx of heavy Gurista presence in the area this practice ceased, although the families still exist, keeping the gate network running and passing on their extensive knowledge to any gate operator crazy enough to run the gauntlet of dangers to reach them.

zh: 德里克星域——艾玛达特统区的主权统治区，在米玛塔尔抗争末期成为了艾玛军队侧翼的保护地。随着抗争军力量不断试图深入他们昔日主人的领地，德里克见证了艾玛和抗争军之间许多惨烈的对抗。艾玛后来终于守住了阵地，这大部分要归功于艾玛达人的军事协助，因此艾玛人奖励给了艾玛达人一片属于他们自己的领地。不过，这块空间与新成立的米玛塔尔共和国以及艾玛帝国接壤，因此可谓处于列强环伺之下。由于没有通往别处的安全路径，该星域的当地经济曾依赖与艾玛人的贸易作为其主要生存手段。艾玛达人数十年来在经济萧条和贸易伙伴稀少的状况下坚持着，不过在近几十年来，他们的坚韧不拔终于换来了经济的繁荣。这条艰难的道路令所有艾玛达人感到自豪，而且极大地巩固了他们的艾玛信仰。
en: The Derelik region, sovereign seat of the Ammatar Mandate, became the shield to the Amarrian flank in the wake of the Minmatar Rebellion. Derelik witnessed many hostile exchanges between the Amarr and rebel forces as the latter tried to push deeper into the territory of their former masters. Having held their ground, thanks in no small part to the Ammatars' military efforts, the Amarr awarded the Ammatar with their own province. However, this portion of space shared borders with the newly forming Minmatar Republic as well as the Empire, and thus came to be situated in a dark recess surrounded by hostiles.   Given the lack of safe routes elsewhere, the local economies of this region were dependent on trade with the Amarr as their primary means of survival. The Ammatar persevered over many decades of economic stagnation and limited trade partners, and their determination has in recent decades been rewarded with an increase in economic prosperity. This harsh trail is a point of pride for all who call themselves Ammatar, and it has bolstered their faith in the Amarrian way to no end.

zh:
我们曾经强大，星星对我们俯首称臣，我们的影响无边无界，我们的力量无与争锋，伸出双手，我们试图 触碰完美的脸庞，但我们却过于靠近那不是凡间的圣物，于是我们的惩罚就是我们的诅咒，我们无尽的悲哀。--一首朱庇特古诗的译文

“所谓的完美根本不是人们吹嘘的那样”--天使语
en:
Once we were mighty, Stars bent to our will, Our reach was infinite, Our power incontestable, With outstretched hands we tried, To touch the face of perfection, But we came too close, To that which is not due mortals, And our punishment is our curse, Our endless sorrow. - Translation of an old Jovian poem

"Perfection ain't all it's cracked up to be" - Angel saying

zh: 我的话语在所有人心里 它需要的只是一丝信仰 来点燃火种 这样迷途人可以找到归路 沉沦者可以崛起 从而成为我选定的子民 因为你们都是我的造物 在我的王国中全都平等--神典，失落的篇章。
en: My word lies within all All it requires is the breath of faith To ignite the fire So the lost can find their way So the fallen can rise To take their place as my chosen For you are all my creation And are all equal in my kingdom - Apocryphon, Lost Passages.

zh:
数百年来，人们都因遭遇某种难以解释的现象而无法进入该片区域进行调查。虽然该区域看上去空空如也，但进入它那里的舰船都会突然消失，一去不复返。在第一次加达里-盖伦特大战时期及之后的冷战期，该区域因此反而成了抵挡侧翼攻击的一座坚实壁垒。

数十年前，一群志同道合的加达里超级军团找到了安全穿越暗涌之域的方法，悄悄开始了殖民运动。势力战争的爆发迫使它们将这一地下行动公知于众。之后这里便成了加达里与盖伦特争夺的焦点。

如今该片区域还没完全发展起来，不过其蕴含的矿物资源非常丰富。虽然那至今尚无人理解的奇怪消失现象给人们带来了诸多不便，但只要利用流体路由网络与跳跃引擎，人们就可以进行通信并穿梭来往。不过关于那些早期在此消失的舰船，人们至今仍无一丝线索。
en:
For centuries, this volume of space remained inexplicably impenetrable to investigation. It possesses no apparent mass or dimension, but the abrupt disappearance of every expedition into the zone made it an effective bulwark against flanking attacks during the first Gallente-Caldari war, and the subsequent uneasy peace.

Several decades ago, a coalition of like-minded Caldari megacorps discovered ways to traverse Black Rise safely, and began a secret programme of colonization. The start of the Empyrean War forced them to show their hand, and the region soon became a key front in the conflict between Caldari and Gallente forces.

Today the region remains somewhat underdeveloped, but rich in raw materials. The poorly-understood phenomena that still manifest can make life awkward, but fluid router networks and jump travel permit unrestricted travel and communications. Of the many early expeditions, though, no trace has yet been found.

zh: 斐德星域是块不详的空间，长期被视为宇宙的穷乡僻壤，这里曾经驻扎了至少十几支相互竞争的小型海盗势力。由于他们之间冲突不断，因此从未对帝国空间造成多大威胁，所以通常都被忽略。这种情况直到天蛇出现并开始扩大势力后才有所改变。在天蛇看来，这座星域是颗已经成熟的果实，只待收割，所以天蛇将自己的人马安插进几个最强大的势力内部，让他们互相争斗从而在政治上和军事上削弱他们，这样天蛇进驻并接受该星域就如同走走形式一般简单了。这一招大胆的举动使天蛇牢牢地在主要帝国的星图上占据了一席之地。
en: A foreboding area of space long considered to be the backwater of the galaxy, Fade was once the home of no less than a dozen small competing pirate sects. Never managing to pose much of a threat to Empire space due to their frequent clashes, they were mostly ignored. That is, until the Serpentis came to be and began expanding its power base.    Seeing a region ripe for the picking, the Serpentis began to insinuate its people into several of the most powerful factions, playing them off against each other until they were sufficiently weakened both politically and militarily that moving in and taking control was simply a formality.  This audacious move put the Serpentis firmly on the map of even the major Empires.

最亲爱的艾洛伊斯：我为这条消息的迟来而道歉。似乎我们的东道主已经把他的研究事业转移到国外了，因此这次劳工运输成为一项耗时长久的任务。当我询问原因时，我们的东道主向我保证说，我们接下来对设施的参观将能说明一切。我还是保持怀疑。不过，我承诺尽快回到你身边。艾洛伊斯：这里的设施太棒了！我们的东道主召集了一支由最聪明的科学家组成的团队来将他的梦想变成现实。他们取得了重大进展，光他们的头盖植入体技术理论就已经让人眼花缭乱了。艾洛伊斯：我们的东道主向我们展示了我运输的那些劳工变成了什么。那些牲口非常安静呆滞。我跟你说，就好像他们的灵魂已经从身上剥离了似的。我明天会跟我们的东道主说说我对这事的担忧。艾洛伊斯：我们的东道主宣布了他的“共和国”诞生。我给内务府发了一份公报。艾洛伊斯：我发现我的消息都被阻止了。我们的东道主从来没有打算发送它们。现在到处都是他的机器人。他们的数量每天都在增长。他们在监视我。我亲爱的妻子：我多么想你啊。那些劳工被设置成与所有非共和国的人为敌。我只是侥幸活了下来。那些东西速度很慢，但很有效率。我听见他们穿过房间的脚步声，有规律而且持续。他们找到我只是个时间问题了。我祈求上帝原谅我们可怕的罪行。我爱你，艾洛伊斯。抱歉，我不得不有失承诺了。
en: Dearest Heloise: I apologize for the tardiness of this message. It seems our host has relocated his research efforts further abroad, making this slave delivery a much longer endeavor. When I asked why, our host assured me that our upcoming tour of the facility would explain everything. I remain skeptical. Regardless, I promise to return to you soon.    Heloise: The facilities here are astounding! Our host has assembled a team of the finest minds to bring his dream to life. They have made major strides-- the implications of their cranial implant technology alone are dazzling.    Heloise: Our host introduced what became of the slaves I delivered. The brutes were silent and inert. I tell you, it was as if their very souls had been stripped from them. I will voice my concerns with our host tomorrow.     Heloise: Our host announced the birth of his 'Nation.' I sent a communique to the Ministry of Internal Order.    Heloise: I discovered my messages are being blocked. Our host never had any intention of sending them. His automatons are everywhere now. Their number grows every day. They are watching me.    My Darling Wife: How I miss you. The slaves have been set against everyone not of the Nation. I survived only by grace. The things are slow, but efficient. I hear their footsteps pass the room, regular, constant. It is only a matter of time. I pray God forgive us our terrible transgressions. I love you, Heloise. I am sorry that I must break my promise.

海盗，恶棍，流氓。人们对谜一般的米玛塔尔部族成员有许多称呼，但没人真正了解他们。我对他们所做的研究恐怕比任何在世的学者都多，但我仍觉得自己只触及皮毛而已。--《哥蒙尼·费鲁什游记》
en: Pirates. Scoundrels. Vagabonds. The most enigmatic of all the Minmatar tribes members are called many things, but no one truly knows them. I have researched them perhaps more than any scholar alive and still I feel I've barely scratched the surface. - The Travels of Germone Ferush

zh: 灼热之径是一片辽阔的恒星温床，是星星的诞生地。这块严酷的宇宙空间是强力离子风暴的故乡，而且剧烈的太阳风经常在这里肆虐，飞船的残骸随处可见，这些都是那些对灼热之径的危险毫无防备的飞行员留下的。  不过，还是有人在这样一个狂暴之地找到了安全和庇护。据传，天使企业联合体在该星域边缘地区有许多由天体现象遮蔽着的基地，而且近期，有许多飞行员团队勇敢地来到这里追求对黑暗权力的梦想。
en: Scalding Pass is a vast stellar nursery, the birth place of stars. A harsh and unforgiving region of space home to violent ion storms and rocked by intense solar winds, the Pass is littered with the wrecks of ships that were blindsided by the unpredictable dangers this region holds.    However, there are some who manage to find solace and safety in such a tumultuous place. The Cartel is rumored to have many outlying bases in the region, masked by stellar phenomena, and in recent times many capsuleer groups have braved its burning embrace in pursuit of their dark dreams of power.

zh: 特纳一直是那些出于各种原因希望远离合众国的人的避风港。由于穿插了古斯塔斯领地，因此前往那里的旅途相当艰辛，但这正是该旅程的主要魅力之一，许多先驱者、隐士和知名度较低的旅者甘冒一切风险来到这块平静的偏僻之地并将其作为家园。有些加达里神秘主义者鼓吹，人们去特纳就能见到造星者，不过这种说法究竟是基于从太空最远处观看特纳时的景象，还仅仅是为了让这条危险的路线显得有些价值，这就不得而知了。
en: Tenal has long been a refuge for those wishing to stray far away from the State, for one reason or another. The journey there is perilous due to the intervening Guristas territories, but that remains a major element of its appeal, and many pioneers, hermits and less reputable travelers have risked everything to travel to this quiet backwater and make it their home. Several Caldari mystics have claimed that Tenal is the place that one should travel to in order to come face to face with the Starsmith, although whether this is in reference to the view into space from its outermost systems or the likely outcome of trying to negotiate the dangers of the route has never been made clear.

zh: 特里菲斯星域将南方大部分辽阔空间一分为二，它既是一条运输通道，也是一条错综复杂的防御线，在最近的血腥历史中，这里经历了不少暴力冲突。与大多数边远领地一样，飞行员时代的来临既给这里带来了财富，也给这里带来了战事。实际上，光提到该星域中某些星系的名字，就能让宇宙各地的飞行员感到不安。
en: Dividing much of the southern expanse into two, Tenerifis acts as both a transit corridor and a sinuous line of fortification, having seen plenty of violence in its recent bloody history. As with most of the outer territories, the advent of the capsuleer era brought wealth and warfare in equal measure. Indeed, the mere mention of the names of some of its systems will unsettle capsuleers all across the cluster.

艾玛帝国一直觊觎其称为普罗维登斯的星域，该星域边界的富饶矿物就如同成熟的果实般举手可摘。但这些计划却由于米玛塔尔叛乱和接下来的瓦克艾蒂斯灾难而被迫搁浅。受到这些事件及其后续影响的牵制，向普罗维登斯扩张的计划最终没有实现。于是，帝国只得任该星域慢慢荒废。如今，飞行员占领了该星域的次要地带，重生的萨沙共和国也打算将他们的势力扩张到这里。不过，只有傻瓜才会以为帝国已彻底忘记了自己的计划。坚忍的艾玛人已学会永远保持耐心和警惕。
en: The Empire long had its eye on the region it named Providence, a wealth of minerals on its border ripe for the plucking. Those plans were forced off the shelf with the Minmatar rebellion and the following disaster of Vak'Atioth. Hamstrung by these events and their repercussions, the expansion into Providence failed to materialize.    So the region was left to waste. Capsuleers now rule the byways, and Sansha's reborn Nation attempts to expand their influence into the region. But only a fool would assume that the Empire has forgotten its plans entirely. The enduring Amarr have learned to be ever patient, ever watchful.

zh: 虽然在很多方面平平无奇，但维格温铎是史上最臭名昭著的一项试验的举办地。铁里耶维就在维格温铎，那是加达里合众国和盖伦特联邦一次致命的合作的遗址。虽然铁里耶维引起的波动在很久以前便平息，但在很多人心目中，维格温铎仍能唤起对那次纯科学合作的记忆。正因为此，该星域中的年轻有理想的科学家数量远远超过那些更大更富裕的区域。许多人梦想着，铁里耶维的希望有朝一日能变成现实，他们能找到促成宇宙间更多科学和睦的蓝图。
en: While otherwise unnotable, Verge Vendor is the home to one of the most infamous experiments of all time. Tierijev is found in Verge Vendor, the site of a doomed cooperative between the Caldari State and the Gallente Federation. While the ripples of Tierijev have long since settled, Verge Vendor still evokes memories of cooperation for the sake of scientific progress in many. As such, the number of young, idealistic scientists found in the region is disproportionately higher than found in other larger, richer areas. Many dream of the day the hope of Tierijev set won't be a simple one-off, but rather a blueprint for greater scientific harmony throughout the galaxy.

zh:
血腥奥玛逃跑了 躲避日光不见人 夜晚现身造基地 远远离开帝国区 贵族以为命得保 皇帝恩泽相庇佑 愚蠢的人啊应知道 种瓜得瓜，种豆得豆 血腥奥玛回来了 无尽黑暗出怪兽 跋涉穿过深红潮 奥玛前来喝你血

--托儿所儿歌
en:
Bloody Omir ran away Hiding from the light of day Made a base out in the night Far far from the Empire's might Holders think they all are safe Protected by the Emp'ror's grace Silly people, they should know You shall reap just what you sow Bloody Omir's coming back Monsters from the endless black Wading through a crimson flood Omir's come to drink your blood

- Nursery Rhyme

zh: 辛塔特 IV (孔拉卡斯) - 卫星 1
辛塔特 IV (孔拉卡斯) - 卫星 2

逑瑞斯星域起初被称为JK-FIX，仅仅是对一大群种类各异的星系的行政归类，这些星系的旁边是早已修建完善的绝地之域。按照大多数习俗，这些星系中的许多都属于绝地之域，但由于血袭者的势力在该星域不断壮大，执政者不得不放弃一部分星系，而剩下的就是如今称为逑瑞斯星域的区域。不过当那部分星域也被血袭者部队占领时，星域的划分已经无关紧要了，但那时星图已经绘制完成。该星域在较近期被赋予了当前的名称(意指一篇晦涩难懂的经文)，虽然它最初的意义已不存在于任何官方记录中，但其部分领地已被勇敢的飞行员占领，那些古老的传统在他们中维持延续。
en: The Querious region was originally referred to as JK-FIX, and was seen as merely an administrative grouping for a large mass of disparate systems discovered near to the already-established Delve region. Many of these should by most conventions be part of Delve proper, but the growing Blood Raider presence in that region drove the administration at the time to fold them in with the rest of what is now Querious. When that region too was overrun by Blood forces the issue became irrelevant, but by then the maps had been finalized. The region was given its current name (a reference to an obscure piece of scripture) relatively recently, and while its original designation is no longer present anywhere in official records, part of it has been adopted by the region's hardy capsuleer residents who keep alive what they see as the old traditions.
